“Takthar a, kiei na nangni dieng kiriei, rieliei a pasha `di na rawjawt a ih `khat nanginik u kha ravan a awm kapa na nangni rang thaw rangnih.
Ajarla kiriming a idi ninawkle uthum ruchun amani kar khan kiei ka`awm.”
Khashole Peter na ama dieng va a ruti, “Pumi, uliennai `khat na kiei dieng munu thaw joiala, ama kha voijat rangaidam kipek rang a maw nih? Voishirishe maw?”
Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kiei na nang dieng voishiri niti mi`ing, inia voishawm shiri kha voishirishe rangaidam roh.
“Hijarhin ravan rengchangna hi reng `khat na oshok hai shierton imushung pe kha le ra`ang inih.
Ama na shierton hai kha imushung pe le roroia, talent bawp shawm atonpa kha ama dieng vak chawi uh.
Inia ama na rupek ngam boi jarkhan, upumpa kha na ama kha unungak nai hai le khan iniei kholok le jor a ieshierton kha thungna rang, chawng rupek joi.
“Khajarkhan shokpa kha na bawklap a ama dieng chubairubawk a ruti, ‘Pumpa, kiei hi nurungakbawt roh, nang dieng kholok a vak mikir rang kanih.’
Shok pumpa kha na ama chung a lainatna runiei a rumoshok joi, khan ieshierton kha rurangaidam pe joi.
“Inia makha shok kha na rushe a, ama dieng dinari rajakhat aton, oshok chang pui `khat vak muk. Ama na ama kha rushur a erek a shawmlam a ruti, ‘Kiei dieng a nangiton kha nepeh rang roh.’
Oshok chang pui kha na ekeshun ah rubu a dawilam a ruti, ‘Nurungakbawt roh, kholok a vak mikir rang kanih.’
“Inia ama na rujawt pe mak. Ama na rushe a, iton kholok kha peksho masheng, tia ama kha lungroko shung ah vak thong joi.
Oshok chang pui hai kha na ashok chon rikip kha rumuk u phakhan, ajeng a ningrushie pui uh. Amani na rushe ua upumpa u dieng ashok chon kholok kha vak riei uh.
“Khashole upumpa kha na shok kha rukoi a ama dieng ruti, ‘Shok tha boi nang! Nangninik jarkhan, nangiton kholok kha kunururangaidam pe.
Kiei na nang chung a koroiruhoi kha ang a, nang shokchang pui chung a roihoina tet naw rawng maw?’
Upumpa kha mulung ruhang pe a, ama dieng a iton kholok kha thungsho masheng, tia micheppa dieng khan rupek joi.
“Khajarkhan nang mulung uah put ah, nang uliennai hai shietna nangrangaidam u nawkatu, ravan a awm kapa na`awm khatikhan nangni dieng thaw rangnih.”
Khan hitihin rushok, Jesu na hihai chawng hi ruriei shole, Galilee ah put ah rushe a, Jordan vara ah awm Judea ram kha rushok joi.
Mipui kha na anu rujui ua kha mun khan amani kha rumadam uh.
Ama kha enretena rang, Pharisee hai eshen va ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Mi `khat na jar `khat a unungak imele hi Dan maw nih?”
Inia mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Amani akonpa kha na putna khan ‘nupang le apa kha rukon,’
khan ruti, ‘Hijarhin apa na unulepa kha mak a ama inkonu le ruchun rangnih. Idi kha taksha `khat chang rangnih,’ iti kha te u makche maw?
Khajarkhan amani kha idi nih u lai mak, inia taksha `khat kha nih u joi. Khajarkhan Pathien na shamishuisha kha miring na shenlai naw rosho.”
Ama dieng ruti uh, “Khanitala ijar a Moses na melena jawtnapek a ama kha mathanna rang chawngirupek maw nih?”
Amani dieng ruti, “Nang mulung u kha michim jar a, nang inkonu u hai mele rang kha, Moses na irujawt inih, inia putna ah put khan tu, kha runimak.
Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei, muruk a ponpha niboia, tunita`awm ama inkonu kha mele a shik `khat niei a tu, uire ithaw inih. Khan mi na imele aniei ama kha na uire ithaw inih.”
Akhaichawi hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Miringpa le inkonu chungchanga khatikhan a awm nitatu, inniei boi kha atha inih.”
Inia amani dieng ruti, “Ipek hai amani dieng niboia, mi rikip na kha chawng kha loi ngam mak.

Ajarla unu naikawk shung ah put ah khatikhan a rushok Eunuch hai awm, miring hai na irumachang Eunuch hai awm, khan eshen na ravan rengchangna rangbak khan a nining a Eunuch ruchang hai awm. Tunita`awm makha aloi ngam kha na loi rosho.”
Khashole naite hai kha amani chung a khut tet a nikna pe rang, amani na vak chawi uh. Inia akhaichawi hai kha na rurawkawk uh.
Inia Jesu na ruti, “Naite hai na kiei dieng ava rang a kha jawt pe u roh. Amani kha makha u naw roh, ajarla kha ang hai dieng khan ravan rengchangna kha awm.”
Khan amani chung khan khut rutet pe shole, khan ah put ah rushe joi.
Khan enro, mi `khat na ava a ama dieng ruti, “Aw Oja Atha, chon atha ih kawthaw `le maw kiei na kumshawt ringna kha muthiei ning?”
Ama dieng rumashang, “Kiei hi ijar a atha nanginiti maw nih? Pathien niboia tute atha awm mak. Hektiknieiboi ringna khan nanglut jawt a tu, chawngpek hai hi jui roh.”
Ama dieng ruti, “Ih hai kha maw?” Jesu na ruriei, “ ‘Mi nangithat boi rang a inih,’ ‘Uire nangithaw boi rang a inih,’ ‘Nangimuruk boi rang a inih,’ ‘Adik boi a kungachang boi rang nangnih,’
‘Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh roh,’ khan ‘Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak ang a numnangipok rang a inih.’ ”
Shanaipa kha na ama dieng rumashang, “Hihai kholok hi korothar chang ah put ah kihawngrung nih joi. Karavatna imaw awmlai?”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Rupumping kha nangnih jawt joiatu, she tana nang niei hai kha vak jor tana shara hai dieng vak peh roh. Khan ravan a bawmniei kha nangniei rangnih, khan va tana nujui roh.”
Inia shanaipa kha na chawng kha rujet `le, mulungshawlam a rushe joi, ajarla ama na niei tampui runiei.
Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, rawchawng miring `khat na ravan rengchangna alut rang a hi matat.
Takthar a nangni dieng kieriei, rawchawng miring `khat na Pathien rengchangna alut rangnek a tu, sharingshiei `khat na shim nokor ah apang rang a kha baidet.”
Akhaichawi hai na makha rujet u phakhan, ajeng a shindawngna niei a ruti uh, “Khanitala tu na maw shanna muh ngam nih?”
Inia Jesu na amani dieng en a ruti, “Miring hai rang tu mahi anithiei boi inih, inia Pathien rang tu kholok nithieiviek.”
Khashole Peter na mashang a ruti, “Enro, ih kholok kurumak ua kinurujui u inih. Khajarkhan kieini na imaw muh u ning?”

Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kieriei, Pathien na nieinak kholok mathar phakhan, Miring Shapa kha na lurna rengmun khan shuh rangnih. Kiei nurujui hai nangniawm rengmun shawmlieidi chung a shuh a Israel phung shawmlieidi kha chawngnangshat pe u rangnih.
Khan kiriming rangbak a in le loi ninawkle uliennai nupang apa ninawkle nu le pa hai rumathan miring rikip na rajarajah a muk rangnih, khan kumshawt ringna kha tum rangnih.
Inia masha mi tampui kha nukna rangnih, khan nukna hai kha masha rangnih.
“Ajarla ravan rengchangna hi ama drakha rohon ah mi moroi rang atawk, jingkarra rushe loipumi kha le ra`ang inih.
Moroimi hai kha nikho `khat a dinari `khat pek rang rurawjawt pui a, ama drakha rohon ah amani kha rutir joi.
“Khan ama na nidan `ko dawr a rushe a miring eshen rievieithawna khan ih thaw boi a ading hai kha vak muk.
Amani dieng ruti, ‘Nangniawm drakha rohon khawn she u roh. Ih nita`awm rutuk kha nepek rang kanih.’ Khan amani kha rushe u joi.
Takthar a nidan shawmlieidi le nidan `thum dawr a rushe phakhan, khatikhan ruthaw.
Khan nidan rahnga dawr hin rushe phakhan, miring eshen chon thaw boi a ading vak muk a amani dieng ruti, ‘Ijar a shunshawt ih thaw boi a hin ading maw nangnih uh?’
Ama dieng rumashang uh, ‘Ajarla tute na kieini hi nomoroi u mak.’ Amani dieng ruti, ‘Nangniawm drakha rohon khawn she u roh. Ih nita`awm rutuk kha nangmuk u rangnih.’
“Khan nitak tieng hin drakha rohon pumpa kha na chonpopa dieng ruti, ‘Moroimi hai kha mutumna ah put ah akhat changnashe kha koi tana amani nilawh kha peh roh.’
“Nidan rahnga dawr a chon thaw hai kha na ava ua dinari `khatkhat hi tumrim uh.
Akhat changna ah put ah chon thaw hai kha na va ua arawpdet mukna rang rumining uh. Inia amaniawm dinari `khatkhat tumrim uh.
Amani na rutum u phakhan, loipumi kha rumieshiet uh.
Amani na ruti uh, ‘Nukkhit a ava hai na nidan `khat chon thaw uh. Khan shunshawt pokrik phung a nisha rophoi kieini hi amani le nangnara`angmashak uh.’
“Inia mashang a amani kar a akhat dieng ruti, ‘Kawlawmpa, kiei na nang dieng rehe mi`ing. Dinari `khat rang a kiei le rurawjawt nimakche maw?
Nang tum kha loi tana she rang roh. Nang dieng kipek kha le ra`angre a nukkhit miringpa dieng kepek jawt.
Ninawkle, kiei dieng a awm kha kidit dan a kithaw hi Dan nih boi maw nih? Ninawkle, katha jarkhan, nang mik`en shie maw nih?’
“Khajarkhan nuknakhit miring kha na mashakhit kha nih rangnih, khan mashakhit kha na nuknakhit kha nih rangnih. Ajarla miring tampui kha okoi, khania lekte kha amadan.”
Khan Jesu na Jerusalem ah ruhawnglai khan, khaichawi shawmlieidi kha lawp a ruchawi a, lam ah amani dieng ruriei,
“Enro, Jerusalem ah nahawng uh, Miring Shapa kha thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai dieng pek rangnih, khan thitnashe rang khan ama kha aheng u rangnih.
Khashole ama kha engshiet a thawna rang, jemna rang, khan cross ah thatna rang, Phungshik hai dieng pek u rangnih. Khan ni `thum changna khan thoiret rangnih.”
Khashole Zebedee shapa hai unu na ashapa hai le Jesu dieng rushe a, chubaibawklam a ih `khat runik.
Ama dieng ruti, “Imaw nangidit?” Ama dieng rumashang, “Kashapa idi hai hi, nang rengchangna mun khan, akhat chang tieng, akhat viei tieng shutna rang, nepek pe roh.”
Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Nanginik kha jet u makche. Kiei na kinek rang a hai aneh, kiloi rang a baptisma le baptisma loi, mahi mawtawr u rawng maw?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Mawtawr u rang kanih.”
Amani dieng ruti, “Kahai kha nangnek u rangnih, khan kabaptisma loina kha nangloi u rangnih. Inia kieviei le kachang a shutna apeh rang a kha kiei nimi`ing, inia kapa na irasham pe hai rang a inih.”
Khan shawm hai kha na makha rujet u phakhan, poro `di hai chung khan mulung rumohoina u lai mak.
Inia Jesu na amani kha ama dieng rukoi a ruti, “Phungshik hai rampo hai na amani miring hai kha adek a pumi achang inih, khan amani alien-arang hai na amani chung a cham ieniei uh, iti hi nangjet uh.
Khania nang kar uatu khatikhan nih naw nih. Inia tunita`awm nang kar ua alien anih jawt miring kha na nang shepding u kha chang rosho.
Khan tunita`awm nang kar ua akhat changna anih jawt miring kha na nang shok u chang rosho.
Khatak kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha ama chon mawthaw rang a ajong nimak, inia mi chon thaw rang le mi tampui khekman rang khan, iringkho apeh jong inih.”
Khan amani na Jericho ah put ah rushe u le roroia, mipui hawi `khat na anu rujui uh.
Enro, mikchaw pasha `di na lam kawriei ah rushuh uh. Jesu na ivakrakan kha rujet u `le, ra`ai a ruti uh, “Aw David Shapa Pumi, nang roihoina kha kieini dieng hin natetna u roh.”
Inia mipui kha na awmchienna rang, adin u kha rurawkawk uh. Inia adin u na ra`ai shishit a ruti uh, “Aw David Shapa Pumi, nang roihoina kha kieini dieng hin natetna u roh.”
Jesu na ruding a adin u kha koi a ruti, “Kiei na nangdin u rang ih kithaw rang maw nangdit uh?”
Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Pumi, kimik u hi nangimavar rang kadit uh.”
Jesu na lainatna kha runiei a imik u hai kha rushit pe, khan relentak a imik u hai kha hawng var pe ua anu rujui u joi.
Khan Jerusalem kha vak ranai pui ua Olive Lawn ah awm Bethphage kha vak shok u joi. Khashole Jesu na akhaichawi pasha `di rutir.
Khan adin u dieng ruti, “Nang maton uah awm kho khawn she u roh. Khan nangni na ranngam `khat hi acha remet `khat le ruthung nangmukrelen u rangnih. Thut u tana kiei dieng vak chawi u roh.
Tukhat na nangni dieng chawng riei a tu, ‘Hihaihi Pumi na rangai,’ tia ama dieng riei u roh, khan relentak a amani kha vak tir rangnih.”
Mahi thiempulien dieng irurieina kha hawng rupumna rang a inih. Hitihin ieriei,
“Zion shanu dieng ti roh, ‘Enro, nang rengpa kha nang dieng jong joi. Mulung renemtak a ranngam chung ah, khan ranngam acha remet, nititu ranngam ete chung ah jong shuh.’ ”
Khaichawi idi kha na rushe ua Jesu na chawngirupek dungjuia, ruthaw uh.
Amani na ranngam le ranngam acha remet kha vak chawi ua amani chung khan amani pon hai kha rumukhu uh. Jesu kha amani chung ah rumushut u joi.
Khan mipui lientak `khat na opon u hai kha lamlien khan rupha uh. Eshen na thingkung ah put ah thingbak hai kha rutuk ua lamlien khan rupha uh.
Amaton ah alawn le anuk ah rujui mipui kha na ra`ai a ruti uh, “David Shapa dieng khan Hosanna! ‘PUMI riming a ajong ama kha rahvantha inih!’ Rashangving a Hosanna!”
Ama na Jerusalem kha rulut phakhan, khopui kholok kha rumuchun joi. Khan amani na ruti uh, “Ama hi tumaw nih?”
Mipui kha na ruti, “Ama hi Galilee ah awm Nazareth ah put ah thiempulien Jesu kha keng.”

Jesu na Pathien riethiengmun khan rulut a riethiengmun ah put ah ajor hai le rawchawh hai kholok kha runawt. Khan shierleshier rotho hai tebol hai le pharphali jor miring hai shutna hai kha shukthala a rutet pe.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Hitihin rumiejiek, ‘Ki`in hi nikna in ti rangnih,’ inia nangni na mahi ‘minieisho hai koh’ nangmachang u joi.”
Khan riethiengmun khan mikchaw le kekhawr hai na ama dieng va ua amani kha rumadam.
Inia thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na ama na erekhek chon iruthaw, khan naite hai na “David Shapa dieng Hosanna,” tia rura`ai u kha rumuk u phakhan, mulung ruhang pe uh.

Ama dieng ruti uh, “Hihaihi na iti hi nangjet maw?” Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Awh, ‘Naite hai le khan rununeh hai bai ah put ah nang rangbak mapakna kha nangrurasham joi,’ iti kha te u makche maw?”
Amani kha rumathan a khopui ah put ah Bethany khan rushe a, kha mun khan ruriek joi.
Jingkar tieng hin ama na khopui ah rukir phakhan, vawnrucham pe.

Lam dieng khan thieichangkung `khat rumuk a makha ama na rujawng. Inia bo hai ranga niboia, ih vak muh mak. Khan ama dieng ruti, “Kumshawt a nang dieng ara shoklai naw rosho.” Khan relentak a thieichangkung kha ruchar joi.
Khaichawi hai na makha rumuk u phakhan, shindawngna niei a ruti uh, “Itia thieichangkung hi achar maw nih?”

Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, rakhana nieiboia takanangshawn uatu, thieichangkung ah ithaw hi ang a, nangithaw u ranga niboia, mahi lawn hi ‘Rechen tana tuikhanglien ah vak rothong roh,’ nangti u joiawm, makha shok rangnih.
Nikna a takashawn le nanginik u kholok kha nangmuk u rangnih.”

Riethiengmun kha lut a Jesu na ruruchuk phakhan, thiempu ulien hai le Jihudi hai shierpui lamkai hai kha ama dieng va a ruti uh, “Ih cham nanginiei a hihaihi nangithaw maw nih? Khan tu na mahi cham hi nang dieng inurupek maw nih?”

Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm nangni dieng chawng `khat nawrawdawn u rang kanih, nangnamashang u joiatu, kiei na`awm hihaihi ih cham le kithaw maw nih, iti kha nieriei u rang kanih.

John baptisma pekna kha ih ah put ah maw nih? Ravan ah put ah maw nih, ninawkle miring hai ah put ah maw nih?” Amani na reshe a ruti uh, “ ‘Ravan ah put ah inih’ niti u le la, ‘Ijar a ama kha takanangishawn boi u maw nih?’ niti u rangnih.
‘Miring hai ah put ah inih’ niti u le la, mipui hi kieini na nichih uh. Ajarla mi kholok na John hi thiempulien `khat a iloi u inih.”
Mashang a Jesu dieng ruti uh, “Jet u mi`ing.” Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm hihaihi ih cham le kithaw maw nih, iti kha nangni dieng nieriei u naw ning.
“Imaw nangmining uh? Miring `khat na shapa `di runiei. Akhat changnapa dieng ava a, ‘Kashapa, von tu drakha rohon ah chon thaw she roh,’ ruti.
“Mashang a ama na ruti, ‘She jawt mi`ing.’ Inia unuk a mulung lek a rushe joi.
“Khan adi changnapa dieng ava a khatikhan ruti. Mashang a ama na ruti, ‘She rang kanih, Aw pumi.’ Inia rushe pelai mak.

“Idi kar khan tu na maw apa mulungmining kha ruthaw pe?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Akhat changnapa.” Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, khaichana rawkhawm hai le nawchijor hai na Pathien rengchangna khan, nang matieng rushe u joi.

Ajarla John na dikna lam khan jong a ama kha takarushawn u makche, inia khaichana rawkhawm hai le nawchijor miring hai na takarushawn uh. Mahi nangmuk u she hin, mulung lek a ama kha takarushawn u makche.

“Rangshim shik `khat rangai u roh. Loipumipa `khat na drakha rohon `khat runiei a ama na rurokorep. Juepna rang khur `khat ruchoi a khan vendai `khat ruthaw. Khan loithaw hai dieng rumashan a khomojin rushe joi.
Khan parrawkhawm rang hawng nai phakhan, oshok hai kha ara rawkhawm rang, loithaw hai dieng rutir joi.
“Inia loithaw hai kha na shok hai kha rushur pe ua akhat kha rujem uh, akhat kha ruthat uh, khan akhat kha lung le rudeng uh.
Matiengnek a arawpdet a, ama shok shik hai kha rutirret. Kha ang khan amani dieng ruthaw uh.
Dawngkhit a amani dieng ashapa kha rutir. Imining a ruti, ‘Amani na kashapa hi tu richit nepek pe u rangnih.’
“Inia loithaw hai kha na ashapa kha rumuk u phakhan, manilemani kar a ruti uh, ‘Mahi koklo kha nih joi. Khai! That u taia ama inkoklo kha loi pe u rang rawi.’
Ama kha rupawttap ua drakha rohon ah put ah rupai ua ama kha ruthat u joi.
“Khajarkhan drakha rohon pumi kha jong phakhan, loithaw hai dieng khan imaw thaw nih?”
Ama dieng ruti uh, “Mi shie hai kha khawktak a ama na mathang rangnih, khan drakha rohon kha parrawkhawm pha rikip a ama dieng ara apeh rang a loithaw hai shik dieng pek rangnih.”

Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “ ‘Inthaw hai na i`enda u lung kha kik ah runiei lung kha ruchang. Mahi PUMI na ithaw inih, khan nimik ua mahi shindawngroi `khat inih,’ tia irumiejiek kha rute u makche maw?
“Mahi kirieina ajartu Pathien rengchangna kha nangni ah put ah loi rangnih joi, khan ara moshok rang a Phungshik hai dieng pek rangnih joi.
Khan mahi lung chung a acho ama kha leklek a koi rangnih. Tunita`awm ichona miring kha rawnawi ning, tia vaiphin rachangmashak rangnih.”
Thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai na ama rangshim kha rujet u phakhan, amani chung a iriei keng, iti kha rujet uh.
Amani na ama kha rushur tu jawt uh, inia mipui kha ruchih uh. Ajarla amani na ama kha thiempulien `khat a iruloi u inih.
Jesu na amani dieng rangshim a chawngruriei peret:
Ama na ruriei, “Ravan rengchangna hi reng `khat na ashapa rang moiloi bumichinna irasham pe kha le ra`ang inih.
Makha moiloi bumichinna rang, koirawkhawmsha hai kha akoi rang, ama shok hai kha rutir, inia amani kha va jawt u mak.

“Shok shik hai kha tirret a ama na hitihin ruti, ‘Koirawkhawmsha hai dieng khan ti roh, “Enro, kieshiecha hai le imawnaw shieite hai kha that a bunekna `khat karasham a irikip karashamsho joi. Thaw, moiloi bumichinna hin va u rang roh.” ’
“Inia amani na irushawn pe u mak. Akhat na loi ah, khan akhat na rievieithawna ah rushe u joi.
Khan aliemlim kha na ama shok hai kha rushur pe uh, khan engshiettak a rutawn ua ruthat uh.
Rengpa kha na rujet phakhan, mulung ruhang pe joi. Ama na ama ramiring hai kha rutir a mithat hai kha vak mathang joi, khan amani khopui kha miei le ruha pe u joi.
“Khashole ama na oshok hai dieng ruti, ‘Moiloina rang rashamsho nih joi, inia koimiring hai hi tu rutuk maklai.
Nangni na khopui jawngna lamlien khawn she u tana nangimuklim kha moiloi bumichinna hin vak rawkhawm u roh.’
Shok hai kha na rushe ua lamlien ah imuktuk, atha ashie lawp `khat a vak chawi ua, moiloina in kha rumiship u joi.
“Inia rengpa kha na koimiring hai kha aen vat phakhan, moiloina ponledier thaw boi miring `khat vak muk.
Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Kama, itia moiloi bumichinna ponledier thaw boipet a hin ah nangvaklut maw nih?’ Inia ama kha chawngrieithiei boi a ruawm.
“Khashole rengpa kha na oshok hai dieng ruti, ‘Ukhutleke kha khop pe u roh, khan chawi u tana vai tieng ah jingnakhap khawn vak pai u roh. Makha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.’
“Ajarla mi tampui kha okoi rangnih, inia mi lekte kha madan rangnih.”
Khashole Pharisee hai na rushe ua ama chawngriei khan lim rudaw pe uh

Amani na amani khaichawi hai kha Herod miring hai kha le Jesu dieng rutir uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Oja, nang na adik kha nangriei, khan miring hai kha maila boi a le enshietenlar thaw boi a adik a Pathien lam kha nangruchuk, iti kejet uh.
Khajarkhan imaw nangmining? Kieini dieng nieriei u roh. Caesar dieng khaichana pek hi Dan maw nih ninawkle dan nih boi maw nih?”
Inia Jesu na amani thatna boi u kha jet pe a ruti, “Aw thanunchan thaw hai, ithaw kiei hi ennanginerete u maw nih?
Khaichana chandi kha kiei dieng numumuk u roh.” Khan amani na dinari `khat kha ama dieng vak chawi uh.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Mahi rilim le khetmiejiek hi, tu tah maw nih?”
Amani na rumashang uh, “Caesar.” Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Khanitatu Caesar tah hai kha Caesar dieng peh u roh, khan Pathien tah hai kha Pathien dieng peh u roh.”
Amani na makha rujet u `le, shindawngna runiei ua ama kha mathan a rushe u joi.
Khanikhan thoiretna awm mak, ati Sadducee hai na ama dieng va ua rurawdawn uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Oja, Moses na ruti makhala tukhat na nainiei boi a thi joiatu, ulienpa chi mothoina rang, anaipangpa na unungak kha loh rangnih.
Poro shiri hi kieini le ruawm. Akhat changna kha na inniei a ruthi joi. Khan chi mak boi a unungak kha anaipangpa dieng rumak joi.
Khatikhan adi changnapa, athum changna, khan ishiri changnashe kha ruthi joi.
Dawngkhit a nupangnu kha`awm ruthi joi.
Thoiretna khan ama kha, shiri hai kar a, tu nungak maw chang nih? Ajarla lawpsheng u na ama kha iruniei u inih.”
Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Nangrehe uh, ajarla nangni na Miejiek hai kha`awm, khan Pathien ranak kha`awm rujet u makche.
Ajarla thoiretna khan innieina awm naw nih, khan inawm mieniei u naw nih. Inia ravan a Pathien ravantir hai kha ang u rangnih.
Khan athi hai thoiretna chungchang khan tu, Pathien na iruti chawng kha te u makche maw?
Ama na ruti, ‘Kiei hi Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, khan Jacob Pathien kha kanih.’ Pathien hi athi hai Pathien kha nimak, inia aring hai Pathien kha inih.”
Ama miruchukna khan mipui kha shindawngna runiei uh.
Inia ama na Sadducee hai kha rumaw`awmchien joi, iti kha Pharisee hai kha na rujet u phakhan, amani na lawp `khat a ruruchun u joi.
Khan amani kar a danthiei `khat na ama kha enretena rang, chawng rawdawn a ruti,
“Oja, Dan shung ah ih chawngpek kha maw aliendet?”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “ ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha nang mulung kholok le, nang ringphuk kholok le khan nang mulungmining kholok le numnangipok rang a inih.’
Mahi akhat changna le aliendet chawngpek kha inih.
Khan adi changna kha hitihin awm: ‘Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak ang a numnangipok rang a inih.’
Mahi chawngpek idi chung hin Dan le Thiempulien hai kholok kha rushui a awm inih.”
Inia Pharisee hai na ruruchun u lai khan, Jesu na amani dieng rurawdawn.
Ama na ruti, “Christa chungchang hin imaw nangmining uh? Ama hi tu shapa kha maw nih?” Ama dieng rumashang uh, “David Shapa.”
Amani dieng ruti, “Khanitala itia Ratha jar a David na ‘Pumi,’ tia irukoi a
‘PUMI na kupumi dieng ruriei, “Nang rahapui hai kha nang kekhawng kamachang malalim, kukhut chang tieng hin shuh roh,” ’ tia iti maw nih?
David na ama kha ‘Pumi,’ ti joiala, iti dan a ama kha ashapa achang maw nih?”
Tute na ama dieng rumashang ngam u mak, khan khani ah put ah tute na ama dieng chawngawm rurawdawn ngam u lai mak.
Khashole Jesu na mipui dieng le akhaichawi hai dieng chawngruriei.
Ama na ruti, “Danoja hai le Pharisee hai na Moses shutna khan shuh uh.
Khajarkhan nangni dieng iriei rikip kha jui u tana thaw u roh, inia amani ithaw ang a tu, thaw u naw roh, ajarla iriei u kha thaw u mak.
Ruput ngam boi pokrik hai kha amani na khop ua miring hai dar a atet pe uh, inia amani kha amani khutlawihai kar a akhatshe le meper jawt u mak.
“Khan ithaw u kholok kha miring hai muk rang thaw uh. Ajarla amani uitangmili hai kha mielien uh, khan amani ponmawr hai kha mieshiei uh.
Bumichinna hai khan mi matonkhit ah shutna rang, adit uh, khan synagogue hai khan shutna runieiving hai kha loh jawt uh.
Khan mi na ‘Rabbi, Rabbi,’ iti le khan rievieithawna mun ah richit ipek rang, adit uh.
“Inia mi na ‘Rabbi,’ tia nokoi u naw roshoh. Ajarla nang Oja u `khat awm. Ama kha Christa kha inih, khan nang kholok hi uliennai kha nangnih uh.
Rieliei a awm tute dieng kapa, tia koi u naw roh, ajarla nangpa u `khat awm, ama kha ravan a awm.
Mi na lamkai hai, tia`awm nokoi u naw rosho, ajarla nang Lamkai `khat awm. Makha Christa kha inih.
Inia nang kar ua alienving kha nang shok u achang rang a inih.
Khan nining a rawlawm miring kha redemashak rangnih. Khan nining a rede miring kha rawlawmmashak rangnih.

“Inia nangni rang idawr a khawk shawna maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla ravan rengchangna kha mi hai rang nangkhar uh. Ajarla nangnirilikawm lut u makche, khan alut rang a miring hai kha`awm mulut jawt u makche.

Nangni rang idawr a khawk shawna maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla mieirawng hai in kha ranak a nangsho uh. Khan rohong a nikna kha nangmieshiei uh. Hijarhin hengna kha liendet a nangmuk u rangnih.

“Nangni rang idawr khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla miring `khat Jihudi mijirna rang, tuikhanglien le maw nangrakan ua nangshe uh. Makha miring kha na ijir phakhan, nangni kha ang a, rothom a Gehenna shapa kha nangmachang uh.

“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw lamkai mikchaw hai! Nangni na nangti uh, ‘Tunita`awm riethiengmun ban a chawngrakham ama chung khan iawm shok naw nih. Inia tunita`awm riethiengmun ah awm rangkachak ban a chawngrakham ama kha chawngrakham kha na ikhit inih.’
Aw amawng le mikchaw hai, ih kha maw liendet, rangkachak kha maw, ninawkle rangkachak riethiengmashak riethiengmun kha maw?
Nangni na nangti uh, ‘Tunita`awm maicham ban a chawngrakham ama chung khan ih shok naw nih, inia tunita`awm kha chung ah awm khutchawi ban a chawngrakham ama kha chawngrakham kha na ikhit inih.’
Aw amawng le mikchaw hai, ih kha maw liendet, khutchawi kha maw ninawkle khutchawi riethiengmashak maicham kha maw?
Khajarkhan tunita`awm maicham ban a chawngrakham miring kha na makha iban a, khan kha chung ah awm kholok kha iban a chawngrakham inih.
Tunita`awm riethiengmun ban a chawngrakham miring kha na makha le kha shung ah awm ama kha iban a chawngirakham inih.
Tunita`awm ravan le chawngrakham miring kha na Pathien rengmun le khan kha chung ah ashupa ama kha le chawngirakham inih.

“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla pudina le patikhawm, khan jira hai kha shemshawm a nangpek uh. Inia Dan a aludet kha ishawn u makche. Khahaikha la, dikna, roihoina, khan takashawn inih. Shik hai kha enda boi a hihaihi nangithaw u rang a shok.
Aw lamkai mikchaw hai, thoiphurlangshan kha nangshawr uh, inia sharingshiei tu nangva uh!

“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla nangni na hai le kheng kha vai tieng nanglap ua, shung ah tu phamrai le takshurna ngam boi kha ship a awm.
Aw Pharisee mikchaw hai, hai le kheng shung kha masha a machai u roh. Khanitatu amani vai tieng a kha`awm chai rangnih.

“Danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai, nangni rang mieriemna awm! Ajarla mi na vai tieng metha a imuk, inia ushung ah tu athi hai ru hai le orono kholok aship thankhur hai lieina ithaw kha le nangra`ang uh.
Khatikhan mi hai dieng khan vai tieng tu richichawi `khat a nangmalang uh, inia shung ah tu nang thanunchan thawna le dannangishawnna boi u kha na shipmer a awm.
“Nangni rang idawr a khawk maw nih naw, Aw danoja hai, Pharisee hai, thanunchan thaw hai! Ajarla nangni na thiempulien hai than kha nangkon uh, khan miriethieng hai than hai kha nangrielien uh.
Khan nangni na nangti uh, ‘Kieini na kapa hai rong khan kuruawm uatu, amani na thiempulien hai thishen moshokna khan rujaw u naw ning.’
Khatikhan thiempulien hai kha ruthat nai hai kha kanih, tia nang nining ua kungnangchang uh.
Nang pilepu hai munu danlakna kha miship u roh.
“Aw moro hai! Rawshawk chicha hai! Nangni na itia maw Gehenna chawngshatna ah put ah rekhe u rawng?

Hijarhin, en u ro, thiempulien hai, mishing hai le danoja hai kha nangni dieng kijongtir inih. Eshen kha cross ling ah nangthat u rangnih. Khan eshen hai kha nang synagogue u hai khan rawmaw le nangjem ua khopui `khat ah put ah khopui `khat ah shawna nangpek u rangnih.

Makha rieliei chung a thijan miriethieng thishen kholok shietna kha nangni dieng chuna rang a inih. Makha miriethieng Abel thishen shok ah put ah Barachiah shapa Zechariah thishen shokshe kha nangni dieng shokna rang a inih. Zechariah kha riethiengmun le lungkheng kar ah nangiruthat u inih.
Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hihai kholok hi mahi rong chung hin chuh rangnih.

“Aw Jerusalem, Aw Jerusalem, thiempulien hai athat le ama dieng a ijongtir hai kha lung le adeng! Arpui `khat na ete hai kha amatha noi ah irawkhawm kha ang a, idawrshe maw nang nai hai kha lawp `khat a kururawkhawm jawt, inia rujawt u makche!
Enro, nang in u kha rokpet a rangah joi.
Ajarla kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, ‘PUMI riming a ava ama kha rahvantha inih,’ nangti u masheng, numuh u lai naw tinih.”
Khashole Jesu na riethiengmun kha mathan a rushe joi. Khan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng rushe ua riethiengmun inrashak dan hai kha rumumuk uh.
Makhan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Hihai kholok hi nangimuk boi u maw nih? Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih. Akhat chung ah akhat rotho hi achim boi a hin ah imak lung `khatshe awm naw nih.”

Khan Ama na Olive Lawn ah rushuh le roroia, akhaichawi hai na bing a ama dieng va uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Khahaikha itik a ashok rang a maw nih, iti kha kieini dieng nieriei u roh. Khan nang jongna rang le khan rong mawtawrna rang a jetna kha imaw ninih?”
Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruriei, “Mi na nomohonna boi u rang, riring u roh.
Ajarla ‘Christa kha kanih,’ tia mi tampui kiriming a va u rangnih, khan mi tampui mohon u rangnih.
Khan ra le muruk a ra chawng nangjet u rangnih. Makhan nang rawthawkna boi u rang, riring u roh. Ajarla hihai kholok hi ashokngir rang a inih, inia dawng kha tu nih naw nilai.

Ajarla phung `khat na phung `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih, khan rengram `khat na rengram `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih. Nekleshak hawng tang rangnih, rikrai hawng rawjawh rangnih, khan nieinu munmun ah hawng rawnawk rangnih.
Hihai kholok hi shawna putna kha nih rangnih.
“Khashole shawrana khan nepeh u ning, tia nathat u rangnih. Khan kiriming jarkhan phung kholok na nangni kha numukmak u rangnih.
Khashole mi tampui na keruthui u rangnih, khatlekhat rojor nana rangnih, khan khatlekhat raha rangnih.
Khan thiempulien jok tampui thoi ning, tia mi tampui kha mohon rangnih.
Khan danishawnboi kha hawng pung ning, tia mi tampui numropokna kha hawng thang rangnih.
Inia dawngshe a adoi ngam ama kha shan rangnih.
Khan rengchangna athachawng hi manmieshie kholok dieng shem rangnih. Makha phung kholok dieng kungchangna `khat kha chang rangnih. Khashole tu dawng kha hawng rangnih joi.
“Khajarkhan thiempulien Daniel dieng irurieina, ‘Mitiroi thitnathangna miring,’ kha na mun riethieng ah ading kha nangmuk u phakhan (ate miring kha na jet rosho),
Judea ah awm miring hai kha na lawn hai khan tan u rosho.
In ah awm nieinak hai kha aloi rang, inphu chung ah awm ama kha na, jong chumlai naw rosho.
Loi ah awm ama kha na, oponledier loina rang hawng kirretlai naw rosho.
Khalai a naivawng nupang hai le nai runupeh hai rang khan idawr a shawna maw ninih naw!
Nang tanna u rang a pha kha phabi le Sabbath nikho nitna boi rang, nikna niei u roh.
Ajarla makhan shawrana lientak `khat shok rangnih. Kha`ang kha manmieshie putna ah put ah vonshe hin ashok boipet nih rangnih, khan takthar a shokret, iti awmlai naw nih.
Khan kha pha hai kha imushum boi nitjoiatu, taksha `khatshe hawi naw nih. Inia madansha hai rangbak khan kha pha hai kha, mushum pe rangnih.
Khashole tukhat na ‘Enro, Christa kha hin awm joi’ ninawkle ‘Khawn awm joi’! ti joiawm takashawn u naw roh.
Ajarla christa jok hai le thiempulien jok hai kha thoi rangnih. Nitthieiatu madansha haishe kha mohonna rang, jetna le rekhekchon alienalien numumuk u rangnih.
Enro, pha mala a kinierieisha u nih joi.
“Khajarkhan, ‘Enro, ama kha ramthim ah awm joi!’ niti u joiawm, she u naw roh. Khan ‘Enro, ama kha indan shung ah awm joi!’ niti u joiawm, takashawn u naw roh.
Ajarla shim tieng ah put ah khomelek a mar tiengshe i`eh kha Miring Shapa ajong kha le ra`ang rangnih.
Ajarla thicho awmna mun khan, langke hai na lawp `khat a ruchun u rangnih.
“Khahai shawrana nikho hai kha thengphit `le, ni kha mijing rangnih, tha na mieivar pelai naw nih; arshi hai na ravan ah put ah jong cho u rangnih, khan ravan ranak hai kholok kha rawnawk rangnih.

“Kha pha khan ravan a Miring Shapa jetna kha malang rangnih, khan rieliei a phung kholok na mulung jumna niei rangnih. Ranak, khan lurna lien le ravan a romiei hai chung ah Miring Shapa ajong kha amani na muk u rangnih.
Khan tekawlawi lientak `khat miri le ama ravantir hai kha jong tir rangnih. Khan imadansha hai kha kiei mili ah put ah, ravan dawng `khat ah put ah dawng `khatshe, rawkhawm u rangnih.
“Khan thieichangkung ah put ah rangshim hi jet u roh: abak hai kha dawnglai khan, obo hawng moshok. Makhan kholum kha hawng nai joi, iti kha nangjet uh.
Khatikhan khahaikha nangmuk u phakhan, ama kha vak ranai a kawtkungtak ah ding a awm joi, iti kha jet u roh!
Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hihaihi hawng rupum masheng, hi rong hi shukhek a hek naw nih.
Ravan le rieliei hi hek rangnih, inia kawchawng hai hi tu shukthang a thang naw nih.
“Inia makha Nikho le nidan chungchanga tute na ajet awm mak, ravan a ravantir haishe na`awm jet u mak. Inia kapa ranga kha na ijet inih.
Inia Miring Shapa jongna rang a dan kha Noah nikho hai kha le ra`ang rangnih.
Ajarla tuilien mala nikho hai khan, miring hai kha na runek rushak uh, inruniei uh, khan inniei rang rupek uh. Makha Noah na rokonglien khan rulut masheng miring hai kha na ruthaw uh.
Tuihawnglien a amani kholok kha ruchawiviek masheng, amani na iawm rujet u mak. Miring Shapa ajong rang a kha`awm, khatak kha ang rangnih.
Kha pha khan miring pasha `di loipuk ah awm rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
Nupang pasha `di na shum ah shanghakshuk u rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
“Khajarkhan riring u roh, ajarla nangni na nang Pumi u jongna rang a pha kha jet u makche.
Inia mahi jet u roh, inpumipa kha na murushapa vatna rang a pha kha rujet joiala, ruche ning, tia i`in kha mokhoi naw nih.
Khajarkhan nangniawm rasham u roh, ajarla nangrumining boi u phakhan, Miring Shapa kha jong rangnih.
“Rangam puithiei le ashing shok kha tumaw nih? Ama kha upumpa kha na ama inshungkhur apana rang le amani kha rutukthep pha a nekleshak apeh rang a roiruputna ipek miring kha inih.
Upumpa kha jong phakhan, khatikhan a chon iruthaw ijongmuk shok kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.
Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ama na ienieinak kholok apoh kha iminit rangnih.
Inia shok shie kha na mulung shung a, ‘Kupumpa ajong hi shum joi,’ iruti a
oshok chang pui hai kha rujem, khan jukhawp hai le runek-rushak.
Makha shok pumpa kha irumining boi pha le irujet boi nidantak khan jong phakhan,
ama na khawktak a achep rangnih, khan thanunchan thaw hai kha le atet rangnih. Kha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.
“Ravan rengchangna kha nungak shawm kha le ra`ang rangnih. Amani thaomiei hai kha ruchawi ua moipa kha rumuk pui rushe uh.
Amani kar a rahnga kha ashing runih uh, khan rahnga kha amawng runih uh.
Amawng hai kha na amani thaomiei hai kha ruchawi uh, inia thao ruchawi u mak.
Inia ashing hai kha na thao kha amani thaokawk hai khan amani thaomiei hai kha le ruchawi uh.
Moipa kha jong shum jarkhan, amani kholok kha inrungui a rumiei u joi.
“Inia janchim khan he ra`ai `khat na ruti, ‘Enro, moipa kha jong joi. She u tana vak rumuk pui u rang roh!’
Khashole nungak hai kholok kha na ruthoi ua amani thaomiei hai kha rumuchuk u joi.
Amawng hai kha na ashing hai dieng ruti uh, ‘Kawthaomiei u hai hi ithi rang keng joi, nang thao u kha eshen nepeh u rang roh.’
“Inia ashing hai kha na rumashang uh, ‘Nithiei naw nih, kieini rangawm, khan nangni rangawm hun naw nih. Kha ruhut a nangni rangbak khan ajor hai dieng khawn vak rawchawh u rang roh.’
“Amani na thao rawchawh rusheriethiei khan, moipa kha jong joi. Khan rurasham miring hai kha na moiloina khan moipa kha le rushe u joi. Khan in kha rukhar joi.
“Kha anuk `le, nungak shik `khat hai kha`awm va ua ‘Pumi, Pumi, mawkawt nawmawlawng pe u roh!’ vak ti uh.
Inia ama na rumashang, ‘Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, tumaw nangnih u kiei na nejet u mi`ing.’
Khajarkhan riring u roh, ajarla Miring Shapa jongna rang a Nikho le nidan kha nangni na jet u makche.
“Ajarla ravan rengchangna hi miring `khat na ama shoktak hai kha irukoi, khan ienieinak hai kha amani dieng khut irurothona a ramlatak `khat a khomijin rushe kha le ra`ang inih.
Akhat dieng talent rahnga rupek, shik `khat dieng idi, khan shik `khat dieng akhat, ingamtuk kha rupekrim a khomijin rushe joi.
Khashole talent rahnga atumpa kha na rushe a makha le rievieiruthaw a talent shik rahnga rumoshok.
Khatikhan idi atumpa kha na`awm idi rumoshok.
Inia akhat atumpa kha na rushe, khan pieipak ah rukhum a upumi shier kha ruthe.
“Pha shawtlawk shole, khahai shok pumi kha hawng kir a amani le talent hai kha rumushung u joi.
Khan talent rahnga atumpa kha na ava a talent shik rahnga kha vak chawi a ruti, ‘Pumi, kiei dieng talent rahnga nangnurupek. Enro, kiei na amani ah put ah talent rahnga kurumupung joi.’

“Upumi kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nangrat joi, atha le takashawn rang a rutuk shok. Nieinak lekte chung a takashawn rang rutuk kha nangnih. Kiei na nieinak tampui chung a apoh kha niminit rang kanih. Nang pumi ningaina khan lut rang roh.’
“Talent idi atumpa kha na`awm ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, kiei dieng talent idi nangnurupek. Enro, amani ah put ah talent idi kurumupung joi.’

“Upumi kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nangrat joi, atha le takashawn rang a rutuk shok. Nieinak lekte chung a takashawn rang a rutuk kha nangnih. Kiei na nieinak tampui chung a apoh kha niminit rang kanih. Nang pumi ningaina khan lut rang roh.’
“Khashole talent `khat atumpa kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang hi mikher, nangivawrna boi a parrawkhawm, khan nangithehna boi a rawkhawm kha nangnih, iti kha kiei na kejet.
Khajarkhan kiei kuruchih, khan kurushe a nang talent kha pieipak ah kiruthe inih. Enro, nang tah kha loi rang roh.’
“Upumi kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang ashie le rathashie shok, kivawrna boi khan kiei na parkirawkhawm, khan kithehna boi khan kirawkhawm, iti kha nangjet!
Kieshier kha niei`in ah nangrutet a la, kawhawngkir phakhan athoi lele kumuk rangnih.
‘Khajarkhan talent kha ama ah put ah loi tana talent shawm anieipa dieng peh rang roh.
Ajarla aniei ama dieng khan pek rangnih, khan ama na ruphu a niei rangnih, khan aniei boi ama dieng khan, inieidak kha`awm ama ah put ah loi pe rangnih.
Khan rutuk boi shokpa kha vai tieng ah jingnakhap khan vak pai u roh. Kha mun khan chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.’
“Miring Shapa kha na ama lurna le ravantir riethieng kholok le jong phakhan, ama lurna rengmun khan jong shuh rangnih.
Khan phung kholok kha amaikung a ruchun rangnih. Kengamroi kha na ekengam hai kha keh hai ah put ah ishen kha ang a, amani kha shikshik a shen rangnih.
Khan kengam hai kha ama khut chang tieng atet rangnih, inia keh hai kha ukhut viei tieng atet rangnih.
“Khashole ukhut chang tieng ah hai dieng khan Rengpa kha na iti rangnih, ‘Khai, kapa na rahvan ipek hai, rieliei phun ah put ah nangni rang a irurasham rengchangna kha tum u rang roh.
Ajarla vawncham a kuruawm, nekleshak nangnurupek uh. Tuira a kuruawm, tui nangnurupek uh. Milak `khat a kuruawm, nangnurupawm uh.
Ponledier boi a kuruawm, pon nangnururieshieimashak uh. Natlam a kuruawm, nangnawhawngphak uh. Lungroko shung ah kuruawm, kiei dieng nanghawng uh.’
“Khashole midik hai kha na mashang a ruti u rangnih, ‘Pumi, itiklai maw vawncham a nang kha kunurumuk ua nekleshak kunurupek uh, ninawkle tuira a kunurumuk ua tui kunurumenek uh?
Itiklai maw kieini na nang kha milak `khat a kunurumuk ua kunurupawm uh, ninawkle ponledier boi a kunurumuk ua pon kunururieshieimashak uh?
Ninawkle natlam a, ninawkle lungroko ah kawnawhawngphak uh?’
“Makhan Rengpa kha na amani dieng mashang rangnih, ‘Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ih nita`awm ashin ku`uliennai hihaihi kar a akhat dieng nangiruthaw u kha, kiei dieng nangiruthaw u inih.’
“Khashole ukhut viei tieng ah hai dieng khanawm iti rangnih, ‘Nangni pumbotna amuh miring hai, diabol le ama ravantir hai rang a irurasham Kumshawt Miei khan, kiei ah put ah she u rang roh.
Ajarla vawncham a kuruawm, nekleshak nurupeh u makche, tuira a kuruawm, tui nurupek u makche.
Milak `khat a kuruawm, in nurumulut u makche. Ponledier boi a kuruawm, pon nururieshieimashak u makche. Natlam a le lungroko ah kuruawm, inia nawhawngphak u makche.’

“Khashole amani na`awm rumashang a ruti u rangnih, ‘Pumi, itiklai maw nang kha vawncham a, ninawkle tuira a ninawkle milak a, ninawkle ponledier boi a, ninawkle dam boi a, ninawkle lungroko ah nang kha kunurumuk ua nang dieng chon kinuruthawna pe boi u awm?’
“Khashole ama na amani dieng rumashang, ‘Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ih nita`awm hihai ashin hai kar a akhat dieng nangiruthaw boi u kha kiei dieng nangiruthaw boi u inih.’
“Khan hihaihi na kumshawt a chepna khan she u rangnih, inia midik hai kha na kumshawt ringna shung khan lut u rangnih.”
Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na chawng hai hi ariei rumawtawr phakhan, akhaichawi hai dieng ruti,
“Ni `di shole, Rakanna kha hawng rangnih joi, iti hi nangjet uh, khan Miring Shapa kha cross ah thatna rang pek u rangnih joi.”
Khashole Caiaphas iti thiempu rashang tolawng khan thiempu ulien hai, danoja hai le miring hai shierulien hai kha ruruchun uh.
Khan Jesu kha mohonchien a shur a thatna rang, muruk a chawng rurashak uh.
Inia “Rohoi khan tu mi muput rang keng, ama kha shur u naw roh,” tia amani na ruti uh.
Khan Jesu kha Bethany ah raithawnaw rutawngpa Simon in ah ruawm.
Kha pha khan nupang `khat na manrawp rieipartui hi lungngoi kawk `khat le Jesu dieng ava a, Jesu na tebol ah rushulai khan, makha ama lu ah ruliei pe.
Inia makha akhaichawi hai na rumuk u phakhan, mulungrahalam a ruti uh, “Ijar a mahi imathang maw nih?
Ajarla mahi rieipartui hi manrawptak a jor a shara hai dieng pekthiei inih.”
Makha Jesu na rujet a amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a nupangnu kha nangirahamashak u maw nih? Ajarla ama na kiei dieng chon atha `khat ithaw inih.
Ajarla shara hai kha ningthingkip nangawm pui uh, inia kiei hi tu ningthingkip nawawm pui u makche.
Ajarla katak a mahi rieipartui iliei hi kurukhumna rashamna rang a iruthaw inih.
Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, ih mun khan nita`awm, rieliei pumpui ah athachawng shem phakhan, mahi nupangnu na iruthaw hi, ama miningna `khat a, riei rangnih.”
Khashole Judas Iscariot iti shawmlieidi kar a akhat na thiempu ulien hai dieng rushe joi.
Ama na ruti, “Nangni dieng ama hi kojor a la, kiei dieng imaw nepeh u rawng?” Amani na dangka shawm `thum le ama kha rurawjawt pui u joi.
Khan ah put ah Jesu jorna rang a chanthatna kha tawk a ruawm joi.
Khan akhat changna Chawjawboi Tan Rohoi Nikho khan khaichawi hai na Jesu dieng rushe a ruti uh, “Khoshekawt ah maw Rakanna shakna rang, nangnarashammashak jawt uh?”
Ama na ruti, “Khopui khawn she u tana mi `khat nangmuk u rangnih. Ama dieng ti u roh, ‘Ojapa na iti, “Kapha kha nai joi, kakhaichawi hai le nang in ah Rakanna kha rasham u rang kanih.” ’ ”
Khajarkhan Jesu na chawngirachak dungjuia, khaichawi hai na ruthaw ua Rakanna kha rurasham u joi.
Khan ni hawng tah phakhan, ama na khaichawi shawmlieidi le maicham ah rushuh u joi.
Amani na runek u lai khan, ama na ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, nang kar ua akhat na kiei hi nojor rangnih joi.”
Khan amani kha dawnga mulungrushaw pe uh. Amani `khatkhat na ama dieng ruti uh, “Kiei maw kanih, Pumi?”
Khan ama na rumashang, “Mahi khengkam hin kiei le khut apur miring kha na kiei hi nojor rangnih.
Miring Shapa kha ama chungchanga irumiejiek dungjuia ashok pe inih. Inia Miring Shapa ajor miring chung khan idawrshe rahvanshie maw nih! Ama kha jong shoklam nawkala ama rang tha pe rangnih.”
Khashole ama ajorpa Judas na mashang a ruti, “Kiei maw kanih, Rabbi?” Ama na rumashang, “Nangti joi.”
Khan amani na irunek u le roroia, Jesu na tan kha ruloi, khan rahvan rupek a rukhoi. Khan akhaichawi hai dieng rupek a ruti, “Loi u tana shah u roh, mahi kupum kha inih.”
Khan hai kha ruloi a mapakna runiei, khan amani dieng pek a ruti, “Nang lawpsheng u na hin ah put ah neh u roh.
Ajarla mahi rawjawtna `thar kithishen kha inih. Mahi mi tampui munu rangaidamna rang a along kha inih.
Inia kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, von ah put ah kapa rengchangna khan nangni le athar a kinekna rang a makha Nikho kha hawng shok masheng, mahi drakha tui hi kiei na nelai naw ning.”
Khan amani na lah `khat ruthaw ua Olive Lawn ah ruhawng u joi.

Khashole Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Von jan hin, kajar a nang kholok na keruthuina nangniei u rangnih, ajarla hitihin rumiejiek: ‘Kiei na Kengamroi kha that rang kanih, khan kengam hawi kha chaiachai a awm rangnih.’
Inia kiei hi nomothoi shole, nang matieng u Galilee ah rushe rang kanih.”
Mashang a Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Nang jar a mi kholok kha keruthuimashak joiawm, kiei tu kenuruthuimashak naw nih.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, von jantak hin, arkhawng na khong mala, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih.”
Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Kiei nang le athi rang kinitjoiawm, nang chung a raphatna niei naw ning!” Khatikhan akhaichawi hai kholok na ruti uh.
Khashole Jesu na amani le Gethsemane iti mun khan rushe a, akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Khawn anih kesheriethiei, hin rushuh u roh.”
Ama na Peter le Zebedee shapa idi kha rushe pui, khan mulungshaw a raha ruput joi.
Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Kiringphuk hi thitna dawr a ajeng a shaw joi. Hin rurangah u roh, khan cheveng a nawawm puishom u roh.”
Khan ama na rushebawt le butlam a nikna niei a ruti, “Aw kapa, nitthiei a tu, hai hi na kiei hi nalim rosho. Khanikengta kidit ang a niboia, nangidit kha ang a nih rosho.”
Khan khaichawi hai dieng ava a rumiei u kha vak tawng a Peter dieng ruti, “Nidan `khatshe neche pui ngam u makche maw?
Chelam a nikna niei u roh. Khanitatu lemna khan lut u naw tinih; ratha na tu adithet, inia taksha hi na dawkshamna ieniei.”
Voidi changna khan rusheret, khan nik a ruti, “Aw kapa, hai hi kinek boi a inalim boi rang nitjoiatu, nang mulungmining kha nih rang rosho.”
Khan ama na ava a amani kha mieilam a vak mukret, ajarla amani mik kha rumasha pe uh.
Khan amani kha mak a voithum changna khan rusheret a, ra`angre a chawng hai kha vak riei.
Khashole akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Tunshe hin amiei a shawmuchum maw nangnih u lai? Enro, apha kha nai joi, khan Miring Shapa kha munu miring hai khut a jor joi.
Thoi u tana she u rang rawi. Enro, kiei najorpa kha na navakdep joi.”

Khan ama na roirurieilai khan, shawmlieidi kar a akhat, Judas kha vak shok joi. Mirawp lientak `khat chemjam le mawbawng raklam a vat pui joi. Amani kha thiempu ulien hai le miring hai shierulien hai na ivaktir u inih.
Khan ajorpa kha na amani dieng jetna pek a ruti, “Kiei na bieng kitumpa kha, ama kha inih, shur u roh.”
Khan ama na Jesu kha vak jawngtir a “Rabbi, chubai!” tia iebieng ah vak tum joi.
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Kama, ithaw va maw nangnih?” Khashole amani na rujawng uh, khan Jesu chung a khut rujawn ua ama kha rushur u joi.
Khan enro, Jesu le rawtawp hai kar a akhat na ukhut rushawn a echemjam kha rupawttap a, thiempu rashang shok `khat rutuk a, onokor kha rutan pe joi.
Khashole Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nang chemjam kha awkawk khan thong roh, ajarla chemjam rotokna miring kholok na chemjam a thi rangnih.
Tun kiei na kapa dieng nik a kamaton a ravantir legion shawmlieidi kiei dieng nepeh ngam naw nih, tia nangimining maw nih?
Khanitala hitihin a ashokngir rang a inih, iti Miejiek kha itia maw hawng rupum ngam nih?”

Kha phatak khan Jesu na mipui dieng ruti, “Minieisho `khat chung a ang a, kiei ashur rang chemjam le mawbawng le ava maw nangnih uh? Ningthingkip kiei na riethiengmun ah mi kururuchuk, khan nangni le kuruawm a nurushur u makche.
Khania hihai kholok hi thiempulien hai na irumiejiek hai kha hawng rupumna rang a ithaw inih.” Khashole khaichawi hai kholok na ama kha mathan a rutan u joi.
Khan Jesu rushur hai kha na ama kha thiempu rashang Caiaphas dieng ruchawi u joi. Kha mun khan danoja hai le shierulien hai kha ruruchun uh.
Inia Peter na ama kha thiempu rashang tolawngshe kha ralaviei a anu rujui. Khan ama na rulut, khan riethiengmun shipai hai kha le rushuh a imaw shok nih, tia ruen.
Thiempu ulien hai, khan shierulien hai le Sanhedrin miring kholok na Jesu kha thatna rang, adik boi a kungchangna kha rutawk uh.
Inia adik boi a kungruchang hai tampui kha va u joiawm, `khatshe rumuk pe u mak. Dawngkhit a adik boi a kungachang hai idi hawng lut uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Hipa hi na ‘Pathien riethiengmun hi shiet a ni `thum shung a komothoi ngam,’ ruti.”
Khan thiempu rashang kha na thoi a Jesu dieng ruti, “Mashanglai naw rawng maw? Nang chung a mi hai na kungchangna ipek u hi imaw nih?”
Inia Jesu kha ruawmchien. Khan thiempu rashang kha na mashang a ruti, “Pathien Shapa Christa kha nangnih a tu, Aring Pathien riming kha ban tana chawngrakham roh.”

Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Nangti joi. Khanikengta kiei na nang dieng kieriei, tun ah put ah Miring Shapa kha na Ranaknieipa khut chang tieng shuh ning, tia ravan romiei kar a ajong kha nangmuk u rangnih.”

Khashole thiempu rashang kha na opon hai kha ther a ruti, “Ama na Pathien mieshietna chawng kha iriei! Dawn a kungchangna rang, imaw nirangai u lai? Enro, tun ama Pathien mieshietna kha nangjet u joi!
Imaw nangmining uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Ama hi athi rang rutuk joi.”
Khashole amani na amai ah rumiechiei uh, khuttum le rushuk uh, khan eshen na khutmaja hai le ruben uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Kieini dieng rophong roh, Aw Christa! Tu na inaben maw nih?”
Tun Peter na tolawng vai tieng rushuh. Khan nungak shok `khat na ama dieng va a ruti, “Nangawm Galilee Jesu kha le rurawtawp akhat nangnih.”
Inia amani kholok maikung khan rapha a ruti, “Imaw nangiriei kiei jet mi`ing.”
Khan ama na tolawng lam ah rushok phakhan, nupang shik `khat na rumuk a, khan ah awm hai dieng ruti, “Hi miring hiawm Nazareth Jesu le rurawtawp inih.”
Khan ama na raphatlam a chawngrurakham, “Miring hi kiei jet mi`ing.”
Khan awmbawt le ama dieng ah ading hai kha na ava ua Peter dieng ruti uh, “Diktak a nangawm amani kar a akhat nangnih, ajarla nang chawngriei na jawt mak.”
Khashole pumrobot a chawngrakhamlam a ruti, “Hi miring hi kiei jet mi`ing!” Khan relentak a arkhawng hawng khong joi.
Jesu na ama dieng iruriei chawng hai kha Peter na rumininghep joi, “Arkhawng na khong mala, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih.” Khan ama na vai rushok a rie`ieklam a ruchap joi.
Jingkara thiempu ulien hai le miring hai shierulien kholok na Jesu kha thatna rang, rurashak u joi.
Khashole ama kha khop a ruchawi u joi, khan rampo Pontius Pilate dieng vak pek u joi.
Khashole ama kha iheng ua engshiet a iruthaw u kha ama rujor Judas na rumuk `le, mulung a shirna hawng niei, khan thiempu ulien hai le shierulien hai dieng dangka shawm `thum kha emele rushe joi.
Ama na ruti, “Kiei na jar boi thishen kinepekna u khan kiei munu kawthaw joi.” Inia amani na rumashang uh, “Makha kieini le ruirakaina imaw awm? Makha nang roiruputna keng joi!”
Riethiengmun khan dangka hai kha apai a rushe joi, khan nining a rui le vak rikhit joi.
Khan thiempu ulien hai kha na dangka hai kha rushar ua ruti uh, “Hihaihi nieibawmna ah tet rang a hi Dan nih naw nih, ajarla mahi thishen man inih.”
Khajarkhan shier hai kha le milak hai khumna rang, bekonpa loipuk `khat rawchawkna rang, rurawjawt u joi.
Khajarkhan makha loipuk kha Thishen Loimun, tia vonshe hin ti u lai.
Makha thiempulien Jeremiah dieng a irurieina kha hawng rupum inih. Hitihin ruriei, “Amani na dangka shawm `thum ruloi uh, makha Israel nai hai na ama rang a irumachat u aman kha inih.
Khatikhan PUMI na chawnginurupek kha ang a amani na bekonpa loipuk rang khan rupek u joi.”
Khan Jesu na rampopa maikung a ruding joi. Khan rampopa kha na ama dieng rawdawn a ruti, “Nang Jihudi hai Reng kha maw nangnih?” Khan Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Nangiti kha inih.”
Khan thiempu ulien hai le shierulien hai na ajar rupek u phakhan, ama na rumashang mak.
Khashole Pilate na ama dieng ruti, “Amani na nang chung a hidawr a kungachang u hi jet makche maw?”
Inia Jesu na chawng `khatshe rumashang mak. Makhan rampopa kha ajeng a shinrudawng pe joi.
Khan rampopa shena dungjuia, rohoi shung a mipui na imadan shurkhop miring `khat amani rang rumoshokngai.
Kha pha khan amani na Barabbas iti shurkhop miropoboi `khat runiei uh.
Khajarkhan amani na ruruchun u phakhan, Pilate na amani dieng rurawdawn, “Nangni rang tumaw nomoshok pe u ning? Barabbas maw, ninawkle Christa iti Jesu hi maw?”
Ajarla Jesu kha mukmakna jar a irupek u keng, iti kha ama na rujet.
Pilate na chawngshatna shutna khan rushuh phakhan, inkonu na hitihin chawng vak mawchawi a ruti, “Miring adik chung khan nang khut raw naw roh. Ajarla jangin ama jar a karamang a ajeng a kashaw.”
Inia Barabbas kha nik a Jesu kha thatna rang, thiempu ulien hai le shierulien hai na mipui kha rumawshawk uh.
Rampopa kha na amani dieng rurawdawn, “Idi kar hin tumaw nangni rang nomoshok pe u ning?” “Barabbas!” tia amani na rumashang uh.
Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Khanitala Christa iti Jesu chung hin kiei na imaw thaw ning?” Kholok na “Cross ling ah that rosho!” tia rumashang uh.
Khan rampopa kha na ruti, “Ithaw maw, ashie imaw thaw joi?” Inia lieklawr a “Cross ling ah that rosho!” tia rura`ai uh.

Pilate na ih ruman ngamlai mak, inia kha ruhut a mi hai kha mohok ruput u joi. Ama na makha rumuk phakhan, tui ruloi a mipui maikung a ukhut rurushuk a ruti, “Mahi midikpa thishen jar hin kiei kajar awm mak. Mahi nang roiruputna u keng joi.”
Khashole mi kholok na ruti uh, “Ama thishen kha kuchung ua le kanai hai chung a cho rosho.”
Khashole Barabbas kha amani rang rumoshok pe joi. Khan Jesu kha rumejem shole, cross ling ah that rang rupek joi.
Khashole rampopa ramiring hai na Jesu kha Praetorium khan ruchawi ua ama kha rarup kholok na rurokochip joi.
Khan amani na ama pon kha rulik pe ua ponshen kha rurieshieimashak u joi.

Khashole riling renglukhum kha ruphan ua ulu ah rurukhumashak uh, khan rengshunshawraw kha ukhut chang tieng rumarak uh. Khan amani na amaikung a rukhuk rushun ua erawh a ruti uh, “Lawm roh, Jihudi hai Reng!”
Khan ama kha rumiechiei uh, khan rengshunshawraw kha ruloi pe ua ulu ah rujem uh.
Khan engshiet a ruthaw u shole, ama ah put ah ponshen kha ruthut pe ua ama ponlediertak kha rurieshieimashak u joi. Khan cross ah that rang, ruchawi u joi.
Khan amani na vak shok u le roroia, Simon iti Cyrene miring `khat vak muk ua ama kha ranak a ama cross kha ruruputmashak uh.
Khan Golgotha iti mun kha hawng shok u joi. Makha Luru Mun tina inih.
Hiei le reche ju kha nek rang rupek uh, khan ama na makha tuidan ruen phakhan, runeh jawt mak.

Khashole ama kha cross ling ah rumakhai u joi. Amani na vanmuk ruen ua ama ponledier hai kha rureshem uh. Makha thiempulien na iruriei kha hawng rupum inih: “Amani na koponledier hai kha amani kar a rushem uh, khan kopon rieshiei chung a vanmuk ruen uh.”
Makhan amani na rushuh ua ama kha rurung uh.
Ama lu chung khan jar ipekna u kha rumiejiek uh: MAHI JESU HI JIHUDI HAI RENG KHA INIH.
Minieisho miring pasha `di, akhat chang tieng, khan shik `khat, viei tieng, ama le cross ah rumakhai uh.
Iedieng ah shehawng hai na, amani lu nawklam a, ama kha rumieshiet uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Riethiengmun shiet a ni `thum shung a mothoi rang a nang, nang nining a rashan roh! Nang Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, cross ah put ah jong chum roh.”
Kha le ra`ang a, thiempu ulien hai na, danoja hai le khan shierulien hai le, engshiet a ruti uh,
“Ama na shik miring hai kha rushan, inia nining a tu rashan ngam mak. Ama hi Israel hai Reng kha nitjoiatu, cross ah put ah jong chumrieshie kieini na takashawn u rang kanih.
Ama na Pathien kha takarushawn. Pathien na adit joiatu, ama hi tun shan rosho, ajarla ama na ruti, ‘Kiei Pathien Shapa kha kanih.’ ”
Kha le ra`ang a, ama le cross ah irumakhai minieisho hai kha na`awm erawh a rubiek uh.
Khan nidan shawmlieidi ah put ah nidan `thumshe khan ram kholok rujing joi.
Khan nidan `thum dawr khan Jesu na he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Eli, Eli lama sabachthani?” Makhala “Kapathien, kapathien ijar a kiei hi ninamathan maw nih joi?” itina inih.
Khan ah ading eshen na makha rujet u phakhan, ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na Elijah kha ahai joi!”
Khan amani kar a akhat na pangrek a spongos vak loi a ju athur khan runawm pe, khan rawmaw mawr ah rukhop pe a nek rang rupek.
Eshen na ruti, “Bieh u naw roh, ama ashan rang, Elijah kha jong pe maw en u rawi.”
Jesu na takthar a he rashangtak a rura`ai a aratha kha rupek joi.
Khan enro, riethiengmun maikharpon kha chung ah put ah thoishe kha her `di a rether, khan nieinu hawng rawnawk a lungbiei hai kha rukek.
Khan thanmun hai kha rurawlawng a ruja miriethieng tampui pum hai kha rumothoi joi.
Amani na than ah put ah vak shok ua, ama thoiretna shole, khopui riethieng ah rushe ua mi tampui dieng rular u joi.
Khan Jesu arung ruawm rarajakhat lamkai, khan ama le ruawm hai kha na nieinu rawnawk le ashok chon hai kha rumuk u phakhan, ajeng a ruchih ua ruti uh, “Diktak a ama hi Pathien Shapa kha inih!”
Khan nupang tampui kha na ralaviei a enlam a ruawm uh. Amani kha Galilee ah put ah Jesu rujui a chon ruthaw pe hai kha runih uh.
Amani kar khan Mary Magdalene, James le Joses unu Mary, khan Zebedee shapa hai unu rujaw uh.
Ni hawng tah phakhan, Joseph iti Arimathea ah put ah rawchawng miring `khat na kha mun khan rushe. Ama kha`awm Jesu khaichawi `khat runih.
Ama na Pilate dieng rushe a Jesu rok kha vak nik. Khashole rok kha ama dieng pekna rang, Pilate na chawng rupek joi.
Khan Joseph na rok kha ruloi phakhan, thanpon achaining `khat le rujo joi.
Lung ah iver ama thanmun athar khan rumaja joi. Khan mawkawt khan lung alientak `khat le rukhar a rushe joi.
Khan Mary Magdalene le Mary shik `khat kha than mai kha le re`en mun khan rushuh uh.
Khan Rashamna Nikho shole, jing tieng hin, thiempu ulien hai le Pharisee hai na lawp `khat a Pilate dieng rushe uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Mimohonpa kha na iringlai khan, ‘Ni `thum shole hawng thoi rang kanih,’ tia iruriei kha kimininghep uh.

Khajarkhan than kha ni `thumshe hin rephetna boi rang chawng peh roh. Khanawkatu akhaichawi hai na jan a va u ning, tia ama kha vak muruk u rangnih, khan amani na ‘Ama kha athi ah put ah thoi joi,’ tia miring hai dieng riei u rangnih. Khajarkhan dawngkhit a mimohonna kha arapanek a shiedet rangnih.”
Pilate na amani dieng ruti, “Ramiring nangniei uh, she u tana nangijet u dungjuia vak menet u roh.”
Khajarkhan amani na rushe ua lung kha jetnam vak nam uh, khan arung miding ua rumenet u joi.
Sabbath nikho theng shole, hapta shung a akhat changna nikho hawng shok le roroia, Mary Magdalene le Mary shik `khat na thanmun kha aen rushe uh.
Khan enro, nieinu lientak `khat rurawnawk, ajarla Pumi ravantir na ravan ah put ah jong chum, khan rushe a mawkawt ah put ah lung kha vak moloi, khan makha chung khan rushuh.
Ama alar kha khomelek ruang, khan ama ponledier kha vur ang a ruchek pe.
Khan mirung hai kha na ama kha ruchih ua rurawnawk uh, khan athi miring ruang uh.
Khan ravantir kha na nupang hai dieng mashang a ruti, “Chih u naw roh, ajarla cross ah iruthat u Jesu kha nangitawk u keng, iti kha kejet.
Ama kha hin awmlai mak. Ajarla, iruriei dungjuia, ama kha thoi joi. Va u roh, Pumi jana hi vak en u roh.

Khan relentak a she u tana, ama kha athi ah put ah thoi joi, tia akhaichawi hai dieng vak riei u roh. Khan enro, ama na Galilee ah nang matieng rushe joi; kha mun khan ama kha nangmuk u rangnih. Enro, kiei na nangni dieng kienieriei u joi.”
Khajarkhan amani na thanmun ah put ah, chih u joiawm, ningaitak a rurelen u joi. Khan akhaichawi hai dieng chawng kha vak rieina rang, rutan u joi.
Akhaichawi hai dieng ariei rushe u le roroia, enro, Jesu na amani kha rurumuk pui ua ruti, “Ningai u roh.” Khan amani na rushe uh, khan eke rumukui pe ua chubairubawk uh.

Khashole Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Chih u naw roh, she u tana ku`uliennai hai kha Galilee ah shena rang le, kha mun khan rumuk puina rang, vak riei u rang roh. Makhan amani na kiei hi numuk u rangnih.”
Khan amani na rushe u lai khan, enro, mirung hai eshen na khopui ah rushe ua thiempu ulien hai dieng ashok chon kholok kha vak mejet u joi.
Khan amani na shierulien hai le vak ruchun ua chon rurashak uh. Amani na ramiring hai dieng shier tampui rupek ua
ruti uh, “ ‘Akhaichawi hai na jan a va ua, kaja riethiei u, vak muruk u joi,’ tia amani dieng riei u roh.
Mahi rampopa nokor shok joiawm, ama kha kieini na dawi a nerekhemashak u rang kanih.”
Khajarkhan amani na shier kha ruloi ua amani na iti u kha ruthaw uh. Khan mahi rishim hi vonshe hin Jihudi hai kar a rajar`er a rushem uh.
Khashole khaichawi shawmlieikhat kha na, Jesu na amani dieng a irukhin lawn khan shena rang, Galilee tieng rushe u joi.
Khan amani na ama kha rumuk u phakhan, chubairubawk uh. Inia eshen na tu rurakhana uh.
Khan Jesu na ava a amani dieng ruriei, “Ravan le rieliei shung ah cham kholok kha kiei dieng nepek joi.
Khajarkhan nangni she u tana phung rikip kha khaichawi vak minit u roh. Amani kha Apa, Shapa, khan Ratha Riethieng riming a baptisma vak moloi u roh.
Nangni dieng chawng kinepek u kholok kha juina rang, vak ruchuh u roh. Khan enro, kiei na nangni le ka`awmchak. Khan manmieshie mawtawrshe khan kiei na nangni kha nawawm pui u rang kanih.” Amen.
Mahi Pathien Shapa Jesu Christa athachawng putna kha inih.
Hitihin Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah rumiejiek: “Enro, chawngchawipa kha nang matieng kojongtir joi. Ama na nang maton ah lam nokon pe rangnih.”
“Ramthim ah hesho `khat na ra`ai, ‘PUMI lam kha kon pe roh. Ama lam hai kha moton pe roh.’ ”
John na ramthim a rular a mulung lek mumukna rang le Pathien dieng hiei a munu hai rangaidamna kha mukna rang, baptisma iloi u rang a inih, tia chawng rushem.
Khan Judea ram ah awm le Jerusalem ah awm mi kholok na ama dieng rushe uh. Makhan amani munu hai kha rurophong ua, Jordan tuidung khan amani kholok kha ama na baptisma rupek uh.
Khan John na sharingshiei sham kha rurieshiei, mevun kawngkhit kha rukhit, khan ama na khaishawr le ram khoining rushak.
Khan ama na ruriei, “Kanuk ah ajong rang a ama hi kieinek a ranak nieidet, kiei na bu a ama kethawp rui thut rang khan rutuk mi`ing.
Kiei na nangni kha tui ah baptisma kunurupek uh, inia ama na tu Ratha Riethieng le baptisma nepek u rangnih.”
Khalaikhan Jesu na Galilee ah awm Nazareth ah put ah rushe a, Jordan khan John na baptisma rumoloi joi.
Tui shung ah put ah hawng shokphit `le, ama na ravan rawlawng a Ratha na vashu ang a ama riding a jong chum kha rumuk.
Ravan ah put ah he `khat hi jong shok, “Numkipoktak kashapa kha nangnih, nang chung a ningnitna kha kieniei joi.”
Khan Ratha na ama kha ramthim ah ruchawirelen joi.
Makha ramthim khan ni shawm mili Satan na rulem a ramsha hai le ruawm. Khashole ravantir hai na ama chon kha jong thaw pe uh.
Khan John kha lungroko shung a rutet shole, Jesu na Galilee ah rushe a Pathien rengchangna athachawng kha rushem.
Ama na ruriei, “Apha kha hawng shun joi, Pathien rengchangna kha nai joi. Nang mulung lek u roh, khan athachawng kha takashawn u roh.”
Khan ama na Galilee Thampui pang kha rujotlai khan, Simon le anaipangpa Andrew na thampui ah len iruvawr u kha vak muk; ajarla amani kha ngashur miring runih uh.
Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Kanu nujui u roh, kiei na nangni kha mishur miring namachang u rang kanih.”
Khajarkhan relentak a len hai kha mak ua anu rujui u joi.
Khan ama na rushebawt `le, Zebedee shapa James le anaipangpa John kha rokong shung ah len hai kha iruphawt ua ruawm u kha vak muk.
Relentak a amani kha rukoi. Khan apa u Zebedee kha shok moroi hai le rokong ah mak ua, anu rujui u joi.
Khan amani na Capernaum ah rushe a, relentak a Sabbath nikho hin ama na synagogue ah rulut a ruruchuk.
Ama miruchuh hai khan, shinrudawng pe uh, ajarla danoja hai kha ang boi a, chamnieitak a amani kha iruruchuk inih.
Ratha rono na ichutna miring `khat synagogue khan ruawm.
Ama na ra`ai a ruti, “Kieini hi ih lawt rang a nangiti maw nih, Aw Nazareth Jesu? Kieini hi mathang rang a va maw nangnih? Nang tu Pathien Miriethieng ama kha nangnih, iti hi kejet uh!”
Makhan Jesu na ama kha rawkawk a ruti, “Awmchien roh, ama shung ah put ah vak shok roh!”
Khan ratha rono kha na enchak a runawk a helehoi le ama shung ah put ah vak shok joi.

Makhan mi kholok na shindawngna runiei uh. Khajarkhan rawdawn nana ua ruti uh, “Mahi imaw nih? Ih miruchukna athar maw nih? Raikho rono haishe chamnieitak a chawngpek a amani na ama chawng kha jui pe uh.”
Khajarkhan Galilee ram ah awm miring kholok dieng ama riming kha rular perelen joi.
Khan synagogue ah put ah vak shokphit `le, James na John le roroia Simon le Andrew in ah rushe uh.
Simon tarpi kha raitun na tun a ruja a ruawm. Khajarkhan amani na relentak a Jesu dieng rumejet uh.
Khan ama kha rujawng a ama khut ah mukui a rumothoi. Khan raitun kha na relentak a rumathan a amani chon kha ruthaw pe joi.
Khan nitak a nilut pha khan, ana miring le raikho hai na ichutna miring hai kha ama dieng vak chawi uh.
Kha khopui shung ah awm mi hai kha na mawkawt kha lochip a ruruchun uh.
Khan rai shikshik le ana hai kha rumadam, khan raikho haiawm runawt. Raikho hai na achawng rang a kha rujawt pe mak, ajarla amani na ama kha rujet uh.
Khan jingkara varmuk hin ama na ruthoi a ramthim ah rushe, khan makha mun khan nikna runiei.
Khania Simon, khan ama le rawtawp hai na ama anu kha ruthir uh.
Khan rumuk u phakhan, ama dieng ruriei uh, “Mi kholok na nang kha natawk uh.”
Inia amani dieng ruriei, “Chawng keshemnathiei rang, aranai kho `khat ah she u rang rawi, ajarla hijarhin a ajong kanih.”
Khan Galilee shung kholok ah awm amani synagogue hai khan ama na chawng rushem, khan raikho hai kha runawt.
Makhan raithawnaw tawngpa kha na ama dieng rushe, rukhuk rushun, khan nik a ruti, “Nangjawt a tu, kiei hi nangnieriethieng ngam.”
Ama chung a lainatna runiei, khan Jesu na ukhut rushawn a rushit, khan ama dieng ruti, “Kajawt, riethieng kha nih rang roh.”
Ama na rurieisho le relentak a raithawnaw kha na ama kha rumathan joi.
Khan Jesu na khawktak a chawngruben a ama kha rumesherelen joi.

Khan ama dieng ruriei, “Riring roh, tute dieng riei naw roh. Inia thiempu dieng nang pumtak kha vak mumuk rang roh. Nang riethiengna jar a Moses na chawngirupek hai kha le vak rawthawi roh. Makha na amani dieng kungchangna kha nih rangnih.”

Khanikengta ama na rushe phakhan, ranaktak a chawng kha rophong vak put joi. Khajarkhan Jesu na malangsheng a khopui ah rulut ngamlai mak. Inia thimnabieng mun ah ruawm joi, khan shie rikip ah mi hai na ama dieng va uh.
Nikhothang shawtbawt `le Capernaum vak lutret phakhan, ama kha in `khat ah awm, iti kha rujet uh.
Relentak a mi tampui vak ruchun ua mawkawtshe khan mun rutawnglai mak. Makhan ama na amani dieng chawngruriei pe.
Makhan takthi miring `khat pasha mili na dawm a ama dieng vak chawi uh.
Inia mi rawphai jarkhan, ama kung ah vat pui ngam u lai mak. Khajarkhan inphu kha ama riding ah lik ua rurevengmashak uh, khan takthipa kha ajana kha le jong muchum uh.
Khan amani takashawn kha rumuk phakhan, Jesu na takthipa dieng ruti, “Shapa, nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi.”
Inia khakawt ah rushuh danoja hai kha na amani ningmuruk a rurawdawn nana uh,
“Ijar a hi miring hi na Pathien mieshietna chawngiriei maw nih? Pathien niboia tu na maw munu hi arangaidam ngam awm?”
Jesu na amani ningmuruk a khatikhan rawdawn nana u kha aratha a rujetrelen a, amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a hihaihi mulung a nangimining u maw nih?
Atakthipa dieng hin, ‘Nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi,’ iti ninawkle, ‘Thoi roh, khan nang jana kha chawi tana lawn rang roh,’ iti hi kar hin ih kha maw baidet?
Miring Shapa na rieliei chung a munu rangaidamna cham kha ieniei,” iti hi nangjetna u rang a inih, khan takthipa dieng ruti,
“Nang dieng kienieriei, thoi rang roh, khan nang jana kha loi tana nang in ah she rang roh.”
Khan relentak a ruthoi a ama jana kha lik a vanoi maikung a rushe joi. Mahin mi kholok kha shinrudawng pe uh, khan Pathien kha mulurlam a ruti uh, “Hi ang hi mulak u makmelai!”
Khashole thampui kawmchang tieng rusheret a mipui na ama dieng va uh, khan ama na amani kha ruruchuk.
Khan ashe le roroia, Alphaeus shapa Levi na khaichana pekna in ah rushuh kha vak muk. Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nujui roh.” Khan ama na ruthoi a anu kha rujui joi.

Khan hitihin ruawm, ama na Levi in ah rushulai khan, khaichana roshong hai le munu miring hai na`awm Jesu le khan akhaichawi hai le maicham ah rushuh ua bu runek uh. Ajarla anujui hai kha rurawp uh, khan amani na anu kha rujui uh.

Ama na munu miring hai le khaichana roshong hai le bu irunekshom kha Pharisee hai le danoja hai na vak muk u phakhan, akhaichawi hai dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a khaichana roshong hai le munu miring hai le nekleshak ishakshom maw nih?”

Khan Jesu na rujet a amani dieng ruti, “Adam miring hai na loipu rangai mak, inia ana hai na irangai inih. Midik hai kha akoi jong nih mi`ing, inia mulung lekna rang, munu miring hai kha akoi jong kanih.”

Khan John khaichawi hai le Pharisee hai na chamrarudoi uh. Khan amani na ama dieng va ua vak rawdawn uh, “John le Pharisee hai shok hai na chamradoi uh, inia ijar a nang khaichawi hai na idoi boi u maw nih?”
Makhan Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Moilawm hai kha na moipa kha le awm shung khan chamradoi u nih maw? Moipa kha le awmlailim tu chamradoi u naw nih.
Inia moipa kha amani ah put ah ichawina pe nikho hai kha hawng shok rangnih. Kha nikho hai khan amani na chamradoi u rangnih.
“Tu na`awm irikin boi pon `thar lek kha pon lui a chingai mak, khanitatu ibo `thar kha na hawng rikin ning, tia shiedet a chiet rangnih.
Khan tu na`awm alui mevun jukawk ah ju `thar thangai mak, tha joiatu, ju `thar kha na mevun jukawk lui kha khoi rangnih. Inia ju `thar kha mevun jukawk `thar ah thong rang a inih.”
Khan hitihin rushok, Sabbath nikho `khat hin Jesu na shangbiei hai kha rakan a rupang. Amani na rupang le roroia, akhaichawi hai na shangvui hai kha achin ruput uh.
Khan Pharisee hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Enro, Sabbath nikho a ijar a amani na Dan nih boi ithaw u maw nih?”
Inia amani dieng ruriei, “David na irawtawp pui hai le ravat a vawnrucham pe pha a iruthaw:

Abiathar na thiempu rashang ruthawlai khan, David na Pathien in ah rulut a, thiempu hai nih boi na shak rang Dan nih boi rawthawina tan kha irawtawp pui hai diengawm irupek a irushak kha nangni na rutelak u makche maw?”
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Sabbath nikho hi miring hai rang a ikon inih, inia miring hai hi Sabbath rang a ikon nimak.
Khajarkhan Miring Shapa kha Sabbath Pumi kha`awm inih.”
Khan ama na synagogue ah rulutret a makhan khutchar miring `khat ruawm.
Khan amani na ama jar pekna rang, Sabbath nikho khan madam maw, tia ruva uh.
Inia khutcharpa dieng ruti, “Akar hin vak ding roh.”
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Sabbath nikho hin atha thaw, ninawkle ashie thaw, ringkho shan, ninawkle ringkho mathang, ih kha maw Dan nidet?” Inia ruawmchien uh.

Makhan mulung hang le roroia, amani kha enroko ruthaw phakhan, amani mulung michimna u khan mulung jumna runiei. Khan anapa dieng ruti, “Nang khut kha vak shawn roh.” Khan ama na rushawn, khan ama khut kha shik `khat kha ang a rudam pe joi.
Khan Pharisee hai na nawtshun a rushok ua ama kha itia maw that rang, tia Herod miring hai kha le chawng vak rashak u joi.
Inia Jesu na akhaichawi hai le roroia thampui tieng rukir joi. Khan Galilee le Judea ah put ah mipui na rujui uh.
Jerusalem, Idumea, khan Jordan vara ah put ah, Tyre le Sidon ramroko ah awm mipui `khat na ama na iruthaw chon hai kha jet ua ama dieng rushe uh.
Khan mipui kha na ru`umna boi rang, ama rang rokong ashin `khat rashamna pe rang, akhaichawi hai dieng ruriei.
Ajarla khadawr a arawp hai kha irumadam inih. Khajarkhan raitawng hai kholok na shih rawng, tia ama dieng rurawshawn uh.
Khan raikho rono hai kha na ama kha rumuk u `le, bawklap a ra`ailam a ruti uh, “Nang hi Pathien Shapa kha nangnih.”
Khan amani na ama kha malarna boi rang, khawktak a chawngruben uh.
Tun Jesu na lawn ah ruhawng a ama na idit miring hai kha rukoi a ama dieng rushe uh.
Khashole ama le rawtawp rang le chawngshem tir rang,
khan chamniei a ana hai kha madamna rang le raikho hai kha nawtna rang, shawmlieidi kha rumadan joi.
Amani khala, ama na Peter iti rimingrothom irupekna Simon,
Zebedee shapa James le James anaipangpa John. Amani dieng Boanerges iti rimingrothom ama na rupek. Makha tina tu “Khomelek Shapa hai” tina inih.
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Matthew, Thomas, Alphaeus shapa James, Thaddaeus, Canaan miring Simon,
khan ama rujor Judas Iscariot, hihaihi inih. Khan amani na in `khat ah rulut u joi
Khan mipui kha vak ruchunret ua amani kha tanshe rushah ngam u mak.
Khania ama inko hai na mahi rujet u `le, ashur rang rushe uh. Ajarla amani na ruti uh, “Ama kha vet joi.”
Khan Jerusalem ah put ah ajong danoja hai kha na ruti uh, “Ama dieng Beelzebul lut joi,” khan “Raikho hai reng ranak a raikho hai hi inawt inih.”
Khajarkhan amani kha rukoi a rangshim a ama na ruriei pe, “Iti a maw Satan na Satan kha nawt ngam nih?
Khan rengchangna `khat hi nining a reshen joiatu, makha rengchangna kha ding ngam naw nih.
Khan in `khat hi nining a reshen joiatu, makha in kha ding ngam naw nih.
Khan Satan na bibing a reshen joiatu, ama kha ding ngam naw nih, inia ama rang dawng kha nit pe rangnih.
Tute na miratpa in ah lut a, miratpa kha khopbak nawkatu, ienieinak hai kha ranak a ro pe ngam nawnih. Makha shole ama in kha ranak a aro pe rangnih.
Nangni dieng diktak a kinieriei u inih, miring hai munu kholok, khan amani na isho mimieshietna kholok kha arangaidam rangnih.
Inia Ratha Riethieng chung a mieshiet ama kha na rangaidamna kha niei mak, inia kumshawt chepna kha muk rangnih.”
Ajarla amani na “Ama shung a raikho rono awm pe,” ruti uh.
Khashole unu le anaipang hai kha va ua vai tieng dinglam a rungak uh, khan ama akoi mi rutir uh.
Mipui na ama kha ru`um uh. Khan ama dieng ruti uh, “Enro, nangnu le nang naipang hai na vai tieng natawk uh.”
Makhan mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Tu kha maw kunu ninawkle kanaipang hai?”
Ama na rokochip a rushuh hai kha enroko a ruti, “Enro, kunu le kanaipang hai kha hin awm!
Tunita`awm Pathien mulungmining athaw ama kha kunu, kanaipangnu, khan kanaipangpa kha inih.”
Khan ama na thampui kawmchang ah miruchuh ruputret. Makhan ama dieng mipui vak ruchun jarkhan, rokong `khat ah rushuh joi. Khalaikhan mipui kholok kha tu kawmchang ah ruawm uh.
Khan amani kha rangshim tampui le ruruchuk, khan iruchukna khan amani dieng ruti,
“Rangai u roh! Enro, muchi vawrpa kha na muchi vawr rushe.
Ama na iruvawr le roroia hitihin ruawm, eshen kha lamkaw ah ruchu, khan ravan a va hai na jong shar uh.
Eshen kha piei arawp awmna boi lung kar ah ruchu. Pieipak kha thuk boi jarkhan, makha na relentak a hawng kei.
Khania ni hawng sha phakhan hawng re`em, khan rujung loi boi jarkhan, makha rovoi.
Eshen na riling hai kar a ruchu, khan riling hai kha hawng lien dedet a makha hawng liep. Makha na ara rumoshok ngam mak.
Inia eshen kha pieipak thatna mun ah ruchu a ara rumoshok. Ara kha hawng rawp dedet a shawm `thum, shawm `ruk, khan rajakhat hawng nih.”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Rangaina rang a nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho!”
Khan Jesu kha thiente a ruawmlai khan, iedieng ah awm hai kha le khan akhaichawi shawmlieidi kha na rangshim chungchang khan rurawdawn uh.
Makhan amani dieng ruti, “Nangni dieng Pathien rengchangna chungchanga murukchawng kha jetna rang nurupek uh, inia vai tieng ah awm hai rang tu, rangshimrok a ipek inih.
Makhala, ‘Aen miring hai na enthiei, inia muh u mak. Rangai miring hai na rangaithiei, inia jet u mak. Khanitnawkatu, amani na mulung lek a rangaidam rumuk u rangnih joi.’ ”
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Hi rangshim hi nangijet boi u maw nih? Itia maw rangshim kholok hai hi jet u rawng?”
Muchi vawrpa kha na chawng kha awvawr.
Inia hihai miring hi lam kaw ah acho muchi hai kha inih: chawng kha vawr pe, inia rangai u phakhan, Satan na varelen a amani dieng a ivawr chawng kha loi pe.
Khan lung arawp chung ah ivawrna miring hai kha hihaihi inih: chawng kha rangai u phakhan, ningai le roroia loirelen uh.
Inia rujung loi u boi jarkhan, ring shawt u mak. Chawng jar a epshawna ninawkle shawrana hawng phakhan, keruthuirelen uh.
Khan hihai miring hai hi riling kar ah achu muchi hai kha inih. Amani na chawng kha rangai uh,
inia ringkho mulungdawngna, nieilelung lemna le shikshik chung a ditrekhena kha na chawng kha liep pe u jarkhan, ara boi kha chang uh.
Khania rieliei thatna ah ivawrna miring hai kha chawng rangai hai kha inih, ajarla irangai u chawng kha loi uh. Khajarkhan shawm `thum a, shawm `ruk a, khan arajah a ara kha moshok uh.”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Thaomiei kha tiengkum thoi ah ninawkle jakhang thoi ah itetngai boi nimak maw? Thaomiei shutna chung ah itetngai nimak maw?
Ajartu rophong boi rang rethe ih awm mak, khan avar ah avangir rang a rethe boi ih awm mak.
Tunita`awm rangaina rang a nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho.”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni na nangijet u kha riring pui u roh. Nangni na dannangilak u kha nangni dieng danlak rangnih. Rangai hai nangni dieng nobo pe u rangnih.
Khan aniei ama dieng khan arawpdet kha pek rangnih. Inia aniei boi ama dieng khan inieidakshe kha`awm, ama ah put ah loi pe rangnih.”
Khan ama na ruriei, “Pathien rengchangna hi loipuk ah muchi ivawr miring kha le ra`ang inih.
Shun le jan a aja nit a, athoi nita`awm, muchi kha hawng kei a hawng rawshawn; inia itia maw nih, iti kha ama na jet mak.
Ajarla rieliei na nining a ara imoshok inih: rapapek a awdawn, dawn a uvui, khan dawn a vui shung ah uru hawng ship.
Khashole ara kha hawng min phakhan, kawite le i`at inih, ajarla rawkhawm pha kha hawng shok nih joi.”
Khan ama na ruriei, “Pathien rengchangna hi kieini na ih le maw ra`angmashak rang? Ninawkle, ih rangshim kha le maw mahi angriei rang?
Makha anchamru le ra`ang inih: pieipak chung ah vawr phakhan, rieliei a muchi kholok kar a ashindet inih.
Khania vawr phakhan, hawng kei, khan anshawbo kung kholok kar a aliendet kha hawng chang, khan abak lien hawng moshok. Khajarkhan ravan a va hai na ama rilip ah rubu konna uh.”
Khan amani dieng chawng kha rangshim tampui le amani na irangai thieituk a khatikhan ruriei pe.
Khan rangshim a niboia amani dieng ruriei pe mak. Khan ama khaichawitak hai dieng bing a rangshim kholok kha rumeler pe.
Khanikhan ni hawng tah phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Kieini thampui shir `khat tieng khawn she u rang rawi.”
Khan amani na mirawp kha meshe shole, rokong shung ah ruawm kha ang a, ama kha rushe pui u joi. Khan rokong eshen haiawm iedieng ah ruawm.
Khan shur hawng thoi a tuilawm kha na rokong kha hawng jem a rokong ah tui hawng lut joi.
Inia Jesu na rokong kik `khat ah lukham thawir a ruja. Makhan amani na mothoi a ruti uh, “Oja, kathi u rang a hi nare u makche maw?”
Khan ama na hawng thoi a rithi kha rawkawk a thampui dieng ruti, “Renem roh, awmchien roh.” Makhan rithi rang kha bang a rurinim joi.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a khadawrtak achih maw nangnih uh? Takashawn nanginiei boi u maw nih?”
Makhan amani kha ajeng a ruchih ua khatlekhat dieng ruriei uh, “Ih miringtak maw nih, rithi le thampuishe na`awm ama chawng irangai pe hi!”
Khan amani na thampui vara `khat ah awm Gadarenes ram ah va u joi.
Khan ama na rokong ah put ah vak shokphit `le, raikho rono alut miring `khat hi than ah put ah hawng shok rurawtawng puirelen.
Ama awmna kha thankung inih. Tute na ama kha thirakarui le khop ngam mak.
Ajarla shan hai, khan thirakarui hai kha le ama kha khop ua`awm, shan hai kha changhawt a thaw a thirakarui hai kha bawngbawng a irutet inih. Khan tute na`awm ama kha adek ngam ruawm mak.
Shunlejan a ama na thankung ah le maw chung ah enchak a rura`ai a, thiethien a ataksha kha lung le irit a ruawm jawnjai inih.
Khan ama na Jesu kha rakhat a rumuk phakhan, vak tan a ama kha chubai vak bawk.
Khan he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Rashangving Pathien Shapa, Aw Jesu, kiei hi ih nawlawt rang a nangiti maw nih? Kiei hi nangnawmawshawna boi rang, Pathien ban a kenengen.”
Ajarla ama dieng ruti, “Aw raikho rono, ama ah put ah vak shok rang roh!”
Khan Jesu na rurawdawn, “Nang riming imaw ti?” Ama na rumashang a ruti, “Kiriming tu Legion iti, ajarla kieini hi karawp uh.”
Khan amani kha makha ram shung ah put ah nawtna boi rang, ama kha enchak a irudawi inih.
Makha mopang hai dieng khan vawk hawi lientak `khat na shak shak a ruawm uh.
Khan raikho hai kha na runik a ruti uh, “Vawk hai dieng khawn lutnathiei rang, nitir u roh.”
