Moses Dan dungjuia riethiengmashakna nikho kha hawng rupum phakhan, Pumi dieng pekna rang, Jerusalem ah vak chawi uh.
Hitihin Pumi Dan khan rumiejiek, “Naikawk mawlawng apa rikip kha PUMI rang a madansha inih, tia koi rang a inih.
Khan Pumi Dan ah iriei dungjuia pharphali rawbaw `khat ninawkle pharphali tete idi le thawi rang a inih.”

Khan enro, Jerusalem ah Simeon iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha midik le richichawi miring `khat runih. Israel kha Maw`awina rang a pha kha ama na ingak a ruawm inih. Khan Ratha Riethieng kha ama chung a ruawm.
Ama na Pumi Christa kha muk masheng thi naw nih, iti kha Ratha Riethieng na ama dieng irumumuk inih.
Ratha Riethieng na lamrukai pe a ama na riethiengmun khan rushe. Khan Naitepa Jesu kha unulepa na, ama rang Dan dungjuia thoithawna rang, vak chawi uh.
Simeon na Naitepa kha rupawm a Pathien mapaklam a ruti:
“Aw Pumi, tun nang chawngriei dungjuia, nang shokpa kiei hi lungdam a noloi rang roh.
Ajarla nang na mi kholok maikung a nangirurasham,
Nang shandamna kha, kimik hai hi na muk joi.
Ama hi Phungshik hai dieng chawngrophong rang a mieivar `khat inih, khan nang miring Israel dieng lurna rang a inih.”
Khan Joseph le unu na ama chungchanga irieina khan shindawngna runiei uh.

Khashole Simeon na amani kha rahvan rupek a unu Mariam dieng ruti, “Enro, Israel shung a mi tampui chona rang le thoina rang, nai hi imadan nih joi; khan amani na ire`erna pui u jetna kha chang rangnih.
(Inia nang mulungtak kha nokhoi pe rangnih). Khatikhan makha na mi tampui mulungmining kha rophong pe rangnih.”
Khan Asher phung Phanuel shanu Anna iti thiempilien `khat ruawm. Ama kha atarber, inruniei ah put ah inkopa le kum shiribak ruawm inih.
Khashole kum shawmrietlieimili dawr hi mieirawng ruchang. Ama na shunlejan a chamradoi a le anih a chubai irubawk a riethiengmun kha mathan boi a ruawm inih.
Kha phatak khan ama`awm ava a Pumi kha vak mapak. Ama na Jerusalem rekhekna rang a rungak mi kholok dieng ama chungchanga chawngruriei.
Pumi Dan dungjuia kholok kha rupummashaksho u le, amani na Galilee ah awm amani khopui Nazareth khan rukir u joi.
Naitepa kha hawng rawshawn, khan Ratha a hawng rat joi. Varna kha na ruship a Pathien numpokmirit kha ama chung a ruawm joi.
Khan unulepa kha na kumkip Rakanna rohoi rang, Jerusalem ah rushe uh.
Khan ama na kum shawmlieidi hawng nih phakhan, amani na rohoi shena dungjuia, Jerusalem ah rushe uh.
Khan nikho hai kha rumeheksho ua amani rukir u le roroia, Pashanai Jesu kha Jerusalem ah rurangah joi. Makha Joseph le unu na rujet u mak.
Hawi khan ajaw rawrawi keng, tia rumining ua amani na nikho `khat rulawn u joi. Khashole amani shokpui hai le lawm hai kar a atawk ruput u joi.
Amani na muk boi phakhan, ama atawk rang Jerusalem tieng vak kir uh.
Ni `thum shole, riethiengmun ah ama na oja hai kar a rushuh, amani chawng kha irurangai, khan chawngrurawdawn a ruawm kha vak muk uh.
Ama ijetna le awchawng mashang hai rangai mi rikip kha na shindawngna runiei uh.
Unulepa kha na ama kha rumuk phakhan, shindawngna runiei ua unu na ama dieng ruti, “Naitepa, ijar a hitihin a kieini dieng nangithaw maw nih? Enro, nangpa le kiei na mulungshawlam a kinatawk u keng.”
Ama na amani dieng rumashang, “Ijar a kiei hi ninatawk u maw nih? Kiei hi kapa in ah awmngir rang kanih, iti hi jet u makche maw?”
Khania amani dieng a iruriei kha rujet u mak.
Khashole amani le rushe a Nazareth tieng va joi, khan amani chawng kha rurangai. Unu na hihai kholok hi umulung shung a arerep a rutet.
Khan Jesu kha varna le taksha a rurawshawn, khan Pathien le miring hai numpokmirit kha rumuk.

Tiberius Caesar kum shawmlieirahnga changna rengchangna khan, Pontius Pilate na Judea rampo ruchang, Herod na Galilee tetrarch ruchang, anaipangpa Philip na Iturea le Trachonitis tetrarch ruchang, khan Lysanias na Abilene tetrarch ruchang.
Annas le Caiaphas na thiempu rashang runih u lai khan, Pathien chawng kha Zacharias shapa John dieng ramthim ah ajong inih.
Ama na Jordan shie `di ah awm ram kholok khan rushe a mulung lek mumukna rang le Pathien dieng hiei a munu hai rangaidamna kha mukna rang, baptisma iloi u rang a inih, tia chawng rushem.
Hitihin thiempulien Isaiah chawngriei hai behangbuk ah rumiejiek, ama na ruti, “Ramthim ah hesho `khat na ra`ai, ‘PUMI lam kha kon pe roh, ama lam hai kha moton pe roh.
Phaijaw rikip kha miship rangnih, khan lawn rikip kha redemashak rangnih. Khan lamkawi hai kha moton, khan aphor lam hai kha ranamashak rangnih.
Khan miring kholok na Pathien shandamna kha muk rangnih.’ ”
Ama dieng baptisma loi ava mipui hai dieng ruriei, “Nangni moro chicha hai! Jong shok rang a lunghangna ah put ah atan rang, tu na maw nangni kha nierieimasha u joi?

Khajarkhan mulung lekna rutuk ara hai kha moshok u roh. ‘Abraham kha kapa u `khat a kieniei uh,’ ti nenek u naw roh. Ajarla hihai lung ah put ah Abraham rang Pathien na nai hai kha mothoi ngam, iti hi nangni dieng kinieriei u inih.
Tunawm thing hai rujung khan riei kha rutung a awm joi. Khajarkhan ara atha moshok boi thingkung rikip kha tuk a miei a apai.”
Khan mipui na ama dieng ti uh, “Khanitala kieini na imaw thaw u ning?”
John na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kotai idi aniei ama kha na aniei boi ama dieng peh rosho, khan nekleshak aniei ama kha na khatikhan thaw rosho.”
Khan khaichana rawkhawm haiawm ama dieng baptisma aloi rang ava ua, ama dieng ruti uh, “Oja, kieini na imaw thaw u ning?”
Amani dieng rumashang, “Nangni dieng inepek dan kha khea rawkhawm u naw roh.”

Khan ramiring hai na`awm ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Kieini na imaw thaw u ning?” Amani dieng ruti, “Tute na ranak a shier rawkhawm u naw roh, ninawkle anih boi a mi bieh u naw roh, khan nang lawh u kha le hun u roh.”
Mi na ngakrala le roroia, John hi Christa kha nithiei, tia mulung shung a rurawdawn uh.

John na mi kholok dieng ruriei, “Kiei na nangni kha tui a baptisma kenepek uh, inia ajong rang a ama hi kieinek a ranak nieidet. Kiei hi ama kekawkrui thut rang khan rutuk mi`ing. Ama na nangni kha Ratha Riethieng le miei a baptisma nepek u rangnih.
Ama pher kha khoreng a riethiengmashakna rang le gehu kha achu ah mulutna rang, rieliei kha ama khut chung a awm joi. Khania irishi hai kha chiemtiknieiboi miei a ha rangnih.”
Khajarkhan mawshawkna tampui le athachawng kha mi hai dieng rurophong.
Inia anaipangpa Philip inkonu Herodia jar a le ochonthaw ashie kholok jar a, tetrarch Herod kha John na rurawkawk.
Hihai kholok chung a, ama na John kha lungroko shung ah irukhum inih.
Khan hitihin rushok, mi kholok kha baptisma rumoloi phakhan, Jesu kha`awm baptisma rumoloi joi. Khan ama na runik phakhan, ravan kha rurawlawng joi.
Khan Ratha Riethieng na vashu ang a taksha me a ama chung ah jong chum, khan ravan ah put ah he `khat jong a iti, “Numkipoktak kashapa kha nangnih, nang chung a ningnitna kha kieniei joi.”
Khan Jesu na chon ruput phakhan, kum shawm `thum dawr runih joi. Mi na imining dungjuia, ama kha Joseph shapa inih. Joseph kha Heli shapa inih. Heli kha Matthat shapa inih.
Matthat kha Levi shapa inih. Levi kha Melki shapa inih. Melki kha Jannai shapa inih. Jannai kha Joseph shapa inih.
Joseph kha Mattathiah shapa inih. Mattathiah kha Amos shapa inih. Amos kha Nahum shapa inih. Nahum kha Esli shapa inih. Esli kha Naggai shapa inih.
Naggai kha Maath shapa inih. Maath kha Mattathiah shapa inih. Mattathiah kha Semei shapa inih. Semei kha Joseph shapa inih. Joseph kha Judah shapa inih.
Judah kha Joanna shapa inih. Joanna kha Rhesa shapa inih. Rhesa kha Zerubbabel shapa inih. Zerubbabel kha Shalathiel shapa inih. Shalathiel kha Neri shapa inih.
Neri kha Melki shapa inih. Melki kha Addi shapa inih. Addi kha Cosam shapa inih. Cosam kha Elmodam shapa inih. Elmodam kha Er shapa inih.
Er kha Joses shapa inih, Joses kha Eliezer shapa inih. Eliezer kha Jorim shapa inih. Jorim kha Matthat shapa inih. Matthat kha Levi shapa inih.
Levi kha Simeon shapa inih. Simeon kha Judah shapa inih. Judah kha Joseph shapa inih. Joseph kha Jonan shapa inih. Jonan kha Eliakim shapa inih.
Eliakim kha Melea shapa inih. Melea kha Menan shapa inih. Menan kha Mattatha shapa inih. Mattatha kha Nathan shapa inih. Nathan kha David shapa inih.
David kha Jesse shapa inih. Jesse kha Obed shapa inih. Obed kha Boaz shapa inih. Boaz kha Salmon shapa inih. Salmon kha Nahshon shapa inih.
Nahshon kha Aminadab shapa inih. Aminadab kha Aram shapa inih. Aram kha Hezron shapa inih. Hezron kha Perez shapa inih. Perez kha Judah shapa inih.
Judah kha Jacob shapa inih. Jacob kha Isaac shapa inih. Isaac kha Abraham shapa inih. Abraham kha Terah shapa inih. Terah kha Nahor shapa inih.
Nahor kha Serug shapa inih. Serug kha Reu shapa inih. Reu kha Peleg shapa inih. Peleg kha Eber shapa inih. Eber kha Shelah shapa inih.
Shelah kha Cainan shapa inih. Cainan kha Arphaxad shapa inih. Arphaxad kha Shem shapa inih. Shem kha Noah shapa inih. Noah kha Lamech shapa inih.
Lamech kha Methusala shapa inih. Methusala kha Enoch shapa inih. Enoch kha Jared shapa inih. Jared kha Mahalalel shapa inih. Mahalalel kha Cainan shapa inih.
Cainan kha Enos shapa inih. Enos kha Seth shapa inih. Seth kha Adam shapa inih. Khan Adam kha Pathien shapa inih.
Khan Jesu na, Ratha Riethieng shiplam a, Jordan ah put ah vak kir a Ratha na ramthim ah ruchawi joi.
Kha mun khan diabol na ni shawm mili rulem. Khahai nikho khan ih shak boi a ruawm, khan nikho hawng shun phakhan, vawnrucham pe joi.
Diabol na ama dieng ruti, “Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, hi lung dieng hin tan rachangna rang, chawng peh roh.”
Makhan Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hitihin miejiek, ‘Miring na nekleshak ranga kha le ring naw nih, inia Pathien chawng rikip kha le aring rang a inih.’ ”
Khashole diabol na lawn rashang a ruchawi a richinkhatte hin manmieshie rengchangna hai kha rumumuk.
Khan diabol na ama dieng ruti, “Hihai kholok cham le amani lurna hai hi nang dieng nepek rang kanih, ajarla mahi kiei dieng nepek joi, khan kidit miring tukhat dieng nita`awm kiei na kipek inih.
Khajarkhan kiei hi chubainangnabawk a tu, kholok hi nang tah chang rangnih.”

Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Kiei ah put ah rechen roh, Satan! Ajarla hitihin miejiek, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha chubainangibawk rang a inih, khan ama ranga kha chon nangithaw pe rang a inih.’ ”
Khan ama kha Jerusalem ah ruchawi a riethiengmun moidawn khan rumiding, khan ama dieng ruti, “Pathien Shapa kha nangnih a tu, nang nining a chawm roh.
Ajarla hitihin miejiek, ‘Nang nurudon rang, ama ravantir hai dieng chawng pek rangnih,’
khan ‘Nang ke kha lung le rawtawna boi rang, amani khut le nurudawm u rangnih.’ ”
Makhan Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hitihin ruriei, “Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha nangilem boi rang a inih.”
Khan diabol na lemna rikip kha le rulem shole, chanthatna pha `khatshe rang khan ama ah put ah rushe joi.
Khashole Jesu na Ratha ranak a Galilee tieng vak kir joi. Khan ama chungchanga khakawt ah awm ram kholok dieng chawngrucherak joi.
Amani synagogue hai khan mi ruruchuk a mi kholok na ama kha rumapak uh.
Ama hawng lienna Nazareth ah vat phakhan, eshena dungjuia, Sabbath nikho hai khan synagogue ah rulut a ate rang ruding.
Khan thiempulien Isaiah behangbuk kha ama khut chung ah rupek uh. Ama na behangbuk kha rumawlawng a hitihin a irumiejiek mun kha rumuk:

“PUMI Ratha kha kuchung a awm, ajarla shara hai dieng athachawng rophong rang, ama na kiei hi thaonanawt joi. Mulungkoi miring hai kha madam rang, shurkhop hai dieng ningchamna, khan mikchaw hai dieng mikmuknaret rophong rang, epshie a iruthaw miring hai kha ningchamna apeh rang,
khan PUMI enlar kum kha rophong rang, inojongtir nih joi.”
Khan behangbuk kha rujo a shepding dieng khan rupek a rushuh joi. Khan synagogue ah awm mi kholok na ama kha ruen uh.
Khashole amani dieng ariei ruput, “Von nikho hin mahi Miejiek hi nangirangai u shung hin rupum nih joi.”
Khan mi kholok na kungruchang uh, khan ama bai ah vak shok numpokmirit chawng hai khan shindawngna runiei uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Hi miring hi Joseph shapa kha nimak maw?”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Mahi chawngrichi hi ban a kiei dieng nangti u rangnih, ‘Mimadampa, nang nining a madan nana roh! Capernaum ah ashok chon kijet u hai kha nang kho hinawm thaw roh.’ ”
Khan ama na ruti, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, thiempulien tuteawm amatak kho khan pawm naw nih.
Khania adik a nangni dieng kieriei, Elijah pha khan Israel ram ah mieirawng tampui ruawm. Kum `thum le tha `ruk ravan kha rakhar phakhan, ram kholok ah nekleshak ajeng a rukhawk.
Inia Sidon ah awm Zarephath ah mieirawng `khat dieng niboia, tute dieng Elijah kha rutir mak.
“Thiempulien Elisha pha khan Israel ah raithawnaw tawng miring tampui ruawm, inia Syria miring Naaman niboia, tute ruriethiengmashak mak.”
Hihaihi rujet u phakhan, synagogue ah awm kholok mulung ruhang pe uh.
Amani na ruthoi ua ama kha kho vai tieng runawt uh. Khan lawntiktibir khan ama kha jong vawrna u rang, amani kho imothoina u lawnmawr kha rumawjawn uh.
Inia amani kar khan rurilik a rupang joi.
Khan Galilee khopui `khat, Capernaum khan rushe a ama na Sabbath nikho hai khan mi ruruchuk.
Ama na chamnieitak a chawngruriei jarkhan, ama miruchukna khan shindawngna runiei uh.
Synagogue khan raikho rono ratha aniei akhat ruawm a he rashangtak a rura`ai a
ruti, “Namathan u roh! Kieini hi ih lawt rang a nangiti maw nih, Aw Nazareth Jesu? Kieini hi namathang rang a ava maw nangnih? Tumaw nangni iti kenejet. Nang hi Pathien Miring Riethieng kha nangnih!”
Khan Jesu na rawkawk a ruti, “Awmchien roh, ama shung ah put ah vak shok roh!” Raikho rono kha na ama kha amani kar a vawrving a shiekho mawtawng boi a ama ah put ah vak shok joi.
Khan mi kholok chung a shindawngna ruawm. Khan akhat na akhat dieng ruti uh, “Mahi ih chawng maw nih! Ajarla cham le ranak a raikho rono hai dieng chawng pek a amani na vak shok u hi.”
Khan khakawt ah awm ram kholok khan ama chungchanga chawngrucherak joi.
Ama na synagogue ah put ah ruthoi a Simon in khan rulut joi. Khan Simon tarpi kha raitun na enchak a rutun a ruawm, khan ama kha madamna rang, rudawi uh.
Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruding a raitun kha rurawkawk phakhan, raitun kha na ama kha rumathan joi. Ama na relentak a ruthoi a amani chon kha ruthaw pe joi.
Khan ni hawng tah le roroia, Jesu dieng natna shikshik aniei hai kha vak chawi uh. Ama na amani rikip dieng khut rutetna a rumadam.

Mi tampui ah put ah raikho haiawm vak shok ua rura`ai uh, “Nang hi Pathien Shapa Christa kha nangnih!” Inia amani na ama kha Christa keng iti jet u jarkhan, Jesu na amani kha rurawkawk a rumawchawng u lai mak.
Khan ni hawng shok `le, ama na ramthim mun ah rushe joi. Khan mipui kha na ama kha rutawk ua ama dieng rushe uh. Khan amani ah put ah ashe rang kha rumakha uh.
Khania amani dieng ruti, “Kho shik hai dieng hinawm Pathien rengchangna jar a athachawng kha kirophongir rang a inih, ajarla hi rang hin a kiei hi inojongtir inih.”
Khan ama na Galilee ah awm synagogue hai khan chawng shem a ruawm joi.
Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na Gennesaret Thampui kawriei ah rudinglai khan, Pathien chawng mierieina rang, mipui na ama kha ruep uh.
Thampui kawmchang ah rokong `di ruawm kha ama na rumuk; inia ngashur miring hai kha na amani kha rumak ua amani len hai kha rushuk a ruawm uh.
Ama na rokong hai kar a Simon rokong khan rulut a pieipak ho ah put ah meshenadet rang ruriei. Khan rokong khan rushuh a mipui dieng ruruchuk.
Ama na ariei rubang phakhan, Simon dieng ruti, “Medena rang, nang len u kha tuithukna khawn vak vawr u roh.”
Simon na mashang a ruti, “Aw Pumpa, janshawt kieini na enchak a kiruthaw ua iawm ruman u mi`ing, khania nang chawngriei dungjuia len hi muchum rang kanih.”
Makha ruthaw u phakhan, amani na nga hawi `khat kha rumede uh. Khan amani len kha achiet ruput pe uh.
Khan rokong shik `khat ah ochonthaw pui hai kha she a vak shanna u rang, jetna rupek uh. Amani na va ua rokong dire kha ship`hai a amani kha rurawnawm dedeng uh.
Makha Simon Peter na rumuk phakhan, Jesu keshun ah rukhuk shun a ruti, “Aw Pumi, kiei ah put ah she rang roh, ajarla kiei hi munu miring kha kanih!”
Ajarla amani nga shur khan, ama le khan ama le awm kholok shinrudawng pe uh.
Khan Simon le chonthawshom Zebedee shapa hai, James le John`awm, ruawm uh. Khan Jesu na Simon dieng ruti, “Chih naw roh, tun ah put ah miring hai ashur kha nangchang rangnih joi.”
Khajarkhan rokong hai kha kawmchang vak shok puiphit u `le, nieinak kholok kha rumak ua ama anu rujui u joi.

Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na khopui `khat ah ruawmlai khan, enro, raithawnaw na ibuk miring `khat ruawm. Ama na Jesu kha rumuk phakhan, bawklap a nik a ruti, “Aw Pumi, nangjawt a tu, kiei hi nangnieriethieng ngam.”
Khan Jesu na ukhut kha rushawn a ama kha irushit le roroia ruti, “Kajawt, nang riethieng kha nih rang roh.” Relentak a raithawnaw kha na ama kha rumathan joi.

Khan tute dieng rieina boi rang, ama dieng chawng rupek, “Khania shetana thiempu dieng vak mumuk roh, khan Moses na chawngirupek kha ang a riethiengna chungchanga vak rawthawi roh. Makha na amani dieng kungchangna kha nih rangnih.”
Inia liekliek a ama chungchanga chawng roshok joi. Khan amani natna hai ah put ah damna rang le chawng rangai rang, mipui lientak `khat vak ruchun uh.
Inia ama na ramthim khan rurakai a nikna runiei.

Hitihin ruawm, ni `khat hin Jesu na mi ruchuk a ruawmlai khan, Pharisee hai le Dan oja haiawm rushuh uh. Amani kha Galilee, Judea, khan Jerusalem rikip ah put ah ajong runih uh. Khan amani madamna rang, Pumi ranak kha ama dieng ruawm pe.
Khashole enro, mi hai na atakthi miring `khat jana chung ah jalam a vak chawi uh. Amani na lut pui a Jesu maton ah tetna rang, rurashak uh.
Inia mi rawphai jarkhan, amani na inshung khan rulut pui ngam u mak. Amani na inphu chung ah ruka pui ua rurevengmashak uh, khan ama jana kha le Jesu matontak ah mipui kar a jong muchum uh.
Amani takashawn kha rumuk a ama dieng ruti, “Aw miringpa, nang munu hai kha anarangaidam pe joi.”
Khan danoja hai le Pharisee hai na amani mulung a rumining uh, “Mieshietna chawng ariei ama hi tumaw nih? Pathien niboia tu na maw munu hi arangaidam ngam?”
Jesu na amani mulungmining kha rushur pe a amani dieng rumashang, “Iloia nang mulung shung a nangimining u maw nih?
‘Nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi,’ iti le ‘Thoi tana lawn rang roh,’ iti idi kar hin ih kha maw baidet?

Inia Miring Shapa kha na rieliei chung hin munu rangaidamna cham iniei kha nangjetna u rang a inih.” Khan takthipa dieng ruti, “Nang dieng kiriei inih, thoi rang roh, khan nang pher kha loi tana nang in ah she rang roh”
Khan ama na relentak a amani maikung a ruthoi joi, khan ajana nieinak hai kha ruloi a Pathien mapaklam a in tieng rushe joi.
Khan shindawngna kha na mi kholok dieng jong ship a Pathien kha rumapak uh. Khan chitna kha na ship a ruti uh, “Von nikho hin rekhek chon nimuk u keng joi!”
Khan hihaihi theng shole, Levi iti khaichana rawkhawm miring `khat khaichana in ah rushuh a awm kha vak muk. Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nujui roh.”
Khan nieinak kholok kha rumak a ama anu rujui joi.
Khan Levi na ama in ah Jesu rang bumichinna lientak `khat ruthaw. Kha mun khan khaichana rawkhawm hawi tampui le eshen hai kha rushuh, khan amani le nekleshak rushak uh.
Khan amani danoja hai le Pharisee hai kha na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a nangni na khaichana rawkhawm hai le khan munu miring hai le nineknishak u maw nih?”
Khan Jesu na mashang a ruriei, “Adam miring hai na loipu rangai mak, inia ana hai na irangai inih.
Midik miring hai akoi jong nimi`ing, inia mulung lekna rang, munu miring hai akoi jong kanih.”

Khan Pharisee hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a John khaichawi hai na rawnaw a chamradoi a nikna iruniei ua, kha le ra`ang a, Pharisee khaichawi hai na`awm ruthaw uh, inia nang khaichawi hai tu aneh-ashah ranga iruthaw u maw nih?”
Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Moipa kha awmlai khan moilawm hai kha chamra modoi u rawng maw?
Moipa kha amani ah put ah iloi pe pha kha hawng rangnih, makha nikho hai khan amani na chamradoi u rangnih.”
Ama na`awm rangshim `khat ruriei pe uh: “Tute na ponlek athar kha ther a alui pon ah chingai mak. Khanitatu ama na athar kha ther rangnih, khan ponlek athar kha alui kha le rohoi naw nih.
Khan tute na mevun jukawk alui hai khan ju athar thongai mak. Khanitatu ju athar kha na mevun jukawk hai kha khoi ning, tia obo rangnih. Khan mevun jukawk hai kha mathang rangnih.
Inia ju athar kha mevun jukawk athar hai khan thong a dire kha reh rang a inih.
Khan tute na, ju alui kha nek shole, relentak a athar kha neh jawt mak. Ajarla ama na iti, ‘Alui kha atha inih.’ ”
Khan hitihin rushok, Sabbath nikho `khat hin Jesu na shangbiei hai kha rurakanlai khan, akhaichawi hai na shangvui hai kha ruchin uh, khan khut hai kha le rumawnawi ua rushak uh.
Khan Pharisee hai eshen na ruti uh, “Iloia Sabbath nikho a Dan nih boi nangithaw u maw nih?”
Jesu na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “David amatak na vawncham pe phakhan, irawtawp pui hai le iruthaw kha nangni na te u makche maw?
Ama na Pathienin kha rulut a Pathien dieng a rawthawina tan kha ruloi a rushak. Khan ama le rawtawp hai diengawm rupek. Makha thiempu hai ranga na ishak niboia, Dan nih boi runih.”
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Miring Shapa kha Sabbath Pumi kha`awm inih.”
Sabbath nikho `khatret hin synagogue ah rulut a mi ruruchuk. Kha mun khan ukhutchang achar miring `khat ruawm.
Danoja hai le Pharisee hai na Sabbath nikho a madam pe maw, tia ruva uh. Makha amani na jar pekna rang a inih.
Inia amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a khutchar miringpa dieng ruti, “Thoi tana amani kar a ding roh.” Khan thoi a ruding joi.
Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng ih `khat nawrawdawn u rang kanih, Sabbath nikho hin atha thaw, ninawkle ashie thaw, ringkho shan, ninawkle ringkho mathang, ih kha maw Dan nidet?”
Khan amani kholok kha enruroko a ama dieng ruti, “Nang khut kha vak shawn roh.” Khan ama na khatikhan ruthaw, khan ama khut kha shik `khat kha ang a rudam pe joi.
Makhan amani kha ajeng a mulung ruhang pe ua Jesu kha imaw lawt rang, tia khatlekhat na rureshe u joi.
Khalaikhan Jesu na anih rang lawn ah ruhawng. Khan janshawt hin ama na Pathien dieng nikna runiei.
Khan kho hawng var phakhan, ama na akhaichawi hai kha rukoi. Amani kar khan ama na shawmlieidi rumadan a amani kha tirtawn, tia`awm riming rupho joi:
Peter iti Simon, anaipangpa Andrew, James le John, Phillip le Bartholomew,
Matthew le Thomas, Alphaeus shapa James, Zealot iti u Simon,
James shapa Judas, khan Jesu ajorpa Judas Iscariot, hihaihi inih.

Ama na amani le jong chum a phaijaw mun `khat ah ruding joi. Akhaichawi hawi `khat le miring hawi `khat ruawm uh. Amani kha Judea kholok, Jerusalem, khan Tyre le Sidon tuikaw ah awm runih uh. Amani kha chawng rangai rang le amani natna hai kha damna mukna rang a ahawng u inih.
Khan raikho rono hai na imawshaw hai kha ama na rumadam.
Mipui kholok na ama kha shitna rang, rurasham uh, ajarla ranak kha ama ah put ah vak shok a mi kholok kha irumadam inih.
Khashole ama na iringrakang a akhaichawi hai dieng ruriei: “Shara hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla Pathien rengchangna kha nang tah u inih.
Tun a vawncham miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla nimiship pe u rangnih. Tun a achap hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, ajarla nang munui u rangnih
Miring Shapa jarbak a mi hai na numukmak u phakhan, nawnawt u phakhan, jak nepek u phakhan, khan ashie keng, tia nang riming hai kha pek u phakhan, rahvanmuh miring hai kha nangnih uh.
Khanikhan ningai u roh, ningai a chawm u roh, ajarla enro, ravan a nangni rang a lawh kha awrawp. Ajarla hitak hi ang a apa u hai kha na thiempulien hai dieng iruthaw u inih.
“Inia rawchawng miring hai nangni dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla maw`awina kha nangtum u joi.
Vawnship miring hai nangni dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla nang vawncham u rangnih. Tun a munui miring hai nangni dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla mulungkur a nangchap u rangnih.
Mi kholok na nangtha iti miring hai dieng mieriemna kha awm, ajarla hitak hi ang a apa u hai kha na thiempulien jok hai dieng iruthaw u inih.
“Inia rangai nangni dieng kieriei: Nang rahapui hai kha numpoh u roh, namumah hai dieng atha thaw u roh.
Pumnaboh miring hai kha rahvan peh u roh, maimawk napeh miring hai rang nik pe u roh.
Nang riengiei ah anaben ama dieng khan shir `khat kha`awm daw pe roh. Nang ponledier naloi pe miring ama dieng khan, nang kotai kha`awm mitik peh naw roh.
Nanih miring rikip dieng peh roh. Khan nang nieinak hai aloi ama dieng khan vak mikirna rang, riei naw roh.
Khan nangni dieng mi hai nangimawthaw jawttak kha ang a, amani diengawm thaw pe u roh.
“Khania numnapoh hai kha numnangpok u joiala, nang thawlawh u kha imaw awm nih? Ajarla munu miring haishe na`awm numapoh miring hai kha numipok u inih.
Khan nangni dieng atha thaw hai dieng atha nangthaw u joiala, nang thawlawh u kha imaw awm? Ajarla munu miring haishe na`awm khakha ithaw u inih.

Khan nangmuk u rangnih, tia nangimining u ama dieng phuk a nangpek uala, nang thawlawh u kha imaw awm? Ajarla munu miring haishe na`awm munu miring hai dieng koi boipet a mukna rang, phuk a ipek u inih.

Inia nangirahapui hai kha numpoh u roh, khan atha kha thaw u roh. Vak kir rangnih, tia mining boi a phuk a peh u roh, khan nang thawlawh kha lien rangnih. Khan Rashang Chungchon shapa hai kha nangchang u rangnih. Ajarla ningaithiei boi le mi shie hai dieng khan Pathien tu roihoi inih.
Nangpa u kha roihoi anih hi ang a, nangniawm roihoi miring kha chang u roh.
“Nang chung ua chawngshatna boi rang, mi chung a chawngshat u naw roh. Mi na nahengna boi u rang, mi kha heng u naw roh. Mi na rangaidam nepek na u rang, mi kha rangaidam peh u roh.

Peh u roh, khan nangni dieng nepek u rangnih. Makha inamtit, lawp `khat a inawk, khan imubungpim danlak atha kha nang maton ah nubun pe u rangnih. Ajarla nangni na dannangilaktak u kha nangni dieng danlak rangnih.”
Khan amani dieng rangshim `khat ruriei pe: “Mikchaw `khat na mikchaw miring `khat rang lamkai pe ngam nih maw? Adinre kha khur ah cho u naw nih maw?
Khaichawi `khat na ama oja chung a awm mak, khania rupumping a iruchuk mi rikip na ama oja kha hawng ang rangnih.
“Ijar a nang miktak shung ah thinglong kha tinta boi a nang uliennai mik ah thinglek kha nangi`en pe maw nih?

Nang miktak ah thinglong kha muk boi a, nang uliennai dieng ‘Uliennai, nang mik ah thinglek kha nawmawkaw roh,’ itia maw ti ngam rawng? Aw thanunchan thaw miring! Nang mik ah thinglong kha kawbak roh, khashole nang uliennai mik ah put ah thinglek kha kawna rang, malangsheng a nangmuk rangnih.
“Ajarla thingkung atha na ara ashie moshok mak, khan thingkung ashie na ara atha moshok mak.
Ajarla thingkung rikip kha ama aratak kha na mejet, ajarla riling hai ah put ah thieichang ara rawkhawm mak, khan rilingbuk ah drakha ara shar mak.

Mitha kha na umulung atha niei`in ah put ah atha kha hawng moshok, khan mi shie kha na umulung ashie niei`in ah put ah ashie kha hawng moshok. Ajarla mulung ruphu ah put ah abai kha na chawngiriei inih.
“Kiriei kha thaw boipet a ijar a ‘Pumi, Pumi,’ nanginiti u maw nih?
Tunita`awm kawchawng hai kha irangai a athaw le kiei dieng ava ama kha, tu kha maw ang, iti kiei na numumuk u rang kanih.

Ama kha thukmet a ichoi a lung chung ah keshun mocho a in rashak ama kha a ang inih. Tui hawng lien phakhan, tuirawnawng na hawng jem a in kha rawnawkmashak ngam mak, ajarla in kha lungpum chung ah iphun inih.

Inia kawchawng hai kha irangai a athaw boi ama kha pieipak ah keshun mocho boi a in rashak ama kha le ra`ang inih. Tuirawnawng na hawng jem phakhan, relentak a upur, khan in athang dan kha ajeng a lien.”
Miring hai ijet a ama chawngriei hai kha rumawtawr shole, Jesu na Capernaum ah rushe joi.
Khan rarajakhat lamkai kha na shok imanartak `khat runiei. Ama kha runa pe a athi rang rurasham joi.
Ama na Jesu chungchanga rujet phakhan, ama na rushe a oshokpa kha vak madamnathiei rang, ama adawi Jihudi hai kar a lamkai hai kha rutir.
Khan amani na Jesu dieng rushe ua ama na ithaw pe rang a ama hi rutuk inih, tia richit`awmtak a rudawi uh,
“ajarla kuphung u hi ama na numpok, khan ama na synagogue `khat nurumothoi pe uh.”

Khan Jesu na amani le rushe joi. Ama na in kha vak shokdeng `le, rarajakhat lamkai kha na awlawm hai kha Jesu dieng vak mieriei, “Pumi, nawshaw puilai naw roh, ajarla ki`in ah nangva rang a hi kiei rutuk mi`ing.
Khajarkhan kiei nang dieng ava rangshe hi rutuk mi`ing. Inia chawng ranga nangiriei khan koshokpa khaw dam rang keng.

Ajarla kieiawm kothoi a ramiring kieniei a cham thoi a awm kanih. Akhat dieng, ‘She roh,’ kiti `le eshe, shik `khat dieng, ‘Va roh,’ kiti `le ava. Khan koshokpa dieng, ‘Hi thaw roh,’ kiti `le awthaw.”
Khan Jesu na khahai chawng kha rujet phakhan, shinrudawng pe, khan anujui mipui dieng hiei a ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, Israelshe hin takashawn hi ang a lien hi kiei na muh mi`inglai!”
Khan irutir hai kha na in khan vak kir ua shokpa kha adam a vak muk u joi.
Khan hitihin rushok, jing tieng hin ama na Nain iti khopui `khat ah rushe. Akhaichawi hai le mipui lientak `khat na ama le rushe uh.
Kho pakawt kha vak ranai pui phakhan, enro, athi miring `khat hi ruruput uh. Ama kha unu shapa khatte runih, khan ama kha mieirawng runih. Khan makha khopui miring tampui na ama kha rurawtawp pui uh.
Pumi na ama kha rumuk phakhan, lairunat pui a ama dieng ruti, “Chap naw roh.”
Ama na vak dep a rokong kha vak phak phakhan, urupu miring hai kha na ruding uh. Khan ama na ruti, “Rothar, nang dieng kienieriei, thoi rang roh.”
Khan athipa kha na hawng thoi a achawng hawng put joi. Khan ama kha unu dieng rupek joi.
Khan mi kholok na chitna runiei uh, khan Pathien kha mapak a ruti uh, “Thiempulien alientak `khat nakar u a shok joi,” khan “Pathien na ama miring kha apha jong joi.”
Khan Judea le khakawt ah ram kholok khan Jesu chungchanga chawng rucherak joi.
Hihai kholok chungchang hin John khaichawi hai na ama dieng chawng rumejet uh.
Khajarkhan John na akhaichawi hai kar a pasha `di hi rukoi a, “Ajong rang a kha nang maw nangnih, ninawkle shik `khat kingak u rang a maw nih?” tia Jesu dieng rawdawn rang, rutir joi.
Jesu dieng ava hai kha na ruti uh, “Baptisma apeh John na nang dieng inavaktir u inih. Hitihin iti, ‘Ajong rang a kha nang maw nangnih, ninawkle shik `khat kingak u rang a maw nih?’ ”
Makha pha khan, ama na rai, shawrieviei, ratha thaboi hai ah put ah mi tampui rumadam, khan mikchaw tampui kha rumavar pe.

Jesu na amani dieng mashang a ruti, “She u tana nangimuk u le nangirangai u hai hi John dieng vak riei u roh: mikchaw hai na imuk, kekhawr hai na alawn, raithawnaw tawng hai na riethieng, nokorshet hai na ijet, athi hai kha imothoi, khan shara hai dieng athachawng iriei pe.
Kajar a keruthui boi miring kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
John palai hai kha na rushe u phakhan, Jesu na John chungchanga mipui dieng ariei ruput, “Ramthim khan ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Rithi na inawk shingnang kha maw?
Inia ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Miring `khat kha ponrenem irieshiei kha maw nih? Enro, ponledier lurtak le rielien a hoiriethiei miring hai kha rengin hai khawn awm uh.
Inia ih en rushe maw nangnih uh? Thiempulien `khat kha maw? Awh, thiempulien `khatnek a alien inih, iti kha kiriei inih.
Mahi ama chungchanga irumiejiek inih: ‘Enro, nang maton a kapalai `khat kitir, ama na nang maton a lam nokon pe rangnih.’
“Ajarla kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, nupang hai na imoshok kar a baptisma apeh Johnnek a aliendet thiempulien awm maklai, khania Pathien rengchangna mun a ashinving ama kha amanek a liendet.”
Khan mi kholok le khaichana rawkhawm hai kha na ama chawngriei kha rurangai u phakhan, Pathien chawngshat kha idik ruti uh. Ajarla amani na John baptisma pek khan a baptisma iruloi u inih.
Khania Pharisee hai le danthiei hai na tu John baptisma pek kha ruloi boi u jarkhan, Pathien rentukna kha ruheng uh.
Pumi na ruti, “Hi rong a miring hai hi ih le maw rekhenna ning, amani hi ih le maw ra`ang uh?

Amani hi naite hai na rievieithawna ah shuh a khatlekhat rashai nana kha le ra`ang inih. Amani na ti uh, ‘Nangni rang thieikhang kurutum uh, inia rulam u makche, mulungkurna kuruniei uh, inia ruchap u makche.’
“Ajarla baptisma apeh John kha tan shah rang le ju neh rang a ajong nimak, khan ‘Ama na raikho ieniei,’ nangti uh.
Miring Shapa kha na rushak, khan runek, inia nangni na nangti uh, ‘Enro, shak a rapham le ju a vanhat thaw miring, khaichana rawkhawm hai le munu miring hai lawm `khat khaw!’
Inia varna hi ama chonthaw hai kholok kha na idikna kha imumuk inih.”
Pharisee hai kar a akhat na Jesu kha ama le bu nekna rang ruriei. Khan ama na Pharisee in kha rulut a bu runek.
Khan enro, kha khopui khan ah awm munu miring nupang `khat na Jesu kha Pharisee in ah bunek a awm iti kha rujet. Ama na lungngoi kawk ah manamhoi rieipartui kha vak chawi.
Ama na Jesu anuk ah chap a ruawm. Ama mikrithi kha le Jesu ke hai kha rumiechier pe a asham kha le hona rang runo pe. Khan ama ke hai kha rutum pe a rieipartui kha runawt pe.

Khania ama akoipa Pharisee kha na umulung shung a ruti, “Mahi miringpa hi thiempulien nitjoiatu, ama ashinu hi tumaw nih, khan ih ang nupang maw nih, iti jet rangnih, ajarla ama kha munu miring runih.”
Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Simon, kiei na nang dieng riei rang dikhat kieniei.” Ama na ruti, “Oja, riei roh.”
“Shierphukshem akhat hi na lieishieton miring idi runiei, akhat kha na dinari rajarahnga, khan shik `khat kha na dinari shawm rahnga ruphuk uh.
Amani na ruthung ngam boi u phakhan, ama na adinre lieishieton kha rupai pe joi. Tu na maw ama kha numpokdet nih, nieriei roh?”
Makhan Simon na rumashang, “Lieishie arawpdet ipai pe ama kha na numpokdet rangnih, tia kimining.” Khan ama dieng ruti, “Thaning a chawngnangshat.”

Ama na nupangnu tieng khan hiei a Simon dieng ruti, “Mahi nupangnu hi nangmuk maw? Kiei na nang in ah kavaklut a keke rang tuishe nepeh makche. Khania hi nupang hi na ama mikrithi le keke hai hi nururushuk pe a asham le nuruno pe.
Nang na nurutum makche, inia hinu hi na tu kawhawnglut ah put ah keke atum hi chat maklai.
Kulu kha thao nurunawt pe makche, khania hinu hi na keke kha rieipartui nurunawt pe.
Khajarkhan nang dieng kiriei inih, ama munu hai arawp kha arangaidam pe joi. Khajarkhan a ama na numinurupokdet inih. Inia rangaidam lekte ipekna kha na lekte le numipok inih.”
Khashole nupangnu dieng ruti, “Nang munu hai kha arangaidam joi.”
Inia ama le tebol ah ashuh miring hai kha na khatlekhat dieng ati ruput uh, “Munushe rangaidam apeh ngam ama hi tumaw nih?”
Inia ama na nupangnu dieng ruti, “Nang takashawn kha na nang kha nashan joi. Damveng a she rang roh.”
Khan Jesu na khopui ah put ah khopui, khan khote ah put ah khote dawna rushe a, Pathien rengchangna athachawng kha rushem a rurophong joi. Khaichawi shawmlieidi kha ama le rurawtawp uh.
Khan ratha thaboi hai le natna hai ah put ah irumadam nupang hai, Mary Magdalene iti, ama ah put ah raikho shiri rushok pe,
khan Herod inshung apoh Chuza inkonu Joanna, Susanna, khan amani shumleshiertak le amani cholam ruthaw shik nupang tampui ruawm uh.
Ama dieng mipui hawng ruchun a khopui rikip ah put ah mi hawng phakhan, ama na rangshim a ruriei pe uh:
“Muchi vawrpa kha na ama muchi vawr rushe. Ama na iruvawr le roroia, eshen kha lamkaw ah rucho, khan mi na ruchongna, khan ravan a va hai na jong shar uh.
Eshen kha lungbiei chung ah rucho, khan hawng mawngphit `le, ruchar ajarla tuiruhu ruawm mak.
Eshen kha rilingbuk ah rucho, khan riling hai kha le hawng thoichen a makha ruliep.
Khan eshen kha pieipak thatna mun ah rucho a hawng mawng, khan makha na arajah a ara rumoshok.” Hihaihi iruriei le roroia, ama na rura`ai, “Rangaina rang nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho!”
Khan akhaichawi hai na ama dieng rawdawn a ruti uh, “Mahi rangshim hi ih itina maw nih?

Khan ama na ruriei, “Nangni dieng Pathien rengchangna chungchanga murukchawng hai kha jetna rang, nurupek uh. Inia shik hai rang tu rangshim hai khan a irupek inih, makha ‘Amani na muk tu muk ua mukna boi rang, khan rangai tu rangai ua jetna boi rang a inih.’
“Rangshim kha hi inih: Muchi kha Pathien chawng kha inih.
Lamkaw ah acho hai kha chawng kha irangai a amani mulung ah put ah diabol na ichawi pe kha inih. Makha amani na takashawn boi rang le shandamna mukna boi rang a inih.
Lungbiei ah acho hai kha chawng rangai a ningai le roroia aloi hai kha inih. Inia hihaihi na rujung loi u mak; khan pha bawngte takashawn uh, inia enretena hawng phakhan, rurakai uh.
Rilingbuk ah acho hai kha chawng rangai hai kha inih. Khania ringkho lungkhamna, rawchawngna le hoina hai hi na ruliep, khan amani ara hai kha hawng chang ngam mak.

Pieipak thatna ah acho hai amani kha mulung atha le mulung riethieng a chawng rangai hai kha inih. Amani na chawng kha rangai phakhan, chawng kha arakrep uh. Khan amani doiratna khan ara kha mupung uh.
“Tute na thaomiei kha muchuk shole, tiengkum thoi ah the ninawkle jakhang thoi ah tet mak. Inia makha hawng lut miring hai na mieivar kha mukna rang, shutna `khat ah itet inih.
Ajarla imalar boi rang a rethe `khatshe awm mak, khan mejet a vai moshok boi rang a rukhum `khatshe awm mak.
Khajarkhan nang irangai dan u kha riring pui u roh, ajarla aniei ama dieng khan arawpdet pek rangnih. Khan aniei boi ama dieng khan kieniei, tia iminingshe kha ama ah put ah loi pe rangnih.”
Khashole unu le anaipang hai na ama dieng va uh. Amani na mirawp jarkhan, ama dieng rulut ngam u mak.
Khan mi eshen na ama dieng ruriei, “Nangnu le nang naipang hai na vai tieng ding a nang kha nurumuk pui jawt uh.”
Inia mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Pathien chawng arangai le athaw hihaihi kunu le kuliennai hai kha inih.”
Nikhat hin ama na akhaichawi hai le rokong shung ah rulut a amani dieng ruti, “Thampui shir `khat tieng khawn she u rawi.” Khan amani kha rokong a rushe u joi.
Amani na rushe u lai khan, ama kha ruja joi. Khan thampui chung ah rithikhopui hawng rang, khan rokong ah tui hawng ship a thangna le ruranai u joi.

Ama kha rujawng ua rumothoi uh, khan amani na ruti uh, “Oja, Oja, kieini hi kathi u rang keng joi!” Inia ama na hawng thoi a rithi le tuirawnawng kha hawng rawkawk. Khan amani kha rubang a rurenem joi.

Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Nang takashawn u kha ih ah awm maw nih joi?” Amani na achih le shindawnglam a khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Ih miringtak maw nih? Ajarla ama na chawng pek phakhan, rithi le tuishe na`awm irangai pe u hi!”
Khan amani na Galilee le re`en Gadarenes kha rushok u joi.

Ama na lieiho khan jong chumphit `le, kha khopui ah awm, raikho hai na ichutna miring `khat na rurumuk pui. Khan ama kha phashawttak ponledier thaw boi a ruawm inih. Khan ama na in ah niboia, than hai khan ruawm inih.
Ama na Jesu kha rumuk le amaikung a rubawklap, khan ra`ai a ruti, “Rashangving Pathien Shapa Jesu, kiei hi ih nawlawt rang a nangiti maw nih? Nang na kiei hi shawna nangnepekna boi rang, kawnawdawi!”

Raikho rono kha miringpa ah put ah vak shokna rang, ama na chawng rupek. Ajarla mahi na voitampui ama kha irushur inih. Khan ama kha thirakarui, khan thir banriei le irukhop ua irurung u inih. Khopna hai kha changhawt a iruthaw a raikho kha na ramthim ah irunawt inih.
Jesu na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Nang riming imaw ti?” Ama na ruti, “Legion,” ajarla raikho hai tampui na ama shung a rulut nih joi.
Khan amani kha dawngawmboi athuk a thongna rang chawng pekna boi rang, ama dieng runik uh.
Khan mopang `khat ah vawk hawi lientak `khat na shak shak a ruawm uh. Khan raikho hai kha na amani dieng lut jawtna rang, ama dieng rudawi uh. Makhan amani kha ama na rujawt pe.
Amani na miringpa ah put ah vak shok ua vawk hai shung khan vak lut u joi. Khan vawk hai kha na thampui khan rucho ua tui arah a ruthi u joi.
Vawkroi hai kha na ashok chon hai kha rumuk u phakhan, rutan ua khopui le khote hai khan ruriei u joi.

Khashole miring hai na ashok chon kha aen va uh, khan amani na Jesu dieng vat u phakhan, raikho hai vak shokna miringpa kha ponledier rurieshiei a pashalak a Jesu keshun ah rushuh kha vak muk ua, amani kha ruchih uh.
Makha amuh hai kha na raikho na ichutna miringpa imadamna dan kha amani dieng ruriei uh.
Khan Gadarenes ram diengvai ah awm mipui na amani ram ah put ah shena rang, rubiek uh; ajarla amani kha ajeng a ruchih u joi. Khajarkhan ama na rokong shung ah rulut a rukir joi.
Khan raikho hai vak shoknapa kha na ama le rawtawpna rang, runik, khania Jesu na tir a ruti,
“Nang in ah kir rang roh, khan idawrthep a Pathien na inawthawna pe kha vak riei roh.” Khan ama na khopui kholok ah rushe a Jesu na ama chung a ithawna chon hai kha vak rophong joi.
Khan Jesu na vak kir phakhan, mipui na ama kha lamjawng ruthaw uh, ajarla amani kholok na ama kha irungakrala u inih.
Khan enro, Jairus iti miring `khat na ama dieng ava. Ama kha synagogue lamkai miring `khat runih. Ama na Jesu keshun ah rubawklap a ama in ah vatna rang runik.
Ajarla kum shawmlieidi dawr anih ashanu khatte iruniei kha athi rang rurasham pe joi. Khan Jesu ashe le roroia, mipui kha na ama kha ru`umchip uh.
Khan kum shawmlieidi thijanrai tawng, iringna rang a iniei kholok kha le loipu hai dieng rure`en joiawm, tute na irumadam ngam boi, nupang `khat ruawm.
Ama anuk khan rujawng a opon mawr kha rushit pe a ama thijan kha ruchat perelen joi.
Khan Jesu na ruti, “Tu na kiei hi inishit maw nih?” Mi kholok na jawt boi phakhan, Peter na ruti, “Oja, mipui na inaum a ine`ep inih, inia ‘Tu na kiei hi inishit maw nih?’ nangti.”
Inia Jesu na ruti, “Miring `khat na kiei hi inishit, ajarla kiei ah put ah ranak ashe kha kejet.”
Nupangnu kha na rethe a awm ngam boi phakhan, rawnawklam a ava a amaikung a rubawklap joi. Khan ama na mipui maikung a ishitna jar le relentak a damna jar kha rurophong.
Khan ama dieng ruti, “Shanu, ranak thaw roh, nang takashawn kha na nang kha namadam joi, damveng a she rang roh.”
Ama na chawngrurieilai khan synagogue lamkai in ah put ah mi `khat ava a ruti, “Nang shanu kha thi joi, Ojapa kha mawshawlai naw roh.”
Inia Jesu na rujet a Jairus dieng ruti, “Chih naw roh, takateshawn roh, ama kha ashan rang keng.”
Ama na in khan ava a Peter, James, John, khan naitenu nulepa ranga niboia, tute rumulut mak.
Mi kholok rie`ieklam a ruchap ua ama chung a mulungkurna runiei uh. Inia ama na ruti, “Chap u naw roh, ama hi athi nimak, amiei keng.”
Amani na ama kha rumunui uh, ajarla amani na athi kha rujet uh.
Ama na lawpsheng a vai rumoshok shole, ukhut kha rumukui pe, khan okoi a ruti, “Naitenu, thoi rang roh.”
Khan aratha kha hawng kir pe a, ama kha hawng thoirelen joi. Khan ama dieng shakthiei pekna rang, ama na chawng rupek joi.
Khan unulepa kha na shindawngna runiei uh. Inia ashok chon kha tute dieng rieina boi rang, ama na chawngruben joi.
Jesu na akhaichawi shawmlieidi kha lawp a rukoi a raikho kholok anawt rang le rai kholok madam rang, ranak le cham kha rupek joi.
Khan Pathien rengchangna chungchanga chawngshem rang le ana hai kha madam rang, rutir joi.
Ama na ruti, “Nang khomijin shena u khan iawm chawi u naw roh: shunshawraw, pai, tan, shier, khan kotai idi ko u naw roh.
Nanglutna u ih in khan nita`awm, makhan awm u roh, khan kha mun ah put ah rawthawt u roh.
Ih mun ah nita`awm nangni nuruphawm boi hai dieng khan nangni na makha khopui kha nangmathan u phakhan, nang kepha uah put ah vaiphin kha khawng u roh. Makha amani le re`erna kungchangna kha inih.”
Amani na karuchawi ua khote hai khan athachawng kha rushem uh, khan mun rikip ah rumadam uh.
Khan tetrarch Herod na ashok chon hai kholok kha rujet phakhan, mulung rurakak pe joi, ajarla mi eshen na John kha athi ah put ah thoi joi,
eshen na Elijah kha jong lar joi, khan eshen na matienglai a thiempulien hai kar a akhat hawng thoi joi ruti uh.
Khania Herod na ruti, “Kiei na John kha ring kurutuk pe joi, inia kiei na tu jar a hihai hi kijet maw nih?” Khajarkhan ama kha mukna rang rutawk joi.
Khan tirtawn hai kha hawng kir ua, ithaw u hai kholok jar a Jesu dieng thanghawngkoi u joi. Khan amani kha shikjek a Bethsaida iti khopui khan ama na rushe pui joi.
Inia mipui na rujet ua anu rujui uh. Khan amani kha ruphawm a amani dieng Pathien rengchangna jar a chawngruriei pe, khan adam rang a rangai miring hai kha ama na rumadam.

Khan ni hawng tadeng `le, khaichawi shawmlieidi kha na vak jawng a ruti uh, “Mipui kha meshe rang roh. Amani na diengvai kho hai khawn she u rieshie, jana rang le nekleshak vak muh u rosho, ajarla kieini hi ramthim hin ah awm nanih uh.”
Khania amani dieng ruti, “Amani kha shak rang dikhat peh u roh.” Amani na ruti uh, “Kieini na hihai miring kholok rang hin rawchawh kashe u joi nawkatu, tan rahnga le nga idibak kieniei u joi.”
Ajarla kha mun khan apa bawp rahnga dawr ruawm uh. Khan ama na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Amani kha shawm rahnga dawr a lawplawp a mushut u roh.”
Khatikhan amani kholok kha rumushut u joi.
Khan ama na tan rahnga le nga idi kha ruloi, ravan tieng khongrunga, khan rahvan irupek le roroia rukhoi. Khan mipui dieng shemna rang, amani dieng rupek.
Amani kholok na rushak ua vawn ruship pe uh. Khan lekvai mienieng kha tiengkum shawmlieidi rurawkhawm uh.
Nikhat hin ama na thien a nikna runiei, khan akhaichawi hai kha ama na ruawm pui a amani dieng ruti, “Mipui kha na kiei hi tumaw nih niti uh?”
Amani na mashang a ruti uh, “Baptisma apeh John, khania eshen na Elijah, khan eshen na matienglai a thiempulien hai kar a akhat, hawng thoi.”
Amani dieng ruti, “Khania nangni na la kiei hi tumaw nih nangniti uh?” Peter na mashang a ruti, “Nang hi Pathien ah put ah ijongtir Christa kha nangnih.”
Khania tute dieng rieina boi rang, amani dieng chawng anatak rupek joi.

Ama na ruti, “Miring Shapa hi na shawna lientak idoingir rang a inih. Ama kha shierulien hai, thiempu ulien hai, khan danoja hai na heng ning, tia ama kha that u rangnih. Khan ni `thum changna khan ama kha mothoi rangnih.”
Khan mi kholok dieng ruti, “Tukhat na kanu nujui jawt joiatu, amarilik chung a rapha rosho, khan ama cross kha ningthingkip rupu rieshie nujui rosho.
Ajarla iringkho ashan jawt kha na makha mathang rangnih, khania kajar a iringkho mathang miring kha na makha ashan rangnih.
Ajarla ama na manmieshie pumpui kha ama tah machang a iringkhotak kha mathang a, ninawkle pawrmechet joiala, inemna imaw awm pe nih?
Ajarla tunita`awm kajar a le kawchawng hai jar a jakna niei a tu, Miring Shapa kha na, ama lurna, Apa lurna, khan ravantir riethieng hai lurna khan jong phakhan, jak pui rangnih.
Khania diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hin ah ading miring eshen hi na Pathien rengchangna kha muk u masheng, amani na thitna tuidan kha en u naw nih.”
Khan hitihin ruawm, hihaihi irieina ni `riet dawr shole, Jesu na Peter, John, khan James kha ruchawi a lawn ah anih rang ruhawng pui.
Ama na nikna runieilai khan, ama maisho kha rurelek pe. Khan ama ponledier hai kha retelang a ruawm pe.
Khan enro, miring pasha `di, Moses le Elijah, na ama le ruriebieh uh.
Amani kha ajeng a rulur. Khan ama kachawina rang a jar a ruriei uh. Makha Jerusalem ah ashok rang a inih.
Khania Peter le irawtawp pui hai kha rumiei uh. Amani na hawng chehep u `le, ama lurna kha hawng muk uh. Khan ama le pasha `di ading kha hawng muk uh.

Khan hitihin ruawm, ama ah put ah rushe u le roroia, Peter na Jesu dieng ruti, “Pumpa, kieini na hin na`awm u hi atha, thamber `thum rashak u rawi: nang rang akhat, Moses rang akhat, khan Elijah rang akhat.” Ama na imaw iriei, iti kha rujet mak.
Ama na makha rurieilai khan, romiei na ava a amani kha vak rilip joi. Amani na romiei shung ah rulut u le roroia, akhaichawi hai kha ajeng a ruchih uh.
Khan romiei ah put ah he `khat jong a ruti, “Mahi numkipoktak kashapa kha inih, ama chawng kha rangai u roh.”
He kha jong phakhan, Jesu kha iethien a ruawm joi. Amani kha ruawmchien uh, khan amani na khalai a irumuk u jar kha tute dieng ruriei u mak.
Khan jing tieng hin amani na lawn ah put ah jongchum u phakhan, mipui hawi `khat na ama kha rurumuk pui uh.
Mipui kar a mi `khat na he rashang a ruti, “Oja, kashapa khaw nangne`en pena rang kininik. Ajarla ama hi kashapa khatte inih.
Enro, raikho na shur phakhan, jetboithieiboi a ama na ra`ai, khan chiephon moshoklam a ruvawr. Ama na mawpawp ning, tia dengre a ama kha irumathanthiei inih.
Nawtnathiei rang, nang khaichawi hai kha kurudawi, inia amani na rumawtawr u mak.”
Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Aw takashawn boi le shuklet rong hai, idawrshe a nangni le awm a kidoi rang a maw nih? Nang shapa kha hin vak chawi roh.”
Naitepa kha na vak jawng phakhan, raikho kha na ama kha vakvawklap a thirthir a rawnawkmashak. Inia Jesu na ratha rono kha rurawkawk, khan ama na naitepa kha rumadam a apa dieng rupek joi.
Khan mi kholok na Pathien lienna khan shindawngna runiei uh. Jesu na iruthaw hai kholok chung a mi rikip na shindawngna runiei u lai khan, ama na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti,
“Hihai chawng hi nang nokor shung ua tet u roh, ajarla Miring Shapa kha miring hai khut a pek rang a nih joi.”
Khania amani na hi chawng hi rujet u mak. Amani na tina jetna ngam boi rang, mahi amani ah put ah rethe inih. Khan amani na mahi chawng jar a rawdawn rang khan ruchih uh.
Amani na amani kar a tu kha maw alienving, tia chawng rurieshiet uh.
Khan Jesu na amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a naite `khat rukoi, khan ama dieng ah rumiding.
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Tunita`awm kiriming a mahi naite hi loi a tu, kiei le khan nojongtirpa kha iloi inih. Ajarla nang kar ua ashinving ama kha alienving kha inih.”
John na mashang a ruti, “Aw Pumpa, nang riming a raikho hai runawt miring `khat kurumuk uh, kieini le nang ajui miring nit boi jarkhan, kurumakha uh.”
Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Makha u naw roh. Kieini le re`er boi ama kha kieini le rachang inih.”
Khan hitihin ruawm, ama kha ravan tieng kana rang, nikho kha hawng rupum le roroia, ama na Jerusalem tieng shena rang, mai rumiehiei joi.
Khan ama na palai hai kha amaton ah rutir joi. Ama tungnajana rashamna rang, amani na rushe ua Samaria miring hai kho `khat ah rulut uh.
Khania ama na Jerusalem tieng rushe jarkhan, amani na ama kha ruphawm u lai mak.
Akhaichawi hai, James le John na makha muk u phakhan, ruti uh, “Pumi, Elijah na iruthaw kha ang a, ravan ah put ah miei koi a amani hi mathang u rang rawi maw?”
Inia Jesu na hiei a amani kha rurawkawk khan ama ruti, “Ih ratha khan a awm maw nangnih u, iti kha jet u mak che?
Miring Shapa kha na miring ringkho kha mathang ajong nimak, inia ringkho ashan jong inih.” Khan amani na kho shik `khat ah rushe u joi.
Khan hitihin ruawm, amani na lam ah rulawn u lai khan, akhat na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, kiei na nang shena mun rikip ah nujui rang kanih.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Ramui hai na khur niei uh, khan ravan a va hai na rubu niei uh, inia Miring Shapa na tu, lu tetna rang mun niei mak.”
Khan shik `khat dieng ama na ruti, “Nujui roh.” Inia ama na rumashang, “Pumi, kapa akhum rang kiei hi nawjawt pemasha roh.”
Inia ama dieng rumashang, “Athi hai kha na amanitak athi hai kha khum u rosho, inia nang tu Pathien rengchangna chungchanga chawng vak shem roh.”
Khan shik `khat na`awm ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, nangnu nujui rang kanih, khania ki`in ah awm miring hai dieng reshenna vak thawna pui rang nawjawt pe roh.”
Jesu na ama dieng rumashang, “Ukhut ah langkon mukui a nukhiei athaw ama kha Pathien rengchangna rang rutuk mak.”
Hihaihi shole Pumi na shawm shiri shik hai kha rumadan joi. Ama na ashe rang a rashamna khopui le mun rikip ah amaton a amani kha ididi a rutir joi.
Ama na ruriei, “Parrawkhawm rang a hi awrawp, inia chon thaw miring hai hi awtawm. Khajarkhan par Pumi dieng ama loimun a chon thaw rang miring jong tirna rang, nikna niei u roh.
She u tana en u ro, kiei na nangni kha melang hai kar a kengamte hai kha ang a kinitir u inih.
Shierkawk, pai, khan kekawk chawi u naw roh. Lam ah tute le chubai thaw u naw roh.
“Nanglutna u in kha ih kha nita`awm akhat changna a, ‘Mahi in hin lungdamna kha awm rosho,’ ti u roh.
In khan lungdamna miring kha awm joiatu, nang mulung damna u kha ama dieng awm rosho. Khanitnawkatu makha nangni dieng vak kir rangnih.
Nangawmna u intak khan bulean kha shah u roh, ajarla chonthaw miring kha na ama lawh imuk rang a kha rutuk inih. In `khat ah put ah in `khat ah rechen u naw roh.
“Khan nanglutna u khopui khan lamjawng nuruthaw uatu, ih kha nita`awm nangni rang a inarasham pe u kha shah u roh.
Makhan ah awm ana hai kha madam u roh. ‘Pathien rengchangna kha na nojongranai pui joi,’ tia riei u roh.
Nanglutna u ih khopui kha nita`awm, noroloi boi u phakhan, amani lamlien ah she u tana ti u roh,
‘Kekepha uah kawp nang khopui u vaiphin haishe hi kieini na kakhawng uh. Mahi nangni le kere`erna u jetna kha inih. Khanikengta Pathien rengchangna kha jong nai joi, iti kha jet u roh.’
Nangni dieng kienieriei uh, makha Nikho khan mahi khopui rangnek hin Sodom rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih.

“Aw Chorazin, nang dieng mieriemna awm! Aw Bethsaida, nang dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni dieng ranakniei chon iruthaw hai kha Tyre le Sidon dieng runih joiatu, bawra rieshiei a, ruvut robolam a shuh ning, tia amani mulung lekna kha shawt rangnih joi.
Inia nangni rangnek hin Tyre le Sidon chung a chawngshatna rang a kha doithieidet chang rangnih.
Khan ravan a irulawm, Aw Capernaum, nang hi thikho a nawvawr rangnih.
“Nang chawng u rangai ama kha na kawchawng kha irangai inih. Nangni anaheng ama kha na kiei hi inaheng inih. Khan kiei anaheng ama kha na nojongtirpa kha iheng inih.”
Khan khaichawi shawm shiri kha ningailam a vak kir ua ruti uh, “Pumi, raikho haishe na`awm nang riming a kieini dieng rubu uh.”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Kiei na Satan kha ravan ah put ah jong cho khomelek kha ang a kurumuk.
Enro, kiei na nangni dieng moro hai le aikoshangpa hai chung a ke le chongna rang, rahapui ranak kholok chung a cham kha kenepek u joi. Ih na`awm nangni kha nawmawpawp u lai naw nih.
Khanikengta nangni dieng ratha hai kha rubu u jarkhan, ningai u naw roh. Kha ruhut a nang riming u hai kha ravan a rumiejiek jarkhan, ningai u roh.”

Kha pha khan Jesu na Ratha a ningaina runiei a ruti, “Ravan le rieliei Pumi, Aw kapa, nang kha kanamapak, ajarla nang na hihaihi mishing le mithiei kanih ati hai kar a nangruthe a, naite hai dieng nangrumalar joi. Inih, Aw kapa, makha keng nang dieng a awm enlar kha.

Kapa na nieinak kholok kha kiei dieng nurupek joi, khan kapa na niboia, tute na Shapa kha tumaw nih, iti kha jet mak; khan Shapa na niboia tute na Apa kha tumaw nih, iti kha jet mak. Khan Shapa na Apa imalarna jawt miring ama kha na Apa kha tumaw nih, iti kha ejet.”
Khan akhaichawi hai dieng hiei a ruti, “Nangimuk u hai hi amuh hai kha rahvanmuh mik hai kha nih uh.
Ajarla kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, thiempulien hai le reng tampui na nang imuk u hai hi rumuk jawt uh, inia rumuh u mak. Khan nangirangai u hai hi rurangai jawt uh, inia rurangai u mak.”
Enro, danthiei `khat na ruding a ama kha enrurete, khan ama na ruti, “Oja, kumshawt ringna kha kutumnathiei rang, kiei na imaw thaw ning?”
Ama dieng ruti, “Dan ah imaw miejiek? Nang na itia maw makha nangte?”

Ama na mashang a ruti, “ ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien kha nang mulung kholok le, nang ringphuk kholok le, nang ranak kholok le khan nang mulungmining kholok le numnangipok rang a inih,’ khan ‘Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak ang a numnangipok rang a inih.’ ”
Khan ama dieng ruti, “Thaning a nangrumashang. Mahi thaw roh, khan nangring rangnih.”
Inia ama na nining a rudik jawt jarkhan, Jesu dieng ruti, “Kiringchangpui kha tumaw nih?”

Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Miring `khat hi Jerusalem ah put ah Jericho ah rushe, khan ama kha shiersho miring hai khut ah rucho joi. Ama kotai kha ruthut pe uh, khan rujem ua ama kha athideng a rumak uh.
Rethenna `khat a makha lam khan thiempu `khat rupang a ama kha rumuk phakhan, ama na shir `khat tieng rulawi.
Khatak kha ang a Levi miring `khat hi kha mun khan vak pang a rumuk phakhan, shir `khat tieng rulawi.
Khania Samaria miring `khat na khomijin vatna a ama ruawmna tieng vak pang a ama kha rumuk phakhan, lairunat pui.
Ama na rujawng a pawpna hai kha thao le ju ruliei pe a rutum pe, khan ama shatak khan rumushut joi. Khan jinin `khat ah ruchawi a ama chon kha ruthaw pe.

Khan jing tieng hin ama na rushe phakhan, dinari `di rurosho a jinin rungpa dieng rupek. Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Ama hi ruen roh, kiei na kavakkir phakhan, nangimulut ijat kha nita`awm nathung rang kanih.’
“Khajarkhan hihai uthum kar hin tu kha maw shiersho miring hai khut ah acho miringpa ringchangpui?”
Makhan ama na rumashang, “Ama chung a roihoina itetna miringpa kha keng.” Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “She tana kha ang khan vak thaw roh.”
Khan amani na rushe u le roroia, khote `khat ah rulut uh. Khan Martha iti nupang `khat na ama kha in ah rumutung.
Ama na Mary iti anaipangnu `khat runiei. Ama na Jesu keshun a rushuh a ama chawng rangai a ruawm.

Inia Martha kha chonthaw a chonruchin pe. Khan ama dieng ava a ruti, “Pumi, kanaipangnu na kiethien a chon inawmawthaw hi nang na ih nangishawn boi maw nih? Khajarkhan ama na nashanna rang, nieriei pe roh.”
Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Martha, Martha, nang na nieinak tampui chung a nang mulungshaw a narahamashak.
Khania nieinak khatte hi rangai, ajarla ama ah put ah shothiei boi, tum atha kha Mary na madan joi.”
Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na mun `khat ah nikna runiei. Ama na rubang phakhan, akhaichawi hai kar a akhat na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, John na akhaichawi hai iruchuk kha ang a, nikna dan nuruchuh u roh.”

Khan ama na ruti, “Nangni na nangnik u phakhan, hitihin ti u roh: Ravan a awm kapa u, nang riming kha riethieng nih rosho, nang rengchangna kha jong rosho. Ravan a nang mulungmining nangithaw kha ang a, rieliei hinawm nih rosho.
Von a nekkhawp nekleshak kha nikip nepeh u roh.
Kielieishie ton miring rikip kha karangaidam u jarkhan, kumunu u hai hi narangaidam pe u roh. Lemna a nomocho u naw roh. Inia ashie ah put ah nakhek u roh.”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Nang kar ua akhat na lawm `khat ieniei, khan ama na janchim a ama dieng she a iti, ‘Kama, tan `thumbak nepeh roh.
Ajarla kawlawm `khat khomijin ah put ah jong tung a ama shak rang ih nieilai mi`ing.’
Khan ama na inshung ah put ah rumashang, ‘Kiei hi nachawklai naw roh, tun mawkawt kha rakhar joi, khan kanai hai kha kiei le jakhang ah ja u joi; kiei na thoi a nepeh ngamlai naw ning.’
Kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, ama kha awlawm nitjoiawm, ruthoi pe mak, inia ringrawrat jarkhan, ama na thoi a irangai rikip kha pek rangnih.
“Khan kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, nih u roh, nangni dieng nepek rangnih. Tawk u roh, nangmuk u rangnih. Tawh u roh, nangni rang nawmawlawng pe rangnih.
Ajarla anih miring rikip na umuk, atawk ama kha na aman, khan atawh ama rang khan mawlawng pe.
“Nang kar ua apa `khat dieng shapa kha na tan nik `le, lung peh nih maw? Nga nik `le, kha ruhut a moro peh nih maw?
Khan arrutui nik `le, kha ruhut a aikoshangpa peh nih maw?
Khajarkhan, ashie nangnih u awm, nang nai hai dieng nieinak atha apeh kha nangthiei uala, ravan a awm nangpa u kha na anih miring hai dieng Ratha Riethieng kha idawr maw nepeh u nih!”
Khan ama na chawngthieiboi raikho `khat runawt. Raikho kha ama ah put ah rushok phakhan, chawngthieiboi miring kha ruchawng joi. Khan mipui kha shinrudawng pe uh.
Inia eshen na ruti uh, “Raikho hai reng Beelzebul ranak a raikho hai hi inawt inih.”
Khan eshen na, enretena rang, ravan ah put ah jetna ama dieng runik uh.
Inia amani mulungmining kha rujet pe a amani dieng ruti, “Nining a reshen rengchangna rikip thangbieng rangnih, khan malema re`er in kha upur.
Khan Satan kha na nining a reshen joiala, iti a maw ama rengchagna kha ding nih? Ajarla Beelzebul ranak a raikho hai kha kinawt keng nangti uh.
Inia kiei na Beelzebul ranak a raikho hai kha kawnawt joiala, nang nai hai na tu ranak a maw amani kha nawt uh? Khajarkhan amani kha nang chawngshat hai kha nih u rangnih.
Inia Pathien khutlawi kha le raikho hai kha kawnawt joiatu, nang chung ua Pathien rengchangna kha jong shok joi.
Miratpa kha na mieriem le rashamjer a ama in kha rung phakhan, ienieinak hai kha rekhe pe.
Khania amanek a aratdet akhat na ava a ama kha vak hum phakhan, ama na irangamna pui mieriem hai kha chawi pe a shoniei hai kha mi dieng vak shem pe.
Kiei le rachang boi ama kha kiei le re`er inih, khan kiei na kiroshong pui boi ama kha na chaiachai a atet.
“Raikho rono kha na miring `khat ah put ah rushok phakhan, ama na shawmuchumna rang, ram hona mun hai kha rakan a rushe. Inia rumuk boi phakhan ruti, ‘Kavakshokna ki`in khan kiei kir rang kanih.’
Ama na rukir phakhan, makha iruphietviek, khan rietienir a irutet kha vak muk.
Khashole ama na rushe a ashiedet ratha shiri shik vak chawi. Khan amani na rulut ua kha mun khan ruawm uh. Khan dawngkhit a miringpa awmchan kha matiengnek khan rushiedet joi.”
Jesu na mahi rurieilai khan, mipui kar khan nupang `khat na ra`ai a ruti, “Nang navawng naikawk le nangirumujup runu kha rahvanmuh inih!”
Inia ama na ruti, “Hinek hin a rahvanmuh miring hai kha, Pathien chawng rangai a ajui miring hai kha nih.”
Khan mipui kha hawng re`ep shishit phakhan, ama na ariei ruput, “Mahi rong hi ashie rong kha inih. Mahi na jetna atawk. Jonah jetna kha niboia amani dieng peh naw nih.
Ajarla Jonah kha Nineveh miring hai rang a jetna ruchang kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha mahi rong rang hin jetna kha nih rangnih.

Chawngshatna khan thang tieng ah rengnu kha na hi rong miring haihi le dingchen ning, tia amani kha aheng rangnih. Ajarla rieliei dawngkhit ah put ah Solomon varna kha rangai ahawng inih. Khan enro, Solomonnek a aliendet miring kha hin awm joi!

Nineveh miring hai kha na mahi rong miring hai hi le chawngshatna khan dingchen ning, tia aheng rangnih. Ajarla Jonah chawngriei khan amani na mulung lekna runiei uh. Khan enro, Jonahnek a aliendet miring kha hin awm joi!
“Tute na thaomiei kha muchuk shole, rethe a ninawkle tiengkum thoi ah tet mak. Khania hawng lut miring hai na mieivar kha mukna rang, thaomieishut ah itet inih.
Mik hi pum mieivar kha inih. Mik kha tha phakhan, nang pumplang kha var rangnih. Mik kha shie phakhan, nang pumplang kha jing rangnih.
Khajarkhan nang dieng a awm mieivar kha jingna boi rang, riring roh.
Nang pumplang kha var a ajing `khatshe awm nawkatu, retelang thaomiei `khat na mieivar inepek kha ang a, nang pumplang kha mieivar kha na ship rangnih.”
Khan Jesu na chawngruriei a awmlai khan, Pharisee `khat na ama kha bunek puina rang, runik. Khajarkhan ama na rulut a bunek rang rushuh joi.
Jesu na bunek mala a ukhut irushukbak boi kha rumuk phakhan, Phariseepa kha shinrudawng pe.
Inia Pumi na ama dieng ruti, “Aw Pharisee hai, nangni na hai le kheng kha vai tieng nanglap uh, inia nang shung uatu phamrai le mulungpok ashie kha shipmer a awm.
Aw amawng miring hai! Vai akonpa kha na shung kha`awm ikon nimak maw?
Khanikengta shung a awm phamrai thaw nanginiei u hai kha numpokpek a peh u roh. Khan enro, nangni rang irikip riethieng rangnih.

“Inia Pharisee hai, nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni na pudina le lengmesher, khan rohon ah anshawbo hai kha shemshawm a nangpek uh. Khan chawngshatna le Pathien numpok kha ishawn boi a nangthaw uh. Shik hai kha enda boi a hihaihi nangithaw u rang a shok.
“Pharisee hai, nangni rang mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni na synagogue ah shutna runiei kha nangdit uh, khan rievieithawna mun hai khan mi na chubai inawthaw pui u kha nangdit uh.
Pharisee hai, danoja hai, khan thanunchan thaw hai, nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangni hi madang boi thankhur hai kha nangnih uh; mi hai na jet boi a makhan lawn a awm uh.”
Khan danthiei `khat na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Oja, hihaihi nangriei phakhan, kieini hiawm maimawk nanginepek u inih.”
Khan ama na ruti, “Danthiei hai nangni diengawm mieriemna awm! Ajarla mi hai dieng iruput ngam boi pokrik kha nangpek uh. Nangni na pokrik hai kha nang khutlawi hai kar a akhatshe le shih u makche.
“Nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla nangpa hai na iruthat u thiempulien hai thanmun kha nangkon pe uh.
Diktak a nangpa hai na iruthaw chon hai kha idik, tia kungnangchang uh. Ajarla amani na thiempulien hai kha iruthat`het u inih, khan nangni na amani thanmun hai kha nangkon pe uh.
Khajarkhan Pathien na ama varna khanawm ruti, ‘Kiei na amani dieng thiempulien hai le tirtawn hai kha tir rang kanih. Amani eshen kha ruthat u rangnih, khan epshawna rupek u rangnih.’
Khajarkhan makha rieliei phun ah put ah rulong thiempulien kholok thishen kha mahi rong dieng hin biena rang a inih.
Makha Abel thishen ah put ah Zachariah thishenshe nih rangnih. Zachariah na lungkheng le riethiengmun kar ah ruthi. Inih, mahi rong dieng hin a bie rang a inih, tia nangni dieng kiriei inih.
“Danthiei hai, nangni dieng mieriemna awm! Ajarla shingna chabi kha nangni na nangthe uh. Nangnirilikawm lut u makche, khan alut hai kha nangkhar uh.”
Ama na hihaihi amani dieng irurieisho le roroia, danoja hai le Pharisee hai na ama kha ajeng a hawng raha pui ua, rahamothoina chawng tampui kha ama dieng rawdawn ruput u joi.
Khan ama kha shurna rang, ama na iriei rang a chawng ih khan nita`awm hengna rang, ruva a ruawm u joi.

Hilaitak hin, miring bawpbawp na hawng ruchun ua khatlekhat chung ah reter nana u phakhan, akhat changna a Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng ariei ruput, “Pharisee hai chawh ah put ah nangni riring u roh. Makha amani thanunchan thaw kha inih.
Ajarla imukhu nieinak kholok phawngthiei boi, iti awm mak, khan jetthiei boi rethe, iti awm mak.
Khajarkhan ih nita`awm ajing a nangiti u kha avar a jet rangnih. Khan indan hai shung ah nangiriei u kha inphu hai khan rophong rangnih.
“Kawlawm hai, nangni dieng kiriei inih, pum athat hai kha chih u naw roh, makha shole ithaw ngam rang niei u mak.
Inia nangni na nangichih u rang a kha kiei na nangni dieng kirieimasha inih. That shole Gehenna a thongna rang a cham anieipa kha nangni na chih u roh, inih, ama kha chih u roh!
Varawchawngpi rahnga hi asharion idibak a ijor nimak maw? Nikengta amani kar a `khatshe Pathien maikung a mieniei awm mak.
Nang lu uah sham kholokshe kha jat iteviek inih. Khajarkhan chih u naw roh; varawchawngpi tampuinek a manlu nangnih uh.
“Inia kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, tunita`awm kiei hi miring hai maikung a norophong ama kha Miring Shapa na`awm Pathien ravantir hai maikung a rophong rangnih.
Inia miring hai maikung a najawt boi ama kha Pathien ravantir hai maikung a jawt naw nih.
Miring Shapa mieshiet mi rikip kha arangaidam rangnih, inia Ratha Riethieng mieshiet ama kha tu rangaidam naw nih.
“Nangni kha synagogue hai le lamkai hai, khan chamniei hai maikung a nawchawi u phakhan, itia nangimashang u rang ninawkle imaw nangiriei u rang, tia mulung mawshaw u naw roh.
Ajarla Ratha Riethieng na, kha phatak khan, nangiriei u rang a kha nuruchuk u rangnih.”
Khan mipui ah put ah mi `khat na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, inkoklo shemna rang, kulienpa dieng khawn nieriei pe roh.”
Inia ama dieng ruti, “Aw miring, nang chung ua chawngshat rang le nieinak ashem rang, kiei hi tuna maw namadan?”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Nangni raphamna kholok ah put ah riring u tana rurung u roh, ajarla miring `khat ringkho hi ruphu a iniei khan awm mak.”
Khan ama na rangshim `khat amani dieng ruriei pe a ruti, “Rawchawng miring `khat loimun khan par tampui rushok pe.
Ama na nining a rumining, ‘Par hai hi atetna rang kieniei boi jarkhan, kiei na imaw thaw ning?’
Ama na ruti, ‘Kiei na hi thaw rang kanih, kachu hai hi shiet a aliendet mothoi rang kanih. Khan kiei na par hai le kienieinak kholok hi khawn ruchun rang kanih.
Khan kiringphuk dieng ti rang kanih, “Aw ringphuk, kum tampui rang nieinak tampui nangbawm joi, hoiriethiei roh, neh roh, khan ningai roh.” ’
“Inia Pathien na ama dieng ruti, ‘Aw amawng miring! Von jan hin nang ratha kha nang ah put ah koi rang kanih joi, nangirasham nieinak hai kha tu rang a maw nih?’
Khajarkhan, ama rangbak a niei ibawm a, Pathien rang a sharachang miring hai dieng khan hi ti rangnih.”

Khan akhaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Khajarkhan nangni dieng kiriei inih, imaw nanginek u rang, tia nang ringkho u rang; ninawkle imaw nangirieshiei u rang, tia nang pum u rang nang mulung mawshaw u naw roh.
Ajarla ringkho hi nekleshaknek a, khan nang pum u kha ponlediernek a manlu inih.

Va`ak hai khi tinta u roh, amani na vawrawm vawr u mak, khan parawm rawkhawm u mak. Amani rang nieirutungna le achuawm awm pe u mak. Khania Pathien na amani kha ivai inih. Va hainek a khadawr khan a manlu nangnih uh!
Khan nang kar uatu na maw lungkhamna niei a atak chung ah rajang `khat maw bo ngam?
Khajarkhan shilitetak a`awm nangthaw ngam nawk uala, ijar a nangni na shik hai rang khan lungkhamna nanginiei u maw nih?
“Tuirieipar hai khaw tinta u roh, amani na chonawm thaw u mak, khan patawm kher u mak. Inia nangni dieng kiriei inih, Solomonshe na ama lurna kholok le hihai kar a akhat ang a rielien ngam mak.
Khan von loipuk ah aring, khan jing a ratapkung ah ivawr champi kha Pathien na khatikhan rielien joiala, Aw ashin a takashawn aniei hai, nangni kha idawrshe maw nierielien u nih?
Khan imaw nangnek rang imaw nangshak rang, tia tawk u naw roh, khan lungkhamna niei u naw roh.
Ajarla rieliei shung a phung kholok na hihaihi itawk u inih. Inia nangpa u na hihaihi nangrangai u, iti ejet.
Khania Pathien rengchangna kha tawk u roh, khan hihai kholok hi nangni dieng nobo pe u rangnih.
“Chih u naw roh, hawi ashin hai, ajarla nangni dieng rengchangna inepek u hi, nangpa u ningnitna kha inih.
Nang niei u hai kha jor u tana numpokpek peh u roh. Achiet boi shierkawk kha shawng u tana ahek boi niei kha ravan a bawm u roh. Makha murushah na idepna boi, khan lieida na imathangna boi mun inih.
Ajarla nang niei u awmna khan nang mulungawm awm rangnih.
“Rasham u tana nang thaomiei u kha muchuk u rang roh.
Upumpa kha na moiloi bumichinna ah put ah vak kir phakhan, rungak a awm miring hai kha ang u roh. Makha ama na ava a mawkawt kha vak tawh phakhan, amani na relentak a mawlawngna rang a inih.

Upumpa kha na vat phakhan, cheveng a ruawm ivakmuk shok hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha nih uh. Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, ama na kawngkhit thaw ning, tia amani kha mushut rangnih, khan va ning, tia amani chon kha thaw pe rangnih.
Ama na adi le athum changna vengpa ding phakhan, khatikhan a ivakmuk amani kha rahvanmuh miring kha nih uh.
Inia mahi jet u roh, inpumipa kha na murushapa vatna rang a pha kha rujet joiala, ruche ning, tia i`in kha mokhoi naw nih.
Khajarkhan nangni`awm rasham u roh, ajarla nangrumining boi u phakhan, Miring Shapa kha jong rangnih.”
Khan Peter na ruti, “Pumi, mahi rangshim hi kieini rang ninawkle mi kholok rangawm nangiriei maw nih?”
Pumi na ruti, “Rangam puithiei le ashing shok kha tumaw nih? Ama kha upumpa kha na ama shok hai apana rang le amani kha rutukthep pha khan nekleshak apeh rang a roiruputna ipek miring kha inih.
Upumpa kha jong phakhan, khatikhan a chon iruthaw ivakmuk shok kha rahvanmuh miring tha inih.
Nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, ama niei kholok chung a apoh rang madan rangnih.
Inia shokpa kha na umulung shung a, ‘Kupumpa kha vak shumthiei,’ tia apashok hai le nupangshok hai kha ajem iput, inek-ishak a jurukhawp joiatu,
shok pumpa kha na, ama na irumining boi pha le irujet boi nidantak va rangnih, khan ama kha chepna natak pek ning, tia takashawn boi hai kha le atet rangnih.
“Khan upumpa mulungmining ijet a rurasham boi, ninawkle imining dungjuia athaw ama kha na rawmaw ajeng a tawng rangnih.

Inia pumpa mulungmining rujet boi, inia rawmaw tawng rang a rutuk inia chon tu ruthaw, ama kha na jangdet a tawng rangnih. Inia arawp ipekna mi rikip dieng arawpdet loi rangnih, khan arawpdet inganshiena ama dieng arawpdet a rangai rangnih. Lungdamna Nimak
“Rieliei chung hin miei kijongchawi inih. Khan makha achuksha kha nitjoiala, atha rangnih kiti!
Kiloi rang a baptisma `khat awm, khan baptisma kha hawng rupum masheng kiei hi ajeng a phainaravaimashak!
Rieliei chung hin lungdamna achawi ajong, tia maw nangmining uh? Nimak, kinieriei u hi inih, reshenmashakna kha inih.
Ajarla tun ah put ah in `khat ah rahnga kha reshen u rangnih: uthum le idi kar a, idi le uthum kar a.
Apa le ashapa kar a, ashapa le apa kar a, unu le ashanu kar a, ashanu le unu kar a, tarpi le moinu kar a, khan moinu le tarpi kar a reshenna awm rangnih.”
Khan mipui diengawm ruti, “Nangni na romiei na mar tieng hawng rajam phakhan, ‘Roshur rangnih’ nangtirelen uh, khan makha oshok.
Khan thang tieng ah rithi hawng rang phakhan, ‘Nisha rangnih’ nangti uh, khan makha oshok.
Aw thanunchan thaw hai! Nangni na rieliei le ravan maisho kha nangmelerthiei uh, inia ijar a tun a pha hi nangimeler ngam boi u maw nih?
“Iloia adik khan nang nining ua chawngnangishat boi u maw nih?

Ajarla khatikhan nangni na chamniei miring maikung a nere`erpui kha le nangshe phakhan, lam khan machaina rang, thaw roh. Khanawkatu, ama na chawngshat miring dieng ranak a nepek rangnih, khan chawngshat miring kha na lungrokorung ama dieng, khan lungrokorung miring kha na lungroko shung ah nothong rangnih.
Nang dieng kiriei inih, nang na dawngkhit lepton kha nangpek masheng, makha mun ah put ah vak shok naw tinih.”
Khan Galilee miring hai na rurawthawi u lai khan, Pilate na amani kha ruthat, tia kha mun ah awm mi eshen na Jesu dieng ruriei uh.
Amani dieng mashang a ruti, “Amani chung a hihaihi shok jarkhan, hihai Galilee miring hai hi Galilee miring shik hainek a munu nieidet miring hai keng, tia nangimining u maw nih?
Nangni dieng kinieriei inih, makha nimak, inia nang mulung nanglek u nawkatu, hitihin nangthi u rangnih.
Ninawkle, Siloam vendai jong pur a shawmlieiriet ide a ruthi hai kha, Jerusalem ah awm miring kholoknek a munu nieidet miring hai keng, tia nangimining u maw nih?
Nangni dieng kinieriei u inih, makha nimak, inia nang mulung nanglek u nawkatu, hitihin nangthi u rangnih.”
Khan ama na mahi rangshim hi ruriei, “Miring `khat na ama drakha rohon shung ah thieichangkung `khat runiei. Ama na ara en vat phakhan, vak muh mak.
Khan ama na drakha rohon aenpa dieng ruti, ‘Mahi thieichangkung hin ara kivak enna hi kum `thumhet nih joi, inia vak muh mi`ing. Mahi tuh rang roh. Ijar a mahi ramshe hi ilo rang a maw nih?’
“Ama na mashang a ruti, ‘Pumi, diengvai hin choi a hir katheh malalim, hikum hin tu endi rawi.
Unuk a ama na ara moshok joiatu atha, khanitnawkatu, mahi nangtukthiei joi.’ ”
Khan ama na Sabbath nikho a synagogue `khat hin mi ruruchuk a ruawm.
Khan enro, ratha thaboi na kum shawmlieiriet imawkhawr nupang `khat ruawm, khan awkawng kha rukaier pe a tonpeng a ruding ngam mak.
Jesu na ama kha rumuk phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Nupangnu, nang khawr ah put ah inathut pe nih joi.”
Ama na ukhut hai kha ama chung ah rutet pe a relentak a ama kha rumotonpeng joi, khan ama na Pathien kha mapak a ruawm joi.

Jesu na Sabbath nikho a irumadam khan synagogue lamkaipa kha na shanglam a rumashang, khan mipui dieng ruti, “Chon thawna rang ni `ruk awm. Kha nikho hai khan va u tana damna vak muh u roh, inia Sabbath nikho a tu nih naw rosho.”

Inia Pumi na mashang a ruti, “Aw thanunchan thaw miring hai! Nangni `khatkhat na Sabbath nikho khan nang shiecha ninawkle nang ranngam kha shiekon ah put ah nangmoshok a tuineh nangimeshe boi maw nih?
Enro, Abraham shanu mahi nupang hi kum shawmlieiriet Satan na ikhop a irutet inih, Sabbath nikho hin irukhop ah put ah ama hi moshok boi rang a maw nih?”
Ama na hihaihi ruriei phakhan, ere`erpui hai kholok kha jak rumumuk. Khan ama na irumoshok alur chon kholok chung khan ningaina runiei uh.
Khajarkhan ama na ruti, “Pathien rengchangna kha imaw ang? Mahi ih le maw kiei na rekhenna ning?
Mahi mi `khat na anchamru ichawi a orohon ah ivakthe, khan hawng mawng a thingkung hawng chang, khan abak hai khan va hai na rubu ithawna kha le ra`ang inih.”
Khan ama na rurieiret, “Pathien rengchangna kha kiei na ih le maw rekhenna ning?
Mahi nupang `khat na chawh ichawi a jam haikhup `thum le ireche a chawh rachangviek masheng a iruthe kha le ra`ang inih.”
Khashole ama na Jerusalem ah rushena lam khan mi ruchuklam a ama na khopui hai le khote hai kha rupangna.
Khan mi `khat na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, ishan miring hai kha atawm rang a maw nih?” Ama na amani dieng ruriei,
“Pakawt rebe khan lutna rang, rojo u roh, ajarla mi tampui na lutna rang, atawk u rangnih, inia mawtawr u naw nih, iti hi kinieriei u inih.

Inpumipa kha na othoi a mawkawt kha khar phakhan, nangni na vai tieng ading nangput u rangnih, khan mawkawt kha tawh u ti ning, tia nangti u rangnih, ‘Pumi, Pumi, nawmawlawng pe u roh.’ Khan ama na nangni dieng niti rangnih, ‘Ih ah put ah va maw nangnih uh, kiei na nejet u mi`ing.’
“Khashole nangti u rangnih, ‘Nang maton ah nekleshak kenek uh, khan lamlien hai khan nang nuruchuk uh.’
Khan ama na riei rangnih, ‘Kiei na nangni dieng kieriei, dikna boi chonthaw miring kholok kiei ah put ah shok u rang roh, ih ah put ah va maw nangnih uh, kiei na nejet u mi`ing.’
“Khan nangni na Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, khan thiempulien kholok na Pathien rengchangna khan awm a, nangni kha vai tieng inapai u kha nangmuk u phakhan, chapna le hareshena kha awm rangnih.
Khashole miring hai na shim le mar, khan shak le thang ah put ah hawng u ning, tia Pathien rengchangna khan shuh u rangnih.
Khan enro, nukna hai kha masha rangnih, khan masha hai kha nukna rangnih.”
Kha phatak khan Pharisee hai eshen na Jesu kha vak jawng ua ama dieng ruti uh, “Hin ah put ah she rang roh, ajarla Herod na nang kha nathatna rang, mining joi.”

Khan amani dieng ruti, “Makha ramui dieng khan she u tana vak ti u roh, ‘Von le jing hin kiei na raikho hai kha nawt rang kanilai, khan ana hai kha madam rang kanilai, khan ni `thum changna khan kikhinmun kha shok rang kanih joi.’
Khanikengta kiei na von, jing a le thiem a kakichawingir rang a shok joi, ajarla thiempulien `khat kha Jerusalem vai ah ithat rang a kha nithiei naw nih.

“Aw Jerusalem, Aw Jerusalem, thiempulien hai athat le ama dieng ijongtir hai kha lung le adeng! Arpui `khat na ete hai kha amatha noi ah irawkhawm kha ang a, idawrshe maw nang nai hai kha kururawkhawm jawt! Inia rujawt u makche.
Enro, nang in u kha rokpet a rangah joi. Khan nangni dieng kiriei inih, ‘PUMI riming a ava ama kha rahvantha inih,’ nangti u masheng, numuh u lai naw tinih.”
Khan hitihin ruawm, Sabbath nikho `khat hin Jesu na Pharisee hai lamkai `khat in ah buneh rushe phakhan, amani na ama kha tinruta uh.
Khan enro, pomrai tawng miring `khat amaton a ruawm.
Jesu na mashang a danthiei hai le Pharisee hai dieng rurawdawn, “Sabbath nikho a mi madam hi Dan maw nih, ninawkle dan nih boi maw nih?”
Inia amani ruawmchien uh. Khan Jesu na ama kha apawttap a rumadam a rumeshe joi.
Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Nang kar ua nang shapa `khat ninawkle nang shiecha `khat hi Sabbath nikho khan khur ah cho joiala, relentak a roshoh naw rawng maw?”
Hihai chung hin amani na rumashang ngam u mak.
Khan koimiring hai kha na runiei a richit ipek itawk u awmchan kha rumuk `le, amani dieng rangshim `khat ruriei pe:
“Tukhat na nangni kha moiloi bumichinna khan nokoi u phakhan, shutna hoi hai khan shuh u naw roh. Miringpa kha na nangnek a richit pekdet rang a miring koithiei.
Nang dinre akoipa kha na ‘Nang mun kha hipa dieng hin peh roh,’ tia nang dieng nitithiei, khan jaklam a, nang na renemving shutna kha nanglothiei.

Inia mi na nang kha nokoi phakhan, she tana renemving mun khan vak shuh roh. Makha nang anakoi miring kha na nang dieng ‘Kama, hoinadet mun hi hawng loh roh,’ nitina rang a inih. Makhan nang le ashuh miring hai maikung khan nang lurna kha awm rangnih.
Ajarla nining a rawlawm ama kha redemashak rangnih, khan nining a rede ama kha alawm rangnih.”

Khan ama akoipa dieng khan ruti, “Jingkarbu ninawkle nitakbu nangrasham phakhan, nang lawm hai, nang uliennai hai, nanginshungkhur hai, khan ringchangpui rawchawng hai kha koi naw roh. Khanitatu amani na`awm nokoi u rangnih; makha inimikirna kha chang rangnih.
Inia bu nangmichin phakhan, shara miring, khutkekhawr, khan mikchaw miring hai kha koi roh.
Amani na nemele boi jarkhan, nang rahvantha kha nangnih. Ajarla midik hai thoiretna khan nang dieng nimikir rangnih.”
Ama le rushuh hai kar a akhat na makha rujet phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Pathien rengchangna a buneh rang a ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih!”
Khan ama na ama dieng ruriei, “Mi `khat na bumichinna lientak `khat runiei a mi tampui rukoi.
Nitakbu nek dieng khan koimiring hai kha ‘Va u rang roh, irikip rashamsho keng joi,’ tia akoi rang shokpa kha ama na rutir joi.
“Inia kholok na mulung khat a methena ruthaw uh. Akhat changna kha na ruti, ‘Kiei na ram mun `khat kawrawchawk, khan makha aen she boi thalai mak, narangaidam roh.’
“Akhat na ruti, ‘Kiei na shiecha rawkawt rahnga kawrawchawk, kiei amani enrete she rang kanih, narangaidam roh.’
“Shik `khat na ruti, ‘Kiei nungak kienieilimlai, va ngamlai naw ning.’
