“Khan shokpa kha vak kir a hihai kholok hi upumpa dieng thangvakkoi joi. Inpumipa kha ashang a oshokpa dieng ruti, ‘Relentak a lamlien ah le khopui lamkawt hai khawn she tana shara miring, khutngaw, mikchaw le kekhawr miring hai kha hin vak chawi roh.’
Khan shokpa kha na ruti, ‘Pumi nang iti kha thawsho keng joi, inia mun tawnglai.’
“Khan pumi kha na shokpa dieng ruti, ‘Lamton ah le lamkawi khan she tana vak mulut boi tha makche. Makha ki`in hi mishipna rang a inih.
Ajarla kikoi hai tute na kinitakbu hi tuidan en naw nih, tia nangni dieng kiriei inih.’ ”
Khan mipui kha ama dieng vak ruchun uh, khan amani dieng hiei a ruti,
“Kiei dieng ava mi rikip na apa, unu, unungak nai hai, uliennaipangpa hai le uliennaipangnu hai, khan kha kar khan, iringkhotak amumak boi ama kha kakhaichawi kha nih ngam naw nih.
Ama cross rupu a kanu ajui boi ama kha kakhaichawi kha nih ngam naw nih.
“Ajarla nang kar ua tukhat na vendai mothoi jawt a tu, makha mawtawrna rang, rapapek a shuh ning, tia alut rang a jat kha mushung naw nih maw?
Ama na keshun phun a mawtawr ngam nawkatu, ama amuh mi rikip na nuijat a ithaw inih.
‘Hi miring hi na in rashak tu put, inia mawtawr ngam mak,’ iti u inih.

“Ninawkle, ih reng kha na maw reng shik `khat chung a ra thaw dieng, rapapek a shuh ning, tia ama na bawp shawmdi vak chawi a ama le rathaw ava rang a hi bawp shawm le mawtawr ngam nih maw, tia mining vak naw nih maw?
Ama na ra`ithaw pui ngam boi rang a nitjoiatu, ala ah awmlai khan, ama na palai tir a riengieina thaw pui rangnih.
Khajarkhan hitihin nanginiei kholok kha nangpai u nawkatu, nang kar ua akhatshe na`awm kakhaichawi kha nih ngam u naw tinih.
“Michi hi atha inih, inia ama tuidan kha thang joiatu, itia maw ma`aret rawng?
Pieipak rangawm, khan hir rangawm tha naw nih. Ama kha apai rangnih. Tunita`awm rangaina rang a nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho.”
Khan khaichana rawkhawm hai kholok le munu miring hai kholok na ama chawngriei rangai rang, hawng ranai pui uh.
Khan Pharisee hai le danoja hai na mieshietlam a ruti uh, “Hi miring hi na munu miring hai kha awphawm a amani le ashak.”
Ama na mahi rangshim hi riei pe a, amani dieng ruti,
“Nangni kar a tu `khat na kengam rajakhat iniei kar khan akhat thang pe joi. Ama na shawmkolieiko kha ramthim ah mak a athang `khat kha muk masheng, atawk she naw nih maw?
Ama na muk phakhan, iring ah mushut a ama na ningai pui.
Khan in ah va a awlawm hai le ringchangpui hai kha okoi a iti, ‘Kekengam athang kha kumuk joi jarkhan, va u tana ningnavakngai pui u roh.’
Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, hitihin mulung lek rang rangai boi midik shawmkolieiko chungnek khan munu miring `khat na mulung lek phakhan, ravan a aliendet ningaina kha awm rangnih.
“Ninawkle, nupang `khat na drachma shawm ieniei, ama na drachma `khat mathang joiatu, thaomiei muchuk ning, tia in kha phiet rangnih. Khan ama na muk masheng rieirit a tawk naw nih maw?
Ama na muk phakhan, awlawm hai le ringchangpui hai kha rawkhawm a ‘Kimathang drachma kha kumuk joi jarkhan, ningnavakngai pui u roh,’ iti.
Khan nangni dieng kiriei inih, hitihin munu miring `khat na mulungilekna chung khan, Pathien ravantir hai maikung a ningaina kha awm rangnih.”
Khashole Jesu na ruriei, “Miring `khat na shapa `di runiei.
Naipanglampa kha na apa dieng ruti, ‘Kapa, kitumphawm nieinak kha nepeh rang roh.’ Apa na nieilelung kha adin u dieng rushem pe joi.
“Nikhothang shawt boi a shapa naipanglampa kha na kholok kha rurawkhawm a ramlatak a rushe joi. Khan ienieinak hai kha pawrshawnawk a ruringna joi.
Ama na kholok kha rumeheksho phakhan, makha ram kholok khan nekleshak ajeng a hawng tang joi. Ama kha ravat hawng put joi.
Khan ama na rushe a makha ram ah awm miring `khat dieng chon vak nik joi. Khan ama kha loipuk ah vawk hai aroi rang, rutir joi.
Ama na vawkbu hai kha le vawn rumiship jawt, khan tute na iawm rupelai mak.
“Nining a hawng chehep a ruti, ‘Kapa shok hai na nekleshak ijat kha le ruphu a awm uh, inia kiei la hin vawnchamtuira le athang a ka`awm naw!
Kiei na thoi a kapa dieng kir a ama dieng ti rang kanih, “Kapa, ravan chung a le nang maikung a munu kawthaw joi.
Nang shapa `khat, tia koi rang hi kiei rutuklai mi`ing, kiei hi nang imoroi shok `khat namachang rang roh.” ’
“Khan ama na ruthoi a apa dieng hawng joi. Khan ama na ralaviei a ruawmlai khan, apa kha na ama kha rumuk a lairunat pui. Ama na tan a ruthaw a ama kha rukaw a rutum joi.
“Khan ashapa kha na ama dieng ruti, ‘Kapa, ravan chung a le nang maikung a munu kawthaw joi. Nang shapa `khat, tia koi rang hi kiei rutuklai mi`ing.’

“Inia apa kha na oshok hai dieng ruti, ‘Relentak a pon athaving kha vak chawi u tana ama hi vak rieshieimashak u roh, khan ukhut hin shumkieviek vak mietieng u roh; khan eke hai hin kekok vak mawrawn pe u roh.
Khan shiecha remet amarting kha vak chawi u tana that u roh. Khan shah u taia ningai moshok u rawi.
Ajarla kashapa hi ruthi a hawng ringret, khan ruthang a kimuk nih joi.’ Khan amani na ningai moshok ruput u joi.
“Inia ashapa ulienchang kha loipuk ah ruawm. Ama na hawng a in hawng shokdeng `le, larichin le lamna helehoi kha hawng jet.
Ama na shok `khat hi rukoi a hihaihi imaw nih, tia rurawdawn.
Ama na ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang naipangpa kha hawng kir joi. Ama na damveng a rumuk jarkhan, nangpa na shiecha remet amarting `khat ithat pe keng.’
“Inia mulung ruhang pe a hawng lut jawtlai mak. Khajarkhan apa kha na vai vak shok a ama kha rudawi.

Inia ama na apa dieng mashang a ruti, ‘Enro, kum khadawr shawt khan nang chon kihawngthaw inih, khan itikte nita`awm nang chawngpek kha rakan mi`ing, khan nang na itikte nita`awm kawlawm hai le ningai moshokna rang, kecha remet `khatshe nurupeh makche.
Inia mahi nang shapa hi na nang nieilelung kholok kha nawchijor hai le shakshoviek shole, hawng kir a nang na shiecha remet amarting `khat nangruthat pe.’
“Khan apa na ama dieng ruti, ‘Naitepa, nangtu ningthingkip kiei le nangawm, khan kienieinak hai kholok hi nangtah inih.
Kieini na mapak a ningaingir rang nashok, ajarla nang naipangpa hi ruthi a hawng ringret inih, khan ruthang a kimuk nih joi.’ ”
Khan Jesu na akhaichawi hai diengawm ruriei pe, “Rawchawng miring `khat ruawm, ama na inchonpo `khat runiei. Ienieinak hai kha pawrshawnawk a thaw, tia ama chung a chawng hawng tung joi.
Khajarkhan rukoi a ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang chungchanga kijet hi imaw nih? Nang inchonpona mushungna kha kiei dieng nepeh rang roh, ajarla ki`inchonpo kha nang nithieilai naw tinih.’
“Inchonpo kha na nining a ruti, ‘Kiei na imaw kithawthiei awm? Kupumi na inchonpona kha kiei ah put noloi pe rangnih joi. Pieipak choi la kiei ngam mi`ing; khutdaw lawn rang la kiei kajak.
Miring hai na amani in ah kiei hi nuruloinathiei rang, kiei na imaw kithaw rang, iti kha kiei kejet joi.’
“Ama na upumi lieishieton hai kha akhatkhat a rukoi a akhat changna dieng ruti, ‘Nang na kupumi shier ijat maw nangton?’
Ama na rumashang, ‘Thao batos rajakhat.’ Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang shierche hi loi tana relentak a shawm rahnga miejiek roh.’
Khashole akhat dieng rurawdawn, ‘Nang la ijat maw nangton?’ Ama na rumashang, ‘Gehu koros rajakhat.’ Ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang shierche hi loi tana shawm riet miejiek roh.’
“Dikna boi inchonpo kha na shingveng a ruthaw jarkhan, pumi kha na rumapak. Ajarla hi rong miring hai na amani rong hin mieivar miring hainek a shing uh.
Khan kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, dikna boi nieilelung kha le lawm thaw u roh, makha rieshiet phakhan, amani na kumshawt a awmna khan noloi u rangnih.
“Lekte chung a takashawn rang a rutuk ama kha tampui chung a awm takashawn rang a rutuk inih, khan lekte chung a adik boi miring kha tampui chung a awm adik boi miring kha inih.
Dikna boi nieilelung khan takashawn rang a rutuk boi nangrunih uala, tu na maw nangni kha adik nieilelung khan nanganshie u nih?
Khan mi nieinak khan takashawn rang a rutuk nangrunih u nawkala, tu na maw nang tatak u kha nepeh u nih?

“Shok tute na pumi `di chon thaw ngam naw nih, ajarla ama na akhat kha mukmak a shik `khat kha numpok rangnih. Ninawkle, akhat kha pawm a shik `khat kha aheng rangnih. Pathien le nieilelung dire chon thaw ngam u naw tinih.”
Khan shierdit Pharisee hai kha na`awm hihai kholok hi rujet ua ama kha eshe a rulai uh.

Khan amani dieng ruti, “Nangni na miring hai maikung a nang nining a dik nangrasha uh, inia Pathien na nang mulung u kha ejet. Ajarla miring hai maikung a rashang kha Pathien maikung a tu mitiroi `khat inih.
“John phashe khan Dan le Thiempulien hai kha rurophong uh. Khan ah put khan Pathien rengchangna kha rurophong a makha shung khan mi rikip na rangrat a rulut uh.
Inia Dan hailak `khat acho rangnek a ravan le rieliei athang rang a kha baidet.
“I`inkonu kha imele a shik `khat iniei mi rikip uire ithaw inih, khan imele nupang aniei ama kha na uire ithaw inih.
“Rawchawng miring `khat na ponshenrin le ponramasha thaning rieshiei a ruawm. Ama na ningthingkip lungtawr a nekleshak rushak.
Khan Lazarus iti shara miring `khat apan a tuisharlam a apakawt khan ruawm.
Ama na rawchawngpa tebol ah put ah jong cho burama hai kha le vawn rumiship jawt. Khan ui haishe na`awm ava ua, ama apan a tuishar kha rumieliek pe uh.
Sharapa kha ruthi a Abraham makap ah awmna rang, ravantir hai na ruchawi u joi. Khan rawchawngpa kha`awm ithi a rukhum u joi.
Khan thikho khan shawrievieilam a ring rakang a, ralaviei a Abraham na amakap ah Lazarus pawmlam a awm kha hawng muk.

“Khan ama na he rashangtak a ruti, ‘Aw kapa Abraham, nang roihoina kha kiei dieng natetna roh, khan Lazarus kha jong tir tana ukhut par le tui shun rieshie kiemieliei hi nojong rachakmashak pe rosho. Ajarla kiei na mahi mieichon hin shawrievieilam a ka`awm joi.’
Inia Abraham na ruti, ‘Naitepa, nang na nangringlai khan atha hai kha nangmuk a Lazarus na ashie hai imuk kha mininghep roh, inia tun ama na hoina muk a nang na shawrievieina kha nangmuk joi.

Khan hihai kholok hi khea nangni le kieini kar a atawngvawng lientak `khat awm joi. Khajarkhan hin ah put ah nangnishe, khan khan ah put ah kieinishe hawng a rakan rawng, tia imining hai kha na mawtawr u lai naw nih.’
“Khan ama na ruti, ‘Aw kapa, ama kha kapa in ah nangtirnathiei rang, kininik.
Ajarla kuliennai hai rahnga kieniei, amani dieng kungnojongchang pe rosho, khanawkatu amaniawm mahi shawrievieina mun hin hawng u rang keng.’
Inia Abraham na ama dieng ruti, ‘Amani na Moses le thiempulien hai kha niei uh, amani chawng kha rangai u rosho.’
Inia ama na ruti, ‘Nimak, Aw kapa Abraham, athi ah put ah mikhat she joiatu, amani na mulung lek u rangnih.’
Inia Abraham na ama dieng ruti, ‘Amani na Moses le thiempulien hai chawng kha rangai u nawkatu, athi ah put ah hawng thoi miring kha na`awm mawkawi ngam u naw nih.’ ”
Khan Jesu na khaichawi hai dieng ruriei, “Keruthuina hai ajong boi rang a hi nithieilai naw nih, inia omojong ama rang khan, idawr a khawk maw nih naw!
Ashin hihaihi kar a akhat keruthuimashak rangnek a tu, ama rek ah shumhiei makhai pe a tuikhanglien shung ah vawr rang a kha ama rang thadet rangnih.
Riring u roh. Nang uliennai kha na munu thaw joiatu, rawkawk roh, khan umulung lek joiatu, rangaidam pe roh.
Khan nikhat a voishiri nang chung a munu thaw joiawm, nang dieng voishiri vak hiei a ‘Kumulung kelek joi,’ ti joiatu, rangaidam nangipek rang a shok.”
Khan tirtawn hai kha na Pumi dieng ruti uh, “Katakashawn u hi namarat pe shishit u roh.”

Pumi na ruriei, “Nangni na anchamru tiettak a`awm takashawn kha nangniei uatu, mahi mana thingkung dieng hin ‘Nang rawphawi tana tuikhanglien shung khawn vak mawng roh,’ nangti u sheawm ama na anarangai pe rangnih.
“Nang kar ua tuna maw shok `khat loipuk ah put ah ninawkle kengam hai aroi ah put ah hawng shoklim nangniei ua, ‘Relentak a va tana bu vak neh rang roh,’ ti u rawng?

Inia makha tinaw tinih. Kha ruhut a ‘Kenek rang shakthiei rasham roh, khan nang kawng kha khit tana kenek kashaklai hin chon nawthaw pe roh, khan hihai shole, nangnek nangshak rangnih,’ ti u naw rawng maw?
Chawngpek hai kha thaw jarkhan, ama na mapakna maw niei nih? Mapakna niei naw nih, tia takakawshawn.
Khatikhan nangniawm, nangni dieng a pek chawngpek kholok kha nangthaw u phakhan, ti u roh, ‘Kieini hi rutuk boi shok hai kha nanih uh, kieini na thawphawm kha nithaw u inih.’ ”
Khan hitihin ruawm, Jesu na Jerusalem ah rushena khan Samaria le Galilee kha phaw a rupang.
Khan ama na kho `khat ah rulut phakhan, raithawnaw tawng apa shawm na rurumuk pui uh.
Amani na ralaviei a ruding ua he rashangtak a ruti uh, “Aw Pumpa Jesu, nang roihoina kha kieini dieng natetna u roh!”
Khan ama na rumuk phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Nangni na she u tana thiempu hai dieng khawn vak mumuk u roh.” Khan ashe u le roroia, amani kha ruriethieng u joi.
Inia amani kar a akhat na adam kha rumuk `le, Pathien mapaklam a vak kir.
Khan ekeshun a vak bawklap a ama kha rumapak. Ama kha Samaria miring runih.
Khan Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Iriethieng hai kha shawm anih boi maw nih? Oko hai kha khoshekawt ah maw awm u joi?
Mejet boi hipa hi niboia vak kir a Pathien lurna kha ipek boi u maw nih?”
Khan ama dieng ruti, “Thoi tana she rang roh, nang takashawn kha na nang kha namadam joi.”

Khan Pharisee hai na Pathien rengchangna kha itik a jong shok rang a maw nih, tia rurawdawn u phakhan, Jesu na amani dieng rumashang, “Pathien rengchangna hi mukthiei nieinak kha le ajong rang a nimak,
ninawkle amani na ‘Enro, hin awm joi!’ ninawkle ‘Enro, khawn awm joi!’ tithiei nimak. Ajartu Pathien rengchangna kha nang shung ua awm inih.”
Jesu na khaichawi hai dieng ruti, “Nangni na Miring Shapa nikho hai kar a akhat nangimuk jawtna u nikho kha jong rangnih. Makha nangni na muh u naw tinih.
Amani na niti u rangnih, ‘Enro, hin awm joi!’ ninawkle ‘Enro, khawn awm joi!’ niti u rangnih. Makhan she u naw roh, khan rojo u naw roh.
Khomelek a ravan shir `khat ah put ah shir `khatshe i`eh kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha ama Nikho khan, kha ang rangnih.
Inia rapapek a ama na shawna tampui doi rangnih, khan mahi rong hi na nawt rangnih.
“Khan Noah nikho hai khan a ashok kha ang a, Miring Shapa nikho hai khanawm kha ang rangnih.
Noah na rokongpui khan rulut masheng, khan tui hawng lien a amani kholok kha rumathangviek masheng, miring hai na rushak runek uh, inruniei uh, khan inniei rang khan rupek uh.
“Khatikhan Lot nikho hai kha ang a, amani na rushak uh, runek uh, nieinak rurawchawk uh, nieinak rujor uh, choicha ruling uh, khan in rumothoi uh.
Inia Lot na Sodom imathanna nikho khan miei le mieidi kha ravan ah put ah roshur ang a jong shur a amani kholok kha rumathang uh.
“Miring Shapa kha jong malarna nikho khan makhatak kha ang rangnih.
Makha nikho khan inphu ah awm mi kha na jong chum a in ah awm ienieinak hai kha jong loilai naw rosho. Kha ang khan loipuk ah awm mi kha na vak kirlai naw rosho.
Lot inkonu kha mininghep u roh.
Iringkho shanna rang a atawk miring kha thang rangnih, khan iringkho mathang ama kha na makha ashan rangnih.
Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei hi inih, makha jan khan jakhang `khat ah miring `di awm rangnih, akhat kha chawi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
Nupang pasha `di shum ah shanghak shukshom u rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.
Miring pasha `di loipuk ah awm rangnih, akhat kha loi rangnih, khan shik `khat kha mak rangnih.”
Amani na mashang a ruti uh, “Khoshekawt a maw, Pumi?” Ama na amani dieng rumashang, “Rok awmna mun khan langke hai na lawp `khat a ruchun u rangnih.”
Khashole ningthingkip mulungrakai boi a nikna rang, Jesu na amani dieng rangshim ruriei pe.
Ama na ruriei, “Khopui `khat hin Pathien chih boi le mi ishawn boi athaw chawngshat miring `khat ruawm.
Khan makha khopui khan mieirawng `khat ruawm; mieirawng kha na ama dieng ava a ruti, ‘Nere`erpui ah put ah kiei hi nimidik roh.’
“Phabawng `khat hi ama na rujawt pe mak, inia hihaihi shole, nining a ruti, ‘Kiei na Pathien kha kichih joi nawkawm, khan mi ishawn boi a kawthaw joiawm,
hi mieirawng hi na kiei hi shutnadingna nemejet boi jarkhan, ama hi kiei na midik rang kanih, khanawkatu ama na rawnaw a ava hi na kiei hi nomoboi rang keng joi’ ”
Khan Pumi na ruti, “Midik boi chawngshatpa iriei kha rangai u roh.
Ama na amani le shawttak doi pui joiawm, shun le jan a ra`ai imadansha hai kha Pathien na midik boi a maw tet nih?
Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, ama na amani kha relentak a midik rangnih. Khania Miring Shapa kha na jong phakhan, rieliei chung hin takashawn kha jong muh nih maw?”
Khan amanirilik dieng rangamna midik kanih ati hai dieng khanawm mahi rangshim hi ruriei pe:
“Miring pasha `di hi na riethiengmun ah anih rushe uh. Akhat kha Pharisee inih, khan akhat kha khaichana rawkhawm miring inih.

Pharisee miringpa kha na ding a hitihin runik: ‘Pathien, kanamapak, ajarla kiei hi miring shik hai, murushah miring hai, midik boi hai, uirethaw miring hai, ninawkle khaichana rawkhawm miringpa hi a`ang nimi`ing.
Kiei na hapta `khat a voidi chamrakodoi, kimuk hai ijat kha kiei na shawm a `khat kepek.’
“Inia khaichana rawkhawm miring kha na ralaving a ding a ravan tiengsheawm khonga ngam boi a, umulung teilam a, ruti, ‘Pathien, kiei hi munu miring kha kanih, nang roihoina kha natetna roh!’

Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, mahi miringpa hi na, akhatpanek khan, midik a i`in ah rukir joi. Ajarla nining a mapak mi rikip kha redemashak rangnih, khan nining a rede mi rikip kha alawm rangnih.”
Khan naite hai kha Jesu na shitna rang, amani na ama dieng vak chawi uh, inia akhaichawi hai na rumuk phakhan, amani kha rurawkawk uh.
Inia Jesu na amani kha rukoi a ruti, “Naite hai kha kiei dieng ava rang a kha jawt pe u roh, amani kha makha u naw roh, ajarla kha ang hai dieng khan Pathien rengchangna kha awm.
Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, naite `khat ang a, Pathien rengchangna kha aloi boi ama kha na itikte nita`awm makhan lut naw nih.”
Khan rampo miring `khat na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Aw Oja atha, kumshawt ringna kutumna rang, kiei na imaw thaw ning?”
Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Ijar a kiei hi atha, tia nanginokoi maw nih? Pathien niboia tute atha awm mak.
Chawngpek hai kha nangjet: ‘Uire thawthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Mi thatthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Muruthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Adik boi a kungchangthiei naw tinih,’ ‘Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh roh.’ ”
Khan ama na ruti, “Hihai kholok hi korothar chang ah put ah kihawngrung nih joi.”

Inia Jesu na rujet phakhan, ama dieng ruti, “Khanikengta thaw rang `khat nangvatlai, nanginiei ijat kha jor tana shara hai dieng vak shem pe roh, khan ravan a bawmniei kha nangniei rangnih. Khan va tana nujui roh.”
Inia mahi ama na rujet phakhan, ajeng a mulung rushaw pe joi, ajarla ama kha ajeng a rawchawng miring `khat runih.
Khan makha rumuk phakhan, Jesu na ruti, “Shumleshier aniei hai na Pathien rengchangna a alut rang a hi idawr a matat maw nih!
Rawchawng miring `khat na Pathien rengchangna alut rangnek a tu, sharingshiei `khat na shim nokor ah apang rang a kha baidet.”
Khan rangai miring hai kha na ruti uh, “Khanitala tu na maw shanna muh ngam nih?”
Khan ama na ruti, “Miring hai dieng a anithiei boi chon hai kha Pathien dieng tu anithiei inih.”
Khan Peter na ruti, “Enro, ih kholok kurumak ua kinurujui u inih.”
Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruriei, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, in le loi ninawkle nungak le nai ninawkle uliennai shokpui ninawkle nu le pa hai kha Pathien rengchangna rangbak khan a rumathan
tute na tun a pha le ajong rang a rong hin kumshawt ringna kha rothom a muk boi a awm naw nih.”

Khan khaichawi shawmlieidi kha shemrushai a amani dieng ruti, “Enro, kieini hi Jerusalem ah ahawng rang a nanih u joi. Khan Miring Shapa chungchanga thiempulien hai dieng irumiejiekna kholok kha hawng rupum rangnih joi.
Ajarla ama kha Phungshik hai dieng rupek u rangnih, ama kha engshiet a ruthaw u rangnih. Ama kha maimawk rupek u rangnih, khan ama kha rumiechiei u rangnih.
Ama kha rujem u ning, tia ruthat u rangnih, khan ni `thum changna khan thoiret rangnih.”
Inia hihaihi amani na rujet ngam u mak, khan mahi rieichawng hi amani ah put ah rethe ruchang, khan amani na rieichawng kha rujet u mak. Mikchaw khutdaw
Khan hitihin ruawm, ama na Jericho ivakranai pui le roroia, mikchaw miring `khat na lamkaw khan khutdawlam a ruawm.
Ama na mipui vak pang kha rujet `le, mahi ih chonshok maw nih, tia rurawdawn.
Khan amani na Nazareth Jesu vak pang keng, tia ama dieng thangrukoi uh.”
Khan ama na ra`ailam a ruti, “David Shapa Jesu, nang roihoina kha kiei dieng hin natetna roh!”
Khan amaton ah alawn hai kha na awmchienna rang, rurawkawk uh, inia ama na rura`ai shishit, “David Shapa, nang roihoina kha kiei dieng hin natetna roh!”
Jesu na ding a ama dieng vak chawina rang, chawng rupek. Khan avak ranai pui phakhan, ama dieng rurawdawn,
Ama na ruti, “Nang rang kiei hi imaw nang nawmawthaw jawt?” Khan ama na ruti, “Aw Pumi, kumukthieina rang, kimik hi namavar pe roh.”
Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Muh rang roh, nang takashawn kha na namadam joi.”
Khan relentak a imik kha hawng var pe joi, khan Pathien kha mapaklam a anu rujui joi. Khan amuh miring kholok na Pathien kha rumapak uh.
Khan Jesu na Jericho kha rulut a rupang joi.
Khan enro, Zacchaeus iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha khaichana rawkhawm ulienchang le mirawchawng `khat runih.
Ama na Jesu kha tumaw nih, iti kha rumuk jawt, inia dungtawi miring runit jarkhan, mipui kar khan ama na rumuh ngam mak.
Khan ama na maton shawn a rutan a Jesu vak pangna rang a lam khan muknathiei rang, ama na thieipong kung `khat ah ruka.
Jesu na makha mun kha vak shok phakhan, chung tieng khongrunga a ama dieng ruti, “Zacchaeus, relentak a jong chum roh, ajarla von nikho hin kiei na nang in ah tungngir rang kanih.”
Khan ama na relentak a jong chum a ningailam a ama kha lamjawng ruthaw.
Khan amuh miring kholok na muruk a mieshiet a ruti uh, “Mununiei miring `khat in ah tungna rang lut joi.”
Zacchaeus na iding a Pumi dieng ruriei, “Enro, shara miring hai dieng kiei na kiniei khoi `khat pek rang kanih, Aw Pumi, khan lehawn a mi dieng koloi a tu, kiei na shem mili a thung rang kanih.”
Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Von nikho hin shandamna kha hi inshung hin jong joi. Ajarla ama hiawm Abraham shapa `khat inih.
Ajarla Miring Shapa kha miring athang atawk le ashan rang a ajong inih.”
Khan amani na irangai u le roroia, rangshim shik `khat hi ruriei pe. Ajarla ama na Jerusalem ivakranai pui le roroia, Pathien rengchangna kha malangrelen rangnih joi, tia amani na rumining uh.
Khajarkhan ama na ruriei, “Rimingniei miring `khat na ramlatak `khat ah ama rang rengchangna kha aloi she a vak kir rang a inih.
Khan ama na oshok shawm kha rukoi a mina shawm hi amani dieng rupek a ruti, ‘Kiei na kavakkir masheng, nangni na hihaihi le rievieiruthaw u roh.’
“Khania ram miring hai kha na ama kha rumukmak uh, khan amani na palai rutir ua hitihin chawng rumawchawi uh, ‘Mahi miringpa hi na kieini inopok u rang a hi kieini na dit u mi`ing.’
“Khan ama na rengchangna kha le vak kir phakhan, ama na shier irupek shok hai kha koina rang, chawng rupek joi. Makha tu nitjoiawm rievieithaw a irumupung kha jetna rang a inih.
“Khan akhat changna kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang mina kha le mina shawm kurumupung joi.’
“Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Mapak awm, Aw shok atha; nang hi ashin nieinak khan takashawn rang a rutuk nangnit jarkhan, nang na khopui shawm chung a cham aniei kha nangnih rangnih.’
“Khan adi changna kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang mina kha le mina rahnga kurumupung joi.’
“Khan hipa dieng hinawm ruti, ‘Nang khopui rahnga chung a cham aniei kha nangnih rangnih.’
“Khan shik `khatpa kha na ava a ruti, ‘Pumi, nang mina hi enro, kiei na pon le kitumrep inih.
Ajarla kiei na nang kha kinichih. Ajarla nang hi mikhawk `khat nangnih, nang itetna boi khan nangloi, khan nangivawrna boi khan nangrawkhawm.’

“Khan ama dieng ruti, ‘Nang ner ah put ah kiei na nang chung a chawngshat rang kanih, Aw shok ashie nang. Kiei hi mikhawk, kitet boi kha kiloi, khan kivawr boi kha kiei na kirawkhawm, iti kha nangijet.
Khan kavakkir phakhan, makha athoi le kawrawkhawmna rang, ijar a kieshier kha niei`in ah nangitet boi maw nih?’
“Khan iedieng ah ading hai dieng khan ama na ruti, ‘Mina kha ama ah put ah loi u tana, mina shawm anieipa dieng khan peh u roh.’
(Khan ama dieng ruti uh, ‘Pumi, ama na mina shawm niei joi.’)
‘Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, aniei mi rikip dieng arawpdet a pek rangnih, khan aniei boi ama dieng khan, inieidakshe kha, loi pe rangnih.
Khan kiei hi amani chung a reng iniminit jawt boi narahapui hai kha hin vak chawi u tana kamaikung hin that u roh.’ ”
Khan Jesu na hihaihi ruriei shole, ama`awm Jerusalem tieng rushe joi.
Khan hitihin ruawm, ama na Olivet iti Lawn ah awm Bethphage le Bethany vak shokdeng phakhan, akhaichawi hai pasha `di kha tir a ruti,
“Nangni na vararashan kho khawn she u roh. Makhawn lut u tana tute na ishutna boilai ranngam acha remet `khat ruthung a awm nangmuk u rangnih. Makha thut u tana vak chawi u roh.
Khan tukhat na ‘Ijar a nangithut u maw nih?’ tia nawrawdawn u joiatu, ‘Pumi na rangai,’ tia mashang u roh.”
Khan tir miring hai kha na rushe ua, amani dieng iruti dungjuia vak muk uh.
Khan amani na ruthut u phakhan, upum hai kha na amani dieng ruti uh, “Ijar a ranngam acha remet kha nangithut u maw nih?”
Amani na rumashang uh, “Ajarla Pumi na mahi rangai.”
Makha Jesu dieng ruchawi uh, khan ranngam acha remet chung khan pon rumukhu ua, ama chung khan Jesu kha rumushut u joi.
Khan ashe le roroia, opon u hai kha lamlien khan rupha uh.
Ama na Olive Lawn ah put ah lam chiengbai kha vak dep phakhan, khaichawi hawipui kha na imuk u chonrekhek kholok jarkhan, amani na he rashangtak a ningailam a Pathien kha rumapak uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “ ‘PUMI riming a ajong Rengpa kha rahvantha inih!’ Ravan a lungdamna le lurna kha rashangving nih rosho!”
Mipui kar a awm Pharisee eshen na ama dieng ruti uh, “Oja, nang khaichawi hai khaw rawkawk roh.”
Ama na mashang a ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng kiriei inih, amani khaw a`awmchien u rang a nitjoiatu, lung hai khaw na hawng ra`ai u rangnih.”
Khan ama na khopui kha vak ranai pui a rumuk phakhan, ama chung a rie`ieklam a ruchap.
Ama na ruti, “Von nikho hin nangni na nang lungdamna u rang a kha nangjet uala, thadet rangnih! Inia nang mik uah put ah rethesho joi.
Nang narahapui hai na ramun kon a inahieichipna u le khan shie kholok a ine`epna u rang a pha kha jong rangnih joi.

Khan nangni kha nang nai hai le pieipak chung ah nawrawnawi u rangnih. Khan lung hai kha akhat chung ah akhat rotho `khatshe mah u naw nih, ajarla Pathien na inojongphakna u pha kha nangni na rujet u makche.”
Khashole ama na riethiengmun ah rulut a kha mun ah ajor le rawchawh hai kha anawt ruput joi.
Khan ama na ruti, “Hitihin rumiejiek, ‘Ki`in hi nikna in inih,’ inia nangni na mahi ‘minieisho hai koh’ nangmachang u joi.’ ”
Khan ama na riethiengmun khan ningthingkip mi ruruchuk a ruawm. Thiempu ulien hai, danoja hai, khan lamkai hai kha na ama kha thatna rang, lam rutawk u joi.
Inia amani na thawnathiei lam kha rumuh u mak, ajarla ama chawng rangai hai kholok na ama chawng kha mulungluttak a rurangai uh.
Khan hitihin ruawm, nikhat hin Jesu na riethiengmun ah miring hai kha ruruchuk a athachawng rushemlai khan, thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na, shierulien hai le lawp `khat a, ama kha rurodoi pui uh.
Amani na riei a, ruti uh, “Ih cham nanginiei a hihaihi nangithaw maw nih? Ninawkle, hihaihi nangthawnathiei rang, tu na cham inurupek maw nih?”
Amani dieng mashang a ruti, “Kiei na`awm nangni dieng chawng `khat nawrawdawn u rawng, khan kiei dieng namashang u roh:
John na baptisma imoloi kha ravan ah put ah maw nih, ninawkle miring hai ah put ah ajong maw nih?”
Amani khatlekhat na rureshe ua ruti uh, “Kieini na ‘Ravan ah put ah keng,’ niti u joiala, ‘Ijar a ama kha takanangishawn boi u maw nih?’ niti rangnih.
Inia kieini na ‘Miring ah put ah keng,’ niti u joiala, mi kholok na kieini hi lung le nedeng u rangnih. Ajarla amani na John hi thiempulien `khat keng, iti hi takarushawn uh.”
Khajarkhan ama kha ih ah put ah ajong maw nih, iti kha jet u mi`ing, tia rumashang uh.
Khan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na`awm hihaihi ih cham le kithaw maw nih, iti kha nangni dieng nieriei u naw ning.”
Khan ama na amani dieng mahi rangshim hi ariei ruput joi: “Miring `khat na drakha rohon `khat hi rurohon a loithaw miring hai dieng rupek joi. Khan ama na pha shawttak rang khan khomijin rushe joi.
Khan pha hawng shok phakhan, drakha rohon ah put ah ara kha loina rang, oshok `khat hi loithaw hai dieng rutir joi. Inia loithaw hai kha na jemjem ua, khut rokpet a ama kha rumikir uh.
Khan ama na shok shik `khat rutirret. Makha`awm maimawk roitak a rujem u shole, khut rokpet a rumikir uh.
Khan takthar a athum changna kha rutir a makha`awm shebe rupek ua rupai uh.
“Makhan drakha rohon pumi kha na ruti, ‘Kiei na imaw thaw ning? Kunumpoktak kashapa hi kiei na tir rang kanih joi. Ama hi rumuk u phakhan, richit rupek u awm jawt.’
“Inia loithaw hai kha na ama kha rumuk u phakhan, khatlekhat na reshe a ruti uh, ‘Ama hi koklo kha inih. Inkoklo hi natah u changna rang, ama hi that u rang rawi.’
Khan drakha rohon ah put ah rupai ua ama kha ruthat u joi. Khanitala drakha rohon pumpa kha na amani kha imaw lawt nih?
Ama na she ning, tia loithaw hai kha vak mathang rangnih, khan drakha rohon kha shik miring hai dieng pek rangnih.” Amani na rurangai u phakhan ruti uh, “Makha nihet mak!”
Khan Jesu na amani kha en a ruti, “ ‘Inthaw hai na iruenda u lung kha kik ah runiei lung kha ruchang,’ tia irumiejiek kha imaw itina?
Makha lung chung a acho ama kha leklek a koi rangnih. Tunita`awm ichona miring kha rawnawi ning, tia vaiphin rachangmashak rangnih.”
Khalaitak khan danoja hai le thiempu ulien hai na ama chung a khut rujawn jawt uh. Ajarla rangshim kha amani ikapna a iruriei keng, iti kha amani na rujet uh.
Khajarkhan ama chawngriei ah put ah shurna rang, ranakniei dieng le chamniei rampo dieng pekna rang, amani na ama kha ruva uh. Khan midik rasha a mitinta hai kha rutir uh.
Khan amani na rawdawn a ruti uh, “Oja, thaning a nangriei khan nang ruchuk, iti kieini na kejet uh, khan nang na enshietenlar thaw makche, inia Pathien lam kha adik a mi nangruchuk.
Caesar dieng khaichana pek hi Dan maw nih, ninawkle dan nih boi maw nih?”
Khan Jesu na amani hongthaw kha rujet pe a amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a kiei hi ennanginerete u maw nih?
Dinari kha kiei dieng numumuk u roh. Mahi na tu rilim le tu khetmiejiek maw ieniei?” Khan amani na rumashang uh, “Caesar.”
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Khanitatu Caesar tah hai kha Caesar dieng peh u roh, khan Pathien tah kha Pathien dieng peh u roh.”
Khan vanoi maikung khan ama chawngriei a rumocho ngam u mak. Kha ruhut a ama chawng mashang khan shindawngna runiei ua ruawmchien u joi.
Khan thoiretna awm mak ati Sadducee eshen na ama kha vak jawng uh, khan rurawdawn uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Oja, Moses na kieini dieng rumiejiek, makhala ulienpa `khat na nai niei boi a thi joiatu, ulienpa chi mothoina rang, ulienpa inkonu kha anaipangpa na iloi rang a shok.
Poro shiri ruawm uh. Akhat changna kha na inruniei a nainiei boi a ruthi joi.
Khan adi changna kha na nupangnu kha runiei a nai niei boi a ruthi joi.
Khashole athum changna kha na ama kha ruloi. Kha le ra`angre a poro shiri hai kha nai niei boi a ruthi u joi.
Dawngkhit a nupangnu kha`awm ruthi joi.
Thoiretna khan nupangnu kha tu inkonu maw chang nih? Ajarla ama kha poro shiri kha na iruniei u inih.”
Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Inniei iti hi mahi rong hai rang a inih.
Inia ajong rang a rong hin tu, kha nih naw nih. Ajarla athi ah put ah thoiretna rang a rutuk amani rang tu innieina, iti awmlai naw nih.
Amani na thit, iti niei u lai naw nih, ajarla amani kha ravantir hai kha le ra`ang u rangnih. Thoiretna nai hai kha chang u jarkhan, Pathien nai hai kha nih u joi.
Athi ah put ah hawng thoina jar hin Mosesshe na`awm rampabuk chungchanga irumiejiekna khan ruriei joi. Kha pha khan ama na Pumi kha ‘Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien khan Jacob Pathien,’ tia rukoi.
Khan ama hi athi miring hai Pathien nimak a aring miring hai Pathien kha inih. Ajarla mi kholok na ama dieng khan ring a awm inih.”
Khan danoja eshen na mashang a ruti uh, “Oja, thatak a nangriei joi.”
Khashole tute na ama dieng chawng rurawdawn ngam u lai mak.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Itia Christa hi David Shapa keng iti u maw nih?
Ajarla Lah khan David amatak na ‘PUMI na kupumi dieng ieriei,
“Nang rahapui hai kha nang kekhawng kamachang malalim, kukhut chang tieng hin shuh roh.” ’
Khajarkhan David na ama kha ‘Pumi’ iti. Iti dan a ama kha ashapa achang maw nih?”
Miring hai kholok ijet a ama na akhaichawi hai dieng ruti,

“Ponrosho rieshiei alawn jawt, khan rievieithawna mun ah mi na richit ipek adit, khan synagogue hai khan shutna runieiving kha aloh jawt, khan bumichinna hai khan mi matonkhit ah shutna rang, adit danoja hai kha riring pui u roh.
Amani na mieirawng hai nieilelung kha ikhawreng pe u inih, khan amalang rangbak khan nikna mieshiei uh. Amani na chawngshatna aliendet kha rawtawng pui u rangnih.”
Khashole Jesu na khongrunga a rawchawng miring hai na nieibawmna khan amani khutchawi hai iruthong u kha rumuk.
Khan mieirawng shara `khat na lepton `di iruthong kha`awm ama na rumuk.
Khan ama na ruti, “Kiei na nangni dieng diktak a kiriei inih, mahi mieirawng shara hi na amani kholoknek a arawpdet ithong inih.
Hihai miring hai hi na amani ruphu ah put ah Pathien dieng ipek u inih, inia mahi nupangnu hi na aravatna kar a iniei kholok le iringna rang a kha ipek inih.”
Khan riethiengmun kha idawr a metha lung hai kha le khan khutchawi hai kha le irielien maw nih, tia mi eshen na ruriei u phakhan, ama na ruti,
“Nangimuk u hihai nieinak hai rang hin nikho jong rangnih, makha pha khan akhat chung ah akhat rotho achim boi a imak lung `khatshe awm naw nih.”
Khan amani na rawdawn a ruti uh, “Oja, khanitala hihaihi itik a maw shok nih? Khan hihaihi shok rangnih, iti jetna kha imaw nih nih?

Khan ama na ruti, “Nangni kha nomohonna boi u rang, riring u roh. Ajarla ‘Ama kha kiei kanih,’ khan ‘Apha kha jong nai joi,’ tia kiriming a mi tampui va u rangnih.’ Khajarkhan amani anu kha jui u naw roh.
Khan nangni na ra le ramuruk nangjet u phakhan, rawthawk u naw roh. Ajarla hihaihi akhat changna a ashokngir rang a inih, inia dawng kha tu nirelen naw nih.”
Khashole amani dieng ruriei, “Phung `khat na phung `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih, rengchangna `khat na rengchangna `khat chung a ra thaw rangnih.
Munmun ah nieinu arat shok rangnih, nekleshak hawng tang rangnih, khan railawn hawng rawjawh rangnih, ravan ah put ah chichairoi chon hai le jetna hai kha jong shok rangnih.

Inia hihai kholok shok mala khan nangni kha khut numuchutna u rangnih, khan epshawna nepek u rangnih. Synagogue hai dieng nepek u ning, tia lungroko shung ah nothong u rangnih. Nangni kha kiriming jarbak khan reng hai le rampo hai maikung a nawchawi u rangnih.
Makha nang kungchangna u `khat chang rangnih.
Khajarkhan nangimashang u rang a kha rashamjerna boi rang, nang mulung miding u roh.
Ajarla nere`erpui hai kha na inorodoina pui ngam boi, ninawkle inamakha ngamna boi rang a ner le varna kha nepek u rang kanih.
Khan nangni kha nang nulepa hai, nang uliennai hai, nang inshungkhur, khan nang lawm haishe na nangni kha nomohon u rangnih. Nangni eshen tu nathat u rangnih.
Khan kiriming jar a mi kholok na naraha pui u rangnih.
Khania nang lu uah shampum `khatshe thang naw nih.
Nang doiratna u khan nang ringphuk u hai kha nangman u rangnih.
“Inia Jerusalem kha ramiring hai na iroko u kha nangmuk u phakhan, mahi thangna rang a kha jong nai joi, iti kha jet u roh.

Khashole Judea ah awm miring hai na lawn hai khawn tan u rosho, khan makha khopui shung ah awm hai kha na makha mathan u rosho. Khan khopui vai ah ruawm amani kha na makha khopui shung khan hawng lut u naw rosho.
Ajarla irumiejiek kholok kha hawng rupumna rang, hihaihi ruhutthungna nikho hai kha inih.
Makha pha khan naivawng nupang hai le nairunu peh hai rang idawr a khawk rang a maw nih naw! Ajarla rieliei chung a mulung koina alien le lunghangna hai hi miring hai chung a awm rangnih joi.
Amani kha chemjam mawr khan cho u rangnih, khan phung rikip dieng shurmi chang u rangnih. Khan Phungshik hai pha kha hawng rupum masheng, Phungshik hai na Jerusalem kha terchawp a thaw u rangnih.
“Ni, tha, khan arshi hai dieng jetna awm rangnih, khan rieliei chung a awm phung hai dieng phairavaina hawng awm rangnih, khan thampui le tuirawnawng miri khan mulung rakakna kha hawng awm rangnih.
Khan manmieshie chung a chichairoi a rahvan shietna ajong rang a hai jar hin miring tampui hai lungar kha chekrachai rangnih, ajarla ravan ranak hai kha rawnawk rangnih joi.
Khan Miring Shapa kha ranak le lurna alientak `khat le romiei chung ah ajong kha amani na muk u rangnih.
Khan hihaihi ashok put phakhan, nang ring rakang u tana en u roh. Ajarla nang rekhekna u rang a kha jong nai joi.”
Khan amani dieng rangshim `khat ruriei pe uh: “Thieichangkung le thingkung hai kholok kha en u roh.
Amani na dawn hawng mawchawr u phakhan, kholum kha hawng nai joi, iti kha en u tana nang nining ua jet u roh.
Khan nangniawm hihai ashok hi nangmuk u phakhan, Pathien rengchangna kha jong nai joi, iti kha jet u roh.
“Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, hihaihi hawng rupum masheng, hi rong hi shukhek a hek naw nih.
Ravan le rieliei hi hek rangnih, inia kawchawng hai hi tu shukthang a thang naw nih.
“Nangni riring u roh. Khanawkatu rekhe a aneh, jukhawp khan ringkho ditrekhena kha le nang mulung u hai kha pokrik chang rangnih. Khan makha Nikho khan ring boipet a nangni dieng jong rangnih.
Ajarla makha, lim ang a, rieliei chung a awm miring kholok dieng jong rangnih.
Riring jawnjai u roh. Ashok rang a kholok chon hai ah put ah nang rekhena u rang le Miring Shapa maton a nangdingna u rang, nikna niei u roh.”
Khan Jesu na nishun a riethiengmun khan miruruchuk a awm, khan jan a Olivet iti Lawn khan janpha meshena rang, ruhawng.
Khan mi kholok na riethiengmun khan ama chawngriei rangai rang, jingkara ama dieng rushe uh.
Khan Rakanna iti Chawjawboi Rohoi kha hawng nai joi.
Thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai na Jesu kha thatna rang, muruk a lam rutawk u joi, ajarla amani na miring hai kha ruchih uh.
Khashole Iscariot iti Judas shung khan Satan hawng lut joi. Ama kha shawmlieidi kar a akhat runih.
Ama na rushe a thiempu ulien hai le riethiengmun shipai hai le itia maw amani dieng Jesu kha jornathiei rang, tia chawngruriei pui joi.
Khan amani kha ningrungai pe uh, khan ama dieng shier pek rang, rujawt u joi.
Khan ama na rujawt a mipui boriethiei jorna rang, chanthatna rutawk joi.
Rakanna kengam thatna rang a Chawjawboi Tan Nikho kha hawng shok joi.
Khan Jesu na Peter le John kha rutir a ruti, “Rakanna kha nashakna u rang, she u tana vak rasham u roh.”
Khan amani na ruti uh, “Mahi rang hi khoshekawt ah maw nangnarashammashak jawt uh?”
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Enro, nangni na khopui shung khawn nanglut u phakhan, tuibe ruput miring `khat nangmuk u rangnih. Ama lutna in khan jui u roh.
Khan in pumpa dieng ti u roh, ‘Ojapa na nang dieng iti, “Kakhaichawi hai le Rakanna kishakna u rang a indan kha khoshekawt ah maw nih?” ’
Khan rielienjiek chungindan alien `khat numumuk u rangnih, kha mun khan rasham u roh.”
Khan amani na rushe ua ama na iruriei kha ang a, vak rawtawng pui uh, khan amani na Rakanna kha rurasham u joi.
Apha kha hawng shok phakhan, ama na tirtawn shawmlieidi kha le tebol khan rushuh joi.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na shawna kodoi mala hin mahi Rakanna hi nangni le kashak jawtngir.
Nangni dieng kiriei inih, ajarla Pathien rengchangna khan rupum masheng, mahi kiei na shalai naw ning.”
Khan hai kha ruloi a mapakna runiei, khan ruti, “Nangni na mahi loi u tana shem u roh.
Ajarla nangni dieng kieriei inih, tun ah put ah kiei na drakha tui hi Pathien rengchangna kha jong masheng, nelai naw ning.”
Khashole ama na tan kha ruloi a Pathien kha rumapak, khan rukhoi. Khan amani dieng rupek a ruti, “Mahi nangni dieng a peksha kupum kha inih. Kiei hi mininghepna rang, mahi thaw u roh.”
Kha le ra`ang a, amani na rushak u shole, hai kha ruloi a ruti, “Mahi hai hi nangni rang a along kithishen jar a rawjawtna `thar kha inih.
Inia enro, kiei najorpa khut kha tebol chung ah kiei le awm joi.
Ajarla Miring Shapa kha irumuchuksha dungjuia ashe rang a inih, inia ama ajorpa rang khan idawr a khawk maw nih naw!”
Khan hihai athaw rang a pa hi tumaw nih, tia khatlekhat dieng rurawdawn uh.
Khan amani kar a alienving, tia imining u kha tumaw nih, iti chungchanga chawngrieshietna `khatawm rumothoi uh.
Khajarkhan amani dieng ruti, “Phungshik hai reng hai na amani kha adek a pumi chang, khan amani chung a pumi chang hai kha chon atha thaw hai kha iti uh.
Khania nangni tu kha nih u makche. Kha ruhut a nang kar ua alienving ama kha nang kar ua naipangving `khat a awm rosho, khan lamkai ama kha na shepding kha a ang rang a shok.
Ajarla tebol ah bunepa le shepding kar khan tumaw aliendet? Tebol ah bunepa kha nimak maw? Inia kiei tu nang kar ua shepding `khat a ka`awm.
Khania kiei na enretena a ka`awmlai khan kiedieng a rephet boi a nangawm uh.
Khan kapa na kiei dieng rengchangna `khat kha inurupek kha ang a, kiei na nangni dieng kinepek u inih.
Makha nangni na kerengchangna a awm tebol khan nangnek nangshakna u rang le nangni na rengmun a shuh a Israel phung shawmlieidi kha chawngnangshatna pe u rang a inih.”
Khan Pumi na ruti, “Simon, Simon! Satan na nangni kha gehu ang a mashap rang nadit u joi.
Inia nang takashawn kha rehena boi rang, nikna kieniei joi. Khan kiei dieng nangvakkir phakhan, nang uliennai hai kha ranak peh roh.”
Khan Simon na ama dieng ruti, “Pumi, lungroko shung ah le thitna rangshe khan kiei rasham kanih.”
Khania Jesu na rumashang, “Peter, kiei na nang dieng kiriei inih, nanginejet hi voithum nangraphat pui masheng, von nikho hin arkhawng na khong naw nih.”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Kiei na nangni kha shierkawk boi a, pai boi a, khan kekawk boi a kunurutir u lai khan, nangravatna u imaw awm?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Ravatna `khatshe runiei u mi`ing.”
Ama na amani dieng ruti, “Inia tuntu shierkawk le pai kha rawshawng pui u rang roh. Khan chemjam aniei boi ama kha na ponledier kha jor rieshie akhat rawchawh rosho.
Ajarla nangni dieng a kiriei hi inih, irumiejiek kha kuchung a rupumngir rang a inih: ‘Ama kha danishawnboi miring hai kha le techen nih joi.’ Ajarla kuchungchanga irumiejiek kha rupum joi.”
Khan amani na ruti uh, “Pumi, enro, hin chemjam `di awm.” Khan amani dieng ruti, “Makha hun joi.”
Ama na vak shok a eshena dungjuia Olive Lawn ah ruhawng, khan akhaichawi hai na`awm ama kha rujui uh.
Ama na kha mun kha rushok phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Lemna khan nanglutna boi u rang, nikna niei u roh.”
Khan ama na lung `khat vawrna dawr hi rurakai a rukhuk shun a runik.
Ama na ruti, “Aw kapa, nang ningmuruk kha nitjoiatu, hai hi kiei ah put ah noloi pe roh, khanikengta kumulungmining kha nimak a nang mulungmining kha nih rosho.”
Khan ravantir na ama dieng rular a ama kha ranak rupek.
Khan ama na enchak a nikna runiei. Khan ama shawna kha lienhai a ahu kha thishen na pieipak ah lawmlawm a acho kha ruang pe.
Ama na inikna ah put ah hawng thoi a akhaichawi hai dieng rushe phakhan, mulungshaw a aja a ruawm u kha vak muk.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Iloia ja maw nangnih uh? Lemna khan nangchona boi u rang, thoi u tana nikna niei u roh.”
Ama na chawng riei a ruawmlai khan, jetboithieiboi a mipui kha va joi. Khan khaichawi shawmlieidi kar a Judas iti ama kha na lamvakkai pe a Jesu kha iebieng a tumna rang, ama kha rujawng joi.
Inia Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Judas, Miring Shapa kha bieng tum pe a nangijor rang a maw nih?”
Khan Jesu dieng ah awm hai kha na, ashok rang a kha muk u phakhan, ruti uh, “Pumi, amani khaw chem le maw tuk u rang ning?”
Khashole amani hai kar a akhat na thiempu rashang shok `khat rutuk a, achang tieng ah nokor kha rutan pe joi.
Khan Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Khashe kha nih rang rosho.” Khan onokor kha rushit pe a rumadam pe joi.

Khashole Jesu na ama dieng ava thiempu ulien hai le riethiengmun shipai hai, khan ama dieng ava lamkai hai dieng ruti, “Kiei hi minieisho miring `khat ang a ashur rang chemjam le mawbawng rak a ava maw nangnih uh?
Kiei na riethiengmun ah nangni le ningthingkip ka`awm, inia nang khut nurujawnna u makche. Inia mahi nangni rang a pha kha nih joi, khan mahi cham ajing kha inih.”
Khan ama kha rushur u phakhan, amani na rushe pui ua, thiempu rashang in khan ruchawi u joi. Khan Peter na ralaviei a anu rujui.
Amani na tolawng khan miei muchuk ua lawp `khat a rushuh u phakhan, Peter na amani kar khan rushuh.
Khan shok nungak `khat na Peter kha miei iru`u a awm kha rumuk phakhan, ruenrep a ama dieng ruti, “Mahi miringpa hiawm Jesu le rawtawp `khat inih.”
Inia ama chung a rapha a ruti, “Nupang, kiei na ama hi jet mi`ing.”
Khan awmbawt `le shik `khat miring na ama kha rumuk a ruti, “Nangawm amani hai kar a akhat nangnih.” Inia Peter na ruti, “Miringpa, kiei nimi`ing.”
Khan nidan `khat dawr hi rakar le miring `khat hi na eplam a ruti, “Diktak a mahi miringpa hiawm ama le rawtawp miring `khat inih, ajarla ama hi Galilee miring `khat inih.”
Inia Peter na ruti, “Miringpa, nangiriei kha imaw nih, iti kiei jet mi`ing.” Ama na chawng ruriei a awmlaitak khan, arkhawng na hawng khawng joi.
Makhan Pumi na vak hiei a Peter dieng ruen. Khan Jesu na ama dieng a iruriei chawng kha Peter na hawng mininghep, makhala “Arkhong na khong mala, kuchung a voithum nangrapha rangnih.”
Khan Peter na vai rushok a rie`ieklam a ruchap joi.
Khan Jesu apana miring hai kha na ama kha engshiet a ajem ruput u joi.
Amani na imik rushing pe uh, khan amai ah ruben ua chawng rurawdawn uh, “Nang anaben hi tumaw nih? Rophong roh!”
Khan ama chung a mieshietna chawng tampui ruriei uh.
Khan kho hawng varphit `le, miring lamkai hai, thiempu ulien hai khan danoja hai kha na amani Sanhedrin khan Jesu kha ruchawi u joi. Amani na ruti uh,
“Nang Christa kha nangnih a tu, nieriei u roh.” Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na kieriei a awm nangni na takashawn u naw tinih.
Khan kiei na chawng kawnawrawdawn u joiatu, nangni na namashang u naw tinih, khan nomoshok u naw tinih.
Inia von ah put ah Miring Shapa na ranakniei Pathien chang tieng shuh rangnih joi.”
Khan kholok na rurawdawn uh, “Khanitala nang Pathien Shapa kha maw nangnih?” Khan ama na ruti, “Kiei kanih, iti kha nangnitak na nangti u joi.”
Khan amani na ruti uh, “Kungchangna dawnshe tawkna rang irangai maw nilai? Ajarla kieinitak na ama ner a narangai u joi.”
Mipui kha na ruthoi ua Jesu kha Pilate dieng ruchawi u joi.
Khan amani na ama kha mieshiet ruput ua ruti uh, “Mahi miringpa hi na nuphung u hi pawrmechet joi. Nining a Christa le Reng kha kanih, tia Caesar dieng a pek rang a khaichana kha irumakha inih.”
Khan Pilate na ama kha rawdawn a ruti, “Nang Jihudi hai Reng kha maw nangnih?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Nangiti kha inih.”
Khan Pilate na thiempu ulien hai le mipui dieng ruti, “Mahi miring dieng hin kiei na shietna muk pe mi`ing.”
Inia amani na eplam a ruti uh, “Ama na Judea kholok, khan Galilee ah put ah hi munshe hin miruchuh a mimuchun joi.”
Galilee iban u kha Pilate na rujet phakhan, miring kha Galilee miring maw nih, tia rurawdawn.
Khan ama na Herod ramroko shung a awm keng, iti kha rujet phakhan, Herod dieng rutir joi. Khalaikhan Herod kha Jerusalem ah ruawm.

Herod na Jesu kha rumuk phakhan, ajeng a ningrungai pe. Ajarla ama na Jesu kha phashawttak khan irumuk jawt inih. Ajarla ama na Jesu chungchanga chawng tampui rujet. Khan ama na jetna dikhat ithaw rang a kha rumuk jawt.
Khan ama na Jesu kha chawng tampui rurawdawn, inia `khatshe rumashang mak.
Ading thiempu ulien hai le danoja hai kha na ranaktak a rumieshiet uh.
Khan Herod na ama ramiring hai kha le jak rupek, khan engshiet a ruthaw. Khan pon cheklak rurieshieimashak a Pilate dieng rumikir joi.
Kha nikhotak khan Herod le Pilate kha lawmpa chang u joi, ajarla matienglai tu khatlekhat raha miring runih uh.
Khan Pilate na thiempu ulien hai, lamkai hai, khan miring hai kha rukoi a,

amani dieng ruti, “Hi miring hi, miring lamrehemashak `khat a nangni na kiei dieng nangivakchawi u inih. Khan enro, nang maikung ua kiei na ama hi enkereteviek a, mahi miring chung a nangimieshiet u khan rehena `khatshe muk pe mi`ing.
Herod na`awm rumuk pe mak. Khan enro, ama na thitna rang a rutuk shietna kha ih ruthaw mak.
Khajarkhan kiei na ama hi shawna pek a moshok rang kanih joi”
(Ajarla ama na rohoi hin miring `khat irumoshokngai inih).
Inia mipui kholok na lawp a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Mahi miring hi that tana kieini rang Barabbas kha moshok roh.”
Amapa kha khopui shung ah ramothoi a mithat jar a lungroko shung ah irukhum inih.
Inia Pilate na Jesu kha moshok jawt jarkhan, amani dieng chawng rurieiret.
Inia amani na ra`ai a ruti uh, “Ama kha cross ah that roh, ama kha cross ah that roh!”

Inia voithum changna khan amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a maw, mahi miring hi na ashie ih maw thaw joi? Kiei na ama chung a thitnathiei rang a jar muk pe mi`ing, khajarkhan kiei na ama hi shawna pek a moshok rang kanih joi.”
Inia amani na he rashangtak a ama kha cross ah thatna rang, shairuep uh. Khan amani le thiempu ulien hai he kha na derumukhu joi.
Khajarkhan Pilate na amani nikna kha chon a meshena rang, mulung rumiding joi.
Khan ama na ra mothoi jar a le mithat jar a lungroko shung ah thong ama kha rumoshok a Jesu kha amani idit dungjuia rupek joi.
Khan amani na iruchawi u le roroia, Simon iti Cyrene miring `khat, khote ah put ah hawng kirna hin, cross kha rangrat a rumuphung ua, Jesu anuk a rumawlawn uh.
Khan mipui hawi `khat na ama anuk a rujui uh, khan amani kar a nupang hai na mulungkur a ama kha ruchap pui uh.
Inia Jesu na amani dieng hiei a ruti, “Jerusalem shanu hai, kuchung a chap u naw roh, nang chung ua le nang nai hai chung a chap u roh.
Ajarla en u roh, ‘Nairong miring hai, naimoshon boi naikawk hai, khan nairunu peh boi runu hai kha rahvanmuh hai kha inih!’ itina u rang a nikho hai kha jong rangnih.
Khashole ‘mo hai dieng “Kuchung uah jongcho roh!” khan lawn hai dieng “Kieini hi nojong mukhu u roh!” ’ ti u rangnih.
Ajarla thingkung kha ringlai khan hihaihi amani na thaw u joiala, makha char phakhan imaw shok nih?”
Khan mithat miring pasha `diawm, ama le that rang, ruchawi uh.
Khan amani na Calvary iti mun kha rushok u phakhan, ama kha cross ah rumakhai u joi. Khan mithat miring hai kha`awm akhat kha chang tieng, khan shik `khat kha viei tieng rumakhai u joi.
Khan Jesu na ruti, “Kapa, amani dieng hin rangaidam peh roh, ajarla amani na ithaw u hi ijet boi u inih.” Khan ama ponledier hai kha shemna rang, vanmuk ruen uh.
Khan miring hai kha na ding a ruen uh. Khan rampo hai kha na engchawng a ruti uh, “Ama na shik miring hai kha rushan, miringpa hi Pathien na imadan Christa kha nitjoiatu, nining a rashan rosho.”
Khan ramiring hai kha na`awm vak jawng ua engshiet a rubiek uh, khan ama kha ju athur kha rumenek uh.
Khan amani na ruti uh, “Nang Jihudi hai Reng kha nangnih a tu, nang nining a rashan roh.”
Khan ama chung khan Greek, Latin khan Hebrew chawng a khetmiejiek `khatawm rumiejiek: MAHI JIHUDI HAI RENG KHA INIH.
Makhan ah akhai mithat hai kar a akhat na ama kha mieshiet a ruti, “Nang Christa kha nangnih a tu, nang nining a rashan roh, khan kieini hiawm nashan u roh.”
Shik `khat kha na mashang a rawkawklam a ruti, “Chawngshatna khatte a nangawm hin Pathien kha chih makche maw?
Ajarla kieini na niruthaw u kha le rutukthep a chawngshatna kha nimuk u inih, inia mahi miring hi na rehena ih ruthaw mak.”
Khan ama na Jesu dieng ruti, “Aw Pumi, nang rengchangna a nanghawng phakhan, kiei hi nimininghep roh.”
Khan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, von nikho hin paradise khan kiei le nangawm rangnih.”
Khan nidan shawmlieidi ah put ah nidan `thum dawrshe hin ajing kha na rieliei kholok jong mukhu joi.
Khan ni kha na jing phakhan, riethiengmun maikharpon kha alaitak a jong rether joi.
Khashole Jesu na he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Kapa, ‘nang khut chung a karatha hi kenepek joi.’ ” Khan mahi ruti shole, arang ruchat joi.
Khan rarajakhat lamkai kha na ashok chon hai kha rumuk `le, Pathien kha mapak a ruti, “Diktak a mahi miring hi midik `khat inih.”
Khan aen rang a vak ruchun mipui kha na ashok chon hai kha rumuk u phakhan, mulung teilam a rukir uh.
Khan ama le rejet hai, khan Galilee ah put ah ivakrawtawp pui nupang hai kha na ralaviei a ding a hihaihi ruen uh.
Khan Joseph iti lamkai miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha mitha le midik `khat runih.
Ama na amani chonrashak le chonmeshe khan rujawt mak. Ama kha Jihudi hai kho Arimathea ah put ah inih. Ama na Pathien rengchangna kha ngak a ruawm inih.
Mahi miringpa hi na Pilate dieng rushe a, Jesu rok kha vak nik.
Khan ama na cross ah put ah jong muchum a ponramasha le rujo joi. Khan tute na ijana boilai lung chung ah iver than khan vak maja joi.
Makha nikho kha Rashamna Nikho kha runih, khan Sabbath nikho kha putdeng nih joi.
Khan Galilee ah put ah ivat puishom a ama anu ivakjui nupang hai kha na thanmun ah ama rok itet dan kha vak muk uh.
Khan amani na vak kir ua, rieipartui manamhoi kha vak rasham uh. Khan chawngpek dungjuia amani na Sabbath nikho khan shawrumuchum u joi.
Khan hapta shung a akhat changna nikho jingkara hin, amani na irasham u rieipartui hai kha ruchawi ua, thanmun khan rushe uh.
Amani na lung kha than ah put ah rurechen kha vak muk uh.
Amani na rulut u phakhan, Pumi Jesu rok kha vak muh u lai mak.
Amani na hi chungchang hin shindawngna runiei u lai khan, enro, miring pasha `di na poncheklak rieshiei a amani dieng khan ruding uh.
Nupang hai kha rurawthawk ua, pieipak tieng rubu uh, khan ravantir `di kha na amani dieng ruti, “Ijar a nangni na aring miring kha athi miring hai kar a nangitawk u maw nih?
Ama kha hin awmlai mak, inia ruthoi joi! Ama na Galilee ah awmlai a nangni dieng iruriei kha mininghep u roh.
Jesu na ruti, ‘Miring Shapa kha munu miring hai dieng pekngir a cross ah that rang a inih. Khan ni `thum changna khan hawng thoiret rangnih.’ ”
Khan amani na ama iruriei hai kha rumininghep uh.
Khan amani na than ah put ah rukir ua, khaichawi shawmlieikhat dieng le lawpsheng u dieng thang vak koi u joi.
Tirtawn hai dieng chawng vak riei hai kha Mary Magdalene le Joanna, James unu Mary, khan amani le rawtawp hai kholok kha runih uh.
Inia tirtawn hai maikung khan hihai chawng hi chawngtawt ruang pe uh, khan amani kha takarushawn u mak.
Inia Peter na ruthoi a thanmun tieng khan rutan. Khan butlam a ruen a ponramasha ranga kha shikjek a vak muk. Khashole ashok chon chungchang khan ishindawng le roroia rukir joi.
Khan enro, kha nikhotak khan miring pasha `di na Emmaus iti kho `khat ah khomijin rushe uh. Makha Jerusalem ah put ah majin shiri dawr runih.
Amani na ashok chon hihai kholok chungchanga rieilam a rulawn uh.
Amani na roiruriei u lai khan, Jesu amatak na amani kha vak ranai pui a amani le rusheshom joi.
Inia ama kha tumaw nih, iti kha amani dieng rumejet maklai.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Nanglawnlam ua ih chawng maw nangiriei uh?” Amani na mulungshaw maisho kha le ruding uh.
Khan Cleopas iti akhat na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hirachang a Jerusalem ah ashok chon hai hi ajet boi milak hi nang ranga maw nangnih?”
Khan ama na ruti, “Ih chon maw ashok?” Khan amani na ruti uh, “Pathien maikung a le miring kholok maikung a chon a le chawng a ranak aniei Thiempulien `khat, Nazareth Jesu,
thiempu ulien hai le karampo hai na ama kha iruheng ua thitna rang, irupekna u le cross ah ama kha iruthatna u awmchan jar a inih.
Inia kieini rang la ama kha Israel akhek rang a kangakmining u `khat kha runih. Inia hihai kholok hi khea ashok chon hi von a hi le ni `thum changna nih joi.
Khatekha niboia, nupang eshen na`awm kieini hi shindawngna nurupek uh. Amani na jingkara hin thanmun khan rushe uh.
Khan amani na ama rok kha muk boi u phakhan, ama kha ring joi, tia amani dieng a ariei ravantir hai kha mulungmik a kumuk u, tia vak riei uh.
Kieini le awm eshen na`awm thanmun ah rushe u phakhan, nupang hai iriei kha ang a vak muk uh, inia ama kha vak muh u mak.”
Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Aw mimawng hai, thiempulien hai na iruriei hai kha takashawn rang khan ajeng a nangmatatmashak uh!
Christa na hihai kholok shawna hi idoi a lurna shung khan alut rang a kha irangai boi maw nih?”
Khan Moses ah put ah Thiempulien hai kholokshe khan, amatak chungchang khan Miejiek rikip ah irumeler inih.
Amani na tungna u rang a kho kha vak ranai pui u phakhan, ama na ala shok rang a rasha a amani kha rukhe joi.
Makhan amani na ama kha khap a ruti uh, “Kieini le awm rang roh, ajarla khohawngromo joi, khan nikho hi mawtawrdeng joi.” Khajarkhan ama na kho khan rulut a amani le rurangah joi.
Khan ama na tebol ah rushuh phakhan, tan kha ruloi a rahvan rupek. Khan ama na rukhoi shole, amani dieng rupek.
Makhan amani mik hai kha mavar pe a amani na ama kha merujet u joi, khan amani mik`en ah put ah ruthangkhap joi.
Amani na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Ama na lam ah chawngrurieilai, khan Miejiek rumelerlai khan, numulung u athoi boi maw nih?”
Amani na kha phatak khan thoi ua, Jerusalem tieng vak kir u joi. Khan khaichawi shawmlieikhat, khan amani le awm hai kha mun `khat ah ruruchun u kha amani na vak muk uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Diktak a Pumi kha thoi joi, khan Simon dieng rular joi!”
Khan amani na lam a ashok chon le ama na tan irukhoi a ihawngjetna u awmchan kha amani dieng ruriei uh.
Amani na hihaihi ruriei u lai khan, Jesu na amani kar a ruding a amani dieng ruti, “Lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.”
Amani kha chihai a rurawnawk uh, khan amani na ratha imuk u `khat a rumining uh.
Khan amani dieng ruti, “Iloia nang mulung u kha raha maw nih? Iloia nang mulung ua rakhana athoi maw nih?
Kukhut le keke hai hi vak en u roh, kieitak kanih keng. Nishih u tana en u roh, ajarla kiei na kiniei nangimuk u hi ang a, ratha na taksha le ru niei mak.”
Khan ama na mahi ruriei shole, ama khut le ke hai kha amani dieng rumumuk.
Amani ningai kha na takashawn boi a le shindawnglam a rutetlai khan, Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Mahin nekleshak maw nangniei uh?”
Amani na ngalek roisha le khoining kha ama dieng rupek uh.
Khan amani maikung a loi a makha rushak joi.

Khan amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na nangni le kaw`awmlai khan, hihai chawng hi nangni dieng kiriei inih, Moses Dan, Thiempulien hai le Lah hai khan kajar a irumiejiek hai kholok kha hawng rupumngir rang a inih.”
Khashole amani na Miejiek hai kha jetna rang, amani mulungmining kha ama na rumawlawng pe uh.
Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Hitihin rumiejiek, Christa na shawna kha idoingir rang a inih, khan ni `thum changna khan athi ah put ah hawng thoiret rang a inih.
Khan Jerusalem ah put ah phung kholok dieng ama riming a mulung lekna le munu rangaidamna kha rophong rang a inih.
Hihai chung a kungachang miring kha nangnih uh.
Khan enro, kapa na kiei dieng a chawngirakham kha kiei na nangni dieng jong tir rang kanih. Khania chung ah put ah ranak kha le nangni kha najo u masheng, nangni na mahi Jerusalem hin rungak u roh.”
Khashole ama na amani kha Bethanyshe kha rushe pui, khan ukhut hai kha alawm a amani kha rahvan rupek.
Amani kha rahvan rupeklai khan, Jesu na rurakai a amani ah put ah ravan a ruchawi joi.
Khan amani na ama kha chubairubawk ua, ningai le roroia Jerusalem ah rukir u joi.
Khan amani na riethiengmun khan ningthingkip Pathien mapak a ruawm uh. Amen.
Putna khan Chawng kha ruawm, Chawng kha Pathien le ruawm, khan Chawng kha Pathien runih.
Putna khan ama kha Pathien le ruawm.
Ama na irikip kha rumijir. Khan ama jaw boi a konsha `khatshe ruchangthiei mak.
Ama dieng ringna kha ruawm. Makha ringna kha miring hai rang a mieivar kha runih.
Mieivar kha na jingna mun a avar. Khan ajing kha na makha rumawtawr mak.
Pathien ah put ah tir miring `khat ruawm. Ama riming kha John ruti.
Ama jar a mi kholok na takashawnna rang le Mieivar chungchanga kungchangna rang, kungchangna `khat a ajong runih.
Ama kha Mieivar kha runimak, inia Mieivar chungchanga kungchangna rang a ajong runih.
Ama kha manmieshie shung a ajong mi rikip mavar, adik Mieivar kha runih.
Ama kha manmieshie hin ruawm. Khan ama jar a manmieshie hi irukon inih. Inia manmieshie na ama kha rujet mak.
Ama miringtak hai dieng a ajong runih, khan ama miringtak hai kha na ama kha ruloi u mak.
Khania ama kha iruloi a ama riming a takashawn hai kholok dieng khan, Pathien nai hai changna cham kha rupek.
Amani kha thishen, taksha mulungmining, khan miring mulungmining ah put ah rushok nih u mak, inia Pathien ah put ah shok runih uh.
Khan Chawng kha taksha ruchang a nakar ua ruawm. Apa ah put ah shapa `khatte lurna ang a numpokmirit le adik shipmer, ama lurna kha kieini na numuk u joi.
Ama chungchanga John na kungruchang, khan ama na ra`ai a ruti, “Mahipa chungchanga keng ‘Kanuk a avapa hi kieinek a rashangdet,’ tia kiruriei kha. Ajarla ama kha kamatieng ruawm joi.”
Ama shipna ah put ah nokholok na numpokmirit kha lawmlawm a nurumuk u joi.
Ajarla Dan kha Moses jar a nurupek uh, khan numpokmirit le adik kha Jesu Christa jar a jong inih.
Tute na`awm Pathien kha rumuh maklai. Apa mulungshom a awm Shapa khatte kha na ama kha rumalar joi.
Khan “Tumaw nangnih?” tia rawdawn rang, Jerusalem ah put ah Jihudi hai na thiempu hai le Levi miring hai kha rutir phakhan, John kungchangna kha hi inih:
Ama na ruruphong, khan jawt boi ruthaw mak, inia rurophong, “Kiei hi Christa kha nimi`ing.”
Khania ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Khanitala nang tumaw nangnih? Elijah kha maw nangni?” Khan ama na ruti, “Nimi`ing.” “Thiempulien kha maw nangnih?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Nimi`ing.”
Khashole ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “Nojongtir hai dieng kamashangna u rang, nang tumaw nangnih? Nang nining a tumaw kanih nangti?”
Ama na ruti, “Thiempulien Isaiah na iruriei kha ang a, kiei hi ‘Ramthim ah ra`ai hesho `khat kha kanih: “PUMI lam kha moton pe roh.” ’
Ijongtir miring hai kha Pharisee hai ah put ah runih uh.
Ama dieng rawdawn a ruti uh, “Christa kha nangnih nawk a, Elijah kha nangnih nawk a, khan Thiempulien kha nangnih nawkala, ijar a baptisma nangipek maw nih?”
John na mashang a amani dieng ruti, “Kiei na tui a baptisma kenepek uh, inia nang kar ua miring `khat ading kha jet u makche.
Ama hi keng kanuk a ava rang a kieinek a rashangdet kha, ama kekawkrui thut rangshe kiei rutuk mi`ing.”
Hihaihi John na baptisma irupek a ruawmna Jordan vara ah awm Bethabara ah ashok chon runih.
Jing tieng hin John na ama awmna tieng Jesu ava kha muk a ruti, “Enro! Manmieshie munu achawi Pathien Kengamte khaw!
Ama chungchanga keng kiei na kiruti, ‘Kanuk ah ava miring khaw kieinek a rashangdet, ajarla ama kha kamatieng ruawm joi.’
Kieitak na ama kha rujet mi`ing, inia Israel dieng ama kha larnathiei rang, tui a baptisma apeh jong kanih.”
Khan John na kungchang a ruti, “Ratha na vashu ang a ravan ah put ah jong chum a ama chung ah awm kha kurumuk.

Kiei na ama kha rujet mi`ing, inia tui a baptisma mawthaw rang a nojongtirpa kha na kiei dieng nururiei, ‘Ratha na jong chum a ama chung ah awm nangimukpa kha na keng Ratha Riethieng le baptisma ipek rang a kha.’
Kieitak na kurumuk joi, khan kungkuruchang joi, makhala ama hi Pathien Shapa kha inih.”
Jing tieng hin John na akhaichawi hai idi le ruding a ruawm.
Khan Jesu apang kha muk phakhan, ruti, “Enro, Pathien Kengamte khaw!”
Khaichawi idi na mahi iriei kha rujet u `le, Jesu anu kha rujui u joi.
Jesu na vak hiei a amani na ivakjui u kha rumuk phakhan, amani dieng ruti, “Imaw nangitawk uh?” Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Rabbi” (nemele a niti `le, Oja tina inih), “khoshekawt ah maw nangawm?”
Amani dieng ruti, “Va u tana vak en u roh.” Khan ava ua ama awmna kha vak muk uh, khan khanikhan ama le ruawm u joi. Apha kha nidan shawm dawr runih.
John iriei kha rujet a ama anu rujui hai idi kar a akhat kha Simon Peter naipangpa, Andrew kha runih.
Ama ulienpatak, Simon kha akhat changna a vak muk a ama dieng ruti, “Messiah kha kumuk u joi” (nemele le Christa tina inih).
Ama kha Jesu dieng vat pui phakhan, Jesu na en a ama dieng ruti, “Nang Jonah shapa Simon kha nangnih. Nang hi Cephas tia koi rang a nangnih joi” (nemele le Peter tina inih).
Jing tieng hin Jesu na Galilee ah shena rang, rumawdawn. Khan Philip kha rumuk a ama dieng ruti, “Kanu nujui roh.”
Philip kha Andrew le Peter awmna Bethsaida ah put ah runih.
Philip na Nathanael kha muk a ama dieng ruti, “Moses na Dan shung ah le khan thiempulien hai na`awm ama jar a irumiejiek, Joseph shapa Nazareth Jesu kha kumuk u joi.”
Nathanael na ama dieng ruti, “Nazareth ah put ah atha maw shok nih?” Philip na ruti, “Va tana vak en roh.”
Nathanael na ama dieng ava kha Jesu na rumuk phakhan, ama chungchanga ruti, “Enro, ama dieng milem-midawina awm boi Israel miring diktak `khat khaw!”
Nathanael na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Itia nanginejet maw nih?” Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Nang kha Philip na nurukoi mala a, thieichangkung thoi ah nangruawmlai khan, kunurumuk joi.”
Nathanael na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Rabbi, nang hi Pathien Shapa kha nangnih! Nang hi Israel Reng kha nangnih!”
Jesu na mashang a ruti, “Thieichangkung thoi ah kunurumuk kiti jar a takaninawshawn maw nih? Hinek hin a alien chon hai kha nangmuk rangnih.”
Khan amani dieng ruriei, “Diktak a nangni dieng kiriei inih, tun ah put ah ravan rawlawng le Pathien ravantir hai na Miring Shapa chung ah aka le achum kha nangmuk u rangnih joi.”
Nithum changna khan Galilee ah awm Cana ah moiloina `khat ruawm. Makhan Jesu nuawm ruawm.
Jesu le akhaichawi haiawm moiloina khan rukoi uh.
Ju hawng ravat phakhan, Jesu unu na ama dieng ruti, “Ju niei u lai mak.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nupang, kiei le nang na nithaw rang imaw awm? Kapha kha jong shok maklai.”
Unu kha na shepding hai dieng ruti, “Ama na nangni dieng iti`iti kha thaw u roh.”
Jihudi hai riethiengna dungjuia litre shawm shirilieirahnga ninawkle rajakhat shawmlieirahnga akeng lung baibe `ruk rumiding uh.
Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Baibe hai kha tui miship u roh.” Khan amani na khahaikha rumishipmer uh.
Khan ama na amani dieng ruti, “Tun vak lok u tana shepulien dieng chawi u roh.” Khan amani na ruchawi uh.
Shepulien na ju rachangsha tui kha tuidan ruen phakhan, khoshekawt ah maw nih, iti rujet mak (inia tuilok shepding hai kha na tu rujet uh). Khan shepulien kha na moipa kha rukoi.
Khan ama dieng ruti, “Mi rikip na mashapek a ju athadet eshem, khan khawp phakhan, acham shemngai. Inia ju athadet kha tunshe nangtetlai.”
Jesu na akhat changna ama jetna kha Galilee ah awm Cana ah ruthaw. Khan ama lurna kha rumalar a akhaichawi hai kha na ama kha takarushawn uh.
Khashole unu, anaipang hai, khan akhaichawi hai le Capernaum ah rushe uh. Makhan nikho ashawt ruawm u mak.
Jihudi hai Rakanna kha hawng nai le roroia, Jesu na Jerusalem ah ruhawng joi.
Riethiengmun roko shung khan shiecha hai, kengam hai, pharphali ajor miring hai, khan shierleshier rotho miring hai rushuh u kha vak muk.

Ruiro le jemna rang rukon a riethiengmun roko ah put ah amani kholok kha runawt. Kengam hai le shiecha hai dire, khan shierleshier rotho hai shiernawi hai kha rubun pe a amani tebol hai kha shukthala a rutet pe.
Pharphali ajor miring hai dieng ruti, “Hihaihi hin ah put ah shok pui u roh, kapa in hi rievieithawna in machang u naw roh.”
Irumiejiek kha akhaichawi hai na rumininghep uh, “Nang in rang a ditrangai kha na kiei hi nakang joi.”
Khashole Jihudi hai na mashang a ama dieng ruti uh, “Hihaihi nangthaw jar a kieini dieng jetna imaw numumuk ngam u rawng?”
Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Mahi riethiengmun hi shiet u roh, khan ni `thum shung a kiei na mothoi rang kanih.”
Khashole Jihudi hai na ruti uh, “Mahi in mothoina hin kum shawmmililieiruk rulut, nang na mahi ni `thum shung a mothoi rang maw?”
Inia makha ama pum riethiengmun jar a irurieina inih.
Ama na athi ah put ah hawng thoi shole, iruriei kha akhaichawi hai na rumininghep uh. Khan Miejiek le Jesu na iruriei chawng hai kha takarushawn uh.
Rakanna rohoi shung a ama na Jerusalem ah ruawmlai khan, ama na jetna iruthaw hai kha rumuk u jarkhan, mi tampui na ama riming kha takarushawn uh.
Inia Jesu na tu amani dieng rurepeh mak, ajarla ama na mi kholok kha rujetviek.
Khan ama rang tu tukhat na miring chungchanga kungachang rang a kha rangai pe mak. Ajarla miring mulung shung a awm kha imaw nih, iti kha ama na ijet inih.
Nicodemus iti Pharisee miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha Jihudi hai lamkai `khat runih.
Jan a Jesu dieng ava a ruti, “Rabbi, Pathien ah put ah ajong Oja `khat nangnih, iti kejet uh. Ajarla jetna nangithaw hai hi Pathien na ama dieng awm pui nawkatu tute na thaw ngam naw nih.”
Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, tute na athar a shok joi nawkatu, Pathien rengchangna kha muh ngam naw nih.”
Nicodemus na ama dieng ruti, “Miring `khat na atar phakhan, itia maw shok ngam nih? Unu vawn shung ah lutthep a shok ngam nih maw?”
Jesu na rumashang, “Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, tukhat na tui le Ratha ah put ah shok joi nawkatu, Pathien rengchangna khan lut ngam naw nih.
Taksha ah put ah ashok kha taksha inih, khan Ratha ah put ah ashok kha ratha inih.
Nang dieng ‘Athar a ashokngirret rang nangnih,’ kiti hin shindawngna niei naw roh.

Rithi na iditna mun tieng ajap, khan imiri kha nangjet. Inia khoshekawt ah put ah ahawng a khoshekawt tieng ah ashe maw nih, iti kha jet makche. Hitihin Ratha ah put ah ashok mi rikip kha hi le ra`ang inih.”
Nicodemus na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Hihaihi itia maw nithiei nih?”
Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Nang Israel oja `khat nangnih, inia hihaihi nangijet boi maw nih?
Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, makhala kijet u kha kiriei u inih, khan kimuk u khan kungkachang u inih. Khan nangni na kukungchangna u hi loi u makche.
Rieliei nieinak chungchanga kienieriei u phakhan, nangni na takashawn u makche, itia maw ravan nieinak chungchanga kiriei hin takashawn u rawng?
Ravan ah put ah jong chum ama niboia, ravan a aka tute awm maklai. Makha ravan a awm Miring Shapa kha inih.
Ramthim ah Moses na moro irulawm kha ang a, Miring Shapa kha`awm ilawmngir rang a inih.
Khajarkhan tunita`awm ama takashawn kha na thangna niei naw nih, inia kumshawt ringna kha muk rangnih.
“Pathien na manmieshie hi hitihin numrupok jarkhan, ashapa khatte kha irupek inih. Makha tunita`awm ama takashawn kha na thangna niei boi a kumshawt ringna kha mukna rang a inih.
Ajarla Pathien na ashapa kha manmieshie chung a chawngshat rang a ijongtir nimak, inia ama jar a manmieshie na ringna kha muknathiei rang a inih.
Ama takashawn miring kha chawngshat pe mak, inia takashawn boi kha tu chawngishat pesho nih joi. Ajarla Pathien Shapa khatte riming kha takarushawn u mak.
Chawngshatna kha hi inih, makhala manmieshie a mieivar kha jong joi. Inia miring hai na ajing kha mieivarnek khan numrupok uh. Ajarla amani chonthaw u kha rutha pe u mak.
Ajarla ashie thaw mi rikip na mieivar kha raha pui. Khan amani chonthaw hai kha malangna boi rang, mieivar khan va u mak.
Inia amani chonthaw hai kha Pathien jar a ithaw inih, iti kha larna pe rang, adik thaw miring kha na mieivar khan ava inih.”
Hihaihi shole, Jesu na akhaichawi hai le Judea ram tieng rushe joi. Khan kha mun khan amani le ruawm, khan amani kha baptisma rupek a ruawm.
Johnawm Salim dieng ah awm Aenon khan baptisma pek a ruawm. Ajarla kha mun khan tui tampui ruawm. Mi hai kha na va ua baptisma ruloi uh.
Ajarla John kha lungroko shung ah thong u maklai.
Khan riethiengmashakna chungchanga Jihudi hai le John khaichawi hai na chawngrieshietna rumothoi uh.
Amani na John dieng va ua ruti uh, “Rabbi, Jordan vara ah nang le ruawm a kungnichangnapa kha na, enro, baptisma rupek a mi kholok na ama dieng rushe u joi.”
John na mashang a ruti, “Ravan ah put ah ama dieng ipek niboia, tute na iawm muh ngam mak.
‘Kiei hi Christa kha nimi`ing,’ inia ‘Kiei hi amaton ah inurutir inih,’ kiruti chungchanga kungnangruchang uh.
Moinu anieipa kha moipa kha inih, moilawm kha na iding a chawng rangai phakhan, moipa hesho a iningaina kha lien pe. Khajarkhan kiningaina kha rupum joi.
Ama kha rashang shishitngir rangnih, inia kiei tu kerede shishitngir rangnih.
“Chung ah put ah ajong miring kha na kholok chung a awm. Rieliei ah put ah awm kha rieliei tah inih, khan rieliei chungchanga ieriei. Ravan ah put ah ajong miring kha na kholok chung a awm.
Imuksha le irangaisha khan kungruchang, inia tute na ama kungchangna kha ruloi pe mak.
Ama kungchangna aloi miring kha na Pathien hi adik inih, tia jetnam kha nam joi.
Ajarla Pathien na ijongtir miring kha na Pathien chawng hai kha ieriei, ajarla Pathien na Ratha kha ama dieng danlak boi a ipek inih.
Apa na ashapa kha numpok a irikip kha ama khut ah rupek joi.
Ashapa takashawn mi kha na kumshawt ringna kha ieniei, khan ashapa chawng ajui boi mi kha na ringna kha muh naw nih, inia ama chung a Pathien lunghangna kha awm.”
Khashole Jesu na Johnnek a arawpdet khaichawi kon a baptisma pek joi, tia Pharisee hai na nokor a irujet u kha Pumi na rujet phakhan
(Jesu amatak na baptisma rupeh mak, inia akhaichawi hai na irupek inih),
ama na Judea kha mathan a Galilee ah rusheret joi.
Khan Samaria kha phaw a ama ashe rang a inih.
Khajarkhan Jacob na ashapa Joseph dieng a irupek ram dieng ah awm, Sychar iti Samaria kho khan rushe joi.
Makhan Jacob tuikhur ruawm. Jesu na ama khomijinna khan rushaw jarkhan, tuikhur dieng khan shawmuchum a ruawm. Apha kha nidan `ruk dawr runih.
Samaria ah put ah nupang `khat hi tuilah ava. Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nek rang tui nepeh roh.”
Ajarla akhaichawi hai kha khopui ah nekleshak rawchawh rushe uh.

Khashole Samaria nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Itia Jihudi miring nang na Samaria nupang kiei dieng hin nek rang tui nangininik maw nih?” Ajarla Jihudi miring hai na Samaria miring hai le rawlawpngai mak.

Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Nang na Pathien khutchawi le nang dieng ‘Nek rang tui nepeh roh,’ tia ananipa kha tumaw nih, iti kha nangrujet joiatu, ama dieng nangrunik a tuiring kha nurupekawm jawt joi.”
Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, tuilok niei makche, khan tuikhur hi uthuk. Khoshekawt ah makha tuiring kha nangimuk maw nih?
Kieini dieng a mahi tuikhur nurupeh, amatak na anai hai le ama uilear hai le hin ah put ah runeh, kapa u Jacobnek a lien maw nangnih?”
Jesu na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Tunita`awm mahi tui aneh miring kha na tuirana nieiret rangnih.
Inia kiei na kipek rang a tui aneh ama kha na tu, tuirana shukniei a nieilai naw nih. Khania kipek rang a tui hi na ama dieng kumshawt ringna rang a aput jawnjai tuinar kha chang pe rangnih.”
Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, tuira`awm kienieina boi rang, khan hi mun hinawm tuilah kavatna boi rang, makha tui kha kiei dieng nepeh roh.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “She tana nang inkopa kha vak koi roh, khan hi mun hin va roh.”
Nupangnu kha na mashang a ruti, “Inkopa niei mi`ing.” Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “ ‘Inkopa niei mi`ing,’ nangiti kha adik inih.
Inkopa rahnga nangruniei joi, khania nanginiei khaw tu nang inkopa nimak, makha nangiti kha adik inih.”
Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Oja, thiempulien `khat nangnih, iti kejet joi.
Kipilepu hai na hi lawn hin biekna runiei uh, inia Jihudi hai nangni na tu Jerusalem hi mi hai na Pathien ibieknangir rang a mun inih, nangti uh.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Aw nupang, takanawshawn roh, ajarla Apa kha hi lawn hinawm, khan Jerusalem a`awm biekna boi rang a pha kha jong nai joi.
Nangijet boi u kha nangbiek uh, khan kijet u kha kiebiek uh. Ajarla shandamna kha Jihudi hai ah put ah inih.

Inia pha kha jong shok joi, khan tun a pha hi nih joi. Makha pha khan Pathien abiehet miring hai kha na Apa kha ratha le adik a biekna niei rangnih. Hi ang hai hi keng Apa na abieh hai dieng a itawk kha.
Pathien hi Ratha inih, khan ama abieh miring rikip na ratha a le adik a ibiekngir rang a inih.”
Nupangnu kha na ama dieng ruti, “Messiah kha jong rangnih, iti kha kejet” (ama kha Christa tia ikoi inih). “Ama na jong phakhan, irikip kha kieini dieng rophong rangnih.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Ama kha nang dieng a chawng ariei, kiei hi kanih.”
Khalaitak khan akhaichawi hai vak shok u joi. Nupangnu le ruriebieh a ruawm khan shinrudawng pe uh. Inia tute na “Imaw nangitawk?” ninawkle “Ijar a ama le riebieh maw nangnih?” tia ruti u mak.
Khashole nupangnu kha na ama tuibe kha rumak a kho khan rushe joi. Khan miring hai dieng vak riei,
“Miring `khat na kiruthawsha chon kholok kiei dieng nieriei pe joi. Haro, vak en u rang roh, ama hi Christa kha ninih maw?”
Makhan kho ah put ah vak shok ua ama dieng rushe u joi.
Khakarkhan khaichawi hai na runik uh, “Rabbi, neh rang roh.”
Inia amani dieng ruti, “Nangijet boi u nekleshak nek rang, kiei na kieniei.”
Khajarkhan khaichawi hai kha na khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Tute na shak rang ivakchawi pe boi nimak maw?”
Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Kiniei nekleshak hi tu nojongtirpa mulungmining athaw le ama chon rupummashak hi inih.
‘Parrawkhawmna rang tha mili vatlai,’ nangiti u nimak maw? Enro, nangni dieng kiriei inih, nang ringrakanglam a en u roh, ajarla amani khaw rawkhawm rang, minsho joi!
Rawkhawm miringpa kha na lawh kha tum joi, khan ara kha kumshawt ringna rang, rawkhawm a awm joi. Makha avawrpa le rawkhawmpa kha na lawp `khat a ningaina rang a inih.
Ajarla mahin rieichawng kha adik inih: ‘Akhat na awvawr, khan shik `khat na rawkhawm.’
Nangishin boi u ara kha rawkhawm rang, kunurutir uh. Shik miring hai na rushin uh, khan nangni na amani ishinna u kha nangnemna uh.”
“Ama na kiruthawsha chon kholok kiei dieng nururiei,” tia nupangnu kungchangna jar a makha kho ah awm Samaria miring tampui na ama kha takarushawn uh.
Samaria miring hai na ama dieng va u phakhan, amani dieng awmna rang, runik uh, khan kha mun khan ni `di ruawm.
Ama chawng jar a mi tampui na takarushawn uh.
Nupangnu dieng amani na ruti uh, “Nang chawngriei jar a takakishawn u nilai mak, ajarla diktak a ama hi rieliei Shandampa Christa kha inih, iti hi kieinitak na kejet u joi, khan kumuk u joi.”
Ni `di shole kha mun kha mathan a Galilee rulut joi.
Ajarla Jesu amatak na thiempulien `khat awmnatak khan richitna rumuh mak, tia kungruchang inih.
Ama na Galilee ah vat phakhan, Jerusalem rohoi `khat a iruthaw chon hai kha rumuk u jarkhan, Galilee miring hai na ama kha rupawm uh. Ajarla amaniawm rachang khan rushe u inih.
Khashole Jesu na tui kha ju imachangna mun, Galilee ah awm Cana kho khan varet. Capernaum khan, ashapa dam pe boi, rengmun ah chonpo miring `khat ruawm.
Jesu na Judea ah put ah Galilee ah va joi, iti rujet phakhan, ashapa kha madamnathiei rang, nojong pe roh, tia runik. Ajarla ama kha thimekai a ruawm nih joi.
Khajarkhan Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Jetna le rekhekchon nangmuk joi nawkatu itikte nita`awm takanawshawn u naw tinih.”
Rengmun ah chonpo kha na ama dieng ruti, “Aw Pumi, naitepa thitmala hin nojong pe roh!”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “She rang roh, nang shapa kha dam joi.” Miringpa kha na Jesu na iruti kha takashawn a rushe joi.
Ojong chum le roroia, oshok hai kha na rurawtawng pui ua thangrukoi uh, “Nang nai kha dam joi.”
Khajarkhan hawng damna pha kha amani dieng rurekeche a ama dieng ruti uh, “Majan nidan shiri khan raitun kha na irumathan inih.”
Khajarkhan apa kha na Jesu na ama dieng “Nang shapa kha dam joi,” irutina pha kha inih, iti kha rujet. Khan ama na ama inshung kholok le takarushawn joi.
Mahi Jesu na Judea ah put ah Galilee ah vatlai a adi changna a iruthaw jetna kha inih.
Hishole Jihudi hai rohoi `khat ruawm, khan Jesu na Jerusalem ah ruhawng joi.
Jerusalem khan, Kengam Pakawt dieng ah awm, Hebrew chawng a Bethesda iti tomai`in rahnga a`awm, tuikhur `khat ruawm.
Khahai mun khan takshon, mikchaw, kekhawr, khan takthi miring hai na rurutung ua tui hawng rawnawk kha ngaklam a ruawm uh.
Ajarla phapha a ravantir `khat na tuikhur khan jong chum a tui kha jong rawnawkmashak. Tunita`awm tui hawng rawnawk shole, rapapek a achum kha na ih natna kha niei joiawm damna imuk inih.
Kha mun khan kum shawm `thumlieiriet natna niei miring `khat ruawm.
Jesu na aja a awm kha rumuk, khan khatikhan a awm kha ashawt nih joi, iti rujet `le, ama dieng ruti, “Nangdam jawt maw?”
Anapa kha na ama dieng rumashang, “Oja, tui hawng rawnawk phakhan, tuikhur hin numuchum rang, mi niei mi`ing. Khanikengta kashe phakhan, miring shik na kamatieng ruchummashathiei.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Thoi roh, nang jana kha loitana lawn rang roh.”
Relentak a ama kha rudam joi, khan ajana kha loi a rulawn joi. Makha nikho kha Sabbath nikho runih.
Khajarkhan imadampa dieng khan Jihudi hai kha na ruti uh, “Mahi Sabbath nikho inih, hi nikho hin nang jana nangichawi hi Dan nimak.”
Amani dieng rumashang, “Anamadampa kha na kiei dieng nuruti, ‘Nang jana kha chawitana lawn rang roh.’ ”
Khashole ama dieng rurawdawn uh, “ ‘Nang jana kha loi tana lawn rang roh,’ nati miring kha tumaw nih?”
