Khashole akhaichawi dieng khan ruti, “Nangnu kha en roh!” Makha pha ah put khan akhaichawi kha na ama kha i`intak ah ruchawi joi.
Mahi shole, Jesu na ih kholok hawng mawtawr joi, iti rujet `le, Miejiek kha hawng rupumna rang, “Kutuira,” ruti.
Kha mun khan ju athur shipmer be `khat ruawm. Khajarkhan spongos kha ju athur khan rumechemen ua hyssop bak ah aje ua, abai ah ruthong pe uh.
Jesu na ju athur kha rumechep shole, ruti, “Mawtawr joi.” Khashole ulu mukun a aratha kha rupek joi.

Rashamna Nikho nit jarkhan, Jihudi hai na amani rok hai kha Sabbath shung a rutetna boi rang (ajarla makha Sabbath kha nikholien runih), amani keranga hai kha khiek pe a amani rok hai kha chawina rang, Pilate dieng vak nik uh.
Khashole ramiring hai na va ua akhat changna le khan ama le cross ling ah imakhaishom shik `khat ke hai kha vak khiek pe uh.
Inia Jesu dieng vat phakhan, ruthisha a ivakmuk u le roroia eke hai kha rukhiek pe u lai mak.
Khania ramiring hai kar a akhat na shiei le edep ah vak shun a thishen le tui vak shokrelen joi.
Khan amupa kha na kungruchang. Khan ama kungchangna kha adik inih. Khan iriei kha adik inih, iti kha ejet. Makha takanangshawnna u rang a inih.
Hihai ashok hi Miejiek kha hawng rupumna rang a inih: “Uru `khatshe khiek pe naw nih.”
Khan Miejiek mun shik `khat na ieriei, “Iruvit u ama kha en u rangnih.”

Hihaihi shole, Jihudi hai kha chit jar a muruk a Jesu khaichawi ruchang, Arimathea Joseph na Jesu rok kha loina rang, Pilate dieng vak nik. Pilate na makha rujawt pe. Khashole rushe a Jesu rok kha vak loi joi.
Khan arapalai a jan a Jesu dieng rushe Nicodemus na`awm myrrh le aloe reche litre rajakhat dawr hi vak chawi.
Khashole amani na Jesu rok kha ruloi ua Jihudi hai khumna shedan dungjuia ponramasha le manamhoi rieipartui le rujo u joi.
Khan cross ling ah ithatna u mun khan rohon `khat ruawm, khan makha rohon shung khan tute na ijana boi thankhur athar `khat ruawm.
Jihudi hai Rashamna Nikho nit jar a le khan than kha iedieng ah ruawm jarkhan, Jesu kha makha mun khan rumaja u joi.
Hapta shung a akhat changna nikho varmuk a, Mary Magdalene na thanmun ah vat phakhan, than ah put ah lungpek rurawthawt kha vak muk.

Khajarkhan vak tan a Simon Peter le Jesu na numipok akhaichawi shik `khat dieng ava a amani dieng ruti, “Than shung ah put ah Pumi kha ruloi u joi, ama kha khoshekawt ah itet u maw nih joi, jet u lai mi`ing.”
Khashole Peter na khaichawi shik `khat kha le rushe a than khan va u joi.
Pasha `di kha na rutanshom ua khaichawi shik `khat kha na Peter kha rukhe a thanmun kha matieng rushok joi.
Ama na butlam a ruen a ponramasha hai rapai kha vak muk, inia rulut maklai.
Khashole Simon Peter na ama kha rujui a than shung khan vak lut; khan ponramasha hai rapai kha vak muk.
Khan lu ah ruawm pontete kha ponramasha hai kha le rurapai mak, inia shikjek a mun `khat ah rurethep a ruawm.
Khashole thanmun ah matieng rushok khaichawi shik kha na`awm rulut joi, khan ama na rumuk a takarushawn joi.
Ajarla ama na athi ah put ah hawng ringngir rangnih, iti Miejiek kha tunshe rujet u maklai.
Khajarkhan takthar a akhaichawi hai na amani inin ah rukir u joi.
Inia than vai tieng khan Mary na ding a rie`ieklam a ruchap. Achap le roroia than shung khan butlam a ruen.
Khan ponchek rieshiei ravantir idi kha Jesu rok irena mun khan ulu tieng `khat, khan eke tieng `khat rushuh u kha rumuk.
Amani na ama dieng ruti uh, “Nupang, ijar a chap maw nangnih?” Amani dieng ruti, “Ajarla kupumi kha nuruchawi pe u joi, khoshekawt a inatet pe u maw nih joi, jetlai mi`ing.”
Hihaihi ruti shole, anuk tieng vak hiei a Jesu ading kha vak muk, inia Jesu keng, iti rujet mak.

Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Nupang, ijar a chap maw nangnih? Tumaw nangitawk?” Rohon rung miring `khat a rumining a ama dieng ruti, “Oja, ama kha ninuruchawi pe nitjoiatu, khoshekawt ah nitet maw nih, nieriei roh. Kiei na chawi rang kanih joi.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Mary!” Ama na vak hiei a ama dieng ruti, “Rabboni!” (mahi Oja tina inih).

Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Numukui a awmlai naw roh, ‘Kiei na kapa dieng hawng mi`inglai. She tana kuliennai hai dieng vak riei rang roh. Kiei na kapa le nangpa u, kapathien le nang Pathien u dieng ahawng rang kanih joi.’ ”
Mary Magdalene na rushe a Pumi kha umuk joi, khan ama dieng hihaihi riei joi, tia khaichawi hai dieng vak rophong joi.

Hapta shung a akhat changna nikho nitak khan akhaichawi hai na Jihudi hai kha ruchih ua, ruruchunna u in mawkawt kha rukhar uh. Jesu na hawng lut a amani kar khan hawng ding a ruriei, “Lungdamna kha nangni le awm rosho.”
Makha ruriei shole, amani dieng ukhut hai le edep kha rumumuk uh. Khajarkhan khaichawi hai kha na Pumi kha rumuk u phakhan, ningrungai pe uh.
Takthar a Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho. Kapa na inojongtir hi ang a, nangniawm kinitir uh.”
Mahi ruriei shole, amani dieng phuk thong pe a ruriei, “Ratha Riethieng kha tum u roh.
Miring hai munu kha nangrangaidam pe u joiatu, irangaidam pe inih. Nangni na nangdawn pe u joiatu, idawn pe inih.”
Inia Didymus iti u shawmlieidi kar a akhat Thomas kha Jesu na vatlai khan amani le ruawm mak.

Khaichawi shik hai na ama dieng ruti uh, “Pumi kha kumuk u joi.” Inia amani dieng ruti, “Ukhut ah hemthir shebe kha kumuk nawk a, hemthir shebe kha kukhut mieriei le kama nawk a, khan edep kha kukhut le kishit nawkatu, takashawn naw ning.”

Ni `riet shole, takthar a akhaichawi hai na inshung khan ruawm uh. Thomas`awm amani le ruawm joi. Mawkawt kha rurakhar joiawm, Jesu kha hawng lut, khan amani kar a ding a ruriei, “Lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho.”

Khashole Thomas dieng ruti, “Nang khut mieriei kha vak shawn tana vak ma roh, khan nang khut kha vak shawn tana kedep hi vak shih roh. Takashawn boi miring kha niboia, takashawn miring kha chang roh.”
Thomas na mashang a ama dieng ruti, “Kupumi kapathien.”
Jesu na ama dieng ruti, “Thomas, nangnumuk joi jarkhan, takanangnawshawn joi. Amuh boi a takashawn miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
Khan mahi behangbuk ah imiejiek boi Jesu na akhaichawi hai dieng iruthaw jetna tampui awmlai.
Khania Jesu hi Christa, Pathien Shapa kha inih, iti takanangshawnna u rang a irumiejiek inih. Makha, takanangshawn u phakhan, ama riming a ringna kha nangnieina u rang a inih.
Hihaihi shole, Jesu na Tiberias Thampui khan akhaichawi hai dieng hitihin rularret.
Simon Peter, Didymus iti u Thomas, Galilee shung ah awm Cana kho ah put ah Nathanael, Zebedee shapa hai le akhaichawi hai kar a idi hai kha ruawmshom uh.

Simon Peter na amani dieng ruti, “Ngashur she rang kanih.” Ama dieng ruti uh, “Kieiniawm nang le she u rang kanih.” Relentak a rushe ua rokong shung khan rulut u joi. Kha jan khan `khatshe rushur u mak.
Jingkar hin Jesu na kawmchang khan ruding, nitjoiawm khaichawi hai na Jesu keng, iti rujet u mak.
Khajarkhan Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Naite hai, nekleshak nanginiei boi u maw nih?” Ama dieng rumashang uh, “Niei u mi`ing.”
Amani dieng ruti, “Len kha rokong chang tieng ah shir khan vawr u roh, khan nangshur u rangnih.” Makha dungjuia amani na ruvawr uh. Khan nga hai kha rawphai jarkhan, akaishe rumawtawr u lai mak.

Jesu na numipok khaichawi kha na Peter dieng ruti, “Mahi Pumi inih!” Simon Peter na Pumi inih, iti kha rujet phakhan, kotai ruko a (ajarla rekengver a ruawm inih) nining a thampui shung khan ruchawm joi.
Inia khaichawi hai eshen na tu, nga shipmer len kha pawtlam a rokongte a rushe uh (ajarla kawmchang kha le rurala mak, inia cubit rajadi dawr runih).
Kawmchang ah eke rumuchum u phakhan, kha mun khan rawhaw ra`ajin chung ah nga le khan tan vak muk uh.
Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Tun a nangishur u nga hai kha eshen vak chawi u roh.”
Simon Peter na hawng ka a nga alien rajakhat shawm rahngalieithum shipmer len kha kawmchang ah hawng pawt joi. Khan nga hai kha tampui nitjoiawm len kha ruchiet mak.
Jesu na amani dieng ruti, “Khai! Jingkarbu neh u rang rawi.” Pumi keng, iti rujet u jarkhan, akhaichawi hai kar a tute na “Tumaw nangnih?” tia rurawdawn ngam u lai mak.
Khashole Jesu na ava a tan kha ruloi, khan amani dieng rupek. Khan nga kha`awm ra`angre a khatikhan rupek joi.
Jesu na athi ah put ah hawng thoi shole a akhaichawi hai dieng rularna kha mahi na athum changna kha inih.

Amani na jingkarbu kha runek u shole, Jesu na Simon Peter dieng ruti, “Jonah shapa Simon, kiei hi hihaihinek hin numnangnopok maw?” Ama dieng rumashang, “Awh, Pumi, numkonopok, iti kha nangjet.” Ama dieng ruriei, “Kekengamte hai hi navai pe roh.”
Adi changna khan rieiret, “Jonah shapa Simon, kiei hi numnangnopok maw?” Ama dieng rumashang, “Awh, Pumi, numkonopok, iti kha nangjet.” ama dieng ruriei, “Kekengam hai hi noroi pe roh.”

Athum changna a ama dieng ruti, “Jonah shapa Simon, kiei hi numnangnopok maw?” “Numnangnopok maw?” tia voithumhet ruti jarkhan, Peter kha mulungrushaw pe joi. Khan ama dieng ruti, “Pumi irikip nangjetviek; numkonopok, iti kha nangjet.” Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kekengam hai hi navai pe roh.”

Diktak a nang dieng kiriei inih, “Nang shindetlai khan kawngkhit thaw a nangshena jawt mun khan nangshe, inia nang tar phakhan, nang khut lawm a shik miring na nang kawng nikhit pening, tia nangiditna boi mun khan nawchawi rangnih.”
Mahi iruti hi ih ang chat thitna kha le ama na Pathien imulur rang a maw nih, iti jetna inih. Mahi ruti shole, ama dieng ruriei, “Nujui roh.”
Peter na ruhiei a Jesu na numipok khaichawi kha na irujui kha rumuk. Ama kha janbu nekna a tebol ah Jesu kha irungiei a “Pumi, tumaw nih anajor rang a pa kha?” tia rurieipa kha inih.
Peter na ama kha muk phakhan, Jesu dieng ruti, “Pumi, ama la imaw rachang nih?”
Jesu na ama dieng ruriei, “Kojong masheng a`awm rang kadit joiatu, nang roiruputna imaw awm? Nujuite nujui roh.”

Khajarkhan uliennai shung khan ama hi thi naw nih, tia chawngrushok joi. Inia Jesu na ama dieng thi naw nih ruti mak, inia “Kojong masheng a`awm rang kadit joiatu, nang roiruputna imaw awm?” iruti inih.
Mahi khaichawi hi keng hihai chungchanga kungruchang miring le hihaihi irumiejiek kha. Khan ama na kungruchangna kha adik inih, iti kejet uh.
Jesu na iruthaw chon shik tampui awm, `khatkhat a miejiekviek joiatu, miejiek rang a behang hai kha manmieshie rieliei shung hin tawng naw nih, tia kimining. Amen.
Aw Theophilus, akhat changna behangbuk khan Jesu na iruthaw le iruruchukna putna kholok le ama kha ravan a iruchawina nikhoshe kha jar a kirumiejiek inih.
Ama kha ruchawi mala khan Jesu na irumadan tirtawn hai kha Ratha Riethieng dieng chawng rupekna.
Ama shawdoi shole, akalangshok ngieichon tampui le amani dieng ama na aring a awm kha nining a rumumuk. Ni shawm mili hi amani dieng rular a Pathien rengchangna jar kha ruriei pe.

Amani kha lawp `khat a ruruchun puilai khan Jerusalem kha rumathan u naw roh, kiei ah put ah nangirujet u Apa chawngrakham kha rungak u roh, tia amani dieng chawng rupek. Jesu na ruti, “Mahi keng kiei ah put ah nangirujet u kha.
Ajarla John na tui a baptisma nurupek uh, inia nikhothang shawt boi a Ratha Riethieng le baptisma nepek u rang kanih.”
Khashole amani na vak ruruchun ua ama dieng rawdawn a ruti uh, “Pumi, mahi pha hin Israel hai rengchangna kha nihawngmikir rang a maw nih?”
Amani dieng ruti, “Apa na ama chamtak a imuchuk rang a pha ninawkle kumletha ajet rang a kha nangni nih u makche.

Inia Ratha Riethieng na nang chung ua jong phakhan, ranak nangtum u rangnih. Khan Jerusalem shung ah, Judea le Samaria kholok ah, khan rieliei dawngkhitshe khan kiei rang kungchang miring hai kha anih rang nangnih uh.”
Hihaihi ruriei shole, amani na i`en u le roroia, ama kha chung tieng rudawm a amani mik`en ah put ah romiei na ama kha ruringi joi.
Ama na ruka le roroia, amani na ravan tieng ruenrep u lai khan enro, ponchek rieshiei pasha `di na amani dieng ruding uh.
Khan amani dieng ruti uh, “Galilee miring hai, iloia ravan tieng khonga a ading maw nangnih uh? Nangni ah put ah ravan a iruchawi Jesu hi, ravan a aka nangimuk u hi ang a, jong rangnih.”
Khashole amani na Olivet iti Lawn ah put ah Jerusalem ah jong kir u joi. Makha Sabbath nikho a lawnnathiei Jerusalem dieng ah awm inih.

In khan jong lut ua, awmna u chungindan khan ruka u joi. Amani khala: Peter, James, John, Andrew, Philip, Thomas, Bartholomew, Matthew, Alphaeus shapa James, Zealot iti Simon, khan James shapa Judas runih uh.
Hihai kholok na nupang hai, Jesu nu Mariam, khan anaipangpa hai le mulung `khat a nikna le rieina runiei jawnjai uh.
Khalaikhan Peter na takashawn hai kar a thoi a ruti (Ruchun mirawp kha rajakhat shawm `di dawr runih),
“Uliennai hai, Jesu ashur hai lamkai ruchang, Judas chungchanga Ratha Riethieng na David kam a irurieimashana, Miejiek kha ashokngir rang a inih.
Ajarla Judas kha kieini le techen runih, khan mahi chonmun hin ama na tum irumuk inih.”
(Khan mahi miringpa hi na idikna boi lawh kha le loimun irurawchawkna mun khan shuk tieng jongcho, khan awvawn rupok pe a ariei kholok vak shok pe.
Mahi Jerusalem ah awm mi kholok na rujet uh. Khajarkhan amani chawng a Akeldama, makhala, Thishen Loimun ruti uh.)
“Ajarla Lah behangbuk ah hitihin rumiejiek: ‘Ama awmna mun kha ramthim chang pe rosho; tute na makhan awm naw rosho.’ Khan ‘Ama chonmun kha shik `khat na loi pe rosho.’
Khan thoiretna chungchanga kieini le kungchangna rang, nimadan u rang a shok. Kieini na nimadan u rang a kha tu, Pumi Jesu na kieini le shehawng a ruawmlai khan kieini le rawtawp jawnjai
makhala, John na ama baptisma irupek ah put ah kieini ah put ah iruchawina nikho haishe miring `khat aningir rang a inih.”
Khajarkhan Barsabbas tia ikoi u, Justus iti Joseph le Matthias, pasha `di hi rumiding uh.
Khan amani na runik a ruti uh, “Pumi nang na mi kholok mulung nangjet, idi kar hin akhat nimadan kha numumuk u roh.
Mahi Judas na irukhoi a nining a iminingna mun a rushe jar a irumak chonmun le tirtawn changna kha lona rang a inih.”
Amani rang khan vanmuk ruen ua, Matthias dieng ruchu joi, khan amani na ama kha tirtawn shawmlieikhat khan rubo u joi.
Pentecost ni kha hawng shok phakhan, amani kholok kha mun `khat ah mulung khatte a ruawm uh.
Khan jetboithieiboi a helehoi kha ravan ah put ah rithirang ang a jong a, rushutna u inshung kholok kha jong miship.
Mieliei hai kha na mieichon ang a amani dieng jong lar. Khahaikha na jong reshen ua, amani rikip dieng jong chutna uh.
Khan Ratha Riethieng na jong miship ua, Ratha na baishona irupek u le roroia, amani kholok na chawngshik a achawng ruput u joi.
Kha mun khan ramram ah awm phung rikip ah put ah richichawi Jihudi hai kha Jerusalem ah ruawm uh.
Makhan helehoi kha rujet u phakhan, mipui kha vak ruchun ua, shindawngna runiei uh. Ajarla tirtawn rikip na amama phung chawng a achawng rujet uh.
Shindawng le amramalam a amani na khatlekhat dieng rurierieina uh, “Enro, achawng miring kholok khaw Galilee miring hai nih u mak maw?
Itia kieini na nojongshokna u phung chawng rikip a nijet u hi?
Parthia, Mede, Elam miring hai, khan Mesopotamia, Judea le Cappadocia, Pontus le Asia ram ah awm miring hai,
Phyrgia le Pamphylia, Egypt, khan Cyrene le ranai Lybia shie `khat, khan Rome ah put ah khomijin hai, Jihudi hai le phungtho hai dire,
Crete tuikawram le Arab miring hai, kieini na Pathien chon thaw hai rekhek kha nawchawngtak a nijet u inih.”
Amani kholok shindawng le amramalam a khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Mahi ih itina maw nih?”
Eshen na erawh a ruti uh, “Amani khaw juning le aship u keng.”
Inia Peter na shawmlieikhat le ding a amani dieng he rashangtak a ruriei, “Judea le Jerusalem ah awm miring hai, mahi nangijet u nih rosho, khan kawchawng hai hi rangairep u roh.
Hihai miring hi nangimining u kha ang a, jukhawp nih u mak. Jingkar nidan kobak cholai.
Inia mahi thiempulien Joel dieng irureina kha inih:

‘Nikho dawng khan hitihin awm rangnih. Makhala, karatha kha miring kholok shung a thong pe rang kanih. Nang shapa u hai le nang shanu u hai na chawng rophong u rangnih. Nang khangdawng u hai na mulungmik muk u rangnih, khan nang khanglui u hai na ramang raman u rangnih.
Kha nikho hai khan koshok hai nupang apa diengshe karatha thong pe rang kanih. Amani na chawng rophong u rangnih.
Chung ravan a rekhekchon hai le noi rieliei a jetna hai kha mumuk rang kanih. Khahaikha thishen, miei, khan mieikhu ruhu nih rangnih.
Alien le alur PUMI Nikho jong mala khan ni na ajing a, khan tha na thishen a jir rangnih.
Khan PUMI riming aban mi rikip kha shan rangnih, tia Pathien na ieriei.’

“Aw Israel miring hai, chawng hai hi rangai u roh. Pathien na ama jar a nang kar ua iruthaw chonrekhek hai, rekhekchon hai le jetna hai kha rotokna a, mahi miring Nazareth Jesu hi irumuchuk nih joi. Nangnitak na mahi nangijet u inih.
Pathien na irumuchuksha le irujetsha dungjuia mahi miringpa hi nangni dieng inurupek u inih. Danishawnboi hai khut kha rotokna a cross ling ah nangruthat uh.
Pathien na thitna natna ah put ah rumoshok a rumiring joi, ajarla thitna ranak kha na ama ikhop rang a kha anithiei nimak.
Ajarla David na Jesu chungchanga ruti: ‘PUMI kha kamaton a kumuk jawnjai. Ih kha na kiei hi nanawk ngam naw nih. Ajarla ama kha kukhut chang tieng awm.
Khajarkhan kumulung na apar, khan kiemieliei na ningaidet. Kha khea kupum na ngakmining a ring rangnih.
Ajarla Thikho khan kiringphuk kha namak pe naw tinih, ninawkle nang Riethieng Akhat kha na omoro imuk rang a kha jawt pe naw tinih.
Ringkho lam hai kha kiei dieng nangnumumuk joi. Kiei dieng a nangawm kha na mulungparna kha le nangnimiship joi.’
“Uliennai miring hai, phungpa David jar a lungartak a riei rawng, makhala ama kha ruthi a rukhum u joi. Ama than kha von nikhoshe hin kieini le awmlai.

Thiempulien `khat runit jarkhan, taksha dungjuia ama vawnchawi ara ah put ah Christa kha Pathien na mothoi a ama rengmun ah mushut rang, tia Pathien na riming ban a chawngirurakham pe kha David na rujet.
Mahi rumukmasha jarkhan, David na Christa thoiretna jar a ruriei, makhala ama ringphuk kha Thikho khan rumak pe mak, khan ama taksha kha na`awm morona, iti kha rumuh mak.
Mahi Jesu hi Pathien na irumothoi inih. Mahi nokholok na kungnachang uh.
Pathien khut chang tieng rulawm a apa ah put ah chawngirurakham Ratha Riethieng kha ruman shole, tun a nangimuk u le nangijet u hi ama na ijongmephe nih joi.
Ajarla David na ravan tieng ruka mak, inia amatak na ruti, ‘PUMI na kupumi dieng ruti,
“Nang rahapui hai kha nang kekhawng kamachang malalim, kukhut chang tieng shuh roh.” ’
“Khajarkhan Israel inshung kholok na jet rosho, makhala cross ling ah nangiruthat u mahi Jesu hi Pumi le Christa dire kha iruminit inih.”
Amani na rujet u phakhan, amani mulung rushit pe ua Peter le tirtawn kholok dieng ruti uh, “Uliennai miring hai, kieini na imaw thaw u ning?”

Peter na amani dieng ruriei, “Pathien na nang munu u kha arangaidamna rang, nang mulung lek u tana mi rikip na Jesu Christa riming a baptisma loi u roh. Khan Ratha Riethieng khutchawi kha nangmuk u rangnih.
Ajarla chawngrakham hi nangni rang le nang nai hai rang, khan latak ah awm hai rang le Pumi napathien na tukha nitjoiawm ikoi amani rang a inih.”
“Nangni ashie hi rong ah put ah rekhe u roh,” tia chawng tampui le chawng rupek a rumawshawk uh.
Khan ningaitak a ama chawng aloi hai kha na baptisma ruloi uh. Makha nikhotak khan miring bawp `thum hi irubo inih.
Amani na tirtawn hai ruchukna le rawlawpna, shakriethieng shakna le nikna khan mulung rupek uh.
Mi rikip chung a ratharakakna jong shok, ajarla tirtawn hai na rekhekchon le jetna tampui kha ruthaw uh.
Takashawn kholok na lawp `khat a ruawm ua, nieinak kholok rureshem uh.
Iniei u inleloi le nieinak kholok kha rujor ua, irangai u dungjuia amani dieng rupek uh.
Nikhonikho a riethiengmun ah mulung pum `khat a ruruchun uh. In rikip ah tan rukhoi uh, khan rawshaw le mulung renem a nekleshak kha rushak uh.
Amani na Pathien kha rumapak uh, khan miring kholok le riengieihiem a ruawm uh. Ishan miring hai kha Pumi na nikhonikho a biekrup khan rubo a ruawm.
Khan Peter le John na riethiengmun ah nikna pha nidan `thum hin riethiengmun ah ruhawng uh.
Unu vawn shung ah put ah kekhawr miring `khat vak chawi uh. Makha riethiengmun ah alut hai dieng numpokpek nikna rang, Metha iti riethiengmun pakawt khan ningthingkip rutet uh.
Peter le John na riethiengmun lut rang a rasham u kha rumuk phakhan, numpokpek kha runik a ruawm.
Peter le John na enrep a ruti uh, “Kieini hi ne`en roh.”
Ih `khat kumuk rangnih ti jarkhan, amani kha rumiejierep.
Inia Peter na ruti, “Kiei na rangkachak le dangka kha niei mi`ing, inia kiniei hi kinepek inih: Nazareth Jesu Christa riming a thoi tana lawn rang roh.”
Peter na ama khut chang khan rurak a rumothoi, khan relentak a eke hai le ekeartui hai kha hawng ngar pe joi.
Ama na hawng chawm a hawng ding le roroia rulawn joi. Khan chawmlam a amani le lawn a Pathien mapaklam a riethiengmun khan rulut joi.
Khan lawnlam a Pathien imapak kha mi kholok na rumuk uh.
Khan ama kha riethiengmun Metha Pakawt ah rushuthiei khutdawpa kha inih, iti kha amani na rujet uh. Ama chung a ashok khan erekhek a shindawngna runiei uh.
Kekhawrpa kha na Peter le John kha irumukui le roroia, mi kholok na, shindawngtak a, Solomon shumkung iti khan ah awm amani dieng rutan uh.

Peter na mahi rumuk phakhan, mi hai dieng khan rumashang, “Aw Israel miring hai, ijar a mahi chung hin shindawngna nanginiei u maw nih? Ninawkle, karanak ua ninawkle kirichichawina u khan a ama hi kimawlawn u ang a, ijar a nine`enrep u maw nih?

Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, Jacob Pathien, pilepu hai Pathien kha na ama shok Jesu kha rumulur joi. Ama kha Pilate na rumoshok jawt phakhan, nangni na Pilate maikung a nangirujawt boi ua, mi hai dieng a nangirupek u kha inih.
Inia nangni na Riethieng le Midik kha rujawt u makche a mithatpa kha nangni rang moshokna rang, nangrunik uh.
Khan nangni na ringna apeh Rengshapa kha nangruthat uh. Pathien na ama kha athi ah put ah rumothoi. Mahin kieini na kungkachang uh.
Ama riming a takashawntak kha na nangimuk u le nangijet u miringpa hi imarat inih. Khan Jesu dieng ama takashawn kha na nang kholok maikung a miringpa hi amadamna joi.
“Tun uliennai hai, nang rampo hai na iruthaw u kha ang a, nangni na jet boi a niruthaw u inih, iti kha kejet.
Hitihin Pathien na ama thiempulien hai kholok ner a irurophongna, makhala Christa kha ashawngir rang a inih, iti kha hawng shok nih joi.
Khajarkhan nang mulung lek u roh, khan jir u roh. Khanitatu Pathien na nang munu u hai kholok kha nurushuk pe rangnih. Makha pha khan Pumi ah put ah matharnaret pha kha jong rangnih.
Khan nangni dieng matieng a irurophong Jesu Christa kha jong tir rangnih.
Nieinak kholok hawng mikir masheng, Jesu kha ravan a awmngir rang a inih. Makha chungchanga Pathien na manmieshie put mala a ama thiempulien riethieng hai ner a irurieina inih.

Ajarla Moses na pilepu hai dieng diktak a iruriei inih, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien na kiei a`ang Thiempulien `khat nang miring ah put ah mothoi rangnih. Nangni dieng a iriei kholok kha nangirangai u rang a shok.
Khan makha Thiempulien chawng rangai boi mi rikip kha mi hai kar ah put ah mathang rangnih.’
Samuel ah put ah anujui thiempulien kholok na hihai nikho chungchanga irurophongmasha inih.

Khan nangni hi thiempulien hai nai hai kha nangnih uh. Pathien na nangpa hai dieng irupek rawjawtna nai hai kha nangnih uh. Abraham dieng ruti, ‘Nang chicha jar a rieliei a inshungkhur kholok dieng rahvan pek rangnih.’
Pathien na ama shok Jesu kha rumothoi shole, akhat changna a ama kha nangni dieng rahvan pek rang jong tir joi. Makha nang kholok kha nang thatna boi uah put ah niemiehieina u rang a inih.”
Peter le John na mi hai dieng chawngruriei u lai khan thiempu hai, riethiengmun arung ralamkai le Sadducee hai na amani dieng va uh.
Jesu dieng athi ah put ah thoiretna awm, tia miring hai kha iruruchuk a irurophong u kha na amani mulung kha rumahang pe.
Khajarkhan amani kha rushur uh. Nitak runit jarkhan, jing tiengshe khan lungroko shung ah amani kha rukhum uh.
Inia chawng rangai hai tampui na takarushawn uh, khan amani jat kha bawp rahnga dawr runih.
Jing tieng hin rampo hai, lamkai hai, khan danoja hai kha na Jerusalem ah ruruchun joi.
Thiempu rashang Annas le Caiaphas, John, Alexander, khan thiempu rashang inshung hai tampui ruawm uh.
Peter le John kha alai ah miding a rurawdawn uh, “Ih ranak ninawkle tu riming a mahi nangithaw u maw nih?”
Ratha Riethieng shiplam a Peter na amani dieng ruriei, “Miring chung a chamniei hai le Israel lamkai hai,
von hin anapa dieng chon atha thaw jar a le itia hi miringpa damna dan kha kieini dieng ennanginerete u nitjoiatu,

nang kholok le Israel miring kholok na ijet nih rosho, mahi Nazareth Jesu Christa riming a nang kar ua damveng a ading nih joi. Mahi Jesu hi nangni na cross ah nangiruthat u, khan Pathien na athi ah put ah irumothoi kha inih.
Mahi ‘Inthaw hai nangni na nirudawnda u runiei kik ah lung ruchang kha inih.’
Tute jar a shandamna hi awm mak, ajarla kieini niringna u rang ravan noi a awm miring hai kar a ipek riming shik awm mak.”

Khan amani na Peter le John mulung ngar kha rumuk u phakhan, amani kha behangthiei boi, miriem inih, iti kha rujet ua shindawngna runiei uh. Khan amani kha Jesu le rawtawp miring hai keng, iti kha rujet uh.
Amani na irumadam u miringpa kha akar ua ading kha rumuk u jarkhan, amani na ama chung a chawngruriei ngam u mak.
Khajarkhan Sanhedrin kha mathan a shena rang, chawng rupek u shole, chonmun kha amani na rureshe uh.
Khan amani na ruti uh, “Amani dieng imaw nithaw u rang? Ajarla Jerusalem ah awm mi kholok dieng jetna ithawna hi madang joi. Mahi kieini na shok mak ti rang a hi anithiei boi inih.
Inia miring hai dieng dawnshe a majarna boi rang le hi riming hin tute dieng rieina boi rang, michitrip u rang rawi.”
Khajarkhan amani kha rukoi ua Jesu riming a chawngriei ninawkle ruchukna boipet rang, chawng rupek u joi.
Inia Peter le John na rumashang uh, “Pathiennek a nang chawng u rangai rang a hi Pathien mik`en a dikna maw chang nih, chawngshat u roh.
Ajarla kimuk u le kijet u chungchanga chawngriei hi bang ngam u naw ning.”
Takthar a amani kha rumichitsho u le, rumeshe u joi. Ajarla ashok chon jarkhan mi kholok na Pathien kha mapak a ruawm le khan amani jarkhan, amani chepna rang, lam rumuk u mak.
Ajarla damna chonrekhek ithawna miringpa kha kum shawm mili khe miring runih joi.
Amani kha rumoshoksho u le, thiempu ulien le shierulien hai na amani dieng iruriei hai kha Peter le John na amani lawm hai dieng thang vak koi uh.
Khan amani na rujet u `le, mulung `khat a he rashangtak a Pathien dieng ruti uh, “Aw Pumpa, nang ravan le rieliei, thampui le ushung ah awm kholok akonpa kha nangnih.
Nang shokpa David ner a nangruriei: ‘Ijar a phung hai kha rurang u maw nih, khan miring hai na nemna boi a chonirashak u maw nih?
Rieliei reng hai na rumiding u joi, khan rampo hai na PUMI chung a le ama Christa chung a re`erpuina rang, ruruchun u joi.’
Ajarla diktak a thao nangirunawt nang shok riethieng Jesu chung a Herod le Pontius Pilate na Phungshik hai, khan Israel miring hai le lawp `khat a ruruchun u joi.
Makha nang ranak le nang mulungmining nirumuchuksha kha ashok inih.
Tun, Aw Pumi, amani mimichit hi enro, khan mulungartak a nang chawng kha rieina rang, nang shok hai dieng hin ranak peh roh.
Nang mimadamna nang ranak kha jong peh tana, jetna le rekhekchon hai kha nang shok riethieng Jesu riming a thaw u rosho.”
Amani na nikna kha runieisho u le, lawp `khat a ruchunna u mun kha hawng rawnawk, khan amani kholok dieng Ratha Riethieng na jong ship ua Pathien chawng kha ngartak a ariei ruput u joi.
Khan takashawn mipui kha mulung `khat le ringphuk `khat a ruawm uh. Tute na`awm inleloi kha bing niei rumachang u mak, inia irawkhawm u rikip kha mun `khat a rurotokna uh.
Ranaknieitak a tirtawn hai kha na Pumi Jesu thoiretna khan kungruchang uh, khan amani kholok chung a numpokmirit kha lawmlawm a jong pe uh.
Amani kar a ravat `khatshe ruawm pe u mak, ajarla inleloi aniei hai kha na rujor ua khahai man kha vak chawi uh.
Amani na tirtawn hai keshun khan vak tet ua rangai hai dieng khan rushem pe uh.
Cyprus tuikawram a ashok, Levi phung Joses iti miring `khat ruawm. Tirtawn hai na ama dieng Barnabas iti riming kha rupek uh (Makha mawshawkna apeh shapa tina inih).
Ama na iniei loipuk kha rujor a shier kha tirtawn hai keshun a vak tet.
Inia Ananias iti miring `khat na ama inkonu Sapphira le rejet a ram `khat hi rujor.
Ama na, ama inkonu le rejet a, ikhawn shier kha eshen rurawt, khan khoikhat kha ruchawi a tirtawn hai keshun a vak tet.
Inia Peter na ruti, “Ananias, ijar a Satan na nang mulung kha ibuk a Ratha Riethieng chung a mielieishiei inawmawthaw a makha ram man kha eshen nangirawt maw nih?

Nangjor mala khan makha nang tah anih boi maw nih? Nangjor sholeawm shier chung khan nang cham a awm boi maw nih? Ijar a nang mulung shung a hiti chon hi nangirashak maw nih? Nang na miring hai dieng mielieishiei nangithaw nimak a Pathien dieng mielieshiei nangithaw inih.”
Ananias na hihai chawng hi rujet phakhan, pur a ruthi joi, khan hihai chon ajet miring kholok na ajeng a chitna runiei uh.
Rothar hai na va ua rok kha vak jo uh, khashole ruchawi ua vak khum u joi.
Khan nidan `thum dawr hi rakar `le ashok chon kha jet boi a ama inkonu kha vak lut.
Peter na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Ram kha kha jat khan a nangijor u maw nih?” Ama na rumashang, “Inih, kha jat khan a kijor u inih.”
Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Itia Pumi Ratha kha enretena rang, rawjawtshom maw nangnih uh? Enro, nang inkopa akhum miring hai na mawkawt kung ah ding a awmlai, nangawm nawchawi u rangnih joi.”
Relentak a ama kha rupur a eke kung a ruthi joi. Rothar hai na va ua athi kha vak muk u phakhan, ruchawi ua ama inkopa diengtak khan vak khum u joi.
Khajarkhan biekrup le khahai ajet kholok chung a chitna jong shok joi.
Khan tirtawn hai khut dieng jetna le rekhekchon tampui hi miring hai kar a ruthawna. Khan amani lawpsheng ua mulung khatte a Solomon Tomai`in khan ruruchun uh.
Mi hai na amani kha rashangtak a ruen uh, khan tute na amani dieng rujaw ngam u mak.
Inia Pumi takashawn nupang apa tampui kha rubo uh.
Khajarkhan Peter na vak pang pha a, ama riliptak a kha nita`awm, amani dieng chona rang, ruti ua ana miring hai kha lamlien khan jana le pher chung ah rumaja uh.
Diengvai ah awm mipui kholok na Jerusalem ah vak ruchun ua, amani na ana miring hai le raikho rono na ichutna miring hai kha vak chawi uh, khan amani lawpsheng a damna rumuk uh.
Khashole thiempu rashang na ama le rawtawp Sadducee lawpreshen kholok le ruthoi joi. Manarshie kha na amani kha rubuk joi.
Amani na tirtawn hai kha rushur ua mithat miring hai thongna lungroko shung ah rutet u joi.
Inia Pumi ravantir na jan a lungroko mawkawt hai kha rumawlawng pe a vai rumoshok uh, khan ruti,
“She u rang roh, riethiengmun ah vak ding u tana mahi ringna chawng kholok hi mi hai dieng vak riei pe u roh.”

Amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, kha jingkar khan jingkara riethiengmun ah rulut ua mi hai kha ruruchuk u joi. Thiempu rashang na ama le rawtawp hai kha le vak shok phakhan, Sanhedrin le Israel nai hai shierpui rikip ruruchun ua, amani kha lungroko shung ah put ah vak chawina rang, mi rutir uh.
Inia mirung hai kha na rushe u phakhan, amani na lungroko shung khan tirtawn hai kha vak muh u lai mak. Khajarkhan vak kir ua thang vak koi uh.
“Kieini na lungroko kha thatak a rakhar, mirung hai kha mawkawt ah ading kha`awm kumuk uh, inia kawmawlawng u phakhan, shung ah tute muh u mi`ing.”
Khan thiempu rashang hai, riethiengmun arung lamkai, khan thiempu ulien hai na hihaihi rujet u phakhan, imaw shok nih, tia shindawngna runiei uh.
Khalaitak khan miring `khat vak shok a vak rophong, “Enro, lungroko shung ah nangikhum u hai kha na riethiengmun ah ding a mi hai kha ruchuk a awm uh.”
Khan lamkaipa kha na mirung hai kha le rushe a rawmawreshem moshok boi a amani kha vak chawi uh, ajarla mi hai kha na lung le nedeng u nih, tia ruchih uh.
Amani na vak chawi u phakhan, Sanhedrin maikung a rumiding ua thiempu rashang kha na amani dieng rurawdawn,

khan ama na ruti, “Mahi riming hin mi ruchukna boi rang, kieini na chawngkinabenrep u nimak maw? Inia enro, nangiruchuk u kha na Jerusalem hi ship joi. Hi miring thishen kha kieini dieng nangmocho jawt uh.”
Inia Peter le tirtawn hai na mashang a ruti uh, “Miring hainek khan Pathien chawng kha kirangai u rang a shok.
Thingling ah nangirumakhai ua nangiruthat u Jesu kha nipilepu hai Pathien kha na irumothoi inih.
Pathien na Israel hai dieng mulung lekna le munu rangaidamna pekna rang, Rengshapa le Shandampa `khat a, ukhut chang tieng awmna rang, rumulur joi.
Khan hihai jar hin kieini na kungachang kanih uh. Pathien na ama chawng rangai miring hai dieng ipek Ratha Riethieng na`awm hihai chungchang hin kungachang u inih.”
Amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, ajeng a mulung ruhang pe ua amani kha thatna rang, lam rutawk u joi.
Inia mi kholok na richit ipek, Dan oja, Gamaliel iti Pharisee miring `khat na Sanhedrin khan ruding a tirtawn hai kha vai ah tetbawtna rang, chawng rupek.
Khashole amani dieng ruti, “Israel miring hai, hihai miring dieng hin thaw rang nangiti u kha miningrep u roh.

Ajartu kum `khat le `di mala khan Theudas iti miring `khat ruawm, ama na kiei kanih, tia miring rajamili dawr na ama anu rujui uh, inia ama kha ruthat uh. Khan ama rungamna miring kholok kha`awm chekrurachai ua ruthangsho u joi.
Ama shole, Judas iti Galilee miring `khat ruthoi. Mijattelai khan mitampui na ama anu kha rujui uh. Ama`awm khatikhan ruthang a ama rungamna miring hai kha chekrurachai uh.

Khajarkhan tunawm chonmun hi nangni dieng kinieriei u inih: hihai miring hi ralat pui u roh, ithaw jawt kha thaw u rosho. Hihai chonmun hai hi manmieshie miring na irashak chonmun nitatu, thang rang keng.
Inia mahi Pathien ah put ah nitatu, mathang ngam u naw tinih. Pathien le rosho nangchang u rang keng.”
Amani kha khatikhan ama na rumawjawt. Khashole amani na tirtawn hai kha koi ua, rujem uh. Khan Jesu riming a chawngriei tha mak, tia chawngrubenrep ua rumoshok u joi.
Sanhedrin kha irumathan u le roroia, ama riming jar a maimawk rang a kha Pathien na irutukmashak inih, tia ningaina kha runiei uh.
Khan ningthingkip hin riethiengmun ah nit a in ah nita`awm, Jesu hi Christa inih, iti kha ruchuh le rophong ruchat u mak.

Khalai a nikho hai khan akhaichawi hai jat kha hawng rawp shishit le roroia, Greek hai na, nikhonikho a nekleshak reshemna khan, amani mieirawng hai kha ruenda uh, tia Hebrew hai chung a ningnitna boi kha rurophong uh.
Khan tirtawn shawmlieidi kha na khaichawi hai kholok kha ruchun a ruti uh, “Tirtawn kieini na Pathien chawng kha mathan a tebol chung ah nekleshak reshepna niboi pui u hi adik nimak.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai mahi chonmun hin a rashap pui rang, mi na kungichangna, Ratha Riethieng le shingna aship, ashing miring shiri nang kar ua tawk u tana kieini na madan u rang kanih.
Inia kieini tu anih le chawngshemna a repeh u rang kanih.”

Mahi chawng hi na mipui kha ningruminit pe a takashawn anieitak le Ratha Riethieng aship, Stephen, Philip, Prochorus, Nicanor, Timon, Parmenas, khan Jihudi ajir Antioch miring, Nicolas, amani hai hi rumadan uh.
Amani kha tirtawn hai maikung a rumiding ua nikna runiei pe uh, khan amani chung a khut rutet pe uh.
Khan Pathien chawng kha rurajar a Jerusalem shung ah khaichawi hai jat kha ajeng a rupung joi. Khan thiempu hai kar a tampui na takashawn kha rushap u joi.
Stephen na, takashawn le ranak ship a, miring hai kar a rekhekchon le jetna lienpui ruthaw.
Khania Synagogue Moshok Miring hai iti ah put ah miring, Cyrene, Alexandria, khan Cilicia le Asia miring hai na Stephen le chawngrieshietna rumothoi uh.
Inia ama ruchawngna shingna le Ratha chung khan rumene ngam u mak.
Khashole amani na miring eshen muruk a rurachak ua, “Ama na Moses le khan Pathien mieshietna chawngiriei kha kejet uh,” rumiti uh.
Amani na shierulien hai, danoja hai kha le roroia, mi hai kha rumarang uh. Khashole amani na jetboithieiboi a va uh, khan ama kha rushur ua Sanhedrin ah ruchawi uh.
Amani na adik boi kungchangna hai kha rupek ua ruti uh, “Mahi miringpa hi na riethiengmun le Dan irodoi pui mieshietna chawngriei kha bang mak.
Ajarla ama na iriei kejet uh, makhala mahi Nazareth Jesu hi na hi mun hi mathang rangnih, khan kieini dieng inepek Moses shedan kha melet rangnih.”
Khan Sanhedrin shung a rushuh miring kholok na ama kha ruenrep u phakhan, ama meh kha ravantir meh ang a rumuk uh.
Khashole thiempu rashang na ama dieng rurawdawn, “Hihaihi khati maw nih?”
Stephen na rumashang, “Uliennai miring hai le kapa hai, narangai pe u roh. Nupu u Abraham na Haran ah ruawm mala khan, Mesopotamia ah ruawm. Khan Pathien alur na ama dieng rular.
Khan Abraham dieng ruti, ‘Nang ram le nang inkoshangram kha mah tana kinumumuk rang a ram khawn she rang roh.’
Khashole ama na Chaldea miring hai ram kha rumathan a Haran khan kho ruloh. Apa thit shole, Pathien na tun a nangawmna u ram hin ivakthawt inih.
Ama na kepha tetna khawpshe inkoklo `khat a rupeh mak. Inia Abraham na nai runiei joi nawkawm, Pathien na ama dieng le ama shole ichicha dieng mahi ram hi tumna rang, chawngirurakham inih.
Pathien na hitihin ama dieng ruti, makhala ama chicha hai na mejet boi ram ah khotang chang u rangnih, khan amani na shok machang a kum rajamili engshiet a thaw u rangnih.
Inia Pathien na ruti, ‘Kiei na shok namachang hai phung kha chep rang kanih, khashole amani na vak shok u ning, tia mahi mun hin kiei hi chubainabawk u rangnih.’

Khashole Abraham dieng vunepna rawjawtna kha rupek. Khatikhan Abraham na Isaac runiei a ni `riet changna a vunruep pe. Khan Isaac na Jacob kha runiei, khan Jacob na phungpa hai shawmlieidi kha runiei.
“Khan phungpa hai kha na Joseph kha rueng ua, Egypt ah rujor uh. Inia ama kha Pathien na rurawtawp pui.

Khan shawna kholok ah put ah rukhek a ama dieng Egypt reng Pharaoh maikung a numpokmirit mukna ngam rang, varna kha Pathien na rupek. Khan Pharaoh na Egypt le ama inshungkhur kholok chung a rampo rumachang.
Tun Egypt le Canaan ram kholok ah nekleshak hawng ravat joi. Mahi na shawna lientak `khat hawng moshok a pilepu hai kha na nekleshak rumuh u lai mak.
Jacob na Egypt ah nekleshak awm, iti rujet phakhan, akhat changna a pilepu hai kha rutir.
Adi changna a Joseph na ama ulien hai dieng ama kha tumaw nih, iti kha rumejet. Khan Joseph inshungkhur hai kha Pharaoh dieng rumejet.
Khashole Joseph na rutir a apa Jacob le ama inshung shawm shirilieirahnga kholok kha rukoi joi.
Jacob na Egypt khan rushe a ruthi joi, khan pilepu hai kha`awm kha ram khan ruthi u joi.
Amani rok hai kha Shechem khan ruchawi ua Abraham na Shechem apa Hamor shapa hai dieng a irurawchawk thanmun khan rukhum uh.
“Inia Pathien na Abraham dieng chawngirurakham kha hawng rupumna rang a pha kha hawng nai phakhan,
Joseph ajet boi reng shik `khat hawng awm malalim Egypt ah amani jat kha rupung shishit uh.
Mahi reng hi na nuphung u kha rumohon uh, shietak a rutawn, khan pilepu hai kha engshiet a ruthaw a amani nai shentengek hai kha ringna boi rang, ranak a rumapai uh.
Hi pha hin a Moses kha rushok inih. Khan ama kha Pathien maikung a metha `khat ruchang, khan apa in khan tha `thum rujawk uh.
Khan ama kha vai ah rupai u phakhan, Pharaoh shanu na rushar a ashapatak ang a rujawk.
Khajarkhan Moses na Egypt miring hai varna kholok khan hawng ruchuk a, chawng le chon hai khan ranak hawng niei.
“Ama na kum shawm mili hawng nih phakhan, ama uliennai Israel nai hai kha phakna rang, mulung hawng niei.
Khan mi `khat hi na adik boi a ama uliennai itawn kha rumuk phakhan, rumakhana khan khutrumieshiei a Egypt miringpa kha Moses na ruthat.
Pathien na amani kha ama khut le ishanna inih, iti kha jet u rangnih, tia rumining, inia amani na rujet u mak.

Jing tieng hin ama na rushe a Israel miring pasha `di rosho a ruawm kha riengieimashakna rang, ama na ruti, ‘Miring hai nangni uliennai nangnih uh, ijar a nangni khatlekhat adik boi a rawtawn maw nangnih uh?’
Inia adik boi a rutawnpa kha na Moses kha rutor a ama dieng ruti, ‘Tu na nang kha kieini anapo rang le chawngshat rang a inamadan maw nih?
Majan a Egypt miring nangiruthat kha ang a ninathat jawt maw nih?’
Makha chawng khan Moses na rutan a Midian ram ah khotang ruchang. Makha mun khan shapa `di apa ruchang.
“Khan kum shawm mili shole, Pumi ravantir `khat na Sinai Mo ramthim khan rampabuk mieichon a ama dieng rular.
Moses na makha rumuk phakhan, imuk khan shindawngna runiei a tintana rang, rujawng phakhan, Pumi he kha ama dieng jong.
‘Kiei hi nang pilepu hai Pathien, Abraham Pathien, Isaac Pathien, khan Jacob Pathien kha kanih.’ Moses na chihai a ruen ngam mak.
‘Khashole PUMI na ama dieng ruti, “Nang kekawk kha thut roh, ajarla nang dingna mun kha mun riethieng inih.
Egypt ah kimiring hai dieng a tawnshie kha kiei na kumuk joi. Khan amani shawra`ai kha kurujet joi. Amani akhek rang khan ajong kanih joi. Tun va rang roh, Egypt ah nitir rang kanih joi.” ’

“Mahi Moses hi keng amani na irujawt boi u kha. Amani na ruti uh, ‘Tu na rampo rang le chawngshat rang, inamadan maw nih?’ Ama kha Pathien na lamkai rang le noroshoh a nakhek rang, rampabuk ah rular ravantir ranak jar a irutir inih.
Egypt ram ah Thampui Shen khan ama na rekhekchon le jetna ruthaw shole, amani kha lamirukai pe inih. Khan ramthim khan rekhekchon kha kum shawm mili iruthaw inih.
“Mahi Moses hi na keng Israel hai dieng a iruriei, ‘Nang PUMI nang Pathien na nangni rang, kiei a`ang Thiempulien `khat nang uliennai hai kar a mothoi rangnih. Ama chawng kha nangijui u rang a inih.’
Mahi Moses hi na ramthim ah puiruchun khan rujaw. Makhan ravantir na Sinai Mo khan ama dieng le nipilepu hai dieng chawngruriei. Khan kieini dieng a pek rang a ringna chawng hai kha ruloi.
Pilepu hai kha na ama chawng kha rujui jawt u mak. Kha ruhut a ama kha ruheng ua amani mulung a Egypt tieng rukir jawt uh.
Amani na Aaron dieng ruti uh, ‘Kamaton uah lawn rang pathien hai kha nokon pe u roh. Egypt ah put ah lamnawhawngkai pe u mahi Moses hi tu, ama chung a ih shok maw nih joi, iti jet u mi`ing.’
Makha phakhan, shieite rukon ua rilim khan rurawthawi uh, khan amani khutkontak khan ningrungai pe uh.

Inia Pathien na amani ah put ah mai rumiehiei a ravan a arshi chubaibawk rang rupek joi. Hitihin Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah rumiejiek: ‘Aw Israel inshung miring hai, nangithat u juleva hai kha le ramthim ah kum shawm mili nangrurawthawi u lai khan, kiei dieng nanginurupek u boi maw nih?
Moloch thamber in le nang pathien u Remphan arshi nangruchawi uh. Moloch le Remphan kha chubaibawk rang a nangirukon u konrilim hai kha inih. Khajarkhan Babylon kha mekhe a nawnawt u rang kanih joi.’
“Nipilepu hai na ramthim khan kungchangna thamber kha runiei uh. Makha Pathien na Moses dieng irilim irumumuk a chawngirupek dungjuia irukon inih.

Khan pilepu hai na, Phungshik hai khut chung a put ah amani ram rukhek u lai khan, makha Joshua le ivakchawi u inih. Pathien na amani kha pilepu hai maikung a runawt a thamber kha David phashe khan ruawm.
David na Pathien maikung a enlar rumuk a Jacob Pathien awmna rang, mun irunik inih.
Inia Solomon kha keng Pathien rang a in rumothoi kha.
“Nitjoiawm Chungchon a Rashang ama na miring hai khut le kon rilimin khan awm mak. Mahi thiempulien na iruriei kha le ra`ang inih:
‘Ravan hi kerengmun inih, khan rieliei hi kekekhawng inih. Ih ang in kha maw kiei rang nomothoi pe u rawng? Ninawkle kawshawmuchumna mun kha imaw nih?
Kukhut na hihai kholok hi ikon nimak maw? tia PUMI na ieriei.’
“Aw kangshawng, khan mulung le nokor a vunep boi miring hai! Nang pilepu hai kha ang a Ratha Riethieng kha nangre`erpui jawnjai uh.
Ih ang thiempulien hai kha maw nang pilepu hai na epshawna irupek boi uh? Amani na Midik `Khat jong rangnih, tia rurieimasha hai kha ruthat uh, khan ama ajor le athat hai kha nangruchang uh.
Nangni hi ravantir hai na irumuchuk Dan kha ruloi a rujui boi miring kha nangnih uh.”
Miring hai kha na hihaihi rujet u phakhan, mulungruhang pe ua, ama chung a harureshe uh.
Ratha Riethieng ship a ravan tieng ruen a Pathien lurna le Jesu na Pathien khut chang tieng ading kha rumuk.
Ama na ruti, “Enro! Kiei na ravan rawlawng a Miring Shapa kha na Pathien khut chang tieng ading a awm kha kumuk.”
Inia amani na nokor rushing uh, khan ra`ailam a rushukbir a ama kha rujawng uh.
Khashole amani na khopui vai tieng rupawt ua lung le rudeng u joi. Khan a kungachang hai kha na Saul iti rothar `khat keshun ah amani ponledier kha rubawm uh.
Amani na Stephen kha rudeng u lai khan, ama na nikna runiei, “Aw Pumi Jesu, karatha hi noloi pe roh.”
Khashole rukhuk shunlam a he rashangtak a rura`ai, “Aw Pumi, hihai munu hi amani dieng mutung pe naw roh.” Mahi ruriei shole, arangruchat joi. Khan amani na Stephen iruthat u khan Saul rujawt.
Khanikhan Jerusalem biekrup chung a epshawna lientak `khat hawngshok joi. Tirtawn hai niboia, takashawn kholok kha Judea le Samaria ram ah rurethehmashak joi.
Khan richichawi miring hai na Stephen kha rukhum ua, ama chung a mulung jumna runiei uh.
Inia Saul na tu in rikip ah lut a biekrup kha mupuhok a ruthaw, khan nupang apa jet boi a lungroko shung ah rukai a rukhum joi.
Khajarkhan retherak miring hai kha na munmun ah rushe ua athachawng kha rushem uh.
Philip na Samaria ah rushe a amani dieng Christa kha rurophong.
Philip na iruthaw jetna hai kha rujet a rumuk u phakhan, mipui na ama chawngriei kha mulungluttak a rurangaishom uh.
Ajarla raikho rono hai kha na ra`ailam a, aniei miring tampui ah put ah, vak shok uh, khan takthi ninawkle kekhawr miring tampui kha rumadam.
Khajarkhan kha khopui khan ningaina lientak `khat ruawm joi.
Khalaikhan makha khopui shung khan matienglai a dawileai chon thaw, Simon iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama na ibibing a alien `khat kanih, tia, Samaria miring hai kha shinrumawdawng pe uh.
Ashinalien mi kholok na “Hi miring hi Pathien ranak alien kha keng,” tia mulunglut a rurangai uh.
Ama dieng mulungluttak a irurangaina u ajartu, pha shawttak mahi dawileai hai hi le shinirumawdawng pe u inih.
Inia amani na Pathien rengchangna jar a le Jesu Christa riming chungchanga chawng rushem, Philip kha takarushawn u phakhan, nupang apa dire na baptisma ruloi uh.
Simonshe kha na`awm takarushawn joi. Khan ama na baptisma ruloi shole, Philip le chatboi a rurawtawp joi, khan ranakniei chon le jetna hai kha rumuk phakhan, shinrudawng pe.
Khan Samaria miring hai na Pathien chawng kha loi u joi, iti chawng kha Jerusalem ah awm tirtawn hai na rujet u phakhan, Peter le John kha amani dieng rutir uh.
Idi hai kha na rushe ua, takashawn `thar hai na Ratha Riethieng tumna u rang, runik pe uh.
Ajarla Ratha Riethieng na amani `khat diengshe jong maklai. Amani na Pumi Jesu riming ranga kha le baptisma iruloi u nilai.
Khashole Peter le John na amani chung ah khut rutet pe ua Ratha Riethieng kha rutum u joi.
Khan tirtawn hai khut kha amani chung ah atet shole, Ratha Riethieng irupek kha Simon na rumuk phakhan, amani dieng shier rupek.
Khan ama na ruti, “Tukhat chung ah khut hai hi katet `le, Ratha Riethieng muknathiei rang, kiei diengawm mahi cham hi nepeh u roh.”
Inia Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Pathien khutchawi hi shier pek a mukthiei, tia nangmining jarkhan, nang shier hi nang le athangchen nih rosho!
Mahi chonmun hin tum ninawkle roiruputna niei makche, ajarla nang mulung kha Pathien maikung a dik mak.
Khajarkhan mahi ashie ah put ah mulung lek tana Pathien dieng nikna niei roh. Khanitatu nang mulung na ikhin kha rangaidam pekthiei rangnih.
Ajarla mulung akha na inubuk khan dikna boi thirakarui na inokhop kha kiei na kumuk.”
Simon na mashang a ruti, “Nangiti hai kholok kha kiei dieng shokna boi rang, kiei rang Pumi dieng ninik pe roh.”
Tun Peter le John na kungruchangsho ua, Pumi chawng kha rushemsho u `le, Jerusalem ah rukir u joi. Khan lam ah athachawng kha Samaria miring hai kho tampui dieng vak shem u joi.
Khashole Pumi ravantir na Philip dieng ruriei, “Thoi roh, khan thang tieng she tana Jerusalem ah put ah Gaza tieng shena lamshuk ramthim lam kha rawh roh.”

Khajarkhan Philip na thoi a rushe joi. Khan enro, chamnieitak Ethiopia eunuch `khat ruawm. Ama kha Ethiopia miring hai rengnu Candace niei`in kholok apana runih. Ama na Jerusalem ah Pathien bieh rushe inih.
In tieng rukirna ama shakawr gari chung ah shutlam a thiempulien Isaiah behangbuk kha rute a ruawm.
Khashole Ratha na Philip dieng ruti, “Jawng tana shakawr gari khaw vak dep roh.”
Philip na rutan a ama na thiempulien Isaiah behangbuk irute a ruawm kha vak rangai phakhan, rurawdawn, “Nangite kha nangjet maw?”
Ama na ruti, “Mi `khat na lamnakai pe nawkala, itia maw kiei na jet ngam ning?” Khan Philip kha hawng lut a hawng shutna rang, ama na rudawi.
Ama na irute Miejiek khala hi inih: “That rang a ichawi kengam ang a, khan moeppa maikung a a`awmchien kengamte kha ang a, ama na bai rumakak mak.
Ama redena khan, ama dikna kha loi pe joi. Tu na maw ama chicha hai jar a rophong nih? Ajarla rieliei ah put ah iringkho kha loi pe joi.”
Eunuch na Philip dieng ruti, “Nawrawdawn rawng, thiempulien na tu jar a iriei maw nih, ibibing jar a maw nih ninawkle tu `khat chungchanga iriei maw nih?”
Khashole Philip na ener rumakak a mahi miejiektak hin ah put ah Jesu chungchanga athachawng kha rurophong pe joi.
Khan amani na lam kha ivakrawh u le roroia, tui awmna mun `khat ruawm, khan eunuch na ruti, “Enro, hin tui awm joi, kiei baptisma ninomoloi rang hin tu na maw namakha nih?”
Khan Philip na ruti, “Nang mulung kholok le takanangshawn a tu, nangthawthiei.” Khan ama na mashang a ruti, “Kiei na Jesu Christa hi Pathien Shapa kha inih, iti hi takakawshawn.”
Shakawr gari kha dingna rang chawng rupek a, Philip le eunuch adin u tui awmna tieng khan ruchum uh, khan ama na baptisma rupek joi.
Amani na tui ah put ah hawng shok phakhan, Pumi Ratha na Philip kha ruchawi joi. Eunuch na ama kha rumulai mak, khan ama na ningailam a rupang joi.
Inia Philip na Azotus khan rurumuh joi, khan Philip na khopui kholok ah athachawng kha Caesarea vak shok masheng, rushem joi.
Khalaikhan Saul na Pumi khaichawi hai kha michitna rang le thatna rang, chawngrumoshok a thiempu rashang dieng rushe.

Ama na Damascus ah awm synagogue hai dieng mawchawi rang, chawngmawchawi `khat runik. Makha ama na Lam khan a awm, nupang apa, muk joiatu, Jerusalem ah vak chawi a lungroko shung ah thongna rang a inih.
Khan ama na rushe a Damascus rushokdeng le jetboithieiboi a ravan ah put ah mieivar na ama kha rokochip a jong eh joi.
Pieipak ah rupur a he `khat na ama dieng iriei kha rujet: “Saul, Saul, iloia kiei hi epshie a ninawthaw maw nih?”
Ama na rurawdawn, “Tumaw nangnih, Pumi?” Khan Pumi na rumashang, “Kiei hi epshie a nangithaw Jesu kha kanih. Rujumjap ruthui, iti hi amatat inih.”
Ama na rawnawk le shindawnglam a ruti, “Pumi, kiei hi nang rang imaw ninawmawthaw jawt?” Khan Pumi na ama dieng rumashang, “Thoi tana khopui khawn lut roh, nangithaw rang a kha nieriei rangnih.”
Ama le rurawtawp hai kha na chawng boi a ruding uh, ajarla he kha rujet u joiawm, tute rumuh u mak.
Pieipak ah put ah Saul na ruthoi a imik hawng makak phakhan, mik rumuh ngamlai mak. Khajarkhan amani na khut ah rumuroi ua Damascus tieng ruchawi u joi.
Khan ama na ni `thum mik muh boi a le nekleshak shah boi a ruawm.
Damascus shung khan Ananias iti khaichawi `khat ruawm. Pumi na mulungmik a ama dieng ruriei, “Ananias.” Ama na rumashang, “Hin ka`awm, Pumi.”
Pumi na ama dieng ruriei, “Thoi tana Lamton iti lamlien khawn she roh, khan Saul iti Tarsus miring `khat Judas in ah vak tawk roh, ajarla enro, ama na nikna niei a awm.
Khan imik hawng muknathiei rang, Ananias iti miring `khat va a ama chung ah khut ivaktet pe rang a kha Saul na mulungmik a rumuk joi.”
Inia Ananias na rumashang, “Pumi, Jerusalem ah awm nang miriethieng hai dieng khadawr khan ashie ruthaw, iti hi mi tampui ah put ah hi miringpa jar hi kurujet.
Khan mahin nang riming aban kholok kha shurna rang, thiempu ulien hai ah put ah cham `khat iniei inih.”
Inia Pumi na ama dieng ruti, “She roh, ajarla Phungshik hai, reng hai le Israel miring hai maikung a kiriming achawi rang khutshui `khat a kiei rang kamadan joi.
Hijarhin kiriming jarbak a idawrshe a shawna idoingir rang a maw nih kiei na mumuk rang kanih.”

Khashole Ananias na rushe a in khan rulut joi. Khan Saul chung ah ukhut rutet pe a ruti, “Uliennai Saul, lam ah nang dieng rular Pumi Jesu na, nangmuknathiei rang le Ratha Riethieng na nang chung a shipnathiei rang, kiei hi inavaktir inih.”
Khan relentak a imik ah put ah ngalip a`ang kha jongcho pe a imik kha hawng var pe joi, khan ruthoi a baptisma ruloi joi.
Khan nekleshak lekte rushak shole, ranak hawng niei joi. Khashole Damascus ah awm khaichawi hai le nikho shawtlawk ruawm.
Khan relentak a ama hi Pathien Shapa kha inih, tia Christa kha synagogue ah rophong ruput joi.

Ama chawng rurangai mi kholok na shindawngna runiei ua, ruti uh, “Hi miringpa hi Jerusalem ah Jesu riming aban hai mathangpa le amani kha shur a thiempu ulien hai dieng chawina rang, hin ah ava nimak maw?”
Saul na ranak ajeng a hawng niei shishit joi, khan Jesu hi Christa inih, iti hi akalang madangmashak phakhan, Damascus ah awm Jihudi hai kha awkruchak u joi.
Nikhothang hawng shawtbawt le Jihudi hai na ama kha thatna rang, rurashak uh.
Inia Saul na amani chonrashak kha rujet. Ama kha thatna rang, shumkawtpakawt ah shunlejan a amani na ruva uh.
Inia khaichawi hai na ama kha ruchawi ua jan a bang rebeng ah tiengkum lien `khat a rumuchum u joi.
Ama na Jerusalem ah vat phakhan, khaichawi hai kha le rawlawpna rang ruthaw. Inia amani kholok na ama kha ruchih uh, ajarla amani na khaichawi `khat chang joi, iti kha takarushawn u mak.

Inia Barnabas na ama kha vak moroi a tirtawn hai dieng vak chawi. Ama na lamlien ah Pumi kha irumuk a ama dieng chawng irurieina le Jesu riming a ngartak a Damascus shung ah chawng irurieina hai kha amani dieng rumejet.
Khashole amani le shehawng a Jerusalem ah ruawm joi.
Khan Pumi Jesu riming a ngartak a chawngruriei joi. Ama na Greek chawng a chawng Jihudi hai le chawngrurieshiet, khan amani na ama kha that rang rurashak uh.
Uliennai hai kha na makha rujet u phakhan, Caesarea tieng ruchawi ua Tarsus tieng rumuchum u joi.
Khalaikhan Judea, Galilee khan Samaria ah awm biekrup hai kha lungdamtak a ruawm ua rulien uh. Pumi chitna le Ratha Riethieng maw`awina kha le amani jat kha rupung shishit uh.
Khan hitihin ruawm makhala Peter na ram kholok a rushe a Lydda ah awm miriethieng hai kha`awm ruphak.
Kha mun khan rishi delap a kum riet ana, Aeneas iti miring `khat hi Peter na vak muk. Ama kha takthi miring runih.
Peter na ama dieng ruti, “Aeneas, Jesu Christa na nang kha namadam joi. Thoi tana nang jana kha jo rang roh.” Khan ama na relentak a ruthoi joi.
Khan Lydda le Sharon ah awm mi kholok na ama kha rumuk ua, Pumi dieng ruhiei u joi.
Khalaikhan Tabitha iti khaichawi `khat hi Joppa khan ruawm. Makha nemele `le, Dorcas tina inih. Ama kha chon atha le numpokpek chonthaw miring `khat runih.
Khalaikhan ama kha ana a ruthi joi. Amani na tuirobomashaksho u le, chungindan `khat a rumaja u joi.
Lydda kha Joppa le ranai nit jarkhan, khaichawi hai na Peter kha khawn awm iti kha rujet ua akoi pasha `di rutir uh. Amani na relentak a navat pe u roh, tia rudawi uh.

Khajarkhan Peter na ruthoi a rushe, khan kha mun kha rushok phakhan, amani na ama kha chungindan khan ruhawng pui uh. Mieirawng hai kholok na ama dieng ruding ua, amani le ruawmlai a, Dorcas na iruchi pe u takdep le ponledier hai kha rumumuk ua ruchap uh.

Peter na amani kholok kha vai rumoshok a rukhuk shunlam a nikna runiei. Ama na rok tieng khan hiei a ruti, “Tabitha, thoi rang roh.” Khashole ama na imik hawng makak a Peter kha hawng muk phakhan, hawng shuh joi.
Khan ama na khut rushawn a ama kha rumothoi joi. Khashole miriethieng hai le mieirawng hai kha rukoi a, iringlam a ama kha rupek joi.
Mahi Joppa ah awm kholok na rujet ua, miring tampui na Pumi kha takarushawn uh.
Khalaikhan Joppa ah Simon iti mevunchonthaw `khat le nikho shawtbawt ruawm.
Caesarea ah Cornelius iti miring `khat ruawm. Ama kha Italy rarup iti rarajakhat lamkai runih.
Ama inshung kholok le ama kha richichawi, Pathien kha achih, mi hai dieng numpokpek arat, khan Pathien dieng nikna aniei jawnjai miring `khat runih.
Nishun nidan `thum dawr hin Pathien ravantir `khat na jong a “Cornelius!” tia ijonghai kha mulungmik a malangsheng a ama na rumuk.
Ama dieng chitlam a ruenrep a ruti, “Mahi imaw nih, Pumi?” Ama na rumashang, “Nanginikna le nang numpokpek hai kha miningna `khat a Pathien maikung hawng shok joi.
Tun Joppa ah miring hai kha tir tana Peter iti Simon kha vak mokoi roh.
Ama kha thampui kawmchang ah awm, mevunchonthaw miring, Simon iti miring `khat in ah awm inih. Peter na nangithaw rang a kha nieriei rangnih.”
Ama dieng chawng ariei ravantir kha rushe shole, Cornelius na ama inshung shok `di le ama arung richichawi ramiring `khat rukoi.
Khan amani dieng irikip ruriei shole, Joppa ah rutir joi.
Jing tieng, nidan shawmlieidi dawr hin, amani na lam rurawh ua khopui kha ivakdep u le roroia, Peter na inphu chung ah Pathien dieng anih rang ruka.
Ama kha vawnrucham pe a ih `khat rushak jawt. Khan amani na ama rang rurasham pe u lai khan, ama kha shuika a ruawm joi.
Ama na ravan rawlawng kha rumuk, khan ama dieng nieinak `khat pon alien mawr mili a khit a rieliei a ijongmuchum kha rumuk.
Makha shung khan ke mili niei rieliei ranring kholok, ramsha hai, vawn a rawshawn, khan ravan a va haiawm ruawm.
Khan he `khat na ruriei, “Peter, thoi roh, that tana shah roh.”
Inia Peter na ruti, “Nithiei naw nih, Pumi! Ajarla itikte nita`awm orono ninawkle riethieng boi nieinak kiei na shah mi`ing.”
He kha na voidi changna a jong rieiret, “Pathien na iriethiengsho hai kha nang na orono keng tithiei naw tinih.”
Hitihin voithum rushok a nieinak hai kha ravan tieng ruchawiret joi.
Peter na mulungmik a irumuk kha ih tina maw nih, tia shindawngna runieilaitak khan, Cornelius na ivaktir hai kha na pakawt khan ruding ua, Simon in kha rurawdawn uh.
Amani na rukoi ua Peter iti Simon kha hin maw awm, tia rurawdawn uh.
Peter na mulungmik chungchanga rumininglaitak khan, Ratha na ama dieng ruriei, “Enro, miring pasha `thum na nang kha natawk uh.
Thoi tana chum rang roh, khan rakhana niei boi a amani le she roh, ajarla amani hi kivaktir hai kha inih.”
Khajarkhan Peter na jong chum a Cornelius na ivaktir miring hai dieng ruti, “Nangitawk u kha kiei hi kanih, ijar a va maw nangnih uh?”

Amani na rumashang uh, “Rarajakhat lamkai, midik, Pathien kha achih miring, khan Jihudi phung kholok na richit ipek u, Cornelius na nang kha ama in ah koi a nang ah put ah chawng rangaina rang hin, ravantir riethieng na jong mejet.”
Khajarkhan Peter na amani kha rukoi a ama in ah rumutung joi. Jing tieng hin ama na ruthoi a amani le khan Joppa ah awm uliennai eshen le rawtawp a rushe joi.
Jing tieng hin amani na Caesarea vak shok u joi. Cornelius na amani kha rungak a ruawm, khan inshung miring hai le lawmdit hai kha lawpkhat a rukoi.
Peter na vak shok le roroia, Cornelius na lamjawng ruthaw a ekeshun ah bawklap a ama kha chubairubawk.
Inia Peter na rumothoi a ruti, “Thoi roh, keiawm miring kanih keng.”
Khan Peter na chawngiruriei pui le roroia, in rulut a mi tampui ruchun a ruawm kha vak muk.

Khan amani dieng ruti, “Jihudi `khat na Phungshik le rawtawp ninawkle alawn hi dan nih boi inih, iti hi nangjet uh. Inia kiei na tu kha`awm rono ninawkle riethieng boi kitina boi rang, Pathien na kiei dieng numumuk joi.
Khajarkhan kiei hi nangnavak mokoi phakhan, rakhana niei boi a kava hi inih. Khajarkhan tun kiei na nawrawdawn rawng: ijar a kiei hi ninavakmokoi u maw nih?”

Cornelius na rumashang, “Ni mili mala khan, mahi phatak hin kiei na chamrakurudoi, khan nidan `thum dawr hin ki`in ah nikna kuruniei. Khan enro, pon cheklak rieshiei miring `khat na kamaton ah jong ding.
Khan ama na ruti, ‘Cornelius, nanginikna kha Pathien na rangai joi, khan nang numpokpek hai kha Pathien na nimininghep pe joi.
Khajarkhan Joppa ah awm, Peter iti Simon kha akoi tir roh. Ama kha thampui kawmchang ah awm, mevunchonthaw Simon in ah awm inih. Ama na vat phakhan, nang dieng chawng nieriei pe rangnih.’
Khajarkhan relentak a nang kha anakoi rang kivaktir inih. Nangnavat pe jar hin mapak awm. Pathien na nang dieng chawng inepek kholok rangai rang, tun Pathien maikung a kokholok a ka`awm u hi inih.”
Khashole abai makak a Peter na ruti, “Diktak a Pathien na enshietenlar thaw mak iti hi kejet joi.
Inia phung rikip shung a tunita`awm ama achih le adik athaw miring kha ama na ipawm inih.
Mahi Pathien na Israel miring hai dieng ijongtir chawng kha inih. Jesu Christa jar a lungdamna kha ama na irushem inih. Ama kha kholok Pumi inih.
Baptisma chungchanga John na rushem shole, Galilee ah put ah Judea kholok ah ashok chon kha nangrujet u joi.

Pathien na Ratha Riethieng le khan ranak le Nazareth Jesu kha thaoirunawt kha nangjet uh. Pathien na ama kha rawtawp pui jarkhan, shehawng a chon atha kha ruthaw a diabol ranak thoi a ruawm kholok kha irumadam inih.
“Jihudi hai ram ah le Jerusalem ah iruthaw hai kholok kha kungkuruchang uh. Amani na ama kha thing ling ah makhai a iruthat u inih.
Inia Pathien na ni `thum changna khan rumothoi a malangsheng a ruralarmashak.
Mi kholok dieng rular nimak, inia kungchang rang, Pathien na matieng irumadan hai, khan athi ah put ah hawng thoi shole, ama le runerusha hai, kieini dieng a inih.
Mi hai dieng chawngshem rang le khan Pathien na irumadan ama kha aring le athi hai chung a chawngshatpa kha inih, tia kungchangna rang, chawng nurupek u joi.
Thiempulien kholok na mahi Jesu chungchanga kungruchang uh, makhala tunita`awm ama dieng takashawn kha na ama riming jar a munu ah put ah rangaidamna kha muk rangnih.”
Peter na chawngriei a ruawmlai khan, Ratha Riethieng na chawngrurangai hai kholok dieng jong chutna joi.
Peter le ava vunep takashawn hai kha na, Phungshik hai diengawm Ratha Riethieng khutchawi jong shok jarkhan, shindawngna runiei uh.
Ajarla amani na chawngshik a ruchawng ua Pathien imapak u kha rujet uh. Khashole Peter na ruriei,
“Kieini na niniei u tak kha ang a, Ratha Riethieng amuh miring hai hi baptisma aloi ah put ah tu maw amakha ngam rang?”
Khajarkhan Pumi riming a amani kha baptisma loina rang, chawng rupek uh. Khashole amani na nikho shawtbawt awmna rang, Peter kha rudawi uh.
Khan Judea ah awm tirtawn hai le uliennai hai na Phungshik hai na`awm Pathien chawng kha man u joi, iti kha rujet u joi.
Khajarkhan Peter na Jerusalem ah rushe phakhan, vunep miring hai na chawngrurieshiet pui uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Vunep boi hai dieng nangshe a amani le nekleshak nangvakshak pui.”
Khania Peter na amani dieng dawdawn a ariei ruput,
“Kiei na Joppa ah nikna kuruniei a shuika a kuruawmlai khan mulungmik `khat kurumuk. Makhan pon alientak `khat ang a ravan ah put ah nieinak `khat shir mili ah khitlam a jong rede a nojong dep.
Depkhit a kuruen phakhan, rieliei a awm ke mili niei ranring, ramsha, vawn a rawshawn, khan chung a va hai kha kurumuk.
He `khat na kiei dieng inieriei kha kurujet, ‘Peter, thoi roh. That tana shah roh.’
“Inia kiei na kurumashang, ‘Nithiei naw nih, Pumi! Ajarla itikte nita`awm orono ninawkle riethieng boi kabai ah lut mak lai.’
Inia voidi changna a ravan a he kha na nurumashang, ‘Pathien na iriethiengsho hai kha nang na rono tithiei naw tinih.’
Hitihin voithum rushok, khan irikip kha ravan tieng ruchawiret joi.
“Khalaitak khan enro, Caesarea ah put ah ivaktir miring `thum kha kaw`awmna in khan vak tung uh.
Amani le rakhana niei boi a sheshomna rang, kiei dieng Ratha na nururiei. Uliennai `ruk hi na`awm nawrawtawp pui ua miringpa in khan kurulut uh.
Ama in ah ravantir na jong ding kha rumuk a ‘Joppa ah awm Peter iti Simon akoi rang miring tir roh.
Nang le nang inshung miring kholok inashanna rang a chawng kha ama na nepek u rangnih,’ tia ijongriei dan kha kieini dieng nururiei uh.
“Kiei na amani dieng chawngriei kiruput le roroia, putna ah put ah kieini dieng ajong kha ang a, Ratha Riethieng kha amani dieng jong shok nih joi.
Khan ‘John na tui a baptisma nurupek uh, inia kiei na tu Ratha Riethieng a baptisma nepek u rang kanih,’ iti Pumi chawng kha kurumininghep.
Kieini na Pumi Jesu Christa kha takanurushawn u phakhan, inurupek u kha le ra`angre a, khutchawi kha Pathien na amani dieng rupek u joiatu, Pathien kha makha ngam rang kiei tumaw kanih?”
Amani na makha rujet u phakhan, ruawmchien uh, khan Pathien kha mulur a ruti uh, “Khanitatu Pathien na Phungshik hai diengawm ringna muknathiei mulung lekna kha rupek joi.”

Khan Stephen chung a iruthaw u epshawna jar a achairak hai kha Phoenicia ram, Cyprus tuikawram, khan Antiochshe kha ruravak u joi. Amani na Jihudi hai dieng niboia, tute dieng chawng kha rushem u mak.
Inia amani kar a Cyprus tuikawram le Cyrene miring eshen na Antioch ah va ua Greek chawng a chawng Jihudi hai diengawm Pumi Jesu chungchanga athachawng kha rurophong uh.
Pumi khut kha amani le ruawm, khan miring tampui na takarushawn ua, Pumi dieng ruhiei uh.
Mahi chawng hi Jerusalem biekrup nokor vak shok phakhan, Barnabas kha Antioch ah shena rang, rutir u joi.
Ama na ava a Pathien numpokmirit kha vak muk phakhan, ningrungai pe, khan amani na mulungdingrep a Pumi dieng awmna jawnjai u rang, amani kholok kha rumawshawk uh.
Ajarla Barnabas kha miring atha runih, khan Ratha Riethieng le takashawn kha aship miring kha runih. Khan Pumi dieng mi tampui rubo joi.
Khan Barnabas na Tarsus tieng Saul atawk rushe joi.

Khan ama kha rumuk phakhan, Antioch ah vak chawi joi. Khajarkhan kum rupumping a biekrup le ruruchun ua, mi tampui ruruchuk uh. Antioch hin akhat changna a khaichawi hai kha Christian hai, tia rukoi uh.
Kha pha khan thiempulien hai na Jerusalem ah put ah Antioch tieng va uh.

Amani hai kar a Agabus iti miring `khat ruding a Ratha na nuk a ashok rang a kha rurieina, makhala manmieshie pumpui hin nekleshak hawng ravat rangnih. Mahi Claudius Caesar na reng ruchanglai khanawm rushok nih joi.
Akhaichawi hai na imawtawrtuk ua Judea ah awm takashawn hai dieng shanna mawchawina rang, mulungrumiding uh.
Hitihin ruthaw ua Barnabas le Saul khut a bieklamkai hai dieng rumawchawi uh.
Khalaikhan reng Herod na khut ruraw a epshie a thawna rang, biekrup miring eshen hi rushur joi.
Ama na John ulienpa James kha chemjam le ruthat joi.
Khashole makha na Jihudi hai kha ningmangai pe, iti rujet `le, dawn a Peter kha`awm shurna rang, rurashak joi. Makha Chawjawboi Tan Nikho hai khan a inih.
Ama na ama kha rushur shole, lungroko shung ah ruthong joi. Ama kha arung rang tetradion mili dieng khutrurotho joi. Makha Rakanna shole, miring hai dieng vak chawina rang a inih.
Peter kha lungroko shung ah rutetlai khan, biekrup na ama rang mulungluttak a Pathien dieng nikna runiei uh.
Herod na vai ivakmoshokna rang a jantak khan, Peter na thirakarui `di le khoplam a ramiring `di kar ah ruja, khan mawkawt maton khan mirung hai kha na lungroko kha rurung uh.

Khan jetboithieiboi a Pumi ravantir na Peter maikung a jong lar a lungroko kha jong erak joi. Khan Peter kha edep ah jong shun, khan mothoi a ruti, “Relentak a thoi roh.” Khan aban ah thirakarui hai kha ruruthut pe joi.
Ravantir na ama dieng ruti, “Rasham tana nang kethawp kha mawrawn roh.” Makha Peter na ruthaw. Khan ravantir na rutiret, “Nang kotai rosho kha ko tana nujui roh.”
Peter na vak shok a ama anu kha rujui joi. Inia ravantir na iruthaw kha tak keng, tia rumining mak, inia mulungmik imuk `khat a rumining.

Amani na akhat changna le adi changna mirungna kha vak rakansho u le, khopui jawngna thirkawtpui kha vak shok uh. Amani rang khan nining a rurawlawng a makha vak rakan u joi. Khan kholaidung `khat hi rulawn u `le, jetboithieiboi a ravantir kha na rumak joi.
Khashole Peter na hawng chehep a ruti, “Herod khut ah put ah le Jihudi miring kholok na irumining uah put ah nashan rang, Pumi na ama ravantir kha ijongtir inih, iti hi ridinghet a kejet joi.”
Mahi jetphit `le, Mark iti John unu, Mary in ah rushe joi. Makha mun khan miring tampui ruruchun a nikna niei a ruawm uh.
Peter na vai tieng mawkawt kha rutaw phakhan, mashang rang, Rhoda, iti nungak-shok `khat hi rushe.
Peter hesho keng, iti rujet le ningai pe hai a mawkawt kha mawlawng ruhut a inshung tieng rutan a Peter mawkawt ah ding joi, tia vak riei.
Amani na ama dieng ruti uh, “Nang vet joi.” Inia ama na dikhet, tia ranaktak a ruriei. Khan amani na “Makha Peter ravantir keng,” ruti uh.
Peter na mawkawt kha rutaw a ruawm. Amani na mawkawt kha mawlawng a rumuk u phakhan, dawnga shinrudawng pe uh.

Amani kha awmchienna u rang, khut le rumakha a, Pumi na ama kha lungroko ah put ah ivakmoshokna dan kha ruriei. Khan ama na ruti, “Hihaihi James le uliennai hai dieng vak rophong u roh.” Khashole makha mun kha mathan a mun `khat tieng rushe joi.
Peter chung a khatikhan a ashok chon jarkhan, jingkar tieng ramiring hai kar a roshorakhana lientak rushok.
Herod na ama kha rutawk a rumuk boi phakhan, arung hai kha riringtak a enrete a thatna rang, chawng rupek joi. Hi shole hin Herod na Judea kha mathan joi, khan Caesarea ah rushe a makhan ruawm joi.

Khalaikhan Herod na Tyre le Sidon miring hai dieng dawnga mulung hangna runiei. Inia amani na mulung `khat a rengpa jana apana Blastus kha le rurashap ua, lungdam awmna rang ruthaw uh, ajarla rengpa ram kha na amani ram miring hai kha nekleshak irupek u inih.
Herod na nikho madan `khat a rengpon kha rurieshiei a chawngshatna shutna kha ruloh joi. Makhan Herod na mipui dieng chawngruriei pe.
Miring hai na hitihin rura`ai uh, “Pathien he keng, manmieshie he nimak!”
Ama na Pathien kha rumulur boi jarkhan, relentak a, Pumi ravantir `khat na ama kha jong jem a rulung na shak a ruthi joi.
Inia Pathien chawng kha rupung a rurajar joi.
Khashole amani chonmun kha rurupummashak ua, Barnabas le Saul kha Jerusalem ah put ah vak kir u joi. Khan amani na Mark iti John kha vak rawtawp pui uh.
Khan Antioch biekrup khan thiempulien hai le oja hai ruawm uh. Amani khala: Barnabas, Niger iti Simeon, Cyrene ah awm Lucius, tetrarch Herod le rulienshom Manaen, khan Saul, hihaihi runih uh.
Amani na Pumi chon thaw a chamrarudoi u lai khan, Ratha Riethieng na ruti, “Barnabas le Saul kha kikoina chonmun khan kiei rang shikjek a natet pe u roh.”
Khashole chamradoilam a nikna runiei uh, khan amani chung ah khut rutet pe ua amani kha rutir u joi.
Khajarkhan amani kha Ratha Riethieng na rutir ua Seleucia khan rushe u joi. Khan ah put ah Cyprus tieng rokong a rushe u joi.
Amani na Salamis kha rushok u phakhan, Jihudi hai synagogue ah Pathien chawng kha rushem uh. Khan John kha`awm amani rashap pui rang, rurawtawp pui uh.
Amani na tuikawram kholok kha rakan a Paphosshe kha rushok uh, khan Bar-Jesu iti Jihudi miring `khat rurawtawng pui uh. Ama kha dawipu le thiempulien jok `khat runih.
Ama na proconsul Sergius Paulus mishingtak `khat le ruawm. Sergius Paulus na Barnabas le Saul kha rukoi a Pathien chawng kha rurangai jawt.
Inia dawipu, Elymas (makha iriming imele inih) ama na amani kha rure`erpui a proconsul kha makha takashawn ah put ah hieina rang, ruthaw.
Inia Paul tia`awm ikoi, Saul na, Ratha Riethieng na jong ship a, ama kha enrep a
ruti, “Nang hi mimohonna kholok le milemmidawi aship, dikna kholok le raha, diabol shapa kha nangnih. Pumi lam ridik nangirehermashak kha bang naw rawng maw?

Enro, Pumi khut kha nang dieng jong cho joi. Nang mik chawning, tia richinkhat ni kha muh ngamlai naw tinih.” Relentak a romiei le ajing kha ama dieng jong pe a tukhat na khut mukui a lamikai pe rang a kha rutawk joi.
Proconsul kha na ashok chon kha rumuk phakhan, takarushawn, khashole Pumi chungchanga ruchukna khan shindawngna runiei.
Khashole Paul le irawtawp pui hai kha na Paphos ah put ah rushe ua, Pamphylia ah awm Perga khan rokong a va u joi. Inia John tu amani kha mak a Jerusalem tieng rukir joi.
Inia amani na Perga ah put ah rokong a rushe ua Pisidia ah awm Antioch ah va uh, khan Sabbath nikho khan synagogue ah rulut a rushuh uh.

Synagogue lamkai hai kha na Dan le Thiempulien behangbuk hai kha rutesho u le, amani dieng chawngrumeshe a ruti uh, “Uliennai miring hai, nangni na miring hai rang mawshawkna nangniei u joiatu, nieriei pe u roh.”
Khajarkhan Paul na ruthoi a khut le jetna thawlam a ruti, “Aw Israel miring hai le Pathien kha achih miring hai, rangai u roh.

Mahi Israel miring hai Pathien hi na nipilepu hai kha iruramadan inih. Amani na Egypt ram ah milak `khat a ruawm u lai khan, Pathien na amani kha irumielien a banbo rashang kha le makha ram ah put ah ivakroshoh u inih.
Ajarla ramthim khan kum shawm mili dawr hi amani ringdan kha irushaw pui inih.
Pathien na Canaan ram khan phung shiri rumathang shole, amani ram kha inkoklo `khat a amani dieng irushem pe inih.
Makha shole, thiempulien Samuelshe kha, kum rajamili shawm rahnga dawr hi amani dieng chawngshat hai kha rupek.
Makha shole, amani na reng runik uh, khan Pathien na Kish shapa Saul kha amani rang rupek. Ama kha Benjamin phung ah put ah inih, khan ama na kum shawm mili reng ruchang.
Ama kha rumabang shole, David kha Pathien na amani reng rumachang. Ama chungchanga kungchang a ruti, ‘Kumulung le racha rang Jesse shapa David kha kumuk joi. Ama na kimining kholok kha thaw rangnih.’
“Chawngrakham dungjuia David chicha ah put ah Israel hai rang Shandampa Jesu kha ijongmoshok inih.
Jesu jong shok mala khan John na mulung lek a baptisma loina chungchanga Israel miring kholok dieng rurophong pe joi.

Khan John na ama chon kha rumawtawr shole, ruti, ‘Kiei hi tumaw kanih, tia nangmining uh? Kiei hi ama kha nimi`ing, inia enro, kanuk a ajong rang a ama kha tu, ama kethawp thut rangshe kiei rutuk mi`ing.’
“Uliennai miring hai, Abraham chicha hai le nang kar ua Pathien kha achih miring hai, nangni dieng mahi shandamna chawng hi jong tir joi.
Ajarla Jerusalem ah awm miring hai le rampo hai kha na ama kha rujet u mak. Amani na Jesu kha iruheng u kha na, Sabbath rikip a irute u, Thiempulien hai hesho hai kha irurupummashak u inih.
Ama thitna rang a jar kha rumuk pe u nawkawm, ama kha thatna rang, amani na Pilate dieng runik uh.
Ama chungchanga irumiejiek rikip kha rurupummashaksho u `le, thing ling ah put ah ruloi ua than ah rumaja uh.
Inia Pathien na ama kha athi hai kar ah put ah irumothoi inih.
Khan nikhothang shawtbawt `le, Galilee ah put ah Jerusalemshe a ihawngpuishom hai dieng rular. Khan amani na mi hai dieng kungruchang uh.
“Khan pilepu hai dieng chawngirurakham athachawng kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih.

Jesu kha athi hai kar ah put ah rumothoi a, mahi chawngrakham hi Pathien na amani nai hai kieini rang rurupummashak joi. Mahi adi changna Lah a imiejiek kha le ra`ang inih: ‘Nang kashapa kha nangnih, von nikho hin konomoshok joi.’

Ama rok kha thutna boi rang, Pathien na athi hai kar ah put ah rumothoi joi. Ama chungchanga Pathien na hitihin ruriei: ‘David dieng irupek takashawn rang a rutuk le chawngrakham riethieng kha nang dieng nepek rang kanih.’
Khajarkhan Lah `khat a`awm ruti: ‘Nang Miring Riethieng kha na thutna imuk rang a kha nang na jawt naw tinih.’
“Ajarla David na Pathien idit dungjuia ama rongtak hai chon kha ruthaw shole, ruthi joi. Khan pilepu hai jana khan rumaja uh, khan thutna kha rumuk.
Inia Pathien na imothoi miring kha na tu thutna rumuh mak.
“Khajarkhan uliennai miring hai, mahi miring jar a munu chung a rangaidamna kha nangni dieng kirophong inih. Mahi nangni na nangijet u nih rosho.
Takashawn miring rikip kha, Moses Dan na iridik ngam boi kholok ah put ah, Jesu jar a iridik ngam inih.
Khajarkhan thiempulien behangbuk ah iruriei hai kha nangni dieng shokna boi rang, riring u roh:

‘Enro, mi ishawnboi a thaw hai, shindawngna niei u tana thang u roh. Ajarla nang nikho u hai hin, tukhat na nangni dieng nieriei u sheawm takashukshawn a nangishawn boi u rang a chon kha thaw rang kanih.’ ”
Jihudi miring hai synagogue kha irumathan le roroia, hawng shok rang a Sabbath hin Paul le Barnabas na hi hai chungchanga roirieinaret rang, Phunshik hai kha na rudawi uh.

Synagogue ah ruchun kha ruchin u `le, Jihudi hai tampui le Jihudi richi a jir richichawi hai kha na Paul le Barnabas kha rujui ua, amani na Pathien numpokmirit khan ruawm jawnjaina u rang, chawngruriei pe uh.
Ahawng rang a Sabbath khan khopui shung ah awm miring arawplam na Pathien chawng rangai rang, ruruchun uh.
Inia Jihudi hai na mipui kha rumuk u phakhan, mukmakna runiei uh. Paul na iriei hai kha perawlaw le mieshietna chawng rumachang pe ua rurodoi pui uh.

Khashole Paul le Barnabas na mulungar`er a rumashang uh, “Akhat changna a Pathien chawng hi nangni dieng riei rang a hi irangai inih. Inia makha nangni na nangheng ua kumshawt ringna rang khan nang nining ua rutukmashak u lai makche. Khajarkhan enro, kieini Phungshik hai dieng kahiei u joi.
Ajarla Pumi na kieini dieng chawng nurupek uh: ‘Phungshik hai rang mieivar nitna rang, kiei na nang kha kanamadan joi. Makha rieliei dawngshe khan shandamna kha nangchawina rang a inih.’ ”
Phunshik hai na mahi rujet u phakhan, ningai a Pumi chawng kha rumulur uh. Khan kumshawt ringna rang a madansha hai kholok kha na takarushawn uh.
Khatikhan Pumi chawng kha ram kholok khan rura`ar joi.

Inia Jihudi hai na richichawi le richit`awm nupang hai, khan khopui shung ah lamkai hai kha rumawphawk ua, Paul le Barnabas chung a epshawna pek rang rumuchun uh. Khan amani ram ah put ah amani kha runawt u joi.
Khajarkhan Paul le Barnabas na eke uah akawp vaiphin kha amani le re`erpuina `khat a rukhawng ua Iconium ah rushe u joi.
Khan khaichawi hai kha na ningai le Ratha Riethieng khan ruship uh.
Khan Iconium ah hitihin rushok makhala Paul le Barnabas na Jihudi hai synagogue ah rulut a khatikhan chawngruriei u shole, Jihudi le Greek mipui lientak `khat na takarushawn uh.
Inia takarushawn boi Jihudi hai kha na Phungshik hai kha rumuchun ua, uliennai hai chung a ningshietna rumieniei uh.

Khajarkhan amani na pha shawttak kha mun khan ruawm ua, ama numpokmirit chawng chungchanga kungruchang, jetna le rekhekchon hai kha amani khut hai kha le thawna rang rupeh, Pumi chungchanga mulungar`er a chawng ruriei uh.
Inia khopui shung ah awm miring hai kha rureshen uh. Eshen na Jihudi hai kha rurachang pui uh, khan eshen na tirtawn hai kha.
Khan Phungshik hai le Jihudi hai na amani rampo hai kha le engshiet thawna rang le lung le dengna rang, rurasham u joi.
Makha tirtawn hai kha na rujet ua Lycaonia ah awm Lystra le Derbe, khan makha ramroko shung hai khan rutan u joi.
Khan kha mun khan athachawng kha rurophong uh.
Lystra shung khan eke mothoi thiei boi miring `khat rushuh, ajarla ama kha unu shung ah put ah kekhawr, alawn boilak, miring `khat runih.
Paul na chawngrurieilai khan ama na mulungluttak a rurangai. Paul na ama kha ruenrep a damnathiei rang a ama takashawn kha rumuk pe.
He rashangtak a ruti, “Thoi tana nang ke a thaning a ding roh.” Khan ama na hawng chawm a rulawn joi.
Paul na iruthaw hai kha mirawp na rumuk phakhan, Lycaonia chawng a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Pathien hai kha na manmieshie me loi a jong chum u joi!”
Barnabas kha Zeus ruti uh, khan Paul kha lutu a chawngriei miring nit jarkhan, Hermes ruti uh.
Zeus thiempu kha na, ama riethiengmun kha khopui vaitak a awm jarkhan, shieratcha hai le rieiparrui hai kha pakawt hai khan vak chawi a mirawp kha le rawthawina `khat pekna rang, rurasham.
Tirtawn Paul le Barnabas na makha rujet u phakhan, amani ponledier hai kha ruther uh, khan mipui kar khan rutan ua, rura`ai uh.

Amani na ruti uh, “Miring hai, ijar a hihaihi nangithaw u maw nih? Nangni le ra`angre kanih u keng. Nangni na hihai nemna boi ah put ah aring Pathien dieng nanghieina u rang, athachawng hi kivakchawi u inih. Pathien hi na ravan le rieliei, thampui, khan kha shung ah awm kholok hi irukon inih.
Ashesho rong khan phung kholok dieng amani ningnom a ringna rang, ama na rujawt pe.

Inia ama na atha thaw a kungchangna mak boi a ruawm mak, makhala ravan ah put ah ro nomojong pe a choicha thatna pha hai kha kieini dieng nurupek uh. Khan ama na numulung u hai hi nekleshak, khan ningaina kha le nimiship pe uh.”
Hihai chawng haishe leawm, amani dieng rawthawina pek ah put ah mipui kha rumakha ngam u mak.
Inia Antioch ah put ah le Iconium ah put ah Jihudi hai jong shok ua, chawng jong mielien pe uh. Khajarkhan amani na Paul kha lung le rudeng ua thi joi, tia ama kha khopui ah put ah rupawt u joi.
Khanikengta khaichawi hai kha na ruhieichip u phakhan, ama na hawng thoi a khopui khan rulut joi. Khan jing tieng hin ama na Barnabas le Derbe tieng rushe joi.
Amani na kha khopui khan athachawng kha rurophongsho ua khaichawi tampui rukonsho u le, Lystra, Iconium, khan Antioch ah vak kir u joi.
