Kha mun khan khaichawi hai mulung hai kha rumenet pe uh, khan takashawn kha awm jawnjaina rang, mulung rumangar pe ua ruti uh, “Kieini na Pathien rengchangna kha hihai epshawna tampui hi doi a alutngir rang nanih uh.”
Khan amani na biekrup rikip ah bieklamkai rumadan ua chamradoi a nikna runieisho u le, amani na taka`irushawn u Pumi dieng pekna runiei uh.
Khashole Pisidia kha rurakan ua Pamphylia tieng rushe u joi.
Amani na Perga ah Pathien chawng kha rurieisho u le, Attalia tieng rushe u joi.
Khan ah put ah Antioch ah rokong a rushe u joi. Makha mun kha irurupummashak u chon hai rang khan Pumi numpokmirit kha irupekna u mun kha inih.
Amani na vak shok u phakhan, biekrup hai kha mun `khat ah ruruchun pui ua Pathien na amani le chon ithawna dan le Phungshik hai dieng takashawn mawkawt imawlawng pena dan kha ruriei uh.
Khan amani na khaichawi hai kha le pha shawttak ruawm uh.
Khan Judea ah put ah miring eshen jong ua, uliennai hai kha ruruchuk uh, “Nangni na Moses shena dungjuia vunnangep u joi nawkatu, shandamna kha muh ngam u naw tinih.”

Paul le Barnabas na jawtna boi lientak `khat runiei ua, amani le chawngrieshietna runiei uh. Khajarkhan mahi rawdawnna chungchang hin tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai le reshena rang, Paul le Barnabas, khan miring eshen hi Jerusalem ah hawngna rang rumadan uh.

Khajarkhan biekrup na amani kha rutir u joi. Phoenicia le Samaria vak rakan u lai khan, Phungshik hai na Pathien dieng hieina u kha amani dieng thang vak koi uh. Amani na uliennai kholok kha ajeng a ningrumangai pe uh.
Amani na Jerusalem vak shok u phakhan, biekrup, tirtawn hai, khan bieklamkai hai na amani kha lamjawng ruthaw uh. Khan Pathien na amani dieng chon iruthawna hai kholok chungchanga thangrukoi uh.
Inia Pharisee lawp takashawn miring eshen na ding a ruti uh, “Amani na vuni`ep ua, khan Moses Dan kha juina rang, chawngnipek u rang a hi rangai.”
Tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai na hi roireshena rang hin ruruchun u joi.

Ashawttak roireshena ruawm shole, Peter na ding a ruti, “Uliennai miring hai, nikhothang shawtbawtlai khan Pathien na nakar ua madanna runiei. Makha, kenertak na kiriei a Phunshik hai na athachawng kha irangai ua, takashawn miring changna u rang a inih.
Khan miring mulung ajet Pathien na kieini dieng a iruthawtak kha ang a, amani dieng Ratha Riethieng kha irupek a kungruchang inih.
Khan takashawn jar a amani mulung hai kha riethiengmashak joi jarkhan, kieini le amani kar a kairekhena tetlai mak.
Khajarkhan tun, ih jar a pilepu hai na`awm, khan kieini na`awm niruput ngam boi ringkaw kha khaichawi hai ring ah tet a Pathien kha ennangirete u maw nih?
Inia Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit jar a amanitak kha ang a, kieini na ringna numuk u rangnih, iti hi takanishawn u inih.”
Ruchun kholok kha ruawmchien uh. Khan amani dieng Phungshik hai kar a jetna le rekhekchon hai kholok Pathien na iruthawna chungchanga Barnabas le Paul na iruriei u kha rurangai uh.
Amani na ruawmchiensho u le, James na rumashang, “Uliennai miring hai, narangai pe u roh,
Pathien na putna ah put ah Phungshik hai kha iruphak a, amani ah put ah ama riming rang miring hai iruloina dan kha Simeon na rurophong joi.
Mahi thiempulien hai chawng kha aracha inih, hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih:
‘Mahi shole kiei jong kir rang kanih, khan apur David thamber kha jong mothoi rang kanih. Achim hai kha kiei na mothoi a rietienret rang kanih.
Makha mienieng miring kholok na le kiriming aban Phungshik kholokshe na PUMI kha atawkna rang a inih. Hihai kholok athaw PUMI na ieriei.’
“Kumshawt a ama chonthaw kholok kha Pathien na ejet.
Khajarkhan Pathien dieng vak hiei Phungshik hai kha nimatatmashak boi rang a shok, iti hi kawchawngmocho inih.
Inia mirilim le rawpawr nieinak, rejai, rek meher a that me, thishen, hihai ah put ah rechenna u rang, miejiek a nimejet u rang a shok.
Ajarla Moses chawng kha tu ashawt rong ah put ah khopui rikip ah irurophong u, khan Sabbath rikip a synagogue ah irute u nih joi.”

Kha pha khan tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai kha na, biekrup kholok le rawjawt a, Paul le Barnabas rawtawp pui rang, amani kar a madan miring Antioch ah tir rang hi atha, tia rumining uh. Amani khala: uliennai hai kar a lamkai hai, Barsabbas iti Judas le Silas runih uh.
Amani dieng mahi chawngmawchawi hi miejiekna uh: Kieini, tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai na Antioch, Syria le Cilicia ah awm Phungshik uliennai hai dieng chubai kenepek uh.

“Nangni vunepngir rang nangnih uh, khan Dan kha nangijuingir u rang a inih,” tia nangni kha chawng a chawkna rang le nang mulung u kha shukletna rang, kieini ah put ah ava u, iti kejet uh. Kieini na kha ang chawngpek kha amani dieng peh u mi`ing.
Khajarkhan kunumpok u Barnabas le Paul, khan amani le roroia madan miring hai kha nangni dieng tirna rang a rawjawtshom hi atha, tia kurumining uh.
Amani kha Pumi Jesu Christa riming rang a iringkho rupeh miring hai kha runih uh.
Khajarkhan kieini na Judas le Silas hi kavaktir u joi, amani na ra`angre a ner a`awm nieriei u rangnih.
Thawboithaboi hihaihi niboia, nangni dieng dawnshe a pokrik pekna boi rang, Ratha Riethieng dieng le kieini dieng atha `khat ruchang joi.
Makhala, mirilim dieng a rawthawina nieinak a, thishen a, rek meher a that me, khan rejai, hihai chon ah put ah rechen u roh. Hihaihi nangrung u joiatu, atha joi. Chubai.
Khajarkhan amani kha rutir ua Antioch tieng rushe u joi. Amani na mipui kha ruruchun a chawngmawchawi kha rupek uh.
Amani na rute u phakhan, kha mawshawkna chawng khan ningrungai pe uh.
Thiempulienawm achang, Judas le Silas, na uliennai hai dieng mawshawkna chawng tampui ruriei pe a rumenet uh.
Amani na makha mun khan ruawmbawt u shole, uliennai hai kha na lungdamna chawng le tirtawn hai dieng rumikir u joi.
Inia Silas na tu makha mun khan a`awmbawt rang a kha atha, tia rumining.
Khan Paul le Barnabasawm Antioch ah rurangah uh, khan kha mun khan shik miring tampui le, Pumi chawng kha ruruchuk ua rushem uh.
Nikhothang shawtbawt `le, Paul na Barnabas dieng ruti, “Pumi chawng rophongna khopui rikip a shetaia uliennai hai khaw itia maw awm u vak phah u rawi.”
Barnabas na Mark iti John kha amani le rushe pui jawt.
Inia Paul na, Pamphylia ah amani kha irumak a chon iruthaw pui boi miring kha, amani le rushe pui jawt mak.
Rawjawtna boi kha ratanbang jarkhan, amani kha rureshen u joi. Barnabas na Mark kha rawtawp pui a Cyprus tieng rokong a rushe joi.
Inia Paul na Silas kha rumadan a uliennai hai na Pathien numpokmirit kha ipek u le roroia, rokong a rushe u joi.
Amani na Syria le Cilicia kha palam a rushe ua biekrup hai kha vak menet uh.
Paul na Derbe le Lystra kha vak shok joi. Khan enro, kha mun khan Timothy iti khaichawi `khat ruawm. Ama kha takashawn Jihudi nupang `khat shapa runih, inia apa kha tu Greek miring runih.
Ama kha Lystra le Iconium ah awm uliennai hai na atha a iruriei u akhat runih.
Paul na ama kha rurawtawp pui jawt. Khan makha mun ah awm Jihudi hai na apa kha Greek miring inih, iti rujet u jarkhan, ama kha vunruep pe.
Amani na khopui hai kha irurakan u le roroia, Jerusalem ah tirtawn hai le bieklamkai hai na irumocho u chawngpek hai kha rungna u rang, amani dieng rurophong uh.
Khajarkhan biekrup hai kha takashawn a rumenet uh, khan miring jat kha nikhonikho a rupung shishit joi.
Amani na Phyrgia le Galatia ram kha rurakan u phakhan, Asia shung ah Pathien chawng irophong u rang a kha Ratha Riethieng na rumakha joi.
Amani na Mysia kha vak shok u phakhan, Bithynia lutna rang, rurashak uh, inia Ratha na rujawt pe u mak.
Khajarkhan Mysia kha rurakan ua, amani kha Troas tieng khan ruchum u joi.
Makha jan khan Paul na mulungmik `khat rumuk. Macedonia miring `khat na iding a ama dieng rudawi a ruti, “Macedonia hin va tana kieini hi navakshan u roh.”
Ama na mulungmik kha rumuk shole, amani dieng athachawng rophong rang hin Pumi na inokoi u inih, iti kha kejet ua, relentak a Macedonia ah shena rang, kurudit uh.
Kieini na Troas ah put ah Samothrace kha jawngphit a rokong a kurushe uh. Khan jing tieng hin Neapolis kurushok uh.
Khan ah put ah colony `khat, Macedonia ah runiei khopui, Philippi khan kurushe uh. Makha khopui khan pha shawtlawk kuruawm uh.

Sabbath nikho khan khopui vai tieng ah awm vapui khan kurushe uh. Kha mun khan mi hai na nikna inieina u mun `khat awm, tia kiruring u inih. Kha mun ah ruruchunsha nupang hai dieng kurushuh ua chawng kururiei pe uh.

Pathien rubieh miring, Lydia iti nupang `khat ruawm. Ama kha Thyatira ah put ah ponshendup jor miring `khat runih. Pumi na ama mulung mawkawt kha rumawlawng pe a Paul na iriei hai kha mulungluttak a rurangai.

Ama le ama inshungkhur hai kha baptisma ruloisho u le, kieini kha nawdawi ua ruti, “Kiei hi Pumi dieng takashawn miring `khat a nangnoloi u joiatu, va tana ki`in hin vak tung u roh.” Hitihin ama na nurukhap uh.
Nikhat hin kieini na nikna mun ah kurushe u le roroia, tashanna ratha ranak aniei nungak-shok `khat kururawtawng pui uh. Ama na tashanna khan upumi hai rang shier tampui irumuk inih.
Paul le khan kieini kha nurujui ua rura`ai, “Hihai miring hi Rashangving Pathien shok hai kha inih. Amani hi shandamna lam kha kieini dieng rophong ava u inih.”

Khanu kha na nikho shawttak khatikhan ruthaw. Paul kha iningrunih pelai mak a ratha thaboi dieng khan iehiei a ruti, “Jesu Christa riming a chawngkenepek, nang ama ah put ah vak shok rang roh.” Kha phatak khan ama kha vak shok joi.
Inia upumi hai kha na shier imukna u miring athang kha rumuk u phakhan, Paul le Silas kha shur u joi, khan rievieithawna mun khan vak kai ua chamniei hai dieng ruchawi u joi.
Amani na chawngmocho hai dieng vak chawi u phakhan, ruti uh, “Mahi Jihudi miring hai hi na nokhopui u hi achawk u joi.
Kieini Rome miring `khat a niloithiei boi le nishenathiei boi shena le dan nih boi kha amani na rophong u joi.”
Mipui kha na amani chung a mulung hangna kha rutet uh. Khan chawngmocho hai kha na amani kotai hai kha ruther ua, amani kha rawmaw le jemna rang, chawng rupek u joi.
Amani kha khawktak a rujemsho u le, lungroko shung ah ruthong uh. Khan lungroko rungpa kha na nettak a atetna rang, chawng rupek uh.
Ama na chawngpek rumuk shole, shungkhit ah atet a thinglong a eke u kha ruthung pe uh.
Inia janchim khan, Paul le Silas na Pathien dieng runik uh, khan Pathien mapakna lah kha ruthaw uh. Khan shurkhop miring hai kha na rurangai uh.

Jetboithieiboi a nieinu lientak `khat hawng rawnawk a, lungroko keshunshe kha hawng rawnawk joi. Khan relentak a mawkawt kholok kha hawng rawlawngsho a, mi rikip rokhopna thirakarui hai kha hawng ruthutsho joi.

Lungroko rungpa kha hawng che a lungroko mawkawt hai kha rurawlawngbiek kha hawng muk phakhan, lungroko shung ah awm hai kha shoksho joi, tia rumining jarkhan, ama chemjam kha rosho a nining a rathatna rang ruthaw.
Inia Paul na he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti, “Kokholok a hin ka`awm uh, nang nining a rathatna rang thaw naw roh.”
Ama na mieivar runik a khan Paul le Silas tieng khan vak tan a amani maikung a rawnawklam a vak bawklap joi.
Khashole amani kha vai tieng ruchawi a ruti, “Pumi hai sheng, kiringna rang imaw kithawngir rang?”
Amani na ruti uh, “Pumi Jesu Christa kha takashawn roh, khanitatu nang kha nashan rangnih, khan nang inshungawm shan rangnih.
Amani na Pumi chawng kha ama dieng le ama in ah awm kholok dieng khan ruriei pe uh.
Makha jantak khan ama na amani kha ruchawi a rawmaw shebe hai kha rurushuk pe, khan relentak a ama le ama inshungkhur kholok kha na baptisma ruloi uh.
Ama in ah vat pui phakhan, bu rumenek uh. Khan ama inshungkhur kholok le Pathien kha takarushawn u jarkhan, ningaina kha runiei.
Jingkar tieng hin chawngshat hai kha na amani police hai kha lungroko rungpa dieng khan “Miring hai kha meshe u rang roh,” ti rang khan vak tir u joi.
Khajarkhan lungroko rungpa kha na hihai chawng hi Paul dieng thangrukoi. Ama na ruti, “Nang shena u rang khan chawngmocho hai na chawng vak mawchawi u joi, lungdamtak a she u rang roh.”

Inia Paul na rumashang, “Rome khomiring kanih u chuchung a chawng mocho boi a mipui maikung a nejem ua lungroko shung ah nothong uh. Khan tun, muruk a meshe rawng initi u maw nih? Mahi nithiei naw nih. Amani pumtak va u rieshie kieini hi navak moshok u rosho.”
Police hai kha na hihai chawng hi chawngmawcho hai dieng thang vak koi uh. Khan amani kha Rome khomiring hai keng, iti kha rujet u phakhan, ruchih uh.
Khajarkhan amani dieng va ua vak dawi uh. Amani kha vak shok pui ua khopui kha mathan a shena u rang ruriei u joi.
Khajarkhan lungroko kha rumathan ua Lydia in ah rulut u joi. Khan uliennai hai kha rurumuk pui u phakhan, lungarna chawng ruriei pe u shole, rushe u joi.
Amani na Amphipolis le Apollonia kha rurakan u shole, Jihudi hai synagogue awmna Thessalonica ah vak lut u joi.
Khan ama shena dungjuia Paul na amani dieng rulut a, Sabbath nikho `thum khan amani le Miejiek ah put ah chawng ruthir.
Makhala Christa hi na shawna idoingir rang a inih, khan athi ah put ah hawng thoingir rang a inih, iti kha rumeler, khan rumumuk a ruti, “Nangni dieng a kirophong mahi Jesu hi Christa kha inih.”
Amani eshen kha rumawjawt, khan richichawi Greek mipui lientak le runiei nupang hai na`awm Paul le Silas kha rushap uh.

Inia imawjawt boi Jihudi hai kha na rumukmak uh. Amani na rievieithawna ah put ah mi tha boi hai kha vak chawi ua, hawipui `khat ruruchun uh. Khopui kholok kha marang a Jason in kha rukhoi uh. Amani kha miring hai dieng vak chawina rang, rutawk uh.
Inia amani kha rumuk boi u phakhan, Jason le uliennai eshen hi khopui rampo hai dieng rupawt ua, rura`ai uh, “Manmieshie shukthala a atet hihai miring hi hinawm va u joi.
Jason na amani kha rumutung a Caesar chawngmocho kholok le re`er a, Jesu iti Reng shik `khat awm, ruti uh.”
Khan amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, amani na mipui le khopui rampo hai kha mulung rahalam a rutet.
Khajarkhan Jason le shik hai kha roiruputna rumoloi ua, amani kha rumoshok u joi.
Khashole relentak a Paul le Silas kha Berea tieng rumeshe u joi. Amani na rushok u phakhan, Jihudi hai synagogue ah rulut uh.

Berea miring hai kha Thessalonica miring hainek a mulungliendet miring runih uh. Amani na ningawroitak a chawng kha ruloi uh, khan hihaihi anih maw nih, tia ningthingkip hin Miejiek hai kha enrurete uh.
Khajarkhan mi tampui na takarushawn uh, khan runiei Greek miring apa le nupang tampui na`awm takarushawn uh.
Inia Thessalonica Jihudi hai kha na Berea ah awm Pathien chawng kha Paul na rophong joi, iti kha rujet u phakhan, makhan va ua mipui kha vak marang uh.
Khashole uliennai hai kha na Paul kha relentak a thampui tieng rumeshe u joi. Inia Silas le Timothy tu kha mun khan rurangah u lai.
Khajarkhan Paul aroi miring hai kha na Athenshe kha vak thak uh. Silas le Timothy na relenthieishe ama kha vak rawlawp puina u rang, amani dieng chawng rupek a rushe u joi.
Khan Athens ah Paul na amani kha rungaklai khan, makha khopui khan konrilim shipmer a awm kha rumuk. Makha na aratha kha ajeng a rumawshaw pe.
Khajarkhan Jihudi hai, khan richichawi miring hai kha le synagogue ah le rievieithawna ah awm miring hai kha le ningthingkip chawngruthir a ruawm.

Khashole Epicurean le Stoic lungthimthiei hai kha na ama kha rurodoi pui uh. Khan eshen na ruti uh, “Mahi chawng rawkhawmpa hi na imaw iriei jawt?” Shik eshen na ruti uh, “Ama hi milak pathien hai ashem miring ang.” Ajarla ama na Jesu le thoiretna kha amani dieng irurophong inih.
Amani na ama kha rushur ua Areopagus mun ah ruchawi uh. Amani na ruti uh, “Nangiriei mahi ruchukna `thar hi imaw nih? Kieini na jet maw tha?
Ajarla nang na chonrekhek hi konokor uah nangivakchawi inih. Khajarkhan hihaihi ih itina maw nih kejet jawt uh.”
Ajarla khan ah awm Athens miring hai le milak hai kholok kha na ih thaw boi a chawng `thar riei rang, ninawkle chawng `thar rangai rang, amani pha hai kha irumehek u inih.
Khashole Paul na Areopagus kar khan ruding a ruti, “Athens miring hai, kholok dungjuia nangni hi richi a ajeng a mulunglut nangnih u, iti hi kumuk.

Ajarla nangni na chubainangibawk u nieinak hai hi kahiei a kimuk le roroia, MEH JET BOI PATHIEN `KHAT DIENG, tia khetimiejiek maicham ading `khatawm kumuk. Khajarkhan meh jet boi a chubainangibawk u ama kha nangni dieng kirophong inih.
“Manmieshie le mahi shung ah awm rikip akonpa, Pathien hi ravan le rieliei Pumi nit jarkhan, miring hai na khut a ikon rilimin khan awm mak.
Ama na ih kha irangai a, miring hai khut le ama chon thaw pe rangawm nimak, ajarla amatak na miring kholok dieng ringkho, phuk, khan kholok kha ipek inih.
Thishen `khat ah put ah rieliei mai kholok hin awmna rang, phung kholok rukon, khan amani awmna mun hai khan pha le ramri hai kha`awm irumuchuk pe inih.
Ama kha kieini ah put ah ala ah awm boi nitjoiawm, malam a ama kha mukthiei `khat a, amani na Pumi kha itawk u rang a shok.
Ajarla ama dieng hin naring, naper, khan na`awm inih. Khan nang thiemshun haitak eshen na`awm iruti kha inih: “Ajarla kieini hiawm ama chicha kha nanih uh.
Kieini hi Pathien chicha kha nanih u jarkhan, Pathien hi miring hai khut thiemna le mulungmining na ikon, rangkachak ninawkle dangka ninawkle konrilim lung keng, tia mining boi rang a inih.
Hihai jetna boi pha hai hi Pathien na imik le irumilim inih, inia tuntu ama na mun rikip ah mi kholok dieng mulung lekna rang, chawng pek joi.
Ajarla manmieshie hi dikna kha le imadan miring dieng khan ama na chawngishatna rang a pha le nikho kha madan joi. Ama kha athi ah put ah rumothoi a mi kholok dieng akalang chona rang, rupeksho joi.”
Athi ah put ah thoiretna rujet phakhan, mi eshen na rumunui uh, khan shik eshen na tu “Hi chawngmun jarhin rangai u ret rang kanih,” ruti uh.
Khan amani ah put ah Paul rushe joi.
Inia amani kar a eshen tu ama kha rushap ua, takarushawn uh. Amani hai khala, Areopagite Dionysius le Damaris iti nupang `khat, khan amani le rawtawp shik hai kha runih uh.
Hihaihi shole, Paul na Athens kha mathan a Corinth ah rushe joi.

Makha mun khan Pontus ah shok Aquila iti Jihudi miring `khat rurumuk pui. Jihudi miring kholok na Rome mathanna rang, Claudius na chawngrumocho jarkhan, i`inkonu Priscilla le Italy ah put ah ava `thar runih uh. Paul na amani kha rumuk pui rushe.
Amani kha khoiruponin chonthawshom runih u jarkhan, amani le ruawm a chon ruthaw.
Sabbath rikip khan ama na Jihudi hai le Greek hai kha mawkawina rang, synagogue ah chawngruthir pui uh.
Silas le Timothy na Macedonia ah put ah jong tung u phakhan, Ratha na Paul kha rumawshawk a Jesu kha Christa inih, tia Jihudi hai dieng kungruchang.

Amani na ama kha rurodoi pui ua rumieshiet u phakhan, ama ponledier hai kha akhawng a amani dieng ruti, “Nang thishen u kha nang lu uah awm nih rosho, kiei tu roiruputna nieilai mi`ing, tun ah put ah kiei Phungshik hai dieng she rang kanih joi.”
Khashole makha mun kha rumathan a Justus iti miring `khat in ah rulut joi. Ama kha Pathien mining runih, khan ama in kha synagogue diengtak ah ruawm pe inih.
Khan synagogue ulienchang Crispus na ama inshungkhur kholok le Pumi kha takarushawn. Corinth miring tampui na rurangai u phakhan, takarushawn ua baptisma ruloi uh.
Jan `khat hin Pumi na Paul dieng mulungmik a ruriei, “Chih naw roh, chawng kha riei roh, bang naw roh.
Ajarla kiei na nang kha kawnawrawtawp pui. Khan tute na nang kha nishih naw nih, khan engshiet a nawthaw naw nih. Ajarla mahi khopui hin kimiring tampui awm.”
Kha mun khan kum `khat le tha `ruk hi amani le awm a, Pathien chawng kha ruruchuk.
Inia Gallio na Achaia ram kha rupoklai khan, Jihudi hai na rushukbir a Paul kha rurudoi pui ua danin khan vak chawi uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Miringpa hi na Dan le racha boi Pathien biekna rang, mi hai kha mawkawi.”
Paul na ener makak diengtak khan Gallio na Jihudi hai dieng ruti, “Aw Jihudi miring hai, danrekhe ninawkle chon shie jar a nitatu, kiei na kirangai rang a hi rutuk inih.
Inia chawng hai le riming hai, khan nang dan u jar a nit jarkhan, nang nining ua vak riethiengmashak u roh. Hihai chung hin kiei na chawngshat jawt mi`ing.”
Khashole danin kha mathanna rang, amani kha runawt joi.
Khashole Greek hai kholok na synagogue lamkai Sosthenes kha shur ua, danin khan rujem uh, inia Gallio na hihai kholok kha irushawnlai mak.

Paul na Corinth khan ashawtbawt ruawm. Khan uliennai hai kha chubai ruthaw pui a Syria tieng rokong a rushe joi. Priscilla le Aquila na ama kha rurawtawp pui uh. Ama chawngrakhamna Cenchrea khan ama sham kha ruep joi.
Ephesus rushok u phakhan, amani kha kha mun khan rumak joi. Paultak na synagogue ah rulut a Jihudi hai kha le chawngruthir.
Amani na ama kha ashawtbawt awm puina rang, rudawi uh, inia rujawt pe mak.

Amani le reshenna ruthaw shole, ruti, “Ih kha nita`awm ahawng rang a rohoi hi Jerusalem ah kithawngir rang a inih. Pathien na ijawt nitjoiatu, nangni dieng vak kirret rang kanih.” Khashole Ephesus ah put ah rokong ah rushe joi.
Caesarea kha rushok shole, Jerusalem ah ruhawng a biekrup miring hai kha le chubai hawng thaw pui. Khashole Antioch tieng ruchum joi.
Kha mun khan pha bawng `khat ruawm shole, ama na Galatia le Phrygea ram ah dawdawn a rushe a, akhaichawi hai kholok kha vak menet joi.
Khan Alexandria ah ashok Jihudi miring Apollos iti `khat na Ephesus ah put ah vak shok. Ama kha chawngrieilariei thiei le Miejiek kha ajeng a ajet miring runih.
Ama kha Pumi lam khan tukhat na iruruchuksha inih, khan ratha a mulungluttak a Pumi chungchanga ridingpip a chawng iruriei kha iruruchuk inih. Inia John baptisma jar ranga kha irujet inih.
Ama na lungar nieitak a synagogue ah chawngriei ruput. Inia Aquila le Priscilla na rujet u phakhan, shir `khat a ruchawi ua, ama dieng Pathien lam chungchanga ridingdet a ruriei pe uh.

Khan ama na Achaia tieng rushe jawt phakhan, akhaichawi hai na ama kha lamjawng ruthawna u rang, uliennai hai na mawshawkna chawng kha rumiejiek pe uh. Khan rushok phakhan, numpokmirit jar a takashawn ruchang hai kha ajeng a vak shan.
Ajarla mipui maikung a, Jihudi hai kha chawngrieshietna khan maimawk rupek. Khan Jesu hi Christa inih, tia Miejiek hai ah put ah ama na rumumuk joi.
Khan hitihin rushok joi, Apollos kha Corinth ah ruawmlai khan, Paul na shak tieng ah ram hai kha vak rakan a Ephesus ah va joi. Kha mun khan khaichawi eshen vak muk.
Amani dieng ama na rurawdawn, “Takanangshawn u ni khan Ratha Riethieng maw nangmuk uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Muh u mi`ing, Ratha Riethieng awm, iti hi jetshe jet u mi`ing.”
Khashole ama na rurawdawn, “Ih baptisma khan maw baptisma nangruloi uh?” Amani na rumashang uh, “Baptisma apeh John baptisma kha kuruloi uh.”
Paul na ruti, “John na ama anuk a ajong rang a Christa Jesu kha miring hai na taka`ishawnngir rang a inih, tia iruriei pe a, mulung lek a baptisma loina kha le baptisma irupek inih.”
Mahi rujet u phakhan, Pumi Jesu riming a baptisma ruloi uh.
Paul na amani chung ah ukhut `hai kha rutet pe phakhan, Ratha Riethieng na amani chung a jong, khan chawng shikshik a ruchawng ua, chawng kha rurophong uh.
Amani lawpsheng a miring shawmlieidi dawr runih uh.
Synagogue kha rulut a tha `thum hi Pathien rengchangna chungchanga thirna le mawkawina kha lungartak a ruriei.

Inia amani eshen na mulung rumichimmashak ua takarushawn u mak. Khan mipui maikung a Lam kha rumieshiet u phakhan, Paul na amani kha rumak joi. Khan khaichawi hai kha ruchawi a Tyrannus behangin khan ningthingkip chawngruthir pui joi.
Makha kum `di rawjawn a rumeshe uh. Makha na Asia ram shung ah awm Jihudi hai le Greek hai adinre na Pumi Jesu chawng kha rurangai u joi.
Khajarkhan Pathien na rekhekchon hai kha Paul khut hai dieng khan ajeng a ruthawna joi.
Khan amatak le rishih khutrakpon hai ninawkle rekpon hai kha ana hai dieng ivakchawi pe u she khanawm, rai hai kha na rumathan uh, khan raikho ashie hai kha na amani ah put ah vai rushok uh.
Khashole shehawng a alawn Jihudi dawithiei hai kha na, Pumi Jesu riming kha ban a ratha thaboi hai chung a ruti uh, “Paul na ishem Jesu riming a kawnawdawi uh.”
Jihudi thiempu ulien Sceva shapa shiri kha na mahi ruthaw uh.
Inia ratha thaboi kha na amani dieng rumashang uh, “Kiei na Jesu kha kejet, khan Paul kha`awm kejet, inia nangni hi tumaw nangnih uh?”
Khashole ratha thaboi anieipa kha na amani dieng vak chawm a, aranak le vak mukhu a ruchutna u joi. Khan amani na makha in ah put ah ponledier boi a pawplam a rutan u joi.
Mahi Ephesus ah awm, Jihudi le Greek kholok na rujet ua, amani kholok dieng chitna ruthoi joi. Makha na Pumi Jesu riming kha rumielien shishit joi.
Makhan a takarushawn miring tampui na`awm rushe ua ithaw u chon shie hai kha malangsheng a rurophong u joi.
Dawithiei miring tengamthoiboi na`awm amani behangbuk hai kha rurawkhawm ua mipui maikung a miei le ruha u joi. Amani man kha ruthai pha ua dangka bawp shawm rahnga inih.
Khatikhan Pumi chawng kha ranaknieitak a rupung a ruawm.
Hihaihi mawtawr shole, Macedonia le Achaia ram rakan a Jerusalem tieng shena rang, Paul na mulung rumiding joi. Ama na ruti, “Makhawn kashe shole, Rome`awm kimukngir rang a shok.”
Khashole ama chonthaw pui, Timothy le Erastus, kha Macedonia ah rutir joi. Ama tu pha bawng `khat Asia ah rurangalai.
Khalaikhan Lam chungchanga helehoi lientak `khat rushok.
Dangkashupa Demetrius iti miring kha na Artemis rang rilimin `khat rukon a khutthiem hai rang shiertong ashin runih pe u mak.
Ama chonmun ra`ang pui hai kha le lawp `khat a ruruchun a ruti, “Miring hai, mahi shierraban ah put ah kieini na nieilelung niniei u inih, iti hi nangijet u inih.
Ephesus ranga hin niboia Asia kholok hin, mahi Paul hi na khut a kon pathien hai hi tu pathien nimak, tia miring tampui mawkawi a rumiehiei joi, iti hi nangmuk ua nangrangai u joi.

Khan mahi na nieshierraban u ranga hi riming imieshiet nimak a pathiennu alien Artemis rilimin hiawm iriming mieshiet pe ning, tia ama lurna kha mawmawk pe rangnih. Inia Asia shung ah awm mi kholok na la chubai ibawk inih.”
Amani na mahi rujet u phakhan, mulung hanglam a rura`ai uh, “Ephesus miring hai Artemis hi alien inih!”
Khopui khan reheshuna ruship joi, khan Paul na khomijin a ivakrawtawp pui, Macedonia miring hai, Gaius le Aristarchus, kha radainamun khan lawp `khat a vak tan ua vak shur u joi.
Paul na mirawp shung khan rulut jawt, inia khaichawi hai kha na rumakha uh.
Khan Asia shung ah ama lawmdit chonpo haishe na`awm radainamun khan lutna boi rang, rudawi uh.
Ruchunna kha reheshuna kha na ruship, eshen na akhat jar a rura`ai uh, eshen na shik jar a rura`ai uh. Khan arawplam na, makha mun khan ijar a vak ruchun u maw nih, iti kha rujet u mak.
Jihudi hai eshen na chawngiriei rang a kha riei rosho, tia Alexander kha mi kar khan vak tor uh. Khan Alexander na ukhut kha rulawm a miring hai mai kung a ama rohonna kha ruriei jawt.
Inia ama kha Jihudi miring keng, iti rujet u phakhan, nidan `di dawr hi lawp `khat a, “Ephesus miring hai Artemis hi alien inih!” tia amani kholok rura`ai uh.

Inia khopui behang miejiekpa kha na mipui kha phuk muchummashak a ruti, “Ephesus miring hai, Ephesus miring hai hi pathiennu alien Artemis rilimin le Zeus ah put ah jong cho rilim arung hai kha inih, iti hi ajet boi tumaw awm?”
Hihaihi jawt boi tha boi `khat nit jarkhan, renem u roh, mulungmining boipet a iawm thaw u naw roh.
Nangivakchawi u hihai miring hi rilimin muru rang a le nang pathiennu u kha mieshiet rang a kha nih u mak.

Khajarkhan Demetrius le khutthiem miring hai kha na tukhat chung a chawngmeshie niei u joiatu, danin hai kha rawlawng a awm, khan kha mun khan rampo hai awm, amani na khatlekhat chung a awm nawngna hai kha vak chawi u rosho.
Inia chonmun shik chungchanga nangtawk jawt u joiatu, dan dungjuia ruchunna ah imuchuk rang a inih.
Ajarla von a ashok phumoshokna chungchanga rawdawnna `khat inokoi u rang a chitroina `khat awm joi. Ajarla mahi chawngshok jar hin ajar pek rang `khatshe awm mak.
Ama na hihaihi ruriei shole, ruchunna kha rureshenmashak joi.
Phumoshokna kha theng shole, Paul na akhaichawi hai kha rukoi a amani kha chubai ruthaw pui a Macedonia tieng khan rushe joi.
Irurakan ram ah awm uliennai hai kha mawshawkna rupek shole, Greece tieng va joi.
Kha mun khan tha `thum ruawm. Ama na Syria tieng rokong a rushe diengtak khan, Jihudi hai na ama kha rurep u jarkhan, ama na Macedonia kha rakan a kirna rang, mulung rumiding joi.

Ama kha Berea ah awm Sopater, Thessalonica ah awm Aristarchus le Secundus, Derbe ah awm Gaius, khan Asia ram ah awm Timothy, Tychicus, khan Trophimus, amani hai hi na Asia ramshe khan rurawtawp pui uh.
Amani kha matieng rushe ua Troas ah nurungak uh.
Inia Chawjawboi Tan Nikho hai shole, Philippi ah put ah kurushe ua ni rahnga shung a Troas ah amani kha kuruphak uh. Kha mun khan ni shiri kuruawm uh.
Hapta shung a akhat changna nikho khan khaichawi hai le tan khoina rang kururuchun u phakhan, Paul na, jing tieng shena rang mining jarkhan, janchimshe khan chawngruriei.
Kururumukna u chungindan khan thaomiei tampui ruawm.

Eutychus iti rothar `khat hi tukber ah rushuh a ruawm. Paul na chawng rieilai khan, Eutychus kha imik rukhu pe a ningnittak a inrurungui jarkhan, indan `thum ah put ah jongcho a ithitlam a rushar u joi.
Inia Paul na ruchum a ama chung ah jong bawkna, khan ama kha rukawrep a ruti, “Nang mulung rakakmashak u naw roh, ajarla ama dieng ringphuk awmlai.”
Khashole Paul na chungindan khan rukaret a tan kha rukhoi a rushak shole, khovarshe khan amani le chawngruriei a, rushe joi.
Khashole rotharpa kha ringlam a ruchawi u jarkhan, ajeng a mulung rumangar pe uh.
Kieini na maton shawn a Assos tieng rokonglien ah kurushe u joi. Assos ah put khan kieini na Paul kha rokonglien ah kurushe pui jawt uh, ajarla ama na Assos rang khan kelam a rurasham inih.
Assos ah nurumuk pui u phakhan, kurumulut ua, khan Mitylene ah kurushe u joi.
Khan ah put ah kava ua, jing tieng hin Chios dieng khan kavak shok uh. Khan thiem hin Samos kavak shok ua Trogyllium khan kuruawm uh. Khan thiem `khat hin Miletus kha kavak shok uh.
Asia ram ah pha mehekna boi rang, Paul na Ephesus kha rakan a rushe jawt. Initthiei a tu Pentecost nikho khan Jerusalem kha rushokna rang, rurawnawt jawt inih.
Ephesus ah bieklamkai hai kha rurumukna pui rang, Miletus ah put ah Paul na mi rutir.
Ama dieng va u phakhan amani dieng ruti, “Akhat changna a Asia ram ah kekimuchum nikho ah put ah nangni le rawtawp jawnjai a kuruawm dan kha nangni na nangjet uh.
Redena kholok le, mikrithi le khan kiei dieng ah hawng Jihudi hai repna le enretena kholok le Pumi chon kha kiruthaw inih.
Nang nemna u rang a kholok kha kiei na mitik mi`ing. In rikip ah vanoi maikung a kinururuchuk u inih.
Jihudi miring hai le Greek miring hai dieng Pathien maikung a mulung lekna rang le Pumi Jesu Christa dieng takashawnna rang, mirittak a kungkuruchang inih.
“Khan tun enro, Ratha na Jerusalem ah shena rang ne`ep joi. Makhawn kuchung a imaw shok nih, iti kiei jet mi`ing.
Kiei na kijet khatte kha tu lungroko le shawrana kha na kiei hi inangakchak a awm inih, tia Ratha Riethieng na khopui rikip ah kiei dieng inierieisha inih.

Inia hihai kholok hi na nerephetmashak mak. Pathien numpokmirit athachawng kha kamalarna rang, katanrieshiet hi ningailam a kumutum a Pumi Jesu na inepek chonmun hi kurupummashak joiatu, kiringkho hi kiei rang man awm tia loi mi`ing.
“Pathien rengchangna chungchanga nangni dieng chawngkirushem inih, inia tuntu nangni na kemeh hi numuh u lai naw tinih, iti hi kejet joi.
Khajarkhan hi nikho hin kiei na kamalar, makhala nang kholok thishen rang khan kiei roiruputna niei mi`ing.
Ajarla Pathien chonmuchuk kholok kha kiei na ip boipet a kururophong.

Ama thishentak le irurawchawk Pathien biekrup aroi rang, Ratha Riethieng na kengam hai kar a kengamroi hai `khat a inamadan u nih joi. Khajarkhan nang bibing u rang le kengamhawi hai rang riring u roh.
Kiei kanuk `le, melang arangtak hai kha nang kar ua va rangnih. Khan amani na kengam `khatshe hawi naw nih iti kha kejet.
Nang kar u she khanawm khaichawi hai kha amani anu mujuina rang, adik kha rehermashak miring hawng thoi rangnih.
Khajarkhan kum `thum shung a shunlejan a mikrithi le chatboia kirieisha hai kha mining u tana riring u roh.

“Uliennai hai, tun kiei na nangni hi Pathien dieng le ama numpokmirit chawng khan kenepek u joi. Makha chawng kha na iniemielienna u rang a inih, khan iriethieng hai amani kholok le inkoklo kha nangni dieng nepekna u rang a inih.
Kiei na tute dangka ninawkle rangkachak ninawkle ponledier hai kha ningaw mi`ing.
Kiei le khan kirawtawp pui hai vaina rang, kukhuttak le chon kawthaw, iti hi nangjet uh.
Hihai kholok hin kiei na nangni dieng rekhenna kinepek u inih. Adawk miring hai kha chon thaw tana vai u roh. Pumi Jesu amatak na, ‘Amunek a apeh hi rahvantha inih,’ iruti kha mining u roh.”
Ama na chawngruriei shole, amani kholok le rukhuk shun a Pathien dieng runik uh.
Amani lawpsheng a rie`ieklam a ruchap uh, khan amani na Paul kha rukawrep a rutum uh.
Ama me kha muret, iti awmlai naw nih ruti chawng jardet khan, amani kha mulung rujum pe uh. Khashole amani na rokonglien tieng khan rushe pui u joi.
Khan hitihin rushok, makhala amani kha kurureshen pui u shole, kieini na Cos kha jawngphit a kurujap uh. Khan jing tieng hin Rhodes le khan kha mun ah put ah Patara ah rokong a kurushe uh.
Kha mun khan Phoenicia ah she rang rokonglien `khat kurumuk uh, khan kurulut ua kurupang u joi.
Cyprus kha kurumuk u `le, viei tieng kuruhiei ua Syria tieng kurujap uh, khan Tyre khan kuruchum u joi, ajarla rokonglien kha kha mun khan nieinak muchum rang a inih.
Kha mun khan khaichawi hai kha kurumuk ua ni shiri kuruawm uh. Ratha jar a Jerusalem ah shena boi rang, Paul dieng ruti uh.

Inia kinikho u kha hawng heksho phakhan, kieini na kakuruchawi u joi. Inkonu hai le khan nai hai, amani kholok na khopui vaishe kha navakthak uh. Khan tuikawmchang khan rukhuk shun a Pathien dieng nikna kuruniei uh.
Khan khatlekhat dieng chubai kururepeh u shole, rokonglien shung khan kurulut u joi, khan amaniawm in tieng rukir u joi.
Tyre ah put ah kajaplawn u kha kurumawtawr u shole, Ptolemais ah kurushe uh, khan uliennai hai kha chubai kuruthaw pui ua amani le ni `khat kuruawm uh.
Jing tieng hin Paul le rawtawp kieini na makha kurumathan ua Caesarea ah kava u joi. Khan shiri hai kar a akhat, chawngshempa Philip, in ah kurulut ua ama le kuruawm uh.
Ama na chawng rophongna ngam khutchawi aniei shanu nungak mili runiei.
Kha mun khan nikho shawttak kuruawm u lai khan, Agubus iti thiempulien `khat Judea ah put ah ava.

Ama na kieini dieng va a Paul kawngkhit kha loi pe a makha le ukhut le eke hai kha nining a rukhit a ruti, “Ratha Riethieng na hitihin nieriei, ‘Hitihin mahi kawngkhit anieipa kha Jihudi hai na Jerusalem ah khop u rangnih, khan Phungshik hai khut ah pek u rangnih.’ ”
Hihaihi kurujet u phakhan, kieini le kha mun ah awm hai kha na Jerusalem ah hawngna boi rang, kurudawi uh.
Khashole Paul na rumashang, “Ithaw chap a kumulung ninumujum pe u maw nih? Ajarla inokhopte kha niboia Jerusalem ah Pumi Jesu riming rang athi rangshe rasham kanih.”
Ama kha kurudawi ngam boi u jarkhan, “Pumi mulungmining kha nih rosho,” kuruti ua kuruawmchien u joi.
Hihai nikho shole, kieini na kururasham ua Jerusalem ah kuruhawng u joi.
Caesarea ah put ah khaichawi eshenawm kieini le vashom uh. Amani na khaichawi alui Cyprus tuikawram miring Mnason dieng tungna rang, ama in ah nuruchawi uh.
Kieini na Jerusalem kurushok u phakhan, uliennai hai na ningaitak a lamjawng nuruthaw uh.
Jing tieng hin Paul na James dieng kieini le rulut. Makhan bieklamkai hai kholok ruawm uh.
Chubai ruthaw pui u shole, ama chonmun ah put ah Pathien na Phungshik hai kar a iruthaw dan hai kha khatkhat a ruriei.

Amani na rurangai u phakhan, Pumi kha rumapak uh. Khashole ama dieng ruti uh, “Uliennai, nangmuk makhala Jihudi hai kar a takashawn miring bawpbawp a awm joi, amani kholok hi Dan kha ningawmer miring runih uh.

Phungshik hai kar a awm Jihudi hai kholok na Moses Dan kha paina rang le amani nai hai kha na vunepna boi rang, ninawkle shena hai dungjuia ringna boi rang, nangruruchuk, iti chungchanga nang jar kha rujet uh.
Dawn a imaw shok nih? Amani na nangva joi, iti jetngir u rangnih joi, amani na mipui rawkhawmngir u rangnih joi.
Khajarkhan kiriei u hi thaw roh. Nining a Pathien dieng a chawngrakham miring pasha mili kieniei uh.

Amani hi le rashap a nang nining a vak riethieng roh. Khan amani sham voina rang a shier kha pek pe roh. Khanitatu mi kholok na nang jar a ijet u kha dik mak, tia loi u rangnih, khan nang na`awm Dan kha nangrung a nangjui ti u rangnih.

Inia Phungshik takashawn hai rang tu amani na konrilim hai dieng a rawthawina, changkhit me, thishen le uire ah put ah rechen u rang a inih, khan tieitang kha tu amani na irung boi u rang a inih, tia kimiejiek ua chawngkimocho u nih joi.”

Jing tieng hin Paul na miring hai kha ruchawi a khan amani kha le ruriethieng, khan riethiengmun khan rulut a riethiengna nikho mawtawrna kha rurophong joi. Mahi pha hin a inih amani rikip rang rawthawina kha ithaw u rang a kha.
Ni shiri kha hawng rupumdeng `le, Asia ah awm Jihudi hai na ama kha riethiengmun ah rumuk u phakhan, mirawp kholok kha rurawphawk ua, ama chung a khut rujawn u joi.

Amani na ra`ai a ruti uh, “Israel phung miring hai, nashan u roh! Hi miringpa hi na mun rikip ah nimiring hai le hi mun Dan le re`er a mi kholok iruchuk inih. Makha khea ama na Greek miring hai kha riethiengmun ah ivakchawi a mahi mun riethieng hi ironomashak inih.
Ajarla matienglai khan Ephesus miring Trophimus kha Paul le rawtawp a khopui shung ah ruravak kha rumuk uh. Khan amani na ama kha Paul na riethiengmun ah irulut pui ang a rumining uh.
Khashole khopui kholok kha rumawphawk ua miring hai kha lawp `khat a vak tan uh. Amani na Paul kha vak shur ua, riethiengmun ah put ah vak pawt uh. Khan relentak a mawkawt hai kha rukhar u joi.
Amani na ama kha thatna rang, rutawk u laitak khan, Jerusalem kholok phumoshok a awm joi, iti chawng kha Rome rarup rabawpkhat lamkai kung rushok joi.
Relentak a ramiring hai kha ruchawi a rarajakhat lamkai hai kha amani dieng rutan joi. Amani na rabawpkhat lamkai le ramiring hai kha rumuk u phakhan, Paul ajem kha rubang uh.
Khashole Rome rabawpkhat lamkaipa kha ava a ama kha rushur joi. Khan ama kha thirakarui `di le khitna rang, chawng rupek. Khan ama kha tumaw nih, khan imaw iruthaw iti kha rurawdawn.

Mirawp eshen na akhat, khan eshen na akhat riei a, rura`ai uh. Phumoshok kha na jar chang a ama na chawngkung chawngler kha rujet ngamlai mak. Khajarkhan ama kha rakhur tieng chawina rang, chawng rupek joi.
Paul na kabe hai khan hawng lawn phakhan, mipui kha ranghai jarkhan, ramiring hai na ama kha iruphung u inih.
Ajui mipui kha na “Ama kha mathan u roh!” ti a rura`ai uh.
Rakhur shung ah lut diengtak khan Paul na rabawpkhat lamkai dieng ruti, “Kiei na nang dieng chawng dikhatte riei maw tha nih?” Ramiring lamkai kha na rumashang, “Greek chawng maw nangjet?
Nang hirachangtak khan ra moshok a mithat hai bawp mili ramthim ah lamrukai Egypt miring kha maw nangnih?”
Paul na rumashang, “Kiei hi Jihudi miring kanih keng. Cilicia ah awm runiei khopui, Tarsus ah shok kanih. Nang dieng kawnawdawi, miring hai dieng hin niemieriei roh.”
Ama na jawtna rupek phakhan, Paul na kabe hai khan hawng ding a miring hai kha awmchienna rang, khut rumajap. Khan mi hai kha ruawmchien `le, ama na Hebrew chawng a amani dieng chawngruriei pe,
“Uliennai miring hai le kapa hai, kiei na nang maikung ua tun a korohonna hi narangai pe u roh.”
Hebrew chawng a iruriei kha rujet u phakhan, amani rurenemdet uh. Khashole ama na ruti,

“Kiei hi Cilicia ah awm Tarsus ah shok Jihudi miring `khat kanih. Mahi khopui hin Gamaliel keshun a behang ruchuh a hawng lien miring `khat kanih. Ama na nulepa hai akhawktak Dan dungjuia riringtak a inuruchuk inih. Von a nangnitak hi ang a Pathien kha ningkiruawmer inih.
Kiei na mahi Lam hi thitnashe a epshawna kurupek, nupang apa kiruchawi a lungroko shung ah kirukhum inih.

Thiempu rashang na le Jihudi hai shierpui lamkai kholok na`awm mahi chungchang hin kiei rang kungchang ngam uh. Amani ah put ah chawngmawchawi hai kha uliennai hai rang kurumuk, khan amani kha khoplam a chawi a Jerusalem ah chepna rang, Damascus ah kurushe.
“Lam kururawh a Damascus kha kururanai pui phakhan, nishun dawr hin, ravan ah put ah mieivar lientak `khat na kiei hi rokochip a nojongeh.
Pieipak a kurupur phakhan, he `khat na kiei dieng nuruti, ‘Saul, Saul, ijar a kiei hi epshawna ninepek maw nih?’
“Kiei na kurumashang, ‘Tumaw nangnih, Pumi?’ Khashole kiei dieng nuruti, ‘Kiei hi nang na epshie a nangithaw a awm Nazareth Jesu kha kanih.’
Khalai a kiei le ruawm hai kha na mieivar kha rumuk ua ruchih uh, inia kiei dieng a chawng arieipa hesho kha tu rujet u mak.
“ ‘Pumi, kiei na imaw thaw ning?’ tia kururawdawn. Pumi na kiei dieng nururiei, ‘Thoi tana Damascus khawn she roh, khawn kiei na nang rang a kimadansha nangithaw rang a kholok kha nieriei rangnih.’
Mieivar lurna kha na kiei rumuh ngamlai mi`ing. Khajarkhan kiei le rawtawp hai kha na kukhut ah nomoroi ua Damascus tieng nuruchawi u joi.
“Dan dungjuia richichawi miring, khan kha mun ah awm Jihudi hai kholok na atha, tia iriei u Ananias iti miring `khat ruawm.
Ama na ava a kiei dieng ding a ruti, ‘Uliennai Saul, muh rang roh.’ Kha phatak khan kimik kha hawng var a ama kha kawhawngen joi.
“Khashole ama na ruti, ‘Nulepa hai Pathien kha na, ama mulungmining kha jetna rang, Diknapa kha mukna rang le ama nertak a jetna rang, nang kha namadan joi.
Ajarla nangimuk nangijet chungchanga mi kholok dieng ama rang a kungachang miring kha anih rang a nangnih joi.
Khan tun, ithaw rashai maw nangnilai? Thoi tana baptisma loi rang roh, khan Pumi riming kha ban tana nang munu hai kha rushuksho rang roh.’
“Khan hitihin rushok, makhala kiei na Jerusalem ah kavakkir shole, riethiengmun ah Pathien dieng kuruniklai khan, shuika a kuruawm.
Khalai khan Jesu na kiei dieng chawngiriei kha kurumuk, ‘Relentak a Jerusalem ah put ah shok rang roh, ajarla kuchungchanga nang kungchangna kha amani na loi u naw nih.’
“Khan kiei na kuruti, ‘Pumi nang takanashawn hai kha synagogue rikip ah dawdawn a kieitak na lung roko shung ah kiruthong a kirujem kha amani na jet uh.
Khan amani na nang kungachang miring, Stephen thishen rumolong pe u lai khan, iedieng ah kuruding a atha kuruti, khan ama athat hai ponledier hai kha kiei na kururung pe.’
“Khashole Jesu na kiei dieng nuruti, ‘She rang roh, ajarla ram latak ah awm Phungshik hai dieng nitir rang kanih joi.’ ”
Khakawtshe khan amani na rurangai pe uh, inia dawdawn a rura`ai ua ruti uh, “Rieliei ah put ah ralatmashak u rang roh, ajarla ama kha aring a awm rang kha rutuklai mak.”
Khan amani na rura`ai u le roroia, amani ponledier hai kha ruther ua rithi ah vaiphin ruvawr uh.
Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na ama kha rakhur ah chawina rang, chawng rupek joi. Khan ama chung a ara`aina u jar kha jetna rang le jem a mawchawngna rang, chawng rupek joi.
Inia amani na ama kha mevun rui le rukhit u phakhan, Paul na ama dieng ah ading rarajakhat lamkai dieng ruti, “Eheng boi Rome khomi jem rang a hi nang rang dan maw nih?”
Rarajakhat lamkai kha na makha rujet phakhan, rushe a rabawpkhat lamkai dieng rumejet. Ama na ruti, “Thaw rang a nangiti khan riring roh, ajarla miringpa hi Rome khomi inih.”
Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na Paul dieng rushe a rurawdawn, “Nang Rome khomi maw nangnih?” Khan ama na rumashang, “Awh.”
Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na ruti, “Rome khomi changna rang shier ajeng a kurulut.” Paul na rumashang, “Kiei hi koshok ah put ah Rome khomi kha kanih keng.”
Ama ajem rang le chawngrawdawn rang a rasham hai kha relentak a rurakai u joi, khan rabawpkhat lamkai kha`awm Rome khomi `khat irukhop nit jarkhan, ruchih joi.

Ama na Paul kha ijar a Jihudi hai na inawng u maw nih, iti jetna rang, jing tieng hin Paul kha khop ah put ah rumoshok u joi. Khan ama na thiempu ulien hai kholok le Sanhedrin kholok rumukna rang, chawng rupek joi. Ama na Paul kha jong chawi a amani maikung a rumiding joi.
Paul na Sanhedrin kha ruenrep a ruti, “Uliennai miring hai, vonshe hin irikip chung a lungthim riethienghiei a Pathien maikung a karinglai.”
Khan thiempu rashang Ananias na iedieng ah ading hai dieng khan Paul kha ener ah jemna rang, chawng rupek.

Mahin Paul na ama dieng ruti, “Pathien na nang kha nejem rang nih joi, Aw angoi nawt bang! Ajarla Dan dungjuia kuchung a chawngshat rang a ashuh nangnih, dan le kairekhe a kiei hi jemna rang chawng nangipek maw nih?”
Iedieng ah ading hai kha na ruti uh, “Pathien thiempu rashang hi maimawk nangipek maw nih?”
Khan Paul na ruti, “Kiei na ama hi thiempu rashang keng, iti rujet mi`ing, ajarla uliennai hai, hitihin rumiejiek, ‘Nang miring hai rampo chung a ashie chawng a rachaithiei naw tinih.’ ”

Amani shenrajat hi Sadducee, khan shenrajat hi Pharisee keng, iti kha Paul na rujet le Sanhedrin khan rura`ai, “Uliennai miring hai, kiei hi Pharisee kanih, khan Pharisee shapa `khat kanih. Kiei na enretena a ka`awm hi ngakmining le athi ah put ah hawng thoiretna chungchanga inih.”
Makha ruti phakhan, chawngrieshietna alientak `khat Pharisee hai le Sadducee hai kar a ruthoi a puiruchun kha idi a rureshen joi.
Ajarla Sadducee hai na thoiretna ninawkle ravantir ninawkle ratha awm mak iti u inih, inia Pharisee hai na tu lawpsheng a ipawm u inih.

Khashole herum moshokna lientak `khat ruthoi joi. Makhan Pharisee hai le rachang danoja hai kha na ruthoi ua enchak a chawng rurieshiet pui ua ruti uh, “Miringpa chung hin ashie muk pe u mi`ing. Ratha ninawkle ravantir na ama chung a chawngiriei nitjoiala, Pathien le re`er chon thaw u naw rawi.”

Chawngrieshietna lientak hawng mothoi u phakhan, rabawpkhat lamkai kha na amani na leklek a ther u rang keng joi, iti kha ruchit pui jarkhan, ramiring hai dieng khan Paul kha amani ah put ah ranak a rakhur tieng chawina rang, chawng rupek joi.
Makha jan khan Pumi na ama dieng ruding a ruti, “Nang mulung mangar roh, Paul. Ajarla Jerusalem ah kiei rang a kungnangruchang kha ang a, Rome a`awm kungachangngir rang nangnih.”
Kho hawng var phakhan, Jihudi hai eshen na lawp `khat a ruruchun ua Paul kha that masheng bulean shah u naw nih, tia chawngrurakham uh.
Miring shawm mili mieliei na mahi repna hi rurashak uh.
Amani na thiempu ulien hai le shierulien dieng rushe ua ruti uh, “Kieini na Paul kathat u masheng iawm shah u naw ning, tia chawngkarakham u joi.

Khajarkhan tun nangni na, Sanhedrin le rashap u tana nangni na ama chungchanga jirjar kha dawn a riringdet a tawkna rang, jing hin nangni dieng ivakchawi u rang a dan a rabawpkhat lamkai dieng khan chawngrashak pui u roh, khan Paul na mun jong shok mala khan kieini na ruthat u rang kanih.”
Khan Paul sharnu shapa kha na amani na irep u kha rujet phakhan, rushe a rakhur khan rulut a Paul dieng thangrukoi joi.
Paul na rarajakhat lamkai kar a akhat kha rukoi a ruti, “Mahi shanaipa hi rabawpkhat lamkai dieng chawi roh, ajarla ama dieng iriei rang chawng dikhat ieniei.”

Khajarkhan ama na shanaipa kha rabawpkhat lamkai dieng khan ruchawi a ruti, “Shurkhop miring Paul na kiei hi nokoi a mahi shanaipa hi na nang dieng thanginokoi jawt awm ti jarkhan, nang dieng kivakchawi hi inih.”
Rabawpkhat lamkai kha na ama khut ah mukui a bingte a ruchawi a rurawdawn, “Kiei dieng thangnangikoi jawt kha imaw nih?”
Ama na rumashang, “Jihudi hai na Sanhedrin ruchunna ah Paul kha nang jong chawina rang le nang dieng nikna rang, rawjawtna niei uh. Amani na ama chung a chawng reshethep rasha u inih.

Amani na nang kha nawdawi u phakhan, jawt pe naw roh. Ajarla amani miring shawm mili mieliei na Paul that malalim u nekleshak shah u naw ning, tia chawngrakham u joi. Tun amani na nang mulungding ranga kha ingak a awm u inih.”
Khajarkhan ramiring lamkaipa kha na shanaipa dieng khan “Nang na kiei dieng a thangnanginokoi hi tute dieng riei naw roh,” tia chawng rupek a ama kha rumeshe joi.

Khashole ama na rarajakhat lamkai hai kar a idi rukoi a ruti, “Ramiring rajadi le shakawr ramiring shawm shiri, khan shiei rak ramiring rajadi le von jan nidan `ko a Caesarea ah shena rang, rasham u rang roh.
Khan rampopa Felix kung damtak a shok puina rang, Paul rang shakawr rasham pe u roh.”
Hitihin ama na chawngmawchawi a rumiejiek:
Claudius Lysias kiei na richit`awm rampopa Felix dieng: Chubai.
Miringpa hi Jihudi hai na ishur ua that rang a rasham u nih joi, inia ama hi Rome khomi `khat inih, iti hi kurujet phakhan, ramiring hai le kirushan inih.
Ama dieng a inawngna kha kejet jawt jarkhan, ama hi amani Sanhedrin khan kuruchawi.
Inawngna u kha tu amani dan rawdawnna chungchanga inih, iti hi kurujet. Inia inawngna u kha thitna ninawkle lungroko shung ah khumnashe rang a rutuk tu nimak.

Khajarkhan miringpa chung a Jihudi hai irepna u chawng kha kejet jar a rawnawttak a nang dieng kivaktir hi inih. Khan ama anawng miring hai diengawm, amani na inawngna u jar kha nang maikung a peh u rosho, tia chawngkipek inih. Chubai.
Khajarkhan ramiring hai kha na chawngpek dungjuia, khan Antipatris rang khan jan a Paul kha ruchawi u joi.
Jing tieng hin amani na shakawr ramiring hai kha ama le dawn a she rang rumak ua, amani kha tu rakhur tieng vak kir u joi.
Amani na Caesarea vak shok u phakhan, rampopa dieng chawngmawchawi kha rupek uh, khan Paul kha`awm ama dieng rupek u joi.
Chawngmawchawi kha rampopa kha na rute shole, ih ram ah put ah maw nangnih, tia Paul dieng rurawdawn. Khan ama kha Cilicia ah put ah inih, iti kha rujet `le,
ama na ruti, “Nang ananawng hai vak shok pha a nang ah put ah rangai rang kanih.” Khashole ama kha rung a Herod chawngshatna Praetorium ah tetna rang, chawng rupek joi.
Ni rahnga shole thiempu rashang Ananias na shierulien eshen le Tertullus iti danthiei `khat le Caesarea ah rushe joi. Amani na Paul kha rampopa maikung a vak nawng uh.

Paul kha rukoi phakhan, Tertullus na Paul inawngna chawng kha ariei ruput a ruti, “Nang sheshepna thoi a kieini na pha shawttak a lungdamna lientak hoikihawngthiei u inih. Khan nang mik`enshiei kha na phung dieng hin takchangna ihawngchawi inih.
Mahi munlepha rikip a mapak le roroia, kieini na lam rikip a kawpawm uh, Aw richit`awm Felix.
Inia ashawt nawmawshaw jawt u lai mi`ing, nang roihoina jar a pha bawngte kawchawng u dikhat hi ninarangaina pe rang hin kawnawdawi.
“Ajarla mahi miringpa hi railawn, manmieshie kholok a awm Jihudi hai dieng a shawna mothoi, khan Nazareth lawpreshen hai lutu a lamkai miring `khat inih, iti hi kieini na kumuk uh.
Ama na riethiengmunshe kha`awm pawrmechetna rang rurai jarkhan, kirushur ua kadan u dungjuia mawchawngna rang, kirumining u inih.
Inia ramiring lamkai Lysias na va a kukhut chung uah put ah ranak a inurosho u inih.
Ama anawng miring hai kha nang dieng vatna rang, chawng irupek inih. Ama hi nang na nangmawchawng phakhan, kieini na kinawngna u ajar kholok rupumping a nangjet ngam rangnih.”
Jihudi hai kholok na rurachang ua hihaihi adik inih, tia rurophong uh.

Rampopa kha na Paul kha chawng rieina rang ukhut le jetna ruthaw a pha rupek phakhan, Paul na rumashang, “Nang na mahi phung chung hin kumshawttak chawngshat miring nangnih hi kejet jarkhan, rangamna nieitak a korohonna hi kipek inih.
Nang na nangjet rangnih, makhala kiei na Jerusalem ah Pathien chubaibawk kurushena kha ni shawmlieidi khe maklai.
Kiei na riethiengmun ah ninawkle synagogue ah ninawkle khopui shung ah mipui kha kirumuputna nurumuk pe u mak.
Amani na inawnawngna u hiawm nang dieng rachamashak ngam u naw nih.

Inia Lam ajui miring `khat a, kiei hi lawpreshen initi u hi tu nang maikung a kiei kajawt. Dan shung ah ninawkle Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah irumiejiek kholok kha takakurushawn a pilepu hai Pathien kha kirubiek inih.
Amani na`awm ijawt u Pathien dieng a ngakmining kha kiei na`awm kieniei, makhala midik midik boi adinre athi ah put ah thoiretna awm rangnih, iti hi inih.
Khajarkhan Pathien dieng le miring hai dieng lungthim riethieng kha nieina rang, munlepha rikip a kiruthaw inih.
“Kiei na kum shawtbawt shole, kuphung hai dieng numpok-khutchawi le rawthawina pekna rang, kuruhawng.
Mahi kuruthawlai hin Asia ah put ah ajong Jihudi hai kha na riethiengmun ah kururiethieng kha nurumuk uh. Makhan mirawp`awm ruawm mak, khan roshorakhana`awm ruawm mak.
Kuchung a nawngna niei u joiatu, mahin nang maikung a a`awmngir u rang a shok.
Sanhedrin ah kurudinglai khan, chonrehe kiruthawna maw nurumuk pe uh? Hin ah awm miring hai hi na riei u rosho.
Ninawkle, amani maikung a kuruding a kurura`aina `khat jar a runithiei, ‘Von a chawngrawdawnna ah ka`awm hi athi ah put ah thoiretna chungchang hin a inih.’ ”
Felix na hihaihi rurangai a ama na Lam jirjar kha thatak a rujet jarkhan, chawngmeshie kha rudeh a ruti, “Rabawpkhat lamkai Lysias vak shok `le, nang chawngmeshie u hi shat rang kanih joi.”
Khashole Paul kha rungna rang le ama lawm hai na irangai hai kha ipek khan makha boi a ningchamna pekna rang, rarajakhat lamkai dieng ama na chawng rupek joi.
Nikhothang shawtbawt le Felix na i`inkonu Drusilla, Jihudinu kha le ava a Paul kha vak mokoimashak. Paul na Christa dieng taka`ishawnna chungchanga iruriei kha ama na rurangai.

Paul na dikna, takshurna, khan ajong rang a chawngshatna chungchanga ruriei pe phakhan, Felix na ajeng a ruchih a ruti, “Tun a hin tu she rang roh, kiei na pha rolotna kumuk phakhan, navakmokoi rang kanih joi.”
Khalaikhan ama moshokna rang, Paul na shier maw nepekngai, tia rawnawrawnaw a Paul kha vak mokoi a chawngruriei puithiei.
Inia kum `di theng shole, Porcius Festus na Felix mun kha hawng loh phakhan, Jihudi hai dieng enlar ruthaw jawt jarkhan, Felix na Paul kha lungroko shung khan rumak joi.
Festus na makha ram khan hawng shokna nithum shole, ama na Caesarea ah put ah Jerusalem tieng ruhawng.
Kha mun khan thiempu ulien le Jihudi lamkai hai na ama kha rurumuk pui ua, Paul chungchanga thangrukoi uh.
Paul kha Jerusalem tieng vak rawthawtmashakna rang, amani na enlar runik uh. Makha thawna jartu, amani na lam a rurep ua ruthatna rang a inih.
Festus na rumashang makhala Paul hi Caesarea ah tet rang a inih, khan relentak a kha mun khan she rang kanih.
Khajarkhan ama na ruti, “Nang kar ua chamniei hai na kiei le she u rieshie, miringpa chung hin adik boi awm joiatu, amani na nawng u rosho.”
Amani kar khan ni shawm dawr ruawm shole, Caesarea tieng ruchum joi. Jing tieng hin ama na chawngshatna mun khan rushuh a Paul kha vak chawina rang, chawng rupek joi.
Ama na vak shok phakhan, Jerusalem ah put ah ahawng ama dieng ah ading Jihudi hai kha na ama chung a irachamashak ngam boi u akhawk nawngna kha Paul chung a rupek uh.
Paul na ibibing a rohonna kha rupek a ruti, “Khoshekhoshe ah nita`awm, kiei na Jihudi hai dan, riethiengmun, khan Caesar chung a rehena chon ruthaw mi`ing.”
Inia Festus na Jihudi hai enlar rang khan rumining a Paul dieng ruti, “Nang na Jerusalem ah she a hihai nawngna chungchanga kamaikung a chawngrawdawn rang hin nangdit maw?”
Paul na rumashang, “Caesar chawngshatna mun ah kading hin nang na chawngninashat penangir rang a mun kha inih. Nang na thaning a nangijet kha ang a, Jihudi hai dieng kiei na kirehena awm mak.

Kiei na dikna boi, khan thitna rangshe rutuk chon kha kiruthaw nitjoiatu, athi rang khan kiei jawt boi thaw naw ning. Inia amani na inawnawng u hin iawm awm joi nawkatu, tute na kiei hi amani dieng nepeh ngam naw nih. Kiei na Caesar dieng chawngkito inih.”
Khashole Festus na chawngrashak pui hai dieng chawngruloi shole, rumashang, “Caesar dieng chawng nangito maw nih joi? Caesar dieng she rang nangnih!”
Nikhothang shebawt `le, reng Agrippa le Bernice na Festus lamjawng thawna rang, Caesarea vak shok u joi.
Amani na makha mun khan nikhothang shawtbawt ruawm ua, Festus na Paul chawngmeshie chungchanga rengpa dieng rurophong a ruti, “Hi mun hin Felix na lungroko ah irumak miring `khat awm.
Jerusalem ah kuruawmlai khan, thiempu ulien hai le Jihudi shierulien hai na ama chung a kiei dieng jar rupek ua, chawngkishat rang kha rudit uh.

“ ‘Anawng hai kha na inawngpa u kha mailemai rumusheng a ama chung a nawngna kha mashangna rang chanthatna muk mala a, mi `khat thatna rang pek rang a hi Rome miring hai shena dan nimak,’ tia kiei na amani dieng kirumashang inih.
Khajarkhan amani na vat u phakhan, kiei na pha mathang boi a, jing tieng chawngshatna mun khan kurushuh a miringpa kha vak chawina rang chawng kirupek inih.
Anawng miring hai kha na ruding u phakhan, kirumining ang a chonshie hai kha le ama kha runawng u mak.
Inia amanirilik richi jar a ama chung a chawngrawdawnna runiei pui uh. Khan Jesu iti miring `khat ruthi a ama kha ring, tia Paul na irurophong chungchanga chawng rurieshiet pui uh.
Hihai rawdawnna kha kurujet boi jarkhan, Paul kha Jerusalem ah she a hihai nawngna hi envakrete pui jawt maw, tia kururawdawn.
Inia Paul na Augustus chawngmocho mukna rang thangrukoi phakhan, Caesar dieng kurutir malalim, tetna rang chawngkirupek inih.”
Agrippa na Festus dieng ruti, “Kieitak na`awm miringpa chawng kha karangai jawt.” Ama na rumashang, “Jing a nangrangai rang keng.”

Khashole jing tieng hin Agrippa na Bernice le va a, chawngrangaina mun kha rabawpkhat lamkai hai le khopui shung ah alien-arang hai le lieklawr a rulut u joi. Khashole Festus na chawng rupek a Paul kha vak chawi u joi.

Festus na ruti, “Reng Agrippa le hin ah hawng ruchun miring kholok, miringpa hi nangmuk u joi. Ama chung hin, Jerusalem ah le hin ah awm, Jihudi mipui kholok na ama hi aring rang hin rutuklai mak, tia ra`ailam a kiei dieng thangnurukoi uh.
Inia kiei na ama chung a thitna rangshe rutuk jar kha iawm rumuk pe mi`ing. Khan upumtak na Augustus dieng thangrukoi joi jarkhan, ama dieng tirna rang kumulung kimiding joi.

Inia ama jar hi kupumi dieng khinrit a miejiek rang niei mi`ing. Khajarkhan ama hi nangni dieng, khinniei a reng Agrippa nang dieng kivakchawi inih. Makha kieini na nawmawchawng shole, miejiek rang dikhat kinieina rang a inih.
Ajarla shurkhop `khat ama dieng a pek nawngna kha khin boipet a meshe rang a hi kiei rang rolotmashak mi`ing.”
Agrippa na Paul dieng ruti, “Nang bibing rang khan chawngna rang, nang dieng pha pek inih.” Khashole Paul na khut kha rulawm a ibibing a rohonna kha ruriei,
“Aw reng Agrippa, von a nang maikung a Jihudi hai na inawnawngna u kholok chungchanga rohonna `khat a kirieina rang a hi rahvantha `khat inih, tia koloi.
Ajarla khinniei a nang na Jihudi hai shena le chawngreper kholok kha nangjet joi. Nang na mulungluttak a narangai pe roh, tia kenengen.
“Putna ah put ah kimiring haitak kar a le Jerusalem ah karingdan hai kha Jihudi hai kholok na kanaite chang ah put ah rujet uh.
Amani na kungchang jawt uatu, inejetna u hi shawt joi. Kiei na nirichi u khawktak lawpreshen, Pharisee `khat a kuruawm.
Khan tun kiei na mawchawngna a kading hi Pathien na pilepu hai dieng chawngirurakham ngakmining jar a inih.

Mahi chawngrakhamtak hin nuphung u shawmlieidi na mulungluttak a Pathien chon kha shunlejan a iruthaw ua shokna rang, ngak`irumining u inih. Mahi ngakmining jar hin a, Aw reng Agrippa, Jihudi hai na kiei hi inurunawng u inih.
Pathien na athi miring kha mothoi, iti hi iloia takashawn nimatatmashak u maw nih?
“Kieitak na Nazareth Jesu riming le kairekhe chon tampui kha thaw rang, tia kirumining inih.

Makha inih kiei na Jerusalem ah kiruthaw kha. Thiempu ulien hai ah put ah cham kha kurumuk a miriethieng hai kha lungroko shung ah kirukhumte kha niboia, amani kha ruthat u phakhan, kawjawtna kha kirupek inih.
Synagogue rikip ah amani kha kiruchep jawnjai a amani kha ranak a mieshietna mawthaw rang, kururai. Amani chung a kumulung ruhanghai a mejet boi khopui haishe khan epshawna pek rang khan kurushe.
“Hilaihin thiempu ulien hai cham le amani tirna ah put ah Damascus khan kurushe.
Nishun dawr hin, Aw rengpa, ravan a ninek a avar `khat na lam ah kiei le khan kirulawn pui hai kha rokochip a nojong eh u kha kurumuk.
Kokholok na thoi a kurupur u phakhan, he `khat na kiei dieng Hebrew chawng a inieriei kha kurujet, ‘Saul, Saul, ijar a epshawna nanginepek maw nih? Rujumjap ruthui, iti hi nang rang matat inih.’
“Kiei na kururawdawn, ‘Tumaw nangnih, Pumi?’ Ama na nurumashang, ‘Nang na epshawna nangipek a awm Jesu kha kanih.

Inia thoi tana nang ke khan ding rang roh. Ajarla nangimuk nieinak hai le kinumumuk rang a nieinak dire chungchanga shepding changna rang le kungmachangna rang, mahi chonmuchuk rang hin a, nang dieng jong lar kanih joi.
Khan tun kinitirna miring hai le Phungshik hai dire ah put ah nashan rang kanih.

Amani mik mavarna rang, ajing ah put ah mieivar tieng hieina rang, Satan cham ah put ah Pathien dieng hawng hieina u rang, kinitir inih. Makha amani munu hai kha rangaidam mukna rang le inkoklo kha takashawn jar a kiei dieng, riethiengsho hai le, mukna rang a inih.’
“Khajarkhan Aw reng Agrippa, ravan ah put ah ajong mulungmik dieng kiei na rieirangai boi ruthaw mi`ing.

Inia akhat changna a Damascus le Jerusalem ah awm, khashole Judea ram kholok ah awm, khan Phungshik hai dieng kieina kirurophong inih. Makha amani na mulung lek a Pathien dieng vak hieina u rang le mulungilek u kha le racha a chon thawna u rang a inih.
Hijarhin Jihudi hai na kiei hi riethiengmun ah nurushur ua that rang nururai uh.
Khajarkhan Pathien ah put ah ranak kumuk a, von nikhoshe hin dinglam a ashin-alien dieng kungkuruchang inih. Thiempulien hai na le Moses na iruriei ashok rang a kha niboia, iawm ruriei mi`ing.

Makhala Christa na shawna idoingir rang a inih, khan ama kha athi ah put ah hawng thoi akhat changna nih rangnih. Khan ama na Jihudi miring hai le Phungshik hai adinre dieng mieivar kha rophong rangnih.”
Ama na ibibing rang rurohonlai khan, Festus na rashangtak a “Nangvet joi Paul, nangthiemna hai kha na miropoboi namachang joi,” tia rura`ai.
Inia Paul na rumashang, “Kiei vet mi`ing, Aw richit`awm Festus. Inia chawng adiktak le mulungmining riethieng kha kiriei inih.
Ajarla rengpa na hihaihi ejet, khan kiei na rangamer a ama dieng kiriei inih. Khan karangam pui, makhala hihai kholok hi ama dieng rethe awm mak, ajarla muruk a thaw nimak.
Reng Agrippa, thiempulien na iruriei hai kha takanangshawn maw? Takanangshawn iti kejet.”
Agrippa na Paul dieng ruti, “Pha bawngte shung hin nang na kiei hi Christian nangnamachangdeng joi.”
Paul na rumashang, “Pha shawt ninawkle pha bawngte loi a, shurkhop kanih hi niboia, nang ranga niboia, von a kiei narangai hai kholok na kiei hi angna u rang, tia Pathien dieng kinik.”
Ama na hihaihi ruriei shole, rengpa kha na rampo Bernice, khan ama le rushuh miring hai kha le ruthoi joi.
Khan amani kha rushe u le roroia, khatlekhat dieng ruriei uh, “Hi miring hi na thatna rang ninawkle lungroko shung ah khumna rang rutuk chon iawm thaw mak.”
Agrippa na Festus dieng ruti, “Caesar dieng thangrukoi nawkatu, hi miring hi moshoktha inih.”
Kieini hi Italy a meshena rang, mulung rumiding u phakhan, Paul le shurkhop eshen hai kha Augustus rarup a awm Julius iti rarajakhat lamkai dieng rupek joi.
Asia ram shir tieng ah she rang a rasham Adramyttium rokonglien khan kurulut ua, makhan rokong a kurushe u joi. Khan Thesalonica ah put ah Macedonia miring Aristarchus kha kieini le rushe.
Jing tieng hin Sidon kurushok uh, khan Julius na Paul kha numpoktak a rutawn a awlawm hai dieng she a tenretna mukna rang, ningchamna kha rupek.
Khan ah put ah tuikhanglien tieng kuruchum ua, Cyprus tuikawram ringi a rokong a kurupang uh, ajarla rithi kha kieini dieng hawng rang.
Cilicia le Pamphylia ram kha kururakan u shole, Lycia khopui Myra khan kava uh.
Kha mun khan rarajakhat lamkai kha na Italy ah she rang, Alexandria rokonglien `khat rumuk a nurumulut u joi.
Nikho tampui loi a jamtia kurushe uh; dengre a Cnidus kha kuroshok uh. Khan rithi na nurukhar u jarkhan, Salmone le re`en Crete ringi a kurushe u joi.
Dengre a makha kavakrakan ua Lasea dieng ah awm Fair Havens, iti mun khan kava u joi.
Khan pha hawng hek a rokonglien torna rangawm chithawngroi joi. Ajarla Chamradoina pha kha`awm thengsho joi jarkhan, Paul na amani dieng chawng rupek joi.
Ama na ruti, “Miring hai nokhomijin she u hi hawng matat rang a hi kumuk, nieinak hai le rokonglien akoi`athang ranga niboia, niringkho u hiawm thang rangnih.”
Inia rarajakhat lamkai kha na Paul iriei hainek khan rokonglien torpa le pumpa kha takarushawndet.

Ajarla rokong muchumna mun kha phabi a awmna rang, rurolo mak. Mi arawpdet kha na dawn a rokong a shena rang, mulung rumiding u joi. Amani na itia maw thaw a Phoenix shokngir a phabi kha makhawn vak metheng rang, tia rumining uh. Makha thangmar le shakmar tieng ah maisho Crete ah rokong muchumna kha inih.
Thang tieng ah rithi na hawng renemdet le khan amani na irumining u kha hawng shok rangnih joi, ti u jarkhan, thirchuk kha ruthut ua Crete tuikawram kha deprit a rushe uh.
Inia shawt boipet a Euroclydon iti rithikhopui hawng rang joi.
Rithikhopui kha na rokonglien kha rushur a rithi shung khan maton shawn a lawn ngam boi jarkhan, tui a rulan u joi.
Clauda iti tuikawram ringi khan kurushe ua dengre a ringrokong hai kha kururethiei uh.
Amani na shung ah rumulutsho u le, rokonglien kha rui le rukhop uh. Khan amani na Syrtis Nge ah ruphun nih, tia ruchit pui u jarkhan, thirchuk mathaklam a amani kha rulan u joi.
Rithikhopui na shehawng a nawnawnghai u jarkhan, rokonglien shung ah awm nieinak hai kha rupai u joi.
Khan ni `thum changna khan tu kukhuttak u le rokonglien khutrak hai kha kurupai u joi.
Nikhothang khadawr shawt a ni le arshi hawng malang boi jarkhan, khan rithikhopui kha`awm hawng renem, iti awm boi phakhan, karing u rangnih, iti ngakmining kholok kha ruthang joi.

Nikhothang khadawr shawt khan nekleshak shak boi a hawng awm u phakhan, Paul na amani kar a ding a ruti, “Miring hai nangni na kawchawng kha nangnarangai pe ua, Crete tuikawram ah put khan rokong a najong u nawkatu, mahi thangna le shietnakoina hai hi rawtawng pui u naw minih.
Mahi rokonglien hi niboia, ringkho thangna `khatshe awm naw nih. Khajarkhan nang mulungmangar u roh, tia kinawdawi u inih.
Ajarla janginlai khan kiei na chonkithaw pe Pathien ravantir na kiei dieng jong ding a
ruti, ‘Chih naw roh, Paul, nang Caesar maikung a adingngir rang nangnih, khan diktak a nang le rawtawp hai miring kholok kha Pathien na nang dieng nepek joi.’
Khajarkhan miring hai nang mulungmangar u roh, ajarla Pathien na kiei dieng inieriei hi ang a shok rangnih, iti hin Pathien kha takakawshawn.
Inia kieini na tuikawram `khat nirojongir u rang a shoklai.”
Jan shawmlieimili changna khan Adria Thampui khan shehawng a inotor u le roroia janchim a ator hai kha na`awm ram kha le karanai u kha ruring u joi.
Amani na tui athuk dan kha ruen u phakhan, lam shawmdi rumuk uh. Khan rushebawt u phakhan, lam shawmlieirahnga rumuk uh.
Lung alien le rawtaw nih, tia ruchit pui u jarkhan, amani na thirchuk mili kha rumuchum ua khovar rangte kha rungakrala u joi.
Inia ator hai kha na thirchuk muchum rurasha ua, ringrokong hai kha muchum a atan rang rurashak uh.
Inia Paul na rarajakhat lamkai le ramiring hai dieng ruti, “Hihai miring hi rokonglien shung ah awm u joi nawkatu, nangni rekhe ngam u naw tinih.”
Khashole ramiring hai kha na ringrokong rui hai kha rushat ua rumalan u joi.
Khovar diengtak khan Paul na amani kholok dieng nekleshak shakna rang, mawshawk a ruti, “Ih shak boi a, vawnchamlam a, nangingakna u hi von le ni shawmlieimili changna nih joi.
Khajarkhan, nang ringna u rang nekleshak shak rang hin kawnawmawshawk uh. Ajarla nang lu uah shampum `khatshe thangna awm naw nih.”
Mahi ruriei shole, ama na tan hai kha ruloi a, amani kholok maikung a Pathien dieng mapakna runiei, khan ama na makha rukhoi a ashah ruput joi.
Amani kholok na lungarna runiei ua, ibibing u rang nekleshak kha ruloi uh.
Rokonglien shung ah awm kha kokholok ua miring rajadi shawm shirilieiruk kurunih uh.
Amani na rutukthep a rushak u shole, amani na rokonglien kha rumajangdet u joi, khan gehu hai kha thampui chung ah rupai u joi.
Kho hawng var phakhan, amani na ram kha rujet u mak. Inia ngebuk ram kha rumuk uh. Kha mun khan nitthiei a la rokonglien kha shok puina rang, rumining uh.
Thirchuk kha ruthut ua tui shung khan rumak u joi. Khan radar le rushui rui kha ruthut uh. Khashole rithiloi kha rulawm ua kawmchang tieng khan rushe u joi.
Thampui `di rumukna mun ah ngebuk kha rushuk ua rokonglien lu kha ruruphun a leh miehieibawt `le, ruper thieilai mak. Khan tuilawm kha na ama takdon kha leklek a akhoi ruput joi.
Ramiring hai chonrashak kha tu shurkhop hai kha tuihot thaw a rekhena boi rang that rang, iti hi inih.

Inia rarajakhat lamkai kha na Paul kha rushan jawt jarkhan, amani chonrashak ah put ah rekhemashakna rang ruthaw. Ama na tuihot thiei hai kha akhat changna a chawm a kawmchang tieng shena rang, chawng rupek joi.
Khan ravat sheng kha na thinglong le rokonglien lekvai hai kha rotokna rang, chawng rupek joi. Khatikhan mi kholok kha ramhona khan rurekhemashak joi.
Khatikhan rurekhe u shole, makha tuikawram kha Malta iti kha rujet uh.
Ajarla roshur a adaihai jarkhan, khomiring hai kha na shindawngroi a numnurupok uh. Khomiring hai kha na miei rurukum ua kieini kha lamjawng nuruthaw uh.
Paul na remrei pawm `khat vak rawkhawm a miei vak rukum phakhan, rawshawk `khat hi miei na re`em phakhan, vak shok a Paul khut kha vak kher pe joi.

Khomiring hai kha na ranring kha ama khut ah akhai kha rumuk u phakhan, khatlekhat dieng ruti uh, “Miringpa hi mithat miring ningir rangnih, ama na thampui ah put ah hawng rekhe joiawm, dikna hi na imiring jawt boi keng joi.”
Ama na ranring kha miei shung ah ruthing a, ama na shiekho kha rutawnglai mak.

Upum kha hawng pom pe ninawkle pur a thirelen rangnih joi, tia amani na rumining uh. Inia pha shawtbawt rungak uh. Ama dieng ih shok boi kha rumuk u `le, mulung rulek uh, khan ama kha pathien `khat keng ruti uh.
Makha ram khan tuikawram kholakpa kha na ram tampui runiei. Ama riming kha Publius ruti. Ama na lamjawng nuruthaw ua mirittak a ni `thum nurumieriek uh.
Hitihin rushok, makhala Publius apa kha raitun le ekshenrai na rumaja. Paul na rushe a Pathien dieng runik pe, khan ukhut rutet pe a damna runiei.
Mahi ruthaw shole, tuikawram ah awm natna aniei mi kholok na va ua damna rumuk uh.
Amani na lam tampui a richit nurupek uh. Khan rokong a kurushe u phakhan, kirangai u kholok kha nurupek uh.
Tha `thum shole pathien aphir hai limbit akawp, Alexandria rokonglien khan kurushe u joi. Makha tuikawram khan phabi irumehek a ruawm inih.
Syracuse khan kuruchum ua kha mun khan ni `thum kuruawm uh.
Kha mun ah put ah kavakhiei ua Rhegium kha kavakshok uh. Ni `khat shole, thang tieng ah rithi hawng a jing tieng hin Puteoli kawhawngshok uh.
Kha mun khan uliennai hai kurumuk ua amani le ni shiri awmna rang nururiei uh. Khatikhan Rome kurushok u joi.
Kha mun khan uliennai hai kha na kava u kha rujet u `le, Appius rievieithawna le tungna In ‘Thum iti munshe kha lamjawng navakthaw uh. Paul na amani kha rumuk phakhan, Pathien mapak a ngarna runiei.
Kieini na Rome kurushok u phakhan, rarajakhat lamkai kha na shurkhop hai kha mirung hai lamkai dieng rupek joi. Inia Paul kha tu arungpa ramiring `khat kha le ibibing a awmna rang rujawt pe.

Ni `thum shole Paul na Jihudi lamkai hai kha rukoi. Amani kha vak ruchun u shole, amani dieng ruti, “Uliennai miring hai, kiei na nimiring hai dieng ninawkle nipilepu hai shena le re`er a chon kha kuruthaw nawkawm, Jerusalem ah nurushur ua Rome miring hai dieng nurupek uh.
Amani na kiei hi nawmawchawng u phakhan, nurumoshok jawt uh. Ajarla kithitna rang a rutuk shikmieshiei kha ruthaw mi`ing.
Inia Jihudi hai na moshokna kha le re`er a chawngruriei u phakhan, kiei na Caesar dieng thangkoi boi thaboi `khat a kuruawm. Kuphung hai chung a nawngna kivakchawi tu nimak.
Hijarhin a inih kiei na nangni le rumuh a chawng kiriei jawtna hi. Ajarla kiei na hitihin a thirakarui le kirikhit hi Israel hai ngakmining rangbak a inih.”

Amani na ruti uh, “Kieini na Judea ah put ah chawngmawchawi `khatshe nang jar a rumuh u mi`ing. Khan khan ah put ah ajong uliennai hai `khatshe na thanginavakkoi u ninawkle nang jar a chon shie `khatshe riei u mak.
Inia nang imining kha karangai jawt uh. Ajarla mahi lawpreshen chungchanga mun rikip a re`erpuilam a iriei u kha kejet uh.”

Amani na nikho `khat ruren ua ama awmna khan mi tampui rushe uh. Jingkar ah put ah nitakshe Pathien rengchangna chungchanga rumeler a riringtak a kungruchang. Khan ama na Jesu chungchanga Moses Dan behangbuk ah le Thiempulien hai behangbuk ah put ah amani kha rumawjawtna rang ruthaw.
Eshen hai na iruriei hai kha rujawt pe uh, inia eshen hai na takarushawn pe u mak.
Amani khatlekhat rurawjawt boi u phakhan, Paul na chawng `khat ruriei shole, rushe u joi: “Ratha Riethieng na nipilepu hai dieng diktak a Isaiah thiempulien dieng irurieina inih.
Hitihin ruti, ‘Hihai miring dieng hin she tana riei roh: “Nangrangai tu nangrangai u rangnih, inia nangni na jet u naw tinih, khan nangen tu nangen u rangnih, inia muh u naw tinih.

Ajarla mahi miring hai mulung kha momo pe joi. Khan amani nokor u kha na rangai matatmashak u joi. Khan imik u kha mawchawt pe u joi. Khanawkatu amani mik le umuk u rangnih, khan amani nokor u le rangai u rangnih, khan amani mulung le jet u joiatu, kiei dieng vak hiei u rangnih. Khan kiei na madam u rang kanih.’
“Khajarkhan mahi nangni dieng kinemejet jawt u inih, makhala Pathien na Phungshik hai dieng ama shandamna kha jong tir joi, khan amani na rangai u rangnih!”
Khahaikha Paul na ruti shole, Jihudi hai kha rushe ua amani kar a chawngrurieshiet u joi.
Paul na manpekin khan kum `di rupumping a ruawm, khan ama dieng ava kholok kha rumulut.
Pathien rengchangna chungchang khan chawngrushem, khan Pumi Jesu Christa jar kha alo-atang boipet a lungartak a ruchuk a ruawm joi.
Paul kiei hi Jesu Christa shok `khat a tirtawn `khat nitna rang, Pathien na athachawng rang khan inurukoi a inuruchaw nih joi.
Makha athachawng kha Miejiek Riethieng a tona a Pathien na thiempulien hai dieng chawngirurakhamna inih.
Makha taksha shena dungjuia David chicha shung a rushok Ashapa Jesu Christa chungchanga inih.
Riethiengna Ratha jar a athi ah put ah Pathien na ranak nieitak a rumothoi phakhan, nupumi u Jesu Christa hi Pathien Shapa inih, tia irumumuk inih.
Ama jar a le ama riming rang khan kieini na numpokmirit le tirtawn changna kha kimuk u nih joi. Makha phung kholok kar a miring hai kha takamawshawn a mujuina rang a inih.
Nangniawm phung hai kar a Jesu Christa na inurukoi kha nangnih u joi.
Miriethieng changna rang, Pathien na numipok Rome ah awm kholok dieng, kiei na kimiejiek inih. Napa u Pathien le nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Rapapek a nang kholok chungchanga kapathien kha Jesu Christa jar a kamapak, ajarla nang takashawn u kha manmieshie kholok dieng rophong joi.
Ashapa athachawng chungchanga karatha le chon kithaw pe Pathien hi, kinikna rikip a nangni kha kinawmawjawchak u inih, iti kukungchangna kha inih.
Nangni dieng kavatna rang, dawng tieng, Pathien na ijawt a lam nawmawlawngna pe rang hin enchak a nikna kiniei inih.
Nangni dieng rathalam khutchawi dikhattak a nita`awm kinepek ua nangni kha namaratnathiei rang, nangni kha kunumuk jawt uh.
Makhala, khatlekhat takashawn jar a kiei hi nangni le lungar nerepeh shomna u rang a inih.

Uliennai hai, nangni na nangijet boi u rang a hi dit mi`ing, makhala Phungshik shik hai kar a kha ang a, nang kar ua`awm, ara dikhat kamanna rang, nangni dieng vatna rang hin karashak jawnjai, inia vonshe hin inakhar inih.
Kiei na Greek hai dieng le Greek nih boi hai dieng, khan mishing hai le mimawng hai dire dieng lieishie niei miring kha kanih.
Khajarkhan, kingamtukshe a, Rome ah awm nangni diengawm athachawng kha kirophong jawt inih.

Ajarla Christa athachawng rang khan kiei jak mi`ing, ajarla takashawn mi rikip shandamna rang a mahi Pathien ranak kha inih. Mahi athachawng hi rapapek a Jihudi hai rang a inih, khan dawn a Greek hai rang a inih.

Ajarla mahi athachawng shung hin Pathien dikna kha takashawn ah put ah takashawnshe khan imalangmashak inih. Mahi hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Midik miring kha na takashawn jar a aring rang a inih.”
Pathien lunghangna kha ravan ah put ah Pathienjetna boi le dikna boi kholok dieng malangmashak joi. Amani na adik kha dikna boi kha le ishawm inih.
Ajarla Pathien jetnathiei kha amani dieng imalar pe nih joi, ajarla amani dieng Pathien na irumalar pe nih joi.

Ajarla manmieshie kon ah put ah mukthiei boi tharingna hai kha na irukon khutkon hai dieng khan malangsheng a irumumukna inih. Amani kha la kumshawt ranak le Pathien changna kha inih. Khajarkhan amani chung a rangaidam awm mak.
Ajarla, amani na Pathien kha rujet u joiawm, Pathien ang a lurna rupeh u mak, ninawkle rumapak u mak. Inia mulungmining khan nemna boi ruchang uh, khan amawng mulung hai kha irumijing pe u inih.
Mishing kanih ti u joiawm, mimawng kha ruchang uh.
Amani na athithiei boi Pathien lurna kha athithiei miring, va hai, kemiliniei sha hai, khan vawn a rawshawn juleva hai rilim hai kha le rurotho uh.
Khajarkhan ditrekhe dungjuia pawrche chon thawna rang khan Pathien na amani kha rono chon hai dieng irupek inih. Makha na jar chang a amani pum hai kha amanirilik dieng richit boi a ruthaw uh.
Amani na Pathien adik kha mielieishiei kha le rurotho uh, khan Akonpanek khan ama khutkon kha chubaibawk a chon ruthaw pe uh. Pathien ama kha kumshawt a mapak chang rosho. Amen.
Khajarkhan richit awm boi jaknaroi kha thawna rang, Pathien na amani kha rupek joi. Dawn a amani nupang hai kha na balam chon kha balam nih boi chon kha le rurotho uh.

Khatikhan, apa hai na`awm, nupang hai le balam a she rang a kha mak ua, manilemani chung khan takjatna mothoi nana uh. Amani palepa kha na jaknaroi chon kha ruthaw ua, makha rehena jarkhan, rutukthep chepna kha rumuk uh.
Amani na Pathien jetna kha iruniei u jawt boitak kha ang a, rutuk boi chon hai thawna rang khan, Pathien na amani kha mulung mawngna dieng khan irupek inih.

Amani mulung shung khan dikna boi kholok, rejaichon, thatna boi, shak a raphamna, michung a mulung hoina boi, mukmakna shipmer, mithatna, raha mothoina, mimohonna, mulungpok ashie, khan muruk a mimieshietna hai kha ruship pe uh. Amani kha mimieshiet miring hai kha runih uh.
Amani kha mi anuk a mieshiet, Pathien amumak, chitniei boi, lienrasha, aphing, ashie chon athar moshok, nupa chawng jui boi,
jetna aniei boi, takashawn rang a rutuk boi, minumpok thiei boi, rangaidam thiei boi, khan roihoi thiei boi miring hai kha runih uh.
Kha ang athaw miring hai kha athi rang a rutuk inih, iti Pathien dikna dan kha rujet u joiawm, amani na khahaikha iruthaw u ranga kha niboia, kha hai athaw miring hai kha amani na irujawt pe u inih.

Khajarkhan nang kha rangaidam niei boi `khat nangnih, Aw mi chung a chawngshat miring. Ajarla nang na shik miring dieng chawngnishattak kha na nang kha inaheng inih. Ajarla chawngshat miring nang na makhatak kha nangithaw inih.
Kha`ang chon athaw miring chung a Pathien na chawngshat phakhan, adik dungjuia chawngshat, iti kha nejet uh.
Aw miring, khahai chon athaw hai chung a chawngnishattak athawpa, Pathien na chawngshat phakhan, kerekhe rangnih, tia maw nangmining?
Ninawkle ama ninghoina, doiratna, ashawt a shawdoina rawchawngna hai kha nangida maw nih? Pathien ninghoina kha na mulung lekna tieng lam inakai pe inih, iti kha nangijet boi maw nih?
Inia nang mulung michimna le nang mulung lekthieina boi dungjuia, Pathien na adik a chawngishat kha irophongna rang a Nikho a Pathien lunghangna kha nangrilik rang a nangirutung inih.
Pathien na “mi rikip dieng amama chonthaw dungjuia mikir pe rangnih.”
Doiratna kha le chon atha hai kha ithaw a, lurna, richit, khan athithiei boi kha itawk a awm amani dieng khan kumshawt ringna kha ipek inih.
Inia ama rangbak a itawk khan adik kha ijui boi a dikna boi kha ijui amani dieng khan Pathien na mulung rahana le lunghangna kha pek rangnih.
Shawrana le mulungshaw kha ashie chon athaw miring rikip dieng chuh rangnih. Makha rapapek a Jihudi hai rang a inih, khan dawn a Greek hai rang a inih.
Inia atha thaw miring rikip dieng lurna, richitna, khan lungdamna kha awm rangnih. Makha Jihudi dieng chubak rangnih, khan dawn a Greek miring dieng chuh rangnih.
Ajarla Pathien dieng enshietenlar iti awm mak.
Ajarla Dan vai a munu athaw mi kholok na Dan vai a thang rangnih. Khan Dan shung a munu athaw mi kholok na Dan kha na chawngshat pe rangnih.
Ajarla Dan na iriei rangai hai kha Pathien maikung a dikna miring hai kha achang nimak, inia Dan na iriei athaw miring hai kha Pathien na midik rangnih.
Ajarla Dan niei boi Phungshik hai kha na balam a Dan na ikhin hai kha thaw uh. Hihai miring hi na, Dan kha niei u joi nawkawm, khahaikha na dan achang inih.
