Hihai miring hi na Dan na ikhin chon kha Pathien na amani mulung shung a imiejiek pe inih, iti kha imumuk u inih. Amani lungthim kha na`awm makha chungchanga kungachang inih. Amanirilik kar khan amani mulungmining hai kha na ipawm ninawkle iheng inih.
Pathien na Jesu Christa jar a miring hai murukchon hai kha chawngishatna rang a Nikho khan, kiei na kirophong athachawng dungjuia thaw rangnih.
Enro, nang Jihudi kanih nangti joi, Dan khan a nangingiei nih joi, khan Pathien dieng nangawm jarkhan, lienrashatna kha nangniei joi.
Khan mulungmining kha nangjet joi, Dan ah put ah narachak jarkhan, athaving nieinak hai kha nangmuchuk joi.
Khan mikchaw lamkai `khat a le ajing a awm miring hai dieng mieivar `khat a nang nining a rangamna kha nangniei joi.
Amawng hai mirachah miring kha nangnih, naite hai oja kha nangchang. Nang na jetna le adik awmchan kha Dan jar a nanginiei inih.
Khajarkhan shik dieng a miruchupa nang, nangrilik dieng ruchuh makche maw? Murushah tha mak, tia mi dieng a chawngshempa, muru maw nangshak?
“Uire thaw naw roh” atipa, uire maw nangthaw? Rilim chubaibawk kha imitir nang na, mun riethieng nieinak kha ranak a maw nangsho?
Dan chungchanga lienrashatna aniei nang na, Dan kha nangkhoi a, Pathien kha maimawk maw nangpek?
Ajarla hitihin miejiek hi a`ang inih: “Phungshik hai kar a Pathien riming mieshiet hi nang jar ua inih.”
Nang na Dan kha nangrung joiatu, nang vunep kha nemna inih, khan nang na Dan kha nangkhoi a tu, nang vunep kha vunep nih boi achang.
Khajarkhan vunep boi miring `khat na Dan dikna irangai kha jui joiala, vunep boina kha vunep `khat a te naw nih maw?
Nang na Dan shung ah chawng kholok kha le vunepna kha nangmuk joi. Nitjoiawm dan kha nangkhoi joiatu, taksha a vunep boi kha na, dan kha rupummashak joiatu, nang chung a chawngshat naw nih maw?
Ajarla vai tieng a Jihudi achang miring kha tu Jihudi nimak, khan taksha vai tieng a vunep kha tu vunep nimak.

Inia shung rieirit a Jihudi ama kha Jihudi inih, khan mulung a vunep kha vunep inih. Mahi Ratha jar a inih, dantak a nimak, ama chung a mapakna kha miring ah put ah nimak a Pathien ah put ah ajong inih.
Khanitala, Jihudi miring `khat na chanthatna kha imaw niei? Ninawkle, vunep nemna kha imaw nih?
Lam rikip a nemna ieniei. Chungchon a, Pathien chawng hai kha amani dieng khutirurothona inih.
Khana tukhat na takashawn joi nawkala, imaw rachang nih? Amani takashawn boi kha na Pathien takashawn rang a rutukna kha chon thaw boi machang nih maw?

Makha nihet mak! Inia Pathien kha adik chang rosho, khan mi rikip kha mielieishiei chang rosho. Hitihin miejiek, “Chawng nangriei phakhan, nangdikthiei. Mi na nang chung a chawngshat phakhan, nangmawtawrthiei.”
Inia nidikna boi u kha na Pathien dikna kha malangmashak joiala, imaw niti u rang? Lunghangna rotoknapa Pathien hi adik boi maw nih? (Miring `khat a kiei na chawngkiriei inih.)
Makha nihet mak! Makha nitala, Pathien na manmieshie hi itia maw chawngshat nih?
Kiemielieishiei thawna hi na Pathien adik changna kha ama lurna dieng mielien shishit joiala, ijar a kiei hi munu miring `khat a inawnawng maw nilai?

“Atha shokna rang ashie kha thaw u rawi,” ti u rawi maw? Makha mi na kieini dieng a iniei mieshietna le khan kieini na niti uh, tia eshen na inojor u kha a`ang inih. Amani chung a hengna kha adik inih.
Khanitala imaw nih? Kieini hi amaninek a athadet maw kanih uh? Shuknih a nimak. Ajarla matieng khan kieini na Jihudi hai le Greek miring hai dire hi munu thoi a awm inih, tia kirumieshiet u inih.
Makha hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Tuteawm midik awm mak, `khatshe awm mak.
Ajet tute awm mak. Pathien atawk tute awm mak.
Mi kholok na lamrehe joi. Lawpsheng a nemna boi chang u joi. Atha athaw tute awm mak. Tute awm mak, `khatshe awm mak.”
“Amani rek hai kha rawlawng thankhur kha inih; amani mieliei hai kha le milemna chawng kha riei uh.” “Moro tur kha ner ah awm pe uh.”
“Amani vai khan pumbotna le mulung akha kha ship pe uh.”
“Thishen moshok rang khan relen uh.
Thangna le shawna kha maton ah awm pe uh.
Lungdamna lam kha amani na jet u mak.”
“Amani mik hai khan Pathien chitna awm pe u mak.”
Inia Dan na iriei rikip kha Dan thoi a awm miring hai dieng a iriei inih, iti kha nejet u joi. Ajarla bai rikip kha makha a manmieshie kholok na Pathien maikung a mashangna rang a inih.
Ajarla Dan hai chon jar a miring kha Pathien na ama maikung a midik naw nih. Ajarla Dan jar a munu kha nijet u inih.
Khania tun Dan jaw boi a Pathien dikna kha malangmashak joi. Mahi Dan le Thiempulien behangbuk hai na kungachang inih.
Jesu Christa dieng takashawn jar a Pathien dikna kha kholok dieng le takashawn miring kholok chung a jong joi. Ajarla kairekhena awm mak.
Ajarla mi kholok na munu thaw a Pathien lurna khan shok ngam mak.
Christa Jesu dieng a awm khekna jar a Pathien na manboi a ama ninghoina kha le iridikmashak inih.

Christa thishen khan takashawn jar a Pathien na ama kha ringnikna rawthawina `khat a imiding inih. Makha ama dikna kha numumukna rang a inih. Ajarla ama doiratna khan matienglai a iruthaw u munu hai kha Pathien na irurakan nih joi.
Makha tun a pha hin ama dikna kha mumukna rang a inih. Makha Jesu dieng a takashawn jar a ama kha midik le mi midikpa nitnathiei rang a inih.
Khanitala lienrashatna kha khoshekawt a maw awm? Mahi akhar joi. Dan jar a maw nih? Chon jar a maw nih? Nimak, inia takashawn dan jar a inih.
Khajarkhan Dan na ikhin chon hai kha jaw boi a, miring `khat hi takashawn jar a imidik inih, iti hin a nimuchum u nih joi.
Ninawkle, Pathien hi Jihudi hai ranga Pathien maw nih? Ama hi Phungshik hai rangawm Pathien anih boi maw nih? Inih, Phungshik hai rangawm inih.
Ajarla Pathien `khat a`awm inih. Ama na vunep hai kha takashawn jar a, khan vunep boi hai kha`awm ra`angre takashawn jar a midik rangnih.
Khanitala takashawn jar a Dan hi chon thaw boi nimachang u maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Inia Dan kha kieini na nimenet u inih.
Khajarkhan napa u Abraham na miring `khat chang a irumuk dungjuia imaw riei u rang?
Ajarla chon hai kha jar a Abraham kha imidik nitjoiala, lienrashatna rang a mun ieniei, inia Pathien maikung a nimak.
Ajarla Miejiekna imaw riei? “Abraham na Pathien kha takarushawn a midik `khat a irute nih joi.”
Chon athaw ama dieng khan nilawh hai kha numpokmirit `khat a te mak, inia lieishie `khat a ite inih.
Khan tukhat na chon tu ithaw boi, inia pathienjet boi hai imidik Pathien kha tu taka`ishawn, ama kha dikna khan itechen inih.
Chon le ruirakaimashak boi a Pathien na dikna khan ite miring kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih, tia David na iruti kha le ra`ang inih:
“Pathien na danishawnboi hai kha irangaidam pe a amani munu hai kha imukhu pe kha rahvanmuh miring hai kha nih uh.
PUMI na ama chung a munu ite pe boi rang a ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
Mahi rahvanmuh changna hi vunep hai dieng ranga maw nih ninawkle vunep boi hai diengawm ajong maw nih? Kieini na niti uh, makhala ama takashawn jar a Abraham kha midik `khat a irute nih joi.
Itia irute pe maw nih? Ama na vunruep shole a maw nih, ninawkle vunruep mala khan a maw nih? Vuneplai khan a nimak a vunruep boilai khan a inih.

Jetna `khat a imuk vunepna kha vunep mala a irumuk takashawn jar a imuk dikna jetnam `khat inih. Makha takashawn miring kholok apa nitnathiei rang a inih. Amani kha vunep boi miring runih u joiawm, amani diengawm dikna kha peknathiei rang a inih.
Ama kha vunep miring hai ranga apa runimak a napa u Abraham na vunruep mala a ama takashawn kenu hai chung a alawn hai amani rangawm apa inih.
Ajarla manmieshie koklo nitna rang a Abraham ninawkle ama chicha hai dieng chawngrakham kha Dan jar a runimak a takashawn dikna jar a runih.
Ajarla Dan ah put ah aring amani kha koklo hai kha nitjoiatu, makha na takashawn kha arok imachang inih, khan chawngrakham kha chon thaw boi imachang inih.
Dan na Pathien lunghangna kha imoshok inih. Ajarla Dan awmna boi mun khan Dan khoina, iti awm mak.

Khajarkhan numpokmirit dungjuia nitna rang, chawngrakham kha takashawn jar a ajong inih. Makha chawngrakham kha chicha kholok dieng anihet nitna rang a inih. Makha Dan thoi a awm miring hai ranga nimak a, nokholok apa achang Abraham takashawn ang a aniei miring hai rangawm inih.

Hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih, “Phung tampui apa `khat rang khan kinamadan nih joi.” Makha ama na taka`ishawn Pathien maikung a inih. Ama na athi miring kha ringna ipek inih, a`awm boi nieinak hai kha`awm irukoi a irumaw`awm inih.
Abraham na ngakmining runiei boi phakhan, ngakmining kha le takarushawn. Makha na phung tampui apa irumachang inih. Makha le racha a hitihin ruriei, “Nang chicha hai kha hitihin rawp rangnih.”
Ama takashawn kha mawdawk boi a ama pum kha athi `khat a rumining (ajarla ama kha kum rajakhat runih joi). Sarah naikawk kha`awm athi `khat a rumining joi.
Takashawn boi jar a Pathien chawngrakham khan rurawnawk mak. Inia ama takashawn kha na Pathien dieng lurna rupek a ranak iruniei shishit inih.
Ama chawngrakham khan Pathien na thawna rang, ranakawm ieniei, iti kha Abraham na rujet`het.
Khajarkhan “ama takashawn jar a Pathien na midik `khat a irute nih joi.”
Ama kha irutechen, iti ama ranga khan a imiejiek runimak.
Inia kieini rangawm inih. Nupumi u Jesu athi ah put ah rumothoipa takashawn khan inetechen u inih.
Ajarla nieshietna u jar a Pathien na ama kha irupek inih. Khan kieini hi nimidikna rang, Pathien na ama kha irumothoi inih.
Takashawn jar a kieini hi nimidik jarkhan, Pumi Jesu Christa jar a Pathien le lungdamna kha nieniei u joi.
Ama jar a nidingna u makha numpokmirit khan takashawn jar a lutna numuk u joi. Khan Pathien lurna ngakmining khan lienrashatna nieniei u joi.
Khan kha ranga kha nimak, shawrana hai khan lienrashatna`awm nieniei uh. Ajarla shawrana kha na doiratna moshok, iti kha nejet uh.
Doiratna kha na tharingna, khan tharingna kha na ngakmining imoshok inih.
Ngakmining kha na mulung rakaina nepeh mak. Ajarla kieini dieng a inepek Ratha Riethieng jar a Pathien numpok kha numulung u shung a thong joi.
Ajarla kieini na adawk a nuruawm u lai khan, pha rutukthep a, Christa na Pathienjetna boi hai ruhut a ruthi.
Midik `khat ruhut a tukhat athi rang a kha ashokngawt boi chon inih. Miring atha `khat ruhut a tukhat na thitna rang lungar inieithiei inih.
Inia kieini na munu miring a nuruawmlaitak khan, nuruhut a Christa na ruthi a Pathien na ama numpok kha kieini dieng inumumuk inih.
Makha khea, tun Christa thishen jar a Pathien na kieini hi nimidik joi. Khajarkhan ama jar a kieini hi Pathien na lunghangna ah put ah nashan rangnih joi.
Ajarla kieini hi rahapui nurunilai khan, ashapa athi khan kieini hi Pathien le nieriengieimashak joiatu, riengieina thaw shole hin, ashapa aring jar a, kieini hi idawr a inashan rang a maw nih!
Makhate kha niboia, nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a Pathien dieng ningaina kha nieniei u joi. Ama dieng tun kieini na riengieina kha numuk joi.

Khajarkhan miring `khat jar a munu kha manmieshie shung a jong lut kha ang a, munu jar a thitna kha jong lut joi. Khatikhan thitna kha mi kholok dieng eshem joi, ajarla mi kholok na munu iruthaw inih.
Ajarla Danshe khan munu na manmieshie shung a ruawm, inia Dan awm boilai khan, munu kha rute mak.
Nitjoiawm thitna kha na Adam ah put ah Mosesshe kha, Adam shietna dungjuia, munu ruthaw boi hai chungshe khan, reng ruchang. Adam kha ajong rang a ama meloi `khat inih.

Khania manboi khutchawi kha tu shietna kha le ra`ang mak. Ajarla miring `khat shietna jar a mi tampui ruthi joiatu, makha khea, Pathien numpokmirit le miring `khat, Jesu Christa, numpokmirit jar a khutchawi kha na mi tampui dieng ruphu a ruawm.

Khan khutchawi kha miring `khat munu thaw jar a ajong kha ang mak. Ajarla miring `khat shietna ruthaw jar a ajong chawngshatna kha hengna tieng rujir. Inia shietna tampui jar a ajong manboi khutchawi kha midikna a rujir.

Miring `khat na shietna ruthaw jarkhan, makha miring `khat jar a thitna na reng ruchang joiatu, makha khea, numpokmirit le dikna khutchawi ruphu a amuh kha na, miring `khat, Jesu Christa, jar a ringkho a reng chang rangnih.
Khajarkhan miring `khat shietna jar a hengna kha mi kholok dieng ajong inih, khan miring `khat dikna chon jar a mi kholok dieng ringkho jong chawi ridikna kha a`awm inih.
Miring `khat chawngjui boi jar a mi tampui kha munu miring rumachang, kha le ra`ang a, miring `khat chawngjui jar a mi tampui kha midik rangnih.
Shietna kha pung shishitna rang a Dan kha ajong inih. Inia munu ruphu a awmna khan numpokmirit kha ruphudet a awm.
Munu kha na thitna a reng ruchangtak kha ang a, nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a, numpokmirit kha na dikna jar a kumshawt ringna khan rengchang rangnih.
Khajarkhan kieini na imaw nithaw u rang? Numpokmirit kha ruphuna rang, munu chon kha thaw a awm u rawi maw?
Makha nihet mak! Munu a ruthi kieini hi na itia maw makhan ring a awm minih?
Ninawkle, Christa Jesu dieng a baptisma niruloi u khan ama thitna a baptisma niruloi u nih joi, iti hi nangijet boi u maw nih?
Khajarkhan ama thitna baptisma loina khan Christa le inukhumchen u nih joi. Makha, Apa lurna jar a Christa kha irumothoi kha le ra`ang a, ringkho `thar shung a kieini niringna rang a inih.
Kieini hi ama thitna meloi khan nurushuimashak joiatu, thoiretna meloi khan kieini hi nurushuimashakngir rangnih.

Nimiringlui changna kha le cross ah inuruthat pe nih joi. Khan munu na ibuk nupum u kha na dawn a chon thawna boi rang le kieini na munu shok achang a nawawmna boi rang a inih, iti kha kieini na nejet joi.
Ajarla Christa le athi miring ama kha munu ah put ah imoshok nih joi.
Kieini na Christa kha le nathi joi jarkhan, kieini na ama le naring rangnih, iti kha takanishawn inih.
Christa na athi ah put ah hawng thoi joi jarkhan, thilai naw nih, iti kha nejet uh. Thitna kha na ama chung a pumi changlai naw nih.
Ajarla Christa na ruthi kha munu jar a voikhatte ruthi joi, inia ama na aring hi Pathien jarbak a aring inih.
Hitihin nangniawm munu ah put ah athihet, khan nupumi u Christa Jesu jar a Pathien dieng aring `khat a mining u roh.
Khajarkhan munu ditrekhe kha jui a athithiei nang pum u shung khan munu kha reng machang u naw roh.

Munu dieng khan nang pasha u kha dikna boi khutrak hai `khat a peh u naw roh, inia athi miring hai ah put ah aring `khat a Pathien dieng peh u roh. Khan nang pasha u kha Pathien dieng dikna khutrak `khat a peh u roh.
Ajarla munu na nang chung ua pumi chang naw nih. Ajarla Dan thoi a awm u makche, inia numpokmirit thoi a awm nangnih uh.
Khanitala imaw? Kieini hi Dan thoi a awm boi, inia numpokmirit thoi a awm ninit jarkhan, munu maw thaw rang? Makha nihet mak!

Nangni na shok hai `khat a tukhat chawng kha jui a nangrepeh joiatu, chawngnangijui pe ama dieng khan shok nangchang nih joi. Khajarkhan nangni kha thitna napeh munu ninawkle dikna napeh chawngjuina shok kha anithiei nangnih. Mahi jet u makche maw?
Pathien dieng khan mapak chang rosho. Ajarla matienglai khan munu shok hai kha nangrunih u joiawm, ruchukna `khat nangni dieng nurupek joi. Makha mulungluttak a nangrujui u joi.
Pathien na munu ah put ah nomoshok u joi jarkhan, dikna shok hai kha nangchang u joi.

Nang miringchangna u kha dawk jarkhan, miring awmchan a kiriei inih. Danishawnna boi aliendet tieng a anachawi, ronochon le danishawnboi dieng shok hai `khat a nang pasha u kha nangirupek u kha ang a, tun riethiengna tieng a anachawi dikna dieng khan nang pasha u kha shok `khat ang a peh u roh.
Ajarla munu shok hai nangrunih u phakhan, dikna ah put ah rushok miring kha nangnih uh.
Khajarkhan nangijak pui u chon hai shung khan ara ih kha maw nangruniei uh? Ajarla khahai ara kha tu thitna inih.
Inia tuntu, Pathien na munu ah put ah nomoshok a ama shok hai kha nangchang u joi. Riethiengna tieng a ara kha nangniei u joi, khan makha ara kha kumshawt ringna kha inih.
Ajarla munu thawlawh kha thitna inih, inia Pathien khutchawi kha nupumi u Christa Jesu jar a kumshawt ringna kha inih.
Ninawkle uliennai hai, miring `khat na iringlailim ama chung a Dan na pumi`ichangna inih, iti hi nangijet boi u maw nih? (Ajarla kiei na mahi dan ajet hai dieng a kiriei inih).
Ajarla inkopa awm nupang kha ama inkopa kha ringlaishe khan Dan na ikhop inih. Inia ama inkopa kha thi joiatu, inkopa dan ah put ah ama kha imoshok nih joi.

Khajarkhan inkopa ringlai khan, ama na miring `khat niei joiatu, ama kha uire athaw nupang, tia koi rangnih. Inia inkopa kha thi joiatu, ama na shik `khat niei joiawm, ama kha uire athaw nupang kha changna boi rang, dan ah put ah ningchamna kha niei joi.

Khajarkhan, kuliennai hai, nangni na shik `khat, nitila, athi hai kar ah put ah hawng thoi ama tah nachangna u rang, Christa pum jar a, nangniawm Dan ah put ah athi miring kha nangnih u joi. Makha Pathien rang ara kha nienieina u rang a inih.
Ajarla kieini na taksha a nuruawmlai khan, Dan jar a munu ditrekhena hai kha thitna ara moshokna rang, napasha dieng chon iruthaw inih.
Matieng a nurushur dieng khan nuruthi ua, tuntu kieini hi Dan ah put ah nakhek joi. Makha miejieklui khan niboia Ratha a ringna athar chon kha nawthawna u rang a inih.

Dawn a imaw kieini na niriei rang? Dan hi munu maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Makha le perawlaw a, Dan jar a runih joi nawkatu, munu kha kiei na rujet naw ning. Ajarla Dan na “Phamrai nangithaw boi rang a inih,” ruti nawkatu, phamrai iti kha rujet naw ning.
Inia chawngpek jar a munu kha na chanthatna ruloi a, phamrai chat rikip kha kushung a irumoshok inih. Ajarla Dan jaw boi a munu hi athi inih.
Pha `khat khan Dan boi a kururing, inia chawngpek jong phakhan, munu kha hawng ring a kiei ruthi kanih joi.
Ringna nurupeh rang a chawngpektak kha na kiei dieng thitna kha nurupek.
Ajarla chawngpek jar a munu na chanthatna ruloi a kiei hi nurulem, khan makha jar a munu na kiei hi inuruthat inih.
Khajarkhan Dan hi riethieng inih, khan chawngpek hi riethieng, adik, khan atha kha inih.

Khajarkhan atha kha kiei rang thitna ruchang maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Inia munu kha munu `khat a malangna rang, atha jar a kiei dieng thitna kha irumoshok inih. Makha chawngpek jar a munu kha aliendet munu changna rang a inih.
Ajarla Dan hi rathalam inih, iti kha nejet uh. Inia kiei tu balam miring kha kanih. Kiei hi munu dieng khan shok `khat a inurujor inih.
Ajarla kithaw chon kha alawtna jet mi`ing. Ajarla kithaw jawt chon kha kiei na thaw mi`ing, inia kimitir chontak kha keng kiei na kithaw.
Inia kiei na kithaw jawt boi chontak kha kawthaw joiatu, Dan kha atha, tia kijawt pui inih.
Khajarkhan makha athaw kha kiei nilai mi`ing a, kiei dieng a awm munu kha na ithaw inih.
Ajarla kushung a (makhala taksha a) atha `khatshe awm mak, iti kha kiei na kejet. Ajarla thawjawtna kha kushung a awm, inia atha thaw kha kiei ngam mi`ing.
Ajarla kithaw jawt atha kha kiei na thaw mi`ing, inia kithaw jawt boi ashie kha kithaw inih.
Kithaw jawt boi kha kiei na kawthaw joiatu, makha athaw kha kiei nilai mi`ing, inia kushung a awm munu kha na ithaw inih.
Khajarkhan atha kawthaw jawt phakhan, ashie hi na kushung a chonithaw inih, iti chawngshebe hi kiei na kumuk.
Ajarla shungmiring dungjuia Pathien Dan khan ningaina kha kieniei.
Inia kulungthim idit kha le rathaw kapasha shung hin dan shik kumuk. Khan makha na kapasha shung a awm munu dan khan kiei hi shurinonokhop a awm inih.
Kiei hi idawr a rahvanshie miring maw kanih! Mahi athi rang a pum ah put ah tu na maw kiei hi nakhek nih?
Nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a Pathien kha kamapak. Khajarkhan kumulungmining hin kiei hi Pathien Dan shok kha kanih jawt, inia kupum a tu munu dan shok kha kanih.
Khajarkhan munu balam dungjuia nih boi Ratha dungjuia aring hai Christa Jesu dieng a awm miring hai chung khan tuntu hengna awm mak.
Ajarla Christa Jesu dieng a awm ringna apeh Ratha dan kha na munu le thitna dan ah put ah kiei hi nomoshok joi.

Munu balam jar a Dan kha rudawk jarkhan, makha na chon thawna ranak kha runiei mak. Khajarkhan Pathien na ashapatak kha munu miring awmchan meloi a munu rang khan ijongtir a, pum shung khan munu kha ijongheng inih.
Makha dikna irangai Dan kha munu balam dungjuia aring boi, inia Ratha dungjuia aring kieini dieng rupumna rang a inih.
Ajarla munu balam dungjuia aring hai kha na munu balam nieinak hai chung khan mulungmining atet uh, khan Ratha dungjuia aring hai kha na Ratha nieinak hai chung khan mulungmining atet uh.
Ajarla taksha chungchanga lungthim kha thitna inih, inia Ratha lungthim kha ringna le lungdamna kha inih.
Ajarla taksha lungthim hi Pathien le re`er inih, ajarla mahi na Pathien Dan thoi a awm ngam mak, khan niawm nithiei naw nih.
Khajarkhan munu a ring amani kha na Pathien kha ningminit pe ngam mak.
Pathien Ratha kha nang shung ua awm phakhan, nangni kha munu a awm boi a Ratha a awm nangnih uh. Tukhat na Christa Ratha kha niei joi nawkatu, ama kha ama tah nimak.
Christa kha nang shung ua awm joi jarkhan, munu jar a, pum kha athi inih. Inia dikna jar a Ratha kha ringna inih.

Jesu kha athi hai kar a rumothoipa ratha kha nang shung ua awm joi jarkhan, athi hai kar a Christa rumothoi ama kha na athithiei nang pum u hai kha ringna pek rangnih. Makha nang shung ua awm aratha jar a ithaw inih.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai, kieini hi lieishieton miring hai kha nanih uh, inia taksha dungjuia ringna rang, taksha a tu nimak.
Taksha dungjuia nangring u joiatu, nangthi u rangnih. Inia Ratha jar a pum chon hai kha nangthat u joiatu, nangring u rangnih.
Ajarla Pathien Ratha na lamikai pe mi kholok Pathien shapa hai kha inih.
Ajarla chit pui rang a shok changna ratha kha ruman u makche, inia naimachangna Ratha kha niruman u nih joi. Makha jar a “Abba, Kapa,” tia ra`ai nanih uh.
Ratha amatak na naratha u kha le kieini hi Pathien nai hai kha nanih u, tia kungachang inih.

Kieini hi anai hai kha nanih u joi jarkhan, koklo hai kha nachang u joi. Makha kieiniawm lawp `khat a numulurchenna rang, kieini na ama le shawna nodoishom a tu, Pathien ah put ah koklo hai le Christa le koklo achangshom kha nanih joi.
Ajarla tun a nawshawna hi kieini dieng a imalar rang a lurna kha le rakamthiei chang naw nih, tia kimining.
Ajarla khutkon dingrakang ngak kha na Pathien shapa hai imalarna kha ngakrala a awm inih.
Ajarla khutkon kha ningrahana awnoi a itet inih. Makha ama idit dungjuia nimak a, ngakmining awnoi a atetpa jar a inih.
Ajarla khutkon kha`awm thangna shokchangna ah put ah moshokning, tia ajeng a lur Pathien nai hai ningchamna tieng khan chawi rangnih.
Ajarla khutkon kholok na vonshe hin, nupang `khat na nainiei pha a shawrieviei kha ang a, rokoilam a shawna doi a awm, iti kha kieini na nejet uh.
Amani ranga kha niboia, akhat changna Ratha ara aniei, kieinirilikawm nushung ua rokoi nanih uh. Kieini na shapa machangna, nupum u rekhekna rang a pha kha ngakrala a awm nanih uh.
Ajarla mahi ngakmining hin a kieini hi inurushan inih, inia mik a muk ngakmining kha tu ngakmining nimak. Ajarla tukhat na imuk kha ngak a awm nih maw?
Inia kieini na nimuk boi kha ngaknimining joiatu, makha doiratna kha le ningakrala inih.

Khatikhan Ratha na`awm nawdawkna u khan inashan inih. Ajarla ninik u rang a kha itia ninik u rang a maw nih iti kha kieini na jet u makme. Inia Ratha amatak na ner a riei ngam boi natrokoina kha le kieini ruhut a ininik pe inih.
Mulung hai atawk Pathien na Ratha lungthim kha imaw nih iti kha ejet. Ajarla miriethieng hai rang khan Ratha na Pathien mulungmining dungjuia nikna iniei inih.
Inia Pathien numapoh amani rang khan Pathien na kholok atha a chonmawthawshom, iti kha nejet uh. Amani kha Pathien chonmuchuk dungjuia ikoi miring hai kha inih.
Ajarla ama na matieng a irujet amani kha ashapa meloi a konchenna rang khan iruminitsha`awm inih. Makha uliennai hai tampui kar a ama kha konmasha kha nitnathiei rang a inih.
Makha khea iruminitsha hai kha irukoi inih. Irukoi amani kha irumidik inih. Irumidik amani kha irumulur inih.
Hihai dieng hin kieini na imaw niriei u rang? Pathien hi kieini rang a nitjoiala, tu na maw kieini hi nere`erpui nih?
Ashapatak kha iruhawi boi a, nokholok rang a ama kha irupek kha na nieinak kholok kha nokholok rang khan manboi a nepek boi a maw awm nih?
Pathien na imadansha amani dieng khan, tu na maw mieshiet nih? Imidik ama kha Pathien inih.
Aheng ama kha tumaw nih? Ama kha ruthi Christa kha inih. Makha khea athi hai kar a Pathien na irumothoi inih. Ama na Pathien khut chang tieng khan awm a nuruhut ua nikna iniei inih.

Christa numpok ah put ah tu na maw kieini hi nereshenmashak nih? Shawrana ninawkle mulung rakaina, ninawkle epshawna, ninawkle nekleshak tangna, ninawkle rekengverna, chiroichon, ninawkle chemjam, kha na maw kieini hi neshen nih?
Hitihin rumiejiek: “Nang rangbak khan kieini hi nishunshawt inuruthat inih. That rang a kengam `khat a kieini hi inurute inih.”
Nitjoiawm hihai kholok chung hin numnurupoh ama jar a kieini hi ramawtawr hainek khan a liendet nanih uh.

Ajarla kiei na rangamna kieniei, makhala thitna kha na`awm, ringna kha na`awm, ravantir hai kha na`awm, rampo hai kha na`awm, ranak hai kha na`awm, tun a nieinak le ajong rang a nieinak hai kha na`awm,
arashang kha na`awm, athuk kha na`awm, khan khutkon ih kha na`awm, nupumi u Christa Jesu dieng a awm Pathien numpok ah put ah kieini hi neshen ngam naw nih.
Christa maikung a adik kiriei inih. Kiei na mielieishiei kithaw nimak. Ratha Riethieng jar a kulungthim na kiei dieng kungachang inih.
Makhala, kumulung shung hin mulungshaw lientak kieniei, khan lungnatna kha chatboia awm.
Ajarla taksha dungjuia kuliennai hai le ki`inshungkhur hai rangbak khan, kiei hi pumbot kachang a Christa le nereshenmashak a la tha rangnih, tia kimining.
Amani kha Israel miring nih uh. Amani dieng shapa changna, lurna, rawjawtna hai, Dan pekna, Pathien chon, khan chawngrakham hai kha awm.
Pilepu hai kha amani ah put ah inih. Taksha dungjuia Christa kha amani ah put ah inih, ama kha kholok chung a Pathien inih. Kumshawt a ama chung a mapakna kha awm rosho. Amen.
Inia Pathien chawng kha chon a she boi kha tu nimak. Ajarla Israel ah put ah jong shok kholok kha adik Israel miring kha nimak.
Abraham chicha hai niti jarkhan, kholok kha Abraham nai hai nimak. “Inia Isaac jar a nang chicha hai kha koi rangnih.”
Makhala, taksha nai hai kha Pathien nai hai kha nimak. Inia chawngrakham nai hai kha chicha `khat a ite inih.
Ajarla chawngrakham chawng kha hi inih: “Mahi pha hin kiei ajong rang kanih, khan Sarah na shapa niei rangnih.”
Inia hi ranga hi nimak, Rebecca kha`awm napa u Isaac na naimawvawng rangnih.

Shapa hai kha niei mala, amani na atha-ashie thaw mala, Pathien na ama dieng iruriei inih. Makha Pathien chonmuchuk dungjuia madanna kha netnathiei rang a inih. Mahi chon hai ah put ah nimak a akoipa ah put ah inih.
Pathien na Rebecca dieng ruti, “Ulienchang kha na naipanglam kha chon thaw pe rangnih.”
Hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih, “Jacob kha numkurupok, inia Esau kha kurumukmak.”
Khanitala imaw niriei u rang? Pathien dieng dikna boi kha a`awm maw nih? Makha nihet nimak!
Ajarla ama na Moses dieng ieriei, “Roihoina kitetna rang a ama dieng khan roihoina kha katet, khan lainatna kitetna rang a ama dieng khan lainatna kha katet.”
Khajarkhan adit ninawkle rojo ama tah nimak, inia roihoi Pathien tah inih.
Ajarla Miejiek na Pharaoh dieng iti, “Nang chung a karanak mumukna rang le rieliei kholok a kiriming hi rophongna rang, kiei na nang kha kinomothoi inih.”
Khajarkhan ama na idit ama dieng khan roihoina kha atet, khan idit ama dieng khan mulung michimna kha ipek inih.
Dawn a kiei dieng nangnitithiei uh, “Ijar a ama na mi maran kha itawk maw nilai? Tu na maw ama chonmuchuk kha khar joi?”
Inia diktak a, Aw miring, Pathien dieng mashang rang, nang tumaw nangnih? Ikon nieinak kha na akonpa dieng khan “Ijar a hitihin a nanginokon maw nih?” tia riei nih.
Bekonpa kha na chir ah put ah be `khat hi richit a rotokna rang, khan akhat hi richit boi a rotokna rang, ikon chung khan ranak iniei boi maw nih?
Pathien na ama lunghangna kha mumuk jawt a ama ranak kha mejet jawt joiawm, lunghangna amuh rang a le thangna rang a irutukmashak amani hai kha ajeng a idoi pui,
lurna rang a masha a irukon roihoina itetna be hai chung a ama lurna rawchawngna kha mumukna rang,
Jihudi hai ranga kar ah put ah inokoi nimak a, Phungshik hai kar ah put a`awm inokoi anih boi maw nih?
Hosea behangbuk khanawm iti: “Kimiring runih boi hai dieng khan kimiring, tia koi rang kanih. Numkipok boi amani dieng khan kunumpok, tia koi rang kanih.”
“Khan ‘Nangni kimiring nih u makche,’ irutina muntak khan nangni hi aring Pathien shapa hai kha nangnih uh, ti rangnih.”
Isaiah na`awm Israel chungchanga rura`ai: “Israel nai hai jat kha tuikhanglien nge ang a rawp joiawm, arangah hai ranga kha shan rangnih.
Ajarla ama na chon kha mawtawr rangnih, khan dikna khan umushum rangnih. Ajarla PUMI na chon hai kha rieliei chung hin mushum rangnih.”
Isaiah na matieng a iruriei kha a`ang inih: “Ramiring hai PUMI kha na chicha dikhattak a`awm ruhawi joi nawkatu, Sodom kha nuruang u rangnih, khan Gomorrah kha nuruma`ang u rangnih.”
Khanitala kieini na imaw niti u rang? Dikna rurojo boi Phungshik hai na dikna, nititu, takashawn jar a dikna kha tum u joi.
Inia dikna dan rojo miring Israel hai kha na dikna dan kha muh u maklai.
Ijar a maw nih? Ajarla takashawn le makha rutawk u mak, inia Dan chon le irutawk u inih. Makha keruthuina lung chung khan keruruthui uh.
Hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Enro, Zion khan keruthuina lung le bakna lungbiei `khat kirutet inih, ama dieng takashawn miring rikip na shirna niei naw nih.”
Uliennai hai, kumulung na idit le Pathien dieng kinik tu, Israel miring hai na shanna imuk rang a hi inih.
Amani na Pathien rang ditrangai kha niei uh, inia makha lungvar dungjuia nimak, iti hi kiei na kungkachang.
Ajarla Pathien dikna kha rujet u mak. Amanirilik dikna kha mothoi jawt u phakhan, Pathien dikna khan rulut u mak.
Ajarla takashawn mi rikip dieng Christa hi richichawi changna rang, Dan mawtawrna kha inih.
Ajarla Dan ah put ah jong dikna chungchanga Moses na rumiejiek, “Khahai athaw miring kha na amani jar a ring rangnih.”
Inia dikna chung a ingiei takashawn kha na hitihin ieriei, “ ‘Ravan a tu maw hawng nih?’ tia nang mulung a ti naw roh” (makha na Christa kha ijong muchum inih)
ninawkle, “ ‘Tu maw chimniei ah chum nih?’ tia riei naw roh” (makha na Christa kha athi hai kar a ihawng chawi inih).
Inia Miejiek na imaw ti? “Chawng kha nangni le ranai a awm, nang ner u le nang mulung shung ua awm joi” (makha kirophong u takashawn chawng kha inih):
nang ner kha le Pumi Jesu kha nang rophong a Pathien na ama kha athi hai kar a mothoi, iti kha nang mulung a takanangshawn a tu, Pathien na nang kha nashan rangnih.
Ajarla dikna shokna rang, tukhat na mulung le taka`ishawn inih, khan shandamna mukna rang, tukhat na ner le irophong inih.
Ajarla Miejiek na ieriei, “Ama dieng takashawn ama kha na shirna niei naw nih.”
Ajarla Jihudi le Greek kairekhena awm mak, ajarla vanoi chung a Pumi amatak kha akoi miring kholok dieng rawchawng inih.
Ajarla “tunita`awm PUMI riming aban ama kha shan rangnih.”
Khania taka`ishawn boi u ama dieng khan itia maw koi u nih? Ama chungchanga ijet boi u lai ama dieng khan itia maw takashawn u nih? Chawngshempa jaw boi a itia maw rangai u nih?

Amani kha tir u joi nawkatu, itia maw chawngshem u nih? Hitihin a irumiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Lungdamna athachawng rophong a atha nieinak athachawng jong chawi amani kepha hai kha idawr a metha maw nih!”
Inia amani arawplam na athachawng kha rujui u mak. Ajarla mahi Isaiah na iruti kha le ra`ang inih: “Pumi, tu na maw nawchawngriei u kha takashawn nih?”
Rangai jar a takashawn kha ajong inih, khan Pathien chawng jar a rangai kha ajong inih.
Inia kiei na kiti, irurangai boi u maw nih? Diktak a amani na rurangai uh: “Amani hesho kha rieliei pumpui a shok joi, khan amani chawng hai kha miring awmna kawdawngshe kha shok joi.”

Inia kiei na kiti, Israel miring hai na irujet boi u maw nih? Akhat changna a Moses na iti, “Phung `khat anih boi hai kha ningmaw`awna rang kanih. Phung amawng rotokna a nangni dieng lunghangna kha mothoi rang kanih.”
Isaiah na ngartak a ieriei, “Inurutawk boi amani kha na kiei hi numuk joi. Nurutawk boi amani dieng khan kinining a kurular joi.”
Inia Israel hai dieng ama na ieriei, “Chawngrangai boi le perawlaw miring hai dieng nishunshawt kukhut le kuruban.”
Khajarkhan kiei na kiti, Pathien na imiring hai kha irupai maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Kiei hiawm Israel miring `khat, Abraham chicha, Benjamin phung ah put ah jong shok kanih.
Pathien na irujetmasha imiring hai kha rupai mak. Ninawkle, Elijah chungchanga Miejiek na iruriei kha jet u makche maw? Itia maw Israel hai chung a Pathien dieng thangrukoi? Ama na ruti,
“PUMI, nang thiempulien hai kha ruthatsho u joi. Khan nang lungkheng hai kha rukhoisho u joi. Kiei ranga kerekhe joi, khan amani na kiei hi that rang natawk uh.”
Inia Pathien chawng mashang kha na ama dieng imaw ruti? “Baal dieng rukhuk shun boilai miring bawp shawmshiri kiei rang kawhawi joi.”
Khatikhan tun a pha shung hin tukchawr miring hai madanna kha numpokmirit dungjuia inih.
Numpokmirit jar a nitjoiatu, chon hai jar a nilai mak. Khanawkatu numpokmirit kha numpokmirit nih naw nih. Inia chon hai jar a nitjoiatu, numpokmirit nilai mak. Khanawkatu chon kha chon nilai mak.
Dawn a imaw awm? Israel na itawk kha muh maklai, inia madansha na man joi, inia aliemlim kha tu Pathien na mulung michimmashaklai.
Hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Pathien na amani dieng amiei ratha, mukna boi rang a mik hai le rangaina boi rang a nokor hai kha, vonshe hin, pek joi.”
David na ieriei, “Amani tebol kha chang le lim, keruthuina rang le lieichawina kha chang pe u rosho.
Muknathiei boi rang, amani mik hai kha Pathien na mijing pe rosho, khan amani kawng kha mubut pe jawnjai rosho.”
Khan kiei na kiti, purna u rang a ke`iruthui u maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Inia amani na shietna ruthaw u jarkhan, shandamna kha Phungshik hai dieng jong joi. Makha ningmaw`awna rang a ithaw inih.
Amani shietna kha manmieshie rang a rawchawngna nih joi a, amani rehena kha Phungshik hai rang a rawchawngna nitjoiala, amani rupumna kha idawr maw Phungshik hai rang rawp nih?
Kiei na Phungshik hai nangni dieng kiriei inih, makhala kiei hi Phungshik hai tirtawn kinit jarkhan, kochonthaw hi kiei na kamapak.
Ki`inshung miring hai kha ningkawmaw`aw a amani kar a shentaka`awm kashan a la, tia kochonmun hi kilawm inih.
Ajarla Jihudi hai na athachawng ipai kha na manmieshie hi Pathien le iriengieimashak nitjoiala, amani na awpawm u joiala imaw nih nih? Makha athi ah put ah ringna kha nih naw nih maw?
Akhat changna ara kha riethieng joiatu, jam kholok kha`awm riethieng rangnih. Khan rujung kha riethieng joiatu, abak hai kha`awm riethieng rangnih.
Bak eshen hai kha tuk a ram ah mawng olive thingkung nang kha olive thingkung khan kalam nawthaw a, amani le olive thingkung rujung le thai kha atumshom nangnih joiatu,
ituk bak hai dieng khan lienrasha naw roh. Inia liennangrasha joiatu, rujung kha doi makche inia rujung kha na idoi inih, iti kha mining roh.
“Kiei hi kalam nawthawnathiei rang, bak hai kha ituk inih,” tia dawn a nangti rangnih.
Makha adik inih. Takashawn boi u jarkhan, amani kha ikhiek inih, inia takashawn jar a ading nangnih. Nang nining a mapak nana naw roh, inia chitna niei roh.
Ajarla Pathien na balam bak hai kha ruhawi boi jarkhan, nangawm nawhawi naw nih.

Khajarkhan Pathien ninghoina le khawkna kha enro. Apur amani dieng khan ama hi akhawk inih. Inia ama ninghoina khan nangawm joiatu, nang dieng ama ninghoina kha nepek rangnih. Khanawkatu nangawm nutuk rangnih.
Khan Jihudi hai na amani takashawn boi khan awm joi nawkatu, amani kha kalam thaw rangnih. Ajarla kalam thawnaret rang, Pathien na ranak iniei.

Balam a ram ah awm olive thingkung ah put ah nutuk ua, balam le re`er olive atha thingkung khan kalam nawthaw u joiatu, idawr maw balam bak hai kha na amanitak kha olive thingkung khan kalam nawthaw inih?

Ajarla uliennai hai, mahi murukchawng hi nangijet boi u rang a hi kiei dit mi`ing. Khanawkatu nang nining a ashing nangrasha u rangnih. Chonrekhek khala: Phungshik hai rupumna kha hawng shok masheng, Israel miring hai mulung eshenlawk kha michimmashak joi.
Khatikhan Israel kholok kha Pathien na shan rangnih. Makha Miejiek ah iriei kha le ra`ang inih: “Zion ah put ah ashanpa kha va rangnih, khan Jacob ah put ah Pathienjetna boi kha miehiei pe rangnih.
Amani munu hai kha kiei na koloi pe phakhan, makha amani le kawrawjawtna kha nih rangnih.”
Athachawng chungchang khan tu, nangni rangbak khan, rahapui miring nih uh. Inia madanna chungchang khan tu, pilepu hai jar a, amani kha Pathien na numipok chang rangnih.
Ajarla Pathien khutchawi hai le koina kha Pathien na loitheplai naw nih.
Pha `khat khan Pathien dieng chawngjui boi kha nangruchang uh. Khania tuntu, amani chawngjui boi jar a, roihoina kha nangman u joi.
Kha le ra`ang a, tun a chawngjui boi hai hiawm, nangni dieng ninghoina kha inumumuk jar a, amani na`awm ninghoina kha man rangnih.
Mi kholok chung a roihoina awmnathiei rang, Pathien na mi kholok kha chawngjuina boi khan ithongsho inih.
Pathien varna le shingna rawchawngna kha idawr a thuk maw nih? Tute na ama chawngshatna kha tawk ngam mak, tute na ama lam hai kha thir ngam mak.
“Ajarla tu na maw PUMI mulungmining kha jet joi? Ninawkle, tu maw ama chawngrachah kha chang joi?”
“Ninawkle, tu na maw Pathien dieng rupekbak a Pathien na ama dieng mikir nih?”
Ajarla nieinak kholok hi ama ah put ah, ama jar a, khan ama dieng a`awm inih. Kumshawt a ama dieng mapak kha chang rosho. Amen.

Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Pathien roihoina jar a, nang pum u hai kha aring, riethieng, khan Pathien dieng ningnitroi rawthawina `khat a pekna rang, kinawdawi u inih. Makha orohoi Pathien chon kha inih.

Khan mahi rong hi le rokonchen u naw roh, inia nang mulungmining nimathar u khan chenkon kha chang u roh. Makha atha, ningnitroi, khan rupumping Pathien mulungmining kha imaw nih, iti kha ennangretena u rang a inih.

Ajarla kiei dieng inepek numpokmirit jar a, nang kar ua awm mi rikip dieng kiriei inih. Imining rang a shok kha niboia, tute na nining a rashang a mining naw rosho. Inia Pathien na mi rikip dieng ipek takashawn le racha dungjuia rachalim mulungmining khan mining rosho.
Ajarla pum `khat shung a pasha tampui niniei u hi ang a, pasha kholok na chonmun ra`angre kha niei mak.
Hitihin kieini hi tampui nanih joiawm, Christa jar a pum `khat chang a, kieini hi khatlekhat rang a pasha hai kha nanih uh.
Kieini dieng inepek numpokmirit dungjuia khutchawi shikshik nieniei uh: rophongchawng kha nitjoiatu, natakashawn u le rachathep khan rophong u rawi.
Chon thawna kha nitjoiatu, chon nithawna u khan rotokna u rawi. Miruchuh miring ama kha na imiruchukna khan rotokna rosho.
Lungarna chawng arieipa kha na chawngriei a, apeh miring kha na mulung lien a apeh a, lamkai ama kha na mulungluttak a, roihoi mulung aniei kha na ningailam a khutchawi kha rotokna rosho.
Numpok kha thanunchan jaw boi chang rosho. Ashie kha mitir u roh. Atha kha mukuirep u roh.
Khatlekhat numropokna kha uliennai numpok kha chang rosho. Khatlekhat dieng a richitna kha ulien machang roh.
Rathashie boi a ningawroitak a chon thaw u roh. Pumi chon nangithawna khan mulunglutna niei u roh.
Ngakmining shung khan ningai u roh. Shawrana khan adoirat chang u roh. Nikna khan mulung repeh u roh.
Miriethieng hai rangaina khan nanginiei u kha reshem pui u roh. Milak hai jinchon kha thaw u roh.
Epshawna napeh amani rang rahvan peh u roh. Amani kha rahvan peh u roh, pumboh u naw roh.
Ningai miring hai kha ningai pui u roh, achap miring hai kha chap pui u roh.
Khatlekhat le riengieishom a ring u roh. Nang nining a arashang a mining u naw roh. Kha ruhut a rede miring hai kha rawtawp pui u roh. Nang mulungminingrilik u chung khan kashing, tia loi u naw roh.
Ashie jar a ashie kha mikir u naw roh. Mi kholok mik`en a atha thaw rang khan mulung niei u roh.
Nithawngamtuk khan mi kholok le lungdam a ring u roh.

Kunumpok hai, phuhen loi u naw roh. Kha ruhut a, Pathien lunghangna rang khan mun peh u roh. Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Phuhen loina chon kha katah inih, kiei na ruhut thung rang kanih,” tia Pumi na iti.

Khajarkhan, “Narahapui miring kha vawncham pe joiatu, nekleshak kha peh roh. Tuira pe joiatu, nek rang tui kha peh roh. Ajarla khatikhan a nangithaw kha na ama lu ah rawhawring hai kha nangirietien pe chang rangnih.”
Ashie kha na nadek naw rosho, inia ashie kha atha kha le dek roh.
Mi rikip na chamniei rashang hai dieng lut rosho, ajarla Pathien ah put ah niboia cham awm mak. A`awm chamniei hai kha Pathien na imadan inih.
Khajarkhan cham rodoi pui ama kha na Pathien chawngmocho kha irodoi pui inih. Irodoi pui miring hai kha na amanirilik chung a chawngshatna kha muk u rangnih.

Ajarla chamniei miring hai na atha athaw hai dieng khan chitna peh mak, inia ashie thaw hai dieng chitna ipek inih. Chamniei dieng khan chih boi a maw nangawm jawt? Atha kha thaw roh, chamniei ah put ah mapakna kha nangmuk rangnih.

Ajarla ama kha nang dieng a atha thaw rang a Pathien shok kha inih. Ashie kha nangthaw joiatu, chih roh, ajarla chemjam kha nemna boi a irak nimak. Ajarla ama kha ashie thaw hai dieng a lunghangna rang a phuhen aloi Pathien shok `khat inih.
Khajarkhan, lunghangna jarbak a niboia lungthim jarbak khan ama dieng lut roh.
Mahi jarhin khaichana hai kha`awm peh u roh. Ajarla amani hi mahi rangbak hin a chatboia pha apeh Pathien shok hai kha inih.
Ramshan nih le ramshan, khaichana nih le khaichana, chitna nih le chitna, khan richit nih le richit, tumphawm shok kholok kha amani dieng peh u roh.
Khatlekhat dieng a numpok ranga kha niboia, tute dieng lieishie ton u naw roh. Ajarla shik `khat dieng a numapoh ama kha na Dan kha irupummashak inih.

Ajarla “Uire nangithaw boi rang a inih,” “Mi nangithat boi rang a inih,” “Nangimuruk boi rang a inih,” “Adik boi a kungachang boi rang a nangnih,” “Ditrekhe chon nangithaw boi rang a inih,” tia Dan na ieriei. Khan chawngpek shik hai kha nangniei joiatu, kholok kha hitihin a imawtawi inih, makhala “Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak kha ang a numnangipok rang a inih.”
Numpok na ringchangpui kha ashie a thaw mak. Khajarkhan numpok na Dan kha irupummashak inih.
Hi le roroia, tun a pha hi aja ah put ah inshangloina pha keng joi, iti kha jet u roh. Ajarla nashandamna u hi takanurushawn u lai a phanek khan anai a nawhawngdep joi.
Janpha kha hekdeng joi, nikho kha hawng nai joi. Khajarkhan ajing chonmun hai kha pai u taia mieivar mieriem kha ko u rang rawi.
Nishun var a lawn kha ang a, lawp a shakshah rat, jukhawp, rejaikawk, taksha pawrchetna, rosho rakhana le manarshie chon khan nih boi a, riringtak a lawn u rawi.
Inia Pumi Jesu Christa kha pon ang a rieshiei u tana taksha kha na ditrekhe kha rupummashakna rang, mun peh u naw roh.
Takashawn a adawk ama kha pawm u roh. Mining ra`angna boi chung khan chawngrieshietna niei u naw roh.
Nieinak kholok hi shakthiei inih, tia tukhat na taka`awshawn, inia adawk ama kha na anshawbo hai ranga kha ishak inih.
Aneh-ashah ama kha na aneh-ashah boi ama kha mieshiet naw rosho. Khan aneh-ashah boi ama kha na aneh-ashah ama kha chawngshat pe naw rosho, ajarla Pathien na ama kha ipawm nih joi.
Shik miring `khat shok chung a chawngashat nang tumaw nangnih? Upumpatak maikung khan ading ninawkle apur inih. Inia ama kha imiding rangnih, ajarla Pathien na ama kha imiding ngam inih.
Shik `khat nikhonek a nikho `khat hi runieidet tia mi `khat na mining, shik `khat miring na ningthingkip hi ra`angre, tia mining. Mi rikip na ama mulungminingtak kha akalang shok a jet rosho.

Makha nikho arung ama kha na Pumi rang a irung inih. Makha nikho arung boi ama kha na, Pumi rang a irung boi inih. Aneh-ashah ama kha na Pumi rang a inek-ishak inih, ajarla Pathien dieng mapakna ieniei. Khan aneh-ashah boi ama kha na, Pumi rang a ishak boi inih, khan Pathien dieng khan mapakna ieniei.
Ajarla tute na amarilik rang khan ring mak, khan tute na amarilik rang khan thi mak.
Ajarla naring u joiatu, Pumi rang a aring nanih uh, nathi u joiatu, Pumi rang a athi nanih uh. Khajarkhan nithit niring u joiawm, kieini hi Pumi tah kha nanih uh.
Ajarla mahi rangbak hin a Christa na ruthi a ruthoi, khan ruringret inih. Makha athi le aring dire Pumi changna rang a inih.
Khania ijar a nang uliennai chung a chawngnishat maw nih? Ninawkle, ijar a nang uliennai kha nangida maw nih? Ajarla nokholok na Christa chawngshatna mun khan adingviek rang nanih uh.
Hitihin rumiejiek, “Kiei aringhet kha kanih, rukhuk rikip na kiei dieng bu rangnih, khan mieliei rikip na Pathien dieng rophong rangnih, tia PUMI na ieriei.”
Khajarkhan mi rikip na amama jar a mushungna kha Pathien dieng pek rangnih.

Khajarkhan kieini khatlekhat chung a dawnshe a chawngrashat nana u lai naw rawi. Makha ruhut a mahi chung a mulung miding u rawi: uliennai `khat keruthuina rang, ninawkle mupurna rang, thaw u naw roh.
Pumi Jesu jar a kejet, khan karangam pui, makhala nieinak `khatsheawm nining a pawrche awm mak, inia ih kha nita`awm pawrche, tia imining ama dieng khan a makha pawrche inih.
Inia nang nekleshak jarkhan, nang uliennai `khat kha ningshie joiatu, numpok shung khan a ring nilai makche. Christa na ama rang a ruthi pe miring kha nang nekleshak kha le mathang naw roh.
Khajarkhan nang na atha, tia nangiloi kha ashie `khat a riei naw rosho.
Ajarla Pathien rengchangna kha ninek le nishak kha nimak, inia Ratha Riethieng jar a dikna, lungdamna, khan ningaina kha inih.
Ajarla khatikhan a Christa chon athaw ama kha na Pathien kha ningiminit pe inih, khan miring hai na imenet inih.
Khajarkhan lungdamna moshok le khatlekhat imothoi nieinak hai kha kieini na rojo u rawi.
Pathien chon kha nekleshak rangbak khan mathang naw roh. Nieinak kholok diktak a riethieng inih, inia ishak kha na mi mupur joiatu, makha ashie inih.
Nang uliennai `khat keruthuimashak me ninawkle juneh ninawkle ih kha nita`awm, nishak boi kha atha inih. Makha na ama mulung shit pethiei, ninawkle keruthuimashakthiei, ninawkle adawk machangthiei.
Takashawn kha nangniei maw? Makha Pathien le nang kar a tet roh. Nining a imenet chung a reheng nana boi ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.
Khania rakhana aniei ama kha na shak joiatu, ama kha iheng inih. Ajarla takashawn boi a ishak inih. Ih nita`awm, takashawn ah put ah anih boi kha tu munu inih.
Arat hai kieini na arat boi hai dawkna kha niruput pui u rang a shok. Ninining u ningnitna kha thaw u naw rawi.
Ringchangpui atha shokna rang, kieini na ama ningnitna kha nithaw perim u rang a shok. Makha na ama kha mothoi rangnih.
Ajarla Christashe na`awm amarilik rang ningnitna kha ruthaw mak, inia hitihin a miejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Nangni jakna apeh jakna hai kha kiei dieng rucho joi.”
Ajarla ih nita`awm matienglai a irumiejiek hai kha kieini na nejetna u rang a irumiejiek inih. Makha Miejiek hai doiratna le mawshawkna jar a kieini na ngakmining kha nienieina u rang a inih.
Doiratna le mawshawkna napeh Pathien na, Christa Jesu dieng a awm kha le ra`ang a, khatlekhat dieng mulung `khat a awmna rang, nepeh u rosho.
Makha mulung `khat hesho `khat a nupumi u Jesu Christa Pathien le apa kha mulurna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan Pathien mulurna rang, Christa na`awm kieini hi inuruloi u kha ang a, khatlekhat rawpawm nana u roh.

Khan kiei na kiriei hi inih, makhala Pathien kha adik changna rang, Jesu Christa na vunep miring hai rang shok chang joi. Makha napa hai dieng a Pathien na chawngirurakham hai kha menetna rang a inih.

Makha ama roihoina rang le Phungshik hai na Pathien kha mulurna rang a inih. Hitihin miejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Mahi jar hin Phungshik hai kar a nang kha rieirophong rang kanih, khan nang riming khan kiei na lah thaw rang kanih.”
Takthar a iti, “Aw Phungshik hai, ama miring hai kha le ningai u roh,”
Khan takthar a, “Phungshik kholok na PUMI kha mapak u roh. Mi kholok na ama kha mapak u roh.”
Takthar a Isaiah na iti, “Jesse rujung kha thoi rangnih, ama kha Phungshik hai chung a reng achang rang hawngthoi rangnih. Phungshik hai na ama chung a ngakmining kha niei rangnih.”
Khajarkhan takanishawn u le roroia, ngakmining apeh Pathien na ningaina le lungdamna kholok le nimiship u rosho. Makha Ratha Riethieng ranak jar a ngakmining a ruphu nangchangna u rang a inih.
Uliennai hai, nangni atha kha le nangship u joi. Nangni na khatlekhat dieng rachakna nangpekna ngam u rang, shingna kholok le nimiship u joi, iti hin rangamna kieniei.
Nitjoiawm, uliennai hai, chawng dikhat chungchanga nangni dieng mejetnaret rang, lungardet a kiemiejiek joi. Makha Pathien na kiei dieng a inepek numpokmirit jar a inih.

Makha kiei na Jesu Christa shepding `khat chang a Pathien athachawng kha thiempu ang a Phungshik hai dieng shemna rang a inih. Khan Phungshik hai kha Ratha Riethieng na iriethieng a Pathien maikung a loithiei rawthawina `khat changna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan kiei na Pathien dieng a kochon thawna shung khan Christa Jesu jar a lienrashatna rang a jar kha kieniei.
Ajarla chawng le chon a, Phungshik hai kha chawngmujuina rang, Christa na kajar a irurupummashak boi chon hai kha le kiei na iawm riei ngam naw ning.

Pathien Ratha ranak jar a ranakniei jetna hai le rekhekchon hai kha le hihai hi rushok inih. Hijarhin kiei na Jerusalem ah put ah Illyricum kha hieijiek a Christa athachawng kha rupumping a kururophong joi.
Khan Christa riming ibanna boi mun khan athachawng kha rophongna rang, kulungkhin kamachang joi, khanawkatu miring shik `khat keshun phunna khan kirashak chang rangnih.
Inia hitihin a imiejiek hi le ra`ang inih: “Ama chungchanga irurophongna boilai amani na muk rangnih, rangai boilai amani na jet u rangnih.”
Hijarhin nangni dieng vatna rang, kieiawm inakhar jawnjai inih.
Inia tun hihai ram shung hin kiei na mun `khatshe kiniei boi a nangni dieng vatna rang, kum shawttak ngakrala a kuruawm nitjarkhan,

Spain a kashe phakhan, nangni dieng va rang kanih. Ajarla kokhomijinna lam khan nangni kha mukna rang, ngakkimining. Rapapek a nangni le rawlawpna kha hoikiethieibawt shole, kokhomijinna khan nangni na kiei hi nangnashan u rangnih.
Inia tuntu, kiei miriethieng hai chon thaw rang Jerusalem tieng kashe joi.
Ajarla Jerusalem ah awm miriethieng hai kar a shara hai rang a roshong shier dikhat kha na Macedonia le Achaia ah awm hai kha ningruminit pe uh.

Diktak a amani kha ningiruminit pe inih, khan lieishieton miring kha runih uh. Ajarla Phungshik hai na Jihudi hai rathalam nieinak kha itum puishom kha runih u joiatu, amani na`awm taksha nieinak kha le amani chon kha ithaw pengir rang a inih.
Khajarkhan kiei na mahi kawthawsho a mahi ara hi amani dieng jetkanamsho phakhan, Spain ah keshena khan navakpa u rang kanih.
Kiei na nangni dieng kavat phakhan, Christa athachawng rahvan shipna kha le kavaklut rangnih, iti kha kiei na kejet.
Khania uliennai hai, Pumi Jesu Christa jar a le Ratha numpok jar a kinawdawi u inih: kiei rang Pathien dieng enchak a nikna nieniei pui u roh.
Makha Judea ah awm takashawn boi hai ah put ah kerekhena rang le Jerusalem ah awm miriethieng hai dieng kochonmun hi loithiei changna rang a inih.
Khan Pathien mulungmining jar a nangni dieng ningailam a kavatna rang le nangni le shawmuchumna kumukna rang a inih.
Lungdamna apeh Pathien na nang kholok le awm rosho. Amen.
Kanaipangnu u Phoebe kha nangni rang khan jawtna kepek. Ama hi Cenchrea ah awm biekrup shepding `khat inih.

Miriethieng hai rang a rutuk awmchan a Pumi riming a ama kha rupawm u roh. Inarangaina u chonmun rikip a ama kha rashap pui u roh. Ajarla ama hi mi tampui rang a le kiei rangawm narashappui `khat a awm inih.
Priscilla le Aquila kha chubai peh u roh. Christa Jesu chonmun a kochonthaw pui u miring inih.
Kiringkho rang a iring hai kha irudaw u inih. Kiei ranga na amani kha kimapak nimak a, Phungshik biekrup hai na`awm imapak u inih.
Amani in ah awm biekrup diengawm chubai peh u roh. Kunumpok Epaenetus kha chubai peh u roh. Ama kha Christa rang a Achaia ah akhat changna ara kha inih.
Mariam kha chubai peh u roh. Kieini rang a chon ranak ruthaw `khat inih.

Andronicus le Junia kha chubai peh u roh. Amani kha ki`inshungkhur miring le lungroko shung ah kiawm pui miring inih. Amani kha kamatieng a Christa takarushawn miring le tirtawn hai kar a runiei miring runih.
Amplias kha chubai peh u roh. Ama kha Pumi riming a kunumpok miring inih.
Urbanus kha chubai peh u roh. Christa chonmun a ama kha kochon thaw pui miring inih. Khan kunumpok Stachys kha`awm chubai peh u roh.
Apelles kha chubai peh u roh, ama kha Christa riming a muchuk runih joi. Aristobulus inshungkhur hai kha chubai peh u roh.
Herodion kha chubai peh u roh. Ama kha ki`inshungkhur inih. Narcissus inshungkhur hai kha chubai peh u roh. Amani kha Pumi riming a awm nih joi.
Tryphena le Tryphosa kha chubai peh u roh, amani kha Pumi riming a chon ranak ruthaw inih. Kunumpok Persis kha chubai peh u roh, ama kha Pumi riming a chon ranak ruthaw inih.
Rufus kha chubai peh u roh, ama kha Pumi riming a irumadan nih joi. Kiei rangawm kunu achang, unu kha`awm chubai peh u roh.
Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes, khan amani le awm uliennai hai kha chubai peh u roh.
Philologus le Julia, Nereus le anaipangnu, Olympas, khan amani le awm miriethieng hai kholok kha chubai peh u roh.
Riethieng biengrutum kha le khatlekhat dieng chubai repeh u roh. Christa biekrup hai na nangni kha chubai nepek uh.
Uliennai hai, nangni dieng kinawmawshawk u inih: nangijet u ruchukna kha le kairekhe reshenna le keruthuina moshok miring hai kha jet u tana amani kha lawi u roh.

Ajarla kha`ang miring hai kha na nupumi u Jesu Christa kha chon thaw pe u mak. Inia amani vawnpui rangbak a chon ithaw u inih. Chawng rana hai le mimapakna khan amani na ariem miring hai mulung hai kha imohon pe u inih.

Ajarla nang chawngjuina u kha mi kholok na jet u joi. Khajarkhan nang jar ua kiei na ningaina kieniei. Atha chungchang khan shing u roh, khan ashie chungchang khan nang mulung u kha mieriem u roh, iti hi kidit inih.
Lungdamna apeh Pathien na Satan kha relentak a nang keshun ua rawnawi rangnih. Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangni le awm nih rosho. Amen.
Kochonthaw pui, Timothy le ki`inshungkhur, Lucius, Jason, khan Sosipater na chubai nepek uh.
Mahi chawngmawchawi miejiekpa Tertius kiei na Pumi riming a chubai kenepek uh.
Kiei le biekrup kholok numutungpa Gaius na nangni dieng chubai nepek uh. Khopui nieitinpa Erastus na nangni dieng chubai nepek uh. Uliennai `khat achang Quartus na`awm chubai nepek uh.
Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang kholok dieng awm rosho. Amen.

Tun kirophong athachawng le Jesu Christa chungchanga chawngshem dungjuia, Pathien na nangni kha nomothoi ngam u joi. Makha athachawng kha manmieshie put ah put ah Pathien na iruthe murukchawng rophongna dungjuia inih.
Inia tuntu, makha malangmashak joi, khan thiempulien hai Miejiek jar a hektiknieiboi Pathien chawngpek dungjuia menet joi. Makha phung kholok dieng, takashawn rang mejet joi.
Thiente a ashing Pathien ama dieng khan, Jesu Christa jar a kumshawt a alur kha chang rosho. Amen.
Pathien mulungmining jar a Jesu Christa tirtawn `khat rang a irukoi,

Christa Jesu jar a riethieng rang a irukoi a iruriethieng, khan mun rikip ah nupumi u Jesu Christa riming aban, Corinth ah awm Pathien biekrup dieng, uliennai Sosthenes le Paul kiei na kimiejiek u inih. Jesu Christa hi amani le kieini Pumi kha inih.
Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Christa Jesu jar a nangni dieng inurupek Pathien numpokmirit chungchang khan kapathien kha kamapak jawnjai.
Makhala ama na chawng kholok a le varna kholok a nawrawchawngmashak uh.
Christa chungchanga kukungchangnashe kha`awm nangni dieng runet joi.
Khajarkhan nupumi u Jesu Christa larna kha nangingak u le roroia, khutchawi hai khan nangravatna u awm mak.
Nupumi u Jesu Christa Nikho khan metek boi nangnitna u rang, dawngshe khan ama na nemenet u rangnih.
Pathien hi takashawn rang a rutuk inih. Ama na ashapa nupumi u Jesu Christa rawlawpna shung khan nangni kha inurukoi inih.

Tun uliennai hai, mi kholok na khatte a nangrieina u rang le nang kar ua reshenrokhoi awmna boi rang, mulungmining khatte a nangruchunna u rang le khan chawngnangshatna u rang, nupumi u Jesu Christa riming a kinawmawshawk u inih.
Ajarla kuliennai hai, nang kar ua roshorakhana awm, tia Chloe inshungkhur ah put ah kiei dieng thangkoina vak niei uh.
“Paul tah kha kanih,” “Apollos tah kha kanih,” “Cephas tah kha kanih,” “Christa tah kha kanih,” tia nangiriei u kha kiriei inih.
Christa hi reshen maw? Nangni rang Paul na cross ling ah maw ruthi? Ninawkle, nangni na Paul riming a baptisma maw nangruloi uh?
Crispus le Gaius niboia, nangni `khatshe baptisma kunurupek boi u jarkhan, Pathien kha kamapak.
Makha tute na kiriming a tui kurumulut tina boi rang a inih.
Khanita`awm Stephanas inshungkhur kha tu baptisma kurupek. Makha niboia kiei na tute dieng baptisma kurupek, iti jet mi`ing.
Ajarla Christa na kiei hi baptisma pek rang a inojongtir nimak, inia lungvar chawng a niboia, athachawng kha rophongna rang a inih. Makha Christa cross kha ranakniei changna rang a inih.
Ajarla athang a awm hai rang tu, cross chawng hi mawngna kha inih, inia ishan a awm kieini dieng tu mahi Pathien ranak kha inih.
Ajarla hitihin rumiejiek: “Kiei na ashing miring hai lungvar kha mathang pe rang kanih. Ajet miring hai jetthieina hai kha momot pe rang kanih.”
Ashing miring kha khoshekawt ah maw awm? Danoja kha khoshekawt ah maw awm? Mahi rong a mihepa kha khoshekawt ah maw awm? Pathien na hi manmieshie lungvar kha mawngna imachangsho nimak maw?
Ajarla, Pathien lungvar shung khan manmieshie na lungvar jar a Pathien kha rujet maklai. Takashawn miring hai kha shanna rang, amawng chawngshem jar a, Pathien kha ningiruminit pe inih.
Jihudi hai na jetna inik uh, khan Greek hai na lungvar atawk uh.
Inia kieini na tu cross ling ah iruthat u Christa kha chawng a korophong uh. Jihudi hai rang mahi keruthuina inih, khan Greek hai rang mahi mawngna inih.
Inia Jihudi nit a Greek nita`awm, irukoi miring hai dieng tu, Christa hi Pathien ranak le Pathien lungvar kha inih.
Ajarla Pathien mawngna kha miring hai shingnanek a shingdet, khan Pathien dawkna kha miring hai ranaknek a ratdet.
Ajarla uliennai hai, inokoina u kha en u roh. Manmieshie ichatna dungjuia ashing tampui, ranakniei tampui, rashang a shok tampui hai kha irukoi nimak.
Inia ashing hai kha majakna rang, manmieshie a awm amawng hai kha Pathien na irumadan inih. Arat hai kha majakna rang, manmieshie a awm adawk hai kha irumadan inih.
Khan manmieshie a awm ih nih boi, inawng a awm hai, khan a`awm boi hai kha Pathien na irumadan inih. Mahi a`awm nieinak hai kha ih nih boi machangna rang a nih.
Makha tute na Pathien maikung a lienrashatna boi rang a inih.
Inia ama jar a Christa Jesu dieng nangawm u joi. Ama kha kieini rang a Pathien ah put ah jong lungvar kha inih. Christa kha kieini rang a dikna, riethiengna le rekhekna kha inih.
Makha “Lienrasha ama kha na PUMI dieng lienrashatna kha niei rosho,” tia imiejiek kha nitna rang a inih.
Khan uliennai hai, kiei na nangni dieng kavat phakhan, chawngriei thieitak a ninawkle lungvar kha le Pathien kungchangna kha rophong va mi`ing.
Ajarla Christa Jesu le cross ah thitna kha niboia, kiei na nangni dieng iawm jetna boi rang, mulung kurumiding.
Khan dawkna le chitna khan rawnawklam a nangni le kuruawm inih.
Khan kawchawng le kawchawngshem kha hawrna lungvar chawng hai kha runimak, inia Ratha na ranaknieitak a chon thaw, tia imumuk inih.
Makha nang takashawn u kha miring hai lungvar khan niboia Pathien ranak khan ngieina rang a inih.
Nitjoiawm puichang miring hai kar khan lungvar chawng kha kieriei uh. Inia mahi rong lungvar chawng kha nimak, khan athang a awm mahi rampo hai rong lungvar kha`awm nimak.
Inia rethe a awm Pathien lungvar kha kishem u inih. Makha murukchawng lungvar kha nulurna u rang, Pathien na rong hai mala a irumadansha nih joi.
Makha mahi rong rampo hai tute na rujet mak. Ajarla makha rujet u joiatu, lurna aship Pumi kha cross ling ah ruthat u naw nih.
Khania irumiejiek kha a`ang inih: “Mik na mumaklai, nokor na jet maklai, ama numapoh amani rang a Pathien na irurasham nieinak hai kha miring mulung a lut maklai.”
Inia aratha jar a amani kha kieini dieng malangmashak joi. Ajarla Ratha na nieinak kholok kha atawk, awh, Pathien nieinak hai athukshe kha`awm itawk inih.
Ajarla ih miring kha na maw, ama shung a awm ratha kha na niboia, miring `khat mulungmining hai kha jet nih? Makha ang a Pathien Ratha na niboia, tute na Pathien mulungmining hai kha jet mak.
Tun manmieshie ratha nih boi, Pathien ah put ah Ratha kha, kieini na naman u joi. Makha Pathien na kieini dieng manboi a inurupek nieinak hai kha nejetna u rang a inih.
Miring lungvar na iruchuk chawng a niboia, Ratha Riethieng na iruchuk chawng a kiriei u inih. Rathalam nieinak hai kha rathalam chawng a kimeler u inih.
Inia balam miring kha na Pathien Ratha nieinak hai kha muh mak, ajarla hihaihi ama dieng mawngna kha inih. Khan amani kha jet ngam mak, ajarla amani kha ratha le enrete rang a inih.
Inia Ratha miring kha na nieinak kholok enirete inih, khania ama chung a chawngshat pe mak.
“Ajarla ama kha chawng peknathiei rang, PUMI mulungmining ajet tumaw awm joi? Inia Christa mulungmining kha niniei u inih.”
Uliennai hai, kiei na nangni dieng rathalam miring `khat dieng a ang a chawng riei mi`ing, inia Christa dieng a naite hai taksha miring hai dieng a ang a chawng kiriei inih.
Burum le niboia runutui le kinavai u inih. Ajarla burum kha neh ngam u makchelai, khan tunshe hin mawtawr u makchelai.
Ajarla taksha a nangawm u lai. Ajarla mukmakna, roshona, khan reshenna awmlai jarkhan, nangni taksha le balam miring hai kha ang a aleng nih makche maw?
Ajarla tukhat na “Paul tah kha kanih” khan shik `khat na “Apollos tah kha kanih,” ti phakhan, nangni taksha a awm nih makche maw?
Khanitala Paul hi tumaw nih? Apollos hi tumaw nih? Pumi na amama dieng a chon ipek dungjuia, amani kha shepding hai kha nih mak maw? Amani jar a takanangirushawn u nih mak maw?
Kiei na kiruling inih, Apollos na tui`iruliei inih, inia Pathien na irumawmawng inih.
Khajarkhan alingpa le tuilieipa kha iawm nimak, inia runiei tu mawmawng Pathien kha inih.
Alingpa le tuilieipa kha akhat inih, khan amani ithawithaw dungjuia amama lawh kha tum u rangnih.
Ajarla kieini hi Pathien chon athawshom miring kha kanih uh, khan nangni kha Pathien loipuk le Pathien inrashak kha nangnih uh.

Kiei dieng a inurupek Pathien numpokmirit dungjuia, inrashak thiemtak `khat a, kiei na inmun kha kirurashamsho nih joi. Khan shik `khat na makha chung khan irashak inih. Inia mi rikip na makha chung khan itia irashak maw nih, iti kha riring pui rosho.
Iruphunsha chawpui Christa kha niboia, tute na shik `khat chawpui kha phun ngam naw nih.
Inia iphun chawpui chung hin tukhat na rangkachak, dangka, manlu lung, thing, rangai, khan shawpaw le inrashak joiatu,
amama chon hai kha malangmashak rangnih, ajarla Nikho kha na makha rophong rangnih. Ajarla miei na makha rophong rangnih. Khan miei na amama chonthaw kha ih maw nih, iti kha enrete rangnih.
Makha chung a irashak tukhatpa chonthaw kha kang pe joinawkatu, ama na lawh kha tum rangnih.
Ama chonthaw hai kha miei na kang joiatu, lawh kha thang pe rangnih, inia mieichon ah put ah rekhe `khat ang a, thiethien a tu shanna kha muk rangnih.
Pathien riethiengmun kha nangnih uh, khan Pathien Ratha kha nangni dieng awm, iti kha jet u makche maw?
Tukhat na riethiengmun kha pawrmechet joiatu, Pathien na ama kha mathang rangnih. Ajarla Pathien riethiengmun kha riethieng inih, makha nangni nangnih uh.
Tute na nining a mohon nana naw rosho. Tukhat na mahi rong hin ashingdan a awm joiatu, ashing miring kha changna rang, amawng kha chang rosho.
Ajarla mahi manmieshie varna hi tu Pathien rang a mawngna kha inih. Ajarla hitihin iemiejiek: “Amani hongthawtak khan ashing miring hai kha ishur inih.”
Khan takthar a, “PUMI na mishing hai lungthim kha nemna boi inih, iti kha jet pe.”
Khajarkhan tute na miring hai jar a lienrashatna niei naw rosho. Ajarla nieinak kholok hi nang tah u inih.
Paul ninawkle Apollos ninawkle Cephas ninawkle manmieshie ninawkle aring ninawkle thitna ninawkle a`awm nieinak ninawkle ajong rang a nieinak kholok hi nang tah u inih.
Khan nangni hi Christa tah, khan Christa hi Pathien tah kha inih.
Mi na kieini hi Christa shok hai le Pathien murukchawng inchonpo hai `khat a noloi rosho.
Makha chung a, inchonpo hai rang a kha takashawn rang a rutuk anih rang a hi rangai.
Inia nangni ninawkle miring danin ih khan nita`awm, kuchung a ennanginerete u hi, kiei rang tu ashinving inih. Kininingshe a enrete nana mi`ing.
Ajarla kuchung a ashie iti jet mi`ing, inia mahi na kiei hi inimidik tu nimak. Inia kiei enneretepa kha Pumi inih.

Khajarkhan, Pumi jong masheng, pha mala khan tute chung a iawm chawngshat u naw roh. Ama na ajing a rethe nieinak hai kha avar tieng vak chawi rangnih. Khan mulung hai chonmuchuk kha malangmashak rangnih. Khashole mi rikip na itum rang a mapakna kha Pathien ah put ah muk rangnih.

Uliennai hai, hihaihi nangni rangbak khan meloi a kiei le Apollos chung a kimocho inih. Makha nangni na imiejiek kha khea mining boi a kieini ah put ah nangruchukna u rang a inih. Khan tukhat jar a tukhat chung a liennangrashatna boi u rang a inih.

Ajarla tu na nangni kha shik miring ah put ah kai`inerekhemashak u maw nih? Khan Pathien ah put ah nangiruloi boi u imaw nangniei uh? Khan nangni na nangruloi u joiala, aloi boi ang a, ijar a lienrasha maw nangnih uh?

Nangni ashipsha kha nangnih joi! Nangni rawchawngsha kha nangnih joi! Kieini jaw boi a reng hai kha ang a rengnangchang u joi! Makha kieiniawm nangni le rengkachangna u rang, rengnangchang u rang a kha kidit inih!

Ajarla kiei na kimining, Pathien na kieini hi, athi rang a iheng ang a, inophoi u tirtawn adawkving hai kha kanih u joi. Ajarla kieini hi manmieshie, ravantir le miring hai en rang a kha namachang u joi.

Christa rangbak khan kieini hi mimawng hai kha kanih u joi, inia nangni tu Christa jar a ashing kha nangnih uh! Kieini hi kadawk uh, inia nangni tu nangrat uh! Nangni kha lurna nepek uh, inia kieini tu nepeh u mak!
Tunshe hin tuiravawncham a ka`awm uh, ponledier boi a ka`awm uh, nejem uh, khan inleloi niei boi a ka`awm uh.
Khan chon ranak kawthaw uh, khuttak le chon kawthaw uh. Narachai u phakhan, rahvan kepek uh, epshawna nepek u phakhan, kodoi uh.
Maimawk nepek u phakhan, renem a kamashang uh. Vonshe hin manmieshie arih le rieliei pawrche kha kachang u lai.
Nangni dieng jak pekna rang a hihaihi kimiejiek nimak, inia kunumpok naite hai `khat a kinarachak u inih.
Ajarla Christa chungchanga mirachah hai kha tengamboi a nangniei u joiawm, nangpa u hai kha tampui niei u makche. Ajarla athachawng jar a Jesu Christa riming a nangpa u kha achang kanih joi.
Khajarkhan kunun kha ruchuh u roh, tia kinawmawshawk u inih.

Mahi jar hin Timothy kha nangni dieng kivaktir inih. Pumi jar a ama kha kunumpok le takashawn rang a rutuk shapa kha inih. Kiei na, mun rikip ah awm biekrup rikip ah kiruchuk kha ang a, Christa dieng a kaw`awmchan hai kha nangni dieng nemejet rangnih.
Kiei na nangni dieng kava boi rang ang a eshen na liennangrasha uh.
Inia Pathien na jawt joiatu, nangni dieng kiei varelen rang kanih. Khan lienrasha miring hai chawng kha niboia, amani ranak kha kiei na jet rang kanih.
Ajarla Pathien rengchangna kha chawng kha nimak a ranak kha inih.
Rawmaw le maw ninawkle numpok le maw, khan mulung renem le maw nangni dieng kiei va ning? Ih kha maw nangdit uh?

Nang kar ua pawrche chon awm, iti thangkoina `khat hi kiei dieng jong tung. Kha`ang pawrche chon hai kha Phungshik hai diengshe riming ban boi inih, makhala miring `khat na apa inkonu le irishih hi inih!
Khan nangni na lienrashatna nangniei uh, makha chon athaw miring kha nang kar uah put ah nawtna rang, mulung shaw puidet u makche.
Ajarla taksha a ka`awm joi nawkawm ratha a ka`awm. Khan a`awm miring `khat ang a, kha`ang chon athaw miring chung khan chawngkashat joi.
Pumi Jesu Christa riming a nangni na lawp `khat a karatha le, nupumi u Jesu Christa ranak le nangruchun u phakhan,
taksha mathangna rang, kha`ang miring kha Satan dieng peh u roh. Makha Pumi Jesu Nikho khan aratha kha shannathiei rang a inih.
Nang lienrashatna u kha atha nimak. Chawh shilite kha na vaipaw kholok kha rakangmashak, iti kha jet u makche maw?
Khajarkhan vaipaw athar nangchangna u rang, chawh alui kha riethieng u roh, ajarla diktak a chawjawboi kha nangnih uh. Ajarla diktak a narakanna u Christa kha kieini rangbak khan irurawthawina inih.
Khajarkhan alui chawh kha le niboia, ashie le pawrche chawh kha leawm niboia, chawjawboi mulung riethieng le adik khan rachang kha rung u rawi.
Pawrche miring kha le nangrawtawpna boi u rang, kawchawngmawchawi khan kirumiejiek inih.
Inia hi manmieshie pawrchetna ninawkle phamrai athaw hai ninawkle mishiersho hai ninawkle rilim chubaibawk hai kha kiti nimak. Makha nitjoiatu, nangni na hi manmieshie hi nangimathan u rang a inih.

Inia tun uliennai tu iti pawrche chon thaw, phamrai athaw ninawkle rilim chubaibawk, ninawkle mi maimawk apeh, ninawkle jukhawp miring, shierliemthaw miring hai kha le rawtawpna boi rang, amani le aneh-ashashe thawna boi rang, kiei na nangni dieng kirumiejiek inih.
Ajarla biekrup vai tieng a awm miring hai kha chawngshat pe a kiei na imaw thaw ning? Biekrup shung a awm miring hai kha nangni na chawngnangishat pe boi maw nih?
Inia vai tieng a awm miring hai kha Pathien na chawngishat pe inih. Khajarkhan “pawrche miring kha nangni ah put ah nawt u roh.”
Nang kar ua tukhat na tukhat chung a chawngreperna niei phakhan, makha chawngshatna rang, miriethieng hai dieng niboia, midik boi hai dieng nangshe u maw nih?

Miriethieng hai na manmieshie hi chawngshat pe rangnih, iti kha nangijet boi u maw nih? Khan manmieshie hi chawngnangishat pe u rang a nitjoiatu, ashinving chon hai kha chawngshatna rang, rutuk boi maw nangnih uh?
Kieini na ravantir hai kha chawngnishat pe rang a inih, iti kha nangijet boi u maw nih? Khanitala hihai ringkho hi idawr a chawngnishat pe u rang a maw nih?
Mahi ringkho chon chungchanga chawngshatna kha nangniei u joiala, biekrup na ashinving a imining miring hai kha chawngshat rang madan u roh!
Mahi nang jakna u rang a kiriei inih. Uliennai hai kar a chawngshat ngam, nang kar ua ashing miring `khatshe awm boi maw nih?
Inia uliennai `khat na uliennai `khat chung a chawngreperna pui rang, danin ah ashe kha takashawn boi hai dieng ashe inih!
Khajarkhan khatlekhat chung a danin ah nangshe u hi maimawk kha nangimuksha u nih joi. Kha ruhut a erehe chang rang ithaw maw jawt u makche? Mi na inomohon u rang khan ithaw maw jawt u makche?
Inia nangnitak na adik boi kha nangthaw uh, khan mi kha nang mohon uh. Khan mahi nang uliennai dieng nangthaw uh!

Midik boi hai na Pathien rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih, iti kha jet u makche maw? Mi na nangni kha inelem boi chang rosho. Pawrche chon thaw hai, rilim chubaibawk hai, uire thaw hai, nupangmunlo hai, palepa rishih hai,
murushah hai, rapham miring hai, jukhawp miring hai, maimawk apeh hai, khan shierliemthaw hai kha na Pathien rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih.
Nangni eshenawm kha`ang miring hai kha nangrunih uh. Inia nangni tu Pumi Jesu riming le napathien u Ratha kha na nururushuk u joi, nururiethieng u joi, khan nurumidiksho u joi.
Ih kholok hi kiei rang dan niviek, inia ih kholok hi nemna nimak. Ih kholok hi kiei rang dan niviek, inia amani ranak thoi khan awm mi`ing.

Nekleshak hai hi vawnpui rang a inih, khan vawnpui hi nekleshak hai rang a inih, inia Pathien na adinre kha mathang rangnih. Pum hi pawrche thawna rang a nimak, inia Pumi rang a inih, khan Pumi hi pum rang a inih.
Khan Pathien na Pumi kha irumothoi inih, ama ranak khan kieiniawm nomothoi u rangnih.
Nang pum u hai kha Christa pasha hai kha inih, iti kha jet u makche maw? Christa pasha hai kha loi a nawchijor pasha hai kha machang ning maw? Makha nihet mak!
Ninawkle, nawchijor `khat le ruchun ama kha, ama kha le pum `khat chang joi, iti kha jet u makche maw? Ajarla Pathien na iti, “Idi kha taksha `khat nih joi.”
Inia Pumi le ruchun ama kha ama le ratha `khat nih joi.
Pawrche chon ah put ah tan u roh. Miring `khat na ithaw munu rikip kha pum vai tieng ah inih, inia pawrche chon athaw ama kha na upumtak chung a munu ithaw inih.
Ninawkle, nang pum u kha nangni dieng a awm, Pathien ah put ah nangimuk u, Ratha Riethieng riethiengmun kha inih, iti jet u makche maw? Nangni hi nang tah u nih u lai makche.
Ajarla nangni hi aman pek a inawrawchawk u nih joi. Khajarkhan Pathien tah nang pum u le nang ratha u khan Pathien kha mulur u roh.
Khan kiei dieng a nivakmiejiek u chungchanga kiemiejiek jawt: apa na nupang ishit boi rang a hi atha inih.
Nitjoiawm pawrche chon jar hin, apa rikip na amama inkonu niei rosho, khan nupang rikip na amama inkopa niei rosho.
Inkopa na ama inkonu dieng a thaw rang a rangai kha thaw rosho, khan inkonu kha na`awm khatikhan ama inkopa dieng khan thaw rosho.
Inkonu na upumtak chung a cham niei mak, inia inkopa na iniei. Kha le ra`ang a, inkopa na upumtak chung a cham niei mak, inia inkonu na iniei.
Chamradoina le nikna rang a pha bawng `khat rang nangrawjawtshom u niboia, khatlekhat idit kha heng u naw roh. Takshur ravat jar a Satan na nelemna boi u rang, vak ruchunret u roh.
Mahi kiei na themna `khat a kiriei inih, chawngpek `khat a kiriei nimak.
Ajarla mi kholok na kiei hi ang a a`awm rang hi kadit. Inia mi rikip na Pathien ah put ah khutchawi inieirim inih, akhat dieng hitihin, khan akhat dieng khatikhan.
Inia inniei boi hai le mieirawng hai dieng kieriei: kiei hi ang a awm u joiatu, thadet.
Inia amani na takshurna kha niei u joi nawkatu, inniei u rosho. Ajarla taksha mieisha doinek a tu inniei kha thadet.
Khan inniei miring hai dieng mahi chawngpek hi kepek (Kiei na nimak Pumi chawngpek kha inih): inkonu na inkopa le reshen boi rang a inih.
Inia reshen joiatu, ama na inniei boi a awm rosho, ninawkle ama inkopa kha le riengiei rosho. Khan inkopa na inkonu kha mele naw rosho.
Inia mienienglim dieng (Pumi na nimak, kiei na kiriei inih): uliennai `khat na takashawn boi inkonu`khat niei a, amanu kha na ama le awm jawt joiatu, ama na mele naw rosho.
Khan nupang `khat na takashawn boi inkopa `khat niei a, amapa kha na ama le awm jawt joiatu, ama na mele naw rosho.

Ajarla inkopa takashawn boi kha inkonu jar a ieriethieng joi, khan inkonu takashawn boi kha inkopa jar a ieriethieng joi. Khanawkatu naite hai kha rono rangnih, inia tuntu amani kha riethieng chang u joi.
Inia takashawn boi kha tan joiatu, tan rosho, kha`ang chonmun khan uliennai ninawkle uliennainu kha ikhop nimak. Inia Pathien na kieini hi lungdamna rang a inokoi inih.
Ajarla, Aw nupang, nanginkopa kha nangshan rangnih, iti kha itia nangijet maw nih? Ninawkle, Aw apa, nanginkonu kha nangshan rangnih, iti kha itia nangijet maw nih?
Inia Pathien na mi rikip dieng irushem pe le Pumi na mi rikip irukoi kha ang a, khatikhan ring rosho. Khatikhan biekrup kholok ah kirachak inih.
Tukhat kha vunep anuk khan irukoi maw nih? Vunep boi kha changlai naw rosho. Tukhat kha vunep mala khan irukoi maw nih? Vunep kha changlai naw rosho.
Vunep, iti hi iawm nimak, khan vunepboi, iti hi iawm nimak, inia Pathien chawngpek hai arung, iti hi runiei inih.
Mi rikip na amama irukoina awmchan khan awm rosho.
Shok nangchanglai khan a inurukoi maw nih? Makha shaw pui naw roh, inia nang kha nomoshok ngam joiatu, makha rotokna roh.
Ajarla shok ruchanglai a Pumi jar a irukoi ama kha Pumi moshok miring kha inih. Kha le ra`ang a, rukoilai a moshok ruchang ama kha Christa shok kha inih.
Nangni hi man pek a inururawchawk u nih joi, miring hai shok kha chang u lai naw roh.
Uliennai hai, mi rikip na, irukoilai a awmchantak khan, Pathien le awm rosho.
Khan nungak hai chungchanga, kiei na Pumi ah put ah chawngpek kha niei mi`ing. Inia Pumi ama roihoina thoi a takashawn rang a rutuk miring `khat a, kimining hi kipek inih.
Tuntun a rangai dungjuia miring `khat na amama awmchan a a`awm kha atha, tia kiei na kimining.
Inkonu `khat na inikhit maw nih joi? Nang na ruthutna rang, tawk naw roh. Inkonu `khat ah put ah ruthut maw nangnih joi? Nang na nungak tawk naw roh.
Inia innanginiei nitsheawm, munu thaw makchelai. Khan nungak `khat na inniei joiatu, munu thaw maklai. Inia inniei miring hai kha na ringkho shawna niei u rangnih, inia kenerekhemashak jawt uh.
Inia uliennai hai, kiei na mahi kieriei, apha hi tawi joi. Inkonu niei hai kha na aniei boi ang a awm u rosho.
Khan achap miring hai kha na, achap boi ang a awm u rosho. Khan ningai hai kha na ningai boi ang a awm u rosho. Khan nieinak rawchawh miring hai kha na aniei boi ang a awm u rosho.
Khan rieliei nieinak rotokna hai kha na irotoknahet boi ang a awm u rosho. Ajarla hi rieliei shung ah awm nieinak hi hawng hek shishit joi.
Inia mulungshaw boi a awm rang khan kanadit uh. Inniei boi ama kha na Pumi dieng a awm nieinak hai kha ishaw pui inih. Ama na itia maw Pumi kha ningkiminit pe rang, tia mining.
Inia inniei miring ama kha na manmieshie nieinak kha mulungshaw pui. Itia maw ama inkonu kha ningkiminit pe rang, tia mining.

Inniei nupang le nungak kairekhena awm. Inniei boi nupang kha na pum a le ratha dire a riethiengna rang, Pumi nieinak jar a mulungshaw ieniei. Inia inniei nupang kha na, itia maw ama inkopa kha ningkiminit pe rang, tia manmieshie nieinak jar a mulungshaw kha ieniei.
Nang maton u kharna rang a nimak, inia mahi nangnemna u rang a kiriei inih. Mahi nangni na perepet boi a Pumi chon kha nangthawna u rang, iriding kha hitihin a kiriei inih.

Inia tukhat na ama na ishot nungaknu chung a riding boi awmchan a ka`awm, tia mining a khan nungaknu kha kumletha na ilim rang a nitjoiatu, khan ama na iloingir rang a inih, tia mining joiatu, imining kha thaw rosho. Ama na munu kha thaw mak, amani na inniei u rosho.
Khanikengta tukhat na mulung a dingrep a rangai, iti niei boi a, ama mulungminingtak chung khan ranak niei a, nungaknu kha loilai naw ning, tia mulungmiding joiatu, ama na`awm atha kha ithaw inih.
Khajarkhan nungaknu aloipa kha na atha ithaw inih, khan aloi boi ama kha na athadet ithaw inih.

Inkonu `khat na ama inkopa ringlaishe khan Dan thoi a awm inih, inia ama inkopa kha thi joiatu, imining tukhat dieng in`iloh rang khan rakharna awm pe mak, nitjoiawm Pumi kha takashawn anih rang a inih.
Inia khatikhan inniei boi a awm joiatu, kimining dungjuia tu, ama kha rahvanthadet kha inih. Pathien Ratha kha kiei na kieniei, tia kimining.
Khan konrilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai chungchanga: nokholok dieng shingna awm, iti hi nokholok na nijet u inih. Shingna na lienrashatmashak, inia numpok na rawshawnmashak.
Tukhat na kejet, tia mining a tu, ijet rang a rutuk kha iawm ijet boi inih.
Inia tukhat na Pathien kha numpok joiatu, ama kha Pathien na ejet.
Khajarkhan konrilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai shakna chungchanga, manmieshie hin konrilim hi iawm nimak, khan Pathien shik awm mak, inia khatte awm, iti hi nijet u inih.
Ajarla pathien hai le pumi hai tampui a`awm ang hin, ravan ninawkle rieliei chung hin pathien iti u hai kha a`awm nitsheawm,

kieini rang tu napa u Pathien khatte awm. Ih kholok ama ah put ah jong shok inih. Kieini hi ama rang a ring nanih uh. Pumi Jesu Christa khatte awm. Nieinak kholok ama jar a jong shok inih. Kieini hi ama jar a ring nanih uh.

Inia mi rikip na makha shingna kha niei mak. Eshen na tu, konrilim hai kha ruriejiei pui jarkhan, tunshe hin konrilim dieng a pek nieinak ang a shak u lai. Khan amani lungthim kha dawk pe u jarkhan, amani lungthim kha pawrimechet pe u inih.
Inia nekleshak kha na Pathien dieng namathatdet mak, ajarla nashak le nemnadetawm awm mak, khan nashak nawk `le, thangnadetawm awm mak.
Inia riring u roh. Mahi ningchamna hi adawk hai keruthuina achangthiei inih.
Ajarla shingna aniei nang na konrilimin ah nangishak kha tukhat na navakmuk phakhan, lungthim dawk anieipa kha na konrilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai kha shakna rang, lungar niei naw nih maw?
Khan adawk uliennai, Christa na ama rang a ruthi miring kha nang shingna kha na mathang naw nih maw?
Inia khatikhan uliennai chung a munu nangthaw a, amani lungthim dawkna kha nang mawpawp pe phakhan, Christa chung a munu nangithaw inih.
Khajarkhan nekleshak kha na ku`uliennai kha keruthuimashak joiatu, uliennai keruthuimashakna boi rang, kiei na me kha shukshah a shalai naw ning.
Kiei hi tirtawn `khat anih boi maw kanih? Kiei hi moshok anih boi maw kanih? Nupumi u Jesu Christa kha kimuk boi maw nih? Pumi riming a nangni hi kochonthaw ara kha nih u makche maw?
