Shik miring hai dieng kiei hi tirtawn kinit joi nawkawm, rakhana niei boi a, kiei hi nangni dieng tu tirtawn `khat kanih. Ajarla Pumi riming a nangni hi kitirtawnchangna jetnam kha nangnih uh.
Ennerete hai dieng a korohonna kha tu hi inih:
Kieini na nekna rang le shakna rang cham kiniei boi maw nih?
Tirtawn shik hai, Pumi naipang hai le Cephas ang a, takashawn nupang hai kha niei a chon thawna pui rang, cham kiniei boi u maw nih?
Ninawkle, Barnabas le kadinte na chon thaw boi a ringna rang, cham kiniei boi maw nih?
Tu na maw ama cholam thaw a ramun ah ashe awm joi? Tu na maw drakha iling a ama ara kha ashah boi awm? Ninawkle, tu na maw kengam ohoi a kengam hai runu aneh boi awm?
Hihaihi miring `khat chang a kiriei nenek maw nih? Ninawkle, Dan na`awm khatak kha iriei boi maw nih?
Ajarla Moses Dan khan hitihin ieriei: “Shiecha `khat na shang achieilai khan ener nangikhop pe boi rang a inih.” Pathien na tenireh kha shiecha hai kha maw nih?

Ninawkle, nokholok jar a iriei maw nih? Rakhana boipet a, mahi kieini rangbak a iriei inih. Makhala, loikhoi miring kha na ngakmining a ikhoi inih, khan makha ngakmining a mawnawi miring kha na, ngakmining a ara kha lokna rang a ithaw inih.
Rathalam nieinak hai kha nangni rang kawvawr uala, kieini na nang rielieiniei hai kha kirawkhawm u khan rekhe chon maw nih?

Mahi cham hi shik miring hai na nangni ah put ah tum u joiala, kieini na ruphu a kitum u rang a nimak maw? Nitjoiawm kieini na mahi cham hi rotokna u mi`ing, inia Christa athachawng kha kakharna boi u rang, kholok kha kidoi u inih.

Riethiengmun ah chon thaw hai kha na riethiengmun ah put ah nekleshak hai kha ishak rang a inih. Maicham ah chon thawa hai kha na maicham ah pek nieinak hai kha itum rang a inih, iti kha jet u makche maw?
Kha le ra`ang a athachawng rophong hai kha na athachawng ah put ah ravaina kha imuk rang a inih, tia Pumi na chawng rupek joi.

Inia kiei na hihai cham hi `khatshe rotokna mi`ing. Hihaihi kiei dieng thaw rang a inih, tia kiei na nangni dieng kimiejiek nimak. Ajarla kielienrashatna hi tukhat na nemna boi imachang rangnek a tu, kiei rang tu athi kha athadet inih.

Ajarla kiei na athachawng kha korophong joiawm, makha chung a lienrashatna rang niei mi`ing, ajarla thawngir rang a chon kha kiei dieng nepek joi. Inia kiei na athachawng kha korophong joi nawkatu, kuchung a idawr a shawna a`awm rang a maw nih naw!
Ajarla mahi kupum repeh a kithaw nitjoiatu, kiei na lawh kha kieniei. Inia kimining kha le re`er a nitjoiatu, inchonpona `khat le roiruputna kha kiei dieng inepek nilai.
Khanitala kawlawh kha imaw nih joi? Makha, athachawng kha korophong phakhan, Christa athachawng kha manboi a keshemna rang le athachawng chung a cham korotokna boi rang a inih.
Ajarla mi kholok ah put ah moshok kha kanih joiawm, arawp kamanna rang, mi kholok dieng kinining a shok achang kanih.
Jihudi hai kha kamanna rang, Jihudi hai kar a Jihudi `khat ang a ka`awm, khan Dan thoi a awm hai kha kamanna rang, Dan thoi a awm hai kar a Dan thoi a awm `khat ang a ka`awm.
Danishawnboi hai kha kamanna rang, Danishawnboi hai kar a Danishawnboi `khat ang a ka`awm (Pathien maikung a danishawnboi kha nimi`ing a Christa maikung a dan thoi a awm kanih).
Adawk miring hai kha kamanna rang, adawk miring hai kar a adawk miring `khat ang a ka`awm. Mi kholok dieng ih kholok kha kanih. Makha nitthieishe a eshentak a nita`awm kashan ngamna rang a inih.
Khan athachawng rangbak a kithaw hi nangni le atumshom kachangna rang a inih.
Tanrieshiet khan mi kholok tan a miring khatte na lawh kha aman, iti kha jet u makche maw? Makha nangmannathiei u rang, tan u roh.
Khan rieshietna ajaw mi rikip na irikip a takshurna kha ieniei. Amani na athangthiei renglukhum kha manna rang, ithaw u inih, inia kieini tu athangthiei boi renglukhum kha manna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan munmangboi a kiei tan mi`ing, rithi kar a ijem kha ang a, kiei na ra thaw mi`ing.
Inia kupum kha kiei na kachep a shok kamachang, khanawkatu, shik miring hai dieng chawng tu kishem, inia kinining a rutuk boi kha kachang rangnih.
Uliennai hai, nangijet boi u rang a kha kiei dit mi`ing, makhala napa u hai kha romiei thoi ah ruawm uh, kholok na tuipui kha rurakan uh.
Kholok na romiei shung ah le tuipui shung ah Moses dieng baptisma ruloi uh.
Khan mi kholok na rathalam nekleshak kha rushak uh.
Mi kholok na amani rujui rathalam Lungpum ah put ah runek uh. Makha Lungpum kha Christa runih.
Inia arawplam dieng Pathien na ningnitna runiei mak, khajarkhan amani rok hai kha ramthim khan chaiachai a irutet pe inih.
Amani na ashie ningiruaw u kha ang a, kieini na`awm ashie kha ningnawawna boi rang, hihaihi kieini dieng endar hai kha ruchang inih.
Amani eshen kha ang a konrilim chubaibawk hai kha chang u naw roh. Hitihin rumiejiek: “Miring hai kha na nekna rang le shakna rang rushuh uh, khan rishirajam a hoiriethieina rang ruthoi uh.”
Amani eshen na iruthaw u kha ang a, kieini na taksha rono chon kha thaw u naw rawi. Khan ni `khat shung a bawp shawmdilieithum ruthi uh.
Amani eshen na iruthaw u kha ang a, kieini na Christa kha lem u naw rawi. Khan amani kha moro hai na rumathang uh.
Amani eshen na irurieishiet u kha ang a, rieishiet u naw roh. Amani kha mimathangpa kha na irumathang inih.
Hihai kholok hi endar hai `khat a amani dieng rushok inih. Rong mawtawrna jong tungna kieini dieng rachakna `khat a irumiejiek inih.
Khajarkhan kading, tia imining ama kha na riring rosho, khanawkatu ama kha apurthiei inih.

Miring dieng a tangjam a awm lemna kha niboia, ih lemna kha na nushur u maklai. Inia Pathien tu takashawn rang a rutuk inih. Nangidoi ngam boi u rang a lemna kha ama na jawt naw nih. Lemna kha nangdoina ngam u rang, ama na rekhena rang, lam mawlawng rangnih.
Khajarkhan, kunumpok uliennai hai, konrilim chubaibawk ah put ah rechen u roh.
Miningthiei miring hai dieng ang a kiriei inih, kiriei hi nang nining ua enrete u roh.
Nimapak u mapakna hai kha Christa thishen rawlawpna kha nithawshom u anih boi maw nih? Nikhoi u tan kha Christa pum rawlawpna kha anih boi maw nih?
Khajarkhan kieini hi tampui nanih joiawm, tan `khat le pum `khat kha nanih uh, ajarla tan khatte kha niloi u inih.
Israel miring hai kha miring shena dungjuia en u roh: rawthawina nieinak ashah hai kha na maicham hai ah put ah rawlawpna kha imuk u nimak maw?
Khanitala kiei na imaw kiriei? Makha konrilim kha ih kha maw nih? Ninawkle konrilim hai dieng a pek hai kha ih kha maw nih?
Inia kiei na kieriei, makhala Phungshik hai rawthawi kha Pathien dieng nimak a raikho hai dieng a rawthawi inih. Khan nangni hi raikho hai le nawrawlawpmashak jawt u mi`ing.
Nangni na Pumi hai le raikho hai hai kha neh ngam u naw tinih. Nangni na Pumi le raikho hai tebol ah nekleshak kha shathiei u naw tinih.
Ninawkle, Pumi kha ningnangimaw`aw u maw nih? Kieini hi amanek a aliendet maw nanih uh?
Kiei rang tu nieinak kholok hi thawthieibiek inih, inia nieinak kholok hi nemna nimak. Kiei rang tu nieinak kholok hi thawthieibiek inih, inia nieinak kholok na rawshawnmashak mak.
Tute na ama idit ranga kha tawk naw rosho, inia shik miring hoina rangawm tawk rosho.
Nang lungthim ah put ah rawdawnna niei boi a, me rievieithawna mun a ijor hai kha shah u roh.
Ajarla, “rieliei hi PUMI tah inih, khan makhan a awm kholokawm ama tah inih.”
Takashawn boi hai kar a akhat na nang kha nitakbu nek rang nokoi a nangshe jawt joiatu, nang lungthim rangbak khan rawdawn boi a, ih kha nita`awm nang maton ah itet hai kha shah roh.

Inia “Mahi konrilim dieng a ipek kha keng,” tia tukhat na nang dieng nieriei joiatu, anarieipa le nang lungthim rangbak khan makha shah naw roh. Ajarla, “rieliei hi PUMI tah inih, khan makhan a awm kholokawm ama tah inih.”
Kiei na kiti tu, miringpa lungthim rangbak a inih, nang lungthim rang a kiti nimak. Ajarla kiningchamna kha miring shik `khat lungthim na ijar a maw chawngshat nih?
Inia kiei na mapak le roroia kashak joiatu, kimapaksha nekleshak jarkhan, ijar a kiei hi ashie a inierieina rang a maw nih?
Khajarkhan nangishak nanginek u, ninawkle ih kha nita`awm, nangithaw u kholok kha Pathien lurna rang thaw u roh.
Jihudi hai diengawm, ninawkle Greek hai diengawm, ninawkle Pathien biekrup hai diengawm, tute kha`awm keruthuimashak naw roh.
Mahi amani kha shanna mukna rang, kenemna kha tawk boi a, vanoi nemna kha tawk a, ih kholok a, mi kholok ningkiminit pe hi ang a, thaw u roh.
Christa awmchan kiruchuk hi ang a, nangniawm kaw`awmchan hi ruchuh u roh.
Uliennai hai, irikip a kiei hi nangnimininghep ua, nangni dieng a kinuruchuk u kha nangrung u jarkhan, kanamapak uh.
Inia apa rikip lu kha Christa inih, nupang lu kha apa inih, khan Christa lu kha Pathien inih, iti hi nangni dieng kenemejet jawt uh.
Apa rikip na nik pha ninawkle chawng rophong phakhan, ulu kha mukhu joiatu, ama lu kha richit ipek boi inih.
Inia nupang rikip na nik phakhan, ninawkle chawng rophong phakhan, ulu kha mukhu nawkatu, ulu kha richit ipek boi inih, ajarla makha ama na lu iboi kha le ra`angre inih.
Ajarla nupang `khat na mukhu nawkatu, asham kha ep rosho. Inia nupang `khat na sham i`ep ninawkle lu iboi kha jaknaroi chon nitjoiatu, ulu kha mukhu rosho.
Ajarla apa na ulu kha imukhu boi rang a shok, ajarla ama kha Pathien meloi le lurna kha inih, inia nupang hi apa lurna kha inih.
Ajarla apa hi nupang ah put ah nimak, inia nupang hi apa ah put ah inih.
Khan apa hi nupang rang a ikon nimak, inia nupang hi apa rang a ikon inih.
Hijarhin, ravantir hai jar a, nupang na ama chung a chamniei akhat awm iti jetna ulu ah itet rang a inih.
Nitjoiawm, Pumi riming a apa hi nupang ah put ah, khan nupang hi apa ah put ah rechenving tu nimak.
Ajarla nupang hi apa ah put ah anih kha ang a, apa`awm nupang jar a inih. Inia nieinak kholok Pathien ah put ah inih.
Nang nining a chawngshat u roh. Nupang `khat na lu mukhu boi a Pathien dieng inik hi iriding maw nih?
Balamshe na`awm nangni kha inuruchuk boi u maw nih? Apa `khat na asham kha mieshiei a tu, ama dieng richitna boi a`awm inih.
Inia nupang `khat na sham mieshiei joiatu, makha ama lurna inih. Ajarla sham kha ama mukhu rang a ipek inih.
Inia tukhat na makha chungchang khan roshorakhana rang mining a tu, kha ang shena kha niei u makme, Pathien biekrup hai diengawm niei u mak.
Hihai chawngrachakna hi kinepek u le roroia, nangni kha namapak u mi`ing, ajarla nangni na lawp `khat a nangva u hi thatnadet rang a nimak a shienadet rang a inih.
Ajarla, rapapek a, nangni na biekrup `khat a lawp a nangva u phakhan, nang kar ua reshenna awm, iti hi kejet: makha ichanshe tu takakawshawn.
Ajarla nang kar ua lawpreshen awmngir rangnih. Makha Pathien na ijawt amani kha meh nangjetna u rang a inih.
Khajarkhan nangni na mun `khat a lawp a nangvakruchun u phakhan, nangishak u kha Pumi shakriethieng kha nilai mak.
Ajarla mi rikip na ama nitakbu kha shik hai mala a shak uh, khan akhat na vawncham phakhan, shik `khat tu jukhawp joi.

Nangnekna u rang le nangshakna u rang, in niei u makche maw? Ninawkle, Pathien biekrup kha maimawk nangipek u maw nih, khan iawm aniei boi miring hai kha jak nangipek u maw nih? Nangni dieng imaw riei ning? Mahin nangni kha namapak u ning maw? Namapak u mi`ing.
Ajarla nangni dieng a kinurupek u kha Pumi ah put ah kirumuk kha inih: Pumi Jesu kha ijorna jantak khan ama na tan kha ruloi.
Khan ama na mapakna runiei phakhan, ama na tan kha rukhoi a ruti, “Loi u roh, shah u roh. Mahi nangni rang a akoisha kupum kha inih. Nangnimininghepna u rang, mahi thaw u roh.”
Khatak kha ang a, nitakbu shole, hai kha ruloi a ruti, “Mahi hai hi kithishen jar a rawjawtna `thar kha inih. Mahi nangnek u laisheng, nangnimininghepna u rang thaw u roh.”
Ajarla mahi tan hi nangshak ua mahi hai hi nangnek u laisheng, Pumi jong masheng, ama thitna kha nangirophong u inih.
Khajarkhan tukhat na mahi tan le mahi hai hi rutuk boi awmchan a enek-ashak a tu, Pumi pum le thishen chung a shietna kha thaw rangnih.
Inia miring `khat na nining a enrete rieshie, makha tan kha shah rosho, khan hai kha loi rosho.
Urutuk boi awmchan a aneh-ashah ama kha na amatak chung a chawngshatna pe rang a inek-ishak inih. Ajarla Pumi pum chung khan mulungmining thaning a peh mak.
Mahi jar hin nang kar ua mi tampui na takshon, ana, khan athi inih.
Ajarla ninining ua ennerete nana uatu, nuchung ua chawngshat naw nih.
Inia nuchung ua chawngshat phakhan, kieini hi Pumi na inimidik inih. Makha kieini hi manmieshie le nahengchenna boi rang a inih.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai, aneh rang lawpkhat a nang vak ruchun u phakhan, khatlekhat rangak nana u roh.
Inia tukhat kha vawncham pe joiatu, i`in ah vak neh rosho. Khanawkatu chawngshatna rang a nang vak ruchun u inih. Inia shik chonmun hai rang tu, kavat phakhan, midik rang kanih.
Khan uliennai hai, rathalam khutchawi hai chungchanga nangijet boi u rang a kha kiei dit mi`ing.
Nangni hi Phungshik nangruchang u lai khan, laminurukai pe u kha ang a, chawngthieiboi konrilim tieng khan shehawng a nuruchawi u, iti kha nangjet uh.

Khajarkhan nangni dieng kinemejet u hi inih, makhala Pathien Ratha jar a achawng tute na “Jesu kha pumbot chang rosho,” ti mak, khan Ratha Riethieng jar a niboia, tute na “Jesu hi Pumi inih,” ti ngam mak.
Khutchawi hai hi shikshik awm, inia Ratha khatte inih.
Pathien chon hai kha shikshik awm, inia Pumi khatte inih.
Chonmun hai kha shikshik awm, inia Pathien khatte na mi kholok dieng chon ithaw inih.
Inia kholok nemna rang mi rikip dieng Ratha ralarna kha ipek inih.
Ajarla Ratha jar a tukhat dieng lungvar chawng kha ipek inih, shik `khat dieng makha Ratharilik jar a, shingna chawng kha ipek inih.
Shik `khat dieng makha Ratha kha na takashawn kha ipek inih, khan shik `khat dieng makha Ratha kha na madamna khutchawi kha ipek inih.

Shik `khat dieng chonrekhek thawna, shik `khat dieng chawngrophongna, shik `khat dieng ratha hai kha kairekhemashakna, shik `khat dieng chawng shikshik, shik `khat dieng chawngshik hai kha melerna khutchawi hai kha ipek inih.
Inia Ratha khatte na hihai kholok hi ithaw inih, ama idit dungjuia a mi rikip dieng ipekrim inih.
Ajarla pum hi `khat nita`awm, pasha tampui ieniei. Makha pum `khat khan pasha tampui awm joiawm, amani kha pum `khat anih kha ang a, Christa kha`awm kha inih.
Ajarla pum `khat khan Jihudi nit a, Greek nit a, shok nit a, moshok nita`awm, Ratha `khat jar a nawlawpsheng u na baptisma kha niloi u inih. Khan Ratha khatte kha inemenek u inih.
Ajarla pum kha pasha khatte nimak a tampui inih.
“Kiei hi khut kha kinit boi jarkhan, kiei hi pum khan jaw mi`ing,” tia ke kha na ti jarkhan, pum khan ajaw boi maw nih?
“Kiei hi mik kha kinit boi jarkhan, pum khan kiei jaw mi`ing,” tia nokor kha na ti jarkhan, pum khan a ajaw boi maw nih?
Pumplang kha na mik kha nit joiala, ih na maw rangai nih? Pumplang kha na rangai a la, ih na maw manam nih?
Inia tun Pathien na pasha rikip kha pum khan ama imining dungjuia itetrim inih.
Khan amani kha pasha khatte nitjoiala, pum kha ih ah maw awm nih?
Khania pasha tampui awm, inia pum kha khatte inih.
Mik kha na khut dieng “Kiei na nang kha narangai mi`ing,” khan lu kha na ke dieng “Kiei na nang kha narangai mi`ing,” tithiei naw nih.
Makha le kairekhe a, pum shung ah adawkdet a malang pasha kha runieitak `khat inih.
Khan pum shung ah runiei nimak, tia nimining pasha kha runieidet inih. Khan inishawn boi pasha kha teniredet inih.
Inia nimoroidet pasha kha tenredet rang, rangai mak. Inia Pathien na adawkdet pasha kha mieliendet a, pum kha ikon inih.
Makha pum shung ah reshenna awmna boi rang le pasha hai kha na ra`angre a khatlekhat dieng tenreh nana rang a inih.
Khan pasha `khat kha nat joiatu, pasha kholok kha ama le anashom inih. Ninawkle pasha `khat kha na lurna muk joiatu, pasha kholok na ama le ningaishom inih.
Nangni Christa pum kha nangnih u joi, khan khatkhat a makha pum pasha kha nangnih u joi.

Khan hihaihi Pathien na biekrup shung a imadan inih: akhat changna a tirtawn hai, adi changna a thiempulien hai, athum changna a oja hai, khashole chonrekhek thaw hai, khashole madamna khutchawi amuh hai, mishan miring hai, inlevaipona, chawng shikshik a chawng miring hai kha inih.
Mi rikip kha tirtawn maw nih? Mi rikip kha thiempulien hai kha maw nih? Mi kholok kha oja hai kha maw nih? Mi rikip kha chonrekhek thaw hai kha maw nih?
Mi rikip na madamna khutchawi maw niei? Mi rikip na chawngshik a maw chawng? Mi rikip na meler maw?
Khania athadet khutchawi hai kha mulungluttak a dit u roh. Khan kiei na athadet lam kha numumuk u rang kanih.
Kiei na miring hai le ravantir hai chawng a kachawng joiawm, numpok kha kieniei joi nawkatu, imiri khong ninawkle thirkhong kha le ra`ang kanih.

Khan chawng rophongna khutchawi kha kieniei joiawm, murukchawng kholok le shingna kholok kha kejet joiawm, khan mo hai kha thawtna rang, takashawn kholok kha kieniei joiawm, numpok kha kieniei joi nawkatu, kiei iawm nimi`ing.
Khan shara hai vaina rang, kienieinak kholok kha kepek joiawm, khan kupum kha ha rang kepek joiawm, numpok kha kieniei joi nawkatu, kiei dieng nemna iawm nepeh mak.
Numpok tu ashawt a odoi, khan roihoi inih, numpok na manarshie thaw mak, numpok na nining a mapak mak, khan lienrasha mak.
Numpok na rum mak, ama rangbak khan tawk mak, baitek a shang mak, ashie kha mining mak.
Dikna boi khan ningai mak, inia adik khan ningai.
Nieinak kholok kha odoi, nieinak kholok kha takashawn, nieinak kholok kha ngakmining, nieinak kholok kha ruput.
Numpok tu shukcho a cho mak. Inia chawngrophong hai kha mawngawh rangnih, chawngshik hai kha rangatna awm rangnih, khan shingna kha mathang rangnih.
Ajarla khoite kha nijet u inih, khan khoite a nirophong u inih.
Inia rupumping kha jong phakhan, rupumpingna kha mathang rangnih.
Kiei na naite kuruchanglai, naite ang a kuruchawng, naite ang a kurujet, naite ang a kurumining. Inia kawhawngchang phakhan, naite awmchan hai kha kapai joi.
Ajarla tun mengsheng a varjinglam a nimuk u inih, inia makha nimiktak na riethienghiei a numuk u rangnih, tun khoite kha kijet inih, inia nuk a Pathien na inejet hi ang a, urupum a kejet rangnih.
Khan takashawn, ngakmining, numpok, hihai `thum hi, awm. Khania hihai kar a alienving tu numpok hi inih.
Numpok kha rojo u roh, rathalam khutchawi hai kha ningaw u roh. Aliendet a rophongna rang ratha khutchawi kha ningaw u roh.

Ajarla chawngshik a chawng miring kha na miring hai dieng a chawngiriei nimak a, Pathien dieng a chawngiriei inih, ajarla tute na ama chawngriei kha jet pe mak. Nitjoiawm ratha jar a murukchawng kha iriei inih.
Inia chawngirophong ama kha na rawshawnna le mawshawkna chawng, khan mulung renemna chawng kha iriei inih.
Chawngshik a achawng ama kha nining a rawshawn inih, inia chawngirophong ama kha na biekrup kha irawshawnmashak inih.

Nang kholok na chawngshik a achawng rang kadit, inia chawngnangirophong u rang kha kaditdet. Ajarla biekrup rawshawnna rang, ama na meler joi nawkatu, chawngirophong ama kha chawngshik a achawng amanek khan liendet.
Inia tun, uliennai hai, chawngshik a chawnglam a nangni dieng kava a, chawngrophong ninawkle varna ninawkle rophongchawng ninawkle miruchukna a kieriei nawkala, imaw nenemna u rawng?
Phukniei boi thieikhang ninawkle shalangdar kha na he moshok. Hesho hai khan kairekhena awm joi nawkatu, idai kha thieikhang maw nih, ninawkle shalangdar maw nih, iti kha itia maw jet nih?
Ajarla tekawlawi kha na munmangboi hesho kha moshok joiala, tu na maw rathaw rang rasham nih?
Nangniawm kha inih, mieliei kha le baitek a jetna rang chawngnangriei u nawkatu, nangiriei u kha itia maw jet nih? Rithi kar a chawngniriei u kha chang rangnih.
Manmieshie shung hin chawng tampui a`awm inih. Amani kha tina niei boi `khatshe awm mak.
Khajarkhan kiei na chawng kha tina kejet nawkala, chawngrieipa dieng kiei hi mejet boi kachang rangnih, khan chawng arieipa kha kiei dieng mejet boi chang rangnih.
Nangni diengawm khatak kha inih, nangni na ratha khutchawi kha ningnangaw u jarkhan, makha biekrup rawshawnna rang a athadet kha tawk u roh.
Khajarkhan chawngshik a achawng ama kha na melerna rang, Pathien dieng nikna niei rosho.
Ajarla kiei na chawngshik a nikna kieniei a tu, karatha na inik inih, inia kijetna kha ara boi inih.

Khanitala imaw nih? Kiei na ratha le nikna niei rang kanih, khan kiei na kijet chawng a`awm nikna niei rang kanih. Kiei na ratha le lah thaw rang kanih, khan kijet chawng a`awm kiei na lah thaw rang kanih.
Khanawkatu, ratha le mapakna nangniei phakhan, itia maw arangaithiei boi miring kha na nangiriei kha jet boi jarkhan nimapak na chawng khan “Amen,” tinih?
Ajarla nang na mapakna chawng kha thaning a nangriei, inia shik miring kha na rawshawnna niei mak.
Nang kholok nek a chawngshik a kachawng jarkhan, kapathien kha kamapak.
Jetthiei boi chawngrama bawp shawm kirieinek khan, biekrup shung a mi kuruchukna rang, kiei na jetthiei chawngrama rahngabak kha riei rawng.
Uliennai hai, jetnathiei khan naite hai chang u naw roh, inia ashie chon khan naishen hai kha chang u roh. Inia jetnathiei khan puichang kha nih u roh.
Dan ah hitihin miejiek: “Miring chawngshik le milak hai ner a, hi miring dieng hin chawngriei rang kanih. Khashe khan amani na kawchawng kha rangai u naw nih,” tia Pumi na ieriei.
Khajarkhan chawngshik hai hi jetna `khat inih, takashawn hai dieng a nimak a takashawn boi hai dieng a inih. Inia rophongchawng hi takashawn boi hai rang a nimak a takashawn miring hai rang a inih.

Khajarkhan biekrup miring kholok na mun `khat ah vak ruchun a mi rikip na chawngshik a chawng u joiala, makha mun ah ajet boi ninawkle takashawn boi miring vak lut hai kha na nangvet u joi, niti u naw nih maw?
Inia mi rikip na chawngrophong a, takashawn boi `khat ninawkle ajet boi miring `khat va joiatu, kholok na ama kha mawjawthet, khan kholok na ama chung a enretena kha ieniei.
Khatikhan umulung irawt kha mawlawng pe a ama na bawklap a Pathien kha chubai abawk rangnih, khan Pathien hi nangni kar a awmhet, tia rophong rangnih.

Khanitala mahi imaw nih, uliennai hai? Nangni na nang vak ruchun u phakhan, lah kha nangnieirim uh, ruchukna kha nangniei uh, chawngshik kha nangniei uh, chawngrophong kha nangniei uh, melerna kha nangniei uh. Hihai kholok hi rawshawnna rang a thaw chang rosho.
Tukhat na chawngshik a chawng a tu, idi ninawkle rawptak a uthum, dawna chawng riei rosho, khan akhat na meler rosho.
Inia meler miring awm nawkatu, biekin khan awmchien rieshie ibing dieng le Pathien dieng khan chawng riei rosho.
Thiempulien idi ninawkle uthum na chawng riei rosho, khan shik miring hai kha na mushung rosho.
Inia rophongchawng kha iedieng ah ashuh ama dieng khan jong joiatu, akhat changna miring kha na awmchien rosho.
Mi kholok na jetna rang le lungar pekna rang, nang kholok na dawna chawng nangrophongthiei uh.
Khan thiempulien hai ratha kha thiempulien hai awnoi a awm inih.
Ajarla Pathien hi reheshuna Pathien kha nimak a, miriethieng hai biekrup kholok shung a kha ang a, ama hi lungdamna apeh Pathien kha inih.
Nang nupang hai kha na biekrup khan awmchien u rosho, ajarla amani dieng chawngrieina rang jawt pe mak. Inia Dan na iriei dungjuia amani na luraw thaw a a`awm u rang a inih.
Khan amani na ih `khat kha ruchuk jawt u joiatu, i`inkopa hai dieng in ah rawdawn u rosho. Ajarla nupang `khat na biekin ah chawngiriei rang kha jaknaroi `khat inih.
Ninawkle, Pathien chawng kha nangni ah put ah hawng put maw nih? Ninawkle nangni dieng ranga vak tung maw nih?
Tukhat na nining a thiempulien ninawkle rathalam miring kha kanih ti joiatu, kiei na kimiejiek chawng hai hi Pumi chawngpek hai kha inih, tia loi rosho.
Inia tukhat na jet nawkatu, ajet boi kha chang rosho.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai, chawngrophong rang a kha ditmer u roh, khan chawngshik a chawngriei kha makha u naw roh.
Ih kholok kha imirit niei a le rieshieihiem a thaw chang rosho.
Uliennai hai, nangni dieng a kirophong athachawng kha tun nangni dieng kenemejet jawt uh. Makha nangni na niruloi ua, nirudingna u kha inih.
Kiei na nangni dieng kirurophong chawng kha nangrurakrep u joiatu, makha jar a shanna kha nangimuk u inih. Khanawkatu nemna boi a takanangrushawn u joi.
Ajarla kiei na`awm kirumuk kha rapapek a nangni dieng kinurupek u inih. Makhala, miejiek dungjuia Christa na numunu u jar a ruthi inih.
Khan miejiek dungjuia, ama kha rukhum ua, ni `thum changna khan hawng thoiret inih.
Khan ama kha Cephas na rumuk, khashole khaichawi shawmlieidi na rumuk uh.
Makha shole ama kha uliennai rajarahnga chung a na pha khatte a rumuk uh. Amani kar khan eshen ruthi u joiawm, arawpdet ring a awm u lai.
Makha shole ama kha James na rumuk, khashole tirtawn kholok na rumuk uh.
Khan dawngkhit a, pha niboia shok, kiei diengawm rular.
Ajarla kiei hi tirtawn tia koi rang a rutuk boi, tirtawn hai kar a ashinving kha kanih, ajarla Pathien biekrup kha kiei na shawna kirupek inih.

Inia Pathien numpokmirit jar a kiei hi hi kanih joi, kiei dieng a ama numpokmirit kha nemna boi ruchang mak. Ajarla kiei na amani kholoknek a chon kuruthawdet, nitjoiawm makha kiei na kiruthaw nimak a, Pathien numpokmirit kha na kiei dieng a iruthawna inih.
Khajarkhan kiei na ninawkle amani na nita`awm, hitihin a kirurophong ua khatikhan a takanangirushawn u inih.
Khan ama kha athi ah put ah hawng thoi joi, tia Christa kha rophong u joiala, itia nang kar ua eshen na athi ah put ah thoiretna awm mak, iti u maw nih?
Inia athi ah put ah thoiretna kha awm nawkatu, Christa kha rumothoi mak.
Khan Christa kha ruthoi joi nawkatu, kawchawngrophong u kha nemna boi inih, khan nang takashawn u kha`awm nemna boi inih.

Khan athi hai kha hawng thoihet boi nitjoiatu, kieini hi Pathien kungchang jok hai `khat a numuk u joi, ajarla kieini na ama na irumothoi boi Christa kha ama na rumothoi, tia Pathien kungchang kha kanih u joi.
Ajarla athi hai kha thoi joi nawkatu, Christa kha thoi mak.
Christa kha thoi joi nawkatu, nang takashawn u kha nemna boi inih, nang munu u hai khan nangawm u lai!
Khajarkhan Christa riming a ruthi miring hai kha thang u joi.
Mahi ringkho shung ranga hin Christa dieng ngakmining aniei kha nanih u joiatu, mi kholok hai kar a minek a numpokroi kha nanih u joi.
Inia Christa kha athi ah put ah thoi joi, khan athi miring hai akhat changna ara kha chang joi.
Miring `khat jar a thitna kha jong jarkhan, miring `khat jar a thitna ah put ah thoiretna kha`awm ajong inih.
Ajarla Adam jar a mi kholok ruthi kha ang a, Christa jar a mi kholokawm khatikhan miring rangnih.
Inia mi rikip na amama pha khan nih rangnih: Christa kha akhat changna ara kha inih, khashole ama jong phakhan, Christa tah achang miring hai kha thoi rangnih.
Rampona kholok, cham kholok khan ranak kholok kha dawng minit a, rengchangna kha Apa Pathien dieng pek phakhan, dawng kha jong rangnih joi.
Ajarla irahapui kholok kha eke thoi ah atet masheng, ama na rengchangngir rang a inih.
Imathang rang a irahapui dawngkhit kha tu thitna kha inih.
Ajarla “Ama na ih kholok kha eke thoi ah atet joi.” Inia “ih kholok kha eke thoi ah atet joi,” tia ama na ti phakhan, ih kholok ama thoi ah atet Pathien kha ajaw boi inih.
Khan nieinak kholok Christa thoi ah atet phakhan,shapa kha`awm, nieinak kholok ama thoi ah atet Pathien thoi ah awm rangnih. Makha Pathien kha kholok chung a Pumi changna rang a inih.
Athi hai ruhut a baptisma aloi hai kha na imaw thaw u nih? Athi hai kha na hawng thoihet nawkatu, ijar a amani rang a baptisma iloi u maw nih?
Ijar a nidan rikip a chitroina dingmun a awm maw nanih uh?
Nang jar ua nupumi u Christa Jesu dieng a kiniei lienrashatna kha jar a, ningthingkip kathi, tia kiriei inih.

Kiei na miring awmchan a, Ephesus ah ramsha hai kha le rakawthaw joiatu, kiei rang a nemna kha imaw nih? Athi hai kha na hawng thoi joi nawkatu, “Neh u rawi, khan shah u rawi, ajarla kieini jing a athi rang a nanih uh!”
Mi na inomohon u kha chang u naw roh. “Lawm tha boi kha na awmchan atha kha me`imieshiet inih.”
Mining ridiktak khan hawng kir u tana, munu thaw u naw roh, ajarla eshen na Pathien jetna lungvarshe kha niei mak. Mahi nang jakna u rang a kiriei inih.
Inia tukhat na ti rangnih, “Itia maw athi hai kha na hawng thoi nih? Khan ih pum kha le maw amani na hawng lar nih?
Aw amawng miring, nangivawr kha thi joi nawkatu miring naw nih.
Khan nangvawr phakhan, hawng mawng rang a kung kha vawr makche, inia rumomoi, gehu ninawkle tieitang ru kha nangivawr inih.
Inia Pathien na idit le roroia, muchi khan kung ipek inih; khan muchi rikip dieng ama na kung kha ipek inih.
Taksha kholok kha ra`angre nimak, inia miring hai taksha `khat, sha hai taksha `khat, nga hai taksha `khat, khan va hai taksha `khat a`awm inih.
Ravan pum hai le rieliei pum hai kha`awm awm, inia ravan lurna kha akhat inih, khan rieliei lurna kha shik inih.
Ni na lurna `khat ieniei, tha na lurna shik ieniei, khan arshi hai na lurna shik ieniei, ajarla arshi `khat lurna hi arshi `khat le kairekhe inih.
Athi ah put ah thoiretna kha`awm kha le ra`ang inih. Athangthiei a ivawr kha athangthiei boi a imothoi inih.
Richit boi a ivawr kha lurna khan imothoi inih. Dawkshamna a ivawr kha ranak khan imothoi inih.
Balam pum ivawr kha, rathalam pum khan imothoi inih. Balam pum kha a`awm inih, khan rathalam pum kha`awm a`awm inih.
Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Akhat changna miring Adam kha aring miring hawng chang inih.” Dawngkhit Adam kha ringkho apeh ratha kha hawng chang.
Nitjoiawm rathalam kha masha nimak a balam kha masha inih, khashole rathalam kha inih.
Akhat changna miring kha rieliei tah inih, pieipak ah put ah ikon inih. Adi changna miring kha ravan ah put ah Pumi kha inih.
Pieipak ah put ah ikon miring kha, pieipak ah put ah ikon amani le ra`ang inih. Ravan ah put ah anih miring kha, ravan ah put ah anih amani kha le ra`ang inih.
Khan pieipak miring rilim kha kieini na niloi u hi le ra`ang a, kieini na ravan miring rilim kha`awm noloi u rangnih.
Uliennai hai, taksha le thishen kha na Pathien Rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih, khan athangthiei nieinak kha na athangthiei boi nieinak kha tum ngam naw nih, tia kiriei inih.
En u roh, kiei na nangni dieng murukchawng kha kiriei inih: nokholok na miei naw minih, inia kieini hi menotho pe rangnih.

Makha pha bawngte shung a, mikmichim `khat shung a, dawngkhit tekawlawi kha miri phakhan, nih rangnih. Ajarla tekawlawi miri phakhan, athi hai kha athangthiei boi rang khan thoi rangnih, khan kieini hi menotho pe rangnih.
Ajarla mahi athangthiei hi na athangthiei boi kha irieshieingir rang a inih, khan mahi athithiei hi na athithiei boi kha irieshieingir rang a inih.

Khajarkhan mahi athangthiei hi na athangthiei boi kha irieshiei, khan mahi athithiei hi na athithiei boi hi rieshiei phakhan, mahi chawngriei hi hawng shok rangnih. Hitihin rumiejiek, “Ramawtawr kha na athi kha ava joi.”
“Aw thitna, nang tur kha khoshekawt ah maw awm joi? Aw Thikho, nang ramawtawr kha khoshekawt ah maw awm joi?”
Thitna tur kha tu munu kha inih, khan munu ranak kha tu dan kha inih.
Inia nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a ramawtawr napeh Pathien dieng mapak chang rosho.

Khajarkhan kunumpok uliennai hai, dingrep u roh, meperthiei boi kha chang u roh. Pumi rang khan nang chonthaw u kha nemna boi chang mak, iti kha jet u tana Pumi chon kha mulungluttak a thaw jawnjai u roh.
Khan miriethieng hai rang a thawlawm chungchanga, Galatia biekrup hai dieng a chawngkirupek kha ang a, nangniawm khatikhan thaw u roh:

Hapta a akhat changna nikho khan nangni khatkhat na ih kha nita`awm nangimadan u rang a shok. Nanginieidan u dungjuia makha thaw u roh. Makha kiei na nangni dieng kavat phakhan, thawlawm thawna rangaina boi rang a inih.
Kiei na kavat phakhan, nangmulung ua achu miring hai kha chawngmawchawi le khutchawi hai kha achawi rang, Jerusalem ah tir rang kanih.
Kieiawm kashe rang a kha iriding nitjoiatu, kiei le she u rangnih.
Khan Macedonia kha kavaklut shole, nangni dieng va rang kanih, ajarla Macedonia khan she rang kanih.
Nangni le ka`awmbawt jawt, ninawkle phabishawt khan nangni le ka`awmawm jawt. Makha kokhomijin shena ih mun khan nita`awm nangnashanna u rang a inih.
Ajarla lampapawt nawthaw jawt u mi`ing, inia Pumi na jawt joiatu, nangni le phabawng `khat awmna rang kimining.
Inia Ephesus khan Pentecostshe awm rang kanih.
Ajarla kiei rang hin ranak moshok a chon thawna rang, mawkawt `khat hi rajaitak a mawlawng joi, inia nere`erpui tampui awm.
Timothy kha nangni dieng va joiatu, chih boi a awmna rang, tinta u roh. Ajarla ama na`awm kithaw hi ang a, Pumi chon kha ithaw inih.
Khajarkhan tute na ama kha maimawk peh naw rosho. Inia kiei dieng vatna rang, lungdamtak a vak tir u roh, ajarla ama kha uliennai hai le ngak a ka`awm inih.

Khan nu`uliennai u Apollos chungchanga tu, uliennai hai kha le nangni dieng vatna rang hin enchak a kimawshawk inih, inia vatna rang hin tun hin mulungmining niei mak, inia chanthatna muk phakhan, va rangnih.
Riring u roh, takashawn khan dingrep u roh, rang u roh, khan ranak niei u roh.
Nangithaw u kholok kha numpok le roroi rosho.
Uliennai hai, kinawmawshawk u inih. Stephanas inshungkhur kha nangjet uh. Makha Achaia ah akhat changna ara kha inih. Amani kha miriethieng hai chon thawna khan mulunglut `khat nih uh.
Makha nangni na kha`ang miring, kieini le chon thaw kholok dieng, nangbutna u rang a inih.
Stephanas, Fortunatus le Achaicus na nangni dieng va jarkhan, kiningai, ajarla nang ravatna u khan amani na imiship inih.
Ajarla karatha le nang ratha u kha inamathar pe u inih. Khajarkhan kha ang miring hai runiei changna kha jet pe u roh.
Asia biekrup hai na chubai nepek uh. Pumi riming a Aquila le Priscilla, khan amani in ah awm biekrup kholok na chubai rothom nepek uh.
Uliennai kholok na chubai nepek uh. Biengrutum riethieng kha le khatlekhat chubai repeh u roh.
Chubai pekna hi Paul, kiei na kukhuttak le kimiejiek inih.
Tukhat na Pumi Jesu Christa kha numpok joi nawkatu, ama dieng pumbotna kha chang rosho. Maranatha!
Nupumi u Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangni le awm rosho.
Christa Jesu riming a nang kholok chung a kunumpok hi a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Pathien mulungmining jar a Jesu Christa tirtawn, Paul kiei le uliennai Timothy na Corinth ah awm Pathien biekrup dieng le Achaia kholok a awm miriethieng hai dieng kiemiejiek uh.
Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Nupumi u Jesu Christa apa le Pathien kha mapak chang rosho. Ama hi roihoina apa le lam rikip a lungar apeh Pathien kha inih.
Kieini na shawrana kholok a acho amani kha, Pathien na kieini dieng a inurupek lungar kha pekna rang, nawshawrana kholok khan ama na lungar nepek uh.
Ajarla Christa shawna hai kha kieini dieng ruphu a awm kha ang a, Christa jar a lungar kha kieini dieng ruphu a awm.

Kieini na shawna kodoi uatu, makha nang lungarna u le nang shandamna u rang a inih. Kieini na maw`awina kha kieniei uatu, makha nangni rang maw`awina kha nitna rang a inih. Makha kieini na kidoi u doiratna kha le ra`ang shawna kha nangdoina u rang a inih.
Khan nangni rang a kangakmining u hi rephet boi inih. Ajarla shawna hai khan atumshom nangnitak u kha ang a, lungarna kha`awm atumshom rang nangnih u, iti kha kieini na kejet uh. 2
Ajarla uliennai hai, Asia ah ashok kawshawna u kha nangni na nangijet boi u rang kha dit u mi`ing. Kidoi ngam boi rang a kha le ajeng a nachep uh. Khajarkhan aring rangshe rumining u mi`ing.
Diktak a thitna rang a chawngshatna kha kieniei u joi, tia kurumining uh. Makha kieinirilik dieng niboia, athi miring hai mothoipa Pathien dieng takashawnna rang a inih.
Ama na khadawr a chitroi thitna ah put ah inurukhek ua, kieini hi inakhek inih. Ama na nakhek rangnilai, tia`awm ama dieng ngakmining kha kieniei uh.
Nangni na`awm kieini rang nikna a nangnarashap pui uh. Makha vanoi nikna jar a kieini dieng inurupek u khutchawi chungchanga kuruhut ua mi tampui na mapakna nieina rang a inih.

Ajarla kielienrashatna u kha hi inih: kulungthim u kungchangna kha tu manmieshie shung a, khan aliendet a nang maikung ua mulungriem le Pathien ah put ah mulung riethieng a karing u hi inih. Makha rieliei lungvar jar a nimak a Pathien numpokmirit jar a inih.
Ajarla nangite u le nangijet u kha niboia, shik iawm miejiek u mi`ing.

Kieini hi khoi `khat a nanginejet u hi ang a, kholok a nangjet u rangnih, tia ngakkimining. Makha Pumi Jesu Nikho khan nangni jar a lienkarashah u hi ang a, nangni na`awm kieini jar a liennangrashatna u rang a inih.
Khan mahi rangamna hi le nangni dieng matieng vatna rang kirudit inih. Makha nangni na voidi changna nemna kha nangnieina u rang a inih.
Makhala Macedonia ah keshena khan nangni kha vak pa a, Macedonia ah put ah nangni dieng kavakkir, khan Judea ah keshena khan nangnashan u rangnih.
Khajarkhan kiei na hitihin a kirashak hin, kiei na baitek a kithaw maw nih? Ninawkle, kirashak chon hi “Awh” kha “Awh,” khan “Nang” kha “Nang,” tina rang, taksha dungjuia kirashak maw nih?
Pathien tu takashawn rang a rutuk anih le roroia, nangni dieng kawchawngriei u kha “Awh” le “Nang” tina rang a nimak.
Ajarla nangni dieng a kirurophong u Pathien Shapa Jesu Christa kha kiei kinit a, Silvanus nit a, khan Timothy nita`awm, “Awh” le “Nang” tina rang a nimak, inia “Awh” iti kha ama jar a inih.
Ajarla ama jar a Pathien chawngrakham kholok kha “Awh” inih, khan ama jar a “Amen” inih. Hitihin Pathien lurna kha miring hai na kieini dieng inurupekna u inih.
Khan Christa jar a nangni le kieini ranak nurupek a thaonurunawt ama kha Pathien inih.
Ama na`awm kieini hi jetnanamna u joi, khan numulung u shung a Ratha kha rentukna `khat a kieini dieng nurupek joi.
Corinth ah kavakkirnaret boi kha kawnawmawshawna boi u rang a inih, iti hin Pathien kha kukungchang rang, kokoi uh.
Makha nang takashawn u kha dekna rang nimak, inia nang ningaina u rang, nangni le chonkithawshom u inih. Ajarla takashawn jar a ading nangnih uh.
Inia nangni kha mulungshaw apeh valai naw ning, tia kinining a mulung kirumiding inih.
Ajarla kiei na nang mulung kawnawmawshaw pe u joiala, kiei na mulung kimawshawmashak nangni na niboia, tu na maw kiei dieng ningaina kha nepeh nih?

Khan kiei na kavat phakhan, ningai kimukna rang a amani dieng mulungshaw kumukna boi rang, makhatak kha nangni dieng kirumiejiek inih. Khan kiningaina hi nang kholok ningaina kha inih, iti hi nang kholok dieng rangamna pui kieniei.
Ajarla shawrana kha mulungkoina le roroia mikrithi tampui cholam a, nangni dieng kimiejiek inih. Makha nangni kha lungshawna pek boi a kiei na ajeng a numkonopok u, iti kha nangjetna u rang a inih.
Inia tukhat na mulungshaw kha nepek u joiatu, kiei dieng tu mulungshaw kha nepeh maklai. Inia idawrshe tu, nang kholok dieng ithaw nih joi. Mahi kiei na mopoi boi a kiriei inih
Tampui na ama dieng a ipek shawna kha, kha ang miring rang tu, ahun nih joi.
Shir `khat tieng, mulungshaw na adona boi rang, ama kha rangaidam a maw`awi u roh.
Khajarkhan ama dieng numpok kha menetna rang, kinawmawshawk u inih.
Ajarla nangni na irikip a chawng maw nangjui u, iti kha kejetna rang, danenna `khat a kirumiejiek inih.
Nangni na tukhat kha rangaidam nangpek u joiatu, kiei na`awm kepek. Ajarla kiei na`awm tukhat dieng rangaidam kawthaw joiatu, nangni rangbak a Christa maikung a kithaw inih.
Makha Satan na chanthatna kha loina boi rang a inih, ajarla ama chonrashak hai kha kijet boi u nimak.
Khan Troas ah Christa athachawng rophongna rang, kavat phakhan, Pumi na kiei rang mawkawt `khat nurumawlawng pe joi.
Ku`uliennai Titus kha kumuk boi jarkhan, karatha a shawmuchumna kha rumuh mi`ing. Khajarkhan amani kha mathan a Macedonia ah kurushe joi.
Inia Christa riming a ra nawmawtawrmashak jawnjai le kieini jar a ama varna manamhoi kha mun rikip a moshok Pathien dieng khan mapak chang rosho.
Ajarla Pathien dieng kieini hi ishan a awm hai le athang hai dieng Christa manamhoi kha nanih uh.
Khan tukhat dieng kieini hi thitna rang a thitna manam kha nanih uh, khan shik `khat dieng kieini hi ringna rang a ringna manam kha nanih uh. Hihai rang hin tumaw rutuk awm?

Ajarla mi tampui hai kha ang a, Pathien chawng khan rievieithaw kha nih u makme, inia mulung riethieng a chon thaw `khat a le Pathien ah put ah kha ang a, Christa riming a Pathien maikung a chawng kha niriei u inih.
Kieini le kieini hi takthar a tharieiret nana rang maw nanih uh? Ninawkle, mi eshen hai ang a, nangni dieng ninawkle nangni ah put ah thariei chawngmawchawi hai kha kirangai u maw nih?
Nangni hi kholok na ijet le ite kumulung shung ua miejiek kawchawngchawi u kha nangnih uh.

Nangni kha kieini na chon kithaw pe u, Christa chawngmawchawi kha nangnih u, tia Pathien na namalar u joi. Muktui le imiejiek nimak a aring Pathien Ratha le imiejiek kha inih. Lungpek hai chung ah imiejiek nimak a miring mulung hai lungpek chung ah imiejiek inih.
Christa jar a Pathien dieng kha ang rangamna pui kha kieini na kieniei uh.
Ih kha nita`awm kajar ua hawng put inih, tia miningna rang, kibingte ua rupum nih u mi`ing, inia kurupumna u hi Pathien ah put ah ajong inih.

Ama na`awm rawjawtna athar chon thaw hai `khat a inurutukmashak inih. Kieini na dan miejiek khan chonnithaw u nimak a Ratha chon kha nithaw u inih, ajarla dan miejiek kha na athat, inia Ratha kha na ringna ipek inih.
Inia lung hai chung ah ikhet a miejieksho thitna chonthaw kha alur ruchang a Moses maisho kha ahek dedet lurna jarkhan, Israel nai hai na ama mai kha ridingpip a ruen ngam u nawkatu,
itia Ratha chon thawna kha alurdet boi rang a maw nih?
Ajarla hengna chonthaw kha na lurna niei joiala, dikna chonthaw kha na akhedet a lurna iniei inih.
Mahin ajeng a lur hi na jar chang a alur a ruawm kha na lurna nieilai mak.
Ajarla ruheksha kha na rulur joiala, tuntun a awm hi na lurna nieidet.
Kha`ang ngakmining kha kieniei u jarkhan, rangamer a chawngkiriei u inih.
Jong hek dedet lurna kha Israel nai hai na ridingpip a enna boi rang, ama maisho a maikhar akawp, Moses kha a`ang nih u makme.

Inia amani mulungmining kha rumichimmashak pe uh. Ajarla vonshe hin Rawjawtna Lui kha rute u phakhan, makha maikhartak kha lik boi a awmlai. Ajarla Christa dieng a takashawn ranga kha na makha ilik ngam rang a inih.
Inia vonshe hin Moses behangbuk kha te u phakhan, maikhar kha amani mulung a awm pe uh.
Inia tukhat na Pumi dieng mai miehiei phakhan, maikhar kha loi pe joi.
Pumi hi Ratha inih, khan Ratha awmna khan ningchamna kha awm.

Mengsheng ah muk ang a Pumi lurna kha, maikhar jaw boi mai kha le, nokholok na ne`en phakhan, lurna ah put ah lurna khan, makha rilimtak khan nechenkon u lai. Mahi lurna hi Pumi Ratha ah put ah ajong inih.
Khajarkhan kieini na roihoina kirumuk u kha ang a, mahi chonmun hi kaman u jarkhan, mulung rakaina kha niei u mi`ing.

Inia kieini na jakna nieinak rethe hai kha kurumiei u joi. Mohonna khan lawn u mi`ing khan Pathien chawng kha`awm pawrmechet u mi`ing, Inia adik kha malar a Pathien maikung a miring hai lungthim rikip khan mathat nana kieniei uh.
Inia ka`athachawng u kha mukhu joiawm, athang miring hai dieng a imukhu pe inih.
Takashawn boi hai amani mulungmining kha mahi rong pathien na mik mawchawmashak joi. Makha, Pathien rilim, Christa lurna athachawng mieivar kha amani chung a varna boi rang a inih.
Ajarla kieinirilik kha rophong u mi`ing, inia Pumi Jesu Christa kha kirophong u inih. Khan Jesu jar a kieini hi nang shok u kha kanih uh.
Ajarla ajing ah put ah mieivar kha var rosho ati Pathien momoi kha na mieivar pekna rang, numulung u shung a nurueh joi. Makha mieivar kha Jesu Christa maikung a Pathien lurna ijet kha inih.
Inia mahi bawmniei hi lieibe hai shung khan kieini na niniei u inih. Rakamthoiboi ranak kha kieini ah put ah niboia, Pathien ah put ah nitna rang a inih.
Irikip a kieini hi ine`ep u inih, inia rawnawinek u mi`ing. Awkchak a natet uh, inia mulung rakaina niei u mi`ing.
Epshawna nepek uh, inia napai u mak. Nawvawr uh, inia namathangvieng u mak.
Pum shung a Pumi Jesu athi kha kichawi jawnjai u inih. Makha kupum u shung a Jesu ringna kha ralarna rang a inih.
Ajarla aring a awm kieini hi Christa jar a thitna dieng nepek jawnjai uh. Makha athithiei kupum ua Jesu ringna kha`awm ralarna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan thitna kha na kieini dieng chonithaw inih, inia ringna kha na nangni dieng chonithaw inih.
Inia takashawn rathatak kha kieniei u jarkhan, imiejiek dungjuia, “Takakurushawn jar a kiruriei inih,” kieini na`awm takakurushawn u jarkhan, kiriei u inih.
Ajarla Pumi Jesu rumothoipa kha na kieiniawm Jesu le nomothoi rangnih, khan nangni le kieini hi Pathien dieng nepek rangnih, iti kha kejet uh.
Ajarla nieinak kholok hi nangni jarbak a inih. Makha mi tampui jar a hawng pung numpokmirit kha na mapakna kha Pathien lurna khan mupungna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan mulung rakaina kha niei u mi`ing. Inia vai tieng a kimiring u kha kiem joiawm, kushung ua awm miring kha nikhonikho a imathar inih.
Ajarla ajong nawshawna u richinkhat le iniboi kha na rakamthoiboi kumshawt lurna khan kieini rang imoshok inih.

Mukthiei nieinak hai khan a ni`en u nimak a mukthiei boi nieinak hai khan a ni`en u inih. Ajarla mukthiei nieinak hai kha pha bawngte rang a inih, inia mukthiei boi nieinak hai kha kumshawt rang a inih.
Ajarla ni`in u achang taksha thamber hi mathang a`awm, khut le kon boi in, kumshawt a ravan a awm, Pathien ah put ah awmna, kha nieniei u, iti hi kieini na nejet uh.
Ajarla taksha thamber hin kieini hi nuruphuher u inih. Ajarla ravan ah put ah ni`in u kha rieshieina rang, kieini na niditmer u inih.
Makha nirieshieihet u nitjoiatu, kieini hi rekengver u naw minih.

Ajarla mahi thamber shung a awm kieini hi nuruphuher ua pokrik kha niruniei u inih. Ajarla, makha kieini na rieshiei boi a awm kha nidit u nimak a inierieshieimashak u rang a kha nadit u jar a inih. Makha thitna kha ringna kha na avana rang a inih.
Khan hihaitak hi kieini rang a inarasham pe ama kha Pathien inih. Ama na`awm rentukna `khat a Ratha kha kieini dieng inurupek inih.
Khajarkhan rangam jawnjai a na`awm uh. Makha kieini na taksha a na`awm u lai hin, Pumi ah put ah arala a awm nanih uh, iti hi nejet u jar a inih.
Ajarla kieini hi mikmuk jar a nimak a, takashawn jar a ring nanih uh.
Kieini na rangamna nieniei uh. Pumi le rala a awmnek khan Pumi le ranai a awm kha kiditdet u inih.
Khajarkhan arala a awm nit a anai a awm nita`awm, nikhinmun u tu ama rang ningnitroi nachangna u rang a inih.
Ajarla nokholok u na Christa chawngshatna shutna khan naleng u rangnih. Makha mi rikip na pum a atha nit a ashie nita`awm, amama ithaw dungjuia mukna rang a inih.

Khajarkhan Pumi chitna kha kejet ua, kieini na miring hai kha kidawi u inih, inia Pathien na thatak a inejet u inih. Khan mahiawm kiei na ngakkimining, makhala nang lungthim u hai khan kholok a nejet u, tia takakawshawn.

Ajarla nangni dieng takthar a kinining ua tharieina kha niei u mi`ing, inia kuruhut ua lienrashatna rang mun kinepek u inih. Makha na mulung shung a niboia mailang a lienrashatna aniei nangni chung a nangmashang ngamna u rang a inih.
Ajarla kieini hi avet kha kanih u joiawm, makha Pathien rang a inih. Kavet u nawkatu makha nangni rang a inih.
Ajarla Christa numpok kha na kieini hi inawmawthawngir u inih. Mahi kieini na nathirsho u joi jarkhan, mi kholok rang Mi khat hi ruthi inih. Makha dungjuia mi kholok ruthi inih.
Khan ama na mi kholok rang ruthi. Makha aring a awm amani kha na amani rangbak niboia, amani rang a ruthi a irumothoi, ama rang ringna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan tun ah put ah tute hi taksha dungjuia jet u makme. Christa kha taksha dungjuia nurujet u joiawm, tuntu ama kha khatikhan jet u lai makme.
Khajarkhan tukhat na Christa dieng awm joiatu, ama kha khutkon `thar kha nih joi. Alui nieinak kholok kha rupaisho a, enro, nieinak kholok hawng thar joi.
Nieinak kholok hi Pathien ah put ah ajong inih. Christa jar a Pathien na amarilik dieng khan nieriengieimashak joi. Ama na kieini dieng hin riengieina chonmun hi nepek joi.
Makhala, Christa jar a Pathien na manmieshie hi amarilik dieng riengieimashak joi. Ama na amani shietna hai kha te pe boi a, riengieina chawng kha kieini dieng khutnorothona joi.
Khajarkhan kieini hi Christa ruhuttir kha nanih joi. Makha Pathien na kieini dieng inawmaw`awina u a`ang inih. Pathien dieng riengiei u roh, tia kieini na Christa ruhut a kinawmawshawk u inih.
Munu rujet boi ama kha kieini rang munu irumachang inih. Makha ama jar a Pathien dikna kha ninitna u rang a inih.
Kieini hi Pathien le chonthawshom ang a, Pathien numpokmirit kha nemna boi a nangloina boi u rang, kinawmawshawk u inih.

Ajarla ama na ieriei, “Chanthatna pha `khat khan kiei na nang chawng kha karangai joi, khan shandamna nikho khan kunurushan joi.” Enro, tun hi chanthatna pha kha inih. Enro, tun hi shandamna nikho kha inih.
Pathien chon kithaw u kha biena boi rang, tute dieng bakna peh u mi`ing.
Kieini hi Pathien chon thaw hai kha nanih, iti hi chon rikip a kimalar u inih: doiratna tampui khan, shawrana khan, ravatna khan, phairavaina khan,
inejemna u hai khan, lungroko shung khan, mipui na inahokna u khan, chon thawna hai khan, jana pha mukna boi khan, vawnchamtuira doina khan,
riethieng khan, shingna khan, ashawt a shawna khan, ninghoina khan, Ratha Riethieng khan, miri`ir numpok khan,
adik chawng khan, Pathien ranak khan, viei le chang a dikna mieriem khan,
richit le maimieshietna khan, thangshietna le thanghoina khan, mimohon hai `khat a inoloi a adik `khat a,
meh jet boi inia meh jet `khat a, athi miring hai `khat a inia, enro, karing uh. Inachep u miring hai `khat a, inia nathat u mak,
mulungshaw miring hai `khat a kiningai jawnjai uh, sharachang’ khat a inia mi tampui kawrawchawngmashak uh. Ih niei boi `khat a inia nieinak kholok kieniei uh.
Aw Corinth miring hai, nangni dieng madangsheng a chawngkiriei u hi inih, nangni rang kumulung u hi rawlawnghawng a awm.
Nangni rang kunumpok u hi khar u mi`ing, inia kieini rang nang numpok u kha nangkhar u joi.
Kunumpoktak u kha ruhutthung `khat a kieini dieng hawng mutung u roh. Kiei na nangni dieng naite hai dieng a ang a kiriei inih.
Takashawn boi hai le rachan boi ringkaw rupushom kha chang u naw roh. Ajarla dikna le danishawnboi ruirakaina imaw awm? Khan mieivar le ajing ruirakaina imaw awm?
Khan Christa le Belial rawjawtna imaw awm? Ninawkle, takashawn le takashawn boi ruirakaina imaw awm?

Khan riethiengmun le rilim hai rawjawtna imaw awm? Ajarla nangni hi aring Pathien riethiengmun kha nangnih uh. Hitihin Pathien na ruti, “Kiei na amani dieng awm rang kanih, khan amani kar a lawn rang kanih. Kiei hi amani Pathien kha nih rang kanih, khan amani hi kimiring kha nih u rangnih.”
Khajarkhan “Amani ah put ah vak shok u tana rechen kha chang u roh. Orono kha shih u naw roh, khan nangni kha kiei na noloi u rang kanih,” tia Pumi na iti.
“Kiei hi nangpa u kha chang rang kanih, khan nangni hi kashapa hai le kashanu hai kha nangchang u rangnih,” tia Chungchon a ranakniei PUMI na iti.
Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, hihai chawngrakham hi nieniei u jarkhan, pum le ratha pawrchetna kholok ah put ah riethieng u taia Pathien chitna le riethiengna kha rupummashak u rawi.
Kieini hi nawpawm u roh. Tute dieng rehe u mi`ing, tute kha pawrmechet u mi`ing, tute kha mohon u mi`ing.
Nawngna rang kiriei nimak, ajarla thitnashom rang le ringnashom rang, nangni hi kumulung shung ua nangawm u joi, tia matieng kieriei joi.
Nangni dieng rangamer a chawngrieina kiniei hi ielien. Nang ruhut ua lienrashatna kiniei hi ielien. Mawshawkna hi kiei dieng ship a awm. Kawshawna u kholok chung a ajeng a ningaina kieniei.
Ajarla diktak a Macedonia ah kava u lai khan, pum a shawmuchumna niei u mi`ing, inia irikip a, vai tieng a roshona hai le khan shung a chitna hai kha kodoi uh.
Inia Titus na kieini dieng vat phakhan, mulungkoi hai dieng lungar apeh Pathien na lungarna kha nurupek uh.

Ama ava ranga kha niboia, ama dieng a nangirupek maw`awina jar a`awm inih. Kiei hi nangna`awi uh, mulung nangnumukurna uh, khan mulung nangnepekna u, iti kha ama ah put ah kurujet `le, lieklawr a kiningai.
Chawngmawchawi a nang mulung kanamanat pe u joiawm, shirna kieniei a`awm, kiei shir mi`ing. Ajarla makha chawngmawchawitak kha na phabawngte tu nang mulung inawmawshaw pe u kha kejet.

Tun kiningai, ajarla nang lungnatna u khan niboia a, mulung lekna kha nurupek u jar a inih. Ajarla Pathien na idit dungjuia mulungshaw kha nangnih uh. Makha kieini ah put ah thangna iawm nangnieina boi u rang a inih.
Ajarla Pathien idit dungjuia lungnatna kha na shandamna rang mulung lekna kha imoshok inih. Mahin shirna rang awm mak. Khania manmieshie dungjuia lungnatna kha na thitna kha imoshok inih.

Ajarla Pathien idit dungjuia, lungnatna kha na ara imaw moshok, iti kha en u roh: adik boi chung a chonthawrat, jar niei boi, ashang, chitna, ditrangai, mulunglut, adik boi kha ichep! Hihai kholok chung hin nang riethieng u, iti kha nangimumuk u inih.
Khajarkhan kiei na nangni dieng kiemiejiek joiawm, chon shie athawpa le makha ithawnapa chung a kithaw nimak, inia Pathien maikung a kinarena u kha nangni dieng larna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan Pathien na nawmawshawk u phakhan, kieini hi inawmawshawk inih. Titus ningaina khan kieini na ningaina liendet kieniei uh, ajarla nang kholok na ama mulung kha dawnthar nangimoloi u inih.

Ajarla ih khan nita`awm, nang jar ua Titus maikung a lienrashatna kha kieniei a kiei jakna niei mi`ing. Inia adik a nangni dieng ih kholok kiriei u hi ang a, Titus dieng a kielienrashatna u kha adik ruchang.
Ama kha lamjawng nangruthaw u lai khan, khadawr khan chitna le rawnawklam a nangruloi uh. Nang kholok chawngjuina kha mining a nangni dieng ama numpok kha ajeng a rashang pe.
Khajarkhan irikip a nangni dieng rangamna kieniei a kiningai.
Uliennai hai, Macedonia biekrup hai dieng irupek Pathien numpokmirit kha nangni dieng kenemejet uh.
Makhala, shawrana chungchanga enretena lientak kha runiei u joiawm, amani na ajeng a ningrungai pui uh. Amani kha ajeng a shararuchang u joiawm, rawchawng ang a, pekjawtna nieitak a rupek uh.
Ajarla imawtawrtuk ua le amani ranak na iphak ngam boishe khan amani na mulunglientak a pek jawt u, iti kha kungachang kanih.
Macedonia biekrup hai na khutchawi le khan miriethieng hai rachang puina rang a kha koloina u rang, ajeng a kieini hi nawdawi uh.
Khan kirumining u kha ang a niboia, Pathien mulungmining dungjuia, arapa a Pumi dieng le kieini dieng rurepeh u inih.
Khajarkhan, matieng a iruput kha ang a, nangni diengawm mahi numpokmirit hi rupummashakna rang, Titus kha kirumawshawk u inih.
Inia takashawn a, chawng a, shingna a, lunglutna a, kieini rang a nang numpok u khan irikip a nangruphu u kha ang a, mahi numpokmirit hinawm ruphu kha chang u roh.
Mahi chawngpek ang a kiriei nimak, inia shik miring hai mulunglut kha le enrete a nangnumpok u kha idawr maw riethieng, iti kha enkirete inih.
Ajarla Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangjet uh. Ama kha rawchawng joiawm, nangni rangbak khan, sharachang inih. Makha ama sharachangna khan rawchawng nangnitna u rang a inih.
Kawchawngpek tu hi inih: nikum a nangiruput u le nangiruthaw jawt u thawna khan mahi nangni rang a chanthatna ranga kha niboia,
tun awm nangiruthaw u kha rupummashak u roh. Thaw rang khan nangirudit ua nangrurasham u kha ang a, nanginiei dungjuia put ah makha rupummashak u roh.
Ajarla thawjawtna mulung kha arapa a awm joiatu, iniei boi dungjuia nimak a, iniei dungjuia Pathien na khutchawi iloi rang a kha rutuk inih.
Ajarla shik miring hai kha maw`aw a nangni kha shawna pek rang, tia kimining nimak.

Kha ruhut a, irikip rachanmashak rang hin kidit inih. Makha tun a nang ruphu u kha na amani ravatna kha mishipna rang le amani ruphu u kha na nang ravatna u kha miship a rachanshom a tetna rang a inih.
Hitihin miejiek, “Arawp a rawkhawm ama kha na rothom a iawm niei mak, atawm a rawkhawm ama kha na ravatna niei mak.”
Inia nangni rang a kiniei ra`angre tenretna Titus mulung a atet Pathien kha mapak chang rosho.
Ajarla ama na rachakna kha iruloi ranga niboia, mulung irulek a, ama idittak a, nangni dieng ava inih.
Khan athachawng chung a chonthaw jar a biekrup kholok na imapak uliennai kha ama le kivaktirshom u inih.
Inia kha ranga kha niboia, mahi numpokmirit hi le kijin puishom u rang a biekrup hai na imadan inih. Makha Pumi amatak kha mulurna rang le nangishan jawtna u kha mumukna rang a kithaw u chon inih.
Khutchawi rothom chung a chonkithaw u hin, mi na iniemieshiet u rang a kha kiriring pui uh.
Ajarla Pumi maikung ranga a atha kha niboia, miring hai maikung a`awm atha kha thawna rang a inih.

Khan kuliennai u hi amani le kavaktir uh. Chon arawplam a kieini na ama kha mulunglut miring inih, iti kha kejet uh. Khan tun ama hi mulunglutdet joi. Ajarla ama na nangni dieng takashawn kha ajeng a niei joi.
Titus kha tu, nangni rang a kirawtawp pui le chon kithaw pui miring `khat inih. Uliennai hai kha tu, biekrup hai tirtawn hai kha inih. Amani kha Christa lurna kha inih.
Khajarkhan biekrup hai dieng nang numpok u le nang chungchang ua kielienrashatna u jetna kha amani dieng mumuk u roh.
Khan miriethieng hai rang a chon thawna chungchang khan nangni dieng kimiejiek rang a kha rangai mak.

Ajarla nangithaw jawt u kha kiei na kijet. Makha chung khan Macedonia miring hai dieng lienkinarashatna u inih, makhala Achaia ah miring hai kha tu, nikum khan a rasham u nih joi. Khan nang mulunglutna kha na amani arawplam kha muchunmashak joi.
Khanikengta nang chung ua kielienrashatna u kha mahin arok changna boi rang, uliennai hai kha kivaktir nih joi. Makhala, kiriei kha ang a nangrashamna u rang a inih.
Kha nitnawkatu, Macedonia miring hai kha na kiei le va a arasham boi a navakmuk uatu, nangni kha te boi a, rangamer a kielienrashatna u chung hin jak kumuk u rangnih.

Khajarkhan arapa a chawngnangrurakham u khutchawi hai kha masha a rashamna rang, nangni dieng matieng vatna rang, uliennai hai kha mawshawkna `khat hi rangai, tia kimining. Makha manarshie a pek niboia pekjawttak a pekna rang, khutchawi `khat a nangrashamjer a nangrutetna u rang a inih.
Inia mahi adik inih, chikchelam a avawr ama kha na chikche kha le rawkhawm rangnih, rahvan peklam a avawr ama kha na rahvan kha le rawkhawm rangnih.
Mi rikip na ningshietlam a ninawkle thawboithaboi `khat a niboia, mulung a imuchuk kha peh rosho. Ajarla mulung parlam a apeh miring kha Pathien na numipok inih.
Pathien na numpokmirit kholok kha nangni dieng iruphumashak ngam inih. Makha ih kholok a ahun a nieina rang le atha chon kholok a ruphu changna rang a inih.
Hitihin a imiejiek hi inih: “Ama na athe a rajaimashak joi, ama na shara hai dieng pek joi. Ama dikna kha kumshawt a awm.”
Khan avawrpa dieng a muchi le khan nek rang nekleshak mawjawnpa Pathien kha na nangivawrna rang, ara kha nawmawjawn pe a numupung pe rangnih, khan nang dikna ara hai kha imupung chang rosho.
Pekjawtna kholok chung khan irikip a nawrawchawngmashak u joi. Makha na Pathien namapakmashak u rangnih.
Ajarla mahi Pathien chon thawna hi na miriethieng hai ravatna kha imawjawn pe ranga niboia, amani kha ruphu a Pathien imapakmashak inih.

Mahi pekna chon hin tumaw nangni u, iti kha mi hai na muk ua, Pathien kha mapakna rang a inih. Makha Christa rieirophongna rawtawp pui chawngjuina, khan amani le mi kholok dieng nang khutjangna u jar a inih.
Khan nangni dieng a awm danlakngam boi Pathien numpokmirit jar a, nangni rang nikna niei u phakhan, ajeng a anarangai uh.
Angrieingam boi ama khutchawi jar a Pathien kha mapak chang rosho.
Christa mulung renem le raw`awina jar a, nangni le mailemai a ka`awm phakhan, mulung rede, inia nangni le ka`awm boi phakhan, mulung ngarna aniei, Paul kiei na kinawmawshawk u inih.
Kieini hi manmieshie ichatna dungjuia aring `khat a nimining amani dieng kavat phakhan, kirumining rangamna hi amani dieng mumukna boi rang, kinawdawi u inih.
Ajarla kieini na dawkshamna le karing u joiawm, miring awmchan dungjuia rakithaw u nimak.
Ajarla karathawna u mieriem hai kha rieliei mieriem nimak, inia ashie ranakbuk kha mathangna rang, Pathien ranakniei mieriem kha inih.
Chawngrieshietna le khan Pathien jetna le rodoi rashang lungthim kholok kha kimathang inih. Khan Christa chawngjui rang khan mulungmining kholok kha shurkhop `khat a kichawi u inih.
Khan nang chawngjuina u kha rupum phakhan, chawngjuina boi kholok kha chepna rang, rasham a awm kanih uh.

Me malang dungjuia nieinak hai kha nangi`en u maw nih? Tukhat na Christa tah kha kanih, tia rangam nana joiatu, takthar a mahi nining a mining rosho, makhala ama na Christa tah anih kha ang a, kieiniawm Christa tah kha kanih uh.
Ajarla nangthangna u rang a nimak a, nangni kha nomothoina u rang, Pumi na inepek u kachamnieina u hi chungchanga lienkarashah u joiawm, jakna niei u naw ning.
Makha chawngmawchawi hai kha le nangni kha kinimichit u kha angna boi rang a inih.
Ajarla amani na ti uh, “Ama chawngmawchawi hai kha irik, khan ranak niei pe, inia upum jawna khan dawkshamna ieniei, khan ama chawngriei kha mieshietthiei a awm pe.”
Kha ang miring kha na mahi mining rosho, makhala kieini na kaw`awm boi u phakhan, chawngmawchawi a kivakmawchawi ua, kiriei u kha ang a ka`awm u phakhan, khatak kha chon a kanih u rangnih.
Ajarla nining a mathat nana hai amani kha le rachan a ninawkle rapana rang, ngam u mi`ing. Inia nining a manilemani kha retena uh, khan nining a rietiet nana ua ashing kha chang u mak.

Pathien na kieini dieng a inepek rietietna kha khea lienrashatna niei u naw ning. Inia kha`ang lienrashatna Pathien na inumutumsha rikaina rietietna shung khan a inih. Makha rikaina kha nangnishe iphak inih.
Nangnishe kavakshok ngam boi u ang a, kielienrashatna khan rekhe u mi`ing, ajarla Christa athachawng kha le nangni dieng vak shok kanih uh.

Shik miring hai chon thawna khan rekhe a lienrashatna kha niei u mi`ing, inia mahi ngakmining hi kieniei uh, makhala nang takashawn u kha hawng lien shishit le roroia, nang jar ua kirikaina u kha Pathien na narajai pe u rangnih.
Makha nangni rang a kha khea athachawng kha rophongna rang le, shik miring chonthawnasha rikaina khan lienrashatna boi rang a inih.
Inia “lienrashah ama kha na PUMI riming a lienrashah rosho.”
Ajarla nining a rieimielien ama kha muchuk mak a, Pumi na irieimielien ama kha imuchuk inih.
Kawmawngna shilite hin nangnodoi pui uala naw! Diktak a nangnodoi pui uh.

Ajarla Pathien ah put ah kimuk ningawna kha le ningkawnawaw uh. Ajarla inkopa `khat dieng nangni inniei rang khan chawngkururakham joi. Makha Christa dieng nangni kha shimnu taklak `khat a pekna rang a inih.
Inia moro na ama mimohonna le Eve irumohon kha ang a, makha na Christa dieng nang mulungmining u ariem kha memieshietthiei, tia chitna kieniei.

Ajarla tukhat na nangni dieng va a kieini na kirophong boi u Jesu shik kha ivakrophong rang a, ninawkle nangirumuk boi u ratha shik nangiloi u rang a, ninawkle nangiruloi boi u athachawng shik nangiloi u rang a, hihaihi nangrodoi puithiei u, tia chitna kieniei.
Rashangving tirtawn hai dieng kiei hi noirede mi`ing, tia kimining.
Khan chawngriei hin miriem kinitjoiawm, shingna a tu nih mi`ing, iti hi ih kholok a kieini hi nangni dieng kirumalar u inih.
Manboi a athachawng kirurophong a kinining a kururede khan kiei na munu kithaw maw nih?
Nang chon u kawthawna rang, biekrup shik hai ah put ah shawlawh kha ranak a kiruloi inih.

Nangni le kaw`awmlai khan kiei ravat a kuruawm, inia tute dieng kiei na pokrik peh mi`ing. Karavatna hai kholok kha Macedonia ah put ah ajong uliennai hai kha na nimiship pe uh. Khan nangni dieng irikip a pokrik kachangna boi rang, kirurung inih, khan rung rang kanih.
Christa adik kha kiei dieng a`awm le roroia, Achaia ah mahi kielienrashatna hin tute na namakha ngam naw nih.
Ijar a maw? Numkonopok boi u jar a maw nih? Numkonopok uh, iti hi Pathien na ejet.
Inia miring hai na kieini ang a lienrashatna rang a chanthatna adit hai chanthatna kha shatna pe rang, kithaw kha kiei na thaw rang kanih.
Ajarla kha ang miring hai kha tirtawn jok, mimohon chonthaw hai kha nih uh. Nining ua Christa tirtawn rang a rasha nih uh.
Mahin shindawngna rang awm mak, ajarla Satan amatak na mieivar ravantir `khat rurashah inih.
Ama shepding hai kha na dikna shepding hai kha rasha u joiawm, mahi rekhekchon nimak. Amani dawng kha ochonthaw u dungjuia nih rangnih.
Kiei na kirieiret inih, tute na kiei hi avet `khat a noloi naw rosho. Noloi joiatu, lektetak a nita`awm, lienkarashatna rang, kiei hi avet `khat a noloi u roh.
Mahi rangamna chung a lienrashatak a chawngkiriei hi Pumi na iriei ang a tu kiriei nimak, inia avet miring `khat a kiriei inih.
Rieliei ichatna dungjuia, mi tampui na lienrashatna niei uh. Khatikhan kieiawm lienrashah rang kanih.
Nangni hi nang shing u jarkhan, amawng hai le ningaitak a nangawm ngam uh.

Tukhat na shok namachang u joiawm, tukhat na nawkhawver u joiawm, tukhat na ama nemna rang norotokna u joiawm, tukhat na nining a rawlawm joiawm, khan tukhat na nang mai uah naben u joiawm, nangdoi uh.
Kajakna u rang, nangni le enkerete ua, kieini hi kadawk u, tia kiriei inih. Ih khan nita`awm tukhat na lienrasha joiatu, kieiawm lienrasha kanih. Avet `khat ang a achawng kanih.
Amani kha Hebrew miring maw nih uh? Kieiawm kanih. Amani kha Israel miring maw nih uh? Kieiawm kanih. Amani kha Abraham chicha hai kha maw nih uh? Kieiawm kanih.

Amani kha Christa shepding kha maw nih uh? Kiei kanidet. Avet miring ang a achawng kanih. Chonthaw khan kiei na kawthawdet, rawmawtawng khan kiei na kawtawngdet, lungroko shung khan rawnaw a kiei ka`awmdet, thitna le ranai khan kiei rawnaw a ka`awmdet.
Jihudi hai ah put ah shawm mili a khatte ta rawmaw voirahngahet kurutawng.
Voithumhet thirpum le nurujem uh, voikhat lung le nurudeng uh, voithum korokong kha rukoi, jan `khat le ni `khat tuipui chung ah shawtak a kuruawm.

Khomijin she kururawnaw, tuidung hai chitroina khan kurocho. Shiersho miring hai chitroina khan kurocho, kimiringtak hai chitroina khan kurocho, Phungshik hai chitroina a kurocho, khopui chitroina khan kurucho, ramthim chitroina khan kurocho, tuikhanglien chitroina khan kurocho, khan uliennai jok hai chitroina khan kurocho.
Shawrieviei a chon kuruthaw, rawnaw a ja boi a kuruawm, vawnchamtuira a kuruawm, rawnaw a bukuruhien, ponledier boi a dai kururieviei.
Tieitang kha te boi a, biekrup kholok rang a kumulungkham hi na ningthingkip inachep inih.
Mi eshen na dawkshamna niei phakhan, kieiawm dawkshamna kiniei boi maw kanih? Amani na mi eshen keruthuimashak phakhan, kupum rieirit a natna kiniei boi maw nih?
Kiei na lienkarashangir rang a shok nitjoiatu, kawdawkshamna khan lienrashatna niei rang kanih.
Kumshawt a kimapak u, kupumi u Jesu Christa Pathien le apa kha na mielieishiei kithaw nimak, iti hi ejet.
Damascus khan kiei hi nurushur jawt jarkhan, reng Aratas thoi a rampo kha na Damascus miring hai khopui kha irurung inih.
Inia bangpui tukber khan kiei hi tiengkum ah nurumuchum ua ama khut ah put ah rurekhe kanih.
Diktak a kielienrashatna hi nemna mi`ing, inia Pumi ah put ah mulungmik hai le chawngrophong hai kha dawna riei rang kanih:

kum shawmlieimili mala khan Christa takashawn miring `khat kejet. Ama kha athum changna ravan khan iruchawi inih. Taksha pum a maw nih, ninawkle taksha pum boi a maw nih, kiei jet mi`ing, Pathien na ejet.
Kha ang miring kha kurujet: taksha pum a maw nih, ninawkle taksha pum boi a maw nih, kiei jet mi`ing, Pathien na ejet.
Ama kha itia paradise khan iruchawi maw nih, khan ama na rieingam boi chawngriei hai kha irujet maw nih, iti kha miring `khat na iriei rang khan dan nih boi inih.
Kha ang miring chungchang khan kiei lienrashatna niei rang kanih. Inia kuchungchanga tu, kawdawkshamna chungchanga niboia, lienrashatna niei naw ning.
Lienrashatna rang khan kidit rang a nitjoiawm, avet kha nih naw ning, ajarla adik kha riei rang kanih. Inia tukhat na kiei dieng a imuk ninawkle ijet kha khea niminingna boi rang, arakai kanih.
Khan rekhek a lien chawngrophong jar a kiei na kawrawlawmna boi rang, kataksha shung a riling hi inurupek inih. Makha riling kha kiei hi analo rang a Satan ah put ah palai kha inih.
Mahi na kiei hi namathanna rang, hi chungchang hin Pumi dieng voithum kirudawi inih.

Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Kunumpokmirit hi nang rang ahun inih, ajarla dawkshamna khan karanak hi irupummashak inih.” Khajarkhan kawdawkshamna khan kiei ningaitak a lienrashatna niei rang kanih. Mahi Christa ranak kha kuchung a awmna rang a inih.

Khajarkhan Christa jarbak a kawdawkshamna khan, engshiet thawna khan, karavatna hai khan, epshie a inawthawna u hai khan, kaphairavaina hai khan ningnitna kieniei. Ajarla dawkshamna kieniei phakhan, arat kha kanih.

Lienrashatna kieniei phakhan, kiei avet kha kachang. Thawboithaboi `khat a ninawmawthaw u inih. Ajarla nangni na rieininurumielien u rang a shok inih. Ajarla kiei hi ih kinit joi nawkawm, rashangving tirtawn hai anuk a awm mi`ing.
Diktak a tirtawn `khat kinitna kha na, nang kar ua doiratna kholok le jetna hai khan, rekhekchon hai le chonrekhek hai khan chon ruthaw joi.
Nangni dieng pokrik kurunitna boi ranga kha niboia, ih khan maw biekrup shik hainek a adawk kha nangrunih uh? Mahi dikna boi hin rangaidam nepeh u roh!

Nangni dieng vatna rang, voithum karasham joi. Khan nangni rang pokrik chang naw ning, ajarla nang tah u hai kha kidit nimak a nangni kha kinadit u inih. Ajarla naite hai na nulepa hai rang niei vawm pe naw nih, nulepa hai na naite hai rang a ibawm pengir rang a inih.
Khan nang ratha u rang ningaitak a kiei na sheng rang kanih, khan resheng rang kanih. Kiei na ruphu a numkonopok u joiawm, ravat a kiei hi numnangnopok uh.
Inia nih rosho, nangni kha kiei na pokrik nepeh u mi`ing. Khanikengta hong kiethiei jarkhan, hong a kinushur u inih!
Nangni dieng kivaktir hai kha nemna kinoloina u maw nih?
Titus kha kirumawshawk inih, ku`uliennai kha ama le kivaktir inih. Titus na nangni dieng nemna iloi maw nih? Ra`angre Ratha a aringshom nih u mi`ing maw? Ra`angre kethawt a lawn nih u mi`ing maw?
Takthar a, nang maikung ua karapha u keng, tia nangimining u maw nih? Christa jar a Pathien maikung a kiriei u inih. Inia kunumpok hai, ih kholok hi nang lienna u rang a kithaw u inih.

Ajarla kavat phakhan, kimining ang a kinavakmuk boi u rang a le nangimining u ang a nanginumuk boi rang a tak khan kiei kachi: roshorakhana awmthiei, manarshie awmthiei, mulung hang mawshawkna awmthiei, bing a raphamna awmthiei, ashie chawngrieina awmthiei, mi mieshietna awmthiei, lienrashatna awmthiei, khan reshenna awmthiei.

Khan takthar a, kavat phakhan, kapathien na nang kar ua jak nepekthiei. Mi tampui na matieng a iruthaw u munu hai: rono chon, rejaichon, rejaikawk chon ithaw u ah put ah mulung lekna inieina boi u chung a kumulung kurthiei.
Nangni dieng kava hi voithum changna inih. “Miring idi ninawkle uthum na kungichangna rikip kha chawngcho nih rangnih.”

Matieng khan voidi changna a nangni le kuruawmlai khan kirieimasha inih. Khan tun ka`awm joi nawkawm, matieng a munu ruthaw hai le aliemlim kholok dieng kimiejiek inih: kavaret joiatu, amani kha kiei na hawi naw ning.
Ajarla Christa na kiei dieng chawngirieina rentukna kha nangni na nangtawk uh. Ama kha nangni dieng adawk nimak a nangni dieng arat inih.

Ajarla dawkna khan ama kha cross ling ah ruthat u joiawm, Pathien ranak jar a aring inih. Ajarla kieiniawm ama le adawk kanih uh. Inia Pathien ranak jar a chonkithaw pe u hin ama le aring rang kanih uh.

Takashawn a nangawm u maw nih, iti kha nang nining ua enrete u roh. Nang nining ua rentukna niei u roh. Enretena khan nangcho u nawkatu, Jesu Christa kha nangni dieng awm, iti kha nangijet boi u maw nih?
Inia kieini hi enretena khan cho u mi`ing, iti kha nangjet u rangnih, tia takakawshawn.
Khania nangni na ashie nangthawna boi u rang, Pathien dieng nikna kieniei. Rentuk ang a namalang u rangnih, iti nimak a, nemna boi `khat ang a namalang u joiawm, atha kha nangthawna u rang a inih.
Ajarla adik le re`er a kieini na iawm thaw u mi`ing, inia adik jarbak a kithaw u inih.
Ajarla kieini kadawk ua nangni nangrat u phakhan, ningai kanih uh. Inia nangni nurupummashakna rangawm, kieini na nikna kieniei u inih.
Ajarla rieshietna rang niboia konna rang, Pumi na kiei dieng a inepek cham hi kavat phakhan, herum a korotokna boi rang, a`awm boi `khat a hihaihi nangni dieng a kimiejiek inih.
Mawtawrna a, kuliennai hai, chubai. Rupum u roh, mulungar repeh nana u roh, mulung `khat a awm u roh, lungdamtak a ring u roh, khan numpok le lungdamna apeh Pathien na nangni le awm rangnih.
Riethieng biengrutum kha le khatlekhat chubairawthaw nana u roh.
Miriethieng kholok na chubai nawthaw uh.
Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le Pathien numpok, khan Ratha Riethieng rawlawpna kha nang kholok le awm rosho. Amen.
Miring hai ah put ah le miring jar a niboia, Jesu Christa jar a le athi ah put ah ama rumothoi, apa Pathien jar a tirtawn,
khan kiei le rawtawp uliennai hai kholok le, Galatia Biekrup hai nangni dieng, Paul kiei na kimiejiek inih.
Apa Pathien le kupumi u Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Napathien u le napa u mulungmining dungjuia, tun a ashie rong ah put ah nakhek rang, numunu u jar a rurepeh,
ama dieng kumshawt a alur jawnjai nih rosho. Amen.
Christa numpokmirit jar a nangni anakoipa ah put ah hidawrtak relen a athachawng shik `khat a nangrurawthawt u jarkhan, shindawngna kieniei.
Athachawng shik awm mak, inia miring eshen na nangni kha reheshu a natet jawt uh, khan Christa Athachawng kha rawpawrmashak jawt uh.
Inia kieini kanih ua, ninawkle ravan a ravantirshe nita`awm, kirophong u athachawng le re`er athachawng shik rophong joiatu, pumbawtna nih rosho.
Matieng a kiruriei u kha ang a, tunshe hinawm kirieithep inih, makhala tukhat na niruloisha u kha le re`er athachawng shik norophong pe u joiatu, pumbawtna nih rosho.

Ajarla miring kha maw ninawkle Pathien kha maw tun kiei na kimawkawi? Ninawkle, miring hai dieng a ningnitna kha maw kitawk? Miring hai ningnitna kha kidit nitlai a tu, kiei Christa shok runithiei naw ning.
Khania uliennai hai, nangni dieng mejet jawtna kieniei, makhala kirophong athachawng hi miring ah put ah nimak.
Ajarla miring ah put ah mahi kimuk nimak, khan mi na mahi inuruchukawm nimak, inia Jesu Christa chawngrophong jar a inih.
Ajarla arapalai a Jihudi hai richi a kaw`awmchan kha nangrujet uh, ajeng a Pathien Biekrup kha shawna kurupek, khan makha mathangna rang, kururai.
Khan kuphung shung a koro hai tampui kar a Jihudi hai richi a kururashangmasha inih, khan rekhe a pilepu hai shena dan khan kumulung kururepeh inih.
Inia kunu vawn shung ah nurumadanpa le ama numpokmirit jar a nurukoi Pathien kha ningrunit phakhan,
Phungshik hai dieng athachawng rophongna rang, ashapa kha kiei dieng jong malar. Inia relentak a miring dieng rurawdawn mi`ing.
Khan Jerusalem ah awm kamatieng a tirtawn hai diengawm ruhawng mi`ing. Inia Arabia ah kurushe, khan Damascus ah kurukirret.
Khan kum `thum shole, Jerusalem ah Peter aphah kuruhawng a ama le ni shawmlieirahnga kuruawm.
Inia, Pumi naipangpa James niboia, tirtawn shik rumuh mi`ing.
Khania nangni dieng a kimiejiek hai hi, Pathien maikung a mielieishiei thaw mi`ing.
Khashole Syria le Cilicia ah kurushe.
Inia Judea Biekrup shung a awm Christa takashawn hai kha na kemeh nurujet u mak.
Khania irujet u khatte tu awm, makhala “Arapalai a shawna nurupepa kha na tuntu pha `khat a mathangna rang a irurai takashawnna kha eshem joi.”
Khajarkhan kajar a amani na Pathien kha rumapak uh.
Khan kum shawmlieimili shole, Barnabas le Jerusalem ah kuruhawngret. Titusawm kuruhawng pui.

Chawngrophong jar a kuruhawng, khan Phungshik hai dieng a kirurophong athachawng chungchanga thangkoina kuruniei. Khania nemna boi a atan ninawkle rutansha kha kinitna boi rang, rimingniei hai dieng shikving a thangkoina kuruniei.
Inia kiei le rurawtawp Titus kha Greek nitjoiawm, vunrume`epngir u mak.
Inia kieini hi shok kachangna u rang, uliennai jok hai kha na Christa Jesu jar a ningchamna kiniei u kha tinta rang, muruk a hawng lut uh.
Nangni le athachawng adik kha awmnathiei rang, amani dieng apha bawngteshe rulut u mi`ing.

Inia rimingniei rasha jawt miring hai dieng tu, ikha nita`awm, kiei dieng kairekhena nepeh mak. Ajarla rimingniei miring hai na kiei dieng inurubo pe iawm awm mak. Pathien na miring mai en a chon thaw mak.
Kha le kairekhe a, vunep hai dieng athachawng riei rang, Peter dieng irurotho pui kha ang a, vunep boi hai dieng athachawng riei rang, kiei dieng nurorotho pui joi. Makha amani na rumuk uh.
Ajarla vunep hai dieng a tirtawn rang a Peter chung a chon ruthaw Pathien na kiei diengawm Phungshik hai rang chon iruthaw inih.

Khan rimingniei chawpui hai James, Cephas, khan John, amani na kiei dieng a inurupek numpokmirit kha rujet u `le, kiei le Barnabas Phungshik hai dieng, khan amani vunep hai dieng shena rang, rawlawpna khutchang kha nurupek uh.
Amani chawngben khatte kha tu shara hai kha miningna rang a inih. Kieiawm makhatak kha thawna rang, ngakrala a kuruawm inih.
Khan Peter na Antioch ah vat phakhan, amaikungtak ah kirurodoi pui inih. Ajarla ama kha metek phawm shok inih.
Ajarla James na ijongtir miring eshen vat mala khan, ama na Phungshik hai le shak rushakshom, inia amani vat phakhan, vunep hai kha ruchih a nining a rurakai a rurechen joi.
Khan Jihudi hai eshenawm ama le thanunchan ruthaw uh. Khan Barnabasshe kha amani thanunchan kha na lamrurehemashak.

Inia amani athachawng adik dungjuia awmrachan boi u kha kurumuk phakhan, amani kholok maikung a Peter dieng kuruti, “Nang Jihudi nangnih a Jihudi hai ringdan a ring boi a Phungshik hai ringdan a nangring. Inia ijar a Phungshik hai kha Jihudi hai ringdan a ringna rang, niruep maw nih?
“Kieini hi balamtak a Jihudi kha nanih uh, Phungshik hai kar ah put ah munu miring hai kha nih u makme.

Dan na ikhin chonthaw kha na miring hi imidik ngam nimak, iti kha nejet uh. Khajarkhan Christa dieng takashawn jar a kieini hi nimidikna rang, Jesu Christa kha takanishawn u inih. Makha Dan na ikhin chonthaw jar a nimak a, Christa dieng takanawshawn u jar a inih. Ajarla miring `khatsheawm Dan na ikhin chonthaw kha na midik ngam naw nih.
“Inia Christa jar a nimidikna rang, kieini na natawk phakhan, kieinirilik munu miring hai `khat a nurumuh uh. Christa hi munu thoithaw miring kha maw nih joi? Makha nihet mak!
Kishiet hai kha kiei na karashakthep joiala, kinining a shiet miring kha achang kanih.
Ajarla Pathien dieng kiringnathiei rang, Dan jar a Dan khan kuruthi joi.

Khan Christa le cross ah kuruthichen joi. Aring hi kiei nilai mi`ing, inia Christa na kiei dieng aring kha nih joi. Tun pum a karing hi kiei hi numnurupoh a upumtak rurepeh Pathien Shapa dieng takashawn jar a aring kanih joi.
Pathien numpokmirit kha kiei ishawn boi a thaw mi`ing. Ajarla dikna hi Dan jar a nitjoiatu, Christa kha nemna boi a ruthi inih.”
Aw amawng Galatia miring hai! Adik nangijui boi u hi, tu na inama`am u maw nih? Jesu Christa na Cross ah thitna kha nangmukna u rang, nang kar ua irutar nimak maw?
Dan na ikhin chon hai jar a ninawkle nangirangai u kha takanangshawn u jar a Ratha kha nangimuk u maw nih? Hi ranga hi nangni dieng kejet jawt.
Ijar a mawnghai maw nangnih uh? Ratha a nangruput ua taksha dieng maw mutumna u rawng?
Nemnahet boi nitjoiatu, nemna boi a shawna tampui maw nangdoi uh?
Khajarkhan nangni dieng Ratha napeh ama le nang kar ua chonrekhek athaw ama kha na Dan chonthaw jar a iruthaw maw nih, ninawkle nangirurangai u kha takashawn jar a iruthaw maw nih?
Khatikhan Abraham na “Pathien kha takarushawn jar a midik `khat a irute nih joi.”
Khajarkhan jet u roh, makhala takashawn amani ranga kha Abraham nai hai kha nih uh.

Takashawn ah put ah Pathien na Phungshik hai kha midik rangnih, iti hi Miejiek na rumukmasha jarkhan, Abraham dieng matieng athachawng kha hitihin rurophongmasha, “Nang ah put ah phung kholok na rahvan muk rangnih.”
Khajarkhan takashawn miring hai kha na takarushawn Abraham kha le rahvan muk rangnih.
Dan na ikhin chonthaw kholok pumbotna thoi a awm. Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Dan behangbuk shung ah thaw rang a irumiejiek athaw boi kholok chung a pumbotna awm.”
Khajarkhan Dan na tuteawm Pathien maikung a midik ngam naw nih, iti hi malangsheng inih, ajarla “takashawn jar a adik miring kha ring rangnih.”
Dan kha takashawn ah put ah nimak, inia “amani na ikhin athaw miring kha na amani jar a ring rangnih.”
Kieini nuruhut rang pumbot kha ruchang a, Christa na Dan pumbotna ah put ah nurukhek joi. Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Thing ah imakhai miring rikip pumbotna thoi a awm inih.”
Makha Christa Jesu jar a Abraham rahvan kha Phungshik hai dieng jongna rang le takashawn jar a kieini na Ratha a chawngrakham kha mukna rang a inih.
Uliennai hai, miring shedan kha kiriei inih: miring rawjawtnashe kha`awm menet shole, tute na ipai boi ninawkle ibo boi inih.
Chawngrakham hai kha Abraham dieng le ama Chicha dieng a ipek inih. Ama na tampui jetna, “Chicha hai dieng,” ti mak, inia `khatte jetna, “Nang Chicha dieng,” iti. Makha Christa inih.
