Mahi kiti inih, Pathien na Christa jar a irumenetsha rawjawtna kha kum rajamili shawm `thum shole, ahawng Dan kha na chawngrakham kha chon thaw boi minitna rang, mathang ngam mak.
Ajarla inkoklo kha Dan jar a nitatu, makha chawngrakham jar a nilai mak, inia makha Abraham dieng tu Pathien na chawngrakham jar a irupek inih.
Ijar a Dan kha a`awm maw nih? Chawngirurakhamna amani dieng Chicha kha na va masheng, mahi shietna jar a irubo inih. Mahi ravantir hai jar a palai khut ah chon na irumenet inih.
Palai kha khatte rang a nimak, inia Pathien tu khatte inih.
Khanitala Dan hi Pathien chawngrakham hai kha le re`er maw nih? Makha nihet mak! Ajarla irupek dan `khat hi na ringna pek ngam joiala, dikna kha Dan jar a nihet joi.
Jesu Christa dieng takashawn jar a chawngrakham kha takashawn amani dieng pekna rang, Miejiek na nieinak kholok kha munu thoi a rukhar joi.
Inia takashawn kha jong mala khan kieini hi Dan na nurukhop uh. Takashawn kha Pathien na rophongphit `le, dan kha rurakhar joi.
Khajarkhan takashawn ah put ah niridikmashakna rang, Dan hi Christa tieng nomoroi lamkai kha runih.
Inia takashawn jong joi jarkhan, kieini nomoroipa thoi a awm u lai makme.
Ajarla Christa Jesu dieng nang takashawn u jar a Pathien nai hai kha nangniviek u joi.
Christa dieng baptisma aloi nang kholok na Christa kha pon a nangrieshiei u joi.
Jihudi le Greek awmlai mak, shok le moshok awmlai mak, nupang le apa awmlai mak. Ajarla Christa Jesu jar a nang kholok khatte nangnih u joi.
Khan nangni Christa tah kha nangnih u joi jarkhan, Abraham chicha hai kha nangnih u joi, khan chawngrakham dungjuia koklo hai kha nangnih u joi.
Khan kiei na kieriei makhala koklo kha naite nit lailim, ama kha kholok pumi nitjoiawm, shok le kairekhena awm mak.
Inia apa na irutukmashak apha kha hawng shun malalim, ama kha aenajawn hai le inchonpo hai thoi a awm.
Kieiniawm kha nanih: nanaite changlai khan manmieshie balam khopna khan nuruawm u inih.
Inia apha kha hawng rupum phakhan, nupang ah put ah le Dan thoi a rumoshok a, Pathien na ashapa kha jong tir.
Makha Dan thoi a awm hai kha khekna rang le naimachang kha numukna u rang a inih.
Shapa nangnih u jarkhan, Pathien na ashapa Ratha kha nang mulung ua jong tir a Ratha na “Abba, Kapa,” tia ra`ai.
Khatikhan shok kha nih u lai makche, inia shapa kha nangnih u joi. Shapa kha nangnih u joiatu, Christa jar a Pathien koklo kha nangnih u joi.
Khania Pathien nangrujet boi u lai khan, balam a pathien nih boi hai chon kha nangiruthaw pe u inih.

Inia tun Pathien kha nangjet u shole, shirkhat tieng, Pathien na inurujet u nih joi, itia takthar a adawk, akip boi ruchukna khan kirna rang le amani dieng shok changna rang, nangiminingthep u maw nih?
Nikho le tha, khan pha le kum hai kha nangsher pui uh.
Nangni rang chon kithawsha hi nemna boi maw nih joi, iti hin kachi.
Uliennai hai, kiei hi angna rang, kawnawmawshawk uh, ajarla kieiawm nangni kha a ang kanih. Kiei dieng rehena chonawm nawthaw pe u makche.
Akhat changna a nangni dieng athachawng kururophonglai khan, katak rudam mak, iti kha nangrujet uh.
Kupum shung a lemna hi mitir a napai u makche. Inia Pathien ravantir le Christa Jesu kha ang a nangnuruloi uh.
Nang rahvanmuk u kha imaw nih joi? Initthiei rang a tu, nang mik u kha kaw a amani kha nangnurupek ngam u, iti hi kiei na kungkachang.
Nangni dieng adik kieriei jarkhan, nang rahapui u achang maw kanih joi?
Nangni kha atha a inahawr u nimak, inia naralatmashakna rang, amani kha ninginawmaw`aw u inih.
Kiei na nangni le ka`awm pha ranga hin niboia, pha rikip a atha a ningaw hi atha inih.
Kanai hai, nangni dieng Christa kha moshon malalim, nairo`oi shawna kha kidoithep inih.
Tun hin nangni dieng awm a kehesho tho rang hin kadit, ajarla nang chungchang ua kiei awkchak a ka`awmlai.
Dan thoi a awm jawt miring hai, kiei dieng nieriei u roh, dan kha rangai u makche maw?
Ajarla hitihin miejiek, “Abraham na shapa `di runiei: shoknu le akhat, khan ningchamnu le akhat.
Inia shoknu ah put ah ama kha taksha dungjuia ashok inih, khan ningchamnu ah put ah ama kha chawngrakham jar a inih.
Mahi chawngmeloi inih, ajarla nupang idi kha chawngrepekna idi kha inih. Chawngrepekna `khat kha Sinai Mo ah put ah inih, khan shok achang rang a nai hai kha ieniei. Ama kha Hagar inih.
Ajarla Hagar hi Arabia ah awm Sinai Mo kha inih. Khan mahi tun a Jerusalem hi itina nih joi. Ajarla Jerusalem hi anai hai kha le shok a awm nih joi.
Inia chung a awm Jerusalem kha tu ningcham a awm inih, ama hi nawlawpsheng u nunu u inih.
Ajarla hitihin miejiek: “Ningai roh, nairong, nai bawng boi nu! Ra`ai tana riei roh, Aw rieviei adoi boi nu! Ajarla inkopa nieinu nai hainek a idanu nai hai kha rawpdet.”
Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Isaac kha ang a, kieini hi chawngrakham dungjuia nai hai kha nanih uh.
Inia tunshe hin, khalaia kha ang a taksha dungjuia ashok ama na Ratha a ashok ama kha epshie a thawlai.
Inia Miejiek na imaw ieriei? “Shoknu le ashapa kha nawt roh, ajarla shoknu shapa kha na ningchamnu shapa kha le koklo changthiei naw nih.”
Hijarhin uliennai hai, kieini hi shoknu nai hai kha nih u makme, inia ningchamnu nai hai kha nanih uh.
Khajarkhan Christa na nomoshok ua ningchamna kha nepek joi, makhan dingrep u roh. Shok ringkaw kha na inokhopthep kha nih u lai naw roh.
Enro, nangni dieng Paul kiei na kieriei makhala nangni na vunnangep u joiatu, Christa kha nangni rang iawm nemna awm naw nih.
Khajarkhan takthar a nangni dieng kungkachang makhala vunep miring rikip na Dan kholok jui rang a itonchip nih joi.
Dan a ridik hai nangni kha Christa na chon ithawna boi le numpokmirit ah put ah acho miring kha nangnih u joi.
Ajarla Ratha jar a takashawn a dikna ngakmining kha kieini na ningak u inih.
Ajarla Christa Jesu dieng vunep vunep boi na chonithaw nimak a, numpok jar a takashawn chon athaw kha na chonithaw inih.
Thatak a nangrutan u joi. Adik kha juina boi rang, tu na inurukhar u maw nih?
Makha mawkawina kha anakoipa ama ah put ah nimak.
Chawh lekte na jam kholok rakangmashakviek.
Pumi riming a kanarangam pui uh, nangni na shik mining u naw tinih. Tunitjoiawm nawmawshaw u hai kha na chawngshatna kha ruput rangnih.
Inia uliennai hai, vunepna chawng kha kishem nilai a la, ijar a kiei hi shawrieviei inepek u maw nilai? Khajarkhan cross jar a keruthuina kha imathang nih joi.
Awi e, nangni nerehemashak hai kha nining ua rurechenving uala naw!
Ajarla, uliennai hai, ningchamna mun khan nurukoi u joi, makha taksha chanthatna rang tu rotokna u naw roh, inia numpok jar a khatlekhat rang chon thaw u roh.
Ajarla Dan kholok kha chawng `khat a ruchun, “Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak kha ang a numnangipok rang a inih.”
Inia nangni khatlekhat nangreke nana ua, khan nang rashah nana uatu, riring u roh, khanawkatu nangni khatlekhat nangmathang nanaviek u rangnih!
Inia kieriei, Ratha a ring u roh, khan taksha ditrekhe a rupummashak u naw roh.
Ajarla taksha na Ratha chung a, khan Ratha na taksha chung a ama ditrekhena kha ieniei. Ajarla hihaihi khatlekhat chung a re`er inih. Mahi na nangidit u kha nawmawthaw u mak.
Inia Ratha na lamnakai pe u joiatu, Dan thoi khan awm u lai makche.
Khan taksha chon hai kha amalar, makhala: uire, rejai, riethieng boi, rejaikawk,
rilim chubaibawk, dawileai chon thaw, mukmakna, rahana, vanhatna, mulung hang rekhe, bingriei mulung niei, reshenrokhoi, lawpreshen hai,

manarshie, mithat, jukhawp, lawp a shakshah rat miring, khan hi ang chonthaw hai, hihaihi inih. Matieng a kinieriei u kha ang a tunawm kirieimasha u inih, kha ang athaw miring hai kha na Pathien rengchangna kha tum ngam naw nih.
Inia Ratha ara kha tu numpok, mulungparna, lungdamna, adoirat, numpokthiei, nunrenem, atha, takashawn,
pum khop ngam: hihai chung a dan awm mak.
Christa dieng a awm miring hai kha na tu taksha kha ditrekhe chon le takjatna kholok le cross ah iruthat nih joi.
Kieini na Ratha a naring jarkhan, Ratha a aring rang a nanih uh.
Nining a mapak nana kha nih u naw rawi, khan akhat chung a rahana pek le khatlekhat chung a manarshie miring kha nih u naw rawi.
Uliennai hai, miring `khat na shietna ithaw nangshur u joiatu, rathalam miring nangni na renem a vak mikir u roh. Nang nining ua`awm riring u roh, khanawkatu nangniawm nelemthiei uh.
Khatlekhat pokrik khan rashan u roh. Khatikhan Christa dan kha rupummashak u roh.
Iawm nih boi miring `khat na mi `khat kanih, tia imining joiatu, nining a mohon nana inih.
Inia mi rikip na ama chontak kha enrete rosho. Tukhat chon kha le rakam boi a, ama chon ranga khan lienrasha rosho.
Ajarla mi rikip na ama pokrik ranga kha phung rangnih.
Chawng chungchanga ruchuh ama kha na miruchuh ama kha le nieinak atha kholok kha ireshem pui rang a inih.
Inomohon u kha chang u naw roh. Pathien hi eshethiei nimak. Ajarla ivawrivawr kha rawkhawm rangnih.
Ama munuphung awmchantak a avawr ama kha na munuphung awmchan ah put ah thangna kha rawkhawm rangnih, khan Ratha a avawr ama kha na Ratha ah put ah kumshawt ringna kha rawkhawm rangnih.
Atha thaw khan ngawk u naw rawi, ajarla nawrawngawi u nawkatu, pha rutukthep a nawrawkhawm u rangnih.
Apha ahoi nimuk u le roroia, mi kholok dieng le, khinniei a takashawn inshungkhur a awm hai dieng atha thaw u rawi.
Khan kukhuttak na khutjem lienpui le nangni dieng kimiejiek hi en u roh!
Christa cross jar a epshawna nangrawtawng puina boi rang, vailar a alar jawt mi hai kha na nangni kha vunep rang inuruep u inih.
Ajarla vunep haishe na`awm Dan kha jui u mak. Inia nang pum ua lienrashatnathiei rang, nangni kha vunineme`ep jawt u inih.
Nupumi u Jesu Christa cross ranga khan niboia, kiei lienrashatna nieihet mi`ing. Mahi jar a manmieshie hi kiei dieng, khan kiei hi manmieshie dieng athi nih joi.
Ajarla Christa jar a vunep vunep boi kha na nemna niei mak a, khutkon athar ranga kha na nemna iniei inih.
Khana mahi shena dungjuia aring kholok chung a le Pathien Israel chung a lungdamna le roihoina kha awm rosho.
Tun ah put ah tute na kiei hi nawmawshawlai naw rosho, ajarla kupum ah Pumi Jesu phaitar kha kawchawi joi.
Uliennai hai, nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang ratha u le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Pathien mulungmining jar a Jesu Christa tirtawn, Paul kiei na Ephesus ah awm miriethieng hai le Jesu Christa maikung a takashawn rang a rutuk miring hai dieng kiemiejiek.
Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho.
Christa jar a ravan mun a rathalam rahvan kholok le rahvan napeh nupumi Jesu Christa Apa Pathien kha mapak chang rosho.
Mahi manmieshie phun mala a kieini hi Christa jar a inurumadan u dungjuia inih. Mahi numpok jar a ama maikung a riethieng le mieshietna awm boi miring ninitna u rang a inih.
Jesu Christa jar a ama dieng shapa inamachangna shung khan, kieini hi inurumuchuksha inih. Mahi ningnitna mulungmining dungjuia iruthaw inih.
Mahi ama numpokmirit lurna mapakna rang a inih. Ama na mahi numpokmirit hi Numipok ama jar a kieini dieng manboi a nurupek joi.
Ama thishen jar a rekhekna kha ama dieng nieniei u joi. Makha ama numpokmirit rawchawngna dungjuia shietna rangaidamna kha inih.
Makha numpokmirit kha kieini rang a imupung inih. Shingna le thieina kholok le
Ama mulungmining murukchawng kha kieini dieng nemejet joi. Makha Christa dieng ama na masha a irumuchuk ama ningnitna dungjuia inih.
Khan rong kha hawng rupum a ama na ravan le rieliei a awm nieinak kholok kha Christa dieng khatte a ruchunmashakna rang a chonrashak inih.
Nieinak kholok kha ama mulungmining a renirutuk dungjuia iruthaw ama chonmuchuk dungjuia muchuksha jar a inkoklo kha kieini na ama ah put ah nutum u joi.
Christa dieng ngakmining runieisha kieini na ama lurna kha mapakna rang, hihai kholok hi iruthaw inih.
Adik chawng, makhala nang shandamna u athachawng kha nangrurangai u shole, takanangrushawn ua, chawngirurakham Ratha Riethieng kha le Christa jar a nangni dieng jetrunam joi.
Pathien na iniei miring hai kha khekna niei malalim, Ratha Riethieng hi nokoklo u rang a rentukna kha inih. Mahi ama lurna kha mapakna rang a inih.
Pumi Jesu dieng nang takashawn u le miriethieng hai kholok chung a nang numpok u kha kurujet joi.
Khajarkhan kinikna rikip a kanaban u phakhan, nangni rang Pathien kha amapak chat mi`ing.
Nupumi Jesu Christa Pathien, lurna apa kha na varna le chawngrophong Ratha kha inepek u nih rosho. Ama kha nangjetna u rang nikna kieniei.
Nang mulung u mik kha var rosho. Makha Pathien na inokoina u ngakmining khan miriethieng hai kar a koklo alur rawchawngna kha nangjetna u rang a inih.
Makha ama takashawn hai kieini dieng a awm danlakngam boi ama ranak kha nangjetna u rang a inih. Mahi ranak hi Pathien ranak alien chonthaw dungjuia inih.
Pathien na Christa dieng iruthaw khala, ama kha athi ah put ah irumothoi, khan ravan mun ah ama khutchang tieng irumushut kha inih.

Pathien na ama kha rampokna kholok, cham kholok, ranak kholok, Pumi changna kholok, khan ipho riming kholok riming chung a hi rongte hin niboia, ajong rang a rong rangshe hin rashangtak a rumushut joi.
Nieinak kholok ama ke thoi ah rutet, khan biekrup rang a nieinak kholok lu changna kha ama dieng rupek joi.
Biekrup hi Christa pum kha inih, khan lam rikip a le irikip a miship ama rupumna kha inih.
Matienglai khan nangni shietna le munu jar a ruthi nangnih uh.
Khalai khan nangni mahi manmieshie shena dungjuia le muntawng a awm ranak rampopa dungjuia nangruring uh. Ama kha tun a chawngrangai boi shapa hai dieng a chonthaw ratha kha inih.
Pha `khat khan kieiniawm taksha ditrekhe a amani le nuruawm uh. Taksha khan mining ditrekhena kha nurujui uh. Khan eshen hai kha ang a, balam a lunghangna amungir rang a nai hai kha nuruchang uh.
Inia Pathien hi roihoi a rawchawng inih, ajarla numpok alien kha le kieini hi numinurupok inih.
Kieini hi shietna jar a nuruthi u laitak khan, Christa le nurumiringchen u joi. Numpokmirit jar a nangni kha nashan joi.
Khajarkhan Pathien na kieini hi nurumothoichen a Christa Jesu le ravan mun hai khan nurumushutchen joi.
Makha Christa Jesu jar a, ajong rang a rong hin, ama numpokmirit danlakngam boi rawchawngna kha ninghoina le nuchung ua malarna rang a inih.
Ajarla Pathien ah put ah numpokmirit jar a nang takashawn kha le shandamna kha nangmuk u joi. Makha nangni ah put ah nimak a Pathien khutchawi kha inih.
Makha chon hai jar a nimak a tute na lienrashatna boi rang a inih.
Ajarla kieini hi Pathien khutkon kha nanih. Christa Jesu jar a, ama na irurashamsha chon atha hai kha thawna rang, inurukon u inih. Makha amani dieng khan niringna u rang a inih.

Khajarkhan pha `khat a nang ringchangna u kha Phungshik kha nangrunih u, iti kha mininghep u roh. Vunep miring kanih ati hai kha na nangni kha vunep boi miring nuruti uh. Vunep, iti kha miring khut hai kha na pum chung a iruthaw chon inih.
Ajarla khalai khan Christa aniei boi, Israel khomi changna a mejet boi, chawngrakham chawngrepekna hai khan milak, ngakmining niei boi le manmieshie shung a Pathien niei boi miring kha nangrunih uh.
Inia tuntu Christa Jesu tah kha nangchang u joi. Pha `khat a arala a nangruawm u kha Christa thishen jar a Pathien na ama le naranaimashak joi.
Ajarla amatak kha nulungdamna u kha inih. Ama na alai a awm reshenna bang kha leklek a khoi a idi kha khatte machang joi.

Ama taksha khan rahana kha rumathang joi. Makha chawngchona hai shung a awm Dan chawngpek hai kha inih. Makha nining a idi kha miring `thar niminitna rang a inih. Khatikhan ama na riengieina kha kon joi.
Makha dire kha Pathien dieng pum `khat a cross jar a riengieimashak a makha rahana kha thatna rang a inih.
Khan ala le anai a ruawm nangni dieng lungdamna chawng kha ashem va joi.
Ajarla ama jar a kieini dire hi napa dieng Ratha `khatte a lutna kha nieniei u joi.
Khajarkhan tuntu nangni milak le khotang kha nih u lai makche, inia miriethieng hai le khoshung miring, khan Pathien inshung kha nangnih u joi.
Jesu Christatak kha runiei lung kha nit jarkhan, nangni tirtawn hai le thiempulien hai na iphun chung khan innangirashak u nih joi.
Ama dieng iruchunlap in kholok kha Pumi jar a riethiengmun riethieng kha hawng chang inih.
Ratha jar a Pathien awmna rang nangni kha ama dieng inarashakchen u nih joi. Phungshik hai dieng
Hijarhin Paul kiei hi Phungshik nangni rangbak a Jesu Christa surkhop miring kha kanih joi.
Nangni rang kiei dieng a inepek Pathien numpokmirit reshepna kha nangjethet u joi.
Matienglai a shampeng a kirumiejiek kha ang a, murukchawng kha kiei dieng chawngrophong a nemejet joi, iti kha nangrujet uh.
Makha nangte u phakhan, Christa murukchawng kijetna kha nangjet ngam u rangnih.
Makha tun a ama tirtawn le thiempulien riethieng hai dieng Ratha jar a irophong hi ang a, rong `shik shapa hai dieng rumejet mak.
Makhala Phungshik hai hi Christa jar a le athachawng jar a kokloshom, pum `khat a ruchunshom, khan ama chawngrakham kha reshemshom kha nih u joi.
Athachawng jar a, Pathien numpokmirit khutchawi dungjuia shepding kanih joi. Mahi numpokmirit hi Pathien ranak chonthaw dungjuia kiei dieng a inurupek inih.
Miriethieng hai kholok kar a adawkving kiei dieng hin mahi numpokmirit hi nepek joi. Makha thirngam boi Christa rawchawngna kha Phungshik hai dieng rophongna rang a inih.
Makha Christa jar a nieinak kholok akon Pathien dieng a rongrong a rethe murukchawng ruchunna kha mi kholok na mukna rang a inih.
Biekrup jar a, thotho a awm Pathien shingna kha, ravan mun a awm rampo hai le chamniei hai dieng tun mejetna rang a inih.
Mahi nupumi Jesu Christa jar a kumshawt chonmuchuk dungjuia iruthawna inih.
Christa jar a le ama dieng natakashawn u jar a rangamna le lungartak a Pathien dieng lutna niniei u inih.
Khajarkhan nangni rang kawshawna khan mulung rakaimashak u naw roh, tia kenengen uh. Amani kha nangni rang a lurna kha inih.
Hijarhin nupumi Jesu Christa Apa dieng rukhuk shun a kabu.
Pathien dieng hin ravan le rieliei a inloh rikip riming phona awm.
Makha ama rawchawng lurna dungjuia nangni dieng nepeknathiei rang le aratha jar a ranak le nang miring rieirit kha maratna rang a inih.
Khan Christa na takashawn jar a nang mulung shung ua awmnathiei rang le numpok shung khan rujung nangmeshena u rang a inih.
Makha na miriethieng hai kholok le Christa numpok dung le khang, rashang le athuk chungchanga nangjetna ngam u rang a inih.
Khan jetna kholok akhe Christa numpok kha nangjetnathiei u rang, Pathien shingna kholok le nangni kha nimishipna u rang a inih.
Kieini dieng chon thaw ama ranak dungjuia kieini na nirawdawn u ninawkle nimining u nek a ruphu a Pathien na chonthaw ngam.
Christa Jesu jar a biekrup hin kumshawt a rongrong dieng ama lurna kha awm nih rosho. Amen.
Khajarkhan Pumi jar a shurkhop a awm kiei na inokoina rutukthep khan ringna rang, kenengen uh, ajarla Pathien na makha le inurukoi u inih.
Nunrenem, mulung raw`awi, khan doiratna kholok le numpok jar a khatlekhat rashan nana u roh.
Inumushuina u lungdamna khan Ratha jar a mulung rushukna kha tetna rang, enchak a thaw u roh.
Pathien na ngakmining `khat khan inurukoi u tak kha ang a, pum `khat le Ratha `khat awm.
Pumi `khat, takashawn `khat khan baptisma loina `khat awm.
Pathien `khat hi kholok apa inih. Ama hi kholok chung a le kholok jar a nang kholok dieng a`awm inih.
Christa khutchawi danlak dungjuia numpokmirit kha mi rikip dieng nurupek joi.
Khajarkhan ama na ruti, “Arashang a rurawlawm phakhan, lungroko kha lungroko shung ah ruthong a miring hai dieng khutchawi rupek joi.”
Rapapek a rieliei thoi a rurede ama kha, rurawlawm ama kha keng, iti hi nithiei nih maw?
Nieinak kholok mishipnathiei rang, rurede ama kha, ravan kholok chung a rurawlawm ama kha inih.

Irupek khutchawi hai khala, eshen dieng tirtawn hai nitna rang, eshen dieng thiempulien hai nitna rang, eshen dieng chawngshem hai nitna rang, eshen dieng kengamroi hai le oja chonthaw hai nitna rang, hihaihi inih.
Makha Pathien chon rang le Christa pum kha mothoina rang, miriethieng hai kha rupummashakna rang a inih.
Makha nokholok na takashawn ruchunna le Pathien Shapa jetna khan nashok masheng irupek inih. Khan nokholok na Christa rupumna danlak shipmer khan pashalak miring minit masheng irupek inih.
Kieini hi ruchukna rithi rikip na miring radaina khan mohonna chonrashak hai kha na shehawng a inawng naite hai kha nih u lai makche.
Inia numpok jar a adik kha kawrep a, lam rikip a ama dieng rawshawnna rang a nih rosho. Mahi ulu hi Christa hi inih.
Ama ah put ah pum kholok ruchun a arang rikip kha rushuichip a imenet inih. Lek rikip na thatak a chonithaw le roroia nining a irashak a upum kha numpok a irawshawnmashak inih.
Khajarkhan Pumi riming a mahi kiriei a kungachang kanih. Makhala Phungshik hai, amani arok nunchan a aring ang a, nangni aring boi rang a nangnih u joi.
Amani dieng jetna boi a`awm le amani mulung michim jar a jetna kha rumijing pe uh, khan Pathien na ipek ringkho ah put ah riephiei ruchang uh.
Amani na jak jet boi a rejaikawk chon khan rurepeh uh, khan rono chon rikip thawna rang khan rurapham uh.
Inia Christa kha khatikhan rutawk u makche.
Jesu dieng adik a`awm kha ang a, ama kha nangruloi ua ama rishim kha nururuchuk u joi.
Milem ditrekhe dungjuia matieng a pawrche ringkholui awmchan kha pai u roh.
Khan nang mulungmining u ratha khan athar kha chang u roh.
Khan adik dikna le riethieng a Pathien na emeh dungjuitak a ikon miring `thar kha rieshiei u roh.
Makha rang khan dikboina kha pai u tana “Miring rikip na ringchangpui le adik kha riei u roh,” ajarla kieini hi aringshom nanih u inih.
“Munu thaw boi a shang u roh.” Nang mulung hangna u khan ni tah naw rosho.
Raikho rang khan mun peh u naw roh.
Murushah hai kha na murulai naw rosho. Kha ruhut a chon thaw rieshie rangai miring le reshem rang, atha kha thaw rosho.
Turniei chawng kha nang ner uah put ah vak shok naw rosho, inia mothoina rang a nemna kha, rangai dungjuia riei u roh. Makha rangai hai dieng khan numpokmirit kha peknathiei rang a inih.
Khan Pathien Ratha Riethieng kha mawshaw u naw roh. Ama kha Pathien na inakhekna rang a Nikho rang khan nangni dieng jetirunam kha inih.
Mulung akha, ashang, lunghang, hareshawng khan mieshietna kholok kha ashie rikip kha le nangni ah put ah pai u roh.
Inia Pathien na Christa jar a inarangaidam u kha ang a, khatlekhat dieng ninghoi, mulung renem, khan khatlekhat chung a rangaidam repethiei kha chang u roh.
Khajarkhan numipok naite hai kha ang a, Pathien nunchan ruchuh miring kha nih u roh.
Christa na kieini hi numinopok a kieini rang nining a rurepeh kha ang a, numpok aship ringkho khan ring u roh. Makha Pathien dieng a pek rawthawina manamhoi kha inih.
Inia rejai le riethieng boi kholok ninawkle raphamna kha tute na nang kar ua irimingshe ban naw rosho. Makha miriethieng hai rang a awmchan rohoi kha inih.
Khan chawngtar le vetchawng ninawkle aracha boi chawngmejer ruhut a mapakna chawng kha riei u roh.
Hijarhin nangjet uh, makhala rejai ninawkle mirono ninawkle phamrai athaw miring, rilim abieh miring hihaihi na Christa le Pathien rengchangna shung a inkoklo kha tum ngam naw nih.
Tute na nangni kha hongchawng le nelem u naw rosho. Ajarla hijarhin Pathien lunghangna kha chawng rangai boi hai dieng ajong inih.
Khajarkhan amani le chonthawshom hai kha chang u naw roh.
Ajarla matienglai khan ajing kha nangrunih uh. Inia tuntu Pumi jar a mieivar kha nangnih u joi. Mieivar kha ang a ring u roh.
Ajarla Ratha ara kha tu atha, dikna le adik rikip kha inih.
Pumi maikung a ningnitroi chon kha mumuk u roh.
Khan ara boi ajing chonthaw miring hai kha ringruchun pui u naw roh. Kha ruhut a rawkawk u roh.
Amani na muruk a ithaw u hai kha riei rangshe jaknaroi inih.
Inia rawkawkna kholok kha mieivar na imalar inih, ajarla imalar rikip kha mieivar inih.
Khajarkhan ama na iti, “Che u rang roh, aja miring hai! Athi ah put ah thoi u rang roh, khan Christa na anaeh u rangnih.”
Khajarkhan mimawng hai kha ang a niboia, ashing miring hai kha ang a, riringtak a ring u roh.
Apha kha thatak a rotokna u roh, ajarla nikho hai hi thalai mak.
Hijarhin amawng kha nih u naw roh, inia Pumi mulungmining kha imaw nih, iti kha jet u roh.
Ju khawp u naw roh, makha mitiroi inih. Inia Ratha kha le nimiship u rosho.
Pathien lah le, Biekrup lah le khan Rathalam lah le nangni khatlekhat rashai u tana, nang mulung ua Pumi kha mapakna lah le awi u roh.
Nupumi u Jesu Christa riming a pha rikip a irikip rang Apa Pathien dieng mapakna niei u roh.
Pathien kha chih a khatlekhat awnoi a awm u roh.
Nupui hai, Pumi awnoi a nangawm u kha ang a, nang param hai awnoi a awm u roh.
Ajarla Christa hi Biekrup lu anih hi ang a, param hai hi nupui hai lu inih. Khan Christa hi pum Shandampa kha inih.
Khajarkhan biekrup na Christa dieng thoirede kha ang a, nupui hai na`awm amani paramtak hai dieng thoirede u rosho.
Param hai, Christa na`awm biekrup numipok a nining a ama ruhut a rurepeh kha ang a, nang nupui hai kha numpoh u roh.
Makha chawng jar a tui le rushuk shole, ama kha riethiengmashak a machaina rang a inih.
Khan biekrup alur `khat, shebe boi, ninawkle irikin boi, ninawkle kha le ra`ang, inia riethieng le mieshiet boi amatak dieng malarna rang a inih.
Khatikhan param hai na unupui hai kha amani pumtak ang a, numipok u rang a shok. Khajarkhan unupuitak numapoh kha nining a numropoh inih.
Ajarla upumtak amumak tute awm mak, inia Pumi na Biekrup dieng iruthaw kha ang a, makha ivai a irielien inih.
Ajarla kieini hi ama pum, ama taksha, ama ru hai pasha hai kha nanih uh.
“Hijarhin miring kha na unulepa kha mak rangnih, khan ama inkonu dieng ruchun rangnih, khan idi kha taksha `khat chang rangnih.”
Mahi murukchawng alientak inih, inia Christa le biekrup jar a kiti inih.
Khanikengta mi rikip na ama inkonutak kha amatak kha ang a khatikhan numpoh rosho. Khan inkonu na`awm inkopa kha richit peh rosho.
Naite hai, Pumi jar a nang nulepa chawng kha rangai u roh, ajarla mahi dikna kha inih.
“Nangnu le nangpa kha richit peh u roh,” makha chawngrakham le roroia, akhat changna chawngpek kha inih.
“Makha nangni rang hoina le rieliei chung a ringshawtna kha nih rangnih.”
Khan apa hai, nang nai hai kha ningmieshiet pe u naw roh, khania Pumi chawngrachakna kha le riji u roh.
Shok hai, rieliei ichatna dungjuia, Christa dieng a nangithaw u kha ang a, mulungkiptak a le chitnieitak a rieliei a nang pumi hai chawng kha jui u roh.
Miring hai mik`en a ningnitna ang boi a, Christa shok hai, mulung rieirit ah put ah Pathien mulungmining athaw kha nih u roh.
Miring hai dieng a nangithaw u kha ang boi a, Pumi dieng a nangithaw u kha ang a, mulungluttak a chon thaw u roh.
Ajarla ih kha nita`awm atha kha nangithaw u nitjoiatu, shok nit a moshok nita`awm, Pumi ah put ah makhatak kha man rangnih.
Khan pumpa hai, nang Pumi u takawm ravan a awm, khan ama dieng engshietenlar awm mak, iti kha jet u tana, makhatak kha, amani dieng michit boi a thaw u roh.
Dawngkhit a, kuliennai hai, Pumi jar a le ama ratna ranak a arat kha nih u roh.
Diabol mohonna maton a nangdingna ngam u rang, Pathien rapon kha mawkawp u roh.
Ajarla kieini hi taksha, khan thishen le robon nih u makme, inia ranakniei hai le chamniei hai, mahi ajing manmieshie apoh hai, ravan mun a rathalam ashie hai le inih.
Khajarkhan ashie nikho hai hin nang dingna ngam u rang le kholok mawtawrviek a dingna rang, Pathien rapon kha mawkawp u roh.
Khajarkhan adik kha kawngkhit a nangikhit u le roroia, dikna phaw kha mawkawp u tana nettak a ding u roh.
Nangrashamna u rang, lungdamna apeh athachawng kha le nangke u kha thawp u roh.
Chungchon a takashawn phaw kha loi u tana makhan ashie miring ah put ah ivakkap mieichong tharu kholok kha nangthat ngam u rangnih.
Khan shandamna ralukhum kha rukhu u roh. Khan ratha chemjam kha`awm rak u roh, makha Pathien chawng inih.
Mahin Ratha jar a pha rikip a nikna le irikip chung a rieina niei u roh. Doiratna le rieina kholok le, miriethieng hai kholok ruhut a, riring u roh.
Khan athachawng murukchawng kha mulung ngar`er a rophongna rang, chawngrieina nepeknathiei rang, kiei rangawm ninik pe u roh.
Mahi rang hin khoplam a ruhuttir kha kanih. Kiei na kirieingir rang a kha mulung ngar`er a kierieina rang, ninik pe u roh.
Inia kiei dieng a ashok chon hi nangni na`awm nangjetna u rang, kunumpok kanaipangpa le Pumi dieng a mulung repeh shepding, Tychicus ama na irikip kha nangni dieng nemejet u rangnih.
Kieini dieng ashok chon nangjetna u rang le nang mulung u kha numuchumna pe rangbak khan a, nangni dieng kivaktir inih.
Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah lungdamna le khan numpok le rawtawp takashawn kha uliennai hai dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Mulunglut a nupumi Jesu Christa numapoh mi kholok dieng numpokmirit kha na chatboi a nawawm pui u rosho. Amen.
Jesu Christa jar a Philippi ah awm miriethieng hai, kengamroi hai le deacon hai kholok dieng Jesu Christa shok hai, Timothy le Paul kieini na kimiejiek u inih.
Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng inepek u nih rosho.
Kinimininghepna u pha rikip a Pathien kha kamapak.
Nang kholok rang kinikna rikip a mulung parlamrok a kinik.
Athachawng jar a nangringruchun u putna ah put ah tunshe hin mapakna kieniei.
Nangni dieng chon atha ruput mi kha na Jesu Christa Nikhoshe khan rupummashak rangnih. Mahitak hin kirangam pui kha awm.

Nangni kumulung shung ua nangawm u jarkhan, hitihin a nang lawpsheng u jar a kimining hi kidikna inih. Ajarla kurukhumna le kirodoipuina dire a le athachawng kimuchukna khan numpokmirit kha kiei le nangitumshom u inih.
Ajarla Pathien hi kiei rang a kungchang kha inih, makhala Jesu Christa lainatna kha le khadawrshe khan kanarangai uh.
Khajarkhan nang numpok u kha jetna le thieina kholok a liekliek a lien shishitna rang, nikna kha kieniei.
Khajarkhan makha Christa nikho rang khan minek a athadet nieinak hai kha nangmumukna u rang, metek boi le atha kha nangnitna u rang a inih.
Ajarla Pathien na Jesu Christa jar a dikna ara hai kha le nimiship u joi. Khajarkhan miring hai na Pathien kha mulur a mapak uh.
Inia uliennai hai, kiei dieng a ashok chon hai kholok hi na athachawng kha irurajarmashak inih, iti hi nangni dieng kinemejet jawt u inih.
Khajarkhan lungroko ah kurukhum hi Christa jar a inih, iti hi Praetorium kholok ah le mun tieitang kholok ah hawng malang joi.
Khan Pumi jar a uliennai hai arawplam na kurukhumna khan rangamna niei uh, khan chih boi a chawngriei rang, mulung ngar shishitna niei uh.
Eshen na Christa kha mukmakna le rahana jar a rophong uh, khan eshen na mulung dik jar a rophong uh.
Matieng a hai kha na mulung dik a nih boi, inia bingrieina jar a Christa kha rophong uh. Amani na kurukhumna khan shawna kobo ngam u, tia rumining uh.
Anuk a hai kha na athachawng kodoi pui jar a inih, iti jet u jarkhan, numpok jar a eshem uh.
Khanitala imaw nih? Ih khan nitjoiawm, hong a nit a adik a nitjoiawm, Christa kha eshem uh. Makhan kiningai, awh, kiei na ningai rang kanih.
Ajarla nangininikna pe u le Christa Jesu Ratha vaina jar a mahi kashandamna kha chang rangnih joi, iti hi kejet.
Kingakrala le kangakmining dungjuia, makhan jakna lekshe niei naw ning, inia mulungar`er a pha rikip a, khan tunawm, aring a nit a athi a nita`awm, Christa kha kupum shung hin mielien rangnih.
Ajarla kiei rang tu aring hi Christa kha inih, khan athi hi nemna kha inih.
Inia pum a karing joiatu, makha kochonthaw ara rawpna rang a inih, nitjoiawm imaw kimadan rang, kiei jet mi`ing.
Kiei hi idi na nachep joi: rechen a Christa le ka`awm jawtdet joi, makha inekinek a athadet inih.
Inia aring a ka`awm rang a hi nangni rang rangai detlai.
Mahi na narangammashak, ajarla nang mashena u rang le takashawn a nang ningaina u rang, nang kholok le awm a dawn she rang kanilai, iti hi kejet.
Khajarkhan nangni dieng kavaret rang a hi, Jesu Christa jar a, kiei dieng nang lienrashatna u kha liendet rangnih.

Jesu Christa athachawng kha le rutukthep a ring u roh. Nangni aen kava ninawkle karangah joiawm, nang jar u jet rang kanih. Khajarkhan mulung `khat a athachawng a takashawn khan rojo shomna rang, Ratha `khat a ding u roh.
Khan nangni norodoi pui hai kha chih u naw roh. Mahi na athangna u rang a jetna kha inih. Inia nangni rang tu makha Pathien ah put ah shandamna kha nih rangnih.
Ajarla nangni Christa ruhut rang Pathien na nepek u joi, makhala Christa dieng takashawn ranga kha niboia, ama rangawm ashaw rang a nangnih u joi.
Kiei dieng a nangimuk u shawnatak kha doi u roh. Tunawm shawna kidoi a ka`awm nangijet u hi inih.
Khajarkhan Christa jar a mawshawkna kha awm jarkhan, numpok ah put ah jong maw`awina kha awm jarkhan, Ratha le ringruchunna kha awm jarkhan, mulungshitna le roihoina kha awm jarkhan,
makha mulungminingtak kha le, makha numpoktak kha le, makha Ratha ruchunna kha le mulung `khat niei u tana kiningaina kha nimikip pe u roh.
Bingrieina ninawkle nemna boi mapakna dungjuia chon kha thaw u naw roh, inia mining rede a shik miring hai kha nangninek a thadet, tia mining u roh.
Nangidit u ranga khan mulungrepeh u naw roh, inia shik hai idit rangawm mulungrepeh u roh.
Mahi mulungmining hi nangni dieng awm rosho, ajarla mahi Christa diengawm a`awm inih.
Ama hi Pathien meh ah ruawm nitjoiawm, Pathien le ra`angna kha shurna rang, rumining mak.
Inia nining a rurorok a shok meh ruloi, khan miring meh a jong shok.
Khan miring nitna khan ama na nining a rurede, khan cross ah thitnashe khan chawngjui a ruthi.
Khajarkhan Pathien na ama kha rashangtak a rulawm a riming rikip chung a riming kha ama dieng rupek.
Makha Jesu riming khan ravan le rieliei, khan rieliei thoi a awm kholok na rukhuk shun a buna rang a inih.
Khan mieliei rikip na Apa Pathien lurna rang, Jesu Christa hi Pumi inih, tia rophongna rang a inih.

Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, kaw`awmlaite hin niboia, arawplam a koboriethieishe khanawm, pha rikip a kawchawng kha nangrujui uh. Kha ang a nang shandamna u kha chon a shena rang, chit le rawnawklam a chon thaw u roh.
Ajarla ama ningnitna rangbak mining a chon thawna rang a nang kar ua chonathaw kha Pathien inih.
Rieishiet boi a le chawngrieshiet boi a chon kholok thaw u roh.

Makha nangni nawng boi le ariempeng nangnitna u rang a inih. Khan mahi hongthaw, pawrche rong kar hin, metek boi Pathien nai hai kha nangnitna u rang a inih. Khan amani kar khan manmieshie shung a arshi hai ang a nangvarna u rang a inih.
Khan ringna chawng kha mukuirep u roh. Makha kiei hi nemna boi a tanrieshiet rutan le nemna boi a chon thaw ruchang mi`ing, tia Christa Nikho khan lienrashatna kienieina rang a inih.
Inia Pathien na kiei hi rawthawina le nang takashawn u chonmun khan tuinapaina joiawm kiningai, khan nangni le kiningaishom.
Makha chonmuntak khan ningai u tana kiei le ningaishom u roh.
Timothy kha nangni dieng kavaktirrelenna rang, Pumi Jesu jar a ngakkimining. Makha nang jar u kejet `le, lungar nepekna rang a inih.
Mulungluttak a nangni kha tennareh rang ama le ra`ang miring shik niei mi`ing.
Ajarla Jesu Christa rang tawk boi a kholok na amani ranga rang atawk uh.
Shapa `khat na apa dieng chonithaw kha ang a, kiei le athachawng rang chonthawshom inih. Timothy na khatikhan awmchan kha mumuk, iti kha nangjet uh.
Kiei dieng imaw shok nih, iti ke`en shole, nawtshun a jong tirna rang, ngakkimining.
Khan kieiawm shawt boi a kajong rangnih, tia Pumi kha karangam pui.

Kha khea nangni dieng Epaphroditus kijongtir rang a hi thawboithaboi `khat a kimining. Ama hi uliennai `khat inih, kochonthaw pui le ramiring kichangpui, nang chawngchawipa u, khan kirangaina mun ah chon thaw miring kha inih.
Nangni kha anarangai uh, inia natlam a awm kha nangjet u jarkhan, mulung shawtak a awm.
Ajarla ama hi ana a athideng runih, inia Pathien na ama chung a roihoina kha irutetna inih. Ama ranga niboia kieiawm, makha mulungshaw chung a mulungshaw kha kienieina boi rang a inih.
Khajarkhan ngakrala a kijongtir inih. Makha nangni na ama kha nangrumuk u phakhan, nang ningaina u rang, khan kieiawm kumulungshaw kha rakaina rang a inih.
Khajarkhan Pumi riming a ningai kholok le rujawng u roh, khan kha ang miring hai kha richit peh u roh.
Ajarla Christa chon jar a athideng inih. Kiei dieng a nang chonthaw u arabat mishipna rang, iringkho manar boi inih.
Dawngkhit a, uliennai hai, Pumi riming a ningai u roh. Nangni dieng ra`angre miejiek rang hin amatatna awm mak, inia nangni rang mahi rodongna `khat inih.
Ui a`ang miring hai kha riring pui u roh. Ashie thaw hai kha riring pui u roh, khan mawr`ep hai kha riring pui u roh.

Ajarla kieini hi Ratha a Pathien chubaibawk, Christa Jesu jar a lienrasha le taksha a rangamna niei kha kinita`awm, vailar a rangamna niei boi miring kha nanih uh. Khajarkhan kieini hi adik vunep miring kha nanih uh.
Khan shik miring na vailar a rangamna kieniei, ti joiatu, kiei na kienieidet.
Kiei hi Benjamin vawnchawi Israel phung, ni riet changna a vunep, Hebrew riethiengbeng, Dan dungjuia Pharisee,
mulungrepeh dungjuia biekrup shawna rupeh, Dan shung ah awm dikna dungjuia, kiei metek boi kha kurunih.
Inia kiei dieng a nemna nieinak hai kha Christa jar a thangna, tia kimining joi.
Diktak a danlakngam boi kupumi Jesu Christa jetna jar a ih kholok hi thangna, tia koloi joi. Ama jar a nieinak kholok kamathang joi. Christa kha manna rang ih kholok mitiroi `khat a koloi joi.
Khan ama jar a Pathien na inumuk kinitna rang, Dan ah put ah kidikna kha nieilai mi`ing. Inia Christa jar a kiniei takashawn le Pathien ah put ah dikna chung a takashawn jar a nih joi.
Ama le ama thoiretna ranak kha le ama shawna ringruchunna kha kejet jar a, ama thitna khan nokonchen rangnih.
Makha, nitthieitukshe, thoiretna kha koshokna rang a inih.
Atumsha ninawkle rupumsha kha nimi`inglai, inia Christa na inushurna makhatak kha shurna rang, kirojo nilai.
Uliennai hai, kushur joi, tia mining mi`ing, inia kithaw `khat tu: kanuk a awm hai kha kiemieniei a, kamaton a awm hai kha kiban a awm kanilai.
Lawh kha mukna rang, khinmun tieng khan korojo joi. Makha lawh kha tu Christa jar a chung tieng a koina kha inih.
Khajarkhan rupumping miring kholok na mining ra`angna kha niei u rawi. Ih khan shik nangmining u joiatu, makha`awm Pathien na nangni dieng malar rangnih.
Nitjoiawm noshoknasho u shedan khan ring u rawi, khan makha lamtak kha mining u rawi.
Uliennai hai, kununruchuh u roh. Nangni rang endar `khat a ka`awm u hi ang a, khatikhan a aring miring hai kha enrep u roh.
Christa cross kha araha pui hai kha ang a, mi tampui ring uh. Amani jar a chatboia nangni dieng kunururiei u joi, inia tun chaplam a kinieriei u hi inih.
Rieliei nieinak a mulungrepeh hai maton khan thangna awm. Amani pathien kha tu vawnpui kha inih, khan amani jakna khan amani lurna kha awm pe uh.
Inia naw`awmna u rang a kha tu ravan a awm. Makha mun khan Shandampa, Pumi Jesu Christa kha ningakrala u inih.
Ama pum alur kha le ra`angmashakna rang, nupum u rede hi tho rangnih. Makha ranak kha na nieinak kholok ama thoi a itet ngam inih.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai, nangni hi numkipok le kirangai, khan kiningaina le kerenglukhum kha nangnih uh. Khajarkhan Pumi riming a dingrep u roh.
Euodia le Syntyche kha Pumi riming a mulungmining `khat a awmna rang, kidawi inih.

Inih, nangniawm kawnawdawi uh, Aw ringkaw adik kiruput pui miring hai, mahi nupang hai hi shan u roh. Ajarla amani hi athachawng rang khan kiei, Clement, khan kochonthaw pui tieitang le chon ranak thaw runih uh. Amani riming hai kha ringna behangbuk khan awm joi.
Pumi jar a pha rikip a ningai u roh. Takthar a kitiret, ningai u roh.
Nang mulung u renem kha miring rikip na jet rosho. Pumi jongna rang pha kha nai joi.
Ih rang khan mulung shaw u naw roh, inia irikip a anih le ariei a mapak le roroia nanginik u kha Pathien dieng mejet u roh.
Khan jetna kholok akhe Pathien lungdamna kha na nang mulung u le nang mulungmining u kha Christa Jesu jar a nurung pe u rangnih.

Dawngkhit a, uliennai hai, adik chon kha nit a, richitna kha nit a, dikna kha nit a, riethieng kha nit a, ningnitna kha nit a, rieihoina kha nit a, tharingna le mapak rang a rutuk kha awm joiatu, hihaihi mining u roh.
Kiei dieng nangiruruchuk u, nangiruman u, nangirurangai u, khan nangirumuk u kha thaw u roh, khanitatu lungdamna apeh Pathien na nangni le awm rangnih.
Pumi riming a lientak a ningaina kieniei, ajarla kaishiei a kiei dieng a nang mulung ninatetna u kha nang matharret ua kiei hi tennangnareh u joiawm, chanthatna kha niei u makche.
Ravatna chawng kiriei nimak, ajarla ih awmchan khan ka`awm joiawm, ningnitna rang, kururuchuk joi.
Arokpet a awm, khan ruphulam a awm, iti hi imaw nih iti kejet: vawnshiplam a awm, khan vawnchamlam a awm, ruphu le ravatlam a awm, ih khan nita`awm, kururuchuksho joi.
Ranak napeh Christa jar a chon kholok kawthaw ngam.
Ih kha nitjoiawm, kawshawna hin nangnarachang pui u jarkhan, mapak nangawm uh.

Khajarkhan Philippi miring hai, nangni na`awm jet u roh, makhala athachawng putpek a Macedonia ah put ah kakuruchawilai khan, Biekrup `khatshe na shumleshier a nururachang pui mak, nangni ranga nangnih uh.
Khan Thessalonica ah kuruawmlaishe khan, karavat phakhan, voikhatvoidi nangnawhawng-mawchawithiei uh.
Khutchawi kha kitawk nimak a, Pathien na nang nieimun ua ara imupung kha kitawk inih.
Nivakmawchawi u nieinak hai kha Epaphroditus ah put ah kurumuk a ih kholok ruphu a kieniei a kaship joi. Amani kha manam hoi, loithiei le Pathien ningminit rawthawina kha inih.
Inia kapathien na Christa Jesu jar a ama rawchawngna lurna dungjuia, nang ravatna u khan nimiship pe u rangnih.
Khan napa u Pathien dieng kumshawtkumshawt a alur kha nih rosho. Amen.
Christa Jesu riming a awm miriethieng rikip kha chubai thaw pui u roh. Kirawtawp pui uliennai hai na chubai navakmawchawi uh.
Miriethieng hai kholok na, khinniei a Caesar inshungkhur na, nangni dieng chubai navakmawchawi uh.
Nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang kholok dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Pathien mulungmining jar a Christa tirtawn, Paul le uliennai Timothy, kieini na Christa jar a Colossae ah awm miriethieng hai le takashawn uliennai hai dieng kiemiejiek uh.
Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho.
Nangni rang ningthingkip nikna kieniei u phakhan, nupumi u Jesu Christa Apa Pathien dieng mapakna kieniei uh.
Ajarla Jesu Christa dieng nang takashawn u le miriethieng hai kholok rang a nanginiei u numpok kha kejet uh.
Makha Pathien na nangni rang ravan a ibawm ngakmining jar a inih. Mahi jar hin adik chawng chungchanga athachawng shung khan nangirurangaisha u nih joi.

Khan manmieshie kholok shung a ajong kha ang a, nangni na Pathien numpokmirit kha adik a nangirurangai u le nangirujet uah put ah nangni dieng ashok kha ang a, ara moshok a manmieshie shung a mupung joi.
Kunumpok koshok chang pui u Epaphras ah put ah nangirujet u kha le ra`angre inih. Ama hi nang ruhut ua rangam pui rang rutuk Christa shepding `khat inih.
Ama hi Ratha jar a nang numpok u kha kieini dieng nemejetpa kha`awm inih.
Khajarkhan nang chungchang ua kirujet u nikho ah put ah nangni rang anih chat u mi`ing. Rathalam shingna le thieina kholok jar a, ama mulungmining jetna kha nangshipna u rang, nikna kieniei uh.
Makha Pumi kha richit pek a, rupumping a ningminit pe a, atha chon rikip rang ara moshok a Pathien lungvar khan nanglien shishitna u rang a inih.
Ama ranak lurna dungjuia, ningai le roroia doiratna rang le shawtshawdoina rang, Pathien na ranak le namaratna u rang,
avar a miriethieng hai inkoklo kha amani le atum rang a nurutukmashak Apa dieng khan kamapak uh.
Ama na cham ajing ah put ah noroshoh a ama numpok shapa rengchangna shung khan nawthawt u joi.
Jesu dieng khan ama thishen jar a Pathien na kieini hi nurukhekna joi. Makha munu rangaidamna kha inih.
Ashapa kha malang boi Pathien rilim le khutkon rikip chung a ruawm konmasha kha inih.

Ajarla ravan le rieliei a awm kholok ama na irukon inih. Ravan le rieliei a awm kholok ama na rukon. Malang le malang boi, rengmun nit a, pumichangna nit a, rampo hai nit a, khan chamniei hai nit a, kholok ama na ama rang a irukon inih.
Khan ama hi kholok mala a awm inih, khan ama na kholok lawp `khat a irak inih.
Biekrup hi Christa pum kha inih, khan Christa hi biekrup lu kha inih. Ama kha putna le athi ah put ah ruthoi masha kha inih. Makha ama na nieinak kholok maton a awmna rang a inih.
Ajarla shipna kholok ama dieng a`awm rang a kha na Apa kha ningruminit pe.
Khan nieinak kholok kha amatak dieng riengieimashak. Ama cross thishen jar a, rieliei a le ravan a awm nieinak nitjoiawm, lungdamna kha rukon joi.
Nangni hi pha `khat khan ashie chon kha na inamachai u, khan nang mulung ua Pathien le re`er kha nangrunih uh,
inia tuntu ama maikung a riethieng, metek boi le rawkawk boi `khat a nurupekna u rang, Pathien na ama taksha pum thitna kha le nieriengieimashak u joi.

Nangni na khur choi a phunsha takashawn khan nangawm ua, athachawng ngakmining ah put ah nangrephet u joi nawkatu, Pathien na hitihin nurupek u rangnih. Makha athachawng kha nangrurangai u joi. Makha athachawng kha ravan noi a juleva kholok dieng irushemsha inih. Khan makha athachawng khan Paul kiei na shok kuruchang.
Khan nang ruhut ua kawshawna hai khan kiningai. Christa shawna a ravat kha kupum a kiei na kimiship joi. Makha ama pumtak kha biekrup inih. Makha rangbak khan a kithaw inih.
Pathien na kiei dieng a inurupek roiruputna khan kiei shok kachang joi. Makha Pathien chawng kha nangni dieng rupumping a pekna rang a inih.
Kum khatuk shawt ah put ah le rongrong ah put ah murukchawng kha tun miriethieng hai dieng malarmashak joi.
Mahi murukchawng hi rawchawng lurna kha Phungshik hai kar a mulurna rang, Pathien na madangmashak joi. Makha nangni dieng a awm Christa alur ngakmining kha inih.
Makha lungvar kholok le mi rikip dieng kieini na Christa kha michitlam a le ruchulam a korophong uh. Makha mi rikip kha rutukthep Jesu Christa miring `khat a pekna rang a inih.
Hi rang hin ama na kiei dieng a ranaktak a chon ithaw dungjuia, rojolam a, chon kithaw inih.
Ajarla nangni rang le Laodicea ah awm miring hai, khan pum a kemeh amuh boi hai rangbak kawshawna kha kenemejet jawt uh.

Makha Pathien na amani mulung kha mangar pe a numpok jar a ruchunna u rang a inih. Makhan amani na madanghet a jet u phakhan, ajong rawchawngna kha man u ning, tia Apa Pathien le Christa murukchawng kha jetna u rang a inih.
Christa dieng varna le jetna kholok niei hai kha rethe a awm.
Mahi kirieina hi tu nangni kha tute na dawina chawng le nomohonna boi u rang a inih.
Ajarla kiei na pum a nangni le ka`awm nawkawm, nangni le Ratha a ka`awm. Christa dieng a nang takashawn u kha rieshieihiem le nettak a awm kha kumuk `le, kiningai.
Khajarkhan Christa Jesu kha Pumi `khat a nangiloi u le roroia, ama chawng khan ring u roh.
Ama dieng khan rujung meshe u tana mawng u roh, khan nettak a ding u roh. Khatikhan nuruchuk u jarkhan, nangni leklawr a makhan ningai u roh.
Riring u roh. Tukhat na nangni kha lungthim le nemna boi mohonna chawng a nimikhit u nih. Makha miring shena le manmieshie miruchukna dungjuia inih, inia Christa miruchukna dungjuia nimak.
Christa dieng khan Pathien changna shipna kholok kha na miring pumtak a awm.
Ama dieng rupum kha nangnih u joi. Ama kha rampo changna le cham kholok lu inih.
Ama jar a khut jaw boi vunepna kha le nangniawm vunnuruep pe u joi. Inia Christa ah put ah ajong vunepna khan munuphung balam pumtak kha Pathien na chen joi.
Baptisma loina khan Christa le nukhumchen u joi. Pathien chonthawna khan takashawn jar a ama le nurumothoichen u joi. Pathien na ama kha athi hai kar a rumothoi joi.
Nieshietna u kholok chung a rangaidamna nepek u shole, Pathien na Christa le inimiringchen joi. Mahi nang munuphung u balam a nangruthi u lai a le vunnangruep boi u lai a iruthaw inih.
Pathien na kieini le re`er a ukhut le irumiejiek chawngmocho kha nurumomot pe joi. Ama na Cross khan rumakhai a kieini ah put ah ruloi joi.
Ama na rampo hai le chamniei hai mieriem kha rumetet a ranak niei boi rumachang. Khan vanoi dieng malangsheng a rumumuk a cross jar a amani chung a ra rumawtawr joi.
Tute na nangni kha nekleshak a ninawkle rohoi a ninawkle thathar a, khan Sabbath nikho chungchanga naheng u naw rosho.
Hihaihi ajong rang a irilip ranga inih, inia atak kha tu Christa kha inih.

Lawh muk rang khan tute na nangni kha rutuk boi namachang u naw rosho. Makha rang khan anih boi a noi rede jawt le ravantir chubaibawk miring hai kha na imuk boi nieinak hai rukukriekiek kha riei uh. Makha munuphung balam mulungmining kha na nemna boi a ama kha iphuk inih.
Kha ang miring kha na Lu kha mukuirep mak. Ama dieng khan upum kholok kha ru le rang na irushuimashak kha na ranak ipek a Pathien na imielien shishit inih.
Khajarkhan manmieshie miruchukna ah put ah Christa kha le nangruthi u joiala, manmieshie a awmngai ang a, ijar a miruchukna awnoi khan a awm maw nangnih u lai?
“Shih u naw roh, tuidan en u naw roh, khan rak u naw roh.”
Kha hai kha miring hai chawngpek le miruchukna dungjuia awm nit jarkhan, irotokna khan kholok athang rang a nimak maw?
Kha hai kha lungvar ang a malang. Amani hai kha nining a kon richi, mulungrede rasha, khan pumtak kha imawshaw inih. Inia taksha re`erna pui ranak kha tu niei mak.
Khajarkhan nangni Christa le nurumothoishom u jarkhan, chung a awm nieinak kha rojo u roh. Makha mun khan Christa na Pathien chang tieng shuh a awm.
Chung a awm nieinak hai khan nang mulung peh u roh, inia rieliei nieinak hai khan nang mulung peh u naw roh.
Ajarla nangruthi ua, nang ringna u kha Pathien dieng Christa le rethe joi.
Niringna u anih Christa kha rumalar phakhan, nangniawm ama le alur a namalar u rangnih.
Khajarkhan nang rieliei pasha hai: riethieng boi, takjatna, ashie ditrekhe kha that u roh. Rapham iti hi rilim chubaibawk inih.
Hihai jar hin Pathien lunghangna kha chawngrangai boi hai dieng jong rangnih.
Amani dieng nangruring u lai khan, hihaihinawm nangruring u inih.
Inia tuntu kha hai kholok kha`awm nangithut u rang a shok joi. Khahaikha la: ashang, lunghang, ashie, mimieshiet, khan nang ner uah put ah chawngtar kha inih.
Khatlekhat dieng mielieshiei thaw u naw roh. Ajarla nang miring changna u alui kha ama chonthaw hai kha le nangruthat u joi.
Khan ama akonpa rilim dungjuia jetna khan Pathien na irumathar miring changna athar kha nangruko u joi.
Mahi ringkho `thar hin Greek, Jihudi, vunep, vunep boi, Greek nih boi, Scythia miring, shok le moshok kairekhena awm mak. Inia mi kholok rang Christa hi ih kholok kha inih.
Khajarkhan, Pathien na imadan miring hai kha ang a, riethieng le numipok miring hai, numpokthiei, ninghoi, rede, renem, khan doiratna, hihaihi ko u roh.
Akhat na akhat chung a rieishiet niei joiatu, khatlekhat rangaithiei u tana rangaidam nana u roh. Christa na inarangaidam u kha ang a, nangniawm rangaidam u roh.
Hihai kholok chung hin numpok kha ko u roh. Mahi na rupumping a inurushuimashak u inih.
Pathien lungdamna kha na nang mulung ua lamkai rosho. Kha rang khanawm nangni kha pum `khat a inurukoi u inih. Khan mapakthiei miring kha chang u roh.

Varna kholok le Christa chawng kha nangni dieng rawchawngtak a awm rosho. Lah le biekna lah le khan rathalam lah hai kha le khatlekhat ruchuh le rachak nana u tana numpokmirit kha le nang mulung shung ua Pumi dieng lah thaw u roh.
Chawng a ninawkle chon a, ih kha nitjoiawm, irikip a Pumi Jesu riming a thaw u roh. Ama jar a Apa Pathien kha mapak u roh.
Nupui hai, Pumi mik`en a rutuk kha ang a, nang paramtak hai awnoi a awm u roh.
Param hai nang nupui hai kha numpoh u roh. Amani dieng khan rum u naw roh.
Naite hai, irikip a nang nulepa hai chawng kha rangai u roh, ajarla mahi na Pumi kha ningiminit pe inih.
Apa hai, nang nai hai kha ningmieshiet pe u naw roh. Makha na amani mulung kha irakaimashak chang rangnih.

Shok hai, rieliei a nang pumi hai kha irikip a chawng rangai pe u roh. Miring ningminit miring hai kha ang a, imuk ranga khan chon thaw u naw roh. Inia Pathien kha chih u tana mulungluttak a chon thaw pe u roh.
Ih kha nangithaw u nitjoiawm ningaihiei a thaw u roh. Makha miring dieng a nimak a Pumi dieng a nangithaw u inih.
Inkoklo kha lawh `khat a nangimuk u kha nangjet u jarkhan, khatikhan chon thaw u roh. Ajartu Christa Pumi chon kha nangithaw u inih.
Ajarla adik boi athaw ama dieng khan adik boi ithaw kha le Pathien na athung rangnih. Khan Pathien dieng tu enshietenlar, iti awm mak.
Pumi hai, ravan a Pumi nanginiei u kha jet u tana shok hai kha nunchan adik le nunchan ra`ang a tawn u roh.
Nikna khan repeh u roh, makhan mapak le roroia riring u roh.
Chawng rang le Pathien na mawkawt mawlawngna rang, kieini rangawm nik shomna niei u roh. Christa murukchawng rieinathiei rangawm kiei hi hitihin a rukhum kanih.
Kiriei rang a kha madangsheng a kierieinathiei rang, nikna niei u roh.
Vai tieng ah awm miring hai dieng khan lungvar le ring u roh. Apha kha thatak a rotokna u roh.
Nang chawngriei u khan numpokmirit kha awmchak rosho, khan michi le mechek nih rosho. Makha nangni na mi rikip dieng nangimashangngir u rang a kha nangjetna u rang a inih
Tychicus na kajar kholok nangni dieng nemejet u rangnih. Ama hi nunumpok u uliennai `khat inih. Khan takashawn rang a rutuk shepding le Pumi jar a koshok chang pui `khat inih.
Nang jar u ajet rang le nang mulung u nemenemna pe rang, nangni dieng kivaktir nih joi.
Ama le, nang kar ua akhat, Onesimus hi kivaktir inih. Ama kha takashawn rang a rutuk le numkipok uliennai `khat inih. Hin ah ashok kholok amani na nieriei u rangnih.

Shurkhop miring kichang pui Aristarchus na nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Barnabas ulienpa shapa Mark na`awm nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Ama chungchanga chawng kenepek u joi. Ama na vak shok phakhan, lamjawng ruthaw u roh.
Justus, tia ikoi u Jesu na`awm nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Amani ranga hi Pathien rengchangna rang chon kithaw pui Jihudi miring nih uh. Amani hi kiei rang mulung ngamna nih uh.

Epaphras na nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Amani hi nang kar ua Christa shok `khat inih. Nangni na Pathien mulungmining kholok a rupum le aship nangnitna u rang, mulung shawtak a nikna rikip a niminingchak uh.
Nangni rang le Laodicea le Hierapolis ah awm hai rang a ama mulunglutna kha kiei na kungkachang inih.
Numnipok u loipu Luke le Demas amani na chubai nepek uh.
Laodicea ah awm uliennai hai kha chubai peh u roh. Khan Nymphas le ama in ah awm biekrup dieng khan chubai peh u roh.
Mahi chawngmawchawi hi nang kar ua nangtesho u le, Laodicea miring hai biekrup diengawm mete u roh. Khan Laodicea ah put ah chawngmawchawi kha`awm te u roh.
Archippus dieng khan “Pumi jar a nangimuk u chonthawna kha rupummashakngir u roh,” tia riei u roh.
Paul kiei na kukhuttak le chubai thawna hi kimiejiek inih. Lungroko shung ah korokhop hi mining u roh. Numpokmirit kha nangni le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.

Apa Pathien le khan Pumi Jesu Christa takashawn, Thessalonica miring hai biekrup dieng Paul, Silvanus khan Timothy kieini na kimiejiek u inih. Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho. Pathien dieng Ningai Malarna
Kinikna rikip a kinaban u le roroia, nang kholok rang Pathien kamapakchak uh.
Kapathien le kapa u maikung khan nang takashawn u chon, nang numpok chonthawna le kupumi u dieng a ngakmining doiratna kha kiminingchak uh.
Pathien na numipok uliennai hai, nangni Pathien na namadan u joi, iti kha kejet uh.

Ajarla ka`athachawng u kha nangni dieng chawng ranga a ajong nimak a, ranak a, Ratha Riethieng a le minitna lientak a awm ajong inih. Nangni rangbak a kieini hi nang kar ua ih miring maw kurunih u, iti kha nangirujet u kha inih.
Nangni na shawdoitak a Ratha Riethieng ningaina kha le chawng kha nangruloi u jarkhan, nangni kha kunun u le Pumi nun ruchuh kha nangnih uh.
Makha Macedonia le Achaia ah awm takashawn miring kholok dieng endar changna rang a inih.
Ajarla nangni ah put ah Pumi chawng kha Macedonia le Achaia ranga khan rehemmashak a, Pathien dieng nang takashawn u kha na mun rikip ah athe joi. Makha kieini na rieinadet rangaina boi rang a inih.
Ajarla amanitak na lamnanginurujawngna u chungchang le nangni na aring le adik Pathien chon thawna rang, Pathien na athi ah put ah irumothoi,
khan ajong rang a mulung hangna ah put ah nakhekpa ravan ah put ah ajong shapa Jesu kha ngakna rang, rilim chubaibawk ah put ah Pathien dieng nangruhieina u dan kha nieriei uh.
Ajarla uliennai hai, kavatna u kha nemna boi runimak iti kha nangnitak na nangjet uh.
Inia Philippi khan shawna kirudoi ua, maimawktak a inurutawn nitjoiawm, Pathien athachawng kha nangni dieng rophongna rang, kapathien u dieng lungar kuruniei u, iti kha nangjet uh.
Ajarla kinawmawshawkna u kha lamrehena ninawkle rono mulung ninawkle mohonna ah put ah nimak.

Inia athachawng kha kieini dieng nganshiena rang, Pathien na kieini hi nawjawt pe u joi. Makha dungjuitak khan miring hai ningminitna rang niboia, kumulung u enretepa Pathien ningnitna rang, chawng kiriei u inih.
Ajarla nangijet u kha ang a, itikte nita`awm nieiman boi kha ruriei u mi`ing, khan phamraiawm ruthaw u mi`ing. Mahin Pathien na kungachang inih.

Christa tirtawn hai `khat a nangni dieng niknathiei ranak kha kuruniei u joiawm, miring hai ah put ah, ninawkle nangni ah put ah, ninawkle shik miring hai ah put ah mapakna kha kieini na rutawk u mi`ing.
Inia nu `khat na anai haitak kha tenretak a itawn kha ang a, nang kar ua renem kha kuruchang uh.
Ajarla numkipoktak u miring kha nangruchang u joi jarkhan, nangni kha kanarangaimer uh. Khajarkhan Pathien athachawngte kha niboia, kiringkho u takshe kha`awm nangni le kunurureshem pui jawt uh.
Ajarla uliennai hai, kochonthaw u le kawshawna u kha mininghep u roh. Pathien athachawng kururiei u lai khan, nangni kha pokrik pekna boi rang, shunlejan a chon kiruthaw u inih.
Takashawn hai nangni dieng a kaw`awmchan u kha khadawrshe a riethieng, adik, khan metek boi inih, iti kha nangni na kungachang nangnih uh, khan Pathien na`awm kungachang inih.
Apa `khat na anai hai dieng a iriei kha ang a, nang kholok dieng kawnawmawshawk uh, lungar kenepek uh, khan kawnawdawi uh, iti kha nangjet uh.
Makha ama rengchangna le ama lurnatak khan anakoi Pathien dieng rutuk a nangringna u rang a inih.

Mahi jarhin kieini na`awm chatboia Pathien kha kamapak uh, makhala, kieini dieng a nangijet u Pathien chawng kha nangloi u phakhan, miring hai chawng ang a loi u makche, inia mahi adik`het anih le roroia, Pathien chawng kha inih, tia nangruloi uh. Mahi na takashawn miring hai nangni dieng rutukthep a chon ithaw inih.

Ajarla uliennai hai, Judea ah awm Christa Jesu takashawn Pathien biekrup hai nunruchuh kha nangnih u joi. Ajarla amani na Jihudi hai ah put ah irudoi u shawna kha le ra`angre kha nangni na`awm nang khomiring hai ah put ah nangirudoi u inih.
Amani na Pumi Jesu le amani thiempulien haitak kha ruthat uh, khan shawna nurupek uh. Pathien kha ningrumieshiet pe uh, khan mi kholok kha rurodoi pui uh.
Phungshik hai na ringnathiei u rang, chawngkiruriei u kha, Jihudi hai na rukhar uh. Hitihin amani munu kha mishipna jawnjai uh. Khan dawngkhit a Pathien lunghangna kha amani dieng jongshok pe u joi.
Inia uliennai hai, pha bawngte rang hin, mulung a niboia melemeh a, nangni le nereshenmashak ua mailemai a rumukna rang hin kanarangairiei u joi.
Khajarkhan kieini na nangni dieng kava jawt uh. Paul kieitak na`awm tharthar a kirumining inih, inia Satan na kalam u kha nurukhar pe uh.
Pumi Jesu Christa jong phakhan, ama maikung a kangakmining u ninawkle kiningaina u ninawkle kielienrashatna u rang, renglukhum kha imaw nih? Nangni hi nih u makche maw?
Ajarla nangni hi kulurna u le kiningaina u kha nangnih uh.
Khajarkhan kieini na kodoi ngam boi u phakhan, Athen ah kawlawpte u inamak u rang khan kurudit uh.
Nang takashawn u chungchanga ranak napeh le nawmawshawk u rang, Timothy kha kivaktir u inih. Khan ama kha kuliennai u le Pathien shepding, khan Christa athachawng rang a kochon thaw pui u `khat inih.
Hihai epshawna hi na tuteawm rawnawkmashakna boi rang, kivaktir u inih. Ajarla mahi rang hin kieini hi inurumadan u nih joi, iti hi nangnitak na nangrujet u joi.
Diktak a, nangni le kuruawm u lai khan, shawna nidoingir u rang a inih, iti hi kieini na masha a kinururiei u nih joi. Makhatak kha ang a, ashok kha nangijet u kha inih.
Hijarhin ashawt a kodoi ngam boi phakhan, nang takashawn u kha jetna rang, kivaktir inih. Khanawkatu milempa kha na nelem u ning, tia kochonthaw u kha nemna boi chang rangnih.

Khania tun Timothy kha nangni ah put ah kieini dieng vak shok joi. Khan nang takashawn u le nang numpok u athachawng kha vak chawi joi. Nangni kha rumukna pui rang, kinarangai u kha ang a, mirittak a nangniminingchak uh, khan rumukna pui rang nangnarangai u, iti chawng hi vak chawi joi.
Hijarhin uliennai hai, ke`epshawna u le kumulungkoina u kholok shung khan nang takashawn u kha na mulung chumna nepek uh.
Ajarla Pumi riming a nangdingrep u joiatu, tun kieini karingthiei uh.
Napathien u maikung a nangni rangbak a ningai kimoshokna u ningaina kholok jarkhan, nangni rang ih mapakna kha maw Pathien dieng chawi u ning?
Nang meh u kha mukna rang le nang takashawn u shung a ravat kha rupummashakna rang, shunlejan a mulungluttak a nikna kieniei uh.
Tun kapathien u le kapa u amatak na, khan kupumi u Jesu na nangni dieng kavatna u rang, lam inawmawlawng pe u nih rosho.
Kieini na nangni dieng kithaw u kha ang a, Pumi na nang numpok u kha khatlekhat dieng le mi rikip dieng iniemielien pe u, khan inumupung pe u nih rosho.
Makha nupumi u na ama miriethieng hai kholok le jong phakhan, kapathien u le kapa u maikung a nang mulung u hai kha riethieng a metek boi `khat a mothoina rang a inih.

Khajarkhan dawngkhit a uliennai hai, Pumi Jesu riming a kinawdawi u, khan kinawmawshawk u inih, makhala nang ringna dan u rang le Pathien ningminitna rang a kieini dieng a nangirumuk u kha liekliek a nangithaw u rang a shok.
Ajarla Pumi Jesu jar a ih chawngpek kha maw nangni dieng kinurupek u, iti kha nangjet uh.
Nangni riethiengngir rang nangnih uh, khan rejai, iti hi nangidep boi u rang a shok, iti hi Pathien mulungmining kha inih.
Makhala, mi rikip na itia nang pum u kha riethieng a le richit a nangitet u rang a maw nih, iti kha nangijet u rang a shok.
Pathien ajet boi Phungshik hai kha ang a, tute na ditrekhe ruhu a aring boi rang a shok.
Tute na uliennai chung a hitihin rehe ninawkle mohon naw rosho. Ajarla hihai kholok chung hin Pumi hi ruhutloipa kha inih. Mahi nangni dieng kienierieisha u le kungkuruchangsha u nih joi.
Ajarla Pathien na kieini hi rono a niboia riethieng a ringna rang inurukoi u inih.
Kha dungjui khan hihaihi aheng miring kha na miring kha iheng nimak a kieini dieng ama Ratha Riethieng napeh Pathien kha iheng inih.
Khania uliennai hai numpokna rang a chungchang khan tu nangni dieng miejiek rang kha rangai u lai makche, ajarla khatlekhat numropokna rang khan Pathien na inuruchuksha u nih joi.
Khan Macedonia ram ah awm uliennai kholok hai kha numnangpokrep uh. Inia liekliek a makha nangthawna u rang, uliennai hai, nangni dieng kinawmawshawk u inih.
Khan chawng kinepek u kha ang a, miri`ir a awmna rang rojo u roh. Nang chon u ranga kha mining u roh, khan nang khuttak u le chon kha thaw u roh.
Makha vai tieng a awm miring hai dieng khan thatak a nangawmna u rang le irikip a ravatna boi rang a inih.
Uliennai hai, aja hai chung khan ajet kha kanamachang jawt uh. Ajartu ngakmining niei boi shik miring hai kha ang a mulungshaw miring kha namachang jawt u mi`ing.
Ajarla Jesu na ruthi a hawng thoi kha takanawshawn u jarkhan, khatak kha ang a, Jesu riming a ruja miring hai kha Pathien na ama le hawng chawichen rangnih, iti kha takanishawn u inih.
Khajarkhan Pumi chawng jar a mahi kiriei u inih. Aring a awm le Pumi jong masheng rang a inamak kieini hi na itikte nita`awm ruja miring hai kha khe u naw minih.

Ajarla Pumi amatak na, chawngpekna hesho `khat le, ravantir ulienchang `khat hesho le khan Pathien tekawlawi kha le ravan ah put ah jong chum rangnih. Khan Christa riming a athi miring hai kha na masha a thoi rangnih.

Khashole dawn a aring a awm imak miring hai kieini hi na Pumi kha rithi kar a rumukna pui rang, romiei shung khan amani le nushurchen u rangnih. Khatikhan kieini na Pumi le kumshawt a na`awm u rangnih.
Khajarkhan hihai chawng hi le khatlekhat maw`awi nana u roh.
Khania uliennai hai, nikho le tha chungchanga kiei na nangni dieng kimiejiek rang khan rangai mak.
Ajarla Pumi Nikho kha murushah na jan a ava ang a, jong rangnih, iti kha madanghet a nangjet uh.
Ajarla amani na “Lungdamna le rekhena awm!” ti u phakhan, jetboithieiboi a naivawng nupang `khat na natrieviei kha ang a, amani chung a thangna kha jong shok. Makhan amani rekhe u naw nih.
Uliennai hai, nangni tu ajing a awm nih u makche. Khajarkhan murushah na ithaw kha ang a, makha Nikho kha na nawrawthawkmashak u naw nih.
Ajarla nang kholok a mieivar a ring shapa hai le nishun a lawn shapa hai kha nangnih uh. Kieini hi jan ninawkle ajing tah kha nih u makme.
Khajarkhan shik miring hai ithaw kha ang a, kieini ja u naw rawi, inia chelam a pashalak a awm u rawi.
Ajarla aja miring hai kha na jan a aja uh, khan jukhawp miring hai kha na jan a khawp uh.
Inia kieini hi nishun a awm nanih u jarkhan, pashalak a awm u rawi. Takashawn le numpok a phaw kha rak u roh. Khan shandamna ngakmining, ralukhum kha ang a rukhu u rawi.
Ajarla lunghangna rang Pathien na kieini hi inamadan u nimak, inia nupumi u Jesu Christa jar a shandamna kha manna rang a inih.
Ama kha kieini rang a ruthi inih. Khajarkhan kieini na amiei a ninawkle ache a na`awm u nitjoiawm, ama le aringshom rang nanih uh.
Khajarkhan nangni na nangithawtak u kha ang a, khatlekhat mawshawk nana u roh, khan khatlekhat mothoi nana u roh.
Uliennai hai, nang kar ua enchak a chon thaw miring hai kha richit pekna rang le Pumi riming a laminakai pe a anarachak miring hai kha richit pekna rang, kawnawdawi uh.
Numpok riming a amani chon jarkhan, rashangtak a loi u roh. Khatlekhat lungdam a awm u roh.
Uliennai hai, nangni dieng mawshawkna kieniei uh, makhala rathashie miring hai kha rachah u roh, mulungkur hai kha lungar peh u roh, adawk hai kha shan u roh, khan mi rikip le doiratna niei u roh.
Ashie kha ashie le ruhut thungna boi rang, riring u roh. Inia khatlekhat dieng le mi kholok dieng atha thawna rang, rojo jawnjai u roh.
Ningai jawnjai u roh.
Nikna niei jawnjai u roh.
Chonmun rikip a mapakna niei u roh, ajarla Christa Jesu jar a mahi nangni rang Pathien mulungmining kha inih.
Ratha kha miechiem u naw roh.
Chawngrophong hai kha metek u naw roh.
Irikip kha enrete u roh. Atha kha rakrep u roh.
Ashie awmchan rikip kha dep u naw roh.
Lungdam apeh Pathien amatak na nangni kha rupumping a inieriethieng u nih rosho. Nupumi u Jesu Christa jong phakhan, nang ratha, nang ringphuk, khan nang pum u kha metek boi a itet nih rosho.
Nangni anakoipa kha takashawn rang a rutuk inih. Ama na mahi thaw rangnih.
Uliennai hai, kieini rang nikna nieniei pe u roh.
Uliennai kholok kha biengrutum riethieng le chubai thaw pui u roh.
Mahi chawngmawchawi hi riethieng uliennai kholok dieng mete mashakna rang, Pumi riming a chawng kinepek u inih.
Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Napa u Pathien le khan Pumi Jesu Christa takashawn, Thessalonica miring hai biekrup dieng Paul, Silvanus le Timothy kieini na kimiejiek u inih.
Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng a`awm nih rosho.

Uliennai hai, nang kholok rang hin Pathien kha kimapak jawnjai u rang a shok. Mahi rutuk inih, ajarla nang takashawn u kha lien shishit joi, khan khatlekhat rang a mi rikip numropokna kha ra`ar shishit joi.
Khatikhan nang jar ua Pathien biekrup hai dieng lienrashatna kha kieini na kieniei uh, ajarla epshawna le shawrievieina kholok kha nangdoi u phakhan, takashawn le doiratna kha nangniei uh.
Hihai kholok hi na Pathien chawngshat dikna kha imadangmashak inih. Makha Pathien rengchangna khan nangni hi rutuk `khat a loinathiei rang a inih. Khajarkhan a nangniawm ashaw nangnih uh.
Nangni nawmawshaw hai kha Pathien na shawrievieina pek phakhan, Pathien rang tu, makha dikna inih.
Makha Pumi na ravan ah put ah ranakniei ama ravantir hai le lar phakhan, shawrieviei rudoi miring hai nangni kha kieini le shawmenemna kha nangnieina u rang a inih.
Pathien ajet boi hai le nupumi u Jesu Christa athachawng ajui boi miring hai dieng khan mieichonshok miei le ruhut jong loi rangnih.
Amani na kumshawt thangna chepna kha muk u rangnih. Mahi Pumi awmna vai tieng le ama lurna ranak vai tieng a ashok rang a chon inih.
Ajarla nangni dieng kukungchangna u kha takanangshawn u jarkhan, miriethieng hai jar a lurna rang le takashawn hai kholok jar a amani kha shinmawdawngna rang, makha Nikho khan jong rangnih.

Hi rang hin nangni rang nikna kieniei jawnjai uh. Makha napathien u na inokoina u khan rutuk namachangna u rang a inih. Khan atha ningawna kholok le khan takashawn chon kha, ama ranak kha le rupummashakna rang a inih.
Makha nangni jar a nupumi Jesu riming kha mulurna rang le ama jar a nangni kha mulurna rang a inih. Makha napathien u le Pumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit dungjuia inih.
Uliennai hai, nupumi Jesu Christa jongna rang le kieini na ama dieng nuruchunna u rang khan kawnawdawi uh.

Christa Nikho kha jong joi, tia ratha a ninawkle chawng a ninawkle kieini ah put ah chawngmawchawi `khat ang a, ih kha na nita`awm nang mulungmining u kha irawnawkmashak, ninawkle imuchunrelen chang naw rosho.

Ih khan nita`awm tute na nangni kha nomohon u naw rosho. Ajarla akhat changna richimathanna kha jong masheng, khan munubukpa kha rophong masheng, makha Nikho kha jong naw nih. Ama kha imathang rang a miring kha inih.

Ama na re`erpui ning, tia Pathien iti rikip ninawkle biekna iti rikip chung a nining a rawlawm rangnih. Khatikhan ama na Pathien riethiengmun khan Pathien ang a shuh a nining a Pathien kanih, tia irophong inih.
Kiei na nangni le kuruawmlai khan hihaihi nangni dieng kururiei joi, iti kha mininghep u makche maw?
Tun a rakhar hi imaw nih, iti kha nangjet u joi, makha ama phatak khan rophongna rang a inih.
Ajarla danishawnboi murukchawng kha na chon thaw joi. Akharpa kha vai moshok masheng ama na khatikhan thaw rangnih.
Danishawnboipa kha rophongning, tia khan Pumi na abairuhu kha le miechiem rangnih, khan ama jongna malang kha le mathang rangnih.
Danishawnboipa kha jong phakhan, Satan na ranak kholok le, jetna kholok le, khan mohonna rekhekchon kholok le ama dieng chon thawna rangnih.
Athang rang a miring hai dieng khan adik boi kholok le mohonna chon kha thaw rangnih. Ajarla amani ringna rang a numpok adik kha tum jawt u mak.
Khajarkhan Pathien na amani dieng reheshuna ranaknieitak `khat jong tir pe rangnih. Makha amani na adik boi kha takashawnna u rang a inih.
Makha adik kha takashawn boi a dikna boi a hoiriethieina runiei hai kha hengna rang a inih.

Inia Pumi na numipok uliennai hai, nangni rang Pathien kimapakchak u rang a shok. Ajarla Ratha jar a riethiengna chon le adik shung a takashawn jar a putna ah put ah Pathien na nangni kha shandamna rang inurumadan u nih joi.
Kishem u athachawng jar a nangni kha makha rang khan nokoi u joi. Makha nupumi u Jesu Christa lurna kha manna rang a inih.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai kawchawng jar a nit a, ninawkle kawchawngmawchawi jar a nita`awm, kinuruchuk u shena hai kha mukui u tana nettak a ding u roh.
Numpokmirit jar a ngakmining atha kha le kumshawt maw`awina nurupeh, kieini numnoropoh Pumi Jesu Christa amatak le,
khan napathien u le napa u kha na nang mulung u kha inemenem pe ua, chon atha kha le chawng adik rikip shung khan inomothoi u nih rosho.
Dawngkhit a, uliennai hai, kieini rang nikna nieniei pe u roh. Makha, nangni dieng a kha ang a, Pumi chawng kha ma relenmashakna rang le mun rikip a mulurna rang a inih.
Khan makha pawrche le mi shie ah put ah kieini hi nashannathiei rang a inih, ajarla mi kholok na takashawn kha niei mak.
Inia Pumi tu takashawn rang a rutuk miring kha inih. Mitha boi ah put ah ama na nangni kha namarat u rangnih, khan nurung u rangnih.
Kieini na chawng kinepek u kha nangthaw u, khan nangthaw u rangnih, tia nang jar ua Pumi kha karangam pui uh.
Pumi na Pathien numpok le Christa doiratna shung khan nang mulung u kha lamikhin pe nih rosho.
Khania uliennai hai, Pumi Jesu Christa riming a chawngkenepek uh. Kieini dieng a irumuk shena dungjuia aring niboia, lule a aring uliennai rikip ah put ah rechen u roh.
Kunun u nangiruchuk u rang a kha nangnitak na nangjet uh. Nang kar ua kuruawm u lai khan, lule a ruring u mi`ing.
Kieini na tute dieng manboi a nekleshak rushak u mi`ing. Inia nangni kha pokrik pekna boi rang, shunlejan a shawrana doilam a chon enchak a kiruthaw u inih.
Cham kha kiniei boi u tu nimak, inia nangni na itia kunun u kha nangijui u rang a maw nih, iti endar kha kinepek u inih.
Ajarla nangni le kuruawm u laishe khan, mahi chawngpek hi nangni dieng kinurupek u inih. Tunita`awm chon thaw jawt boi miring kha na nekleshakawm shah naw rosho.
Ajarla nang kar ua lule a ring, chon thaw jawt boi, inia chon mawrawp miring nangawm uh, iti kha kejet uh.
Tun, kha hai miring dieng khan, kupumi Jesu Christa riming a chawng kepek uh, khan kawmawshawk uh. Amani na muruk a chon thaw u rieshie amani nekleshaktak kha shah u rosho.
Khania uliennai hai, nangni na atha nangithaw u khan mohot u naw roh.
Mahi chawngmawchawi hin ah kiriei u hi ajui boi ama kha khin u roh. Ama na jak mukna rang, rawtawp pui u naw roh.
Rahapui miring `khat a loi u naw roh, inia uliennai `khat a rachah u roh.
Tun lungdamna apeh Pumi amatak kha na nangni dieng lam rikip a lungdamna kha inepek u jawnjai nih rosho. Pumi na nang kholok dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Kukhuttak le Paul kiei na mahi chubai hi kimiejiek inih. Kimiejiek chawngmawchawi rikip khan mahi jetna hi awm.
Nupumi u Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha nang kholok dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Nashandampa u Pathien le na`ngakmining u Pumi Jesu Christa chawngpek dungjuia, Jesu Christa tirtawn,
Paul kiei na takashawn jar a kashapa diktak, Timothy nang dieng kimiejiek inih. Napa u Pathien le nupumi u Christa Jesu ah put ah numpokmirit, roihoina, khan lungdamna kha nang dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Macedonia ah kurushelam a Ephesus ah awmna rang kunurudawi. Makha tukhat na ruchukna shik ruchukna boi rang, chawngnangbiena rang a inih.
Khan jokrishim le dawngawmboi thoinakeina khan mulung repena boi rang a inih. Ajarla Pathien dieng takashawn a rawshawnnek khan chawngrieshietna kha imothoi inih.
Khati chawngbie kha na ikhin kha tu, mulung riethieng, lungthim atha, khan thanunchan jaw boi takashawn ah put ah ajong, numpok kha inih.
Khania miring eshen na tu chawngbiena ah put ah riephiei ua, chawngshok boi chawngrieina tieng ruhiei u joi.
Dan oja hai kha chang jawt uh, inia iriei u kha imaw nih iti rujet u mak, khan ngartak a dingna u kha imaw nih, iti rujet u mak.
Inia tukhat na Dan kha dantak a rotokna joiatu, makha atha inih, iti nejet uh.
Dan hi midik rang a imushung nimak, inia danishawnboi le danjui boi, pathienjet boi le munu miring, riethieng boi le richi boi, nupa athat hai le mithat hai,

rejai hai, palepa rishih hai, mimuruh hai, mielieishiei thaw hai, khan chawngrakham akhoi hai rang a inih, iti kha nejet uh. Khan ih kha nita`awm atha ruchukna le kairekhe hai rang a dan hi ikon inih, iti hi nejet uh.
Makha ruchukna atha kha le rahvantha Pathien lurna athachawng dungjuia inih. Makha le kiei hi inanganshie inih.
Anamaratpa nupumi u Christa Jesu kha kamapak, ajarla ama na kiei hi ngamna `khat a nuruloi a, ama chon thaw rang nurumadan joi.
Matienglai khan kiei hi Pathien mieshiet miring, shawnapek miring, khan miphing `khat kurunih. Khania jet boi a le takashawn boi a kiruthaw nit jarkhan, numpokmirit kha kurumuk joi.
Christa Jesu dieng a awm takashawn le numpok kha le nupumi numpokmirit kha kiei dieng ship a awm joi.
Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk, vanoi na pawm rang a rutuk chawng kha inih. Makhala rieliei a Christa Jesu ajong kha munu miring hai shanna rang a inih. Makha kar khan kiei hi lutu kuruchang.

Nitjoiawm kiei dieng Jesu Christa na dawngkhit doiratna kha malarna rang, kumshawt ringna rang, takashawn a ama dieng ava hai dieng endar niminitna rang a inih. Makha jarbak khan kiei na numpokmirit kha kirumuk inih.
Rongrong rang a Reng, athi boi, malang boi, ashing Pathien khatte ama dieng richit le lurna kha kumshawt a awm nih rosho.
Kashapa Timothy, pha mala a nang chungchanga rophongchawng hai dungjuia, mahi chawngpek hi nang dieng kinepek inih. Hihai nangijui hi na ra atha kha inawmawthaw rang a inih.
Takashawn le atha lungthim nangnieilai khan ra thaw roh. Mi eshen na makha ruheng u jarkhan, amani takashawn u kha rokong ang a koi pe u joi.
Amani hai kar a Hymenaeus le Alexander jaw uh. Amani na Pathien mieshietna chawng kha ruchukna boi rang, amani kha Satan khut ah kepek joi.
Khajarkhan mi kholok rang anih le ariei a, mi rang ninikna a, mapakna rang akhat changna a kawnawmawshawk uh.
Reng hai le chamniei hai kholok rang nikna niei pe u roh. Makha kieini na Pathienjet a le richittak a rithip le lungdam ring a niringna u rang a inih.
Mahi nashandampa u Pathien maikung a atha le ijawt kha inih.
Pathien na mi rikip hi shan a adik jetna khan mavatna rang adit.
Ajarla Pathien `khat awm, khan Pathien le miring kar a palai `khat awm, makha miring kha Christa Jesu kha inih.
Ama na mi kholok khekman rang amatak kha rurepeh joi. Mahi pha rutukthep a irupek kungchangna kha inih.

Mahi kungchangna rang hin, Pathien chawngriei le tirtawn `khat a, takashawn le adik chungchanga, Phungshik hai oja `khat a, kiei hi nurumadan joi (Christa maikung a adik kiriei inih, kiei na mielieishiei thaw mi`ing).
Khajarkhan mun rikip ah apa hai na inik rang a kha kadit. Lunghangna le chawngrieshietna jaw boi a khut riethieng hai kha lawm u rieshie nikna niei u rosho.

Khan nupang hai na`awm ponledier kha miri`ir a le riemhiei a rielienna rang, mulung niei u rosho. Sham rikinmashak a ninawkle rangkachak ninawkle kongkeplung ninawkle manrawp ponledier le rielien u naw rosho.
Kha ruhut a Pathien achih kanih ati nupang hai rang a rohoi atha chon hai kha le rielien u rosho.
Nupang `khat na rede kholok le miri`ir a ruchuh rosho.
Nupang `khat na miruchuh rang a ninawkle apa `khat chung a chamniei rang hin kiei jawt mi`ing, a`awmchien rang a inih.
Ajarla Adam kha akhat changna a rumijir shole, Eve kha irumijir inih.
Khan Adam kha rumohon mak, inia nupangnu kha rumohon a, shietna miring `khat ruchang inih.
Khania takashawn a, numpok a, takshur le riethieng a awm joiatu, shanai mawshawmna shung khan Pathien na shan rangnih.
Tukhat na bieklamkai rang khan aditmer joiatu, atha chon kha idit inih. Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk chawng kha inih.
Bieklamkai `khat hi rawkawkna chung a awm rang a inih. Nungak `khat inko, acheveng, ariemhiei, richit pekthiei, jinchonthiei, ruchuthiei miring anih rang a shok.
Juneh boi, arang boi, nieinak a vanhat boi, mulung renem, lungdamna numapoh, shier a rapham boi,
inlothiei, nai hai kha lam rikip a richit ipek a chawngijui pe miring kha anih rang a inih.
Ajarla tukhat na ama intak kha lothiei nawkala, itia maw Pathien biekrup kha tinta ngam nih?
Lienrashatna khan ruphuk a diabol chawngshatna khan chona boi rang, ama kha takashawn `thar anih boi rang a shok.
Vai a awm mi hai na kungichangna aningir rang a shok. Khanitnawkatu mimieshietna le diabol lim khan cho rangnih.
Kha ang a deacon hai kha richitpekthiei, mulung ra`ak boi, juneh boi, khan shumleshier a rapham boi miring kha aningir rang a shok.
Amani na takashawn murukchawng kha lungthim riethieng le irakrep u rang a shok.
Rapapek a amani kha enrete rang a shok. Khashole eshebe awm nawkatu deacon a jaw rosho.
Kha ang a amani nupang hai kha richitpekthiei, mimieshiet boi, takshur ngam, irikip a takashawn rang a rutuk kha anih rang a shok.
Deacon hai kha nupang `khat inkopa nih rosho. Inshung le nai hai kha thaning a chon thaw pe rosho.
Ajarla deacon `khat a thaning a chon thaw hai kha na amani rangbak dingna atha kha iman inih. Khan Christa Jesu dieng a awm takashawn khan mulung ngarna tampui iman inih.
Nang dieng avarelen rang kanih, iti ngakmining jar a hihaihi kimiejiek inih.
Inia kavakshumawm jawt. Khajarkhan nang na Pathien inshung a itia aring rang a maw kanih, iti kha nangjetna rang a kimiejiek inih. Makha aring Pathien biekrup khan adik chawkier le chawkhur kha inih.

Pathienjet chungchanga murukchawng adik hi ielien, iti hi najawtviek uh: Pathien kha pum a rumalang, makha Ratha kha na idik, tia rurophong. Ama kha ravantir hai na rumuk, ama kha Phungshik hai kar a chawng a irushem inih. Manmieshie kholok na ama kha takarushawn, alur a Pathien na ruloi joi.
Nikhothang anuk a mi eshen na takashawn ah put ah hiei a milem-midawi ratha hai chawng le raikho hai miruchukna kha jui u rangnih, tia Ratha na madanghet a ieriei.
Anih boi chawngriei hai na thanunchan khan amani lungthimrilik kha imawmaw u inih.
