Amani na inniei le nekleshak eshen ah put ah amakha uh. Khahaikha takashawn hai le adik ajet miring hai na mapaklam a loi rang a Pathien na irukon inih.
Pathien na irukon rikip kha atha inih. Amani kha mapaklam a noloi joiatu, `khatshe pai rang awm mak.
Ajarla mahi Pathien chawng le nikna jar a iriethiengmashak inih.

Hihai chawngbiena hi uliennai hai maikung a nangte pe joiatu, Jesu Christa deacon atha `khat kha nangchang rangnih. Ajarla nangirujuirep takashawn chawng hai kha le miruchukna atha kha le inuruvai inih.
Inia richiniei boi le tarshevet jokrishim kha jawt naw roh. Kha ruhut a nang nining a Pathienjetna rang ruchuh roh.
Ajarla pum takmajangna khan nemna dikhat awm, inia Pathienjet tu irikip a nemna awm. Mahi na tun a ringkho le ajong rang a ringkho rang chawngrakham kha iniei inih.
Mahi takashawnthiei le mi kholok na pawm rang a rutuk chawng kha inih.
Aring Pathien dieng khan ngakmining kha niniei u inih. Pathien hi mi kholok, khinniei a takashawn hai, Shandampa kha inih. Mahi rang hin chon nithaw u, khan rachainiphung u hi inih.
Hihaihi chawngpek le roroia ruchuh roh.
Nang khangdawng kha tute na mitir naw rosho. Khania chawng a, awmchan a, ratha a, riethieng a, takashawn hai rang a endar kha chang roh.
Kiei na nang dieng kavat masheng ate a, arachah a, khan miruchuh a mulung repeh roh.
Nang dieng a awm khutchawi kha enda naw roh. Makha chawngrophong jar a bieklamkai hai khut donglai a Pathien na nang dieng inurupek inih.
Hihaihin nang mulung mulut tana awm roh. Khanitatu mi hai kar a nang mameshe kha lar rangnih.
Nang pumtak chungchanga le nangiruchuk kha rung tana awm roh. Makha nangithaw kha na nang pumtak le khan nang chawng rangai hai kha nangshan rangnih.
Patar `khat dieng hare a rawkawk naw roh. Khania nangpa `khat ang a, rothar hai kha nang naipangpa hai `khat ang a dawi roh.
Nutar hai kha nangnu hai `khat ang a, nungak hai kha nang naipangnu hai `khat ang a riethieng kholok le dawi roh.
Mieirawng hai kha, aliendet a mieirawng jielak hai kha, richit peh roh.

Mieirawng tukhat na nai hai ninawkle tu hai niei joiatu, ama inshung a naite hai kha na richichawi nitna u rang, akhat changna a ruchuh u rosho. Khan unulepa hai kha ruhutthung rosho. Ajarla mahi Pathien maikung a atha le ningnitroi kha inih.
Thien a awm mieirawng adik kha na Pathien dieng ngakmining niei rosho. Khan shunlejan a anih le ariei chat naw rosho.
Inia hoiriethiei a awm ama kha iringlam a athi inih.
Amani na mieshiet nieina boi rang, hihai chawng hi peh roh.
Tukhat na amatak, khinniei a, ama inshung mi hai kha avai nawkatu, ama takashawn kha ijawt boi inih, khan takashawn boi miringnek khan ashiedet miring kha inih.
Kum shawm `ruk thoi a awm boi kha mieirawng a tethiei inih. Ama kha pa khatte inkonu anih rang a shok.
Amani kha chon atha a rimingniei, shanai rumawshawm, jinchon ruthaw, miriethieng hai ke rushuk, shawdoi hai rurachang pui, khan atha chon kholok a mulung rurepeh miring anih rang a shok.
Inia mieirawng noi hai kha te naw roh. Ajarla amani takjatna kha na Christa kha re`erpui ning, tia inniei jawt uh.
Amani na arapa a atakashawn u kha rupai u jarkhan, chawngshatna kha muk uh.
Kha le roroia adaw ruchuk a inin ah she ua, adaw ranga kha niboia, michawk a chonchin uh, khan riei boi rang a kha ieriei uh.
Khajarkhan mieirawng noi hai na in`iniei uh, nai`iniei uh, khan inshungkhur kha i`en ua mirahapui ama na mieshietna rang a mun kha ipek boi rang a kha kadit.
Ajarla mieirawng eshen na Satan anu juina rang, hieisho u joi.

Takashawn apa ninawkle nupang `khat na mieirawng hai kha awm pui joiatu, amani kha rachang pui u rosho. Khan biekrup pokrik machang u naw rosho. Makha mieirawng jielak hai kha biekrup na rachangna pui rang a inih.
Thatak a makai bieklamkai hai, khinniei a Pathien chawng ariei le miruchuh a chon ranak athaw hai kha na richit rothom imuk rang kha rutuk inih.
Ajarla Miejiek na ieriei, “Shiecha `khat na shang achieilai khan ener nangikhop pe boi rang a inih,” khan “Chon thaw miring kha na ama nilawh imuk rang a kha rutuk inih.”
Miring idi ninawkle uthum na kungchang joi nawkatu, bieklamkai akhat chung a jar peh u naw roh.
Eshen hai na`awm chitna nieina rang, munu thaw hai kha vanoi maikung a rawkawk u roh.
Hihaihi nangrungna rang, ningsha boi a le enshietenlar boi a nangthawna rang, Pathien le nupumi Jesu Christa, khan madan ravantir maikung a kungachang kanih.
Tute chung ah nawtshun a nang khut dong naw roh. Khan munu hai khan jaw naw roh. Nang pumtak kha riethieng a tet roh.
Tui neh roh, khania nang bukawk le khan phapha a nangnatna jarkhan, ju lekte neh roh.
Miring eshen hai munu kha malangsheng a awm a chawngshatna mun khan amani maton ah rushe pe uh. Khan mi eshen hai munu kha na unuk ah ujui uh.
Kha ang khan, chon atha hai kha malangsheng a awm, khan ashie chon hai kha`awm the ngam chat nimak.
Ringkaw rupu shok kholok na upumpa hai kha richit ipek rang khan urutuk inih, tia imining u rang a shok. Makhan Pathien riming le miruchukna kha mieshiet naw nih.

Takashawn pumpa aniei hai na amani kha uliennai nit jar a noishie a mining u naw rosho. Khania inemna hai kha takashawn miring le amani na numipok nit jarkhan, thadet a chon ithaw pe u rang a shok. Amani dieng hihaihi ruchuh le roroia rachah u roh.
Tukhat na shik miruchukna kha loi a nupumi Jesu Christa le Pathienjet ruchukna aracha chawng hai kha ijawt boi nitatu,

ama kha lienrasha le ih jet boi miring kha inih. Inia ama kha chawngreper le chawngrishietna khan ditrekhe iniei inih. Makhan ah put ah mukmakna, roshona, mieshietna, riringna boi khan ashie vak shok inih.

Makhan ah put ah mulung tha boi miring hai kar a chawng rekherna tampui vak shok inih. Amani ah put ah adik kha imuruk pe u inih. Amani na Pathienjet hi shumleshier mukna `khat inih, tia imining hai kha nih uh. Kha ang miring hai kha le rawtawp u naw roh.
Inia ninghien le roroia Pathienjet hi nemna lientak `khat inih.
Ajarla kieini na manmieshie shung hin iawm jong chawi u makme, khan hin ah put ah iawm chawi ngam makme, iti hi madangsheng inih.
Nekleshak le ponledier nieniei uh, hihaihi le ninghienna nieniei u rangnih.
Inia rawchawng jawt miring hai na lemna le lim, khan mawngna le mawpawpthiei ditrekhe tampui khan acho u inih, makha na thitna le thangna khan imulut inih.
Ajarla shumleshier numpoh hi ashie kholok rujung inih. Mi eshen na makha ahotna khan takashawn ah put ah iehiei a nining a mulungshaw tampui kha le rushun inih.
Aw Pathien miringpa, hihai ah put ah tan rang roh. Dikna, Pathienjet, takashawn, numpok doiratna le mulung renem hi rojo rang roh.

Takashawn ra atha kha thaw rang roh, kumshawt ringna kha mukui rang roh. Makha rang khan a inurukoi inih. Khan makha rang khan a nang na kungachang mi tampui maikung a rieirophongna atha kha nangirurophong inih.
Nieinak kholok chung a ringkho apeh Pathien maikung a, khan Pontius Pilate maton a kungruchang, khan thatak a rieirophongna rupeh Christa Jesu maikung a, nang dieng chawngkenepek.
Makha nupumi Jesu Christa na jong lar masheng, mahi chawngpek hi mawk boi a le metek boi a rungna rang a inih.
Pathien na Christa kha pha rutukthep a numumuk rangnih. Pathien hi nimapak u rang a ranakniei khatte, reng hai Reng, khan pumi hai Pumi kha inih.
Ama ranga na thitniei boi iniei, khan banngam boi varna mun ah awm, tute na imuk boilai, ninawkle imuk boi inih. Ama dieng richit le kumshawt ratna kha nih rosho. Amen.

Tun a rong a rawchawng miring hai kha mining rashang mashakna boi rang, ninawkle madang boi rawchawngna khan ngakmining nieina boi rang, rachah u roh. Khania nohoina u rang a nieinak kholok rawchawngtak a napeh, aring Pathien dieng khan ngakmining kha itet u rang a shok.
Khan atha thawna rang, atha chon hai khan rawchawng nitna rang, khutjang le mi hai le reshem jawt nitna rang, amani kha chawngbie roh.
Nuk rang a keshun atha kha amani rangbak khan ibawm u rang a shok. Makha kumshawt ringna kha mukuina rang a inih.
Timothy, nang dieng a kinanganshie kha rungrep roh. Anih boi a shingnavarna iti richiboi, chawngnawk le mining kairekhe hai kha lawi roh.
Mi eshen na makha varna kha kieniei, ti ua takashawn kha imahien u inih. Numpokmirit kha nang dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Jesu Christa dieng a awm ringkho chawngrakham dungjuia, Pathien mulungmining a Jesu Christa tirtawn,
Paul kiei na kashapa numpok Timothy nang dieng kimiejiek inih. Napa Pathien le nupumi u Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit, roihoina le lungdamna kha nang dieng a`awm nih rosho.
Shunlejan a chatboia kinikna hai khan, nang kha kinimininghep le roroia, kapa hai na iruthaw kha ang a, lungthim diktak a kiei na chubaikirubawk Pathien kha kamapak.
Nang mikrithi hai kha kimininghep jarkhan, nang kha ajeng a kunumuk jawt. Makha kiei dieng ningaina kha shipna rang a inih.
Nang takashawn riethieng kha niminingmashak. Makha nangpi Lois le nangnu Eunice dieng a ruawmmasha inih. Makha nang diengawm awm rangnih, tia karangam pui.
Khajarkhan nang chung ah kukhut kodong jar a nang dieng a awm Pathien khutchawi hai kha mieichon moshokmashakna rang hin a kinemejetret inih.
Ajarla Pathien na chitna ratha kha kieini dieng nepeh mak, inia ranak, numpok le mulungmining atha kha inepek inih.
Khajarkhan nupumi chungchanga kungachang rang khan jak naw roh, khan ama shurkhop kajar a jak naw roh. Inia Pathien ranak kha biei tana athachawng jar a kawshawna hai hin narashap pui roh.

Pathien na kieini hi inurushan a koina riethieng kha le inurukoi u inih. Makha nochonthaw u dungjuia nimak, inia ama chonmuchuk le numpokmirit dungjuia inih. Makha numpokmirit kha pha put mala a Christa Jesu jar a kieini dieng inurupek u inih.
Makha, nashandampa u Jesu Christa rular jar a, irumalangmashak inih. Jesu Christa na thitna kha irumathang a ringna le thitniei boi kha athachawng jar a malangsheng a ijongchawi inih.
Mahi athachawng rang hin kiei hi Pathien chawngriei `khat a, tirtawn `khat a, khan Phungshik hai dieng a oja `khat a inurumadan inih.

Hijarhin a inih kieiawm shawna kidoi hi. Inia kiei jak mi`ing, ajarla takakishawn ama kha kiei na kejet. Khan ama dieng kinganshie kha, kha Nikhoshe khan ama na nurung pe ngam rangnih, tia karangam pui.
Kiei dieng a nangirurangai, Christa Jesu dieng a awm takashawn le numpok jar a, miruchukna atha endar kha mukuirep roh.
Kieini dieng a awm Ratha Riethieng shanna jar a, nang dieng a inanganshie atha nieinak hai kha rung roh.
Asia ah awm kholok kha kiei ah put ah hieisho u joi, iti kha nangjet. Amani hai kar a khala, Phygellus le Hermogenes nih uh.
Pumi na Onesiphorus inshungkhur dieng khan numpokmirit kha ipek nih rosho. Ama na kiei hi ringjin a natet jawnjai. Khan kurukhumna chungchanga ama na jakna runiei mak.
Ama na Rome hawng shok phakhan, ama na mulung luttak a natawk a navak muk.
Makha Nikho khan Pumi na ama dieng Pumi ah put ah roihoina kha ipek chang rosho. Khan Ephesus khan idawr maw kochon nawthaw pe, iti kha thatak a nangjet.
Khajarkhan kashapa nang na Christa Jesu dieng a awm numpokmirit khan ranak niei miring kha chang roh.
Kungchang hai tampui kar a kiei dieng a nangirujet hai kha, shik miring hai kha`awm ruchuh ngam rang a takashawn rang a rutuk miring hai dieng khan nganshie roh.
Khajarkhan, Christa Jesu ramiring atha `khat ang a, shawna kha nangidoi rang a shok.
Rachon a chonthaw miring tute na mahi ringkho chon le robon naw nih. Makha ramiring `khat a chon apepa kha ningminit pena rang a inih.
Khan tukhat na radai rieshietna a jaw joiatu, shena dungjuia rieshietna khan jaw masheng renglukhum kha mukhu naw nih.
Chon ranaktak a athaw loithaw ama kha ara hai kha atum akhat changna miring anih rang a inih.
Kiriei hi mining roh, ajarla Pumi na nieinak kholok chung a jetnathiei kha nepek rangnih.
David chicha ah put ah jong shok, athi ah put ah hawng thoi, Jesu Christa kha mininghep roh. Makha kiei rang a athachawng kha inih.
Makha jar a ashie thaw miring `khat ang a, rukhumnashe khan, shawna kodoi. Inia Pathien chawng kha tu khopthiei nimak.
Khajarkhan madansha hai rangbak a kiei na ih kholok hi kidoi inih. Makha Christa Jesu dieng a kumshawt lurna le a`awm shandamna kha amani na tumna rang a inih.
Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk rieina `khat inih: kieini na ama le nathishom u joiatu, kieiniawm ama le naringshom u rangnih.
Kieini na adoi narat u joiatu, kieiniawm ama le rengchangshom rang nanih uh. Ama kha naraphat pui u joiatu, ama na`awm naraphat pui u rangnih.
Takashawn rang a rutuk boi ninit u phakhan, ama tu takashawn rang a rutuk kha nih jawnjai, ajarla nining a rapha ngam naw nih.
Amani dieng hihaihi mejetret roh, khan Pumi maikung a chawng hai chungchanga roshona boi rang, masha a riei pe roh. Mahi nemna boi inih, khan makha na rangai hai kha imathang inih.
Pathien maikung a imuchuk kha nangnitna rang, ningamtuk kha thaw roh. Ajak boi le adik chawng kha diktak a meler chonthaw miring kha chang roh.
Chawngmejer rono kha thaw naw roh, ajarla Pathienjet boi tieng khan amani kha pung shishit rangnih.
Khan amani chawng kha cancer ang a rawjawh rangnih. Hymenaeus le Philetus kha, kha ang kha nih uh.
Amani na adik ah put ah lamrurehe uh. Thoiretna hi ashesho keng joi ruti uh. Amani na mi eshen hai takashawn kha shukthala a rutet pe uh.
Nitjoiawm mahi jetnam akawp Pathien chawkhur kha rudinger inih: “Pumi na ama tah hai kha ejet,” khan “Pumi riming aban rikip na shietna ah put ah hiei rosho.”
Inia in alien khan dangka rangkachak be ranga awm mak a, thing le lieibeawm awm: eshen kha richit a, khan eshen kha chochawp a rotokna rang a inih.

Khajarkhan tukhat na hihaihi ah put ah rechenving a riethieng rang a nitjoiatu, richitpekthiei be kha inih. Ama kha riethiengsha, Pumpa dieng a rotoknathiei, khan chon atha kholok rang a irashak kha inih.
Inia khangdawng ditrekhe ah put ah tan roh. Mulung riethieng ah put ah Pumi akoi hai kha le dikna, takashawn, numpok, lungdamna kha rojo roh.
Inia mimawng le mining awm boi chawngrieshietna hai kha lawi roh, amani kha na roshona metemashak, iti jet roh.
Khan Pumi shok kha na mi le rosho boi rang a inih, inia mi kholok dieng erenem, ruchuthiei miring, khan adoirat rang a shok.
Ama rodoi pui hai kha renem a midik rosho. Pathien na mulung lekna pek a adik jetna khan hawng kirthiei inih.
Khan amani na hawng jet ua, diabol lim ah put ah rekhethiei u inih. Ajarla ama mulungmining mawthaw rang a irushur a irukhum u inih.
Inia mahi jet roh: nikho dawng hai khan chichairoi pha kha awm rangnih.
Ajarla amani ranga numapoh, shumleshier numapoh, aphing, lienrasha, mimieshiet hai, nulepa chawng rangai boi, thawlawh jet boi, pawrche,
minumpok awm boi, dawi tha boi, chawng adik boi ariei, takshur boi, chichairoi, atha ditna niei boi,
mijor hai, ashak, ratrasha, Pathiennek a hoina numapoh miring,
Pathienjet rasha a ama ranak ajawt boi hai kha hawng awm rangnih. Khahai miring ah put ah nang mai miehiei roh.

Ajarla kha ang miring hai kha na adawk nupang hai inin ah rawraw ua, amani kha amani dieng rumawjawt uh. Khahai nupang hai kha munu hai kha na pokrik ipek ua, ditrekhe shikshik na ichawi miring hai kha inih uh.
Ruchuk jawnjai uh, inia hihai nupang hai hi na dikna jetthieina tieng khan va ngam u mak.
Khatak kha ang a, Jannes le Jambres na Moses kha rurodoi pui uh. Khatikhan hihaihi na`awm adik kha irodoi pui u inih. Amani hi mining pawrche, takashawn chungchanga iheng miring hai kha inih uh.
Inia amani na dawn a she ngam u naw nih. Ajarla, amani tah iruthaw u kha ang a, amani mawngna kha rupumping a malar pe u rangnih.
Inia kinuruchuk awmdan, chonmuchuk, takashawn, numpok, doiratna,
epshawna, shawrana hai khan mulung nangrurepeh joi. Khan Antioch ah, Iconium ah, khan Lystra ah kiei dieng a ashok shawna kholok ah put ah Pumi na inurukhek inih, iti kha`awm nangrujet joi.
Diktak a Christa Jesu jar a Pathienjet a aring jawt kholok na epshawna kha rawtawng pui rangnih.
Inia mi shie le milem-midawi hai kha na tha shishit naw nih. Amani na mi hai kha elem u rangnih, khan lemna khan cho u rangnih.
Inia nang tu nangiruchuk, nangijawtnahet nieinak hai khan dawn a she roh. Nangiruchuknapa kha eme jet roh.
Khan makha nang naite chang ah put ah Miejiek Riethieng kha nangrujet joi. Makha, Christa Jesu dieng a takashawn jar a shandamna rang a, shingna napeh ngam kha inih.
Miejiek kholok hi Pathien phuk na inepek inih, khan mahi miruchukna rang, rawkawkna rang, midikna rang, dikna khan rijina rang, nemna inih.
Makha Pathien miring kha na rutuk a awmna rang le atha chon rikip rang rupumpingna rang a inih.
Aring le athi chawngshat rang a Pathien le nupumi Jesu Christa maikung a, khan ama larna le ama rengchangna dungjuia, mirittak a mawshawkna kienieniei.
Chawng kha shem roh. Pha kha rutuk a rutuk joi nawkawm, rashamjer roh. Doiratna le ruchukna kholok le mawjawt roh, rawkawk roh, khan mawshawk roh.
Ajarla miruchukna atha kha rawkawna boi rang a pha kha jong rangnih. Inia amanirilik ditrekhe dungjuia, amani nokor mathak nemna rang, oja hai kha bawm u rangnih.
Khan adik ah put ah onokor u kha miehiei u ning, tia jokrishim tieng khan nokor miding u rangnih.
Inia hihai kholok hin riring tana shawna kha doi roh, khan Pathien chawngshemna chon kha thaw roh. Nang chonmun kha rupummashak roh.
Ajarla Pathien na kiei hi tuipaina `khat a nielieina a ka`awm joi, khan kakichawina rang a pha kha jong nai joi.
Ra atha kha kawthaw joi, tanrieshiet kha kawmawtawr joi, khan takashawn kha kurung joi.

Tun ah put ah, dikna renglukhum kha kiei rang bawm a awm joi. Makha, kha Nikho khan dikna a chawngashat Pumi na kiei dieng a inepek rang a kha inih. Makha kiei dieng ranga nimak a ama jong kirnaret numapoh kholok diengawm ipek rang a inih.
Kiei dieng relentak a vatna rang, rakangchak a awm roh.
Ajarla Demas tu, tun a pha hi numpok jarkhan, kiei hi namathan a Thessalonica ah she joi. Crescens na Galatia ah, Titus na Dalmatia ah she joi.
Luke ranga hi kiei le awm joi. Mark kha rumuk pui tana vat pui roh. Ajarla kochonthawna hin ama kha nemna awm.
Inia Tychicus kha Ephesus ah kurutir joi.
Troas ah Carpus dieng a kimak kotai kha nangvat phakhan, navakchawi roh. Khan behangbuk hai, khinniei a mevun behangbuk kha, navakchawi roh.
Thirchonthawpa Alexander kha na kiei dieng ashie chon tampui ruthaw. Ama chonthaw dungjuia Pumi na pek rangnih.
Nangawm ama maikung a riring rang a nangshok. Ajarla nawchawng u hai kha ama na ajeng a rure`erpui.
Akhat changna a korodoi puilai khan, tute na narachang pui mak, inia mi kholok na kiei hi namathan uh. Amani dieng chona boi rang, kiei na Pathien dieng kinik.

Inia Pathien na kiei le ding a ruawm, khan ama na ranak nurupek. Makha kajar a, chawng kha rupumping a rophong a Phungshik hai na`awm arangaina rang a inih. Khan kieipui bai ah put ah Pathien na nurukhek joi.
Khan Pumi na ashie chon rikip a nakhek ning, tia ama ravan rengchangna khan nashan rangnih. Ama dieng khan kumshawt a lurna kha chang rosho. Amen.
Priscilla le Aquila khan Onesiphorus inshungkhur hai kha chubai peh roh.
Erastus hi Corinth ah awm joi, khan Trophimus hi Miletus ah natlam a kamak joi.
Phabi mala hin vak shokna rang, rakangchak a awm roh. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Claudia khan uliennai kholok na chubai nepek uh.
Nang ratha kha le Pumi Jesu Christa kha a`awm nih rosho. Numpokmirit kha nangni le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Pathien na imadansha hai takashawn dungjuia le Pathienjet le adik jetna `khat a, Pathien shok le Jesu Christa tirtawn, Paul kiei na nang dieng kimiejiek inih.
Kiei hi rong put mala a mielieishiei boi Pathien na chawngirurakham kumshawt ringna ngakmining khan a`awm kanih.
Apha rutukthep a chawngshem jar a ama chawng kha amalar joi. Makha le, nashandampa u Pathien chawngpek dungjuia, kiei hi inurunganshie nih joi.
Takashawn nuruchun dungjuia kashapa dik, Titus nang dieng napa u Pathien le nashandampa u nupumi u Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit, roihoina le lungdamna kha a`awm nih rosho.

Hijarhin a inih, kiei na nang kha Crete tuikawram ah kinurumakna kha. Makha thaw rang a ravat hai kha dawna nangtetna rang le, chawng kinepek kha ang a, khopui rikip ah bieklamkai hai kha nangmadanna rang a inih.
Ama kha metek boi, nungak `khat inkopa aningir rang a inih. Anai hai kha takashawn rang a rutuk, chonrekhe thaw a ninawkle chawngjui boi a nawng boi aningir rang a inih.
Bieklamkai rang tu, Pathien inchonpo `khat a, bieniei boi, iminingrok a she boi, ashangrat boi, ju a vanhat boi, chichairoi boi, shier a rapham boi,
inia jinchonthiei, atha kha numapoh miring, mirachan, midik, miriethieng, takshur ngam anih rang a inih.
Ama kha miruchukna dungjuia takashawn rang a rutuk, chawng arakrep miring anih rang a inih. Makha miruchukna atha kha shemna rang le makha le perawlaw miring hai kha rachak a demna rang a inih.
Ajarla chungrasha miring tampui awm uh, khinniei a vunep hai kar a rathashie methena a mohon a chawngriei hai kha inih uh.
Amani kha maw`awmchien rang a shok. Amani na mulung riethieng boi nemna rangbak a ruchuk rang adik boi kha le miruchuk ua, inshung kholok kha pawrimechet u inih.
Amanitak thiempulien `khat na ruti, “Crete miring hai kha mielieishiei, ramsha mulung apoh, rathashie, shak a rapham miring kha nih jawnjai uh.”
Mahi kungchangna hi adik inih. Khajarkhan takashawn khan atha changna u rang, khawktak a amani kha rawkawk roh.
Jihudi hai jokrishim hai le adik ah put ah ahiei miring hai chawngpek kha rangai naw roh.
Riethieng hai dieng tu ih kholok riethieng inih. Inia rono hai dieng tu iawm riethieng awm mak. Amani mining le lungthimshe kha pawrche chang pe uh.
Amani na Pathien jet miring kha kanih ti uh, inia amani chonthaw a ama kha jawt u mak. Amani na mipawrche, chawng rangai boi miring chang u jarkhan, atha chon rikip rang khan rutuk boi chang uh.
Khania nang tu miruchukna atha kha le aracha kha riei roh.
Patar hai kha mulung renem a awmna rang, ningsha a, mulungnet a, takashawn a riethieng le numpok a adoirat kha changna rang, riei pe roh.
Nutar hai kha khatikhan richit a awmna rang, ashie mulung pokna boi rang, juneh khan shok changna boi rang, atha ruchuh oja nitna rang, riei pe roh.
Makha nainu noi hai na amani inkopa hai kha numpokna rang le amani nai hai kha numpokna rang, mawshawkna `khat nitna rang a inih.
Khan makha mulung menetna rang, riethieng, inshung kha thatak a ishinna rang, amani inkopa haitak dieng khan redena rang a inih. Makha na Pathien chawng kha mieshietna boi rang a nih.
Khatikhan mieila noi hai kha`awm mulung menet ngamna rang, rachah roh.
Ih kholok a atha chon endar `khat nitna rang, nang nining a mumuk roh. Nang miruchukna khan ningsha le a`am boi kha machang roh.
Nang chawngriei khan atha le heng boi kha machang roh. Makha na nang norodoi pui ama kha majak rangnih. Khan nang dieng ashie rieina kha niei naw nih.
Shok hai na amani pumpa hai awnoi a awmna rang le irikip a ningminit pe a amani le perawlawna boi rang, riei pe roh.
Amani na rawt boi a rutukthep takashawn kha mumuk rosho. Makha na ih kholok a nashandampa u Pathien miruchukna kha rohoimashak rangnih.
Ajarla mi kholok rang a shandamna jong chawi Pathien numpokmirit kha jong lar joi.
Pathienjet boi le manmieshie ditrekhena kha jawtna boi rang kieini hi nuruchuk u joi. Khajarkhan mahi tun a pha hin tu mulungnet a, adik a, Pathien jet a aring rang nashok uh.
Khan ngakmining rahvanmukna, khan rashang napathien u le nashandampa u Jesu Christa na lurtak a larna kha kieini na ngaklam a na`awm u inih.
Christa kha na nining a kieini rang khan rurepeh joi. Makha danishawnboi kholok ah put ah nakhekna rang le, atha chon hai rang a ningaw, ama miring `khat a riethiengmashakna rang a inih.
Hihaihi riei tana mawshawk roh. Chawngpek kholok kha le rachah roh. Tute na nang kha adawk `khat a numuh naw rosho.
Amani kha rampo hai le chamniei hai awnoi a awmna rang, chawng juina rang, atha chon rikip a rashamna rang,
tute dieng chawng shie rieina boi rang, lungdam a awmna rang, mulung renem a awmna rang le mi kholok dieng redena kha mumukna rang, amani kha miningmashakret roh.

Ajarla kieiniawm pha `khat khan mimawng, chawngrangai boi, mi na imohon, ditrekhe hai le hoina shikshik chon ruthaw, ashie awmchan le manarshie khan a ruring, mi na imukmak le khatlekhat chung a mukmakna aniei nuruchang uh.
Inia nashandampa u Pathien miritna le numpok kha miring hai dieng lar phakhan,
tharmoshok rushukna le Ratha Riethieng matharna jar a, ama na kieini hi inurushan inih. Makha kieini na niruthaw u dikna chon hai jar a nimak a, ama ninghoina jar a inih.
Nashandampa u Jesu Christa jar a Ratha Riethieng kha nuchung ua rothom a ama na inojongliei pe u inih.
Makha, ama numpokmirit jar a kieini hi nimidiksho u le, kumshawt ringkho ngakmining dungjuia, koklo hai kha nachangna rang a inih.

Mahi takashawn rang a rutuk chawng inih. Khan hihaihi nangni na rawnaw a nimenet u rang a hi kidit inih. Makha Pathien takarushawn miring hai kha na atha chon hai kha riringtak a tawnna u rang a inih. Khahaikha miring hai rang a atha le nemna nieinak kha inih.
Inia chawngrieshiet amawng hai, thoinakeina hai, roshona hai, Dan chungchanga rieshietna hai kha lawi u roh. Ajarla amani kha nemna boi le arok nieinak kha inih.
Akhat changna le adi changna khan mi reshenmashak chonthaw miring kha riei pe roh. Khashole ama kha lawi roh.
Kha`ang miring kha ashawi le munu ithaw khan nining a reheng nana inih, iti kha jet roh.
Artemas ninawkle Tychicus kha nang dieng kavaktir phakhan, Nicopolis ah kiei dieng vatnangir rang thaw roh. Ajarla makhawn kiei na phabi kemehek jawt.
Danthieipa Zenas le Apollos amani khomijinna khan ravatna boi rang, nang ngamtukshe a shan roh.
Khan nimiring hai na`awm atha chon khan mulung repena rang le rangai akhawk niei miring hai kha mumuknathiei rang, ruchuh u rosho. Makha amani na ara boi changna boi rang a inih.
Kiei le awm miring kholok na nangni kha chubai nepek uh. Takashawn a kieini numnapoh miring hai kha chubai peh u roh. Nang kholok chung a numpokmirit kha a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Christa Jesu shurkhop Paul kiei le uliennai Timothy na kunumpok le kochonthaw puishom u Philemon nang dieng le
kunumpok Apphia, khan karamiring chang pui Archippus, khan nang in ah biekrup dieng kiemiejiek.
Napa u Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa na numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng nepeh u rosho.
Nang rang kapathien kha kamapak. Kiei na nikna kieniei phakhan, nang riming kaban jawnjai.
Ajarla Pumi Jesu le miriethieng hai kholok dieng a nanginiei nang numpok le nang takashawn kha kejet joi.
Nang takashawn ringruchunna kha nangni dieng a awm atha kholok nangijetna jar a takimachang inih, tia kinik inih. Mahi atha nieinak hai hi Christa jar a inih.
Ajarla nang numpok kha na ajeng a ningaina le lungar nepek uh. Ajarla uliennai, miriethieng hai mulung kha nang na nangmathar u joi.
Khajarkhan thaw rang a rohoi thawna rang a Christa riming a chawng pekna rang, lungar kha kieniei.
Khanikengta numpok dungjuia Paul kiei na, tar `khat a le tun Jesu Christa shurkhop `khat a, kinengen inih.
Khoplam a kaw`awmlai a kimoshok, kashapa Onesimus rang, nang dieng nikna kiniei inih.
Ama kha matienglai tu nang rang nemna boi runih, inia tuntu nang le kiei rang nemna kha chang joi.
Ama hi nang dieng kivaktirret inih. Khajarkhan kumulungtak `khat ang a, nurupawm pe roh.
Athachawng rang a shurkhop a kaw`awm shung hin, nang ruhut a, kochon nawthawna pe rang, ama hi kiei dieng kirutet jawt inih.
Inia nang jawtna awm boi a kiei na iawm ruthaw jawt mi`ing. Makha nang chonthaw atha kha thawboithaboi `khat a niboia, ningrepeh a nitna rang a inih.
Ama kha kumshawt a nangruloina rang, pha bawngte ama na nang le rureshen nithiei.
Ama kha shok `khat a niboia, shok chung a awm, khinniei a numkipok uliennai kha nih joi. Nang na numpodet roh, ajarla ama hi miring le Pumi maikung a uliennai kha inih.
Khajarkhan kiei hi nang le chonthawshom `khat a nangnoloi joiatu, kiei nanginoloi rang a kha ang a, ama kha ruloi roh.
Khania ama na nang dieng irehena ninawkle lieishie niei joiatu, makha kieshiermushung khan tet roh.
Hihai chawng hi Paul kiei na kukhuttak le kimiejiek inih. Kiei na thung rang kanih. Nang pumtak kha kiei dieng a lieishie `khat inih, ti jar a kiei na kiriei nimak.
Inih, Aw uliennai, Pumi riming a nang ah put ah mahi nemna hi kiei na niei rawng. Pumi riming a kumulung hi namapar pe roh.
Nang chawngjuina khan rangamna kieniei jar a, nang dieng kimiejiek inih. Kirieinek hin khedet a nangthaw rangnih, iti hi kejet.
`Khatret tu, kiei rang tungna nururasham pe roh. Ajarla nangnik jar a Pathien na kiei hi nang dieng navakpek rangnih, iti hi takakawshawn.
Christa Jesu jar a koshurkhop chang pui, Epaphras na chubai nepek.
Kochonthaw pui hai: Mark, Aristarchus, Demas le Luke na chubai nepek uh.
Nupumi Jesu Christa numpokmirit kha na nang ratha u le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Tolai khan Pathien na pilepu hai dieng rawnawrawnaw a le awmchan shikshik a thiempulien hai dieng irurieina inih.
Mahi nikho dawng hai hin Pathien na kieini dieng hin ashapa dieng irurieina inih. Irikip koklona kha ama dieng pek inih. Khan ama jar a manmieshie hiawm Pathien na irukon inih.

Shapa kha lurna engvar le ama ringchangna rilim kha inih. Ama chawng hai ranak jar a, nieinak kholok ama na irumukui inih. Khan amani munu hai riethiengmashakna kha thaw shole, Renglur chang tieng khan rashangtak a rushuh inih.
Ravantir hainek khan athadet chang jarkhan, irurawh riming kha amani rimingnek a alur inih.

Ajarla ravantir tu dieng maw “Nang hi kashapa kha nangnih, Von hin konomoshok joi.” Khan takthar a, “Ama dieng hin kiei Apa nih rang kanih, khan kiei dieng hin ama hi Shapa nih rangnih,” tia irieina pha awm joi?
Khan takthar a, ama sharapa kha rieliei chung a jong chawi phakhan, ama na ieriei, “Pathien ravantir kholok na ama dieng chubai ibawk nih rosho.”
Khan ravantir hai chungchanga ieriei, “Ama ravantir hai kha ratha hai machang joi, khan ama richichonthaw hai kha mieichon machang joi.”
Inia Shapa chungchang khan ieriei, “Aw Pathien, nangrengmun kha kumshawtkumshawt a awm inih. Khan dikna rawmaw kha nang rengchangna rawmaw kha inih.
Dikna kha numnangpok, khan danishawnboi kha nangmukmak. Khajarkhan Pathien, nang Pathien na nangrawtawp pui hainek a rawshawna thao kha le thaonanawt joi.”
Khan “Nang, Aw PUMI, putna khan rieliei hi kungnangphun, khan ravan hai hi nang khutkon kha inih.
Amani hi thang rangnih, inia nang tu nangawm. Ih kholok ponledier ang a lui rangnih.
Khan ponpha ang a amani kha nangjo a amani kha rotho rangnih, inia nang tu angangai a nangawm. Khan nang kum hai kha dawng, iti awm naw nih.”
Khan ravantir tu hai dieng khan maw “Nang rahapui hai kha nangke hai kekhawng kamachang masheng, kukhut chang tieng hin shuh roh,” tia irieina pha awm joi?
Ravantir hai kha shandamna arawh rang a hai chonthaw rang a ijongtir, chon thaw ratha hai kholok kha anih boi u maw nih?
Mahi jarhin kieini na lamrekhe thawna boi rang, nirangai u hai dieng khan mulunglutdet rang nashok uh.
Ajarla ravantir hai dieng a irurieina chawng kha anet inih, khan shietna rikip le chawngjuina boi kha na rutukthep lawh kha rumuk joi.
Mahi adik nitjarkhan, khadawr a alien shandamna kha ne`enda uala, itia maw rekhe u minih? Mahi shandamna hi putna a Pumi dieng a irurieina rangai hai na kieini dieng a irumenet inih.
Jetna le shindawngna, shikshik chonrekhek, khan Ratha Riethieng shemna khan, ama idit dungjuia, Pathien na`awm kungichang puishom inih.
Jong shok rang a rieliei kha ama na ravantir hai thoi a rutet mak. Makha chungchang khan kieini na niriei u inih.
Inia tukhat na kungchang a ieriei: “Nangimining miring ama kha imaw nih? Ninawkle, nangtenret miring shapa kha tumaw nih?
Ama kha ravantir hainek a pha bawngte rang khan nangrenemmashak. Lurna le richit a ama kha nang renglukhum kha nangmukhu joi. Khan nang khut hai chonthaw hai aen rang nangtet joi.
Irikip kha ama kepha thoi ah nangtet joi.” Ama kepha thoi ah nangitetna khan, ama kepha thoi ah itet boi `khatshe awm mak. Inia ih kholok ama thoi ah itet kha kieini na muh u makmelai.

Inia shawna thitna rang a, ravantir hainek a pha bawngte imawdawk a lurna le richit a renglukhum imukhu, Jesu kha numuk u joi. Makha Pathien numpokmirit jar a, Jesu na mi kholok rang thitna tuidan ru`enna rang a inih.

Pathien rang mahi rutuk inih, ajarla irikip hi ama rang le ama jar a aring inih. Ama na shapa tampui hi lurna khan ihawngchawi a, amani shandamna thoina, Jesu kha shawna jar a rupummashakna rang a inih.
Ajarla riethiengmashakpa le iriethiengmashak hai kholok kha akhat inih. Makha jarkhan amani kha uliennai, tia koi phakhan, ama na jakna niei mak.
Ama na iti, “Nang riming kha ku`uliennai hai dieng rophong rang kanih, biekrup kar khan nang mapakna lah kha thaw rang kanih.”
Khan takthar a, “Kiei na ama chung a karangam pui.” Khan takthar a, “Enro, Pathien na inurupek naite hai kha kiei le hin awm uh.”
Khajarkhan naite hai na athithiei balam itumshom u kha le ra`ang a, Jesutak na`awm amani kha irutum inih. Makha Jesu na athi a, thitna ranak aniei, diabol ama kha mathangna rang a inih.
Makha thitna kha chit jar a iringkho shungshe a shok a a`awm rang a amani kha moshoknathiei rang a inih.
Ajarla diktak a ravantir hai kha ishan nimak, inia Abraham chicha hai kha ishan inih.
Lam rikip a ama kha uliennai hai kha le ra`angngir rang a shok. Makha Pathien chon a numpokthiei le takashawnthiei Thiempu Rashang chang a miring hai munu jar a ringnikna konna rang a inih.
Ajarla amatakawm rulem a shawna kha irudoi inih. Makha na irulem miring hai kha ishan ngam inih.
Khajarkhan ravan koina atumshom uliennai riethieng hai, nierieirophongna u Tirtawn le Thiempu Rashang achang, Christa Jesu kha mining u roh.
Moses na Pathien inshung kholok a takashawn rang a rutuk kha ang a, rumadanpa ama dieng khan Christa kha takashawn rang a rutuk runih.
Ajarla ama kha Moses nek a lurna aliendet a rutuk `khat a ruloi. Khatak kha ang a, inrashakpa kha na innek khan lurna aliendet kha ieniei.
Ajarla in rikip kha tukhat na irashak inih, khanita`awm ih kholok rurashakpa kha Pathien inih.
Shok `khat a Moses na ama inshung kholok a takashawn rang a rutuk ruchang. Mahi kungchangna hi nuk a riei rang a inih.

Inia Shapa `khat a Christa na ama inshung a takashawn rang a rutuk ruchang. Khan narangamna u le nangakmining u shung a awm ningaina kha dawngshe khan numukuirep u joiatu, kieini hi Pathien inshung kha nanih uh.
Khajarkhan Ratha Riethieng na ieriei kha le ra`ang inih: “Von nikho hin ama hesho kha nangrangai u joiatu,
ramthim a enirete u nikho khan ra`irumothoi u kha ang a, nang mulung michimmashak u naw roh.
Makha enretena khan nang pilepu hai kha na kiei hi nuruthir uh. Khan kum shawm mili khan kochonthaw hai kha rumuk uh.
Khajarkhan makha rong dieng khan mulung hang a kuruti, ‘Amani mulung a lamrehemashak jawnjai uh, amani na kalam hai kha rujet u mak.’
Khajarkhan kumulung hangna khan chawng kururakham, ‘Kawshawmuchumna khan lut u naw nih.’ ”
Uliennai hai, aring Pathien ah put ah vai shokna rang, takashawn boi mulung shie kha tu diengawm awmna boi rang, riring u roh.
Inia “Von nikho,” iti awmlai hin khatlekhat dieng mulung ngarna kha ningthingkip repeh u roh. Makha munu mimohonna kha na nang mulung u kha michimmashakna boi rang a inih.
Ajartu kieini na kung putna a nirangam pui u kha dawngshe a diktak a numukuirep u joiatu, kieini hi Christa le atumshom miring kha nanih u joi.
Hitihin ieriei, “Von nikho hin, ama hesho kha nangrangai u joiatu, ra`irumothoi u kha ang a, nang mulung michimmashak u naw roh.”
Rangai chuchung a rosho mothoi kha, tu hai maw nih? Moses na Egypt ah put ah lamivakkai pe kholok kha runih boi maw nih?
Tu hai dieng a kum shawm mili mulung ruhang pe maw nih? Ramthim ah amani rok acho munu ruthaw hai kha runih boi maw nih?
Ama shawmuchumna khan amani lut naw nih, tia chawngirurakham kha, tu hai dieng a maw nih? Makha chawngrangai boi miring hai dieng a nih boi maw nih?
Khajarkhan amani takashawn boi jar a rulut ngam boi u inih, iti kha kieini na numuk u joi.
Khajarkhan shawmuchumna khan lutnathiei rang, chawngrakham kha ringjin a awmlai hin nichit pui u rang a shok. Khania tukhat na, makha mun khan nang hawng ngam boiawm jawt.
Ajarla amani dieng a kha le ra`ang a, kieini diengawm athachawng kha irurophong nih joi. Khania irurangai u chawng kha amani na runemna u mak, khan takashawn kha le makha rurechemashak u mak.

Ajarla shawmuchumna khan takarushawn hai kieini nalut u joi. Pathien na iriei hi le ra`ang inih, “Khajarkhan kumulung hangna khan chawngkururakham, ‘Kawshawmuchumna khan lut u naw nih.’ ” Nitjoiawm manmieshie phun ah put ah chon hai kha irumawtawrsho nih joi.
Ajarla ishiri changna chungchanga mun `khat a hitihin ieriei joi, “Ni shiri changna khan ama chon kholok ah put ah Pathien na shawrumuchum.”
Khan mahin takthar a, “Kawshawmuchumna khan lut u naw nih.”
Makha shawmuchumna khan eshen tu lut rangnih, iti kha ding a awm. Khan arapa a athachawng rurangai miring hai kha na chawngjui boi jar a rulut u mak.

Takthar a nikho `khat rumadan a, Pathien na “Von,” ruti. Iruti kha ang a, kum shawttak shole, Pathien na mahi David kam a iruti inih: “Von hin, ama hesho kha nangrangai u joiatu, nang mulung michimmashak u naw roh.”
Ajarla Joshua na amani dieng shawmuchumna kha rupek joiala, nikho shik `khat chungchanga Pathien na nuk a iruriei boi rang a inih.
Khashole Pathien miring rang shawmuchumna kha ringjin a awmlai.
Ajarla ama shawmuchumna ah put ah alut ama kha na, Pathien na amatak chon hai ah put ah iruthaw kha ang a, ama`awm ochon ah put ah shawirumuchum inih.
Khajarkhan makha chawngjuina boi endartak khan lutna boi rang, makha shawmuchumna khan lutna rang, ningamtuk a rojo u rawi.
Ajarla Pathien chawng hi aring le ranakniei, khan bediniei chemjam rikipnek a angai, ringphuk le ratha, rawlawh le rithing idi reshenshe ichi, khan mining le chonmuchuk kha ithir ngam inih.
Khan Pathien maikung a rethe khutkon awm mak, inia kieini na mushungna nipeknangir u rang a ama dieng ih kholok hi imukhu boi a rophoiviek inih.
Khajarkhan ravan kholok rurakan, Thiempu Rashang alien, Pathien Shapa Jesu kha nieniei u joi jarkhan, nirieirophong u kha mukuirep u rawi.
Ajarla nawdawkna u chungchanga nashaw pui ngam boi Thiempu Rashang kha niei u makme. Inia kieini ang a ih kholok a lemna kha irurawtawng pui inih, nitjoiawm munu runiei mak.
Khajarkhan numpokmirit aship rengmun kha rangamna nieitak a jawng u rawi. Makha rangai pha a nashan rang, roihoina nienieina rang le numpokmirit kha numukna u rang a inih.
Ajarla miring hai kar a iloi thiempu rashang rikip miring hai ruhut a Pathien chon aboi pui rang a irumadan inih. Makha munu rangbak a khutchawi hai le rawthawina hai kha pekna rang a inih.
Ama`awm dawkna kha na irubuk nit jarkhan, amawng hai le lamrehe miring hai dieng khan mulung raw`awi a ruthaw ngam.
Mahi jarhin miring hai munu chungchanga rawthawina khan amatak munu rangawm rawthawi rang a shok inih.
Khan tute na mahi richit kha ama idit dungjuia iman nimak a, Aaron kha ang a, Pathien na ikoi ama kha na iman inih.
Hitihin Christa na`awm Thiempu Rashang changna rang khan nining a rurulur mak, inia “Nang kashapa kha nangnih, von hin konomoshok joi,” atipa ama na irumulur inih.
Mun `khat khanawm ama na iti, “Nang hi Melchizedek awmchan a awm kumshawt thiempu kha nangnih.”
Ama na rieliei ringkho a ruringlai khan, mikrithi cho a ra`ai a, thitna ah put ah ashan ngam ama dieng nikna le rieina runiei. Ama na Pathien kha ruchih jarkhan, Pathien na inikna kha rurangai pe.
Ama na Shapa `khat runih joiawm, ama shawdoina hai ah put ah, chawngjuina kha iruruchuk inih.
Ama kha rupummashak a, ama chawngjui kholok dieng kumshawt shandamna tuinar kha ruchang.
“Melchizedek awmchan a awm,” Thiempu Rashang `khat inih, tia Pathien na ama kha riming irupek inih.
Ama chungchanga chawngriei rang tampui nieniei uh, rangai nangthiei boi u jarkhan, meler rang matat.

Ajarla tun a pha hin tu nangni kha miruchuh hai anih rang a tu nangnih u joi, inia takthar a, mi na Pathien chawngriei chawngrukung inuruchuk u rang a kha rangai. Khan burum kha niboia, runutui kha nangrangai u joi.
Ajarla runutui aneh mi rikip na dikna chawng kha, naite nit jarkhan, jet ngam mak.
Inia burum kha achang miring hai rang a inih. Atha-ashie reshenmashakna rang, thawshieina kha na imining a ijetna u kha imawjawng u inih.

Khajarkhan Christa chungchanga chawngriei putna kha mak u taia rupumping tieng she u rawi. Khan athi chon hai ah put ah mulung lekna le Pathien tieng a takashawn chungchanga chawkier kha phun u lai naw rawi.
Baptisma pekna hai miruchukna, khut dong a rahvan pekna, athi miring hai na hawng thoiretna, khan kumshawt a chawngshatna chawkier kha phun u lai naw rawi.
Khan mahi Pathien na jawt joiatu, nawthaw u rangnih.
Ajarla matieng a varna runiei hai, ravan khutchawi tuidan ruen hai, khan Ratha Riethieng atumshom ruchang hai,
khan Pathien chawng atha le ajong rang a rong ranak hai tuidan ruensha hai kha na cho u joiatu,
mulung lekna a matharnaret rang, anithiei boi inih. Ajarla Pathien Shapa kha amani rangbak khan cross ah ithatthep ua, ama kha mipui maikung a jakna kha ipek u inih.
Ajarla rieliei na ama chung ah phapha a jong cho rotui kha inek inih. Khan ama chung ah chon thaw hai rang khan nemna choicha mawmawng pe a rieliei na Pathien ah put ah rahvan imuk inih.
Inia riling le rampa mawmawng rieliei kha tu nemna boi inih, khan pumbot mukna rang a kha nai pe joi. Khan ama dawng kha tu miei a ha rang a inih.
Inia kunumpok hai, kieini na hitihin chawng kieriei u joiawm, nang chungchang uatu athadet, shandamna rawtawp pui chon hai kha, shok rangnih, tia karangam pui uh.
Nangni na miriethieng hai chon nangiruthaw u, khan thaw a nang awm ua, ama riming a nangimumuk u nang chonthaw u le numpok jar a, nang chonthaw ratna u kha mieniei rang a Pathien kha adik boi nimak.
Nang ngakmining u kha dawngshe khan minitna rang, nangni khatkhat na makha lunglutna kha nangimumuk u rang a kha kadit uh.
Makha rathashie boi, inia chawngrakham hai kha doirat a le takashawn a atum hai nunruchuh miring hai kha nangnitna u rang a inih.
Ajarla Pathien na Abraham dieng chawngrurakhamlai khan, ama chawngrakhamna rang tuawm aliendet awm boi jarkhan, amatak dieng chawngrurakham.
Ama na ruti, “Kiei na rahvan nepekngir rang kanih, khan nang chicha tampui numupung pengir rang kanih.”
Khatikhan, doirattak a irungak anuk a, ama na chawngrakham kha irumuk inih.
Ajarla miring hai na aliendet tukhat dieng chawngirakham inih. Khan chawngrieshietna rikip mawtawrna kha chawngrakham na imenet inih.
Chawngrakham atum hai dieng ama chonmuchuk kha thothieiboi runih, iti kha mumuknadet rang, Pathien na chawngrakham le irumenet inih.

Inurupek u ngakmining kha manna rang a rutan nanih uh. Khan lungar lientak nienieina u rang, Pathien na thothieiboi idi hi mahi iruthaw inih. Ajarla Pathien na mielieishiei ithaw rang a hi anithiei boi inih.
Makha ringphuk chuk `khat a niniei u, aningir le anettak, maikhar shung rieirit a alut, ngakmining kha inih.
Malamkai Jesu na, Melchizedek awmchan a awm kumshawt Thiempu Rashang ruchang a, nuruhut ua makhan rulut joi.
Ajarla Rashang Chungchon Pathien thiempu, Salem reng, Melchizedek hi na, reng hai that shole a vak kir, Abraham kha rumuk pui a rahvan rupek.

Abraham na raniei kholok kar a shawm a `khat hi ama dieng rupek. Akhat changna a iriming kha nemele le “Dikna aniei reng,” itina inih, khashole Salem rengawm inih. Makha “Lungdamna aniei reng,” tina inih.
Ama na apa runiei mak, unu runiei mak, thoinakeina runiei mak, ama nikho hai putna le ama ringkho mawtawrna runiei mak. Inia Pathien Shapa kha ruang, khan chatboia thiempu `khat a ruawm.
En u ro, ama hi idawr a rulien maw nih, phungpa Abraham na ama raniei hai shemshawm kha ama dieng irupek inih.
Khan thiempumun aloh Levi naitak hai na, Abraham chicha kha runishom u joiawm, miring hai, nititu uliennai hai dieng, shemshawm loina rang, Dan shung ah chawngpek runiei uh.
Inia amani rui a jong shok nih boi ama na Abraham ah put ah shemshawm rumuk a, chawngrakham hai runiei ama kha rahvan irupek inih.
Aliendet na adawkdet dieng rahvan ipek, iti hi perawlaw boi `khat inih.
Khan mahin athithiei miring hai na shemshawm ruloi uh, inia makhan amani na ring a awmlai, tia kungichangna ama na shemshawm iruloi inih.
Chawnga khan ti rawi, makhala shemshawm aloi Levishe na shemshawm kha Abraham dieng irupekna inih.
Ajarla Melchizedek na Abraham rurumuk puilai khan, Levi kha ipipu chirui a ruawmlai.

Khajarkhan rupumpingna kha Levi thiempumun jar a nitjoiala (ajarla mahi noi a miring hai na Dan kha imuk u inih), Aaron rui dungjuia niboia, Melchizedek rui dungjuia thiempu shik athoingir rang a hi irangai rang a maw nilai?
Ajarla thiempumun kha tho joi jarkhan, Dan kha`awm tho rang khan irangai`er nih joi.
Ajarla hihaihi chungchanga irieina ama hi phung `shik ah put ah inih. Makha phung ah put ah tute na lungkheng ah chon thaw maklai.
Ajarla nupumi u hi Judah phung a hawng thoi inih, iti hi madanghet inih. Moses na thiempumun chungchanga rieina khan makha phung kha ruban mak.
Thiempu shik hawng thoi kha Melchizedek le ra`ang nitjoiatu, akalang madanghet joi.
Jesu kha miring chawngpek dan dungjuia nimak a, dawngawmboi ringkho `khat ranak dungjuia inih.
Ajarla ama na kungruchang, “Melchizedek awmchan a awm dungjuia kumshawt thiempu kha nangnih.”
Ajarla matieng a chawngpek kha na dawkna le nemna boi niei jarkhan, chon a meshe boi nih joi.
Ajarla Dan na ih kha`awm rupummashak mak, inia shir `khat tieng, ngakmining athadet kha vak chawi joi. Makha jar a Pathien dieng naranai u joi.
Mahi chawngrakham jaw boi a runimak.

Ajarla thiempu shik hai tu, chawngrakham boi a, thiempumun kha iruloh u inih. Inia chawngrakham aniei ama na ruti, “PUMI na chawngrakham a mulung lek naw nih, ‘Melchizedek awmchan a awm dungjuia kumshawt thiempu kha nangnih.’ ”
Makha chawngrakham khan Jesu na athadet rawjawtna rentukna kha ruchang inih.
Dawn shena rang khan thitna na rukhar jarkhan, thiempu hai tampui ruawm joi.
Inia ama tu, kumshawt a dawn she jarkhan, rotho boi thiempumun `khat kha ieniei joi.
Khajarkhan ama jar a Pathien dieng ava miring hai kha rupumping a ishan ngam inih. Ajarla amani ruhut a nikna rang khan aring jawnjai inih.
Ajarla kha`ang Thiempu Rashang kha kieini rang a rutuk inih. Ama kha riethieng, metek boi, pawrche boi, munu miring hai ah put ah rechen, khan ravan hainek a rashang kha ruchang joi.

Khahai thiempu rashang hai kha ang a, ama rang khan ningthingkip rawthawi rang kha rangai mak. Amani na rapapek a amani munu hai rangbak khan rawthawi shole, miring hai rang khan rawthawina runiei uh. Ajarla ama na upumtak a rurawthawi phakhan, pha kholok rang voikhatte ruthaw joi.
Ajarla Dan na dawkna aniei miring hai kha thiempu rashang hai `khat a amadan, inia Dan shole a ajong chawngrakham chawng kha na kumshawt a rupum Shapa kha madan joi.
Tun niriei u hai kar a runiei kha hi inih: ravan a Renglur rengmun chang tieng ah rushuh, kha ang Thiempu Rashang kha niniei u inih.
Ama kha miring na nih boi, Pumi na ikon inriethieng, khan adik thamber ah richichonthaw `khat runih.
Ajarla thiempu rashang rikip kha, khutchawi hai le rawthawina hai kha pekna rang, irumadan inih. Khajarkhan ama na ih `khat irupek rang a shok inih.
Ajarla rieliei a ruawm joiatu, ama kha thiempu runih naw nih. Ajarla Dan dungjuia khutchawi hai rupeh, thiempu hai kha ruawm uh.

Amani na ravan a awm nieinak hai endar le rilim chon kha iruthaw u inih. Makha Moses na thamber rurashak diengtak a Pathien na ama dieng chawngirupek kha a`ang inih. Ama na hitihin ruti, “Enro, lawn ah nang dieng inurumumuk thawdan dungjuia irikip kha kon roh.”
Inia tuntu ama na athaving richichon kha man joi. Ama hi athadet rawjawtna, ranaknieidet Palai kha inih. Mahi rawjawtna hi athadet chawngrakham chung a imothoi inih.
Ajarla arapa rawjawtna kha metek boi runih joiatu, makha atho rang, adi changna rawjawtna tawkna rang, rangai mak.
Metekna kha muk pe a, ama na iti: “PUMI na iti, enro, Israel inshung le Judah inshung a rawjawtna `thar kikonna rang a nikho hai kha jong nai joi.

Amani khut mukui pe a, Egypt ah put ah kavakmoroilai a, amani pa hai dieng a kirukon rawjawtna kha le ra`anglai naw nih. Ajarla kawrawjawtna kon kha amani na rujui u mak. Khajarkhan amani kha ke`enda joi, tia PUMI na ieriei.

Ajarla kha hai nikho shole Israel inshung dieng a kikon rang a rawjawtna kha hi inih: amani mulungmining khan kadan hai hi thong rang kanih, amani mulung hai khan amani kha miejiek pe rang kanih, amani Pathien kha kiei nih rang kanih, khan amani kha kimiring nih u rangnih, tia PUMI na ieriei.
Tute na amani ringchangpui le uliennai hai dieng ‘PUMI kha jet roh,’ tia ruchuh naw nih. Ajarla mi kholok, ashinving ah put ah alienving, na kiei hi nejet rangnih.
Amani dikna boi khan koroihoina kha tetna rang kanih, khan amani munu hai kha le danishawnboi chon thaw hai kha mining pelai naw ning.”
“Rawjawtna `thar,” itina khan akhat changna kha rotoknathiei boi machang a rotoknathiei boi le alui kha athang rang rasham nih joi.
Diktak a akhat changna rawjawtna khan Pathien biekna le rieliei inriethieng shedan kha ieniei.
Ajarla hitihin thamber hi ikon inih: akhat changna indan kha inriethieng iti. Makhan thaomeishutna tebol khan rawthawina tan itet inih.
Khan adi changna maikhar anuk khan riethieng chungchon a Riethieng iti thamber `khat awm.
Makhan berawh hana rangkachak lungkheng le rangkachak le itoprep rawjawtna tapu `khat awm. Makha shung khan manna a`awm rangkachak be, achawr shok Aaron shunshawraw le rawjawtna lungpek hai kha awm.
Khan makha chung khan alur cherubim hai kha na irilip ringnikna mun `khat awm. Hihai chungchang hin tun kieini na thirviek ngam u naw minih.
Khatikhan irikip kha rashamsho u le, thiempu hai na akhat changna thamber khan richichon thawna rang, rulut uh.

Khania adi changna indan khan tu kumkhat shung a voikhatte thiempu rashang na thishen ichawingir a, iethien a alut inih. Makhan ama rangbak le miring hai na jet boi a ithaw munu hai rang khan Pathien dieng ipek inih.
Akhat changna thamber kha dinglaisheng, Riethiengving lutna lam kha tu imalangmashak boi nilai. Hitihin a Ratha Riethieng na imumuk inih.
Makha tun a pha chawngmeloi kha runih. Ipek khutchawi hai le rawthawina hai kha na rubiekpa lungthim kha rurupummashak ngam mak.
Thona pha kha jong shok masheng, shakna le nekna khan shikshik rushukna le taksha shedan hai kha she rangnih.
Inia khut le kon boi, aliendet le rupumdet thamber jar a, Christa na ajong nieinak atha hai Thiempu Rashang kha ruchang joi. Makha thamber kha hi khutkon rieliei ah put ah nimak.
Kumshawt rekhekna kha rumuk shole, kecha hai le shiecha remet hai thishen le niboia, ama thishentak le Riethiengving khan voikhatte rulut joi.
Ajarla shiecha hai le ke hai thishen le shiero ruvut hai kha na orono kha athing a pum riethiengmashakna khan riethiengmashak joiala,
idawrshe maw hektiknieiboi Ratha jar a Pathien dieng nining a rurepeh, Christa thishen kha na athi chon hai ah put ah aring Pathien chon thawna rang, nang lungthim u kha nieriethieng pe u nih?

Makha jarkhan ama hi rawjawtna `thar Palai kha inih. Akhat changna rawjawtna thoi a shietna rekhekna hai rang khan thitna runiei. Makha ikoi miring hai kha na kumshawt inkoklo chawngrakham kha manna rang a inih.
Ajarla rawjawtna `khat chon a meshena rang, amah miring athi rang a kha irangaingir inih.
Ajarla miring hai thit shole, chawngmah kha anet inih, inia chawngmah miring kha ringlai khan tu, makha na ranak niei mak.
Ajarla akhat changna rawjawtnashe kha`awm, thishen le iloh boi nimak.

Dan dungjuia Moses na chawngpek kholok kha miring hai dieng ruriei phakhan, ama na shiecha remet le kecha hai thishen kha tui le rumeche, khan moniei ponshen le hyssop kha rotokna a, behangjo le miring hai dire kha iruphen inih.
Ama na ruti, “Mahi Pathien na nangni dieng chawnginepek u rawjawtna thishen kha inih.”
Kha le ra`ang a, thamber le richichon thawna be kholok kha, thishen le iruphen inih.
Khan Dan dungjuia irikip kha thishen na iruriethiengsho inih. Thishen moshok boi a munu rangaidamna awm mak.
Khajarkhan ravan a nieinak endar hai hi, hihai rawthawina hi le riethiengmashakna rang, irangai inih. Inia hihainek hin a athadet rawthawina hai kha ravan nieinak hai rang khan irangai inih.
Ajarla Christa na khut le kon Riethiengving khan rulut mak. Hihaihi adik mera`ang kha inih. Inia tun Pathien maikung a larna rang, nuruhut ua ravantak khan a rulut inih.
Thiempu rashang hai na Riethiengving khan kumkip shik thishen le alut kha ang a, Christa na nining a repeh jawnjai rang a kha rangai mak.
Khanitjoiatu rieliei phun ah put ah ama na rawnawrawnaw a shawna irudoi rang a inih. Inia tun, voikhatte, rong mawtawr tieng hin, munu hai paina rang, ama rawthawina jar a rular joi.
Khatikhan miring hi voikhat tu athi rang a imadansha inih, makha shole chawngshatna kha inih.

Khajarkhan Christa na mi tampui munu hai kha ruputna rang, voikhatte rurepeh joi. Ngakrala a ruawm miring hai dieng shandamna apeh rang, voidi changna a jong lar rangnih. Mahi pha hin tu munu chungchanga boi puilai naw nih.

Ajarla Dan hi ajong rang a atha nieinak hai rilip kha inih. Khan mahi nieinak hai rilimtak kha tu nimak. Kumkip a rawthawina ipek makha rawthawina kha na chubaibawk rang a ajawng miring hai kha rupummashak ngamhet mak.
Rupummashak joiatu, amani na apeh kha bang u naw nih maw? Ajarla voikhat a iriethiengmashaksha biekmiring hai kha na amani munu hai miningnaret kha nieilai naw nih.
Inia khahai rawthawina kha na munu hai kha kumkip iminingmashak inih.
Ajarla shiecha hai le kecha hai thishen kha na munu hai kha ipai ngam rang a hi adikthieiboi inih.
Khajarkhan rieliei shung a jong phakhan, ama na ruti, “Rawthawina le pekna kha nang na rudit makche, inia pum `khat hi kiei rang nangnarasham pe joi.
Munu chungchanga havieng a pek le rawthawina khan ningnitna runiei makche.
Khashole kiei na kuruti, ‘Enro, Aw Pathien, nang mulungmining thaw rang khan kajong joi. Kuchungchanga imiejiek behangjo khan miejiek joi.’ ”

(Amani kha Dan dungjuia pek nitjoiawm), maton khan ruti, “Rawthawina hai le pekna hai, havieng a pek le munu jar a pek hai kha nang na rudit makche, khan amani chung khan ningnitna`awm runiei makche.”
Khashole ama na ruti, “Enro, Aw Pathien, nang mulungmining thaw rang khan kiei kajong joi.” Adi changna kha mothoinathiei rang, akhat changna kha loi joi.
Makha mining kha thaw a, Jesu Christa na voikhatte rang khan a ipek pum jar a, kieini hi nieriethiengmashak joi.
Khan thiempu rikip na ningthingkip ding a richichon thaw a ruawm, khan munu hai shukpai a apai ngam boi rawthawina hai momoi kha chatboi a pek a ruawm uh.
Inia mahi miring hi na, munu hai jar a kumshawt rang rawthawina `khatte kha rupek shole, Pathien khutchang khan rushuh joi.
Kha pha ah put ah ama rahapui hai kha ekekhawng machangna rang ngak a ruawm.
Ajarla makha rawthawina `khatte kha le riethiengmashak a awm hai kha kumshawt a irupummashak inih.
Khan Ratha Riethieng na`awm kieini dieng kungruchang a hitihin arapa khan ruti,

“PUMI na ruti, amani le kithaw rang a rawjawtna kha hi inih. Makha nikho hai kha shole, amani mulung shung khan kadan hai kha tet pe rang kanih, khan amani mulungmining hai khan miejiek pe rang kanih.”
Khan “Amani munu hai le amani danishawnboi chon hai kha kiei na miningthep pelai naw ning.”
Tun hihai munu rangaidamna awm joi jarkhan, munu chungchanga pekna kha awmlai naw nih.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Jesu thishen jar a, Riethiengving lutna rang rangamna kha nieniei u joi.
Mahi athar le aring lam hi maikhar, nitila ama pum kha le kieini rang iruloh nih joi.
Pathien inshung hai apoh rang, Thiempu Alien `khat nieniei u joi.
Khajarkhan takashawn nihetna rupumna shung a adik mulung kha le kieini na jawng u rawi. Ashie lungthim ah put ah numulung u kha aphen a tui riethieng kha le nupum u hai kha Pathien na rurushuk joi.
Nangakmining u rophongna khan kieini na rawnawk boi a mukuirep u rawi, ajarla chawngrakhampa kha takashawn rang a rutuk inih.
Khan numpok le atha chon hai khan khatlekhat mawphawkna rang, mining u rawi.
Mi eshen hai awmchan kha ang a, nuruchunna u kha pai u naw rawi, inia makha Nikho jong nai nangimuk u tukthep khan kieini khatlekhat mawshawk nana u rawi.
Ajarla adik kha nejet u shole, chana a munu kha kieini na nawthaw u joiatu, munu chungchanga rawthawina rang, mun awmlai mak.
Inia chiroi chawngshatna le akhawk miei ranga kha mukshashang a awm nih joi. Mahi na Pathien rahapui miring hai kha kang rangnih.
Tunita`awm Moses Dan ajawt boi ama kha, idi ninawkle uthum kungchangna khan, roihoina awm boipet a, athi inih.

Inia Pathien Shapa kha eke le ater, ieriethiengna rawjawtna thishen kha riethieng boi `khat a iloi nenek, khan numpokmirit apeh Ratha kha maimawk apeh ama rang khan chepna kha idawr ashie rang a kha nangmining u maw?
Ajarla ruriei ama kha nejet uh, “Phuhen aloi rang a kha kiei kanih, kiei na ruhutthung rang kanih,” tia Pumi na ieriei. Khan takthar a, “PUMI na ama miring hai chung a chawngshat rangnih.”
Aring Pathien khut ah acho, iti hi chiroi `khat inih.
Khan matienglai nangni nangruvar u shole, shawna apeh chawngreherna kha ajeng a nangirudoi u nikho hai kha miningret u roh.
Shir `khat a nangni kha mipui maikung a maimawk le shawna kha nepek uh, khan shir `khat khan khatikhan hi ang amuh amani kha le adingshom nangruchang uh.

Ajarla kiei na lungroko shung ah kuruawmlai khan nangnurushaw pui uh. Nang niei u hai kha ranak a nasho u phakhan, ningaitak a nangruloi uh. Ajarla ravan a athadet le ashawtshe niei kha nangni rang awm, iti kha nangrujet uh.
Khajarkhan nang ngarna u kha pai u naw roh. Mahi na lawh alien kha iniei inih.
Ajarla doiratna kha nangrangai uh. Makha Pathien mulungmining kha nangthaw u shole, chawngrakham kha nangtumna u rang a inih.
“Ajarla pha bawngte shung hin ajong rang a ama kha jong rangnih joi, khan jong shum naw nih.
Khan midik kha na takashawn a ring rangnih, inia tukhat na nukkir thaw joiatu, ama chung a kiringphuk ningnitna kha awm naw nih.”
Inia kieini tu nukkir thaw a amathang hai kha nih u makme a, ratha shannashe a takashawn rang a hai kha nanih uh.
Takashawn hi ningakmining u nieinak hai kha rangampuina le nimuk boi u nieinak hai rentukna kha inih.
Mahi jarhin pipu hai na kungruchang u inih.
Takashawn jar a rong hai hi Pathien chawng na irashak inih, iti nejet uh. Makha kieini na nimuk u nieinak hai hi mukthiei nieinak ah put ah ikon nitna boi rang a inih.

Takashawn jar a Abel na Cain nek a athadet khutchawi kha Pathien dieng rupek jarkhan, midik inih, tia Pathien na kungruchang a, ama khutchawi kha ruloi pe. Abel kha ruthi joiawm, ama takashawn jar a, kieini dieng chawng rieilai.

Takashawn jar a Enoch kha ringlam a ravan a iruchawi inih, “khan Pathien na ruchawi joi jarkhan, ama kha muk boi runih joi”; ajarla ama kha ruchawi mala khan ama na Pathien ningnitna chon ruthaw, tia kungchangna kha irumuk inih.

Inia takashawn jaw boi a ama ningminit pe, iti hi anithiei boi inih. Ajarla Pathien dieng ava ama kha na ama hi awm, khan mulungluttak a ama atawk hai lawh apepa kha inih, iti kha taka`ishawnngir rang a inih.

Takashawn jar a Noah na ama inshungkhur shanna rang, muk boilai nieinak hai chungchanga Pathien na irurieimasha chawng kha rujui a, chitnieitak a rokongpui `khat rukon. Makha takashawn kha le manmieshie kha ruheng a, takashawn jar a ajong dikna koklo kha ruchang.
Inkoklo `khat a itum rang a mun khan shena rang, ama kha rukoi phakhan, takashawn jar a Abraham na chawng kha rujui. Khan khoshekawt ah ashe rang a maw nih, iti jet boi a ama na karuchawi.
Takashawn jar a Pathien na chawngirurakham pe ram khan Abraham na chawngrakham chung a koklo itum puishom Isaac, khan Jacob le, milak ram a awm milak ang a, thamber in hai khan ruawm.
Ajarla keshun niei khopui `khat kha irungak inih. Makha khopui rashak le akonpa kha Pathien inih.
Takashawn jar a Sarah na`awm naivawngna rang, ranak rumuk. Ama dieng chawngrurakhampa kha takashawn rang a rutuk inih, tia ruloi jarkhan, kumletha na rulim joiawm, nai runiei.
Khajarkhan athi dawr miring `khat ah put ah, ravan a arshi arawp ang a le tuipui kawmchang ah tengamboi nge ang a, chicha hai kha runiei.

Chawngrakham kha man boi a takashawnlam a amani kha ruthi u joi. Inia ralatak ah put ah irumuk u le chawngrakham hai kha rurangam pui ua, rupawm uh. Khan rieliei a milak le khomijin miring nih uh, tia amani na ruruphong uh.
Ajarla kha`ang ati miring hai kha na nuram itawk u inih, iti kha imalar u inih.
Khan amani na vak shokna u ram kha irumining u nitjoiatu, kirna rang a chanthatna kha runiei u rangnih.
Inia tuntu ravan a awm athadet ram kha iawi u inih. Khajarkhan amani Pathien, tia koi rang khan Pathien na jak mak, ajarla ama na khopui `khat amani rang irurasham pe inih.
Takashawn jar a Abraham na, ama kha enrurete phakhan, Isaac kha rupek, khan chawngrakham hai amanpa kha na ashapa khatte kha irupek inih.
Abraham dieng ruti, “Isaac jar a nang chicha hai kha koi rangnih.”
Isaac kha athi miring hai kar a Pathien na`awm mothoi ngam rangnih, tia Abraham na rumining. Chawngmeloi `khat a, Isaac kha athi miring hai ah put ah irumanret inih.
Takashawn jar a ajong rang a chungchanga Isaac na Jacob le Esau kha rahvan rupek.
Takashawn jar a Jacob na thit dieng Joseph shapa rikip kha rahvan rupek. Ama na ushunshawraw chung khan angiei a, Pathien kha chubairubawk.
Takashawn jar a Israel nai hai na Egypt kha mathan rangnih, tia ama na iruban inih. Joseph na thit dieng uru hai khumna rang a chungchanga chawng rupek.
Takashawn jar a Moses shok phakhan, unulepa na tha `thum ruthe uh. Ama kha metha jarkhan, rengpa chawngmocho kha ruchih u mak.
Takashawn jar a Moses na hawng chang phakhan, Pharaoh shanu shapa, tia koi rang khan rujawt mak.
Pha bawngte rang a munu ningaina hoiriethieinek a, Pathien miring hai le shawna doi rang khan, ama na rumadan.
Egypt ah niei hainek khan Christa rangbak a jakmuh kha aliendet niei inih, tia ruloi. Ajarla nuk a lawh rang khan iruen inih.
Takashawn jar a rengpa lunghangna kha chih boi a, Egypt kha irumathan inih. Ajarla ama na mik a muk boi ama kha, imuktak ang a, shawna kha irudoi inih.
Takashawn jar a ama na Rakanna le thishen phenna kha rurung. Makha akhat changna shapa athat ama kha na Israel nai hai kha shitna boi rang a inih.
Takashawn jar a Israel nai hai na, ramho a lawn ang a, Thampui Shen kha rurakan uh. Khania khatikhan a athaw Egypt miring hai kha tuirah a ruthi uh.
Takashawn jar a Jericho bang hai kha, ni shiri ahieisho u le, ruchim.
Takashawn jar a Rahab na, mitinta hai kha lungdam a ruloi jarkhan, takashawn boi hai kha le ruthang mak.
Kiei na imaw rieiu ning? Ajarla Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephthah, David le Samuelawm, khan thiempulien hai chungchanga rieina rang, pha nieilai mi`ing.
Ajarla amani na takashawn jar a rengchangna hai kha ra rumawtawr uh, dikna chon hai kha ruthaw uh, chawngrakham hai kha ruman uh, khan kieipui hai ner kha ruhup pe uh.
Amani na miei ranak kha ruthat uh, chemjam mawr ah put ah rurekhe uh, dawkna ah put ah ranak rumuk uh, ra shung khan arat chang a milak hai ramiring hai kha runawt uh.
Nupang hai kha na athi hai kha hawng ring jar a rumuk u joi. Amani na athadet thoiretna mukna rang, moshok rang khan eshen na rujawt u mak a, rekhek a epshawna kha rudoi uh.
Eshen na engmejer kha rumuk ua, ajeng a vunrawmaw rutawng uh. Khan thirakarui le khop a lungroko shung ah rukhum uh.

Amani kha lung le rudeng uh, her `di a thingat le ruat uh, amani kha rulem uh, chemjam le ruthat uh. Amani na kengam vun hai le kevun hai kha rieshiei a ruchai uh, khan amani kha ruravat uh, ruchep uh, khan engshiet a rutawn uh.
Manmieshie kha amani rang rurutuk mak. Amani na ramthim ah, lawn ah, koh le rieliei khur a ruawm uh.
Amani kholok na, takashawn jar a, kungchangna atha kha ruman uh, inia chawngrakham kha ruman u mak.
Pathien na athadet kha kieini rang rasham a atet joi. Makha, kieini jaw boi a, amani kha rupummashakna boi rang a inih.

Kieini hi romiei dawrthep a rawp kungchang miring hawi `khat na inoroko u inih. Khajarkhan kieini na arik irikip le khan inakherrep munu kha pai u taia, namaton ua irutet tanrieshiet kha doiratnieitak a tan u rang rawi.
Natakashawn u thoina le rupummashak Jesu kha en a awm u rawi. Amaton a awm ningaina jarkhan, ama na cross kha irudoi inih. Ama na jakna kha irushawn mak a Pathien rengmun khutchang khan rushuh joi.
Nang rawngawina u boi rang le nang mulung rakaina u boi rang, ama kha mining u roh. Ama chung a munu miring hai na amaikung a rodoi pui phakhan, ama na ajeng a shawna kha irudoi inih.
Munu chung a ranangithawna u khan thishenshe shok a dong u makchelai.

Khan ashapa hai dieng iriei ang a, nangni dieng iriei mawshawkna chawng kha nangmieniei u joi: “Kashapa, PUMI na nang kha nachep phakhan, ishawn boi a thaw naw roh. Khan nang kha nawrawkawk phakhan, mulung rakaimashak naw roh.
Ajarla PUMI na numipok ama kha achep, khan iman shapa rikip kha ama na ejem.”
Chepna kha nangdoi u joiatu, shapa hai dieng itawn ang a, Pathien na nawtawn u rangnih. Ajarla apa na ichep boi shapa tumaw awm?
Khania mi kholok na imanshom chepna khan nangjaw u joi nawkatu, adik shapa hai kha niboia, rejai nai hai kha nangnih u joi.
Khakhea kieini nachep rang rieliei a awm napa u hai kha nuruniei ua, amani kha richit nepek uh. Kieini na naratha u hai Apa dieng khan rawdawdet a aring boi rang maw nanih uh?

Ajarla napa u hai kha na athadet inih, tia imining khan pha bawngte shung rang khan kieini hi inuruchep u inih. Inia nenemna u rang, ama Riethiengna kha atumshom changna rang, kieini hi inachep u inih.
Tuntun hin tu chepna hi ahoi nimak, mahi ana inih. Inia chepna adoisha hai amani rang khan nuk a dikna moshok lungdamna ara kha moshok rangnih.
Khajarkhan nang khut u atalap le nang rukhuk u adawk kha ranak peh u roh.
Kekhawr miring kha na eke nawh ruhut a damna rang, nangke u hai rang khan lam atonpeng kha kon u roh.
Miring kholok le lungdam a ringna rang le khan riethieng a ringna rang, rojo u roh. Makha jaw boi a, tute na Pumi kha muh naw nih.
Tukhat na Pathien numpokmirit kha mathangna boi rang le mulung akha kha na rujung moshok a nawmawshawna u boi rang, riring u roh. Makha na mi tampui pawrimechet inih.
Tute na rejaichon ninawkle richiniei boi miring Esau kha ang a awmna boi rang, riring u roh. Ajarla nekleshak le ama shungshokpui kha ijor inih.
Ajarla nuk a ashok chon kha nangjet uh: rahvan kha arawh jawt phakhan, ama kha rujawt pelai mak. Ama na rahvan kha mikrithi le rutawk joiawm, mulung rulek ngamlai mak.
Ajarla shitthiei mo khan hawng u makche. Mieichong, ahang, ajing, khan rithikhopui awmna mun khan hawng u makche.
Tekawlawi miri le chawngriei hesho awmna khan hawng u makche. Ajet miring hai kha na chawng kha amani dieng rieina boi rang, rudawi uh.
Ajarla ipek chawngpek kha amani na rudoi ngam u mak: “Khan sha kha na`awm mo kha shit joiatu, ama kha lung le deng rang a inih, ninawkle tha le kap rang a inih.”
Ajarla mukchon kha chichairoi inih. Moses na ruti, “Kiei kachihai a kururawnawk.”
Khania Zion mo le aring Pathien khopui, ravan Jerusalem, khan ravantir tengamthoiboi hai dieng khan nang hawng u joi.
Khan ravan a riming imiejiek pe sharapa hai ruchunna le biekrup khan nang hawng u joi. Khan kholok Chawngshatpa Pathien, khan irupummashak midik hai ratha hai dieng nanghawng u joi.
Rawjawtna `thar Palai Jesu dieng nanghawng u joi. Abel thishennek a athadet a iriei, iruphen thishen dieng nanghawng u joi.

Nangni dieng chawngiriei mashapa kha jawt boi nangthawna boi u rang, riring u roh. Ajarla rieliei a chawnginieriei mashapa jawt boi hai kha na rekhe u joi nawkala, ravan ah put ah chawnginieriei masha ama ah put ah nahiei u phakhan, idawr a rekhedet boi rang a maw nanih uh?
Pha `khat khan ama hesho a rieliei hi rurawnawk. Khania tuntu ama na chawngrurakham a iti, “Voikhat tu rielieite hi niboia, ravan hai hiawm rawnawkmashak rang kanih.”
“Voikhat tu,” iti hi ama na ikonsha hai kholok hi rawnawkmashak a loi rangnih. Makha jartu rawnawkthiei boi nieinak hai kha khatikhan rangah rangnih.
Rawnawk ngam boi rengchangna kha kieini na naman u joi jarkhan, Pathien kha mapak u rawi. Mahi le richit le chitnieitak a Pathien chon kha loithiei `khat a thaw u rawi.
Ajarla napathien u hi iemiechiem miei kha inih.
Uliennai numropokna kha chatboia awm rosho.
Jinchonthaw kha mieniei u naw roh. Ajarla khatikhan a thaw kha na jet boi a ravantir hai kha imutung inih.
Shurkhop achangshom `khat ang a, shurkhop miring hai kha mining u roh. Amani le pum `khat anishom `khat ang a, engshiet a itawn miring hai kha nih u roh.
Inniei hi richit a mi kholok kar a shok rosho. Riethieng a ruchun nih rosho. Inia rejai le uire chon thaw miring hai kha Pathien na chawngshat pe rangnih.
Nang ringdan u kha shiernumpoh boi kha chang rosho. Nanginiei nieinak kha le ningnitna niei u roh. Ajarla amatak na iti, “Kiei na nang kha namathan naw ning, kiei na nang kha napai naw ning.”
Khajarkhan mulungartak a nitithiei: “PUMI hi kiei narachang pui kha inih, kiei na chitna niei naw ning. Mi na kiei dieng imaw thaw ngam nih?”
Pathien chawng nariei pe hai, nang lamkai hai kha mininghep u roh. Amani awmchan kha tinta u tana, amani takashawn nunjui kha chang u roh.
Jesu Christa hi majan, von, khan kumshawt a ra`angre inih.
Erekhek shikshik miruchukna kha na nawchawi u naw rosho. Ajarla nekleshak le niboia numpokmirit na nang mulung u imenet kha atha inih. Nekleshak a alut miring hai tute dieng makha na nemna peh mak.
Kieini na maicham `khat nieniei u inih. Thamber a chon thaw hai na makha maicham ah put ah shakna rang, cham niei mak.
Ajarla munu chungchanga pek rang a sha hai thishen kha thiempu rashang na inriethieng hai khan ilut pui inih. Inia sha hai pum hai kha tu ngakmun vai tieng iha inih.
Khajarkhan miring hai kha ama thishentak le riethiengmashakna rang, Jesu na`awm pakawt vai tieng shawna irudoi inih.
Khajarkhan ngakmun vai tieng ah awm ama dieng khan she u taia, ama jakmukna kha vak doi u rawi.
Mahin ashawt a awm rang a khopui kha nieniei boi u jarkhan, ajong rang a khopui `khat kha nitawk u inih.
Khajarkhan ama jar a mapakna moshok rawthawina kha Pathien dieng chatboi a peh u rawi. Nawrawthawina u hi ama riming rophong ner hai ara kha inih.
Inia atha thaw le nieinak reshem kha mieniei u naw roh. Kha ang rawthawina hai kha na Pathien kha ningiminit pe inih.

Nang lamkai hai chawng kha rangai u roh, khan amani cham khan lut u roh. Ajarla mushungna apengir rang a akhat ang a, amani na nang ratha u kha tenireh u inih. Ningshietlam a niboia, ningailam a amani na khatikhan thaw u rosho, ajarla amani ningshietna kha nangni rang nemna naw nih.
Kieini rang nikna nieniei pe u roh. Ajarla lungthim atha `khat kieniei uh, iti hi karangam pui uh. Irikip a richit a aring rang hi kadit uh.
Nangni dieng kawhawngkirrelen ngamna rang, aliendet a mahi nangthawna u rang’ kawnawmawshawk uh.
Tun kumshawt a ashe rang a rawjawtna thishen jar a, kengam hai Kengamroi alien, nupumi u Jesu kha athi ah put ah ihawng chawi, lungdamna apeh Pathien kha na
atha kholok a ama mulungmining thawna rang, inurupummashak u nih rosho. Jesu Christa jar a ama mik`en a ningnitroi kha nangni dieng ithaw nih rosho. Ama dieng kumshawt a alur kha chang rosho. Amen.
Uliennai hai, mahi chawngmawchawi hi atawitek nitjoiawm, mawshawkna chawng hai hi ashawt a doi u roh, tia kinawmawshawk u inih.
Uliennai Timothy kha moshok joi, iti hi jet u roh. Ama na kiei dieng varelen joiatu, nangni apha vat pui rang kanih.
Nang lamkai hai le miriethieng hai kholok kha chubai peh u roh. Italy ah awm hai na chubai navakmawchawi uh.
Numpokmirit kha nang kholok chung a a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Pathien le Pumi Jesu Christa shok, James kiei na retherak ah a awm phung shawmlieidi dieng chubai pekna kieniei.
Kuliennai hai, danenna shikshik nangrawtawng pui u phakhan, ningaina tieng loi u roh.
Ajarla nang takashawn u enrete hi na doiratna moshok, iti kha nangjet uh.
Khan doiratna hi na ama chon rupumping kha rupumping a imoshok inih. Makha rupum le ahun, khan ih khanawm ravat boi nangnitna u rang a inih.
Nang kar ua tukhat na varna ravat joiatu, Pathien dieng nih rosho. Ama na ruphu a le rawkawk boi a ama dieng kholok pek rangnih.
Inia rakhana niei boi a, takashawn le roroia nih rosho. Ajarla rakhana aniei ama kha tu thampui hawng let a rithi na shehawng a ijap a ichawi kha le ra`ang inih.
Kha ang miring kha na tu Pumi dieng ih nita`awm kumuk rangnih, tia mining naw rosho.
Ama kha tu mulungding boi le lam rikip a anet boi miring kha inih.
Khania rede uliennai kha na, mi na ilawmna khan ningai rosho.
Inia rawchawng ama kha na mi na iredemashakna khan ningai rosho. Ajarla champi par achoi kha ang a ama`awm choi rangnih.
Ajarla ni na ama asha kha le hawng shok a champi kha rovoimashak. Ama apar kha cho a emethatna kholok kha thang pe. Kha ang a rawchawng miring ama kha`awm, ama niei rojona khan thang rangnih.
Lemna adoi ngam miring kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih. Makha enretena khan ding ngam jarkhan, Pumi na ama numapoh hai dieng a chawngirurakhamsha ringna renglukhum kha ama na tum rangnih.
Tute na lemna rawtawng pui phakhan, “Pathien na inelem keng,” ti naw rosho. Ajarla Pathien hi ashie kha na ilem ngam nimak, khan ama na tu kha`awm lem mak.
Inia mi rikip kha ama ditrekhe hai rikip kha na ipawt a ima`am inih.
Khan ditrekhe kha marai phakhan, munu a mete inih, khan munu kha hawng chang phakhan, thitna a mete inih.
Kunumpok uliennai hai, nangni kha mi na nomohon u naw rosho.
Atha khutchawi rikip le rupum khutchawi rikip hi chung ah put ah ajong inih, khan mieivar hai Apa ah put ah ajongrok inih. Ama dieng rotho, iti awm mak, khan rilip rawthawt hi ang a rawthawt mak.
Adik apeh chawng jar a ama idittak khan a kieini hi inieniei u inih. Makha ama khutkon hai ara arapa hai kha ninitna u rang a inih.
Khajarkhan kunumpok kuliennai hai, mi rikip na arangai khan relen, achong khan ashum, khan lunghangna khan ashum kha nih rosho.
Ajarla miring lunghangna kha na Pathien dikna kha thaw mak.
Khajarkhan rono rikip le ashie a hawng pung rikip kha heng u tana nang ratha ashan ngam phunsha chawng kha renem le roroia loi u roh.
Khania chawng ranga rangai nih boi a chon a`awm meshe miring hai kha nih u roh. Rangai ranga kha nangnit uatu, nang nining a mohon nana kha nangnih uh.
Ajarla tukhat na chawng kha irangai a, chon a imeshe boi nitjoiatu, ama balam maisho kha mengsheng ah i`en a, tinita kha le ra`ang inih.
Ajarla nining a tinrata a rushe joi, khan relentak a ichat miring runih maw nih, iti kha iemieniei.

Inia tunita`awm ningchamna apeh rupumping dan kha i`en a makhan a a`awm, ama kha ningmieniei miring kha nimak. Inia irangai chawng kha chon a meshe miring kha inih. Ithaw chon rikip khan ama na rahvan muk rangnih.
Nang kar ua tukhat na richichawi miring tu kanih iti, inia ener tu imakha ngam boi a umulungrilik kha imohon, amapa richichawi kha nemna boi inih.
Pathien le Apa maikung a riethieng le pawrche boi richi kha tu: nupaboi hai le mieirawng hai renrorieviei pha a, tenrena le rieliei mawkna ah put ah rechen kha inih.
Kuliennai hai, alur Pumi Jesu Christa dieng a nang takashawn u kha enshietenlar thawna u naw roh.
Ajarla nang ruchunna u khan miring `khat na rangkachak shumkieviek vak mawrawn a ponledier lurtak le rielien, khan shara miring `khat na ponledier rambieng a ava.

Nangni na ponledier atha vak thawpa dieng khan richit nangpekdet ua, “Hin hoining a nushut pe roh,” nangti uh. Khan sharapa dieng khan “Khan ruding roh, ninawkle kekekhawngna hin shuh roh,” nangti uh.
Makhan nangnirilik kar a enshietenlar nangithaw ua, mulungmining ashie aniei chawngshat hai kha anih boi maw nangnih uh?

Rangai u roh, kunumpok uliennai hai, mahi manmieshie shung a shara hai hi takashawn a rawchawng rang a le ama na numipok hai dieng chawngirurakham rengchangna koklo hai kha changna rang, Pathien na irumadan boi maw nih?
Inia nangni na tu shara hai kha richit peh u makche. Nangni epshie a nathaw hai kha rawchawng hai kha anih boi maw nih? Khan danin ah napawt hai kha rawchawng hai kha anih boi maw nih?
Inokoina u riming atha kha amani na imieshiet boi u maw nih?
Miejiek dungjuia rengdan, “Nang ringchangpui kha nang pumtak kha ang a numnangipok rang a inih,” iti hi diktak a nangmushun uatu, atha kha nangithaw u inih.
Nangni na enshietenlar nangthaw uatu, munu kha nangithaw u inih. Khan Dan kha na dankhoi miring hai `khat a inamalar u inih.
Ajarla Dan kholok arung tu kha nita`awm, nieinak `khat a keruthui joiatu, kholok chung a shiet aniei kha inih.
Ajarla “Uire thaw naw roh,” atipa kha na “Mithat naw roh,” awm iti inih. Tun uire kha nangthaw nawkawm, mi nangthat a tu, Dan akhoi miring kha nangnih joi.
Ningchamna napeh rang a dan jar a chawngishat rang a nitjarkhan, nangiriei u rang a shok kha riei u roh, khan nangithaw u rang a shok kha thaw u roh.
Ajarla roihoina mumuk boi ama dieng khan roihoina jaw boi a chawngshat rangnih. Ajarla roihoina kha na chawngshatna kha imawtawr inih.
Kuliennai hai, chon jaw boi a tukhat na takashawn kha kieniei iti kha na imaw nemna pe nih? Takashawn kha na shan ngam nih maw?
Shokpuipa ninawkle shokpuinu `khat hi rekengver a awm a ningthingkip nekleshak niei boi a awm phakhan,
amani pum na irangai kha pek boi a, nang kar ua tukhat na amani dieng “Damveng a she rang roh, lumping rang roh, khan nang vawn ship rang rosho,” ti joiala, imaw nemna nih?
Makha le ra`angre a takashawn kha`awm, chon jaw nawkatu, nining a athi inih.

Inia mi `khat na iti rangnih, “Nang na takashawn kha nangniei, inia kiei tu chon a kithaw inih.” Nang takashawn kha chon jaw boi a numumuk roh, khan katakashawn hi kochonthaw hai hin numumuk rang kanih.
Pathien hi khatte inih, iti kha takanangshawn ua atha joi. Raikho haishe na`awm takashawn ua, rawnawk uh!
Aw amawng miring, chon jaw boi a takashawn kha tu athi inih, iti hi nangjet jawt maw?
Napa u Abraham na ashapa Isaac kha lungkheng ah rupek phakhan, ama chonthaw kha na irumidik boi maw nih?
Ama takashawn kha chon le roroia rumeshe, khan takashawn kha ochonthaw hai kha na rupummashak pe, iti kha nang muk uh.
Miejiek na “Abraham na Pathien kha takarushawn a midik `khat a irute nih joi,” iti kha rurupum inih. Khan ama kha Pathien lawmpa, tia irukoi inih.
Chon na mi kha imidik inih, khan takashawn ranga kha na nimak, iti hi nang muk uh.
Kha le ra`angre a nawchijor Rahab na palai hai kha ama in ah rumutung a lam shik `khat tieng rumeshe phakhan, chon hai kha na irumidik boi maw nih?
Khajarkhan ratha jaw boi taksha kha athi inih, kha le ra`angre a, chon jaw boi takashawn kha`awm athi inih.
Kuliennai hai, akhawkdet chawngshatna nutum u rangnih, iti jet u tana arawplam na miruchuh hai kha nih u naw roh.
Ajarla nokholok na irikip a nirehena u arawp inih. Tukhat na chawngriei a rehelak nawkatu, ama kha rupumping miring kha inih, khan atak kholok akhop ngam kha`awm inih.
Enro, nawchawng u rangaina rang, shakawr bai ah jachan nimawrawn pe ua, upum kholok kha nimiehiei pe u inih.
Enro, rokonglien hi khadawr khan lien a rithi arat na enchak a nawng a`awm, rokong ahang shilite na imiehiei a ahangmeherpa iditna khan imeshe inih.
Kha le ra`ang a mieliei hiawm pasha shilite inih, inia lienrashatak a chawng. Enro, miei`ek shilite na mangpui lien ikang ngam hi!

Khan mieliei hi miei inih. Napasha u kar hin manmieshie dikna boi `khat a mieliei hi itet inih. Mahi na natak pumplang hi imawmawk inih. Mahi na balam ahiei hi ikang inih. Khan Gehenna ah put ah miei kha na ikang inih.
Ajarla ram ah juleva, vawn a rawshawn, khan thampui ranring rikip hi miring hai na imangam le irumangam a awm inih.
Inia mieliei hi tute na mangam ngam mak. Ajarla ama hi alak ngam boi a ashie kha inih, khan thitnathiei tur ashipmer kha inih.
Mahi le napathien u le khan napa u kha imapak inih, khan mahi le Pathien meloi a ikon miring hai kha pumibot inih.
Makha bai khatte shung ah put khan rahvan le pumbotna dire vak shok inih. Kuliennai hai, mahi anih boi rang a shok.
Tuinar khur khatte hin athum le akha tui hawng put maw?
Kuliennai hai, thieichangkung ah longmawt maw ra nih, nitnawkle drakha jam ah thieichang maw ra nih? Khatikhan mun khatte hin a`ah le athum tui putshom ngam mak.
Nang kar ua tumaw ashing le athiei? Ama na varna renem jar a ama awmchan atha kha chon a mumuk rosho.
Inia akha mukmakna le riekiemna kha nang mulung shung u khan nangniei u joiatu, lienrasha u naw roh, khan adik le re`er a mielieishiei thaw u naw roh.
Mahi varna hi chung ah put ah ajong nimak, inia rieliei nun, ratha nih boi le raikho nun ah put ah inih.
Ajarla mukmakna le riekiemna awmna khan reheshuna le ashie rikip kha awm rangnih.
Khania chung ah put ah varna kha tu rapapek a riethieng, lungdamna pekthiei, renem, mi awnoi a awm, ninghoina ship le ara atha, enshietenlar awm boi, khan thanunchan awm boi, hihaihi inih.
Khan dikna ara kha lungdamna rashak hai kha na lungdamhiei a ivawr inih.
