Nang kar ua ra le roshona hai kha khoshekawt ah put ah hawng put maw nih? Amani hai kha nang shung ua ra athaw hoiriethiei ah put ah ahawng nimak maw?
Rekhe a nangdit uh, inia niei u makche. Mi nangthat uh, khan manarshie nangthaw uh, inia man u makche. Nangrosho ua, ra nangthaw uh. Nangnik u boi jarkhan, niei u makche.
Hoiriethiei a rotokna rang khan rehe a nangnik u jarkhan, nangniktu nangnik uh, inia man u makche.
Aw uirepa hai le uirenu hai! Manmieshie le lawmthaw hi Pathien le raha inih, iti hi jet u makche maw? Khajarkhan manmieshie le lawmthaw jawtpa kha tu nining a Pathien le rahana ikon inih.
Ninawkle, “Kieini dieng a awm Ratha kha na ningawroitak a rangai,” iti hi miejiek na nemna boi a iriei keng, tia nangimining u maw nih?
Inia ama na numpokmirit arawpdet kha ipek inih. Khajarkhan miejiek ah ieriei: “Pathien na lienrasha hai kha rodoi pui, inia mulung renem hai dieng khan numpokmirit kha ipek inih.”
Khajarkhan Pathien awnoi khan awm u roh. Diabol kha rodoi pui u roh, khan ama kha nangni ah put ah tan rangnih.
Pathien kha ranai pui u roh, khan ama na naranai pui u rangnih. Nang khut u kha rushuk u roh, Aw munu miring hai. Nang mulung u kha riethiengmashak u roh, Aw mulung ding boi hai.
Awi u roh, jum u roh, khan chap u roh! Nangmunui u kha jumna, khan nangningai u kha maikhuna kha chang rosho.
Pumi maikung a rede u roh, khan ama na nalawm u rangnih.

Khatlekhat dieng ashie a riebieh u naw roh, uliennai hai. Uliennai chung a ashie iriei a, chawngishat ama kha na dan kha imieshiet a chawngishat pe inih. Inia Dan chung a chawngnangshat a tu, Dan arung miring kha nimakche a, chawngmochomi kha nangnih joi.
Dan Apepa `khat awm. Ama na ashan ngam, khan amathang ngam. Khajarkhan tukhat chung a chawngshat nang tumaw nangnih?
Tun she roh, “Von ninawkle jing a khopui `khat ah she a kum `khat vak awm a, rievieithaw a, nemna tampui muk rang,” ati miring hai.
Inia jing a imaw shok nih, iti jet u makche. Nang ringkho u kha imaw nih? Mahi tuiruhu pha bawngte alar a athang kha inih.
Kha ruhut a “Pumi na adit joiatu, kieini naring a mahi ninawkle makha nawthawthiei uh,” nangiti u rang a shok.
Inia tun nangni na nang rangrat chon khan liennangrasha uh. Kha ang lienrashatna kholok kha ashie inih.
Khajarkhan tunita`awm atha thawna kha ejet a, makha thaw joinawkatu, ama rang khan makha munu inih.
Tun she rang roh, Aw rawchawng miring hai, nang chung a shawnarana ajong rang a jarkhan, rie`ieklam a chap u rang roh.
Nang rawchawngna kha rono joi, khan nang ponledier kha lieida na shaksho joi.

Nang rangkachak le nang dangka hai kha ek na shak joi, khan amani ek na ishak kha na nang chung ua kungchang joi. Makha na nang taksha u kha miei ang a nakang pe u rangnih. Nangni na nikho dawng rang khan niei nangbawm uh.
Shawlawh nangimohon u nang loivat hai kha na ra`ai uh. Khan rawkhawm miring hai ara`ai he kha Ramiring hai Pumi nokor kha shok joi.
Nang na ahur a le hoiriethiei a rieliei chung a nang ring joi, that rang a hai kha ang a, nang mulung u kha nangvai uh.
Nangni kha norodoi pui boi midikpa kha nangheng a nangruthat uh.

Khajarkhan uliennai hai, Pumi jong malalim adoi rat u roh. Enro, pieipak na rushur relen le rushur ashum imuk rang a kha, rieliei ara manlu kha arat malalim, loithaw miring hai na doirattak a ingak a awm u inih.
Nangniawm adoi rat u roh. Nang mulung kha menet u roh, ajarla Pumi jongna rang a kha anai joi.
Uliennai hai, nangni kha anahengna boi u rang, nangni khatlekhat chung a mieshiet nana u naw roh. Enro, chawngshatpa kha mawkawt kung ah iding a awm joi!
Kuliennai hai, Pumi riming a chawngruriei thiempulien hai kha shawna le doiratna endar `khat a loi u roh.

Enro, rudoingam miring hai kha rahvanmuh miring inih niti uh. Job doiratna kha nangni na nangrujet u joi. Dawng tieng Pumi na ama dieng a iruthaw pe kha nangrujet uh. Pumi na lungnatna le roihoina kha ama chung a rutet pe.

Inia chungchon a, kuliennai hai, rieliei le ravan, khan tieitang riming ban a chawngrakham u naw roh. Inia nangni na hengna khan nangchona boi u rang, “Awh,” nangitina u khan “Awh,” nih rosho, khan “Nang,” nangitina u khan “Nang,” nih rosho.
Nang kar ua tukhat na shawna maw doi? Ama na nikna niei rosho. Tukhat na mulungparna maw niei? Ama na mapakna lah kha thaw rosho.
Nang kar ua tukhat na natna maw niei? Ama na bieklamkai hai kha koi rosho. Amani na Pumi riming a thao nawt pe u rieshie ama rang nikna niei pe u rosho.
Takashawn nikna kha na anapa kha shan rangnih, khan Pumi na ama kha mothoi rangnih. Munu ruthaw joiatu, Pathien na rangaidam pek rangnih.
Nangdamna u rang, khatlekhat dieng nang shietna u kha rophong u roh, khan khatlekhat rang Pathien dieng nikna niei u roh. Midik miring nikna kha na chon tampui thawna ranak ieniei.
Elijah kha kieini le ra`ang balam miring `khat runih. Ama na mulungluttak a rushurna boi rang, Pathien dieng runik. Khan rieliei chung a kum `thum le tha `ruk ro rushur mak.
Khashole roshurna rang, Pathien dieng runikthep a ravan na ro jong pek, khan rieliei na ama ara kha rumoshok.
Uliennai hai, nang kar ua tukhat na adik ah put ah achai a shik `khat na vak mikir joiatu,
munu miring `khat lamirehena ah put ah avak mikirpa kha na ama ringphuk kha athi ah put ah ashan pe rangnih, khan munu tampui kha mukhu pe rangnih, iti hi jet rosho.
Jesu Christa tirtawn Peter kiei na Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, khan Bithynia ah retherak a awm khotang hai dieng kimiejiek inih.

Amani kha riethiengmashakna Ratha chonthaw jar a, apa Pathien na irujetmasha dungjuia, irumadan u nih joi. Makha Jesu Christa chawngriei rangaina rang le ama thishen kha nang chung ua athingna rang a inih. Numpokmirit le lungdamna kha Pathien na ruphu a nepeh u rosho.
Nupumi u Jesu Christa Apa Pathien kha mapak chang rosho. Ama roihoina ruphu dungjuia, Jesu Christa thoiretna jar a, ngakmining aring nienieina u rang, takthar a kieini hi inomoshok u nih joi.
Makha nangni rang a ravan a ibawm athangthiei boi, rono boi le achoi boi kha nangmanna u rang a inih.
Takashawn jar a dawng pha khan rophong rang a rasham shandamna rang, kieini hi Pathien ranak na nurung joi.
Pha bawngte shung hin enretena shikshik chung a shawna nangidoi u rang a kha rangai joiawm, makhan nangrawshaw uh.

Makha Jesu Christa kha malangmashak phakhan, nang takashawn u riethieng kha mapakna, richitna, khan lurna khan imuk changna rang a inih. Ajarla nang takashawn u kha na, miei na danenshe`awm athangthiei rangkachak kha, ikhe inih.
Ama kha nangmuk u nawkawm, numnangpok u joi. Ama kha nangmuk u nawkawm, takanangshawn u joi. Khajarkhan chawng na imeler ngam boi lurna aship khan nangrawshaw u joi.
Ajarla nang takashawn u ara, nang ratha u shandamna kha nangmuk u joi.
Nangni dieng ajong rang a numpokmirit chungchanga rurophong, thiempulien hai na mahi shandamna chungchang hin riringtak a ruthir ua, rutawk uh.

Amani dieng a awm Christa Ratha kha na Christa shawna hai chungchanga le unuk a ajong rang a lurna hai chungchanga, masha a kungruchang u hai kha itik a le itia rushok maw nih, iti chungchanga irutawk u inih.

Ravan ah put ah ijongtir Ratha Riethieng na nangni dieng athachawng kha ruriei u jar a, hihaihi amani rangte a iruthaw u nimak a, nang chon u awm iruthaw u inih, iti kha amani na nurumalangmashak pe joi. Khahaikha ravantir hai na`awm rumuk jawt uh.

Khajarkhan nang mulungmining u khan rasham u tana nang mulung u kha shur u roh. Jesu Christa kha malangmashak phakhan, nangni rang ijongchawi rang a numpokmirit chung khan nang ngakmining u kha rupumping a tet u roh.
Rieijui naite hai kha ang a, jet boi a matieng a taksha ditrekhena me kha loi u naw roh.
Inia nangni nurukoipa kha riethieng nit jarkhan, nang nunchan u kholok a riethieng kha chang u roh.
Ajarla hitihin rumiejiek, “Kiei hi riethieng kinit jarkhan, nangniawm riethieng u roh.”
Amama chonthaw dungjuia enshietenlar boi a chawngashat, nangpa u kha nangkoi u joiatu, khotang a nangawm shungshe khan chitlam a awm u roh.
Nang pilepu hai ah put ah nemna boi a nitum hai ringna ah put ah athangthiei dangka ninawkle rangkachak kha le inurukhek u nimak,
inia rehena le shebe awm boi kengam thishen ang a, manlu Christa thishen kha na inurukhek u inih, iti kha nangjet uh.
Pathien na ama kha manmieshie phun mala a irujetmasha inih, inia nangni rangbak a mahi dawng pha hin a imalarmashak inih.
Athi ah put ah irumothoi a, ama dieng a lurna rupeh Pathien kha Christa jar a takanangirushawn u inih. Hitihin nang takashawn u kha le nang ngakmining u kha Pathien dieng a`awm inih.

Ratha jar a adik kha nangjui u jarkhan, nang ratha u kha nangriethiengmashak u joi. Makha uliennai chung a thanunchan a niboia numropokna rang a inih. Khajarkhan mulung riethiengtak a khatlekhat numropoh u roh.
Aring le kumshawt a awm Pathien chawng jar a athangthiei muchi ah put ah niboia, athangthiei boi muchi ah put ah athar a inomoshok u nih joi.
Ajarla “Miring kholok hi champi a`ang inih, khan miring lurna kholok hi champi apar le ra`ang inih. Champi na achar, khan apar hai kha ocho.
Inia PUMI chawng tu kumshawt a awm.” Makha nangni dieng a ishem athachawng kha inih.
Khajarkhan shietmining kholok, mimohonna kholok, thanunchan kholok, mukmakna kholok le mimieshietna kholok kha pai u tana,
ashok `thar naite hai ang a, runutui riethieng a`ang Pathien chawng kha vanhat u roh. Makha jar a nangni nangrawshawn u rangnih.
Nangni na Pumi hi numpokthiei inih, iti tuidan kha nangen u joi jarkhan, makha vanhat u roh.
Miring hai na iruheng u, inia Pathien na tu irumadan, manlutak `khat achang, Aring a awm lung ama dieng khan ava nangnih uh.
Nangniawm rathalam inshung le thiempumun riethieng `khat a imothoi, aring lung hai kha nangnih uh. Makha Jesu Christa jar a Pathien dieng rutuk ratha rawthawina kha pekna rang a inih.
Ajarla miejiek a hitihin awm, “Enro, Zion khan kimadansha le manlu lung `khat kuphun joi. Ama takashawn miring kha na jakna shukmuh a muh naw nih.”
Khajarkhan takashawn nangni dieng ama hi manlu `khat inih. Inia chawngjui boi amani dieng tu, “Inthaw miring hai na iheng kik a runiei lung kha ruchang joi.”
Khan “Lung kha na amani keruthuina, khan lungbiei kha na amani bakna ruchang joi.” Amani na chawng kha jui boi u jarkhan, ke`iruthui u inih. Amani keruthui kha imuchuksha inih.

Inia nangni tu phung madan, reng thiempumun, phung riethieng, ama miring achang kha nangnih uh. Makha nangni kha ajing ah put ah ama mieivar ah nakoi shindawngroi Pathien rieihoina kha rophongna rang a inih.
Pha `khat khan Pathien miring runih u makche, inia tuntu Pathien miring hai kha nangnih u joi. Pha `khat khan roihoina kha rumuh u makche, inia tuntu nangni na roihoina kha nangtum u joi.
Kunumpok hai, nang ratha u chung a rathaw munuphung ditrekhe ah put ah nangrechenna u rang, milak hai le khotang hai `khat a, kinawmawshawk u inih.

Phungshik hai kar khan richittak a awm u roh. Makha amani na ashie athaw miring hai nangnih u, tia chawngriei u phakhan, nang chonthaw atha kha muk ua, manmieshie ijongphak rang a Nikho khan, amani na Pathien kha mapakna u rang a inih.
Khajarkhan Pumi rangbak khan, miring hai shena rikip awnoi khan awm u roh. Chungchon a ranakniei reng ama dieng khan nita`awm, ama awnoi khan awm u roh.
Ninawkle, ashie athaw hai kha chepna rang le atha thaw hai kha mapakna rang, reng na irutir rampo hai awnoi khan awm u roh.
Ajarla atha nangithaw u kha na mimawng hai jetnaboi kha nangimakha u kha Pathien mulungmining inih.
Ningcham miring hai kha ang a ring u roh. Ashie kha mukhuna rang, nang ningchamna u kha rotokna boi a, Pathien shok hai kha ang a, ring u roh.
Mi kholok kha richit peh u roh. Takashawn uliennai hai kha numpoh u roh. Pathien kha chih u roh. Reng kha richit peh u roh.
Shok hai, chit kholok le nang pumpa u hai dieng luraw thaw u roh. Atha le mulungrenem hai dieng ranga niboia, arum hai diengawm luraw thaw u roh.
Ajarla, Pathien dieng a nanginiei lungthim jar a, shawna doina boi rangshe khan shawna nangdoi phakhan, makha mapakthiei inih.
Ajarla, nangrehe u jar a rawmawtawng a nangidoi u nitjoiala, nangni rang imaw nemna nih? Inia atha nangthaw a, makha rang khan shawna nangdoi u joiatu, Pathien dieng a ningnitna kha nih rangnih.
Ajarla mahi rang hin a nangni kha inurukoi u inih. Ajarla Christa na kieini rang a shawna irudoi kha endar `khat irumak inih. Makha ama kenu kha nangjuina u rang a inih:
“Ama na munu ruthaw mak, khan ama ner khan milem-midawina rumuh mak.”

Ama kha irachai a engshiet a ruthaw u phakhan, amani dieng khan engshiet kha rumikir mak. Ama na shawna rudoi phakhan, amani kha rumichit mak. Inia adik a chawngashat ama dieng khan nining a rurepeh joi.
Cross chung khan numunu u hai kha upumtak na ruruput joi. Makha kieini na munu hai khan thitna niei a dikna khan ringna rang a inih. Ama apawp shebe kha na nangni kha inurumadam u inih.
Ajarla nangni kha kengam lamrehe kha a`ang nangnih uh, inia tuntu Kengamroi le khan nang ringphuk u tenareh ama dieng khan nangvakkir u joi.
Khatikhan nupui hai, nang inkotak hai awnoi khan awm u roh. Makha eshen na chawng kha jui u joi nawkawm, chawng jaw boi a, unungak hai awmchan kha na amani kha mawjawtna rang a inih.
Richit le taklak a nangring u kha amani na muk u phakhan, nangmawjawt u rangnih.
Nang sham u kha raphanmashak a, rangkachak kha li a, ninawkle ponledier atha thaw a, mailang khan rielien u naw roh.
Makha ruhut a athangthiei boi mulung renem le miri`ir shungrieirit miring kha le rielien u roh. Makha Pathien maikung a manlu inih.
Ajarla ronglui a nupang riethieng hai kha na Pathien dieng ngakmining runiei ua, hitihin rurielien uh. Khan amani inkotak hai awnoi khan ruring uh.
Khatikhan Sarah na Abraham chawng kha rujui a, pumi, tia ama kha rukoi. Inimichit jar a niboia, atha kha nangthaw u joiatu, ama shanu hai kha nangnih u joi.

Inkopa hai, khatikhan nang nungak hai kha riringtak a awm pui u roh. Bekoirat `khat a le ringkho numpokmirit kha atumshom `khat a loi u tana amani kha richit peh u roh. Makha nang inikna u hai kha kharna boi rang a inih.
Dawngkhit a, mulungmining `khat a nang kholok awm u roh. Khatlekhat numropoh u roh. Uliennai hai kha numpoh u roh. Nang mulung u kha renemmashak u tana rede u roh.
Ashie kha ashie le khan rachaina kha rachaina le thung u naw roh. Kha ruhut a rahvan nangtumna u rang, Pathien na inurukoi u inih, iti hi jet u tana rahvan peh u roh.
Ajarla “Ringkho numapoh jawt le khan atha nikho hai amuh jawt miring kha na ashie chawngriei ah put ah iemieliei le mohonna boi rang, ama ner kha makha rosho.
Ama na ashie ah put ah hieirieshie atha kha thaw rosho. Ama na lungdamna kha tawkrieshie makha rojo rosho.
Ajarla midik hai chung a PUMI na imik atetna, khan amani nikna hai kha rangaina rang onokor awdawna. Inia PUMI mai kha ashie athaw miring hai kha le re`er inih.”
Atha kha nangthaw jawt u joiatu, engshiet a natawn u rang a kha tumaw nih?
Dikna rangbak khan shawna nangdoi u joi a awm, rahvanmuh miring kha nangnih uh. “Khan amani michitna khan nangni chih u naw roh, ninawkle mulungshaw u naw roh.”

Inia nang mulung shung ua Pumi Pathien kha riethiengtak a tet u roh. Rede le richit a, nang mulung shung ua awm ngakmining jar a chawng inawrawdawn mi rikip dieng khan rodoi pui rang khan rasham jawnjai u roh.
Christa jar a nang awmchan atha kha ashie athaw `khat a rieishiet phakhan, lungthim atha kha tet u roh, amani na jak muk u rangnih.
Pathien mulungmining kha nitjoiatu, atha nangithaw u jar a shawna nangidoi u kha ashie thaw jar a shawna doinek khan athadet inih.

Ajarla Christa na munu hai jar a voikhat shawna rudoi. Makha midik `khat na midik boi hai rang a iruthaw chon inih. Makha ama na Pathien dieng nawchawina rang a inih. Taksha khan ama kha ruthat uh, inia Ratha jar a ama kha rumiring joi.
Ratha jar a ama na`awm rushe a lungroko shung ah ratha hai dieng khan chawng rurophong.
Tolai voikhat Noah rong a Pathien na doirat a rungaklai, Noah na rokongpui kha rukonlai, tui kar khan ratha ieriet bakte irushan inih.

Tui kha na, Jesu Christa thoiretna jar a, tun a kieini nashan baptisma hi ikhin inih. Makha baptisma kha na nupum ua akhe hi iloi nimak a, atha lungthim ah put ah Pathien dieng a chawngrakham kha inih. Jesu Christa thoiretna jar a baptisma kha na inashan inih.
Ama na ravan a ruhawng a Pathien khut chang tieng khan awm joi. Khan ravantir hai, chamniei hai, khan ranak hai kha Pathien na ama awnoi ah atet joi.
Hitihin Christa na kieini rang taksha a shawna rudoi jarkhan, makha miningtak kha le rapon kha rieshiei u roh. Ajarla taksha a shawna rudoi ama kha na munu ah put ah aranga nih joi.
Khatikhan ama na ringkho dawnshe khan miring hai ditrekhe rang khan ring boi a Pathien mulungmining rang khan ruring inih.

Ajarla rejaikawk, taksha ditrekhena, jukhawp, juhoiriethiei, lawp a juneh, khan mitiroi rilim chubaibawk hai kha thaw a ashesho ringkho khan Phungshik hai mulungmining niruthaw u khan ahunlim nangnih u joi.
Kha`ang arangatna awm boi a along munu khan amani le nangtan boi u jarkhan, shindawngna niei uh. Khajarkhan amani na nangni kha niemieshiet uh.
Inia aring le athi chawngshat rang a rasham ama dieng khan amani na ithaw chon hai jar kha pek u rangnih.

Hijarhin tuntu athachawng kha athi miring hai dieng khanawm irushem pe u inih. Makha amani kha shik miring hai kha ang a taksha dungjuia chawngrushat pe joiawm, Ratha dungjuia amani na ringna rang a inih.
Tun nieinak kholok dawng kha hawng nai joi. Khajarkhan nikna rang khan mulunglut le riring kha nih u roh.
Hihai kholok chung hin khatlekhat rang numpok kha nieichak u roh, ajarla numpok na munu tampui kha imukhu inih.
Muruk a mimieshiet boi a khatlekhat rang a jinchonthiei kha chang u roh.
Mi rikip na khutchawi inieirim nit jarkhan, Pathien numpokmirit arawp dungjuia nieitin atha hai `khat a, khutchawi kha khatlekhat dieng chonthawna a rotokna u roh.

Tukhat na chawng riei joiatu, Pathien chawngtak kha ang a riei rosho. Tukhat na michon thaw joiatu, Pathien na ipek ranak kha le thaw rosho. Makha Jesu Christa jar a nieinak kholok chung a Pathien kha mapakna rang a inih. Lurna le ranak kha kumshawt a ama dieng a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
Kunumpok hai, enneretena u rang, ajeng a shawna enretena khan, nangni dieng erekhek ashok ang a, shindawngna niei u naw roh.
Inia Christa shawna khan shaw puishom u tana ningai u roh. Makha Christa lurna kha malangmashak phakhan, rawshawlam a nangningaina u rang a inih.

Christa riming rang khan engshiet nangtum u joiatu, rahvantha kha nangnih uh. Ajartu lurna le Pathien Ratha kha na nangni dieng awm joi. Amani rang tu ama hi mieshietna kha inih, inia nangni rang tu ama hi lurna kha inih.
Inia mithat ninawkle murushah ninawkle ashie athaw miring ninawkle mi tieitang jar a khut araw miring `khat a shawna kha doi u naw roh.
Inia tukhat na Christian `khat a shaw joiatu, jak naw rosho, inia hi chungchang hin Pathien kha mulur rosho.
Ajarla Pathien in ah chawngshatna putna rang a pha kha jong joi. Khan makha kieini dieng put masha joiatu, Pathien athachawng ajui boi hai dawng kha imaw ninih?
Tun “Midik rang khan shanna kha shaw joiala, pathienjet boi le munu miring rang khan imaw rachang nih?”
Khajarkhan Pathien mulungmining dungjuia shawna adoi miring hai kha na takashawn rang a rutuk nakonpa ama dieng, atha chon thaw a, amani ratha kha peh u rosho.
Christa shawna khan kungruchang le irophong rang a lurna kha atum rang, bieklamkai `khat changna a, nang kar ua bieklamkai hai dieng khan mawshawkna kieniei.

Nang kar ua awm Pathien kengam hai kha roina rang, kengamroi hai chon kha thaw u roh. Makha nangni na epchon a niboia, mulungdit a, khan mulung dik boi nemna rang khan niboia, ningawroitak a thaw u roh.
Khan nangni dieng khutinorotho u chung khan chungrasha boi a, kengam hai dieng khan endar chang u roh.
Khan Kengamroi Ulienchang kha na jonglar phakhan, achoi boi lurna renglukhum kha nangtum u rangnih.

Khatikhan khangthar hai, nangni na lamkai hai awnoi a awm u roh. Nang kholok na khatlekhat awnoi a awm u roh. Khan redena kha rieshiei u roh. Ajarla, “Pathien na lienrasha hai kha akhar, khan rede hai dieng khan numpokmirit kha ipek inih.”
Khajarkhan ranakniei Pathien khut noi khan rede u roh. Makha Pathien na chanthatna `khat a nangni kha nalawmna rang a inih.
Nang mulungshaw kholok kha ama dieng tetna u roh, ajarla ama na nangni kha anareh uh.
Mulung kha khop u roh. Riring u roh. Ajarla nang rahapui u diabol kha kieipui murung kha ang a, tumaw kashak rang, tia shehawng a awm.
Ama kha khar u roh. Nang shawna u kha le ra`ang shawnatak kha nang uliennai hai na`awm rieliei hin doi u, iti kha jet u tana, nang takashawnna u khan dingrep u roh.

Khan Jesu Christa dieng a ama kumshawt lurna a inurukoina numpokmirit kholok Pathien kha na, apha bawngte nangshaw u shole, nurupummashak u rangnih, namarat u rangnih, nemenet u rangnih, khan nettak a nimiding u rangnih.
Lurna le ranak kha kumshawtkumshawt a ama dieng awm rosho. Amen.

Takashawnthiei `khat inih, tia kiruloi uliennai Silvanus jar a, kiei na tawihiei a kiemiejiek inih. Pathien numpokmirit kha adik inih, tia kinawmawshawk ua, khan kungachang kanih. Numpokmirit khan dingrep u roh.
Nangni le imadanshom Babylon ah awmnu na chubai nepek uh. Khan kashapa Mark na`awm chubai nepek uh.
Numpok biengrutum kha le khatlekhat dieng chubai repeh u roh. Jesu Christa dieng a awm nang kholok dieng lungdamna kha a`awm nih rosho. Amen.

Jesu Christa shok le tirtawn Simon Peter kiei na takashawn aman hai nangni dieng kimiejiek inih. Napathien u le nashandampa Jesu Christa dikna jar a, nangiman u takashawn kha ki`iman u takashawn kha le manrawp ra`angre.
Pathien le nupumi u Jesu Christa jetna shung khan numpokmirit le lungdamna kha apung nih rosho.
Ringna le Pathien chitna rang a rangai rikip kha Pathien ranak na kieini dieng nepek joi. Makha ama lurna le ama thatna jar a kieini hi nurukoipa kha nejet u jar a inih.

Khahaikha jar a alientak le manlutak chawngrakham hai kha ama na kieini dieng nepek joi. Makha amani jar a, ditrekhena jar a manmieshie shung a awm morona ah put ah nangrekhe ua, Pathien balam kha atumshom nangnitna u rang a inih.
Ajarla makhatak jarkhan mulungluttak a nang takashawn u khan tharieina, tharieina khan jetna,
jetna khan takshurna, takshurna khan doiratna, doiratna khan Pathien chitna,
Pathien chitna khan uliennai numropokna, uliennai numropokna khan numpok kha bo u roh.
Ajarla hihai kholok hi nangniei ua, nang kar ua pung joiatu, nupumi u Jesu Christa jetna khan rongawm rong u naw tinih, khan ara boi kha`awm chang u naw tinih.
Ajarla hihaihi aniei boi ama kha mik`entawi le mikchaw inih, khan ama munu alui hai kha riethiengmashak joi, iti kha imieniei inih.
Khajarkhan uliennai hai, inokoina u le inamadanna u kha akalang moshokna rang, mulungluttak a thaw u roh. Ajarla makha nangthaw u joiatu, keruthuina kha shukniei a niei u naw tinih.
Ajarla nupumi le nashandampa u Jesu Christa kumshawt rengchangna khan rupumping a lutna kha nepek u rangnih.
Nanginiei u adik khan nettak a nimiding u, iti kha nangjet u joiawm, mejet jawnjai rang hin kiei na ishawn boi a thaw jawt mi`ing.
Kiei na mahi thamber hin kaw`awmlailim, nangni kha mejetret a meche rang hi adik chon `khat a koloi.
Nupumi u Jesu Christa na inumumuk dungjuia, kathamber hi relen a kimak rang a nih joi, iti hi kiei na kejet.
Kiei na kakawchawi shole, hihaihi nangmining jawnjaina u rang, kiei na thawtuk kha kithaw inih.

Ajarla nupumi u ranak le Jesu Christa jongna rang a kinemejetna u khan, miring hai na shingveng a ikon lungthurishim kha kieini na rujui u mi`ing, inia ama renglur mikkungchang hai kha kuruchang u inih.

Ajarla Erekhek a Lurna ah put ah he `khat na ama dieng chawngriei phakhan, Apa Pathien ah put ah richit le lurna kha irumuk inih: “Mahi kunumpok kashapa kha inih, ama dieng hin ningnitna kha kieniei.”
Khan ravan ah put ah ajong mahi hesho hi kieini na ama le lawn riethieng ah kuruawm u lai khan kirujet u inih.

Khajarkhan thiempulien hai chawng hai kha kieini rang anet nih joi. Kho hawng var masheng, khan jingkar arshi kha na nang mulung shung ua awm masheng, jingna mun a avar thaomiei khan nokor nangimiding u kha ang a, amani chawng hai khan nokor nangmiding pe u joiatu, nangni rang tha rangnih.
Akhat changna a mahi jet u roh, makhala miejiek rophong `khatsheawm miring `khat ah put ah hawng shok nimak.
Ajarla miring mulungdit a rophongchawng hawng shok mak. Inia amani kha Ratha Riethieng na imeper le roroia iruriei u inih.

Inia mi hai kar a thiempulien jok hai ruawm kha le ra`ang a, nang kar ua`awm thiempulien jok hai kha hawng awm rangnih. Inamathangthiei ruchukna jok kha amani na murukte a hawng chawi u rangnih. Amani rurawchawh Pumpashe kha rujawt u mak, khan relentak a thangna kha amanirilik dieng imuchut u inih.
Khan mi tampui na amani rejaikawk chon kha jui u rangnih. Amani jar a adik lam kha na mieshietna muk rangnih.
Khan amani raphamna jar a lemna chawng le nangni kha vetrotokna a nawthaw u rangnih. Ashawt pha ah put ah amani chung a chawngshatna kha rudaw mak, khan amani chung a thangna kha rumiei mak.
Ajarla Pathien na munu thaw ravantir hai kha ruhawi boi a rui ajing le khoplam a tartaros a ruthong a chawngshatna rang khan rutet joiatu,
ama na Pathienjet boi manmieshie chung a tuilien jong chawi phakhan, dikna rophong Noah kha shiri eshen le rushan joiawm, ronglui hai kha ruhawi nawkatu,
Sodom le Gomorrah khopui hai kha ruvut rurashatmashak a irumathangbieng kha ahawng rang a Pathienjet boi a aring hai rang a endar `khat a rutet joiatu,
danishawnboi miring hai rejaikawk chon kha na ningirumieshiet pe u midik Lot kha Pathien na rushan joiatu
(makha midikpa kha amani kar a ruawm inih. Amani danishawnboi chon hai kha irumuk a irujet nitjoiatu, makha na ama dikna ringphuk kha nikhonikho a irumawshaw pe u inih),
Pathienchi miring kha lemna ah put ah itia ishan rang a maw nih, khan midik boi hai kha chawngshatna Nikho rang le chepna rang itia ihawi rang a maw nih, iti kha Pumi na ijet inih.
Khinniei a taksha ashie ditrekhe dungjuia aring hai le chamniei hai ishawn boi hai chung khan inih. Amani kha chitchai jet boi, ningnom a awm, lienrang hai mieshiet rang, achih boi hai kha runih uh.
Ravantir hai kha amaninek a ratna le ranak a liendet u joiawm, Pumi maikung a amani chung a chawngshatna rang, mieshietna chawng kha riei u mak.
Inia hihai miring hi mining awm boi, shur a that rang a, ramsha hai a`ang, amani na ijet boi u nieinak hai chung a mieshietna chawng kha riei uh. Amani amna u khan ambieng u rangnih.

Amani idikna boi u lawh kha imuk u rang a inih. Amani na nishun khan lungtawr shie khan ningai uh. Amani kha adelawk le mieshiet kha chang uh. Amani na nangni le lungtawr shie thaw u phakhan, amani mimohonna khan ningai uh.
Imik u hai khan uire ship jarkhan, munu thaw chat u mak. Anet boi ratha hai kha ahawr uh. Rapham chon thaw rang khan amani mulung u khan ajeng a ruthaw uh. Pathien na pumibot naite hai kha chang uh.
Amani na adik lam kha apai ua, lamrehe uh. Dikna boi lawh numrupoh, Bosor shapa Balaam lam kha amani na rujui uh.
Inia achawngthiei boi ranngam kha na miring hesho a ruchawng a ama shietna jar a rurawkawk, khan thiempulien vetna kha rukhar pe.
Hihai miring hi tui awm boi tuikhur, rithikhopui na inawng romiei kha nih uh. Amani rang khan kumshawt a jingnakhap kha ihawi pe inih.
Ajarla nemna boi chawngriei a lienrasha hai kha na, amani taksha ditrekhe le rejaikawk chon khan, rehe a aring hai ah put ah dengre a vakrekhelimlai, amani kha ruhawr uh.
Amanirilik amna shok a awm chuchung ua, ningchamna chawngrakham kha amani dieng rophong uh. Ajarla ih `khat na miring chung a pumpa chang joiatu, makha miring kha makha nieinak shok kha achang inih.
Ajarla, Pumi le shandampa Jesu Christa jetna jar a manmieshie amna ah put ah rurekhe u shole, amani na lut u ret phakhan, elem a mawtawr u joiatu, putnanek khan dawng kha amani rang khan shiedet.
Ajarla amani na dikna kha jet u shole, Pathien na amani dieng a irupek chawngpek riethieng ah put ah akirnek a tu, dikna lam kha irujet boi u rang a kha amani rang athadet inih.
Inia chawngrichi adik dungjuia, mahi amani dieng a ashok inih: “Ui na ama moloktak dieng khan ikir,” khan “Vawkpui na tuirobo joiawm, chir irobothep inih.”
Kunumpok hai, adi changna chawngmawchawi hi tun nangni dieng kimiejiek inih (chawngmawchawi dire khan nang mulung u riethieng kha mothoina rang, mejetnaret `khat a kimiejiek inih).
Makha thiempulien riethieng hai na matieng a irurieisha chawng hai le khan nang tirtawn u hai dieng irurieinasha u Pumi le Shandampa chawngpek hai kha nangminingna u rang a inih.
Akhat changna a mahi jet u roh, makhala nikho dawng hai khan erawh thaw miring hai kha jong rangnih. Amani na amani ditrekhe dungjuia ring u rangnih.
Amani na ti u rangnih, “Ama jongna rang a chawngrakham kha khoshekawt ah maw awm joi? Ajarla nipilepu hai ruthi uah put khan nieinak kholok khati momoi khan konputpek ah put ah ruawm inih.”
Ajarla amani na mahi chana a jetnaw`awm iruthaw u inih, makhala tona a ravan hai hi Pathien chawng jar a irumaw`awm inih, khan rieliei hi tui ah put ah le tui shung ah irumidingsho nih joi.
Khalai a ruawmsha miring hai kha tui na ruhup a rumathang joi.
Khan makha chawngtak kha na tuntun a ravan le rieliei hi miei rang khan a ihawi inih. Mahi chawngshatna le pathienjet boi miring thangna Nikho rang khan a ama na itet inih.
Inia kunumpok hai, mahi `khat hi mieniei u naw roh, makhala Pumi rang tu ni `khat hi kum bawp `khat le ra`ang inih, khan kum bawp `khat hi ni `khat le ra`ang inih.

Tukhat na ashum `khat a mining joiawm, Pumi tu ama chawngrakham chungchang khan shum mak, inia kieini rang idoishom inih. Khan tukhatshe na athang rang a kha ama na dit mak, kha ruhut a mi rikip na mulung ilek rang a kha idit inih.

Inia Pumi Nikho kha jan a murushah ang a jong rangnih. Khan ravan hai kha helehoi rekhektak le hek rangnih, khan kha shung a awm nieinak kholok miei le longchen rangnih. Khan rieliei le kha shung a awm chon hai kha kang rangnih.
Hihai kholok hi hitihin a animjit rang a nit jarkhan, itia riethieng le Pathien chih miring achang rang a maw nangnih, iti kha mining u roh.
Pathien Nikho jongna rang a kha tuiravawncham ang a rungak u roh. Makha nikho jarkhan, ravan hai kha miei a rinim ning, tia kha shung ah awm nieinak hai kha miei a long rangnih.
Inia ama chawngrakham dungjuia, dikna awmna ravan athar hai le rieliei athar kha nirungakrala u inih.
Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, nangni na hihaihi nangingakrala u le roroia, jie awm boi, ninawkle metek boi a lungdam a ama na numukna u rang, enchak a rojo u roh.
Khan nupumi doiratna kha shandamna `khat a loi u roh. Nunumpok u uliennai, Paul na`awm, ama dieng varna ipek dungjuia, nangni dieng irumiejiek kha a`ang inih.

Hihai chungchang hin ama chawngmawchawi kholok a iriei inih. Amani shung khan eshen tu jet amatat inih. Makha mimawng le mi riding boi hai kha na amani thangnatak rang khan iriephiermashak u inih. Miejiek shik dieng khanawm khatikhan a ithaw u inih.
Khajarkhan kunumpok hai, hihaihi nangni na masha a nangjet u joi jarkhan, riring u roh. Khanawkatu mi shie hai irehena kha le nawchawichen u ning, tia nangnetna uah put ah nangcho u rangnih.
Inia nupumi le nashandampa u Jesu Christa numpokmirit le jetna khan rawshawn u roh. Ama dieng tun le kumshawt dire hin mapakna kha awm rosho. Amen.
Mahi putna ah ruawm, kirujet u, kimik le kirumuk u, khan kiruenrep ua, khut le kirushit u ringna chawng chungchanga inih.
Ringkho kha rular jarkhan, kieini na kurumuk ua, kungkachang u joi. Khan Apa dieng a ruawm le kieini dieng a rular, kumshawt ringna kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih.
Khan kieini na kirumuk u le kirujet u kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih. Makha nangniawm kieini le rawlawpnathiei rang a inih. Khan diktak a nawrawlawpna u hi tu Apa khan Ashapa Jesu Christa le inih.
Khan nang ningaina u kipna rang, hihaihi nangni dieng kimiejiek inih.
Khan ama ah put ah kirujet u chawngriei kha nangni dieng kirophong u inih, makhala Pathien hi mieivar kha inih, khan ama dieng hin jingna kha shukawm a awm mak.
Kieini na ama le nawrawlawp niti a ajing a nalawn uatu, mielieishiei nithaw u inih, khan adik kha thaw u makme.
Ama na mieivar a awm hi ang a, kieiniawm mieivar a nalawn uatu, khatlekhat rawlawpna kha nieniei u joi. Khan Ashapa Jesu Christa thishen kha na munu rikip ah put ah nieriethiengmashak u joi.
Kieini na munu niei mi`ing niti uatu, ninining a mohon nana nanih uh, khan adik kha kieini dieng awm mak.
Kieini na numunu u hai kha norophong uatu, ama tu takashawn rang a rutuk le dikna kha inih, ama na numunu u hai kha narangaidam pe u rangnih, khan dikna boi kholok ah put ah nieriethieng u rangnih.
Inia kieini na munu thaw mi`ing niti uatu, ama kha mielieishiei thaw miring nimachang a ama chawng kha kieini dieng awm mak.
Kanai hai, munu nangthawna boi u rang, hihaihi kimiejiek inih. Khan tukhat na munu thaw a`awm, kapa maikung a Narashappui rang, midik miring Jesu Christa kha nieniei u inih.
Khan Christa hi numunu u rang a ringnikna rawthawina kha inih; kieini ranga rang nimak, inia manmieshie kholok rangawm inih.
Ama chawngpek kha nurung uatu, mahin ama kha nejet uh, iti kha kieini na nijet u inih.
“Ama kha kejet,” ati miring kha na ama chawngpek hai kha rung nawkatu, ama kha mielieishiei miring kha inih, khan adik kha ama dieng awm pe mak.
Tunita`awm ama chawng kha arung ama dieng khan diktak a Pathien numpokna kha rupum pe inih. Mahin kieini na ama dieng na`awm uh, iti kha nijet u inih.
Ama dieng ka`awm ati miring kha na ama aring dan khan aringir rang a inih.
Uliennai hai, kiei na nangni dieng chawngpek athar kimiejiek nimak, inia putna ah put ah nangiruniei u chawngpek alui kha inih. Chawngpek alui kha putna ah put ah nangirurangai u chawng kha inih.
Khan chawngpek athar nangni dieng kiemiejiekthep, mahi ama dieng le nangni dieng adik inih. Ajarla ajing kha thangsho a adik mieivar kha tun var a awm joi.
Mieivar a ka`awm tu iti, inia ama uliennai tu imukmak ama kha tunshe hin ajing a awm nilai.
Uliennai numapoh ama kha mieivar a awm inih, khan ama dieng bakna awm pe mak.
Inia uliennai amumak miring kha tu ajing a awm kha inih, khan ajing khan aring inih. Ama na khotang tieng ah she maw kanih, iti jet mak, ajarla ajing kha na imik hai kha imawchawt pe inih.
Kunumpok naite hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, makhala ama riming jar a nang munu u hai kha arangaidam joi.

Apa hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla kung ah put ah ama kha nangjet u joi. Rothar hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla nangni na mi shie kha nangmawtawr u joi. Naite hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla nangpa u kha nangjet u joi.

Apa hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla kung ah put ah ruawm ama kha nangjet u joi. Rothar hai, nangni dieng kiemiejiek, ajarla nangni nangrat uh, khan Pathien chawng kha nangni dieng awm joi, khan nangni na mi shie kha nang mawtawr u joi.
Manmieshie le kha shung a awm nieinak hai kha numpoh u naw roh. Tukhat na manmieshie hi numpok a tu, ama dieng Apa numpokna kha awm mak.
Ajarla manmieshie shung a awm nieinak: pum ditrekhena, mik hai ditrekhena, khan ringkho lienrashatna, kholok hi apa tah kha nimak, inia manmieshie tah kha inih.
Khan manmieshie hi ama ditrekhena kha le thang rangnih, inia Pathien mulungmining athaw miring kha na kumshawt a awm rangnih.
Naite hai, dawng pha kha nih joi, khan Christa jok jong rangnih, iti kha nangjet uh. Kha ang khan tunawm Christa jok tampui pung joi. Mahi na dawng pha kha nih joi, iti kha inemejet u inih.

Kieini ah put ah amani kha rushesho joi, inia kieini ah put ah ruthoi nih u mak. Kieini ah put runih uala ruawm u rangnih. Inia rushe u kha na amani kholok kha kieini ah put runih u mak, iti kha imalar inih.
Khan Riethieng ah put ah thaonawtna kha nangniei u joi, khan kholok kha nangni na nangjet uh.
Adik kha nangjet boi u jar a nangni dieng kimiejiek nimak, inia makha nangjet u jar a inih, ajarla mielieishiei rikip adik ah put nimak.
Jesu hi Christa inih, iti rapha miring kha ninawkala, tumaw nih mielieishiei thaw miring kha? Ama kha Apa le Shapa chung a rapha Christa le re`er miring kha inih.
Tunita`awm Shapa chung a rapha kha na Apa kha niei mak. Ashapa rophong miring kha na Apa kha`awm ieniei inih.
Kung ah put ah nang irujetsha u kha nangni dieng awm rosho. Kung ah put ah nangirujetsha u kha nangni dieng awm a tu, Apa dieng le khan Shapa dieng khan nang awm u rangnih.
Khan mahi kieini dieng a chawngirurakhamsha chawngrakham kha inih, khan makha kumshawt ringna kha inih.
Nangni nomohon rang a hai jar a mahi nangni dieng kimiejiek inih.

Khan ama ah put ah nangiruloi u thaonawtna kha nangni dieng awm. Tukhat na inuruchuk u rang a kha nemna awm mak. Ajarla thaonawtnatak kha na kholok chungchanga inuruchuk u inih. Makhala adik kha inih, khan mielieishiei kha nimak. Khan makha na inuruchuk u tak kha ang a, nangni ama dieng awm u roh.
Khan tun, naite hai, ama jonglar phakhan, narangamna u rang le ama maikung a jak numukna boi u rang, ama dieng awm u roh.
Ama hi adik miring kha inih, iti kha nangjet uatu, dikna athaw miring rikip kha ama ah put ah jong shok inih, iti hi nangijet u inih.
Enro, kieini hi Pathien naite hai tia koina rang, idawr a alien numpok kha Apa na kieini dieng inepek maw nih! Khajarkhan manmieshie na kieini hi nejet u mak, ajarla mahi na ama kha rujet mak.

Kunumpok hai, tun kieini hi Pathien nai hai kha nanih u joi, khan kieini hi ih rachang rang a maw nanih u, iti kha lar maklai. Kieini na nijet u kha tu, alar phakhan, ama le nara`ang u rangnih, ajarla amama kha ang a kieini na numuk u rangnih.
Ama dieng a mahi ngakmining aniei rikip kha na, ama riethieng anih kha ang a, nining a riethieng rangnih.
Tunita`awm munu athaw kha na Danishawnboi kha ithaw inih, khan munu hi Danishawnboi kha inih.
Munu hai achawiviek rang a ama kha Pathien na malar joi. Ama dieng khan munu awm mak, iti kha nangjet uh.
Ama dieng a awm tu kha na munu kha thaw a awm mak. Khan munu athaw tu kha na ama kha muawm muh maklai, khan jetawm jet maklai.
Naite hai, tute na nangni kha nomohon u naw rosho. Ama kha midik anitak kha ang a, dikna athaw ama kha midik kha inih.
Munu athaw ama kha diabol ah put inih, ajarla kung ah put diabol kha na munu kha iruthaw inih. Makha jarkhan diabol chon thaw hai kha mathangna rang, Pathien Shapa kha irumalar inih.
Tunita`awm Pathien ah put ah jong shok ama kha na munu thaw naw nih. Ajarla ama chi kha ama dieng awm, khan ama na munu kha thaw ngam mak, ajarla ama kha Pathien ah put inih.
Mahi na Pathien nai hai le khan diabol nai hai kha imalar inih. Tunita`awm dikna athaw boi le uliennai numapoh boi ama kha Pathien ah put ah nimak. Khatlekhat Numropokna
Kieini khatlekhat numropoh u rawi, iti chawngkung hi keng nangni na kung ah put ah nangirurangai u kha.

Kieini na Cain kha a`ang boi rang nashok uh. Ama kha mi shie `khat ah put ah runih, khan anaipangpa kha iruthat inih. Ijar a ama kha iruthat maw nih? Ajarla ama chon hai kha ashie kha runih pe, khan anaipangpa chon hai kha dikna kha runih pe.
Kuliennai hai, manmieshie na numukmak u joiawm, shindawngna niei u naw roh.
Kieini na khatlekhat numnoropoh u jarkhan, thitna ah put ah ringna tieng rawthawt kha nanih u joi, iti kha nejet uh. Tunita`awm uliennai numapoh boi ama kha thitna khan a a`awm inih.
Uliennai amumak miring rikip kha mithat miring inih. Mithat miring rikip na ama dieng khan kumshawt ringna kha awm pe mak, iti kha nangjet uh.
Mahin kieini na numpok hi imaw nih, iti kha nejet uh, makhala amatak na kieini ruhut a iringkho kha irupek inih. Khajarkhan niringkho u hi nuliennai hai rang khan nipek u rang a shok.
Tukhat na manmieshie niei ieniei a, khan uliennai aravatna kha muk phakhan, lainatna kha niei nawkala, itia maw Pathien numpokna kha ama dieng awm nih?
Naite hai, chawng ninawkle mieliei a nih boi chon a le adik a numropoh u rawi.
Hin ah put ah kieini hi adik ah put ah nanih, iti hi nejet u rangnih, khan ama maikung a numulung u hi nawmawjawi u rangnih.
Numulung u hi na naheng ua`awm, Pathien tu numulung u nek a liendet, khan ama na kholok kha jetviek.
Kunumpok hai, numulung u hi na naheng u nawkatu, Pathien maikung a rangamna kha nieniei u joi.
Ama chawngpek hai kha nijui u le khan ama maikung a ningnitna kha nawthaw u jarkhan, kieini na ninik u hai kholok kha ama ah put ah nimuk u inih.

Mahi ama chawngpek inih, makhala kieini na ashapa Jesu Christa riming kha takashawnngir rang nanih uh. Khan ama na kieini dieng a chawnginepek u kha ang a, kieini khatlekhat numropongir rang a nanih uh.
Khan ama chawngpek ajui kha na ama dieng awm, khan ama na ama dieng awm. Mahin, kieini dieng a inurupek Ratha jar a, ama hi kieini dieng awm, iti kha nijet u inih.
Kunumpok hai, ratha rikip kha takashawn u naw roh, inia ratha hai kha Pathien ah put ah maw nih, iti kha enrete u roh. Ajarla thiempulien jok tampui rieliei a rushe u joi.
Mahin Pathien Ratha kha nangjet uh: Jesu Christa hi miring a jong inih, tia rophong ratha rikip kha Pathien ah put ah inih.

Jesu Christa hi miring a ajong inih, tia rophong boi ratha rikip kha Pathien ah put ah nimak. Mahi jong rangnih, tia nangirujet u Christa le re`er ratha kha inih. Tun manmieshie shung a mahi a`awmsha nih joi.
Naite hai, nangni Pathien ah put ah nangnih uh, khan amani kha nangmawtawr u joi. Ajarla manmieshie shung a awm amanek khan nangni dieng a awm ama kha liendet.
Amani kha manmieshie ah put ah nih uh, khan amani kha manmieshie chawng dan a chawng uh, khan manmieshie na amani chawng kha rangai pe uh.
Kieini hi Pathien ah put ah nanih uh. Pathien ajet miring kha na niriei u hai hi rangai. Pathien ah put nih boi ama kha na niriei u hi rangai mak. Mahin adik ratha le rehena ratha kha nijet u inih.
Kunumpok hai, kieini khatlekhat numropoh u rawi, ajarla numpok hi Pathien ah put ah inih. Khan numropoh miring rikip kha Pathien ah put ah shok inih, khan ama na Pathien kha ejet.
Numapoh boi ama kha na Pathien kha jet mak, ajarla Pathien hi numpok inih.
Mahin kieini dieng Pathien numpok kha rumalar: ama jar a niringnathiei rang, Pathien na ashapa khatte kha manmieshie shung hin jong tir joi.
Mahi shung hin numpok kha awm: kieini na Pathien kha numnirupok u nimak, inia ama na kieini hi numinurupok a ashapa kha numunu u jar a ringnikna rawthawina `khat a ijongtir inih.
Kunumpok hai, Pathien na kieini hi khatikhan numnurupok joiala, kieiniawm khatlekhat numropongir rang a nashok uh.
Tute na Pathien hi mumaklai. Kieini khatlekhat numnoropoh uatu, Pathien na kieini dieng awm, khan ama numpok kha kieini dieng irupummashak inih.
Aratha kha kieini dieng nepek joi jarkhan, kieini na ama dieng na`awm uh, khan ama na kieini dieng awm, iti hi nejet u joi.
Khan kieini na numuk u joi, khan kungnachang u joi, makhala Apa na Shapa kha manmieshie Shandampa `khat a jong tir joi.
Tunitjoiawm Jesu hi Pathien Shapa inih, tia rophong a tu, Pathien kha ama dieng awm, khan ama na Pathien dieng awm.

Khajarkhan Pathien na kieini dieng a iniei numpok kha kieini na nejet ua, takanawshawn u joi. Pathien hi numpok inih. Numpok shung a awm miring kha na Pathien dieng awm, khan Pathien na ama dieng awm.
Mahin chawngshatna Nikho a rangamna nienieinathiei rang, numpok kha nakar ua nurupummashak joi. Ajarla ama kha ang a kieini hi manmieshie shung a awm nanih uh.

Numpok shung a chitna kha awm mak, khan rupumping numpok kha na chitna kha inawt inih. Ajarla chitna hi chepna le asheshom inih. Khan achih miring ama dieng khan Pathien numpok kha irupummashak boi inih.
Ama na kieini hi numnurupokmasha jarkhan, kieini na ama kha numnipok u inih.

Tukhat na, “Pathien kha numkopok,” tia ama uliennai hai kha mukmak joiatu, ama kha mielieishiei thaw miring kha inih. Ajarla imik na imuk uliennai hai kha numapoh boi miring kha na itia maw mik a muk boi Pathien kha numpoh ngam nih?
Khajarkhan ama ah put ah nimuk chawngpek kha hi inih: Pathien numapoh miring kha na ama uliennai hai kha numipokngir rang a shok inih.
Tunita` awm Jesu hi Christa inih, tia takashawn ama kha Pathien ah put ah jong shok inih. Khan omoshok ama numapoh miring kha na ama na imoshok ama kha`awm numpok.
Kieini na Pathien kha numnopok a ama chawngpek kha nujui u phakhan, kieini na Pathien nai hai kha numnopok, iti kha nejet uh.
Ama chawngpek hai nijui u hi Pathien numpok kha inih. Khan ama chawngpek hai kha tu, arik nimak.
Ajarla Pathien ah put ah jong shok ama kha na manmieshie hi imawtawr inih. Manmieshie mawtawr ramawtawrna kha natakashawn u hi inih.
Jesu hi Pathien Shapa inih, tia takashawn miring ama kha manmieshie mawtawr miring nitjoiawm, ama kha tumaw ninih?
Jesu Christa hi tui le thishen ranak a ajong inih, tui ranga ranak a ajong nimak, inia tui le thishen ranak a inih. Mahi Ratha na kungachang inih, ajarla Ratha hi adik inih.
Ravan a kungachang `thum awm: Apa, Chawng, khan Ratha Riethieng, hihai `thum hi khatte inih.
Khan rieliei kungmachang hai kha `thum inih: Ratha, tui khan thishen, hihai `thum hi rawjawt inih.
Miring hai kungchangna kha noloi uatu, Pathien kungchangna kha liendet. Ajarla Pathien kungchangna kha hi inih: ama na ashapa chungchanga kungchang joi.
Pathien Shapa takashawn kha na nining a kungachang inih. Pathien takashawn boi kha na ama kha mielieishiei miring imachang inih, ajarla Pathien na ashapa chungchanga kungachang kha takashawn mak.
Khan kungchangna kha mahi inih: Pathien na kieini dieng kumshawt ringna kha nepek joi, khan makha ringna kha ashapa dieng khan a`awm inih.
Tunita`awm shapa aniei kha na ringna kha ieniei, Pathien shapa aniei boi kha na ringna kha niei mak.
Pathien Shapa riming a takashawn nangni dieng kumshawt ringna kha nangniei u, iti nangjetna u rang le Pathien Shapa riming kha dawdawn a takanangshawnna u rang, hihaihi nangni dieng kimiejiek inih.
Kieini na ama dieng rangamna niniei kha hi inih: kieini na ama mulungmining dungjuia ninik uatu, ninik u rikip kha ama na inarangai pe inih.
Khan kieini na ninik u rikip kha narangai pe, iti hi nejet uatu, ama dieng a ninik u rikip kha numuk u joi, iti kha nijet u inih.

Uliennai `khat na thitnathiei nih boi munu ithaw kha tukhat na muk a tu, ama rang nik pe rosho. Khan Pathien na thitnathiei nih boi munu athawpa le amani dieng khan ringna pek rangnih. Thitnathiei munu awm, makha jarkhan nikna niei rang a nanih u kiti nimak.
Dikna boi rikip hi munu inih, khan thitnathiei nih boi munu awm.
Kieini na nejet uh, makhala Pathien ah put ah jong shok ama kha na munu thaw mak, inia Pathien ah put ah jong shok miring kha na bibing a rurung inih, khan ashie kha na shih ngam mak.
Kieini na nejet uh, makhala kieini hi Pathien ah put ah jong shok nanih uh, khan manmieshie kholok hi mi shie ranak thoi a ring inih.

Kieini na nejet uh, makhala Pathien Shapa kha jong joi, khan kieini dieng jetthieina kha nepek u joi. Makha adik, ashapa Jesu Christa kha nejetnathiei rang le adik ama dieng naw`awmnathiei rang a inih. Mahi adik Pathien le kumshawt ringna kha inih.
Naite hai, konrilim ah put ah ralaving u roh. Amen.
Ulienchang `khat a, Pathien na imadan rengnu le anai hai dieng kiei na kimiejiek inih. Kiei na amani kha adik khan numkipok inih. Kiei ranga niboia adik ajet kholok na amani kha numipok u inih.
Mahi kieini dieng a awm adik jar a adik inih. Mahi adik hi a`awm, khan kumshawt a kieini le awm rangnih.
Apa Pathien le Apa Shapa Pumi Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit, ninghoina, khan lungdamna kha na adik le numpok, khan kieini hi nawrawtawp pui rangnih.
Ajarla Apa na kieini dieng chawnginurupek kha le ra`ang a, nang nai hai eshen na adik khan ring u, iti hi kumuk a ajeng a kiningai.
Aw rengnu, kiei na nang dieng chawngpek athar `khat ang a kirumiejiek nimak a, kung ah put ah nirunieisha: khatlekhat numropoh u rawi, tia kinengen inih.
Ama chawngpek dungjuia aring hi numpok kha nih. Khan kung ah put ah nangirujet u makha shung khan aringir rang nangnih uh, iti kha chawngpek kha inih.
Jesu Christa hi miring a jong inih, tia rophong boi, mimohon tampui manmieshie hin jong shok joi. Kha ang kha keng mimohon le Christa le re`er miring kha!
Nochon thawna kha namathangna boi rang le rupumping a shawlawh kha namanna u rang, nang nining a riring u roh.
Christa miruchukna kha ikhoi a, khan a a`awm boi miring kha na Pathien kha niei mak. Christa miruchuk khan a awm ama kha na Apa le Shapa dire kha iniei inih
Khan tukhat na mahi miruchukna hi vak chawi nawkatu, nang in khan lamjawng ruthaw naw roh, khan chubaiawm ruthaw pui naw roh.
Ajartu ama kha lamjawng ruthawpa kha na ama chonthaw atha boi kha itum pui inih.
Kiei na nang dieng miejiek rang tampui kieniei a awm, muk le che rotokna jawtlai mi`ing. Kha ruhut a niningaina u hi kipna rang kupumtak va a mailemai re`en a chawng kieriei jawt joi.
Pathien na imadansha nang uliennu nai hai na nang dieng chubai navakmawchawi uh. Amen.
Ulienchang `khat a, adik a numkipok Gaius dieng kimiejiek inih.
Kunumpok, nang ratha rawchawng kha ang a, taksha damna khan nita`awm, irikip a nangrawchawngna rang, nikna kieniei.
Ajarla nang na adik a nangring dan khakha ang a, uliennai eshen na va ua, nang dieng a awm adik chungchanga kungvakchang u phakhan, kiei ajeng a kiningai.
Kanai hai na adik a ring u, iti chawng kha kejet le a kiningai dawrthep shik awm mak.
Kunumpok, nang na uliennai hai rang le, chungchon a, milak hai rang khan takashawnroi a chon nangthaw pe.
Amani na biekrup maikung a nang numpok chungchang khan kungvakchang uh. Amani kha Pathien maikung a rutuk, khan lam nangmojot joiatu, atha kha nangthaw joi.
Ajarla ama riming jarbak khan a ka`iruchawi u inih. Amani na Phungshik hai dieng shanna iawm muk boi a rushe u inih.
Khajarkhan adik khan chonthawshom nachangna u rang, kha ang miring hai kha nirachang pui u rang a shok.
Kiei na biekrup dieng kiemiejiek joi. Inia amani kar a ulienchang jawt, Diotrephes na kieini hi nawpawm u mak.

Khajarkhan kiei na kava a tu, ama na iruthaw, makhala anih boi a le ashie chawng a iniebiekna u kha, miring hai dieng hawng chawi rang kanih. Ama na, khan hun mak a, uliennai hai kha rupawm mak. Aloi jawt hai kha`awm amakha, khan amani kha biekrup ah put ah inawt inih.
Kunumpok, kha ang nunchan ashie kha loi naw roh, inia awmchan atha kha loi roh. Atha athaw ama kha Pathien ah put ah shok inih, ashie athaw ama kha na Pathien kha mumaklai.
Miring rikip na Demetrius chungchanga atha a kungchang uh, khan adiktak kha`awm ama dieng awm. Kieini na`awm ama chungchanga kungkachang uh, khan kukungchang u hi adik inih.
Kiei na kimiejiek jawt tampui awm, inia che le muk ah miejiek jawtlai mi`ing.

Inia relentak a rumuh a, kieini nokhoreng a mailemai re`en a nieriebieh u rangnih, tia ngakkimining joi. Nang dieng lungdamna kha awm rosho. Hin a awm lawm hai na chubai nepek uh. Khan a awm lawm hai kha riming ban a chubai pe roh.
Jesu Christa shok le James naipangpa Jude na irukoi a Apa Pathien na iruriethieng, khan Jesu Christa na iruhawi miring hai dieng kimiejiek inih.
Roihoina le lungdamna, khan numpok kha nangni dieng rothom a awm rosho.

Kunumpok hai, kieini na nimanshom u shandamna chungchanga nangni dieng miejiekna rang, enchak a kururasham inih. Miriethieng hai dieng a voikhatte a irupek takashawn kha mulunglut a nangrohonna rang, mawshawkna kimiejiek hi arangai, tia koloi.

Ajarla mahi hengna rang hin a tolai a phairutarsha eshen kha nang kar ua muruk a hawng riliklut u joi. Amani kha pathienjet boi miring kha runih uh. Amani na napathien u numpokmirit kha rejaikawk chon a mijir uh. Amani na nupumpa u Pathien `khatte le nupumi u Jesu kha rujawt u mak.
Pumi na ama miring hai kha Egypt ram ah put ah rukhek a, takashawn boi hai kha irumathang inih. Hihai kholok hi voikhat nangrujet u joiawm, makha kiniminingmashak jawt uh.
Khan amani akhat changna dingmun arung boi, inia amanitak awmna mathan, ravantir hai kha chawngshatna Nikho alien rang khan kumshawt a khop a jingnakhap mun khan ama na atet joi.

Makha Sodom le Gomorrah le dieng vai ah awm khopui hai kha a`ang inih. Kha le ra`ang a amani na mitiroi rejaikawk ringkho kha le ruring uh. Khan balam nih boi ditrekhe kha ruthaw uh. Amani na kumshawt miei a shawna irudoi u chepna khan endar ruchang uh.
Kha le ra`ang a ramang raman hai hi na amani pumtak hai kha pawrmechet uh, chamniei hai kha nawng uh, khan alur hai kha mieshiet uh.
Inia ravantir ulienchang Michael na Moses pum jar a diabol le chawngrurieshietlai khan, diabol chung a shietak a chawngrushat jawt mak, inia ama na ruti, “Pumi na nang kha nawrawkawk.”
Inia hihai miring hi na ijet boi u nieinak hai kha rumieshiet uh. Khan mining jaw boi sha hai kha ang a, balam a irujet hai kha na amani kha irumathang u inih.
Amani rang idawr a shawna rang a maw nih naw! Ajarla amani na Cain ring dan a ruring uh. Nemna rangbak khan Balaam rehena khan ru`um uh, khan Korah roshomothoina khan ruthang uh.

Amani hi nang numpok-bumichinna uah rethe lung hai kha inih. Nangni le nekleshak rushak u phakhan, chih boi a amani dieng ranga khan chon ruthaw uh. Amani kha rithi na inawng, tui jaw boi romiei hai kha inih. Ara awm boi ajar tha thingkung hai kha inih, voidi a thi, rujung a phawi thingkung hai kha inih.
Amani hi tuikhanglien rawngaw tuilawm, amani jakna kha tui chung ah aphon ang a vak shok, achai arshi hai kha nih uh. Amani rang khan kumshawt a ajingkhap mun kha ihawi pe nih joi.
Khan Adam ah put ah ishiri changna rong khan, Enoch na hihai miring chungchanga rurieimasha. Ama na ruti, “Enro, Pumi na ama miriethieng bawpbawp le jong joi.

Makha mi kholok chung a chawngshatna rang a inih. Khan pathienjet boi kholok na pathienjet boi chon kha pathienjet boi nunchan a iruthaw kha malangsheng a mumukna rang a inih. Khan Pumi chung a pathienjet boi munu miring hai na shietak a chawngiriei u kha mumukna rang a ajong inih.”
Amani kha muruk a achawng hai, ningnit boi hai, amani ditrekhe dungjuia aring hai, chawngriei a lienrasha hai, amani nemna rang khan mi mapak hai kha nih uh.
Inia kunumpok hai, nupumi u Jesu Christa tirtawn hai na irurieimasha chawng hai kha mininghep u roh.
Amani pathienjet boi ditrekhe dungjuia aring erawh thaw miring hai kha nikho dawng khan jong rangnih, tia tirtawn hai na ruriei uh.
Hihaihi Ratha niei boi, balam a aring, khan mi reshenmashak hai kha inih.
Inia kunumpok hai, Ratha Riethieng khan nikna niei u tana takashawn riethiengving khan nang ringkho u kha rawshawnmashak u roh.
Kumshawt ringna mukna rang, nupumi u Jesu Christa ninghoina kha ngaklam a Pathien numpokna khan awm u roh.
Rakhana aniei miring eshen dieng ninghoina kha tet u roh.
Inia chitlam a amani kha miei ah put ah khai u tana shan u roh. Inia munuphung awmchan le pawrimechet u kotaishe kha`awm mitir pe u roh.
Khan keruthuina ah put ah narung ngam, khan rawshawlam a ama lurna maikung a shietna awm boi a namalar ngam,
thiente a ashing nashandampa u Pathien dieng khan lurna le richit`awmna, ratna le cham kha tun le kumshawt a awm nih rosho. Amen.

Mahi Jesu Christa chawngrophong kha inih. Mahi relentak a ashokngir rang a chonshok hai, ama shok hai dieng mumuk rang a Pathien na ama dieng a irupek inih. Khan ama shok John dieng mejetna rang, ama ravantir kha irutir inih.
Pathien chawng chungchanga, Jesu Christa kungchangna chungchanga le ama na irumuk rikip chungchanga John na kungruchang inih.
Mahi rophongchawng hi ate le rangai, khan mahi shung ah miejiek hai ajui ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih. Ajarla pha hi jong nai joi.
Asia ah awm biekrup shiri dieng John, kiei na kiemiejiek: a`awm, ruawm, khan ajong rang a ama ah put ah, khan ama rengmun maton a awm ratha shiri ah put ah,

khan takashawn rang a rutuk kungchang, thitna ah put ah ruthoi masha, khan rieliei reng hai apoh, Jesu Christa ah put ah numpokmirit le lungdamna kha nangni dieng awm rosho. Kieini numnurupoh a ama thishen le numunu uah put ah nururushuk,
khan ama Pathien le Apa dieng reng hai le thiempu hai nurumachang, ama dieng khan lurna le ranak kha kumshawtkumshawt a awm nih rosho. Amen.

Enro, Jesu na romiei hai kha le jong rangnih. Mik rikip na ama kha muk rangnih, khan ama ruvit rikip na ama kha muk rangnih. Ama jar a rieliei a phung kholok na rie`iek pui rangnih. Mahi adik inih. Amen.
Pumi na ieriei, “Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Putna le Mutumna, anih, runih, khan ajong rang a Chungchon a ranakniei kha kanih.”

John kiei hi nang uliennai u `khat kanih. Shawrana khan Jesu Christa rengchangna le doiratna kha atumshom `khat kanih. Pathien chawng jar a le Jesu Christa kungchangna jar a, kiei na Patmos, iti tuikawram khan kuruawm.
Pumi Nikho khan kiei na Ratha a kuruawmlai khan tekawlawi `khat a`ang hesho rashang `khat kanuk tieng kurujet.

Hesho kha na ruti, “Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Akhat changna le Mawtawrna kha kanih,” khan “Nangimuk kha behang a miejiek tana Asia a awm biekrup shiri: Ephesus dieng, Smyrna dieng, Pergamos dieng, Thyatira dieng, Sardis dieng, Philadelphia dieng, khan Laodicea dieng mawchawi roh.”
Khan kiei le riebieh hesho kha mukna rang, kahiei a rangkachak thaomieishut shiri kha kurumuk.
Thaomieishut shiri kar khan Miring Shapa a`ang `khat ruawm. Ama keshe ihup kotai rosho kha ruko, khan rangkachak kawngkhit le runubo kha rumawkaw.
Ama lu le sham hai kha angoi shamo le vur ang a ruchek pe, khan ama mik hai kha mieichon ruang pe.
Ama ke hai kha mieipui shung ah miling shumeng atha kha ruang pe, khan ama hesho kha tui tampui miri ruang pe.
Ama khutchang khan arshi shiri runiei, abai ah put ah bediniei chemjam angaitak kha vak shok pe, khan ama maisho kha ranak moshok nivar kha ruang pe.
Khan kiei na ama kha kurumuk phakhan, athi ang a ama kekung a kurukieklap. Inia kuchung ah ama khutchang kha atet a kiei dieng nuruti, “Chih naw roh, kiei hi Akhat changna le Mawtawrna kha kanih.
Kiei hi aring ama kha kanih. Kuruthi, inia enro, kiei kumshawtkumshawt a karing joi. Amen. Khan Thikho le Thitna chabi kha kiei dieng awm.
“Nangimuk nieinak hai kha miejiek roh, khan anih nieinak hai, khan mahi shole jong shok rang a nieinak hai kha miejiek roh.

Mahi kukhutchang a nangirumuk arshi shiri chungchanga le rangkachak thaomieishut shiri murukchawng jar kha inih: arshi shiri kha biekrup shiri ravantir hai kha inih, khan nangirumuk thaomieishut shiri kha biekrup shiri kha inih.
“ Ephesus ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Ama khutchang a arshi shiri arakpa le rangkachak thaomieishut shiri kar a alawn ama kha na hihaihi ruti,

“Nang chonthaw hai, nang chonthawrat hai, khan nang doiratna, khan mi shie hai kha doi ngam makche, iti kejet. Tirtawn hai kanih ati hai chung a nangenrete khan amani kha mielieishiei thaw miring hai kha inih, iti kha nangmuk joi.
Nang na shawna kha nangdoi a doiratna kha nangniei joi. Khan kiriming rangbak khan mulung rakaina niei boi a, chon kha ranaktak a nangthaw joi.
“Khanikengta nang chung a kijawtna boi `khat awm, makhala nang numpok akhat changna kha nangmak joi.

Khajarkhan khoshekawt a acho maw kanih, iti kha mining tana nang mulung lek roh, khan akhat changna chon hai kha thaw roh. Nang mulung nanglek nawkatu, kiei na nang dieng relentak a jong a, nang thaomieishut kha ama mun ah put ah noroshoh pe rang kanih.
Inia mahi nang na nangniei, makhala Nicolas miring hai chon thaw hai kha nang na nang mitir. Makha kiei na`awm kimitir.
“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho. Ramawtawr ama dieng khan ringna thingkung ah put ah shakna rang, pek rang kanih. Makha Pathien Paradise kar a awm inih.” ’
“Smyrna ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Akhat changna le Mawtawrna, khan ruthi le hawng ring ama na hihaihi ieriei,
“Nang chon hai, shawrana, sharachangna (inia nang tu rawchawng kha nangni), iti kha kejet. Khan Jihudi nih boi chuchung a kanih ati hai mimieshietna kha kejet, amani kha Satan synagogue nih uh.

Nang shawna rang a chon ashie hai kar a akhat diengshe chih naw roh. Enro, diabol na enretena `khat a nangni hi lungroko shung ah thong rang, rasham joi. Makhan ni shawm hi shawrana nangdoi u rangnih. Thitnashe khan takashawn rang a rutuk kha chang roh, khan kiei na nang dieng ringna renglukhum kha nepek rang kanih.
“Nokor niei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho. Ramawtawr ama kha na adi changna thitna khan pawpna niei naw nih.” ’
“Pergamos ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Bediniei chemjam angai aniei, ama na hihaihi ieriei,

“Nang chon kha kejet, khan Satan rengmun awmna khan nangawm, iti kha kejet. Kiriming kha nangrakrep, khan takashawn rang a rutuk kungchangpa Antipas nikho haishe khan katakashawn kha jawt boi, iti ruthaw makche. Ama kha Satan awmna khan nang kar ua iruthat inih.

Inia nang chung a kijawtna boi dikhat awm. Ajarla Balaam miruchukna ajui miring kha nangniei. Israel miring hai kha keruthuimashakna rang, rilim hai dieng a pek nieinak mashakna rang le rejaichon mawthawna rang, Balaam na Balak dieng ruruchuk.
Khatikhan Nicolas miring hai miruchukna ajui miringawm nangniei. Makha kimitir inih.
Nang mulung lek roh, khanawkatu nang dieng relentak a jong a kener chemjam le amani chung a ra jong thaw rang kanih.

“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho. Ramawtawr ama dieng khan manna rethe kha shak rang pek rang kanih. Khan ama dieng khan lung angoi pek rang kanih. Makha lung angoi chung khan riming `thar miejiek a awm. Makha aman ama kha na niboia, tute na jet mak.” ’
“Thyatira ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Mik hai mieichon le eke ah shumeng atha a`ang aniei, Pathien Shapa kha na hihaihi ieriei,

“Nang chon hai, nang numpok, nang takashawn, nang shepdingna thaw khan nang doirat kha kiei na kejet. Khan nang chonthaw hai rang khan tu, mawtawrna nang chonthaw kha akhat changna kha na ikhedet inih.

Khanikengta nangchung a kijawtna boi dikhat awm. Ajarla nining a thiempilien kanih ati nupang Jezebel na koshok hai kha rejaichon thawna rang le rilim hai dieng a pek nieinak hai kha shakna rang, iruruchuk a, lamirurehemashak kha nangrujawt pe.
Khan ama rejaichon thawna ah put ah mulung lekna rang, pha kepek, inia mulung lekna runiei u mak.
Enro, ama kha kiei na shawna jakhang khan kawvawr joi. Ama le uire athaw miring hai kha na, amani chon hai ah put ah mulung lek u nawkatu, shawrana khan ama le roroia vawrchen rang kanih.

Khan anai hai kha thitna khan that rang kanih. Khan biekrup kholok na kiei hi mulungmining hai le mulung hai atawk kha inih, iti jet u rangnih. Khan nang chon hai `khatkhat dungjuia kiei na pek rang kanih.

Khania nang dieng le Thyatira ah awm mienieng dieng tu, mahi miruchukna kha niei boi jar a le Satan shungrieirit kha nangjet boi u jarkhan, nangchung ua pokrik shik bolai naw ning, tia kiriei hi inih.
Inia kojong masheng nanginiei u kha rakrep u roh.
Khan ramawtawr khan dawngshe a kochon hai hi arung ama dieng khan phung hai chung a cham kha pek rang kanih.
‘Bekonpa be leklek a ikhoi kha ang a, ama na thir rawmaw le amani kha pok rangnih.’ Mahi kiei na`awm kapa dieng a kiman cham kha le ra`ang inih.
Khan ama dieng jingkar arshi kha pek rang kanih.
“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho.” ’

“Sardis ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Pathien Ratha shiri le arshi shiri aniei miring kha na hihaihi ieriei, “Nangring, iti riming nangniei jarkhan, nang chon hai kha kejet, inia athi kha nangnih.
Iriring kha chang roh, khan athi rang a arangah nieinak hai kha menet roh, ajarla Pathien maikung a nang chonthaw hai urupum muh mi`inglai.

Khajarkhan nangirumuk le nangirujet dan kha mining roh. Khan makha rakrep tana mulung lekna kha niei roh. Khajarkhan nangriring nawkatu, nang dieng murushah ang a jong rang kanih, khan nang dieng ih nidan khan a ajong rang a maw kanih, iti shukjet a jet naw tinih.
Khania amani pon hai kha pawrmechet boi Sardis ah miring dikhat nangniei. Khan amani na angoi a kiei le lawn u rangnih, ajarla amani kha rutuk nih uh.

Ramawtawr ama kha ponledier angoi le ajo rangnih, khan Ringna Behangbuk ah put ah ama riming kha mathang pe naw ning. Inia kapa maikung a le ama ravantir hai maikung a ama riming kha rophong pe rang kanih.
“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho.” ’
“Philadelphia ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Riethieng le Adik, “David chabi aniei miring, ama na mawlawng a tute na ikhar boi, akhar a tute na imawlawng boi” ama na hihaihi ierei,

“Nang chon hai kha kejet. Enro, nang maikung a rawlawng a tute na ikhar ngam boi mawkawt kha katet joi. Ajarla nang ranak lekte nangniei, khan kawchawng kha nang rung a kiriming kha raphat pui makche.
Enro, numkonopok, iti nangjetna rang, Satan synagogue miring hai kha nang kekung a mavat a mawbawklap rang kanih. Jihudi kanih ti u joiawm, mielieshiei keng, amani kha nih u mak.
Kidoiratna chawng kha nangrung jarkhan, rieliei chung a a`awm miring hai enretena rang, rieliei pumpui chung a ajong rang a enretena nidan ah put ah kiei na`awm nang kha nurung rang kanih.
Enro, relentak a ajong rang kanih! Nanginiei nang renglukhum kha tute na loina boi rang, rakrep roh.

Ramawtawr ama kha kapathien riethiengmun shung a chawpui `khat kha minit rang kanih. Khan ama na vai shokret, iti nieilai naw nih. Khan ama chung khan kapathien riming le kapathien khopui riming, Jerusalem `thar, kha miejiek rang kanih. Makha ravan ah put ah le kapathien ah put ah ajong inih. Ama chung khan kiriming `thar kha miejiek rang kanih.
“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a irupek kha rangai rosho.” ’
“Laodicea ah awm biekrup ravantir dieng miejiek roh, ‘Amen, Takashawn rang a rutuk, khan Adik Kungachang, Pathien khutkon Putna ama kha na hihaihi ieriei,
“Nang chon hai kha kejet, makhala nang hi rachakawm nimakche, khan asha`awm nimakche. Rachak ninawkle asha kha nangrunih a la naw!
Khatikhan rachakawm nih boi asha`awm nih boi lumchiei kha nangnit jarkhan, kabai ah put ah nomoloh rang kanih joi.
Ajarla nang na ‘Kawrawchawng joi, niei arawp kieniei joi, iawm rangailai mi`ing,’ nangti. Inia rahvanshie, numpokroi, shara, mikchaw le rekengver kha nangnih, iti kha jet makche.

Nang rawchawngna rang khan miei a enretesha rangkachak kha kiei ah put ah nangrawchawkna rang, kinarachak inih. Khan jak nangmukna boi rang, ponledier angoi kha rawchawh tana ko roh. Khan nang mik hai kha damna rang, loileai kha nawt roh.
“Kiei na numkipok miring hai kha kiei na kirachak a kiriji inih. Khajarkhan ningawmer tana mulung lekna niei roh.

Enro, mawkawt khan kading a tawlam a ka`awm joi. Tukhat na kehesho hi rangai a, mawkawt kha mawlawng joiatu, ama dieng ajong rang kanih, khan nekleshak kha shak pui rang kanih, khan ama na kiei le shakshom rangnih.
Ramawtawr ama dieng khan, kiei na`awm rakawmawtawr a ama rengmun ah kapa le kashuh kha ang a, kerengmun khan kiei le shutna rang, jawt pe rang kanih.
“Nokor aniei ama kha na Ratha na biekrup hai dieng a iriei kha rangai rosho.” ’ ”

Hihaihi shole enro, kiei na ravan a mawkawt `khat rawlawng kha kurumuk, khan akhat changna hesho kirujet kha tekawlawi a`ang `khat na kiei dieng chawngruriei a ruti, “Hin hawng roh, hihaihi shole ashok rang a kha kiei na numumuk rang kanih.”
Makha shole relentak a kiei hi Ratha a kuruawm joi. Khan enro, ravan shung khan rengmun `khat kha ding a ruawm, khan rengmun chung khan miring `khat rushuh.
Khan ashuh miring kha jasper le sardius a rumalang, khan rengmun roko khan shumratang `khat na ruroko a emerald ang a rumalang.
Makha rengmun roko khan rengmun shawmdilieimili ruawm. Makha rengmun hai khan bieklamkai shawmdilieimili na achek ponledier rieshiei a rushuh uh. Amani lu hai khan rangkachak renglukhum rurukhu uh.
Khan makha rengmun ah put ah khomelek, hesho le khomiri hai kha vak shok. Khan rengmun maton khan thaomieichon shiri kha chong a awm. Amani kha Pathien Ratha hai shiri kha inih.
Rengmun maton khan avarlang likli thampui a`ang `khat ruawm. Khan rengmun kar a le rengmun roko khan anuk maton tieng mik shipmer aring juleva mili ruawm.

Akhat changna aring juleva kha kieipui ruang, adi changna aring juleva kha shiecha remet ruang, athum changna aring juleva kha na miring mai a`ang runiei, khan imili changna aring juleva kha avung a awm rumu ruang.

Khan aring juleva mili kha na matha rukruk runieirim uh, khan pumplang a mik rushipmer pe uh. Khan amani na shunlejan a shawmuchum boi a ruti uh, “Riethieng, riethieng, riethieng, Chungchon a Ranakniei Pumi Pathien, ruchang, anih, khan ajong rang a!”
Aring juleva hai kha na rengmun ah shuh a awm le kumshawtkumshawt a aring, ama dieng lurna le richit, khan mapakna rupek uh.

Makha phakhan bieklamkai shawmdilieimili hai kha na rengmun chung ah ashuh, kumshawt a aring ama maikung khan bawklap ua, chubairubawk uh. Khan amani renglukhum hai kha rengmun maton khan rushawn ua, ruti uh,
“Aw Pumi, lurna le richit, khan ranak amuh rang khan rutuk nangnih, ajarla nieinak kholok hi nangirukon inih. Nang mulungmining jar a amani hi aring inih, khan irukon inih.”
Khan rengmun chung ah ashuh ama khutchang tieng khan behangjo `khat kurumuk. Makha shung le vai khan miejiek ruawm, khan jetnam shiri le runam.
Khan ravantir arat `khat na “Behangjo hi mawlawng a jetnam hai hi athut rang a rutuk tumaw nih?” tia hesho rashang a irophong kurumuk.
Khan ravan shung a ninawkle rieliei chung a ninawkle chimniei a ruawm tute na behangjo kha rumawlawng ngam mak, ninawkle makha ruen ngam mak.
Khan tute na behangjo kha mawlawng rang ninawkle makha aen rang khan rurutuk boi jarkhan, kiei rie`ieklam a kuruchap.

Inia bieklamkai hai kar a akhat na kiei dieng nieriei, “Chap naw roh. Enro, Judah phung Kieipui, David Rujung kha na behangjo kha mawlawng rang le jetnam shiri rikip kha athut rang a kha chungshokna runiei joi.”

Khan rengmun kar a le aring juleva mili kar a le bieklamkai hai kar khan ithatsha a`ang Kengamte kha ding a ruawm kha kurumuk. Kengamte kha na riki shiri le mik shiri ieniei. Amani hai kha rieliei kholok a irutir Pathien Ratha shiri kha inih.
Khan ama na ava a rengmun ah ashupa khutchang ah put ah behangjo kha vak loi.

Khan behangjo kha ruloi phakhan, juleva mili le bieklamkai hai shawmdilieimili kha na Kengamte maikung khan rubawklap uh. Amani kha na sharangdar `khatkhat le verawh shipmer rangkachak khengkam hai kha arakrim uh. Khahaikha miriethieng hai nikna kha inih.

Amani na lah `thar `khat ruthaw uh: “Behangjo nangiloi le ama jetnam hai nangithut khan rutuk nangnih. Ajarla nang kha inuruthat nih joi, khan nang thishen kha le phung rikip ah put ah, chawng rikip ah put ah, khan miring le phung rikip ah put ah Pathien rang khan amani kha nangrukhek joi.
Khan kapathien u dieng khan reng hai le thiempu hai kha nangnurumachang u joi. Khan rieliei chung a reng chang u rangnih joi.”
Khan rengmun roko khan ravantir hai tampui, juleva hai, bieklamkai hai hesho kha kuruen a, kururangai. Khan amani jat kha bawp shawm bawp shawm le bawp hai bawp hai kha runih.
Amani na he rashangtak a ruti uh, “Ranak, rawchawng, varna, ratna le richit, khan lurna le mapakna rang a iruthat u Kengamte kha rutuk inih!”

Khan ravan, rieliei chung le chimniei ah awm, khan tuipui le makha shung ah awm juleva rikip na iti u kha kejet: “Rengmun chung ah ashuh ama dieng le Kengamte dieng khan mapak, richit, khan lurna le ranak nieina kha kumshawtkumshawt a a`awm chang rosho.”
Khan aring juleva mili kha na rubawklap a ruti uh, “Amen!” Khan bieklamkai shawmdilieimili kha na rubawk a chubairubawk uh.
Khan Kengamte kha na jetnam shiri kar a akhat mawlawng phakhan, kiei na kurumuk. Juleva aring mili hai kar a akhat na, khomiri hesho `khat ang a, “Va tana vak en roh,” iti kha kurujet.
Khan kiei na kurumuk: enro, shakawr angoi `khat, khan makha chung ah ashupa kha na tha `khat ieniei. Ama dieng khan renglukhum `khat rupek, khan ama na ramawtawrlam a ramawtawr rang khan rushe joi.
Khan Kengamte kha na adi changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, adi changna aring juleva kha na “Va tana vak en roh,” iti kha kurujet.
Khan shakawr shenpeng shik `khat rushe. Khan ama chung ah ashupa dieng khan rieliei ah put ah lungdamna roshoh rang, chemjam alien `khat rupek. Makha miring hai na khatlekhat rathat nana rang a inih.

Khan Kengamte kha na athum changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, athum changna aring juleva kha na “Va tana vak en roh,” iti `khat kurujet. Khan kiei na kurumuk: enro, shakawr ahang `khat, khan makha chung ah ashupa kha na ukhut ah phala `khat runiei.
Khan juleva aring mili hai kar ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet, “Gehu haikhup `khat a dinari `khat, nim haikhup `thum a dinari `khat nih rangnih, inia thao le ju kha pawrmechet tha mak.”
Khan Kengamte kha na imili changna jetnam kha mawlawng phakhan, imili changna juleva kha na “Va tana vak en roh,” iti hesho kha kurujet.

Khan kiei na kurumuk: enro, shakawr apawh `khat, khan ama chung ah ashupa riming kha Athi runih. Thikho hai kha na ama kha rujui uh. Mili a akhat rieliei kha chemjam le, vawncham le, thitna le khan rieliei sharang le thatna rang, ama dieng cham kha rupek.
Khan Kengamte kha na arahnga changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, khan Pathien chawng jar a le amani na irumukui u kungchangna jar a iruthat u hai ringphuk hai kha maicham thoi khan kurumuk.

Khan ringphuk hai kha na he rashangtak a rura`ai ua, ruti uh, “Aw Pumpa, Riethieng le Adik `Khat! Rieliei chung a awm hai chung a chawngshatna rang le kithishen u ruhut loina rang a kha idawr shawt rang a maw nilai?”

Khan ponrosho achek kha ringphuk hai dieng rupekrim uh, khan amani ang a ithat u rang a rasham, oshok changpui hai le ishokpui hai dire hi jat hawng rupum masheng, amani na pha bawng `khat shawimuchum u rang a shok.
Khan Kengamte kha na aruk changna jetnam kha rumawlawng phakhan, enro, nieinu lientak `khat rushok. Khan sham le iphan lemawnpon ang a ni kha ruhang, khan tha pumpui kha thishen ang a ruawm.
Khan ravan a arshi hai na rieliei a jong cho. Makha rithi arattak na ijap a inawk, pha niboia ara thieichang ang khan rucho.
Khan behang ijo ang a ravan kha ruloi joi. Lawn rikip le tuikawram rikip kha amani mun ah put ah rurechenmashak joi.
Khan rieliei reng hai, milienmirang hai, ramiring bawp `khat lamkai hai, rawchawng miring hai, ranakniei hai, shok le moshok miring hai rikip na lungko le lawn raw thoi hai khan rubi uh.
Khan mo le lungbiei hai dieng ruti uh, “Kuchung uah jong cho u roh, khan rengmun ah put ah ashupa mai le Kengamte mulung hang ah put ah nethe u roh!
Ajarla ama lunghangna Nikho lientak kha jong joi. Tumaw ding ngam nih?”

Khan mahi shole rieliei kiei mili ah ravantir mili ading a awm kha kurumuk. Amani na rieliei rithi mili kha arak a ruawm uh. Makha rithi na rieliei chung ah, tuipui chung ah le ih thingkung chung ah ajapna boi rang a inih.
Khan nishokna tieng ah hawng ravantir shik `khat kha kurumuk. Ama na aring Pathien jetnam kha runiei. Khan rieliei le thampui mawpawpna rang a irupek, ravantir mili dieng khan he rashangtak a ruti,
“Napathien u shok hai, amani macha hai khan kieini na jetnam kanam u masheng, rieliei le thampui khan thingkung hai kha mawpawp naw roh.”
Khan jetirunam hai jat kha kurujet. Israel nai hai phung rikip ah put ah bawp rajakhat le shawm mililieimili kha jetrunam.
Juda phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam, Reuben phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Gad phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.
Asher phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Naphtali phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Manasseh phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.
Simeon phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Levi phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Issachar phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.
Zebulun phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Joseph phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam. Benjamin phung ah put ah bawp shawmlieidi jetrunam.

Hihaihi shole kiei na kurumuk: enro, phung le phungte rikip ah put ah, miring rikip ah put ah, khan chawng rikip ah put ah, tute na ite ngam boi mipui lientak kha kurumuk. Amani na rengmun maton le Kengamte maton khan ponrosho angoi rieshiei a, amani khut ah naw bak hai kha rak a ruding uh.
Khan he rashangtak a ra`ai a ruti uh, “Shandamna kha rengmun chung ah ashuh kapathien u ama tah inih, khan Kengamte ama tah inih!”
Khan ravantir kholok kha na rengmun le bieklamkai hai, khan aring juleva mili kha rokojiek a ruding uh. Khan amani na rengmun maton khan bawklap ua, Pathien kha chubairubawk uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Amen! Rahvan, lurna, varna, mapaknapek, richit, ranak, khan ratna kha napathien u dieng kumshawtkumshawt a a`awm nih rosho. Amen.”
Khan bieklamkai hai kar a akhat na namashang a, kiei dieng nuruti, “Ponrosho angoi rieshiei hai hi tu hai kha maw nih, khan khoshekawt ah put ah ava u maw nih?”

Khan kiei na kurumashang, “Pumi, nang na nangjet.” Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Hihaihi shawrana lientak ah put ah ahawng, amani ponrosho hai kha rushuk a Kengamte thishen kha na imongoi hai kha inih.
Khajarkhan amani kha Pathien rengmun maton ah awm u joi. Khan ama riethiengmun khan shunlejan a ama chon thaw pe uh. Khan rengmun ah ashupa kha na amani le awm rangnih.
Amani na chamna le rana, iti niei u lai naw nih. Ninawkle, nisha na jeilai naw nih, khan ih `khat asha na re`emawm re`emlai naw nih.
Ajarla rengmun kar a awm Kengamte kha na amani kha hoi u rangnih, khan aring tuinar hai dieng khan chawi u rangnih. Khan Pathien na amani mikrithi kholok kha imik uah put ah no pe u rangnih.”
Khan Kengamte kha na ishiri changna jetnam kha mawlawng phakhan, nidan khoi dawr hi ravan shung khan chipchip a ruawm.
Khan Pathien maikung a ading ravantir shiri dieng khan tekawlawi shiri irupek kha kurumuk.

Khan ravantir shik `khat na ava a maicham maton khan vak ding. Ama na berawh hana rangkachak khengkam runiei, khan ama dieng berawh tampui rupek. Makha rengmun maton a awm rangkachak maicham khan miriethieng hai nikna hai kha le roroia pekna rang a inih.
Khan berawh mieikhu kha le miriethieng hai kholok nikna kha ravantir khut ah put ah Pathien maikung a ruka joi.
Khan ravantir kha na berawh khengkam kha ruloi a maicham ah awm miei kha le rumiship a rieliei chung ah rupai joi. Khan hesho reshe, khomiri, khomelek, khan nieinu hai kha rushok.
Khan tekawlawi shiri aniei ravantir shiri kha na tekawlawi tum rang khan rurasham uh.

Akhat changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum joi. Makha shole thishen le reche riei le miei kha ruawm. Amani kha rieliei chung ah rupai a, rieliei thumakhat, thingkung thumakhat, khan aring champi kholok kha rukang joi.
Khan adi changna ravantir kha na tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan akang mopum alientak `khat a`ang hi tuipui shung ah rupai. Khan tuipui thumakhat hi thishen ruchang.
Khan tuipui shung ah awm aring juleva hai thumakhat hi ruthi. Khan rokonglien hai kha thumakhat hi ruthang joi.

Khan athum changna ravantir kha na tekawlawi kha rutum. Makhan ravan ah put ah arshi lientak `khat hi jong cho. Makha thaomiei `khat ang a rukang, khan tuidung hai kha thumakhat chung le khan tuinar hai chung ah makha jong cho.
Khan arshi riming kha Nimshi inih. Khan tui thumakhat hi Nimshi ruchang a miring tampui ruthi, ajarla tui kha rumakhatmashak joi.

Khan imili changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan ni thumakhat, tha thumakhat, arshi hai thumakhat kha rujem joi. Khajarkhan thumakhat kha rujing joi, khan nikho thumakhat le jan thumakhat na mieivar kha rupelai mak.

Khan kiei na ravan lai ah rumu avung kha kurumuk a he rashangtak a iruriei kha kurujet, “Rieliei a awm hai dieng khan shawna, shawna, shawna kha nih naw! Ajarla ravantir `thum kha na tekawlawi kha tumdeng joi!”
Khan arahnga changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan ravan ah put ah arshi `khat rieliei a jong cho kha kurumuk. Khan ravantir dieng khan dawngawmboi khur chabi kha rupek.
Khan ama na dawngawmboi khur kha rumawlawng a, mieipui mieikhu a`ang khur ah put ah mieikhu hawng shok. Khan khur ah put ah mieikhu kha na ni le rithi kha hawng mijingkhap.
Khan mieikhu ah put ah khaishawr hai kha rieliei a vak shok uh. Khan amani dieng khan, rieliei a awm aikoshangpa hai na cham iniei u kha ang a, cham kha rupek uh.
Rieliei a awm, amacha ah Pathien jetnam aniei boi miring hai kha niboia, champi, thinglelung, khan thing hai kha mawpawpna boi rang, amani dieng chawng rupek.
Thatna rang niboia, tha rahnga mawshawna rang, amani dieng cham rupek uh. Amani shawna kha aikoshangpa `khat na miring reke pharoia shawna kha le ara`ang inih.
Khan kha nikho hai khan miring hai na thitna rutawk u rangnih, inia itikte nita`awm ruman ngam u naw nih. Amani na ruthi jawt u rangnih, inia athi kha na amani ah put ah tan rangnih.
Khaishawr hai kha shakawr hai na ra rang a rasham u kha le rura`ang uh. Khan amani lu hai kha rangkachak a`ang renglukhum rumukhu uh. Amani mai hai kha miring hai mai ruang pe uh.
Khan amani sham hai kha nupang hai sham ruang pe uh, khan amani ha hai kha kieipui hai ha ruang pe uh.
