Khan amani phaw kha thir phaw hai kha ruang pe uh, khan amani matha miri kha ra ah atan shakawr gari tampui miri ruang pe uh.
Khan amani na, aikoshangpa hai kha ang a, riemiei hai kha runiei uh, khan amani riemiei hai khan turshim ruawm, khan miring hai kha tha rahnga mawpawpna rang, cham runiei pe uh.
Dawngawmboi a athuk kom ravantir `khat amani reng rang runiei uh. Ama riming kha Hebrew chawng a Abaddon, khan Greek chawng a Apollyon inih.
Akhat changna shawna kha mawtawr joi. Hihaihi shole enro, shawna `di ajong rang rashamlai.
Khan aruk changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan kiei na Pathien maton a awm rangkachak maicham riki mili ah put ah hesho kha kurujet.
Iriei kha na tekawlawi anieipa aruk changna ravantir dieng ruti, “Euphrates tuidung alien ah ikhop ravantir mili hai kha moshok roh.”
Amani kha nidan, nikho, tha le kum ijat rurasham a, miring hai thumakhat thatna rang khan moshok joi.
Khan ruchun shakawr-ramiring hai jat kha baibe bawp `di inih, iti kha kurujet.

Khan shakawr hai le amani chung ah ashuh hai kha kiei na mulungmik a kurumuk. Amani na mieishen le adum, khan aeng phaw hai kha runiei uh. Khan shakawr lu hai kha kieipui lu hai kha ruang, khan amani bai ah put ah miei le mieikhu, khan mieidi vak shok.
Hihai railawn `thum– amani bai ah put ah vak shok, miei le mieikhu, khan mieidi-hi na miring hai kha thumakhat hi iruthat inih.
Ajarla shakawr hai ranak kha amani bai le riemiei hai khan awm. Ajarla amani riemiei hai kha moro hai kha ang. Amani kha na lu hai kha niei ua, khahaikha le imawpawp u inih.

Khan hihai railawn hi na iruthat boi miring hai kha na chubai`ibawk boi u rang a amani khutkon: raikho hai, dangka le rangkachak, shumeng, thingkunglungkung, amuthiei boi, arangaithiei boi, khan alawnthiei boi rilim hai khan mulung rulek u mak.
Khan amani mithat chon hai, amani dawileai chon hai, amani rejaichon hai le amani murushakna hai khan mulung rulek u mak.

Khan kiei na arat ravantir shik `khat hi romiei le rojolam a ravan ah put ah ajong kurumuk. Shumratang `khat hi ama lu ah ruawm pe, ama maisho kha ni ruang pe, khan ama ke hai kha miei chawpui hai kha ruang pe.
Khan ama khut khan rawlawngsha behangjo `khat ruawm pe. Ama chang tieng ah ke kha na thampui chung ah ruthin, viei tieng ah ke kha na rieliei chung ah ruthin.
Khan ama na he rashangtak a kieipui murung ang a rura`ai. Khan ama na rura`ai phakhan, khomiri shiri kha na amani hesho hai kha vak moshok uh.

Khan khomiri shiri hai kha na ruchawng phakhan, miejiek rang, kiei kururasham joi. Khan kiei na ravan ah put ah hesho kha hitihin a iriei kurujet: “Khomiri shiri hai na iriei nieinak hai kha jetnam roh, inia miejiek naw roh.”
Thampui chung ah le rieliei chung ah ruding kirumuk ravantir kha na ama khutchang kha ravan tieng rulawm.

Khan a aring, ravan le kha shung ah awm nieinak kholok rukonpa, rieliei le kha shung ah awm kholok rukonpa, khan thampui le kha shung ah awm hai rukonpa, ama riming a chawngrurakham. Makha dawnshe a mushumna boi rang a nih joi.

Khania ishiri changna ravantir hesho nikho hai khan, ama na tekawlawi tum dieng khan, Pathien murukchawng kha mawtawr rangnih joi. Makha athachawng `khat a oshok hai thiempulien hai dieng irurophong kha inih.
Khan ravan ah put ah kirujet hesho kha na kiei dieng nururieithep a ruti, “She tana thampui le rieliei chung ah adingpa ravantir khut ah awm behangjo ashin rawlawng khaw vak loi roh.”

Khan kiei na ravantir dieng kurushe a kuruti, “Behangjo ashin kha nepeh roh.” Khan ama na kei dieng nuruti, “Mahi loi tana shah roh. Mahi na nang vawn kha namakhat pe rangnih, inia nang bai kha tu khoining athum dawr a thum rangnih.”
Khan kiei na behangjo ashin kha ravantir khut ah put ah kuruloi a makha kurushak joi. Kabai kha khoining ang a ruthum, khan makha kiei na kurushak shole, kawvawn kha nurumakhat pe joi.
Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Nang na miring hai, phung hai, chawng hai le reng tampui dieng rophongthep pe roh.”
Khan kiei dieng rawmaw a`ang kairidik `khat hi nurupek a ruti, “Thoi tana Pathien riethiengmun le maicham, khan makha shung ah chubaibawk hai kha vak on roh.

Khan riethiengmun vai tieng ah awm tolawng kha mah roh, makha on naw roh, ajarla makha Phungshik hai dieng pek nih joi. Khan amani na khopui riethieng kha tha shawm mililieidi hi eke le ater u rangnih.
Khan kukungchang pasha `di hai dieng khan cham kha pek rang kanih. Khan amani na nikho bawp `khat rajadi shawm `ruk hi lemawnpon rieshiei a rophong u rangnih.”
Hihaihi rieliei Pumi maton ah ading, olive thingkung idi le thaomieishut idi hai kha nih uh.
Khan tukhat na amani kha mawpawp jawt joiatu, amani bai ah put ah miei vak shok a amani rahapui hai kha ikang inih. Tukhat na amani kha mawpawp jawt joiatu, khatikhan ama kha thatngir rang a inih.

Hihaihi na ravan kha kharna rang, cham ieniei. Amani rophongchawng nikho hai phakhan, ro `khatshe chona boi rang le amani na tui hai kha thishen rachangmashakna rang, cham ieniei uh. Khan rieliei railawn kholok le idittuk rawnaw a jemna rang, cham ieniei uh.
Khan amani kungchangna mawtawr u phakhan, dawngawmboi khur ah put ah hawng shok ranring kha na amani le ra thaw rangnih. Ama kha na mawtawr ning, tia amani kha that rangnih.
Khan amani rok kha khopui `lien lamlien khan rapai rangnih. Makha khopui alien kha rathalam a Sodom le Egypt iti, upumi u kha`awm cross ling ah iruthatna u, mun kha inih.
Khan amani miring hai, phungte hai, chawng hai, phung hai kha na amani rok kha nithum le khoishe muk uh, khan amani rok hai kha than shung ah khumna rang, rujawt u mak.

Khan rieliei chung a awm amani kha na amani chung a ningai ua, rohoi ruthaw uh, khan akhat na akhat dieng khutchawi tir u rangnih, ajarla thiempulien idi kha na rieliei chung a awm amani kha shawna irupek inih.
Khan nithum le khoi shole, amani chung a Pathien ah put ah ringna ratha kha jong lut, khan amani ke a ruding u joi, khan amuh hai chung a chitna alientak `khat hi jong shok.
Khan ravan ah put ah he rashangtak `khat na amani dieng iriei kha rujet uh, “Hin hawng u roh.” Khan amani na romiei a ravan tieng khan rurawlawm uh, khan irahapui miring hai kha na amani kha ruen uh.

Khan makha phakhan nieinu alientak hawng rawnawk, khan khopui kha shawm a `khat hi ruchim joi. Khan nieinu shung khan miring bawp shiri kha ruthat joi. Khan ihawi hai chung a chitna ruship a ravan Pathien dieng lurna kha rupek.
Adi changna shawna kha mawtawr joi. Enro, athum changna shawna kha jongrelen joi.

Khan ishiri changna ravantir kha na ama tekawlawi kha rutum. Khan ravan shung khan hesho hai lientak kha ruawm a ruti, “Manmieshie rengchangna hai kha nupumi uh le ama Christa rengchangna kha achang nih joi. Khan ama na kumshawtkumshawt a reng chang rangnih joi.”
Khan amani rengmun ah ashuh bieklamkai shawmdilieimili hai kha na Pathien maton a rubawklap ua, chubairubawk uh.
Amani na ruti uh, “Chungchon a ranakniei, Aw Pumi Pathien, nang kha kanamapak uh. Nang tu a`awm, ruawm kha nangnih, ajarla nang ranak lientak kha nangruloi a reng nangchang joi.

Khan phung hai kha lunghangna kha na ship u joi, khan nang lunghangna kha jong joi. Athi hai chawngshatna rang a pha kha jong joi. Khan nang shok thiempulien hai, miriethieng hai, khan nang riming achih hai alien ashin dieng lawh pekna rang, jong joi. Khan rieliei mathang hai mathangna rang a pha kha jong joi.”
Khan ravan a Pathien riethiengmun kha mawlawng a ama rawjawtna tapu kha kurumuk. Makhan khomelek hai, hesho hai, khomiri hai, khan nieinu le rieicho alientak kha ruawm.
Khan ravan a jetna alientak `khat hi rular: nupang `khat hi na ni rurieshiei, khan tha kha na ama ke noi a ruawm, khan ama lu khan arshi shawmlieidi renglukhum hai kha ruawm.
Nai ruvawng jarkhan, nainiei rang a natna shawrieviei khan ama na rura`ai.
Khan ravan khan jetna shik `khat hi rular: khan enro, rorei ashen alientak `khat hi lu shiri le riki shawm runiei, khan ulu hai khan renglukai shiri runiei.

Khan ama riemiei kha na ravan a arshi hai thumakhat hi apawt a amani kha rieliei a apai. Khan rorei kha na nainiei rang a rasham nupangnu maton khan ruding. Makha ama na nai kha niei pha a anai kha shakna rang a inih.
Khan ama na, phung kholok kha thirrawmaw le ahoi rang, shapa `khat hi runiei. Khan anai kha Pathien rang le ama rengmun rang, rusho joi.
Khan nupangnu kha Pathien na irurashamna pe ramthim khan rutan joi. Makha amani na nikho bawp `khat rajadi shawm `ruk ama kha vaina rang a inih.
Khan ravan shung khan ra ruawm: Michael le ama ravantir hai kha na rorei le ra ruthaw joi. Khan rorei le ama ravantir hai kha na amani le ra ruthaw joi.
Inia rorei kha na ranak runieilai mak, khan ravan a awmna rang, munawm runieilai mak.

Khan rorei alien kha jong vawr joi. Ama kha diabol le Satan iti u ronglui moro kha inih. Awmnathiei manmieshie pumpui hi ama na elem, ama kha rieliei a jong vawr joi, khan ama ravantir hai kha ama le jong vawrchen joi.

Khan ravan a he rashangtak `khat kiei na kurujet. Hitihin ruti, “Tun hin, shandamna, ranak, khan napathien u rengchangna le ama Christa cham kha jong joi. Ajarla nu`uliennai hai ajorpa kha nawt joi. Ama na Pathien maikung a shunlejan a amani kha irujor inih.
Khan Kengamte thishen jar a, amani kungchangna chawng jar a le amani ringkho hai kha athi rangshe khan numrupok boi u jar a, ama kha irumawtawr u inih.

Khajarkhan ningai u rang roh, Aw ravan hai le amani shung ah awm hai! Rieliei le thampui chung a shawna kha nih naw! Ajarla diabol kha na nangni dieng jong joi, apha bawngte iniei kha jet jarkhan, lunghangna lientak ieniei joi.”
Khan rorei kha na ama kha rieliei chung a nawt joi, iti kha rumuk `le, shapa aniei nupangnu kha ajui ruput joi.
Rumu alien matha idi hi ama dieng rupek joi. Makha ama mun, ama kha pha `khat le pha hai khan pha khoi shung a aravaina rang, moro awmna ah put ah matha a ramthim khan vungna rang a inih.
Khan moro kha na nupangnu anuk khan tui hi tuidung ang a ener ah put ah ruphuk joi. Makha tuilien kha na ama kha mawchawina rang a inih.
Inia rieliei kha na nupangnu kha rushan. Rorei na abai ah put ah ivakphuk tuidung kha avana rang, rieliei na abai kha rumawlawng joi.
Khan rorei kha nupangnu chung khan mulung ajeng a ruhang pe joi. Khan Pathien chawngpek hai kha arung le Jesu Christa chungchanga kungachang hai, nupangnu chicha shik hai le rathaw rang, rushe joi.

Khan John kiei na tuipui kawmchang khan kuruding. Khan ranring `khat hi tuipui ah put ah hawng shok kurumuk. Ama kha na riki shawm le lu shiri runiei, khan riki hai chung khan renglukai shawm, khan lu hai chung khan mieshietroi riming hai kha ruawm.

Khan kiei na kirumuk ranring kha kieishente `khat ruang, khan ama ke hai kha vawm ke ruang, khan ama bai kha kieipui bai ruang. Khan rorei kha na ama ranak le ama rengmun khan cham alientak `khat ama dieng rupek.
Khan lu hai kar a akhat kha thitna dawr a pawp a riekier pe joi. Khan rieliei kholok na shindawngna runiei ua, makha ranring kha rujui uh.
Khajarkhan ranring dieng cham apeh rorei kha chubairubawk uh. Khan ranring kha chubaibawk a ruti uh, “Mahi ranring a`ang tumaw awm? Khan tu na maw ama chung a ra athaw ngam rang?”
Makha ranring dieng khan lienrashatna chawng le mieshietna chawng rieina rang, ner rupek. Khan tha shawm mililieidi hi ama cham kha rotokna rang, rupek.
Pathien le ama riming le ama thamber khan ravan a awm hai kha mieshietna rang, ama ner kha rumawlawng.
Khan miriethieng hai chung a rathawna rang le amani kha dekna rang, ama dieng cham kha rupek joi. Khan phungte rikip, miring rikip, chawng rikip le phung rikip chung a cham kha ama dieng rupek.
Khan rieliei chung a awm kholok na ama kha chubaiabawk rangnih. Khan manmieshie phun ah put ah iruthat u Kengamte Ringna Behangjo shung ah imiejiek boi rikip na ama kha chubaiabawk rangnih.
Nokor aniei ama kha na rangai rosho.
Shurkhop rang ama kha na shurkhopna tieng khan she rangnih. Chemjam na ithat rang a ama kha chemjam kha le ithatngir rang a inih. Mahin miriethieng hai doiratna le takashawn kha rangai.
Khan rieliei ah put ah hawng shok ranring shik `khat hi kurumuk. Ama na kengamte `khat ang a riki `di runiei, khan rorei `khat ang a ruchawng.
Khan akhat changna ranring cham kholok kha, ama maton a, ama na ruthaw. Khan rieliei le kha shung ah awm kholok hi thitna dawr a apawp riekier akhat changna ranring kha ama na chubairumawbawk.
Adi changna ranring na alientak jetna hai kha awthaw. Mi kholok imuk a, ravan ah put ah mieishe rieliei a jong muchummashak.
Ranring maton ah thaw rang a jetna hai jarkhan, rieliei a awm hai kha ama na rumohong. Khan rieliei a awm hai dieng khan chemjam a rupawp a ruriekier ranring rilim kha konna rang, ruriei.
Khan ranring rilim kha phuk pek a mawchawngna rang, makha ranring rilim chubaibawk boi hai kha nitthieitukshe mathatna rang, ama dieng ranak rupek joi.
Khan ashin alien, rawchawng shara, moshok miring le shok hai kha amani khutchang khan ninawkle amacha khan phairumatar joi.
Makha phaitar runiei le makha ranring riming ninawkle ama riming jat runiei hai kha na niboia, tute na rawchawk ninawkle jor thawna ngam boi rang a inih.
Varna kha hin awm. Jetthieina aniei ama kha na makha ranring jat kha te rosho, ajarla mahi miring `khat jat inih. Ama jat kha 666 inih.
Khan enro, Zion mo khan Kengamte na ding a awm. Ama le miring bawp rajakhat shawm mililieimili na ama riming le apa riming kha amani macha hai khan imiejiek u kha kiei na kurumuk.
Khan ravan ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet. Makha tui tampui le alientak khomiri hesho kha ruang. Khan kirujet hesho kha sharangdar le lah thaw hai na amani sharangdar i`at u kha le rura`ang.

Rengmun le aring juleva, khan bieklamkai hai maton khan amani na lah `thar ruthaw uh. Khan, rieliei ah put ah kheksha hai, bawp rajakhat shawm mililieimili kha na niboia, tute na makha lah kha ruchuk ngam u mak.

Hihaihi nupang hai le pawrche boilai apa hai, ajarla amani kha ashimbak runih uh. Hihaihi Kengamte kha eshena rikip a rujui hai kha nih uh. Hihaihi miring hai ah put ah kheksha hai, khan Pathien le Kengamte dieng a akhat changna ara kha nih uh.
Amani bai hai khan mohonna runiei u mak, ajarla amani kha Pathien rengmun maton a metek boi runih uh.

Khan ravan kawngkar a avung ravantir shik `khat hi kurumuk. Rieliei chung a a`awm hai phung le phungte rikip, khan chawng le miring rikip dieng thangtiknieiboi athachawng rophong rang, ama dieng ruawm.

Ama na he rashangtak a ruriei, “Pathien kha chih u roh, khan ama kha mulur u roh, ajarla ama chawngshatna rang a nidan kha jong joi. Khan ravan le rieliei, khan thampui le tuinar hai rukonpa ama kha chubaibawk u roh.”
Khan adi changna ravantir shik `khat na rujui a ruriei, “Cho joi, cho joi, Babylon khopui alien kha cho joi, ajarla ama rejai ditrekhena ju kha phung kholok irumenek inih.”
Khan athum changna ravantir shik `khat na amani kha rujui a he rashangtak a ruriei, “Tukhat na ranring le ama rilim kha chubaibawk a ama macha ah ninawkle ama khut chung ah phaitar kha awm pe joiatu,

Pathien na ama lunghangna khengkam shung ah reche boi a iliei, Pathien lunghangna ju kha, ama na`awm nek rangnih. Khan ravantir riethieng hai le Kengamte maton khan, miei le mieidi shung khan, ama kha shawmodoi rangnih.

Khan amani shawdoina mieikhu kha kumshawt a chung tieng ka rangnih. Khan tunita`awm ranring le ama rilim chubaibawk, khan ama riming phaitar aniei miring hai kha na shunlejan a shawmuchumna niei u mak.”
Pathien chawngpek hai le Jesu takashawn arung miriethieng hai doiratna kha hin awm.

Khan ravan ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet. Hitihin ruriei, “ ‘Tun ah put ah Pumi riming a athi ama kha rahvantha inih,’ tia miejiek roh.” Ratha na ieriei, “Idik, makha amani chon ah put ah shawmuchumna u rang a inih. Ajarla amani chonthaw hai kha na amani kha ijui inih.”
Khan kiei na kuruen a romiei angoi kurumuk. Romiei chung khan Miring Shapa a`ang miring `khat shuh a awm. Ama lu chung khan rangkachak renglukhum awm pe, khan ama khut khan kawite angaitak `khat awm.

Khan ravantir shik `khat hi riethiengmun ah put ah vak shok. Ama na romiei chung ah ashupa dieng khan he rashangtak a rura`ai, “Nang kawite kha jong tir tana jong rawkhawm rang roh, ajarla rawkhawmna rang a pha kha jong joi, ajarla rieliei a par hai kha minsho joi.”
Khan romiei chung ah ashupa kha na ama kawite kha rieliei chung a jong tet joi, khan rieliei kha rurawkhawm joi.
Khan ravantir shik `khat na ravan a awm riethiengmun ah put ah vak shok. Ama na`awm kawite angaitak runiei.

Khan maicham ah put ah ravantir shik `khat vak shok. Ama kha miei chung a cham runiei. Kawite angaitak `khat anieipa dieng khan he rashangtak a ruti, “Nang kawite angaitak kha jong tir tana rieliei drakha bawr hai hi jong rawkhawm rang roh, ajarla drakha ara hai kha minchit joi.”
Khan ravantir kha na ama kawite kha rieliei khan jong tet joi. Khan rieliei a drakha kha jong rawkhawm joi. Khan drakha hai kha Pathien phingna juepna lien khan apai joi.
Amani juepna kha khopui vai tieng khan eke le ruchiei uh. Juepna ah put ah thishen vak shok. Thishen kha shakawr jachan rashang dawrthep hi majin rajakhat shawmriet dawr hi rushe.
Khan kiei na ravan a alien le shindawngroi jetna shik `khat hi kurumuk. Ravantir shiri kha na railawn shiri runiei uh. Makha dawngkhit nih joi, ajarla amani dieng a Pathien lunghangna kha rupum joi.

Khan miei le rawpawr likli tuipui a`ang kiei na kurumuk. Khan ranring chung a, ama phaitar chung a, ama riming jat chung a, ramawtawr a, khan likli thampui chung ah Pathien sharangdar raklam a ruding u kha kurumuk.

Khan amani na Pathien shok Moses lah le Kengamte lah kha ruthaw ua, ruti uh, “Aw Chungchon a Ranakniei Pumi Pathien, nang chonthaw hai kha ielien, khan shindawngroi! Nang lam hai kha dikna le adik inih! Aw miriethieng hai Rengpa!

Tu na maw nang kha nichih boi a awm nih? Aw Pumi, nang riming kha mulur boi a awm nih maw? Ajarla nang ranga kha riethieng nangnih. Ajarla phung rikip na va ning, tia nang maikung a chubainabawk u rangnih, ajarla nang dikna chonthaw hai kha malar joi.”
Khan hihaihi shole, enro, kungachang thamber riethiengmun ravan a rawlawng kha kiei na kurumuk.
Khan railawn shiri aniei ravantir shiri hai kha na riethiengmun ah put ah vak shok uh. Amani na ponramasha cheklak rurieshiei uh, khan rangkachak kawngkhit hai kha amani awrawp thoi ah rukhit uh.
Khan aring juleva mili hai kar a `khat na ravantir shiri hai dieng rangkachak khengkam shiri, kumshawt a aring Pathien lunghangna shipmer kha rupek uh.
Khan Pathien lurna le ama ranak ah put ah mieikhu kha na riethiengmun kha rumiship, khan ravantir shiri railawn shiri kha mawtawr masheng, riethiengmun khan tute na rulut ngam u mak.
Khan riethiengmun ah put ah hesho lientak `khat hi kurujet. Ravantir shiri dieng khan ruti, “She tana Pathien lunghangna khengkam shiri kha rieliei a vak liei roh.”
Khan akhat changna ravantir kha na rushe a ama khengkam kha rieliei a vak liei joi. Khan ranring phaitar le ama rilim chubaibawk hai dieng khan ashie le chiroi panrai jong chuh pe u joi.
Khan adi changna ravantir kha na ama khengkam kha thampui chung ah ruliei. Makha athi miring thishen ruang, khan thampui shung ah aring ringphuk rikip kha ruthi joi.
Khan athum changnapa kha na ama khengkam kha tuidung le tuinar hai chung ah ruliei, khan amani kha thishen ruchang joi.
Khan tui hai ravantir kha na iruti kha kurujet: “Nang midik kha nangnih, Aw Pumi, nang anih, runih, khan anih rang a kha nangnih joi. Ajarla khatikhan nang na chawngnangrushat.
Ajarla amani na miriethieng hai le thiempulien hai thishen kha irumoshok u inih, khan amani kha nang na thishen kha nangmenek joi, amani kha, kha rangbak khan, rutuk u inih.”
Khan maicham ah put ah hesho `khat kurujet: “Awh, Chungchon a ranakniei Pumi Pathien, adik le dikna kha nang chawngshatna hai kha inih.”
Khan imili changna kha na ama khengkam kha ni chung a ruliei. Miring hai kha miei le hana rang, ni dieng khan cham kha irupek inih.
Khan miring hai kha mieisha lientak kha na rukang. Amani na hihai railawn chung a cham aniei Pathien riming kha rumieshiet uh. Pathien dieng lurna pekna rang, mulung lekna runiei u mak.
Khan arahnga changna kha na ranring rengmun khan ama khengkam kha ruliei. Khan ama rengchangna kha rujing pe. Ana pehai ua, miring hai kha na amani mieliei hai kha rureke uh.
Khan amani natna le panrai jarkhan, ravan Pathien kha rumieshiet uh. Khan amani chon hai ah put ah mulung rulek u mak.
Khan aruk changna kha na Euphrates tuidung alien chung khan ama khengkam kha ruliei. Ama tui hai kha rukang, makha nishokna tieng ah reng hai lam kha rashamna pe rang a inih.
Khan kiei na rorei bai ah put ah le ranring bai ah put ah, khan thiempulien nawk bai ah put ah uichawk hai a`ang raikho rono `thum vak shok kha kurumuk.
Ajarla amani kha jetna athaw raikho hai ratha kha inih. Amani na Chungchon a ranakniei Pathien Nikho lien ni a rathaw rang, lawp a rawkhawm rang, manmieshie rieliei pumpui reng hai dieng rushe uh.

“Enro, murushah ang a kiei ajong rang kanih joi. Tunita`awm mikkhu doi, khan ponledier rashamjer a awm ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih. Makha amani na ponledier boi a lawnna boi rang le ama ajak kha mi na mukna boi rang a inih.”
Khan Hebrew chawng a Armageddon iti mun `khat khan ama na lawp `khat a amani kha ruruchun joi.
Khan ishiri changna kha na ama khengkam kha rithi chung a ruliei. Khan ravan riethiengmun le rengmun ah put ah hesho alientak hi vak shok a ruriei, “Takchang joi!”
Khan khomelek hai, khomiri hai hesho hai kha ruawm. Khan nieinu lientak `khat rushok. Kha`ang a lien nieinu kha miring hai na rieliei shung ah ruawmret ah put ah rushok maklai.
Khan khopui alien kha tum `thum ah rureshen, khan phung khopui hai kha rupur. Ama lunghangna alientak ju hai kha pekna rang, Pathien na Babylon alien kha rumininghep joi.
Khan tuikawram rikip kha rutansho joi, khan mo hai kha ruawm u lai mak.

Khan talent `khat dawr arik, rie alientak `khat hi, ravan ah put ah miring hai chung ah jong cho a, makha rie railawn jarkhan, miring hai na Pathien kha rumieshiet uh, ajarla makha railawn kha ajeng a rulien inih.
Khan khengkam shiri aniei ravantir shiri hai kar a akhat na kiei dieng ava a ruti, “Hin va roh, tui tampui chung ah ashuh alien nawchijor chawngshatna kha nang dieng kiei na numumuk rang kanih.
Rieliei reng hai kha na ama kha le rejaichon thaw joi. Khan rieliei chung a awm hai kha ama rejaichon ju kha rumenek joi.”
Khan ravantir kha na Ratha a ramthim ah nuruchawi, khan kiei na nupang `khat hi ranring ashen chung ah ashuh a awm kurumuk. Ama na mieshietna riming shipmer, khan lu shiri le riki shawm ieniei.

Khan nupangnu kha na ponshendup le ashen rurieshiei, khan ama na rangkachak le manlu lung hai, khan kongkeplung hai kha le rurielien. Ama khut chung khan rejaichon, mitiroi le pawrche shipmer rangkachak hai `khat hi ruawm pe.
Khan ama macha khan: MURUKCHAWNG, BABYLON KHOPUI ALIEN, NAWCHIJOR HAI LE RIELIEI MITIROI HAI UNU, tia pekriming `khat rumiejiek.
Khan kiei na miriethieng hai thishen le khan Jesu jar a kungachang hai thishen kha le akhawp nupangnu kha kurumuk. Ama kha kumuk `le, shindawngna lientak le shindawngna kuruniei.
Khan ravantir kha na kiei dieng nuruti, “Ithaw shindawng maw nangnih? Kiei na nupangnu le khan, ama achawi, lu shiri le riki shawm aniei ranring murukchawng kha nieriei rang kanih.

Nangirumuk ranring kha pha `khat a runih, anih boi, khan hawng nih rang a inih. Khan dawngawmboi athuk ah put ah hawng shok ning, tia thangna khan she rangnih. Rieliei a awm, Ringna Behangjo ah amani riming hai miejiek boi hai kha na shindawngna runiei uh, ajarla ama kha runih, nilai mak, inia hawngret rangnih.
“Varna aniei mulungmining kha hin awm: lu shiri kha nupangnu shutna mo shiri kha inih.
Khan reng hai shiri ruawm, rahnga tu cho joi, akhat awmlai, khan shik `khat kha tu tunshe hawng maklai. Khan ama na hawng phakhan, phabawng `khat awm rangnih.
Khan runih, khan tuntu nih boi, ranring ama kha ariet changna reng kha inih. Ama kha shiri hai kar a akhat kha inih, khan ama na thangna tieng khan eshe.
“Khan nangirumuk riki shawm kha reng shawm kha inih. Amani kha rengchangna atum boilai hai kha inih, inia ranring kha le nidan `khat reng nitna rang khan cham kha man uh.
Hihaihi na mulung `khat runiei ua, ranring dieng amani ranak le cham hai kha pek rangnih.

Hihaihi na Kengamte kha le ra thaw u rangnih, khan Kengamte kha na amani kha adek rangnih, ajarla ama kha pumi hai chung a Pumi, khan reng hai chung a Reng kha inih. Khan ama le ruawm miring hai kha irukoi a irumadan khan takashawnthiei runih uh.”
Khan ravantir na kiei dieng nuruti, “Nangimuk nawchijor shutna tui hai kha miring hai le mipui hai, khan phung hai le chawng hai kha inih.

Khan ranring chung ah nangirumuk riki shawm kha na nawchijor kha mukmak u rangnih, khan ama kha mathangbieng a rekengver a atet u rangnih. Khan ataksha kha amani na shak pe u rangnih, khan ama kha miei le ha u rangnih.

Ajarla Pathien na ama chonmuchuk kha amani mulung a thawna rang, amani mulung kha iruchun a, Pathien chawng hai kha lawpsheng a hawng rupum masheng, amani rengchangna kha ranring dieng rupek jawt u rangnih.
Khan nangimuk nupangnu kha khopui alien, rieliei reng hai chung a reng achang kha inih.”
Hihaihi shole cham alientak `khat aniei, ravan ah put ah jong chum ravantir shik `khat hi kiei na kurumuk. Khan ama lurna kha na rieliei kha varpeng a rutet.
Khan ama na he ranakniei le rashangtak a rura`ai a ruti, “Cho joi, Babylon alien kha rucho joi, khan raikho hai awmna mun le ratha rono kholok, pawrche le mukmakroi va hai riekna kha ruchang joi!

Ajarla ama rejai ditrekhena ju kha phung rikip na runek joi, khan rieliei reng hai kha na ama le rejaichon ruthaw u joi. Khan rieliei a rievieithaw miring hai kha na ama hurna hai rekhe khan rurawchawng shishit uh.”

Khan ravan ah put ah shik `khat hesho kha kurujet a ruti, “Kimiring hai, nangni ama ah put ah vak shok u roh. Makha ama munu hai kha nangtum puina boi u rang le ama railawn hai kha ih kha nita`awm nangmukna boi u rang a inih.
Ajarla ama munu hai kha rietien a ravanshe phak joi, khan Pathien na ama dikna boi hai kha mininghep joi.
Ama na irupek kha ang a ama dieng peh u roh. Ama na ithaw dungjuia rothom a ama dieng peh u roh. Khan ama na irupawr hai khan ama rangbak khan rothom a peh u roh.

Ama na rekhe a ruhur a nining a rumulur nana kha ang a, rutukthep a ama kha shawmodoi tana mawshaw roh, ajarla umulung khan iti, ‘Kiei na rengnu `khat a kashuh inih, kiei mieirawng kha nimi`ing, khan kiei na mulungshaw kha muh mi`ing.’

“Khajarkhan nikho `khat shung a ama railawn kha jong rangnih, makhala thitna, mulungkurna le nekleshak tangna hai kha inih, khan ama kha miei le habieng rangnih. Ajarla ama chung a chawngashat Pumi Pathien kha ranakniei kha inih.
“Khan ama le rejaichon ruthaw, ama le hurna chon ruthaw rieliei reng hai kha na, ama kha miei na ikangna mieikhu kha rumuk u phakhan, chap u rangnih, khan ama chung a mulungkurna niei u rangnih.
Khan ama shawdoina kha chih a amani na ralaviei a ding a ruti u rangnih: ‘Echei, echei, Babylon khopui alien, ranakniei khopui! Ajarla nidan `khat shung a chawngshatna kha jong joi.’
“Rieliei a rievieithaw hai kha na chap a ama chung a mulung rumukur uh, ajarla tute na amani rievieithawna nieinak hai kha rawchawk pe u lai mak.

Amani rievieithawna nieinak hai khala: rangkachak, dangka, khan manlu lung hai le kongkeplung, manrawp ponramasha le ponshenrin, khan lungphurpon le ashen pon, manrawp thing kholok, shaipui ha ah put a kon nieinak rikip, khan manrawptatak thing ah put ah kon nieinak rikip, khan shumeng le thir le lungngoi
thingteinei le manam hoi berawh, khan manam hoi thao, libanos, ju, olive thao, chachaidi atha, gehu, insha, kengam, shakawr hai, shakawr gari hai, shok hai le miring hai ringphuk hai kha inih.
“Khan nang ringphuk na idit thieira amin kha nang ah put ah she joi, khan nieinak atha le alur kholok kha nang ah put ah thangsho joi, khan amani kha nang na manlai naw tinih.
Nupangnu jar a hawng rawchawng miring hai kha ama shawrieviei kha chih ua, ralaviei ah ding u rangnih. Amani na chap u rangnih, mulungkur pe u rangnih.
Amani na ti uh, ‘Awi e, awi e, khopui alien, ponramasha jielak, ponshendup le pon ashen, rangkachak, manlu lung hai, khan kongkeplung le rielien khopui khaw!
Ajarla nidan `khat a khadawr a rawchawng kha rokpet joi.’ Rokonglien rikip, rokonglien a rawlawn kholok, rokongtor hai, thampui chung ah rievieithaw rikip na arala a ruding uh.
Khan ama akang mieikhu kha rumuk u phakhan ruti uh, ‘Mahi khopui alien hi le ra`ang imaw awm?’

“Khan amani lu chung ah ruvut rubo uh, khan rura`ai ua, ruchap uh, khan mulungkurlam a rie`iek a ruti uh, ‘Awi e, awi e, khopui alien, ama niei jar a thampui chung ah rokonglien runiei kholok kha rurawchawngmashak! Ajarla nidan `khat shung a ama kha rokpet a atet joi.’
“Aw ravan, nangni miriethieng hai, tirtawn hai, thiempulien hai nangni ama chung a ningai u roh, ajarla Pathien na nang chawngshatna u kha ama chung a mocho joi!”
Khan ravantir arat `khat na lungshum lientak `khat a`ang lung kha loi a tuipui chung ah ruthong ah ruti, “Hitihin Babylon khopui alien kha ranak a vawr rangnih, khan muret, iti awmlai naw nih.

Khan nang dieng sharangdar at hai, lah thiei hai, thieikhang tum hai, khan tekawlawi tum hai tute na rangairet, iti awmlai naw nih. Khan nang dieng khutthiem hai khutshin thawret, iti awmlai naw nih. Khan nang dieng lungshum miri kha jetretlai naw tinih.

Khan nang dieng thaomiei avar kha varret, iti awmlai naw nih. Khan nang dieng moinu le moipa hesho rangairet, iti awmlai naw nih. Ajarla rievieithaw hai kha rieliei a milien runih uh, ajarla nang dawileai kha na phung kholok kha rumohong joi.
Khan thiempulien hai le miriethieng hai, khan rieliei chung a ithat miring kholok thishen kha ama dieng iruman inih.”
Hihai kholok shole hin ravan a hawipui hesho ang a hesho lientak `khat hi kurujet a ruti, “Hallelujah! Shandamna, ranak le lurna kha Pumi napathien u dieng awm!

Ajarla ama chawngshatna kha adik le dikna kha inih. Ajarla ama rejaichon kha na rieliei pumpui imathang nawchijor alien chung a chawngshat joi, Pumi na ama shok hai thishen kha ama chung a phuhen loi joi.”
Khan voidi changna amani na ruti uh, “Hallelujah. Khan kumshawtkumshawt rang khan ama mieikhu kha hawng joi!”
Khan lamkai shawm dilieimili kha le aring juleva mili kha na rubawklap uh, khan rengmun ah ashuh Pathien dieng khan chubairubawk ua, ruti uh, “Amen! Hallelujah!”
Khan rengmun ah put ah hesho `khat vak shok a, ruti, “Nangni ama shok hai, achih miring hai, ashinalien na napathien u kha mapak u roh!”
Khan kiei na mipui hesho a`ang, tui tampui hesho a`ang, khan khomiri lientak hesho a`ang `khat kurujet. Hitihin ruti, “Hallelujah! Ajarla Chungchon a ranakniei nupumi u Pathien kha na reng chang joi!
Kieini na ningai u rawi, khan rawshaw u rawi, khan ama dieng lurna kha mutung u rawi. Ajarla Kengamte innieina kha jong joi, khan unungak kha na nining a rasham joi.”
Khan ama rielienna rang, ashiei ponramasha thaning, achaining le retelang kha ama dieng rupek joi, ajarla ponramasha thaning kha miriethieng hai dikna kha inih.

Khan ravantir na kiei dieng nuruti, “ ‘Kengamte inniei bumichinna ah ikoi amani kha rahvanmuh miring hai kha inih!’ tia miejiek roh.” Khan kiei dieng nuruti, “Hihaihi Pathien chawng adik hai kha inih.”

Khan kiei na ama kha chubaibawk rang, ekekung a kurubawklap. Khan kiei dieng nururiei, “Nang na makha thaw naw roh! Kiei hi nang shok changpui kha kanih, khan Jesu kungchangna aniei nang uliennai hai shok changpui kha kanih. Pathien kha chubaibawk roh! Ajarla rophongchawng ratha hi Jesu kungchangna kha inih.”
Khan kiei na ravan imawlawng a shakawr angoi `khat kurumuk. Makha chung ah ashuh kha Takashawn rang a rutuk le Adik, tia rukoi. Ama na dikna a chawngishat a ra`ithaw inih.
Khan ama mik hai kha mieichon `ruang pe, khan ama lu khan renglukai tampui ruawm pe. Makhan tute na ijet boi miejiek riming `khat awm, inia ama ranga na makha ejet.
Khan thishen shung a inawm ponrosho `kha ama na rurieshiei, khan ama riming kha Pathien Chawng iti.
Khan ravan a ramiring hai kha na shakawr angoi hai chung ah, angoi le acheklak, khan ponramasha thaning le rielien a, ama kha rujui uh.

Khan ama bai ah put ah chemjam shirdi a angai vak shok pe, makha phung hai kha jemna rang a inih. Khan thir rawmaw le amani kha ihoi rang a inih. Khan Chungchon a Ranakniei Pathien lunghangna kha le juepna kha achiei a awm.
Khan ama ponledier le ama atawr chung ah riming kha “RENG HAI RENG, KHAN PUMI HAI PUMI,” tia miejiek.
Khashole kiei na ni shung a ading ravantir `khat kurumuk. Khan ama na he rashangtak a rura`ai a ravanlai ah avung va hai kholok dieng ruti, “Alien Pathien bumichinna khan va u tana vak ruchun u roh.

Makha reng hai taksha, rabawpkhat lamkai hai taksha, arat miring hai taksha, shakawr hai taksha le amani chung ah ashuh hai taksha, khan moshok hai taksha le shok hai taksha, khan ashinalien hai taksha shakna rang, vak ruchun u roh.”
Khan kiei na ranring le rieliei reng hai, khan amani ramiring hai na lawp `khat a ruchun a shakawr chung ah ashuh ama chung a le ama ramiring chung a rathawna rang, vak ruchun kha kurumuk.

Khan ranring kha ama maton ah erekhek chon athaw thiempulien jok kha le rushur joi. Khan jetna thaw makha na ranring phaitar aniei hai le ama rilim chubaibawk hai kha irumohon inih. Adinre kha mieidi le iha Mieidir khan rupai joi.
Khan aliemlim kha shakawr chung ah ashupa bai ah vak shok chemjam kha le ruthat a va hai kholok na amani taksha kha le vawn mishipna a ruthaw u joi.
Khan kiei na ravantir `khat hi ravan ah put ah jong chum a, dawngawmboi athuk chabi le ukhut ah thirakarui lientak `khat irak kha kurumuk.
Khan ama na matienglai a moro, nititu, diabol le Satan achang rorei kha rushur a, kum bawp `khat rang khan rukhop joi.

Ama kha dawngawmboi a athuk khan ruthong, khan rukhar a ama chung ah jetnam runam joi. Makha, kum bawp `khat kha mawtawr masheng, phung hai kha mohonnaret, iti awmna boi rang a inih. Makha shole ama kha pha bawng `khat moshok rangnih.

Khan kiei na rengmun hai kha kurumuk, khan makhan ah ashuh hai dieng khan chawngshatna rang, cham kha amani dieng rupek. Khan Jesu jar a kungchang le Pathien chawng jar a ring ituk pe hai ringphuk kha kurumuk. Amani kha ranring ninawkle ama rilim chubaibawk boi hai, khan amani macha ninawkle khut ah phaitar aniei boi hai kha runih uh. Khan amani na hawng ring ua, Christa le kum bawp `khat reng ruchang uh.
Aliemlim shik athi hai kha tu, kum bawp `khat hi mawtawr masheng, hawng ring u mak. Mahi akhat changna thoiretna kha inih.

Akhat changna thoiretna a ajaw miring kha rahvanmuh le miriethieng kha inih. Hihai chung hin adi changna a thitna kha na chamniei mak, inia amani kha Pathien le Christa thiempu hai kha chang u rangnih. Khan ama le kum bawp `khat reng chang u rangnih.
Khan kum bawp `khat kha mawtawr phakhan, Satan kha ama lungroko ah put ah moshok rangnih.
Khan ama na kiei mili ah awm phung hai, Gog le Magog, kha mohon a rathaw rang ruchunmashakna rang, vak shok rangnih. Amani kha tuipui ah nge kha ang a rawp uh.
Khan amani na rieliei akhang kha dechip a hawng rakan ua, amani na miriethieng hai awmna le numipok u khopui kha ruroko uh. Khan miei na Pathien le ravan ah put ah vak shok a amani kha kang u joi.
Khan amani mohon diabol kha ranring le thiempulien jok ngakmun Mieidir le mieidi akang shung khan ruthong joi. Khan shunlejan a le kumshawtkumshawt khan shawmodoi u rangnih.
Khashole kiei na alien rengmun angoi le makhan ah ashupa kha kurumuk. Ama awmna ah put ah rieliei le ravan kha tan u joi, khan amani rang mun awm pelai mak.

Khan kiei na ashinalien athi hai kha rengmun maton ah ading kha kurumuk, khan behangjo hai kha rurawlawng. Khan behangjo shik `khatawm rawlawng kha kurumuk, makha Ringna Behangjo kha inih. Khan athi hai kha amani ithaw le behangjo shung ah miejiek dungjuia, amani kha chawngrushat pe uh.
Tuipui kha na makhan ah ruawm athi hai kha rumathan joi. Thitna le Thikho kha na amani shung ah awm athi hai kha rupek joi. Mi rikip kha amani ithaw dungjuia chawngshat pe joi.
Khashole thitna le Thikho kha Mieidir khan ruthong joi. Mahi Mieidir hi adi changna Thitna kha inih.
Khan tu riming nitjoiawm, Ringna behangjo shung ah miejiek boi kha Mieidir khan ruvawr joi.
Khan kiei na ravan athar le rieliei athar kha kurumuk, ajarla akhat changna ravan le akhat changna rieliei kha thang joi, khan tuipui kha awmretlai mak.
Khan John kiei na khopui riethieng, Jerusalem `thar, i`inko rang a irielien, moi `thar kha ang a rasham, ravan a le Pathien ah put ah put ah jong chum kha kiei na kurumuk.

Khan kiei na ravan ah put ah hesho rashang `khat kurujet a, ruti, “Enro, Pathien thamber kha miring hai le awm joi. Ama na amani le awm rangnih. Amani kha ama miring chang u rangnih. Pathien amatak na amani le awm a, amani Pathien kha chang rangnih.

Khan amani mik hai ah put ah Pathien na imikrithi kholok kha no pe u rangnih, khan thitna, iti kha awmlai naw nih; mulungshaw, chapna ninawkle natna, iti awmretlai naw nih, ajarla matienglai a nieinak hai kha thangsho joi.”
Khan rengmun ah ashuh ama kha na ruti, “Enro, nieinak kholok kiei na kamathar joi.” Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Miejiek roh, ajarla hihai chawng hi adik le takashawn rang a rutuk inih.”
Khan ama na kiei dieng nuruti, “Tak chang joi! Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Putna le Mutumna kha kanih. Ringna tui tuinar ah put ah tuira ama dieng khan man boi a kiei na nekna rang, pek rang kanih.
Ramawtawr ama kha na hihai kholok hi arawh rangnih, khan kiei na ama Pathien kha chang rang kanih, khan ama na kashapa kha chang rangnih.

Inia achirat hai, takashawn boi, khan mitiroi, mithat miring hai, rejaichon thaw hai, dawileai thaw hai, rilim chubaibawk hai, khan mielieishiei miring kholok mun kha tu, miei le mieidi achong thampui kha inih. Makha adi changna thitna kha inih.”

Khashole ravantir shiri kar a akhat, dawngkhit railawn shiri shipmer khengkam shiri hai runieipa kha na kiei dieng chawngruriei a ruti, “Va roh, kiei na Kengamte nungak, moinu kha numumuk rang kanih.”
Khan kiei hi Ratha a alientak le rashangtak mo khan nuruchawi a khopui alien, Jerusalem riethieng kha Pathien le ravan ah put ah jong chum kha nurumumuk.
Makha na Pathien lurna kha runiei. Ama mieivar kha manluving lung le, jasper lung ang a langlang a ruvar.

Makha na alien le rashang bang kha runiei. Makha na pakawt shawmlieidi runiei, khan makha pakawt hai khan ravantir shawmlieidi le amani riming hai kha imiejiek ruawm. Amani kha Israel nai hai phungte shawmlieidi kha nih uh.
Shim tieng khan pakawt `thum ruawm, khan shak tieng khan pakawt `thum ruawm, khan thang tieng khan pakawt `thum ruawm, khan mar tieng pakawt `thum ruawm.
Khan khopui bang kha na chawkhur shawmlieidi runiei, khan amani chung khan Kengamte tirtawn shawmlieidi riming hai kha ruawm.
Khan kiei le riebieh ravantir kha na makha khopui, ama pakawt hai le ama bang hai kha onna rang, rangkachak kairidik `khat runiei.

Khan khopui kha pukiei mili a awm, khan dung shieithep kha rajai. Khan kairidik kha le khopui kha ama na rute. Makha majin bawp `khat le rajarahnga rushiei. Khan khopui udungakhang le arashang kha ra`ang.
Khan makha bang hai kha cubit rajakhat shawmmililieimili dawr rumasha. Makha ravantir na irurotokna u miring onna dungjuia onna `khat kha inih.
Khan bang kha jasper le irashak inih. Khan khopui kha rangkachak jielak le ikon inih.
Khopui bang chawkhur kha manlu lung shikshik le irielien inih. Akhat changna jasper, adi changna shapphire; athum changna chalcedony, imili changna, emerald,

arahnga changna sardonyx, aruk changna sardius, ishiri changna chrysolite, ariet changna beryl, ako changna topaz, ashawm changna chrysoprase, shawmlieikhat changna jacinth, khan shawmlieidi changna kha amethyst inih.
Khan pakawt shawmlieidi kha kongkeplung shawmlieidi runih. Khan pakawt changkidip kha kongkeplung `khat iniei. Khan khopui lamlien kha amalang likli ang a rangkachak jielak runih.
Khan khopui shung khan riethiengmun muh mi`ing, ajarla Chungchon a Ranakniei Pumi Pathien le Kengamte hai kha ama riethiengmun kha inih.
Khan khopui kha na, amani rang a avar, ni le tha rangai mak, ajarla Pathien lurna kha na makha mavar joi, khan makhan a Kengamte kha mieivar kha inih.
Khan phung hai kha na ama avar jar a awlawn, khan rieliei reng hai kha na amani lurna le richit kha khopui shung khan vak chawi uh.
Khan pakawt hai kha nishun khan kharlai naw nih, ajarla makha mun khan nitak, iti kha awmlai naw nih.
Khan amani na phung hai lurna le richit kha khopui dieng vak chawi u rangnih.
Khan orono, iti le mitiroi ninawkle mielieishiei hai kha itikte nita`awm makhan lutlai naw nih. Inia Kengamte Ringna Behangjo shung ah imiejiek hai ranga kha makhan lut rangnih.
Khan langlang a var ringna tui jielak kha kiei dieng nurumumuk. Makha Pathien le Kengamte rengmun ah put ah jong long inih.

Makha khopui lamlien laitak khan tuidung shir dire khan ara shawmlieidi aniei ringna thingkung ruawm. Makha na tha rikip a ara rumoshok. Makha thingbo hai kha na phung hai kha ana ah put ah madamna rang a inih.
Makha mun khan pumbotna, iti awmlai naw nih. Pathien le Kengamte rengmun kha makha shung khan awm rangnih. Khan oshok hai kha na ama chon kha thaw pe rangnih.
Ama maisho kha amani na muk u rangnih, khan ama riming kha amani macha hai khan awm rangnih.

Khan jan, iti kha awmlai naw nih. Khan thaomiei mieivar le nivar kha rangailai naw nih, ajarla amani chung a Pumi Pathien na mieivar kha pek rangnih joi. Khan amani na kumshawtkumshawt khan reng chang u rangnih joi.

Khan ravantir na kiei dieng nuruti, “Hihai chawng hi takashawn rang a rutuk le adik kha inih.” Khan thiempulien riethieng hai Pumi Pathien na relen a ashokngir rang a chon hai kha ama shok hai dieng mumukna rang, ama ravantir kha jong tir joi.
“Enro, kiei ajongrelen rang kanih. Mahi behangjo rophongchawng arung ama kha rahvanmuh miring kha inih.”
Hihaihi rujet `le rumupa kha John kiei kanih. Kiei na hihaihi kurumuk le kurujet phakhan, kiei dieng a hihaihi nurumumuk ravantir kekung khan bawklap a chubaikurubawk.

Khan kiei dieng nururiei, “Nang na makha thaw naw roh, ajarla kiei hi nang shok changpui, nang uliennai thiempulien hai le mahi behangjo chawng hai arung miring hai kha le chonthawshom kanih keng. Pathien kha chubaibawk roh.”
Khan kiei dieng nuruti, “Mahi behangjo rophongchawng hai kha jetnam nam naw roh, ajarla apha kha nai joi.
Midik boi hai kha na midik boi khan awmdi rosho. Rono athaw ama kha na rono chon kha thawdi rosho. Midik kha na adik chon kha thawdi rosho, khan riethieng ama kha na riethieng a awmdi rosho.”
“Enro, kiei ajongrelen rang kanih joi. Khan kiei na mi rikip dieng amani ithaw dungjuia pekna rang, kawlawh kha kiei le awm.
Kiei hi Alpha le Omega, Akhat changna le Mutumna, khan Putna le Mawtawrna kha kanih.”
Amani na ringna thingkung khan vatna rang a cham kha nieina rang le pakawtpakawt ah lut a khopui lutnathiei rang, Pathien chawngpek ajui hai kha rahvanmuh miring hai kha nih uh.
Ajarla ui hai, dawileai thaw hai, rejaichon thaw hai, mithat hai, rilim chubaibawk hai, adik boi numapoh hai, kholok kha khopui vai tieng ah awm hai kha nih uh.
“Jesu kiei na karavantir kha biekrup hai le nang dieng kungchang rang, kojong tir joi. Kiei hi Rujung, David Chicha, Jingkar Arshi Avar kha kanih.”
Ratha le moinu kha na ruti, “Va roh!” Khan rangai miring rikip na “Va roh!” ti rosho. Khan tuira miring rikip kha na va rosho. Adit mi rikip kha na ringna apeh tui kha manboi a loi rosho.

Ajarla mahi behangjo rophongchawng hai hi rangai miring rikip dieng kungkachang inih: Tukhat na amani dieng hi obo joiatu, mahi behangjo shung ah imiejiek railawn hai hi Pathien na makha miring dieng bo pe rangnih.

Khan tukhat na mahi behangjo rophongchawng hai hi apai joiatu, Ringna Behangbuk ah put ah, khopui riethieng ah put ah, khan mahi behangjo a imiejiek nieinak hai ah put ah Pathien na ama tum kha apai pe rangnih.
Hihai kungachangpa kha na ieriei, “Diktak a kiei ajongrelen rang kanih joi.” Amen. Jong roh, Aw Pumi Jesu!
Pumi Jesu roihoina kha nang kholok le a`awm nih rosho. Amen.
